1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag ga dang / tan+tad+d+haHe kang te ma n+ta ka ma 'i rtogs parjid myu k+ShaH/ bodaska dang/ ral gcig ma sa kyi dbyings bla da ma
1b2(rnying rgyud): ya ma'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal padz+ra gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di snyed bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ yum gyi mkha' chos kyi dbyings rnam
1b3(rnying rgyud): par dag pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ chos kyi sku thig le nyag gcig/ rgya phyogs bcu yongs su ma chad cing / longs spyod thams cad rang la rdzogs pa'i sku/ rang byung po
1b4(rnying rgyud): nya lha mo'i gzugs su byung ba ni/ bud med sdug mo ga yu yi smi na ma can/ sprul pa'i dung gi mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyi bo'i gtsug na g.yu yi ral gcig ma/ ral pa'i
1b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal bsgral pa'i mo'i bar ba/ rab po'i skud nas sprul pa'i glog slong 'thub/ rab pa'i mtha' nas khrag gi sar rab 'bib pa/ zad med drug ma 'bum gyi bas
2a1(rnying rgyud): gyus/ na rdzunas zhes gangs na g+sa/ dU sa kyog thas na smig na nam kyang / na ng+gAngs bathur / zlu mas
2a2(rnying rgyud): 'debs pa/ 'jig rten gtso mo dbyings kyi ral gcig ma zhes bya ste/ 'khor zhi ba'i las byed ma mo bzhi dang / rgyas pa'i las byed ma mo bzhi dang / dbang gi las byed ma mo bzhi dang / zag po'i las byed ma mo bzhi
2a3(rnying rgyud): ste/ las byed ma mo bcu drug dang thabs cig tu bzhugs nas/ dpyid zla gsum la dur khrod na bzhugs nas/ sha khrag gi zas tshol/ skye 'gro khram la 'debs pas/ e ka dza ti ma zhes kyang bya/ dbyar zla gsum la nam
2a4(rnying rgyud): mkhar gnas shing / me tog dang sems can gyi bkrag mdangs dang bcud lan/ rtse 'gro zhum la 'debs pas/ b+ha ga rbiSh+Ti mkha' la char 'bebs ma zhes kyang bya'o// ston zla gsum la ri rab kyi zom lnga
2a5(rnying rgyud): gnas shing / 'azas pa thams cad kyi bcud len/ skye 'gro tham la 'dings pas sring bzhi pa 'thams zag ma rgyal zhes kyang gyur// dgun grags ma la byung shar mtshams na/ chags par/
2b1(rnying rgyud): gan nga bug sum ldanas 'dasas/ rkye grolam naskye zug rnamags su gyu// thugs sa su sa kyad smra/ nasas su pas pa sa // slod dang //
2b2(rnying rgyud): da / dus smra ga 'i rdzugs/
2b3(rnying rgyud): 'dreg stong ngas gcig pa 'gyur ba'i sgrar gyur te/ 'jig rten khams thams cad nyams shing drug la khrugs nas/ khams gsus dbang du ba grus/ sred gsum thil kyis yinan/ dregs pa can rnams cad ci brgyad nas sang 'das pa las/ skyems ni
2b4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug/ ye shes kyi ha rug rje 'phrul can gcig tu gyur te/ dpal chen po la gsol pa/ lha mchog dregs pa 'dul mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la bdadug btud nas// 'bar ma dbyings kyi dam gcig sa// lta ba'i brag ni ji ltar bca
2b5(rnying rgyud): spyod na'is ni ji ltar dor // / dbang dang ngamachog byed par gang // bsru na nyams su ji ltar thang // khyad par rdzas ni gang la brten// gsang sngags rim pa ji ltar bzlas// brags dam gnad nas mi ltar bsgral// pram pa'i rtag su tshad gang masur//
2b6(rnying rgyud): ma grub gnad la ji ltar dbab// nyams na thugs dam ji ltar bskrang // phrin las khyad par rnam pa Ta// 'dri don brtson 'grus nan tan du// denga'abo thugs nges bka' sngol cig/ su kr-i la ma'i rgyud las rkyen gleng slong ba'i ler ste gnyis daso/
2b7(rnying rgyud): de na sa bcom ldan 'das deng la bang+gA gar kyi bang phyug gis/ dbyings kyi la gcig ma byang chub tu srog ga zung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par lpags nas/ blta bas zag bcad pa 'di ched du gsungs pa/ thig pa snying blang chung sems/ rang
3a1(rnying rgyud): 'di 'dram nges pas// rig dang ma rig rang byung nas// las dang ye shes gnyis su snang // ma rig pa la mngon zhan nas// las kye ma mor gzung ba lI// rang sems rang ga gdon du che// khrims gsam
3a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i g.yang sa yin// dug sbrul rgya mtshor lhung bar 'gyur// rig pa ye shes ma mo ste// ma mo thig le byang chub sems// thig le nyid la nyid snang ste// rig dang ma rig thig ser mnyam// las dang ye shes gnyis pa med/
3a3(rnying rgyud): mo rang gyu/ ye shes te// rang byung ye shes rang la snang // de rtogs de la gang gnas pa// sangs rgyas snying po yin par bshad// su sri ya ma'i rgyud las ma mo byang chub tu srog gzung zhing ltabs la bzla ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
3a4(rnying rgyud): de nas ngocom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis gang dar med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ spyod pas la dong ba 'di ched du bka' stsal tI// thig gri sus bral ma gcigs// thams cad 'byung gnas kun bzang mo// gnyis med
3a5(rnying rgyud): pa bde da'i mchog/ gzugs snang slar grag sems snang ba// ma mo'i sku gsung thugs nyid de// de nyid thig ler longs spyod pa// spyod pa rmad du byung ba yin// phan gnod dmigs 'gro yon tan zhing // byed spyod phrin las rnam pa bzhi// gnyis med pade
3a6(rnying rgyud): bAr s+yA par bya// kye shi med par bskal ba yang // thig le nyid las ma g.yos na// skrod bzig le rol pa'i rgyan// zhes bka' stsal to// su gri ya ma'i rgyud las spyod pas la dor de'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal badz+ra gar
3a7(rnying rgyud): gyi dpo / phyag gis/ khams gsum dbang du bkru ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rim pa dbang gis bgrod pa 'di ched du dka' stsal to// dab gi ngo bo shes rab ste// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa la// lung bstan byin gyis brlab pa dang // dang
3b1(rnying rgyud): bsrung po ba par byub la// byin dra gsang ba rnam gsum \u0f7f// dam gyi yi dbang bsgyur ba// mamamakha' 'gro 'dra ba'i spang// dur khrod gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ma gcig bsnyen cing sgrub pa dang // mnan ma btan pa zlab cu ste// gas ba mcho/
3b2(rnying rgyud): gri dem rdzas kyis// dmal mi ldog dbang bskur ro// nang gi dbang bskur thob bya ba// bdag nyid dbang chen srur bsgoms te// gzungs ma sha mdog dmar ba la// bdag mor dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// thig la byang chub sems spos la// byang sems
3b3(rnying rgyud): thig le dkar dmar gyis// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rnams su dbang bskur ro// trag rAg+na mu tra/ e kadza ti snying kha rag mo kA pa badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ zhes pas ma mo'i lha'i dbang thob par gyur cig/ thag raH/ mu tra e ka dza ti
3b4(rnying rgyud): snying ba dag mo lAg badz+ra swAb+hA wa a~M Sh+T+r-ihU~M/ khrus ma mo gsung gi dbyung thob par gyur cig/ dza ga~M g+h+ra mU rba e kadza ti snying khe dag mo tsita badz+ra mA~M d+hA la At+ma na na/ zhes ma mo thugs kyi dbang thob par gyur cig/ trag rak+ke mung e kadza ti ltad la ga mo ar+tha
3b5(rnying rgyud): rAg padz+ra swa b+hA wa Ar+thako&ha~M/ ma mo yon tan gyi dbang thob par gyur cig/ drug ragA mu tra e ka dza ti snying pa rag mo karma badz+ra swA b+hA wa A kau&ha~M/ zhes ma mo phrin las kyi dbang thob par gyur cig/ so so'i rdzas kyis dbang bskur te// mi ldog brtan
3b6(rnying rgyud): zhing thob par bya// gsang ba'i dbang bskur thob pa ni// ma mor snang ba rang gi sems// sems nyid ma bcos thig le'i ring // sems la rang dbang thob pa na// chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin de// khams gsum 'khor ba'i g.yul las kyang//
3b7(rnying rgyud): zhes bka' stsal to// sU kri ya ma'i rgyud las dbang gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ mi 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig gi gnad 'di ched du bka' stsal to// dam du
4a1(rnying rgyud): bcas pa sdom pa ste// mi 'da' ba ste dam pa'i rigs// 'das na 'bras bu chog pas na// dper na tal mgo bcad bzhin// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// dam tshig dang ni sdom pa la// khyad par
4a2(rnying rgyud): thun mo rnam pa gnyis// thun mong 'bum sde sa ma ya// bsrun sum brgya drug drung 'dus// de yang rtsa ba yan lag gi// dam chog nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// bslus pa sku gsung thugs yin no// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// chags dang phyug
4a3(rnying rgyud): rgya rgyun Ni gcad// gsang tshi ga gzhan du sgra mi bya// dam tshig rdo rje mchog gsum po// ma mo'i sku gsung thugs yin te// dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi// yid bzhin dgos 'dod skong ba'i gter// khyad par ma mo'i dam tshig ni//
4a4(rnying rgyud): ma dang mo yi don rtogs nas// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa rgyun mi gcod// ting 'dzin rtsa gcig brtan pa dang // rtag tu dam tshig bden pa dang // mdzod tshigs gtor ma rgyan mig cad// ma la rtag tu gdung ba bskyed// dam tshig sngags dang phyag
4a5(rnying rgyud): rgya ba rten// rgyud kyi khungs dang sgrub pa'i gnas// bsrub pa'i grogs dang gzungs ma dang // brda tshig nam yang brjod mi bya// rtag tu dme nyams mkhon mi bya// dus bzhi rgya ba'i gnas su bskang // zhes bka' stsal to// sU pri ya ma'i rgyud las dAm
4a6(rnying rgyud): gnad kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ dbar sgyur thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ srub thabs kyi rim pa bka' stsal pa ni/ mtho bsnyen cing sgrub pa la// thabs ni rang
4a7(rnying rgyud): 'bring zhem gsum// rab kyis ting 'dzin brten te bsgrubs// 'bring gis sngags la brten te bsgrubs// thams rdzas la brten te bsgrubs// rab kyis ting 'dzin brten bya ba// bskyed pa'i tshul dang rdzogs pa dang // rdzogs pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gsum// rim
4b1(rnying rgyud): nga'aphrul gyis thobardzus na// shAs rab tang 'dzin mthad tan// ma byad gnyis dang maldan na// dngos smra bathob pa'i thabs dang bral// bathad gnyis la langs kyad na// ma mA dngas klub nga dbang zang// ngas na pa zla brtag par bya// d+ha/
4b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin rim pa ni// de bzhin nyid dang kun snang rgya// dbang chen yum lnga'i b+ha ga cu// d+haD+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// ro rdzogs stong gi gdan steng du// lha mo bsnol ba'i khri steng na// rma srin tir nag mon// bzhi po waM hUM
4b3(rnying rgyud): zla bsam// skrag nag dza yis 'gro 'dra las// bud med skrag mo chen mo gcig/ gser gyi spyan lag yu yi smin// zhal ba zad dung gi mche ba gtsigs// sku stod zhing gi g.yeng gzhi gsol// mu skad stug gi sham thabs cad// klu rigs
4b4(rnying rgyud): ldes ni sbrul brgyan// thod pa tshar gsum se ral kha// dbul bskul ba'i me dpung 'bar// sbyin mig g.yas na khrag mtsho khyil// phyag g.yon b+had+ha ra k+Shas bkang // g.yas pa rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol// zhabs gnyis brkyang bsum dor
4b5(rnying rgyud): thangs bgrad// bud med skyug mo 'bum gyis bskor// ting nge 'dzin gyi me gtong zhing // rim pas bsgom zhing brtan par bya// ye shes mA mo spun drangs shing // pas kyi ma mo dgug gzhug bstim// de yi mthu dang ldan bya ste// phrin las rnam
4b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi dmigs dang sbya // yongs na bar du gcod par 'gyur// ma yengs brtan na dngos srung 'grub// s+phu thi ya ma'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de na rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin grub pa ni// snyir po chog tsa
4b7(rnying rgyud): brjod de'am// dran rig tsam gyis rdzogs pa ni// chu las chu bur rol ba'i tshul// bud med sdug mag bu can// bka' rgyal nad ci ga ma du 'ong // lus deng grib na'i tshul du 'phrogs// ma sring lta bur gdung nga la// bsgo banyan pa'i bran mor ba tag
5a1(rnying rgyud): pa pa'i rgyud las rmugs dman kyi pan/ thu na da bang sa/ dang phag pa nga da// mas dang
5a2(rnying rgyud): skyed pas// sems nyid ma ma nam par // se bzhin na da pa'i ga N+DIr 'chang bas// dgos 'dod dang la byung ba skyed// zugs na mas sa ma d+h-in// spyad thams cad po gsung // ngan mas padum 'i thugs/
5a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i stobs 'chang ba// longs spyod ring la rdzogs pa'i phra// sbrul pa mi bzad 'dod dgur gyur// sems kyi yon tan nyid 'dzin mdzod// dngos grub gang 'dod yid bzhin stong // pu gri ya mA'i rgyud las rdzogs chen ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste dgra pa'o//
5a4(rnying rgyud): 'bring gis gsang sngags brtan byab// ngan sngags drag sngags rnam pa gnyis// drag sngags la yang rnam gnyis te// gsang dang dmod pa'i drag sngags gnyis// ngan sngags la yang rnam gnyis te// sbyor ba phyi yi ngan sngags dang // sbyor ba na
5a5(rnying rgyud): gi ngan sngags gnyis// gang la dmigs pas de 'grub pas// gsang sngags rim pa de bstan pa// ma nor rtsa ba'i rgyu sngags ni// dza sdug gu'o// bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags ni/ e ka dza ti ma hA kro h+ya hU~M phaT/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags ni/
5a6(rnying rgyud): dzAgA d+hAg+ha/ spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ ma ma e kA dza ti a ra lI/ 'dzi dring zing / mchod pa'i ljags ni/ ma ma thag sha mu tra m+me kadza ti mr-i daM a mr-i ta ma hA ba liM gr-ih+Na Tu moMd+b+ha d+hi/ dngos grub blang ba'i ljags ni/ ma ma hA ga raSh+Ta murba e ka dza N+Di kA ya
5a7(rnying rgyud): lags d+d+hi AH/ kyaid+hi si d+d+ha hUM/ dam tshig gsum gyi sngags dang / phyag rgyal/ thod kam gyi phyag rgyabacas la/ i badz+rag h+yadri byas ma ra d+hu/ sra'i de mchog go// zod rnon gyi phyag rgya bcas la/ oM grarba dri byas mi yaho// zod rtsol
5b1(rnying rgyud): rgya sa/ oMhrA bums pa pan/ thags kyi mchags/ gas 'dag sngags zag gi stong ba nas drang ba/ ma mjug nas ngan ga nyi stong bdag na tu ba nga drag thags las la bskul zhing zad dan/ mam da tan/
5b2(rnying rgyud): ma pa sgying la sen sen/ srog la ya~M yaM/ nyid ni zad pa ma ral/ trag // mu nga? ni dpral ya badz+ra d+hadz+nyAn b+h+yo/ gsang sngags la/ waSha mA ra yang phyung byung mahA e ka da t+ti/ k+ko d+ha ma hU~M na/ thun sgrub pa'i sngags la/ ma ma dkA la ras myos/
5b3(rnying rgyud): rdza dzad tsit+ta long rak+ta thu na ma ma/ rak+ta tsa mra ti/ snying khrag dag khwa rag thun thun yA ma ma ts+tsha/ thAn brdeg pa'i sngags la/ thag ra k+Sha mA ya mA ya ma snyid kha rag tshal pa srog la thun b+ho/ phrin las bzhi'i sngags laM/ ma trag ra k+ka mu tra e ka dza ti ste la rag mo shAn
5b4(rnying rgyud): ti ku ru swA hA/ tshe dang bsod nams rgyas pa'i sngags la/ ma ma tra ga rak+Sha mu tra a ka dza ti snying kha dag ma/ putra A yuHpha la sid+d+hitrA~M/ log par blta ba dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags la/ ma ma thag rAt+na mu tra e ka dza ti snying kha rag ma ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ lha 'dre thams
5b5(rnying rgyud): cad dbring du bya ba'i sngags la/ maM ma tra ga rak+Sha mu tra e ka dza ti snying kha rAg ma/ badz+ra d+han b+h+yo// tik+Sh+Na dza dza sa ma ya s+t+waM/ gzhan gyi rig sngags bzlog pa'i sngags la/ ma ma tra ga rag+na mu tra e ka dza ti snying kha rag mo man+ta kA la yakra zlog/ bdud nag po bkrag
5b6(rnying rgyud): med bzlog pa'i sngags la/ yak+ka pA la ha na ha na hUM phaT/ dmu bdud nag po bzlog pa'i sngags la/ b+he bas tA yo ha na ha na hUM phaT/ klu bdud nag po bzlog pa'i sngags la/ nA ga ha ti nAn pa ling pa ku ru ling ma ting sod/ gnod sbyin nag mo bzlog pa'i
5b7(rnying rgyud): sngags la/ ma mo dun dun bzlog/ yag sha mo dun dun bzlog snying kha rag dun bzlog/ sbyor ba phyi yi ngan sngags la/ dud mo zom dkar phrom shu ri phrom/ yug ti smin/ trag du tsar hril b+h+yo/ tra~M trai hril b+h+yo/ ltas ngan dbab pa'i ngan sngags
6a1(rnying rgyud): pa/ blag gnamamadunanapa/ na pa/ nga ga bas pa gas pa shas stong smri ga napa blags thu rdzu nga pa/ thab sa cad pa gagang na na
6a2(rnying rgyud): ban / na 'gas pa/ sam m+b+ha kA'aldanapa/ shAn / gas ma mdun byed na/ thags ma rgyad las sbyid pa'i rnags kyi pa /
6a3(rnying rgyud): ba la bang kyil brten bsgrug// ma lku 'khor ba'i khrag la bsgrub// drag sngags cung ngukar brten la bathub/ bzlab 'a' ma brten tha pa// dbang chen la bgro'amang ba dang // las kyi dgeng gi 'khor loganyis// dbang chen yang kyi dzu
6a4(rnying rgyud): gas pa dag / dang mi lag sa cin / ga gi ste/ pa// dkyings 'i thagananas das sa dul// rim pa gsam dang ldan pa me// mas zug sum na grang shAshA/
6a5(rnying rgyud): rna rtse khrig nang la// 'khor ma ri mig brji bri// tshigasum dbus su paN+Dazhis// glegs gsum lA ma maH// rnal gyir martsibs brtul// de nyigs bya ba dang // padz+ra shA~M ta N+yeg sa/ zhes byab ba rkye
6a6(rnying rgyud): sa pasdu// ma ma kyibs ni bcwa ba'i nung // rdzi rtan ta t+ta rnam pa dang / e ka d+hi gasra pa ni/ thig nong ma pa gsum pa la/ thal \u0f7f la dz+nyA baT+Ta/ thos pad / dmang dag 'jigs pa'i gaganas te// dang rgyur cog dngas /
6a7(rnying rgyud): la 'a'i ma dpung sro dkyil na// byed bye nga ba brjid par bshod // phragadung thag pa rkyen gyis bams// ye shes sa dra dang btung ngo// yab kyi'i 'ang ba snyeng du dag pa/ gong du babyen pa rdzogs byas so// drimi 'i zhing yang bye yong na /
6b1(rnying rgyud): dbang du bkru zhing las la bzung // rtag tu yab kyi 'khor lo bcangs// gang dmigs las rnams ma 'grub na// yub kyi 'khor lo gyen la bstan// phra gsum dbus su khrag thun bzhag/ yab kyi 'khar ma gro yang bzlog/ dpal gyi gdungs
6b2(rnying rgyud): skad thang gsum gyis// dbang du dgug gzhug zil gyis mnan// phrin las zhi khro dmigs dang sbyar// spu gri ya mu'i rgyud las yab kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / las byed gling shrI 'khor lo ni// grol ging bdag po ma ru tsha//
6b3(rnying rgyud): spyir sgrol las kyi bdag po ste// dkyil 'khor gru gsum tha ma na// sa bdag rgyal po'i snying sogs dku// gang la bya ba'i ming dus bcas// mi zad mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor// ging chen gsad pa ldog med kyi// srog gi yang snying 'bru brgyad pa// spu hri
6b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i drag sngags yin// oM badz+ra gring car lam shAshwad+d+ho/ skya rengs dang po shar ba dang // nyi ma'i zer la drug tu bzlas// kun gzhi rtsa yi drag sngags dang // dbang po lnga yi sgrol sngags brgyad// mtshon tshwa'i 'khor lo bskor zhing bsad// su gri 'bar/
6b5(rnying rgyud): ban sgrol sngags brgyad// 'di brgyad gang gi reg chod yin// oM badz+re thib du d+ha nga la thib rdang / su rak+Sha shrI pa pu ti d+ha ra thib/ oM bcu tshub ril chud/ pra hi su tsakra d+ha ra rbad/ oM badz+ra nA ldibs/ oM badz+ra snying mgo tshad/ khal mu la dran ta/
6b6(rnying rgyud): d+hAr yA yang du da/ steng dang yin pa bcas pa la// 'bang ga'i 'khor ma med par dbab// phu po rdul du ba zhig nas kyang // ging chen tshogs kyis rol par bya// rnam shes byas pa'i sras su bag/ sgra kri ya ma'i rgyud las gang martson char 'khor lo
6b7(rnying rgyud): li'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / mo skug khrag la brten bya'o// nus pazhi rgya 'is phyogs su// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga lnga'i chag chag gdab// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni// dbus kyi grwa gsum thur dudu//
7a1(rnying rgyud): dag // na san/ / sa // sa// sa sa sa//
7a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyi rigs dang byur// dbus kyi mug sa ma nalarba// 'dod chags rang gshed thod pa n+tu/ ga ma da sreg blags// dkrug seM dang thug sa// mug mo ba la snyid thagasakyi'o// dang byug pa le gur khung da ga// ba sh+tsa
7a3(rnying rgyud): rgo 'di zung khrung bzhi// drag po'i thod par ldan pa sgri ba cal/ shar dur smug snying khrug thun// lhom gyi skyug snying khrag thun// nub tu lug phrug snying khrag byin// byang bya phrug snying zhag thun// nyung dkar nyung nag ni tshwa dang // shA tsong ni/
7a4(rnying rgyud): la bsngags shing thug/ dkyil 'khor lcags ri go bzhin// sman dang ts+tsha ga ting ma banag/ byang gamam brten pa'i rdzas// zangs sa ma lakhar ba'i gzhong parba// sdug mo bzhi mi khrag mtsho bkyil// sdug ma bzhi yi khrag gis ni/
7a5(rnying rgyud): rnam bu'i rgyal zhus pa yi// dpal bshos zur gsum khru gang tshad// seng ldeng phur pa khru gang la// bud med srug mo'i dbang po lnga// skra dang so dang srin mo la// gang la bya ba'i gson thun dpab// 'bur ram ris su zas pa yi// ma mo gra
7a6(rnying rgyud): mi gzugs brten la// snying po srog gi skyong ba bris// khrag gi zhum dbu yi mdangs// mamo'i gzugs brten khrag mtshor dbyung // gang dmigs gzugs mdangs khrag gi thun// gzugs la lcags thag za theg gdags
7a7(rnying rgyud): seM pa sa kyi bu bus bton/ kyi bu dri pa dang skos sun gtong // thad dab bang dngos dang phyogs su 'grangs/ pu'i ya ma'i rgyud las ma ma thag la bstan pa'i le'u gyi bcu gsum pa'o// drag sngags cung dag la
7b1(rnying rgyud): A/ nan / na sa na ma smra/
7b2(rnying rgyud): nga mdu// mas / bya sa don // rgya/ 'tha n+d+he/ sa / sa/
7b3(rnying rgyud): gas // ma byeng cag dam pa da gdus / bzhin/ ga /
7b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa pa sa/ sa
7b5(rnying rgyud): lta sa
7b6(rnying rgyud): gathun na/ da mams glangs / sa da nu 'dag ga na ga du/ rigs pazhes ban pa
7b7(rnying rgyud): na / kyi nga // chung / na sa/
8a1(rnying rgyud): smra/ smra/ sa su // /
8a2(rnying rgyud): //
8a3(rnying rgyud): da la pa ga/ ming gu kyi ma / can sa ma sa// ma ma sbyi pa/ khyebyang chubs / ga mthon / gang
8a4(rnying rgyud): sa pa gangasas/ shA/ nga nga gas brgya // gan // pacwa byed pas nga/ gang
8a5(rnying rgyud): na sa // sa pa g+sas mas/
8a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas ma sang / dri ma nga du go 'i dimi ga gying rdzog brags rtsus tham 'di sa / /
8b1(rnying rgyud): dmar zhing gdangs la chan bzang // sdug nag mag par byung ba ni// sngags pa lngam lag dam nyams yin// mag par byung na bshags pabya// gsang ba'i rnags ni mtshon chate// 'gas sa chag canal ngan// mtshan cham 'bar 'ad drwa/
8b2(rnying rgyud): dang // thogs pa med par gcod na bzang // thun gyi rtags mtshan bstan pa ni// b+han+ta'i rak+ta khol na bzung // dri zhim mnam zhing 'phel na bzang // lbu ba sob mor byung na na// dri mi zhim zhing chung nang na// dam tshig nyams na bskyang
8b3(rnying rgyud): bshags bya// rtags kyi rnam pa gang byung yang // dam tshig bsre zhing dngos grub blangs// gsang zhing yid la brnag par bya// dbang chen bsgom zhing dbang du bsdu// nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don brtan// bab tshol ras chod spyad nyes na// long 'ji
8b4(rnying rgyud): mo mkhan dang 'dra// tshe chad rang gi gnyen por 'gyur// de bas nyams kyi phyag rgya bstan// spu gri ya ma'i rgyud las mtshan rtags kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ sngags
8b5(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // bzlas lugs rim pa bka' stsal pa// dbang chen yab kyi thugs ka nas// tsit+ta rin chen ga'u ru// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de dkyil dz+wA la snying pos bskor// patwA ma da tri/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka a/
8b6(rnying rgyud): yab kyi 'khor lo g.yas su bskor/ hrI pad+ma ta kr-i ta ha ya grI ba hUM/ e ka dza ti ru lu hu lu hUM phaT/ yab kyi mtha' ma las sngags bskor// gser gyi ba thag bzhin du sgo// yum gyi tsid+d+ha ga'u ru// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/
8b7(rnying rgyud): nyidakyil thag la snying pos bskur// mi mjug kra muH i ka dza te/ snying kha rag mo hU~M/ yum gyi 'khor lo g.yon du bskor// de yi phyi rim zad pa'i sngags// tha ma bsad pa'i sngags kyis bskor// 'od zer lcags kyu lte bur bskor//
9a1(rnying rgyud): rmad la srog ga slong ban// dge 'dun grong du 'dra ba'i rgyal// 'ad dang thad med mtshon car 'ang // nam kyang zung ba'i stong po na// rlung nag 'chubs ma'i tshu du byams// sdang sri ma ma lajug dngang
9a2(rnying rgyud): thorangs bsad pa'i snying po ni// khwa sbyang gzan la rub pa'i tshul// gsad bcang mang ba byed pa dang // sha chang mang po byed na bzang // yab kyi 'khor lo g.yas su bskor// yum gyi 'khor lo g.yon du bskor// gnyis su med pa 'gro' /
9a3(rnying rgyud): su gri yA ma'i rgyud las bzlas lugs 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// rgyal ba yab dang sdebs pa dang /
9a4(rnying rgyud): mkhan ging dang sngo b+hu pa dang // rgyal ba yab dang sdebs pa ni// yab ni byin tshe bkra shis shing // dbang du bsdu zhing byang chub thob// yum gyis rno zhing gyur ba dang // bkrag zer che zhing nye bas na// yab yum gnyis med sgrub pa'i thabs// dkyil 'khor
9a5(rnying rgyud): phrin las rnam pa bzhi// dbus kyi e las a dang ma// g.yas su a las zla dkyil te// d+hI las pad+ma dbang chen ni// dbul rta mgo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dmar nag kyad kyi dor stabs can// mi bzang 'ab ba du chub byed// g.yon du ma las nye
9a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil steng // drag las e kang ti ma// dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa na// b+han+d+ha ra \u0f7fsa bkang ba bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing // gnyis med pastim zhing brtan par bri// phyag 'tshal mchod
9a7(rnying rgyud): nga dgyes pa bstod// yab sum bstan cing bgrub pa'i thugs// thog mthar yo pa snga yis so// par na bcu gsum 'bru gnas pa// dbang chen yab kyi brten pa yin// 'bru brgyad me dang ma gyis so// e kadza ti brten pa yin// yab sram/
9b1(rnying rgyud): bzung da stong na// rngog mnar spyod pang // ma na rna bangan drug nasapa// bsgrub cing gas sa rung ba bya// sbyin pas rnam bzhid migs dang byug+sa/ sku la ma'i rgyan las rgyal ba la ba dang thebs pa'i bangs pa ra btud dag/
9b2(rnying rgyud): bras mkhan gang dang thabs pa dang // po nam ma la gdugs pa dang // ma sham po la gdags pa ni// nos nga ga cig zud pa yin// gdug pa'i dpal gcig dbyung ba yin// dkyil 'khor las ni nyi zhal la// g.yas stan las
9b3(rnying rgyud): sti las sgrol zhing bdage go bskyed// g.yon du ma las nyi ma'i steng // dzag las sgrol gang bdag mo bskyed// su mkhang stsal rtse dgul// dkar po gsum gyi snying srog dang // rin chen na tshogs dar zab gdags// thang dkyi la 'ang rnye
9b4(rnying rgyud): mdangs sbyin ma bya'i rgyal mtshan dang // phrug s+ho gsum rnying thog bcas// g.ya ba dang mang nag rin rten nams// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du dgod// bdag nyid dpal chen gyur bsgom la// srog gi ster po rgyan du kres// drug mu pa'i de ti
9b5(rnying rgyud): rag ma g+ha/ mtsho'i srog gi snying pa'o// oM badz+ra ga tsor la shAH/ sgrol gir bdag po'i snying po'o// las kyi myong 'thun 'di bcang // skal gri mo mthod pa ru// 'dod chags srin mo'i mngal khrag dang // zhe sdang mo snying khrag dang / na
9b6(rnying rgyud): mug bam gyi snying khrag bas gas// le ba nan dar gyis la bcud lnga// thal chen rgyas gdab gsung drung ni// tsi dbyung ba'i sngags 'dri zlas// dgar// la mun tra e karba ti steng kha rag mad+hi/ drag gas ma pa dbang 'i steng par rjod/ desan so
9b7(rnying rgyud): su byung // gsad cing gnan sa spyong rgya// bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor byang shirang du// drug po sa yid kyil 'khor la// gling gi bas pa'i 'thor thobarjong // yi gra gos sa ma zhing lpags pa// 'khong pa sa pa gsum ldan pa// thig
10a1(rnying rgyud): pas ling tse brgyad// dbus kyi phreng tsag gsum la// gang la dmigs pa'i don meng bzhag/ nang rim phyogs mtshams mang ca brdud// srog gi snying po 'bru brgyad bri// oM brdeg nar la than+ta/ rang byung /
10a2(rnying rgyud): mtshams ling co la// bsad pa'i drag sngags 'di brgyad bri// oM badz+ra thibs du rbad/ d+ha ra mi libs rbad/ su rak+ka thibs/ pra ti d+ha ra thibs/ oM badz+ra tshub ril rbad/ pra ti pu tsag dur rbad/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra ldi bas/ oM badz+ra snying mgo tshad
10a3(rnying rgyud): kha la mu li dAn ti d+ha ra ya ma ra du chud/ de yi phyi rim mtshon chas bskor// tho rangs nam gyi cha smad la// nyi ma'i rtsel sbyor ba bya// ling+ga 'khor lo bcas pa de// shugs 'chang gser mdog thod par stsal// 'byung po 'dus pa'i khyim tra sa?/
10a4(rnying rgyud): u gri ya ma'i rgyud las las mkhan ging dang sdebs pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis// bsnyen bsgrub las kyi sbyor kha'i tshe// thugs dam gnang nas bskul ba bstan// bsnyen pa'i dus su bsngal
10a5(rnying rgyud): hUM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur byon tshur gshegs lha mo khyod// khyad par mdzes pa'i sku lus la// shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis bklubs// thugs ni sna tshogs cir yang ston// mdzad pa'i cha lugs sangs rgyas 'dra// lta ba'i
10a6(rnying rgyud): 'phang ni nam mkha' 'dra// sku yi yon tan bsam mi khyab// dgongs pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa// khyung chen mkha' la lding ba bzhin// thugs rje'i rlabs kyis snang srid rlob// g.yas kyi gshog pa gdengs pa yis// ye shes rdo rje rtse dgus 'bar/
10a7(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi gshog pa phyar ba yis// ma mo las byed bcu drug 'char// rlabs kyis 'dzam gling khyab par gcod// dge sdig gnyis kyi sbrul ma 'debs// srid pa gsum gyi bdud gcod ma// dru tra nag po'i srog len ma// e ka dza ta ra la gcig ma/
10b1(rnying rgyud): dbu yi ral pa se yan can// ral gcig gnam la yang brkyang bas// steng gi lha rnams kun 'dul ma// ral gcigs la mar brkyang bas// sa bdag klu srin kun 'dul ma// lag na zangs lcags par rdzogs ma// zangs zor dmar po chems se chem// bstan pa gnyen la dgra dang rgya
10b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa bsrung ba'i mthu mo che// srog gi snying pos gnas nas spyan drangs na// rak+ta dmar gyi gtor ma 'di gsol la// thugs dpa rgyud baphrul bkrol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bsgrub pa'i dus su bskul ba ni// oM ka ra ti na ma mkha'i ga Ta
10b3(rnying rgyud): tsan+da// bor tshugs 'bar ba'i spyan gcig ral gcig ma// dmar nag 'bar ba a li klong dkyil na// kro d+hI shA rI'i yum b+hi b+ha ga'i klong // gdug pa 'dul phyir 'jigs pa'i mu byung ba// ral gcig rgya mtsho khrag gi me 'bar ma// thor thog gcig
10b4(rnying rgyud): bcings spyan mig dmar la ser// rgya mtsho chen po'i klong nas me 'bar te// ri rab zom 'dzin klu rgyal sbyor chen mo// chu gri brgya yis thang gi dngos gtams shing // lcags rgya brgya phrag dgra snying 'dren mdzad ma// thugs dam rgyud baphrul bcol pa'i phrin/
10b5(rnying rgyud): las mdzod// rdo dzo rak+ta mu tra dgra la ya// snying la kI lI ma ti ya/ ma ma rak+Sha ru nga zad chud/ phrin las sbyor khar bskul ba ni// e ka dza ti gu ya gsang ba'i yum// swa ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ ro tshogs mang po bsnol ba'i gdan sbyang na// ti ra
10b6(rnying rgyud): nag po bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// chibs su chu srin nag mo chi bas// srul chu sbyin g.yang gzhi gsol// klu rgyal rigs lngas skul brgyan// nyi zla'i thod thabs bcings pa dngul rgyan// dbul me yi ral padamar po phro// ram
10b7(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i ma 'bar lams sel ma// sder ma rje dpal rgyud drug thabs kyis sgrol// spyan mig g.yas pa khrag mtshol khrelo// phyag g.yon dung rgan dmar gyis bkang ba la// phyag g.yas rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol// dbar gyis bya 'di gsol
11a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ la// thugs dam rgyung baphrul bcob pa'i phrin las mdzod// e kadza ti a ra li dza/ khyod kyi thugs dam sprul pa chen ma ne// srid mo gar gyi dang byug sa// su ne rak+takha mo la// khra mon k+ta mun ti//
11a2(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum sun dgum// mtsho badrug gtsigs zhal ni gnyer// phyag dang zhabs ni cir migs la// srog tu dbugs dang rnying la 'dung // dmyalararta 'khrug pa'i lan phran las// dkyu 'khrug pa'i khro mo 'bum 'jam gro// su yi
11a3(rnying rgyud): rag+hu khrag gi wa mo re// khrag gi wa mo lce brgyad ma// dam nyams rnams kyi snying khrag 'thung // snyan nas rak+ta'i 'brug ldir ma// spyan nas rak+ta'i chu 'bab ma// shangs nasar k+ta'i rlung 'tshubs na// zhal nas dbu'i ma bar ma// gzig
11a4(rnying rgyud): mtsho'i dbus na gzigs// mdzad ni srog gi dbang po 'phrog/ dmar sti gtor ma 'di gsol la// thugs dam rgyad bskul bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// ma mar wA dun dun snying la dza dzaH/ las byed mcho phul pa / maud
11a5(rnying rgyud): zhugs// mu ni nag mo chen ma la// smin nag ral pa'i tho gdengs can// sul char sprin nag mo gyon// 'dud kyig yang gzhi yags dkor// khyod kyi lag pa ga ran 'a ni/ nga gags pa gang gsong/ dkyilag pa ga ma
11a6(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi bskal rus thod pa 'chang // sa la brda' ning rdung ba'i tshul// nr-i tir nag gro dza nan nan/ grur la dmar mo'i dbus su zhugs// mu ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdo// sha khrag dmar gyi rjes gcod ma// sring pa gsum sha za ma// srid pa
11a7(rnying rgyud): gyi khrag 'bring ma// kyai zos kyang 'grangs pa med// dgra pa'i sha khrag wa du byon// mar dmar monananan/ nam phyed mthong ga'i sbubs su zhugs// sbrul nag 'bum gyi drod gdengs can// sprul nag stong gi rgyan // rigs lngas mul brgyan
11b1(rnying rgyud): panI// lag pa g.yas pa'i gung ma la// dkar ba gsum gyis phyen ka lag/ rkang pa g.yan pa'i mthe bong la// nag khragasum gyis nang ka log/ lag dgu che gla 'khor lo yis// rgya mtsho'i gtid daphyag byugs pas// bachen brgyad ni gdan na/
11b2(rnying rgyud): brusrin nag mo zas su 'o// dam sde a r+g+ha 'di gas pa pa// thugs dam cung bskul bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// blo rangs ser mo'i sbubs su zhugs// du ni gser gyi 'dag la// sman yang gsar kyi thu sum 'dra// caklan gser gyis ba ba ldams// ga
11b3(rnying rgyud): ral ser mo skyugs pa yis// gser thog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis// dgra bo'i steng la thun 'bebs ma// ma ma hA ti nAn/ sa bdag sum pa la/ dgrang zhig thun thun/ khyed ni bdud kyi bu mo bzhi// dmar gyi a r+g+ha 'di gsol la// thugs dam chu dang sku
11b4(rnying rgyud): bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// snying dang srog rtsa mkhal ma dang // glo ba nang khrol gang yang rung // khrag dang sen mo so dang sba// mi bla slad tsam khug la shog/ mi bla skad tsam mkhrugs na// rang gi gnas kyang zhig ta re// nyin mo dkar mo'i chubs
11b5(rnying rgyud): zhugs// su ni dung gi kha dog la// dbul dung gi thor tshugs can// phyag na dung gi 'khor lo bsdams// khros te gnyen por mngags pa'i tshe// dung gi 'khor lo bskor ba yis// tshangs rigs lha yi gnas ring 'joms// tshangs rigs thams cad ngal
11b6(rnying rgyud): rlog/ mar+tha yaH sen tan nan/ dpral ba do ni mig gcig ma// ye shes 'bar ba'i stan gcig ma// rgyab na don gshog gcig ma// 'jig rten 'phyo ba'i gshog gcig ma// dbul non dal gcigs// rtsod 'ams dbang srud ral gtsigs
11b7(rnying rgyud): zhal na de ni tshams gcig ma// skye shi rtsad gcod tshems gcig ma// blang na de ni nu gcig mo// bdud rtsi char 'bebs nu gcig ma// dbu yo ba su nyag re la// gnam lcags thog gi bu yug 'chug// dab can bu dri'i mchod rten le// gas
12a1(rnying rgyud): rdul bran 'bum gyis brgyan// gnam phyed gos su gyon pas yang bas bskor// sa phyed gdan du bting bas gting bsgrags// cer cer bsdus pas stong gsum bsreg/ snying dang srog ca gro snying dang // bgegs ni rting 'a/
12a2(rnying rgyud): kha nas phyugs// yag mo yag mo gro tI shwa rI thun thun/ ru ru tsa la tsa le/ mgo la tsa le/ snying khrag thog la khA hi/ sgying dang srog rgya glo steng dang // mchin pa nang khrol khug la sh+log/ mi bA sgang tsam khrag la shog/ da ni bdud kyi chung ma bzhi// dmar gyi
12a3(rnying rgyud): 'di gsol la// thugs dam chud bskul bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// pa ta ta thun/ dgun gyi rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// me ba brag kyon rgya mtsho'i gting na nyal// khyod ni sa bdag dgu bskor chung ma yin// thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i drin las mdzo/
12a4(rnying rgyud): sa pa ra ti pa ti ga thun thun/ dpyid kyi rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// na bza' sprin dkar go zul// tha ma rlung dmar 'dzubs mas bskor// zas mu glo rnying nang khrol za// khyod ni tsang kun nag mo'i chung ma ste// thugs dam rgyud bskul bco ba'i phrin pas ma do//
12a5(rnying rgyud): te ba te ba ti la pra rab te ni thun thun/ dbyar gyi rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// gos su 'ja' sprin spel ma gyon// zas mu me tog sna tshogs za// khyod ni sa bdag hal khyi'i chung ma yin// thugs dam chud bsul 'acol ba'i rngan las mdzod// na mo raShAtra yA ya/
12a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kr-i t+ti ni thun thun/ ston gyi rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// gos su gshin rdo'i g.yang gzhi gyon// zas sku 'bru dang ma thog za// khyod ni the se'i chung ma yin// thugs dam chung bskul bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// khyod ni bdud kyi rol bzhi// dmar
12a7(rnying rgyud): 'di gsol la// snying dang srog rtsa mkhal ma dang // glo snying nang grol gang yang rung // sgra dang so dang sen mo dang // mi bla sbrang tsam khug la shog/ bla sha re ma ti 'grim 'brim// shar ma'i bral thub/ myos myos yid 'ad/ shar mati mu gajing / sa
12b1(rnying rgyud): ling sha ling bdum/ tsan+dan t-iH/ blang thugs gli dgug pa'i sngags sa// srog dgug pa'i sngags pa/ tsa ni gshanas la/ rdubrag dri khrag shig/ b+h+yo s+thing nang grol dkrug pa'i sngags la/ ngal na can naH/ nr-itri shi shin rgyad// khrag dgug
12b2(rnying rgyud): 'i sngags la/ ngag cag ma de ba ni thig thum tham/ chud chung thum thum chung drud/ so dang sen mo rma dkrug pa'i sngags la/ da yi mi nas dag pa 'i sinA/ phrin gyi ni gi rbang dbum du thug cig/ che ge mo'i mgo 'o khos shig/ lus sboms shig/ rgyo'i na
12b3(rnying rgyud): dang sgrol cig/ b+h+yo zhig/ las kyi rlung dmar kyis nub nas phul cig/ 'jigs pa'i yun nag gis mdun nas sus shig/ dzI ba lag gsum pos snying nas drongs shig/ las bye ma'i rini bas pa bzhin thong zhig/ snying adza ka yi ngag pa bzhin du 'ong shi
12b4(rnying rgyud): mgo badra bzhin khos shig/ snying khrag kha nas skyugs shig/ don snying khong nas phyung zhig/ kha so sel bur ltogs shig/ mig 'bras zang la byung zhig/ dam tshig gi dmed pas rdzogs shig/ dpal gyi chad pa chod cig/ mu Ta ya ma'i rgyud las
12b5(rnying rgyud): thugs dam gnad nas bskul ba dang / dam tshig dmod pa'i len ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis// cha dang bsod nams sgrub pa dang // rigs brgyad spel bar bka' stsal pa// btsun phyag 'phan der rjod pa la// gangs
12b6(rnying rgyud): ts+tshitsan+dan zas bkrus la// mtshan ldan bu mo gzhon nu yi// mun mtshal dang thig ler sbyar// yum+ba dang tshe yi snying po zla// rdo rje tshe dang snying por bcas// gsang sngags 'dis ni brtan par bya// A yu a la sa~Md+d+hi hU~M/ ba bar tshe yi lha mo bsgral/
12b7(rnying rgyud): it+ma n+d+ra la pad+ma tshe yaM yum// sku mdog pad+ma rAga'i mdog/ ral pa dkar po g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil// phyag na rin chen bum pa 'dzin// tshe srog kun la dbang byed ma// mthu chen dregs pa'i lag nas ma drongs pa// skal ldan rigs kyi
13a1(rnying rgyud): na/ dang / / 'azu sas na na da / pa/ ga da//
13a2(rnying rgyud): rtag tu bcangs// mu thi la ma'i rgyud las tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la// / de nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis// nyams pa bslang ba'i lung bstan pa// zangs sam pas li gzhong brgya// skrag mo gsum gyi sted khrag
13a3(rnying rgyud): bskyil// ram bu'i lha bshos sum brtsegs la// ri rab chen por byin gyis brlabs// ri rab phyogs bzhir spug mo bzhi// shar drur sdug dgu 'i gzugs// lhon gyi sdug dgu yi gzugs// nub tu lug smug dgu yi gzugs// byang nga bya srog dag rmi
13a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs// phyogs bzhir gling bzhi'i rgyal mo bzhi// lag tu ba dan rin po che// ngar klud brgya ba rgya bzhi brgyas bskor// ri ba zom la srug nag dgur// cel na bya'i rgyal mtshan pa rnams// gur nag bud mid sdug mo la// mchong gi ling ka tshon
13a5(rnying rgyud): bang rim par dang tha ma N+Da// bud med skrag mo 'bum gyis bskor// na tshogs snying dang dar snas brgyan// thig le dkar dmar me long bcas// srug mo bzhi yi mdangs kyis bskor// dku'am bdun gyi bar dun rnye// gas gsad nang bzlog dmigs dang / 'aM
13a6(rnying rgyud): ma gcig ma la zhug sol gdab// lis zin tag phyogs rdzas btab na// gta dmigs de 'grub gdon mig// swa waM la ma'i rgyud las nyams ni bzlog pa'i le'u kye nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gang bye dbang rgyag gis// tsaM sta dang sbyin ci
13a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub byas kyang // rgyu bathab gnad la dbab pa bstan// bdag nyid dbang chen sbyar bsgoms te// ma ma'i gru bgyid gdan du nyid // gdan gyi rnyed khrag ga padu drug// lce yi steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ gsang sngags 'dis ni gad pa dang //
13b1(rnying rgyud): bdu tan ma bdas pa sams skye ba gam ta pa na/ thastsas chubang/ chu ring cas 'di nad babyud// ni gangs nasu kla kya ba// ngan bad gshugs can rgyags nag sang na gyi gshang// na so nga/
13b2(rnying rgyud): nga ni dur khrod nyid sha can// da ni bdud kyi bdud chen po// thams cad dbang chen nga yi sku// pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ nga ni sbyor ba dag chen po ste// yak+ka shrI he ru ka/ nga ni grol bdag chen po ste// raD+ga shrI he ru ka/ nga ni dam tshig chen po ste// sa ma ya Sh+kaM te ruH
13b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad sbas pa'i rang bzhin te// gu rgya dpal chen he ru ka/ nga ni dus gsum kun tu 'byung // da ni dus gsum da ltar gnas// da ni dus gsum slad kyis 'byung // dus gsum 'di ni nga yi dbang // dpal 'bar dbang chen skra bzhengs pa// dmar na/
13b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba 'jig pa'i sgra// dbul phyag kyang bcu drug pa// zhabs kyang 'bar ba drug tu bzod// dur khrod 'bar ba'i chos kyis brgyan// rdo rnga'i gshog pa nam mkhar gdengs// thod sbrul 'bar ba'i rgyun gyis bklubs// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs// zhal
13b5(rnying rgyud): bgrad 'bar ba'i mtsho gtsigs shing // spyan bzlog sprin ma klog ltar 'byug/ tshwam rnams drag pos ma mo 'dul// khyod kyi srog skying dal yod// khwa sbyang gzan la 'dzum pa bzhin// thog gi snying po dam la 'dra// khyod kyi dmanas ral yod// ras pal
13b6(rnying rgyud): rlung gis bskrod pa bzhin// mthun pa'i rnam rdzas rnam la 'dri// bka' dang dam pas mi gnas na// gzhab nad rdog las snamis pa bzhi// gsogag med pa dmyal zag cad// ni ba ting kudu ni sa ni/ khaso badz+ra yi/ sen me ru yin sod / snying
13b7(rnying rgyud): maM sharo la khrag thun/ shal gri khyig kang+ka sha ya/ tA par ma rta dzadz+r-i d+h+we phaT tra he na he/ gro shog zhing ngas la gnas pa'i// ma ma'i gzugs kyi snying gar thob// tsa mara'amadza tis brnabs// tsham tshalas drag po'i rtangs stabs bya// zhag gsum pa pa/
14a1(rnying rgyud): su dzogananas// basnru ga babs pa gyu/ das pan ngapas bcu// pa da na byung gas sa nga sgru byung rtags rang
14a2(rnying rgyud): nas gar kyi dbang phyug gis// zin las khyad par bskrun pa ni// zhi ba'i las sra bra ba ni// maN+Dal zlab nya lta sa// kun nas yongs su blam pA la// drar khrod thas pas dkar por \u0f7f// deng dkar ngas la ma gnas pa// dka la 'jog pa'i rtsa ro
14a3(rnying rgyud): brje gdung byang sems ma lta hA// gdul gyi gang dmigs de la rgyabs// gsang sngags 'dis ni zhabar bya// ma mjug kA mu e ga dze ti snying kha dag ma/ shAn+ti ga dra swAH/ rtag tu 'di la gang gnas pa// gnod sdig thams cad zhib da/
14a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lus su byab la// maN+Dal chu gyes rgyas pa ni// bcom gser gyi kha dog la// btsan phyag 'phan dang ka pA la// tsan+dan gur gum rgyas bkris te// dbang po'i dri dang ldan pas bdug/ sranas snying po la ldan zhing // rdorje cho bcas pa /
14a5(rnying rgyud): po 'dis ni brtan par bya// ma mjug darna su ma e kadza ti lci kha dag sa rmA A yA pha la baSh+T+rI dz+dza/ swa b+h+ri ku ru mA hA/ bzlas brjod basbyin pa'i glangs rnams na// longs spyod thams cad rgyam par 'gyur// log lha dang du byebar// maN+Dal b+ha ga'i dkyi
14a6(rnying rgyud): byung // shes rab mtshol gyis danar bar b+ha// blad med na tshung mngos pa ste// thod par dbang gi gzhan// mtshal chen dag gis ma gcig gre// mug mo mongs pa'i tshul gcig ma// chags pas khams gsum dbang du phud // gang sngags 'ang
14a7(rnying rgyud): ning nga bang 'gyur// ma ma jug da su rna meg te myed pa dgam pa zhes sh+thaT+Ta/ gsang sdugs tsho byed pa na// phog par lci ba dang 'gyur// byinang da papa yang byan// su gra gags par mthod pa// gang dmigs yum
14b1(rnying rgyud): sa// da 'asngags snang ba pa na// gsapas shA/ rnardugs na/ // nu rgyu// spyan 'gas na kyang na/ dag zhugs // dran
14b2(rnying rgyud): sbyin nang 'debs pa'i bdag/ nyung dag khrag skam gra gal la// sbyin tha~Md snying po 'di las dbab// mamajug dak+ShamA na/ e rdo N+Di la dgra ma du dzim/ dA ma/ da ti thom/ srog smin/ shang shar pa zhi hU~M/ rgyags
14b3(rnying rgyud): snying por dril ba'i sngags// thub pa blos ninan tanaH// chu rnams sbying bo dril ba dang // khyad par dus gapa' lag rnyed// bdag po gnas pa'i rtenas rba// sbyin byung por thun dbab par hU~M// dag / sa ma ma snying pa dag dul cheg ma rdos/
14b4(rnying rgyud): dkang blom// srog tu sbyin gang d+hA khrel na la btsu \u0f7f// gra 'du pas yul bdag ga pade// khrag gi skye bang mo thong bag// lhas dun dubab pa'i las byas ni// snrel gromam thod pa r+tha// rdzas ngan ni phyogs skye pa
14b5(rnying rgyud): dri yo sa kyis babacad pa// gyi dgas pa pa'i yang yang byug/ 'bru chags pa'i bya btags/ ma dang ga khrag te dang y-i// sa nganargyal mo'i gzugs byas s+ho// dpa'i lang grag ngam mam tshogs sa na rje/
14b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rnye// le gnan dung kyi nga chu // lhas ngan snga rtogs bsgrub par rtse// lung dkar sngag sa la blan grag// sa ngan rgyam tho bar ma bskul// ting po 'di ni na byas nas// dngo sa mi rdzogs su thad yang // nyes ngon na
14b7(rnying rgyud): rgyad// mam ma thong ban pa tugs// mim ga nasan/ dado nyid 'dus pa rji ti pa dun rtsom/ kangagazil du thopa kyi phyi bas/ yam po dashus pang / sham 'ing/ reg / migadun de dang la/
15a1(rnying rgyud): rtag/ thob zhig/ ci dun dung bab sa/ ladu lag shing du ngas thob sa ng+yas panas/ dab ba ba 'byor ba rnam pa yin// gzugs sbyor ba zlog pa'i ldam+b+ha// sbyin pa'i sa la byas pa pa// mdzad tan dbang ba tu
15a2(rnying rgyud): grangs// rnam par bzlog pa'i 'bar poH// ri nang sa da pa'i lus// 'ogat+ta mnan pa'i 'dod mi yi// 'ayang gi mas pa can yig 'byung // las sngags ci pa'i y-i ges// ming dang gyis kyi legs pastir// sa~Mng+ga r+dz+dza ba gan dang u// dang gyur
15a3(rnying rgyud): byinin rlabs tho byas la// rab tu dben pa'i gnas su bzhag/ de yi gsang sngags rim pa ni// ma ma trag ra k+Sha mu tra e ka dza ti snying kha ma/ oM ka dun bzlog/ ma hA dran bzlog/ sag dun bzlog/ tsa dur snying na bzlog/ ra tsa dr-i na bzlog/ gcig tu dril zhing rkabs
15a4(rnying rgyud): gtor// spyi dang khyad par bzlog pa'i las// bsad pa'i sa la mA ra ya// mnan pa'i sol s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ spyi dang khyad par bzlog pa ni// gcig tu dril zhing so sor gtor// gang la bya ba dus dang sbyar// gang dmigs de 'grub gdon mi za// spu gri ya ma'i rgyud las zin
15a5(rnying rgyud): las khyad par so sor bstan pa'i le'u ga nyi shurtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ 'bar ma dbyings kyi ral gcig ma// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gter// yon tan phrin las thams cad kyang // khyad par thabs kyi rim pa yis/
15a6(rnying rgyud): dngos klu ba drang dbang sbyar ba dang // lho spyod so sor bskrun pa la// 'dres pa'i 'khor rnams mi rangs te// mngon par ba stod nas sa sor dngas// gang gyi dbang phyug yab la thim// dbang chen mi gnas dbyings su mnal// swa rmi la mang rgyud las bstan pa'i rgyud
15a7(rnying rgyud): kyid na yongs sugatarnaM la bab nas/ rjes su le la shing mngan par btod pa'i seng sa ti rtsa lnga ngo // / waM la pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgyagar rmi mab dpon dAn shI la dang / grod kyi slab pan dag slong yang dbang gtad kyis pabyur kya
15b1(rnying rgyud): gtan la phab pa'o// kun gyi thun mong ma yin te// 'di bsgyur bsod nams can pas ni// phyi rabs bstan bsrung bar shog/ yon tan rgya mchogar gnas par// bstan pa rgya ma cha tshugs par shog/ 'gro ba yongs kyis khar bar shog/
15b2(rnying rgyud): rgyag du skad du/ tsir ma ni sha pra titan+ta/ bod skad du/ e kang rjes pa nag mo'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung kun tu bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ lung lo can gyi bzang nas/ kun zang lha'i rgyal po'i phyogs kyi rim
15b3(rnying rgyud): la la'i brag phug tu/ dpas chen po drwa pa?'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa las/ 'khor gyi e ka dza rje dang / re ma ti dang / re mni dang / re mdza dang / re ma dzA dang / nag mo tshags dang / dmar ma'i tshogs dang / khrog nyen rlabs can ma'i tshags dang /
15b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang la khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la dang mgyogs kyi nu 'phrul bstan pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen pos/ dbyengs phyag pacwabargyang drul te/ zung khrod kyi chas brgyad sbrul btun nas/ bzhal ba'i mari 'bar ba'i gling na bzhugs te/
15b5(rnying rgyud): sdigs mdzub me 'bar ba ma mo'i tshags la bstan pas/ mamo'i tshogs 'dar zhing btul nas rdzogs la 'gyel to// brgyal ba sangs nas srog gi snying po 'di yul lo// ma ma trag rak+Sha/ a tsa ti a pa ra tsi ta/ ces phul lo// de nas khrag 'byung gi rgyal pos
15b6(rnying rgyud): nag mo'i tshogs la/ yum e ka dza te dang / ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba mdzad nas/ dbang mo dang thos mos gsang ba'i dbang bskur te/ ma mo'i tshogs la bka' bsgos so// de nas dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs
15b7(rnying rgyud): te/ mamo'i tshogs zad do// sbas pa nag mo'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos nag mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor dmar nag gru gsum la// gru gsum dbus ni nag por gri/
16a1(rnying rgyud): zlag ma gsum ni dmar par bya// tha ma do rdo rlabs bkor// zlag ma gsum la gtor ma gsum// sham+ba sna tshogs gtor mar bya// mtha' ma me ri nang gis bskor// bal tshon sngon dmar dablangs kyis dag pa// mthu'i gdugs
16a2(rnying rgyud): kyang snying du bub// lug nag dpyi dkar rten du bca'// lug nag spyi bo dkar po la// mamo'i sku yi snying po bri// mgrin par srog gi snying ba bri// drag po thun thun zhes bya ba// bris la de nyid rten du gzug/ bdag nyid rdo rje gzhon nu yi// ting nge 'dzin
16a3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs nas ni// re nag gos za ba nAm byas nas// za 'og nag khra'i phu rung bya// phyag rgya bcas la bzlas paH// yungs kar khrag ska ma phul gang la// bsad pa'i rdzas ni seng ldeng phur pa dang // ma mo'i gzugs ni zhi ba'i zhal gsum ma// kha nas drag/
16a4(rnying rgyud): 'dag mig gsum gcer zung // snying la gra gsum 'bar dre// bai ta mA~M la na/ thugs dang dgapa mang byu la// mtha' ma ma ma 'dzag sngags na// sras parnyan ma'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor gyi la rje ste gnyis pa'o// / den
16a5(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos srog gi snying po 'di rnams drangs te/ ma ma hA ga rag+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha pa maM ma ta ma ma sha tra~M/ a mra ka sha D+haM/ ku rba badz+ra/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM budz+ra kI li kI la ya/ oM a~M srag la myur/ rag mo lag mo ka la dum pa p+ta \u0f7f sha la ma yaM sarba bi dz+nyAn nots+tsha
16a6(rnying rgyud): ni/ srog la yaM rbad/ sarba bi bAn baM hU~M phaT/ maras nas pa yar tan ye hUM phaT/ snying grol phral/ srog ya ma ya ma/ chu ma ta ye hU~M phaT/ snying la zab ma te sha ya hUM phaT/ rtags zon snying trag sha dza/ tsid+ha glog tud tud/ thum ril sham khyir rgyo/
16a7(rnying rgyud): las kyi nitha' brtul phrin las sham kyi kyai/ zhes nag ma 'tshogs kyi su gsung thugs dang / srog gi snying po dang / 'gugs byed kyi snying po dang / dri rde ga tsa ba la phul bas khrag 'thung gi rgyal po zhal mngon sum du zhugs par gyur to// nag mo'i tshogs kyis kyang las
16b1(rnying rgyud): mngon du byed par gyur to// smras pa nag mo'i rgud las sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos zad pa'i bya babs 'di gsungs te/ dpal chen ting 'dzin ma ngan zhugs nas// thugs/ 'i thalas lugs rgyu 'bros// daR+sha/
16b2(rnying rgyud): bgegs shes pa'i zug nas ni// A bo shaM yis bstim par bya// br-ig shing kun thag mapangs// gnas lha'i rjes ni skabar bya// yin bcas la meng dras bri// mon pa nag po 'dzid par gzhug/ yungs kar thab ci dbug bzug bya// ba~M ta ya dang bla
16b3(rnying rgyud): hrIng sbrel// 'bum tshe gnyis su bzlas par bya// yungs kar bzlas shing yid thab// che ge grub pa'i rtags 'ang ste// lha mo'i bla ni mngon du ston// yang na 'od dang spa dang dri 'byung // 'a ched mad sngags zad cing bzlas// kin mug sha nag pas tapa yid te/
16b4(rnying rgyud): la mur ti tsam pa la/ mA ra ya phaT/ ces bzlas shing yungs kar gyis brab bo// sbas pa nag mo'i rgyud las las sbyor rtags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi// brug khung las kyi hom byas te// klu gsum ku phyed thur du bu/
16b5(rnying rgyud): phyed 'dag pas byen du brtsigs// mthang mardo rje rabs bzher/ de yi mtha' ma me ris bskor// gdug pa cher ma can gyi shing rnams la// bye tshor bra ma gang rung gis// chag gang pa ye hom byas la// ho ma khung nang du lha mo bskyed// dz+wa la ra gyis me 'bar gyis// l+r-in
16b6(rnying rgyud): mu ka'i sngags rnams dang // bi ta ya yi sngags spel la// sbyin bsreg bya zhing ling+ga dbul// thal ba bsdus la rgya gram sar// gnan pa bya zhing dmod sngags bzlas// phyin ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur// sbas pa nag mo'i chud las sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
16b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// rgya ga skad du/ shAn pra ma dA ShA k+She tad+han+t+ra ma/ bod skad du/ ma mo eka rnge te byed srung rgyal nag ma rgyud ces bya ba/ dpa la rang byung gi rgyal mo la phra gang tshal lo// 'di sad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ dpal ra byung gi
17a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo'i gnas/ rang bzhin kyad kyis rdzogs pa pa// Tharna ba ba'i gzhal las dang // dku dang dam dang sa dung nag pa ma// phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub pa sa// zhabs sa kang byas pas thal gnon pa// dab gas
17a2(rnying rgyud): dbang phud dag pos grol bar byed// khams gsum dbang srung ste d+ha'i gzhal las ni// dri ba la sogs tshogs skyong bcu yi mgos// shar la sogs pa de bzhin ba tu mdzes// b+had+ha'i gzhal yas lhun gyis grub pa la// gnam lcags 'bar bya'i gzer chen
17a3(rnying rgyud): dA bteg// ye shes lha ldan pa dog rab tu 'gro// gyib kya ka bkru brgyad gdung du bres// gzu' brgyang byam zes d+hag ngarda la drab bgyis// drung dkar po sarang po dmar po dang // l-I bu la sogs pags pas thog kyang thub// ye shes bzhi ldan sgo bzhing gnas
17a4(rnying rgyud): ba ni/ b+h+yas g.yas g.yon gyi srin 'gram pa la// gzas pa po mos pa thim mtham byas// rdza srin mod pa'i rtababs rab tu mengs// bden su ma c-i ce gnyis rab tu ga sa ste// chos kyi 'jod la rang turnams su dgal// 'od pang nga mang dga'atsho rgya nga 'chang/
17a5(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo skyug drug gdugs phub pa'i// g.yas ga/ yon du yin bu grub tuni phyogs// seM/ ge steg dang rta srin ngos gyi mgos// b+haska bar pa'i gzhal las pad bgyis te// thod pa'i dra ba tshal bu'i dgyed pa// zhesang sbrul nag chen po'i thag pas brgyas/
17a6(rnying rgyud): gser gyi rdul 'khrol rin chen 'od zer 'byur// sbrul nag gdug pa'i chun po hi li li// thabs dang shes rab 'od zer gsal byas te// gzhil yas kyi nang med par 'od gsal 'byur // thod pa khrag 'dzag zang bu ba bdulda na// sprul pa'i lha mos 'dod yon
17a7(rnying rgyud): mchod pa stob// rgyal martson chen po bzhi yang gnas pa ni// drang shar sbal pa rdo rje'i bral mtshan dang // co 'dul phyir phyogs kyi rtsal mtshan dang // skyon pa lnga sde dang gyi grong mtshan dang // rab byang dem nas rdeg gi rgyal ma tshan te// rgyab
17b1(rnying rgyud): chen po bzhi yang de bzhin gnas// de ltar gnas pa'i gzhal yas chen pa de// dpal ldaT rang byung rgyal mo bzhugs pa'i gnas// gzhal yas phyi mthag gi rgya mchor te// sprul pa'i mamamakha' 'gro bzhugs pa'i gnas// phyir mthong pa'am lcags mthong nga /
17b2(rnying rgyud): ni// bdud dang srin po gshin rje bzhugs pa'i gnas// mtha' ma lcags ri nag pos bskor ba'i nang // ngur khrod chen po brgyad kyis gtams pa ni// dur khrod bdag po phyogs skyong yi dwags dang // ro ni sna tshogs rnam par bams pa dang // dral dang rgyags dang rnam par/
17b3(rnying rgyud): sngob dang // stag dang gzig dang gcan gzan sna tshogs dang // kang ka dur bya 'dab chags sna tshogs dang // shing la sogs pa sna tshogs de bzhin gnas// sha za khrag 'thung las kyi mkha' 'gro dang // ging dang lang ka gnod sbyin pho mo'i gnas// gzhan
17b4(rnying rgyud): yang dur khrod gling nam mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dpal chen bka' la gtogs pa bsam mi khyab// de dag thams cad 'khor dang thabs cig bzhugs// dur khrod gzhal yas de yi phyir man// dur khrod mo dpung 'bang bas bskor te gnas// chos nyid gang dus
17b5(rnying rgyud): dbyar mi shigs rtags// rdo rje'i baphyogs su rtswa mtshad// de lta bu'i bzhal las 'bar ba de// phrin las nam bzhi ldan gyis grub pa'i rtags// pho brang thug sam mkha' dbyings dang ldan ni// du thong ro yi gdan la 'byung ba'i tshul// bud me dru
17b6(rnying rgyud): mo mdzes pa'i cha byad can// dkar po ser mo dmar mo nag mo'i tshogs// nyid las me gzhan 'khor gyis bskor te gnas// nyid kyis the tshom byas par bshad pa'i phyir// phyag na rdo rje'i sprul pa lha mo bde byed ma// nyid las mi gzhan dmod pa'i mtshon
17b7(rnying rgyud): can// rang las byung ba'i nag mo 'bum dang chas// dang byung rgyal mo nyid pa 'di skad gsol// e mtho 'ing byung rgyal mo nyid/ bdag ni rtag tu myong la 'drid// rgyad kyi byin rlabs thugs rjegapa// rgya cher ba dag la bshad du gsol//
18a1(rnying rgyud): gsol pas/ de'i dus de'i tshe/ dpal ldan rang byung gi rgyal mod yang / sru mdog mthing naga'abar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ ral pas sa gzhi khebs pa la spro bo'i gtsug na ga yu'i ral ba mthing ga'od du 'ab rang gcig gnas pa/
18a2(rnying rgyud): zhabs gyad kyi dor thabs su bzhugs pa/ g.yas nab mchen gyi rtseH srog brtsa dang bcas nas bzung ba/ g.yon pa na gsu'i sbrang mo zhe nas bzung nas phra thabs su bsnams pa/ tir ro'i gdan la trag rak+ka zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod nas/ nyid kyi las sprul pa'i ma mod kye sde/
18a3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa las bal mo nag mo/ gsung gi srus pa las ma mo srin mo'i tshogs dang / thugs kyi sprul pa las ma mo mon mo'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang lhor ging dang sgrol ging la sogs pa khram thogs kyi bdud dang / srog gcod kyi ging la sogs pa dang bcas te/ sbrul
18a4(rnying rgyud): pamango bo nyid las brtse bas/ skang srid tha mra ca dus gcig tu g.yos par gyur te/ nad kyi rlangs pa dang / mtshon gyi char pa dang / bskal pa phra mo dang / dug dpal yams nad dang / gnam lcags ser ba la sogs pa/ dus gcig tu 'khrugs par gyur te/ slar yang 'khor
18a5(rnying rgyud): bdud po mo de dag rang la rdzogs par gyur to// snang srid thams cad bde ba la dus gcig tu bkod do// dug dpal dang yams nad la sogs pa thams cad bdud rtsi chen por gyur te/ thams cad thugs rje chen pos bde ba la bkod do// za byed spung rgyal nag mo'i chud las gleng
18a6(rnying rgyud): gzhi'i skabs te dang po'o// / lha mo bid byed mas 'di skad ces gsol te// dpal ldan radang byung rgyal mo che// zug rje'i byin rlabs bdag mo ni// nyid kyi lha spyod ji ltar lags// thugs rdo'i bdag mos bshad du gsol// zhes gsal pas/
18a7(rnying rgyud): dpal ldan pa zung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa/ stab rnam pa gnyis yod de// gnyis pod yang gcig ging gi// rang bzhin ldan rdzogs lta ba dang // rtogs pa mngon gyur ba lci ba // rang bzhin lhan rdzogs lta ba ni// snang srid 'di ltar snang ba'i chos// byi nang
18b1(rnying rgyud): da ngastsas dang // mam tad las gzhan sa yin// na sa n+yathong // mnang mams sa shes dang // dacid du dang blags danags pa// mdangam ma da tag sa man// man sa gags pan/ rtags pa ma byar/ dadun
18b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar gnyis med don rtogs na// bgrod pa med pa'i sa chen non// yang gcig ma mo lta ba ni// mamo snying po byang chub sems// snying po nyid las gzhan ma yin// snying po byang chub ye sangs rgyas// thams cad dag pas sangs rgyas yin// sbyin gyis grub
18b3(rnying rgyud): pasam mo yin// gnyis su med pas ma mo yin// rang las byung bas ma mo yin// yongs la khyab pas mamo yin// cir yang snang bas ma ma yin// gang yang sharabs ma ma yin// khyang par gdal bsam mo yin// mi 'gyur mi shigs ma ma yin//
18b4(rnying rgyud): gcig las med pas ma mo yin// tha dad med pas mamo yin// mamo gros zhing thub tu med// mam tha skams shing bslabs na 'grub// batha~Md du med par gar yang byin// bram du med pas gang yang 'grib// gdags su med pas thams cad yin// 'ad
18b5(rnying rgyud): snang bas gnyis su med// gnyis med don rtogs ma mo yin// mni snying po byang chub sems// mo ni rang byung ye shes yin// snying nga byang chub nyid la ni// rang byung ye shes de bzhin nyid// ye nas nam dag snying po nyid// ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs par gnas/
18b6(rnying rgyud): khre nam ma ldang rjo ba yang // rlu l+r-i byi sa kyis gtsad// ting bzang dru na ldan na// man nas sug dgas ma med// byang ba byang chub sa masalas na// mam gzhananas brgyal mind// sems nas kun na dbams cad sems// ma
18b7(rnying rgyud): byang chung sems kyi rgya ne// de ltar gnyis med don rtogs na// mamo ba na ma zhing bsrub me dgos// mamo sras dang gre ba bzhin 'phrogs// zhes gsungs so// zabyed srung rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las lta ba bstan pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o/
19a1(rnying rgyud): na/ na spya sa// / sa so// /
19a2(rnying rgyud): bdag tid pan// 'asrung ba shes pas cadas// mang gtan dag nyid / dus rgya bani// na / sa pa di ni canyis kyi
19a3(rnying rgyud): sa ma na namis sa sa pa /
19a4(rnying rgyud): sa / sa/
19a5(rnying rgyud): sa pa mam sa na/ na / sa byed/ ma
19a6(rnying rgyud): sa pa sa nas/ dgadum na nub pos/ gargya drun gnyis / na ma nas pam/ nas sems cad 'dan/ deyi mam na pastan/ ni mi gtas 'du/
19a7(rnying rgyud): sa
19b1(rnying rgyud): de yang ma mo'i sgom pa yin// ma mo sems dang gnyis med na// bsgom du med pa sgom pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// za byed spang rgyal nag mo'i gud las sgom pa bstan pa'i skabs te bzhi pa'o// / de nas sgrub pa bstan pa ni// snang zhing srid
19b2(rnying rgyud): 'i chos rnams kun// thams cad ma mor bsrub par bya// ma ma rang byung sems sgra bskyab// sems nyid ye bsgrubs chen pa yin// skang med kun tu snang ba'i gdos pa can// zlab med cing mtshan nyid ci dgar 'gyur// nor bu rin chen lta bu'i sems kyid /
19b3(rnying rgyud): ma mo mkha' 'gro sems can rnams kyi dngos// de nyid ma yengs ma mo'i sgrub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// za byed sbyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las grub pa bstan pa'i skabs te lnga pa'o// / lha mo bde byed yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo
19b4(rnying rgyud): nAM// blam srub gnyis kyi bdag mon// nyid kyi sbyong sgo pa'i gar lags/ sgom smrab bdag mas bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pags na nas cang// da byung rgya sems bka' stsal pa// bdag shigs thugs kyi ye shes la/ gi mo
19b5(rnying rgyud): khro yis sbyor// thams cad chos kyis chos nyid la// sems kyis sems nyid gnyis med sbyor// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med sbyor// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med sgor// 'khor ba kyang 'das gnyis med
19b6(rnying rgyud): sbyor// phyi nang snod bcud gnyis med sbyor// yul dang dbang po gnyis med sbyor// snang srid thams cad ma mor sbyor// ma mo'i snying po sems su sbyor// sems nyid ye sbyong chen po yin// de ltar gnyis med sbyor ba na// de ni ma mo'i sbyor ba yin//
19b7(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// babyed byang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las sbyor ba bstan pa'i skabs te drug pa // / de nas slob pa bstan pa ni// khams gsum thams cad rang gi sems yin pas// sems nyid yi sangs rgyas pas khams gsum lo rjes sgrol
20a1(rnying rgyud): sred gsum thams sa gsums yin pas// snyams nyid sde sangs nas pas thar mad pa mthal// srang dag pa na dam la can pa yin// rlud dag zang pa snang ba dang // dugs sas pa tu
20a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// rgyung drug 'khor ba'i rtsad bcad dag pa'i nying dun pa// rgyud lngalam gyi sgo yang rang gi sems yin pas// sems nyid me nas sangs rgyas pas// ngan sang pa sa yang ye nas rnyed// len pa dag pas dgra pa'i shing dun la/
20a3(rnying rgyud): srid thams cad ma mo'i ngang du bskal// ma mo mkha' 'gro byang chub sems su bskal// sems nyid ye sangs rgyas pas ye basbal chen po yin// zhes gsungs so// za byed skang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las sgrol ba bstan pa'i skabs te 'dren par
20a4(rnying rgyud): lha mo bde byed yang gsol ba// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// sbyor sgrol gnyis kyi bdag mon// nyid kyi gsogs ji ltar lags// sbyor sgrol bdag mos bshad du gsol// de srad gsal pa gsan nas kyang // rang byung rgyal pos
20a5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kun// bde chen chos kyi dbyings su gso// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// snying po byang chub sems su gso// thugs rje chen po'i byin rngubs kyis// khams gsum sems can nyon mong/
20a6(rnying rgyud): gas// 'dra ba'i nad kyis zin pa rnams// bdud rtsi chen po'i blan gyis gso// thugs rje'i rgyan thag chad pa rnams// rang byung ye shes thugs rjes gso// dam tshig rgyun thag chad pa rnams// me brjid gzungs kyi thugs rjes gso// shes
20a7(rnying rgyud): ran me b+hag shi ba rnams// ting 'dzin mi yengs brtan pos gso// shes rab me lce chad pa rnams// rtogs pa'i khyad par brtan posags// pa byung ye shes tshun chad pa// snying po byang chub sems kyis gso// sems kyi de nyid ma rtogs pas/
20b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab ting 'dzin brtan pos gso// ma mo mkha' 'gro gdug gtum pa// snying po byang chub sems kyis gso// zhes gsungs so// za byed srung rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las gso ba bstan pa'i skabs te brgyad pa'o// / gsad pa'i sbyor ba bstan
20b2(rnying rgyud): pa ni// dug lnga ye shes lnga ru bsad// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su bsad// sdug bsngal bde ba chen por bsad// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par bsad// shes rab me lce 'bar ba yis// gzung 'dzin drung chub 'tshubs pa bsad// she
20b3(rnying rgyud): rab me stag chen po yis// rnam rtog glu char 'bab pa bsad// rnal 'byor rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// ma rtogs rmongs pa'i gti mug bsad// ye shes nyi ma 'od gsal bas// gti mug mun pa 'thibs pa bsad// snang srid chos rnams
20b4(rnying rgyud): sems su bsad// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dbyings su bsad// shi ba med pas ye bsad yin// sems can thams cad sems su bsad// rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa na// ting 'dzin las su rung ba na// snang srid thams cad gsad par bya// gsang
20b5(rnying rgyud): du med de ye bsad yin// zhes gsungs so// za byed sbyang rgyal nag mo'i chud las bsad pa bstan pa'i skabs te dgu pa'o// / lha mo bde byed yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// gsogasad gnyis kyi bdag mo na// nyi
20b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbab bcad ji ltar lags// gsogasad bdag mos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba'i lung rong skam po ru// byang chub sems kyi chu bo dbab// rnam rtog me chen 'bar
20b7(rnying rgyud): bal// ye shes chen po'i chu bo dbab// dug lnga'i 'bras bu smin pa la// ye shes lnga yi ser ba dbab// dug gsum lo ma rgyas pa la// sku gsung thugs kyi thog chen dbab// gzung 'dzin drung tshub ldang ba la// ting 'dzin brtan po'i thibs
21a1(rnying rgyud): kyis gnon// sram gyi bad+ma b+hag sa// byang chub sems pa chu bo dbab// chom sa dbyings nyid gdal bcu// rig pa'i la shes chu bo bab// mkhar dbyings pade chen slong yangs su// shes rab nyeng 'dzin nuradu
21a2(rnying rgyud): dbab// mkha' 'gro ma mo'i phyogs chad du// snying po byang chub chu bo dbab// dbab tu med de ye phab yin// de ltar dbab pa bstan pa ni// byang chub sems kyi chu chen te// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dbang lugs yin// za byed srung rgyal nag mol
21a3(rnying rgyud): rgyud pas dbab pa bstan pa'i skabs te bcu pa'o// / de nas bcad lugs bka' stsal pa// bde chen chos dbyings klong yangs su// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgyun thag bcad// nga dang bdag tu blta ba la// gnyis med pal gri nan
21a4(rnying rgyud): yis// byang chub sems su rgyun thag gcad// dug lnga'i khang bur bcug pa la// ye shes lnga ru tshun thag gcad// drug gsum dra bar chud pA yaM// sku gsung thugs su rgyun zag gcad// chags sna'i lcags su btsud pa la//
21a5(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab spu gri yis// chags sdang gnyis kyi rgyan zag gcad// yid gnyis the tshom za ba la// shes rab ting 'dzin brtan po yis// yid ches dad par rgyun thag gcad// snang srid ma mo thams cad kun// rang gi sems las byung bas
21a6(rnying rgyud): nA// sem+ba nyid yin par rgyun thag gcad// gcad du med de nam rtog rnams// ye sangs rgyas pas ye b+had gcad// ces gsungs so// babyed sbyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las gcad thabs bstan pa'i skabs te bcu gcig pa'o// / bad byed
21a7(rnying rgyud): mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan da byung rgya mtsho// dbapagacid gnyis kyi bdag mon// nyid kyi mtshon du srung rabs gang // ngas dang bya 'dzi ltar lags// phrin pas gzung bsrang ji ltar lags// srub thabs rnam pa dun bstan// dbapagacad pa
21b1(rnying rgyud): mos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// las su bya ba'i bye brag rnams// nges par bshad kyi tshul bzhin nyon// mngon du sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum// rab kyis ting 'dzin brten nas bslab// 'brang
21b2(rnying rgyud): gis sngags la brten te bsgrub// tha mas rdzas la brten te bsgrub// rab kyis ting 'dzin sgrub thabs ni// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas gsal ba la// dmigs pa bskyed la nan tan bya// dmag pa gsal bar gyur pa dang // ting 'dzin brtan por gyur pa yis// mam
21b3(rnying rgyud): las su rung ba dang // rnal 'byor lus dang grib bzhin 'gyur// dmigs pa gsal bar ma gyur cing // lha mo las su ma rung na// nam kyang bkol du mi btub ste// dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// dur khrod ma mo chags sa ru// bdag las ma yin gzhan
21b4(rnying rgyud): mi bsnyen// 'du 'dzi spangs la bde gnas bshams// maN+Dal chag chag legs btab la// dar dkar ras la ma mo nyid// 'bri mkhan dam tshig can gyis bri// mdog nag zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs pa// spyan bzlog ral pa thur du gsig
21b5(rnying rgyud): mthing ga'i ral pa chag gang pa// 'od 'bar gyen du bsgreng ba'o// g.yas pa bam chen tsit+ta la// g.yon pa spyang mo phra thabs thogs// skra dang ral pa'i gseb nas kyang // skyang mo mar po 'phro ba bri// g.yas su spol ba'i ging chen bri// g.yon du
21b6(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i ging chen bri// kha dog gzugs mdangs mdzes par dri// de ltar bris pa'i ma mo de// maN+Dal dbus su de bzhag la// dmigs pa bskyed la nan tan bya// res bying res gsal cung zad tsam// mang du byung bas nan tan bya// de ltar byung ste
21b7(rnying rgyud): mngon gsal na// rang gi sems nyid yin par blta// lo'am zla ba'i bar du bya// de ltar yin par shes rtogs na// phrin las rnam bzhi ci dgar spyad// zhi rgyas gnyis kyis gso bar bya// dbang drag gnyis kyis gsad par bya// gsal ba mngon
22a1(rnying rgyud): du gyur pan// ra tud ba cid par byed// desugasangasas// bzod kyang tu la nag sa'i chud las ngatam ban sa btad to bsgrub pa'i'o slabs d+ha bcaganyis pan/ sngags la brten tung rtsub pa ni/
22a2(rnying rgyud): sa //
22a3(rnying rgyud): chod par bya// shakhrag snying sogs su na gzigs dang / gta ma rgyas pa rlags la 'bus la// ngag da/ dag megs pa// namam/ mad+hamAMs la ya/ many+dzu / zum/ da rjem ma mi rbad/ drug pa'i sngags 'das las
22a4(rnying rgyud): ya // drug dgra ba dz+ra la chums ri m+b+ha li/ dz+ha pyo/ pra tis nam nga grag sa tis nam ni khrimag kham khyim mgams can/ yungs kar grangs nag seM tsho dang // drag ngas la sogs ngas kyis bdag/ rdzas rnams skal ba'i gang du bzhom// de ba'i nang gas
22a5(rnying rgyud): rnamapa rim gyis so// zhes gsungs so// za byed spyad rgya la nag mo'i rgyud las sngags la brten te bslab pa'i skabs te brgya gsum pa// / rdzas la brten te bsgrub pa ni// rdzas ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad// dbang rdzas mchod rdzas bslab pa'i rdzas
22a6(rnying rgyud): brten rdzas bkang rdzas swa rba bshad// dbang rdzas pang sems dkar dmar dang // chang phung a mr-i ta sbyar ba'o// zas chen srog shad la sogs pa'o// mchod mas snying khrag la sogs sha/ dkar gsum mngang gsum spar gzigs sogs// sman dang bud
22a7(rnying rgyud): dang mying gis mchod// 'bras bus tshogs de bzhin drung // skyab rdzas rba dkar tshogs gsum pa// dug khrag la sogs can rnams so// ten rdzas shes rab sa tshal ched dang // a mr-i ta dang byang chub sems// ga khrag sbyir tshogs pa'i gre// rtag tu lus
22b1(rnying rgyud): la bsrel bar bya// rudar dmar nag le brgan grur// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan mthing nag gur/ stel mo'i g.yang gzhi sdel mo'i mgo// nal bu'i rgyal mtshan sha khrag snying // sde blugs zhwa dang rnga gling dung // tsi \u0f7f'i rgyal mtshan lug nag gsepa// lcags
22b2(rnying rgyud): slod rnga dang phreng chen rnams// ma mo brten pa'i rdzas su bshad// bskang rdzas 'bras bu sna tshogs dang // bya nag lug nag khyi rog mo// 'bri rog mo la sogs pas bskang // mi khyi rta yi bam gyis bskor// mdos la sogs pa'ang de bzhin
22b3(rnying rgyud): de ltar zas rnams tshogs pa dang // ma mo gnyis su med par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// za byed sbyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las rdzas la brten te bslab pa'i skabs te bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas phrin las gzhung bsrang ba// brag dpar
22b4(rnying rgyud): chol zangs 'dra ba'am// mtsho gling dur khrod dag tu bsgrub// zla ba mar gyi nyi shu gnyis// gza' mchog sgra gcan 'dzin la gtad// bsgrub bya shes ldan dbang rdzogs pas// dkyil 'khor ni rgyas dbang drag bzhi// dbus su mtshal gyis drag zas
22b5(rnying rgyud): la// rba dkar tshigs gsum gzug par bya// sbyir pa mgo ling yal ga lnga// de bzhin mkhar ba'i rtsa ru gzug/ snrel mo'i thod pa dum lnga'i nang // rten rdzas shes rab mtshal chen dang // a mr-i ta dang chang phung sogs// spyan
22b6(rnying rgyud): gzigs gtor ma de bzhin te// rgyab ni 'jam dpal phur la brten// yang na che mchog de bzhin no// ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bsgom la// dbang chen gzhal yas gdan bcas bsgom// bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags brjod de// dbus
22b7(rnying rgyud): kye shing dang pa mi dad// sru la dbang bskur dug gis ma pra byin bskyed// phrin las rdzogs nas rtag par rgyan sngags bzlas// bar du rbad cing tha mar bsad sngags bzlas// brdeg pa'i sngags bzlas snying thun dbab par bya// gtor ma gtang zhing
23a1(rnying rgyud): las kyi mapa' ba tra ste// sa chen ma lar ba dun ma ma phyogs su bstan// bdag pa'i len dag gis gnan par bya// ming bya gtub ba sags bzlas sbyin patheg pa// bdakar me lag mi bskur rtagatumam 'asam// khrin las
23a2(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs nas lus dang grib bzhin 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// babyed sbyang rgyal nag mo rgya las phrin las bstan pa'i skabs te bcolnga pa lA/ bde byed snyams yang gsol pa// dpal ldan dang byung rgyal mche// phrin las thams
23a3(rnying rgyud): zang bdag mon// grub babs rnam padu ra bstan// phrin las bdag mos bshang dragasol// de ska dgas lapags na nas kyang // rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// srub thabs rnam pa gsum du bshad// sa bskapa la bar la la brten bslab// ma bslab
23a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i zug pa bslab// dragasngags sangs kar la brten bslab// la bslab lapar mar brten bslab pa// thong ngagapar mi stobs che ste// de byer 'khor mong brten te bsgrug// kho ni gdug cing gtum pa ste// de phyer la bar lar brten la bsrung // lo yis thams
23a5(rnying rgyud): nga tshul byed pas// de phyir 'khor por brten sa bzlab// 'gror po brgya bas bams cad sgrol// 'khor lo pas rapas rnams cad gcod// phrin las rnam bzhis dngas dgacod// de kyi nal khyer mor brten te bslab// drar thod ngas la srung nul rtsa// drug phyag
23a6(rnying rgyud): mtshon sngags brdar la byug/ sbol ging sgod gi pan la bris la// sto bar srid pa'i 'khor lo gnar// srog gi 'khor lo ba skor ba'i tshe// srog las drung ba'i sgrib pas bskor// bsad pa'i 'khor lo bskor po'i tshe// phreng zhing bskal ba'i 'khor lo bskor/
23a7(rnying rgyud): da bar ming rdzas sham thar spyar// mAr la lo d+ho bsgrags gdag// pog gi khor po sram pan// bdu rtsi chang zang san gyis bkra// bsang ba'i tshig tu ra bya// bas dpa'i 'ja la 'grub ma rtse// rabs cang thod bcug gan na gtad bya// stsol
23b1(rnying rgyud): sgrol ging nyid lnga ste// gtad pa zhang bkrula'o// zhes gsungasas// za byed srung rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las pa 'khor lo la brten te bslab pa'i skabs te btu drug pa la// mo sgrub 'khor ba'i thag la bsgrub pa ni// ma mo rang bzhin 'ad chags
23b2(rnying rgyud): rje// khrag gi rang bzhin chags pa'i rgyu// chags pa'i 'bras bu thag tu sbyin// de phyir ldag la brten te bsgrub// dang ba bsgrub mo khrag gis mchod// bsad pa'i mtshan cha khrag gis bya// khrag la drug gi grogs dang myur// drag zhag nad kyi su
23b3(rnying rgyud): yin pas// gsod tshe drug khrag skye bar bya// khrag la rnam pa gnyis yod ste// shi ba'i khrag dang gson po'i khrag/ gson po'i khrag gis bslab cing mchod// shi ba'i thag gis gsad par bya// drag dang khrag gnyis drag po'i rdzas// khrag 'phreng
23b4(rnying rgyud): dug la gnan pa bya// zhes gsungs so// za byed sbyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las mo 'khor ba'i khrag la brten te bsrub pa'i skabs te bcu bdun pa'o// / drag sngags yungs kar la brten bslab bya ba// yungs kar sngags kyi mtshan yin te/
23b5(rnying rgyud): drag po'i rdzas su rab tu bsngags// yungs kar rgyal po dag la'ang // gong du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te// mtshan ma drod la gebs pa dang // dmigs bya'i ling+ga nyid la'o// trig trig/ se ra ser/ ku lu ku lu/ mo ku mo ku/ tsa ha tsata/ mu ta dz+wa la kha ha/
23b6(rnying rgyud): tsug ra lding / mu lu mU rba/ phyogs lding ldang / bu chag phyag/ mi ha he/ ba shal ba shul/ mu dru pa ne tseg tsag/ tsig tsig/ mu s+thAm ti/ he le he te/ sA R+sha tsis tsi/ myog myog/ zlum bum/ dkar ldan me he/ hi ku lu tse e phaT ni/ dga' ba'i mchog chen po'o//
23b7(rnying rgyud): tsing l+ling mu ka ye ka dkod mi he/ mya mya/ mi mi tse ku/ hU hU tsi lding / mu da ya tsing lding / khu cog ne/ tsa ta me mu ka ye/ ting ma long rtsa ka ye/ skar mi ting ting phrag phrag/ bri ba brib rtsing le steng / mi lo ka yang shing pi myongs sta ri/ zhes gong du bsnyen pa rdzogs
24a1(rnying rgyud): pa dag // gas kya gso// nga gas bas// / bgan ga tugs // ba tsong dragasags bas// ga ma ga rgyud da/
24a2(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum yang 'khrugs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// babyed srung rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las drug sngags yungs ka ra la brten nas bslab pa'i skabs te bco brgyad pa'i// l+h+wam bde byed yang gas pa // lus kyi dkyil la
24a3(rnying rgyud): chen po dag/ tshul dang thabs ni ji ltar lags// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// man ngag las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dur khrod ma la yar song la// snol mo'i ro ma yang
24a4(rnying rgyud): na ni// gri mo dashege ba'i grangs la// ster ra tshal chog bya// spos dang sran gyis ra sbyangs la// ral dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// snying gi srog gi 'khor lo bri// mtheng nag gugasum blag ma gsum// mkhyung zlum po ku cad ldang // sgo bzhi rigs dang
24a5(rnying rgyud): mthun par bya// shes rab ma tshal gyis sngags 'di 'i// g+ha gsum dbus su nga ga zis te// bam drag pa 'di rnams kyi// A khaman pa sa pa/ srin mo nag mo'i dragazugs te// rang dgas srog gi snying po'i bshad// mid dpags ma yang rgyal
24a6(rnying rgyud): byed // b+hag ma gsum la sngags 'di bri// su ru lus rba hrIts+tshiSh+Ta/ gnod sbyin nag mo'i drag sngags te// grub pa rtags kyi snying por bshad// sred gsum dbang du sdud par byed// mu khyud zlum por sngags 'di bre// ran mo ti ke ma mtsha ba la ma toH/
24a7(rnying rgyud): ma monag mo'i drag sngags te// khams gsam babyed snying po bshad// thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed// gru cad bzhi la sngags 'di ni// pu lu ru wa ma hi \u0f7f// bdud mo nag mo'i drag sngags te// gdug pa 'dul byed snying por bshad// zam
24b1(rnying rgyud): cad ma lus rgas par byed// sgo bzhir du ba hoHwi// sgra bzhi 'byed pa'i pho nya mo// de ltar dkyil 'bar bre ba yang // brang sems dkar dmar sbyar la bri// de ni srog gi dkyil 'khor yin// lta bar sred pa'i 'khor lo bri// dbus sra
24b2(rnying rgyud): dug gsum yi ge dgod// mtha' ma bsad pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mA na'i mtha' ma ming rus sbyar// dug dang khrag tu sbyar la bri// srid pa bshig pa'i 'khor lor bshad// gsang gnas bsad pa'i 'khor lo dag/ gru gsum b+ha ga'i
24b3(rnying rgyud): maN+Da la drA/ dbus su ljang gu'i nr-i gcig bri// mtha' ma ming rus dag gis bskor// de yi mtha' mdzes bskor te// lha mo lcags kyu spo zhing bsdu// zhugs pa lcags slog tho ba dang // mda' gzhu mo ri dmar nag bri// de ni bskal ba'i dkyil
24b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor yin// zhal du bsreg pa'i maN+Dal la// gru gsum rtse mo sna sgor bstan// nang du rdo sol chang du sbyar// dbus su raM zhes bri bar bya// mtha' mar ag ne ma brgyad bri// dz+wa la raM brgyad bri bar bya// gru gsum kha khyer me ris bskor// dpal ldan
24b5(rnying rgyud): radapyang rgyal mo yang // sbyin sreg mo yi lha mor bskyed// dug shing sna tshogs hom byas te// tsher ma can gyi shing la sbar// sbyin sreg 'bod rbad sbrel la bya// mgo bo byang shar mtshams su bstan// snying gar rba dkar tshigs gsum gzug/ dbang
24b6(rnying rgyud): bsgyur sru bskyed phrin las bcol// lte bar 'khor lor ming rus bri// gos dang rkang rjes dang snrubs dang // dri chen dri chu dag las bya// sngon dmar btags la byang du gzhug/ sde gcig 'khar ba'i rtse mor gdags// nyams pa tshe yi rgyan thag kyang /
24b7(rnying rgyud): ma mo'i zhal du rngubs par bsam// gsang gnas b+ha ga'i 'thung khung nyid// lcags kyi khang sgrom 'bar bar bsam// rabs chad thod par ming rus gzhug/ lcags kyi phrar tha sor brgyad pa// gdug byed nag mo'i skur bsgom ste// sngon dmar sde
25a1(rnying rgyud): gcig phur bu la'o// gdug byed phur bu zhag gdab// bsad pa las kyi sbya ba bya// rad ma mo nyid yi na te// nang rub tin grang mtshan krung ngu// mchod bsnyen sreg zhal du 'bul// steng ga ra da ra nag gur gcig dbug
25a2(rnying rgyud): kal te ni med gyur na// srin po'i sa la ro gzugs bya// gong bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyas par bri// ro do ma yis mthong mi rung // mthong na dam tshig nyams pa ste// rnal 'byor bdag la bar chad 'brang // mis ma mthong na dngos grub srir// na pa
25a3(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhi'i dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// za byed spang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las man ngag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor srog gi bsgrub pa'i skabs te bcu dgu pa'o// / bde byed lha mos yang gsol ba// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mtsha
25a4(rnying rgyud): de yi gsang sngags ji ltar legs// bdag 'dud khyod kyis bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rang byang rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags dgos pa'i rtsa ba rnams// nges par bshad kyi yang dag nyon// rbag rak+Sha Sha mun
25a5(rnying rgyud): tra/ mu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rag mo te ku ma dz+nyi d+h+r-i kha la b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma hid b+h+yo/ rtsa ba rgyan gyi snying po yin// trag trag gur lan gur la na/ ser ser dug dug cha run shag/ bal mo sha ma/ mu ka ye a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ nam mkha' khams kyi sgra drag po
25a6(rnying rgyud): nus pa'i mabu ldan dbang bskur sngags// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ ma mkhad ga sha ma ma khwa dag sha dza hU~M hU~M hring hring / de ni ma mo spyan drang sngags/ ma ma tra ga rak+Sha sa ma la tiSh+Tha g+han/ de ni bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags/ tra ga rAk+Sha e kadz+ha ti 'dzin mo// dra ka
25a7(rnying rgyud): pa na mo// de ni phyag bcol pa'i sngags so// ma mdzag ra nra e ka dza ti/ i dam pa 'i hrIts+yai ho/ d-i k+Sha hi/ de ni gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so// tra gar kA ma ma tiSh+Tha sa ma ya/ dam 'da' ba'i sngags so// las ye drag po'i sngags 'dis btang /
25b1(rnying rgyud): ga ra// ma ba sgri parag/ sogs zad/ 'du / sa// thams ris 'i zad/ dag pa'i sngags 'dis ga sa shAg// dag ra/ badra ba rnams la ma hU~M ba / gtis ma / thag ma nyis namang / sreg ga khru lag lag cag
25b2(rnying rgyud): ming rus gzugs la sngags 'dis brdeg/ oM maM dar hri bu ma ril zad/ oM me dar lig snying kha rag rbad/ oM tsa mar snying pa rag ti badz+ra dun b+h+yo/ bsad pa pho mo'i sngags 'dis brdeg/ thig trig// si ra ser/ ku lu ku lu/ mo ku mo ku/ tsa ha tsa ha/
25b3(rnying rgyud): ma ti dz+wa la/ kha he tsa gar sting / mu hu mA ru myogasu ldeng ldang bu/ phyag phyag/ me he ha ba shal ba shul/ ma hu sa ne/ tsagra tsa ga cig cig mr-i ti mA ti/ phu ru tsi sa dzI/ phyogs phyogs/ dr-i braM/ dkar lAn me he hi/ ku ma dzu tse/ e phaT nr-i/ dag
25b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchog chen po/ tsong lding mu ka ye kod kod mi he/ lcags lcags mi cos/ hu Tu tsi he/ mud ye ye/ skar mi ting ting / prab prab/ pri ba bIb/ tsong le lding ming sh+lo ka/ ya shi'i phyogs sta ri/ lo mo bsad pa ru ba zlog dang // dkrig dang badzad
