25b5(rnying rgyud): dang brdeg pa'i sngags// de la rab tu brnag par bya'o// mo rang skying kun sngags 'dis bsgrub// tra ga rak+ta kha mAn tra mu tra/ mu ru lu ru lu kha la ma hi/ tsu lu b+h+yo/ 'dis snying la rbad par bya'o// e kadzA ti me dang lig/ snying pa rag ma/ rag mo
25b6(rnying rgyud): srog rtsa rgud/ kha 'dar ru ni sa ma ya g+ho/ 'dis ni gsad par bya'o// e ka dzA ti me se na me sa na/ tra ga ra k+Sha/ snyig pa rags ma yang dza/ drag sngags gsum pa'i bslapa lugs su// phur bu'i sngags 'dis gzir bar bya'o// dz+dza hA tshaShachan+ta mA ra ya
25b7(rnying rgyud): ma ga sha truM pra be sha phaT/ phung po bshag pa'i sngags 'dis bdeg/ pra pe shag phaT/ saM be shag te/ phyogs shu gra a~M ku sha dza/ tsi d+ha gra lu s+pha ra ma shag ti n+do/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa drangs shig pa'o// ba ma tshugs rbad thibs/ li shar /
26a1(rnying rgyud): 'du rdzu / ga ga sa sa/ un s+ho/ pa gas / su na rdzas// sa
26a2(rnying rgyud): thams cadargyas par thu ba'i phyir// ngag g.yos sa uH/ thams cad dbang du bslab kyin/ dag pa/ e kas+t+wa~M/ sarbab gang nas/ thag pas bsgral pa'i sa sags / sa da
26a3(rnying rgyud): so// srer ba dpa 'a 'dar// dag dag gas ma/ ran ma e kAn+nati/ dra rtsam/ dkar zlum/ kyai phU/ yug ti smin/ zag tu tshar/ shA ra/ la Sh+TA ba/ traM hU~M bajug tu phyog/ rgyo phrul zhes nganang bab pa ni// ma mra ga mo maka
26a4(rnying rgyud): rAti/ yo ma lem thug lem ma hAd+ha/ mig dun bab pa/ drag tug/ mdun na ya/ kram ka ma/ snre la dran tsa ya/ kya kyang babs/ dzam / batra pa byung beb/ gling kyang dun dran rabs/ log/ dza~Mn lag d+he/ drung zib dran ce pal/
26a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal la/ den rdzogs tha gas pa'o// yang dag bku thongs par bas/ dathang sa la nag ma'i byud pas dgas pamams pa'i gsang sngags kyis pa ga ti tha pa'o// bdeded rnams padugs pa 'o// na
26a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo yi// bran gyi 'chang bdag ldan 'tshal// gdug byed sgrams bshang drugs la// des gsol bags na nas kyang // rang byung rgyal mas bka' stsal pa// thun la rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// bslab pa'abya ba'i bran pazhini// snying theg pas
26a7(rnying rgyud): sa can pa 'o'o// khrag pa ming srung ba // dkyim pa mthong nab grags mang/ khyed drags sa 'i yod mag padag/ zas ga na la ngos pa banan par// the rgo pas gnas btags// tho ba'i rtsa pa'i bta // rin pa
26b1(rnying rgyud): gzungs thag lcags bur btod// 'byung bzhi'i ma ma bskam lag dab// drag sngags 'dis ni mngon du bsgrub// dza ga raH/ kha mAn tra/ mA tra a kad ti steng kha ragam bya/ Thag rag sa ma pa dang / bu'i snying ling chud/ ma ma snying kha rag sring kha rag/ ma ma
26b2(rnying rgyud): rag sha/ ma ma ragag/ rag mo skyeng khrag la mdun dun/ trug rak+ta ma/ snying le he ke ma/ ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+rU~M/ khog supa drongs shig/ snying thag la sa ma ya dz+nya dza dzaM/ snying rtsa phyung zhig/ ma ma snying tsit+ta la thun/ snying khrag ma mthun/ shi sti ta ma sgying
26b3(rnying rgyud): ya ma b+h+yo/ mu ma sha shra ma ma hring hring / mA mA sa ma ya dgra bo na mA ra ya sod sod/ ma ma tsiN+Da dz+wa la raM/ snying rtsa la rol/ chu ma thu ma ri li lI/ ma las myur du mdzod cig/ khrag las snying du grub pa dang // de nas sngags 'di bzlas par bya// o ba
26b4(rnying rgyud): snying phog/ oM badz+ra snying mgo chod cig/ kha la rba mun te lo dra na ti da ra ya rbad/ oM badz+ra khrug ti sngar parbad/ oM badz+ra tsa ta kr-i dar zad/ oM ga u kre dar ti ti ya badz+ra hU~M phaT/ rbad du za du/ zang bu zad bu dar ka ya/ sdom pa ma shi swa sa ma ya/ de nas
26b5(rnying rgyud): snying de gtub cing bsreg/ dngos grub mchog tu thob par bshad// za byed srung rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las khrag thun gyi skabs te nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas snying thun 'di gsungs so// klu gsum mthing nag kha khyer na// dbus bu
26b6(rnying rgyud): b+han+d+ha kha sbar la// phyi rol dug khrag dmar nag phyog/ gri mor shi ba'i snying chen la// nang du snying rtse sna tshogs blugs// rgyus tshon dag gis bcom par bya// ming rus snying gar sngon dmar btags// de yang snying ga'i nang du gzhug/ srud pa srog
26b7(rnying rgyud): 'i nang nas phyung // lcags phrar brtod la gdug byed bsgom// thod pa'i steng du bu gu dbug/ gri lcags spa grar yungs kar bsngags// mthing nag dar ram le brgan gur// rgya dang bcas te sngon dmar bcing // srog gi steng pos mngon du
27a1(rnying rgyud): ban+d+ha// ma g+sa / ma b+h+ya/ / ma smra stsug/ ma zhu smra // sta / na/ nam tha 'dang/
27a2(rnying rgyud): zad / tsit+ta kra lu skAr ma shag ti dza / rtags dang sbar la las la chad// de nas srog steng 'di yis bsgrub// snying pa ma ril/ snying kha dag tshal pa/ rbad 'ang rbad baT/ tshag le mu dzu ba ma/ oM s+t+waM phaT/ ne tsog sod song / byang phyogs bum+ba ril/ a
27a3(rnying rgyud): lo sha thung / khazhun snying dum sa zad / dug srog khyer yag sha ba ma ri la zang / yungs kar rgyal por bsngags shing brdeg/ de nas phrar bu dril b+ha zhing // snying la mgo mjug med par brdeg/ oM badz+ra kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAn paM hUM phaT/ tsit+ta chud khrig yang phyag/
27a4(rnying rgyud): myogs tham pa ma ril/ zhung zhung chu ma chu marba na rba na kI la ya kI la ya/ rak+Sha rAk+Sha/ khrum khyum/ kr-i d+ha ba ma ril/ zhes brdeg go// de nas snying dang ling+gar bcas// gtub cing sngags bzlas gtor mar dbul// ga tor ma bdud kyi nyi ma la// rlung la 'phyar na
27a5(rnying rgyud): phung bar bshad// za byed spang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las snying thun gyi srub pa pa rnag pa'i skabs te nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas myos pa'i drug thun dag/ shin tu drag po'i mdo thod nang // phyi rol drag byug re bar gril// sna chags khrag dang dug
27a6(rnying rgyud): sbyar la// bud med zhabasams pa yang gargyad// drag po'i sngags 'dis drug thun bsrub// ma mthag raH/ tha ma ri li li/ bal dug kun dug e ka d+na ti tI ha tsukra kro d+ha mA ra la gyo b+ho// khol lam drangs byung smos pa na// ming rus drug gi rlangs pas bajug
27a7(rnying rgyud): gragasum bcug lajug gis brdeg/ oM a pe ga 'a be ga pa sha ma/ rba ba sha ga zun 'thun/ shog zam shig bam/ sa bams bam/ be lugs pa mugs/ myos rgal mos gal/ na ti s+t+waM b+hanan/ zhes bzlas la ling+ga la gteg cing / kla nag pa gnas/
27b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sar mnan no// za byed srung rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las myos pa dug thun gyi skabs te nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas gdug byed pur thun dag/ gru gsum mthing nag thur du ba'o// kha khyer thod phreng me ris bskor// lcags kyi phur ba sor brgyad
27b2(rnying rgyud): pa// gdug byed nag mor bsgom par bya// so ba tshig phye gu gul dang // sha chen rag/ zhing gi ras// go ro tsan la sogs pas// chag gang gzugs dang dbang bapo btod// ming nus bris la mdun rgyab bsran// rkang rjes lung ba dar skabs kyang /
27b3(rnying rgyud): y+m+R+YuMng+tha de yi rgyun bya// tshon srud sna lhas gzugs bkyigasal// phur pa dwe la btag la bzhag/ gra gral dud pas lha dang dbye// yungs kar rgyal po dag dung ni// phrar pa dbang bskur drin gyis brlab// phrar pa drag po'i sngags 'das bslab/
27b4(rnying rgyud): oM maM dar hr-ing thu ma ril rbad/ oM tsar ma snying khrag ragar ti badz+ra dun b+h+yo/ oM me dar lig snying kha rag rbad/ grub tags 'od dang du ba dang // me 'phara? l+la dang bri zhim na// 'bar ba'i sngags bzlas gzugs la brdeg/ da re hing gis ming wa brdeg/ dar bi
27b5(rnying rgyud): gis rdzas la brdes/ de nas lus spyir sngags 'dis bdeg/ hU~M hU~M oMn+da mo mA ra ya/ ma ga shatrUM thai ba sha phaH/ dri ni sras snyir bathud cing bdag/ sni theg srog brtse yi khrag/ 'drar/ 'i gtar ma yang // gdug byed ma mo nyid lad bu le// gzugs de k+sha
27b6(rnying rgyud): gnas sarba sra// yang na byang shar sbyin sreg hom// zhes gsungs so// ba byed spang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las yang big yang snying phur blun gyi skabs te nyi shu bzhi pa'o// lha mo bde byed yang gsol ba// dpal ldan dang byung rgyal mocha//
27b7(rnying rgyud): dbab pa'i las dag bshad du gsol// desad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal ba// dbab pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// ster ba dbapa dang lhas ngan dbab// serab dbab par 'dod pa na// mdze can dag gi mgo bod dam// rabs
28a1(rnying rgyud): chad lpags sa'i thod nang du// khri mar rog pa dmar zag// swa swA m+b+ha tshogs brdungs te spad// grag la dru pa zad par bdug/ rgya tshe lagasar can gagal che// dzadapyas yul lha 'jug par bya// tam grin sbyar bstsom mar
28a2(rnying rgyud): gzir// ma mo'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // sngags 'dis bsnyen pa 'bum du bstsal// dud phrom dkar bram/ shud ti zo ma yug ti sprin/ trag dur tsar hril b+ho/ shar sha la ta trail gyo/ tra~M traM mur d+ho/ pho ba rab tu pho ba la/ yul lha'i thog tu thod pa
28a3(rnying rgyud): gnan// khrag dang sngo khus yul lha bslu// de dus sngags 'dis yul lha gzir// oM ya mAn+ta ka/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ hA ya grI ba/ a tsa me da ra ku ru me tse sa brag swA hA/ drag tu khros te bzlas par bya// yul lha rten bdag gzir nas kyang // yul khams
28a4(rnying rgyud): ser bas 'joms par bshad// yang na klu gnas chu mig dang // bdag nyid nub phyogs phyir bskyed la// bag phye'i sbal ba bzhi byas te// khrag la sngags bzlas skye bor blugs// mgo mjug khrag dang sngo khus bsdu// klu yang mi bzod 'joms
28a5(rnying rgyud): par bshad// zang po che la las byas na// phug pa gcig tu me btang la// dgra gzugs bag rtse dag la bya// ming rus khrag dang sngo khu dag/ gcig tu bsres la sbyin pa sreg bya// srid pa 'khrug par ma gyur na// ser ba phebs par mi 'gyur te/
28a6(rnying rgyud): ma mo chu 'khyags bdag mor bsgom// zhes gsungs so// za byed spang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las ser ba dbab pa'i skabs te nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas ltas ngan dbab pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor phrin las rnam bzhir bri// dbus su
28a7(rnying rgyud): mthing nag su gsum du// lhas ngan pa dag mo zhal phyung ste// 'brun ga zan la de bzhin pa // mthing nag ral pas sa gzhi khyab// mcha gtsigs sran dmar nab krong// phyag g.yas tsed+ha g.yon spang mo// thugs kar gru gsum kha rgyal/
28b1(rnying rgyud): dgra bgegs gang rung med rus dang // ma ma'i snying po gzhug par bya// slar yang mthing nag dar gyis gcad// spyi bor le brgan bur gcig dbub// 'bru nag zan la ltas ngan ni// rang nyid gang 'babs sha khrag dang// bsres te ltas ngan gzugs byas
28b2(rnying rgyud): te// mu mo nyid la bskor la bzhag/ yang sbal sna tshogs dbab pa'i phyir// re re la yang bzhi bzhis bskor// rang rang snying khrag sha rus la// gtor ma byas twa gzhag par bya// gsob la sogs pa'ang de bzhin te// sum sul 'ong dang
28b3(rnying rgyud): dbab pa'i phyir// me long g.yab cing sngags kyang bzlas// ru dar nag po rten du bca'// ma mo nyid kyi rgyab tu yang // sngon dmar dra ba bsrur bar bya// rke ru gser gyi dra ba gdags// mdun du cha shog dug la yang // mnyes yus 'bris la bzhag
28b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rang gi spyod yul las// rgyal ba'i sras po nyid me bsnyen// byang sems dkar dmar a mr-i ta// chad phud sogs pas dbang yang bskur// lhas ngan bdag mor dbang yang bskur// lhas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs par bsgom// snying phrag
28b5(rnying rgyud): skyeng dang srog rtsa'i khrag/ sna tshogs lhas ngan sha khrag sbar// nang nub gtor ma chun mi gcad// nyams dang rmi lam mngon sum du// rnal 'byor rang gi gnas su ngong // de nas dgral zad par bya// bdag nyid che mchog ha rbaka/ ma mo thag la su mngon
28b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed// lhas ngan sna tshogs 'gyed par bsgom// sngags 'di kun du bzlas par bya// trag rak+Sha kha mAn tra mu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo ta ke mar rdo la b+h+yo/ ru lu mu mu ma hi b+ho/ yaM lim shaM li ma ma sha ra/ ma sha dun dA tho ba ya/ trag he he yadzun tse ya/
28b7(rnying rgyud): bikr-i sr-i la dran tse ya/ kyang byeng po ba la/ khu 'ur trab trab thi bzab kyi kyang / dun dun thob pa/ tho po li dur yag gi/ du da pri la dun tso thob pa/ n+ya d+ha pi ya/ rang gi gnas dang po phyi na// bi bathib ma byung bar du bzlas// ting nge 'dzin gyis mazin na// yang
29a1(rnying rgyud): pa yabs par ga/ nam nga bdA na // ngas ma smras sas pa // nga / tshogs smras na / nga
29a2(rnying rgyud): byas te// rang gi lus la bsrel par bya// phyis ni ngas kun gtor bas chog/ yid la gang bsam gang 'dod 'ong // zhes gsungs so// za byed spang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las tshe'i 'brul lhas ngan dbab pa'i skabs te nyi shu drug du'o//
29a3(rnying rgyud): lha mo pade byed yang gsol pa// rang byung rgyal mo'i bskang zas gang // bkang lugs gang ljagasub shad du gsol// de sad gsol pags na nas kyang // rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma mo skyed nga'i tshe// @
29a4(rnying rgyud): pa ga ma // mam thagrang rdzo / da pa / btsu gas pa pa// gzhag ci zugs ga
29a5(rnying rgyud): gro 'brur brtsegs// rgyas pag ste gaN+DI'i steng dag tu// snang srid gzugs kyis basbyor pa gzhag/ de steng zhi ba dkar zlum du// spyan gzigs sna tshogs bkram la gzhang// zung gsum brtsegs par zag ma gsum// glags
29a6(rnying rgyud): gsum la gtor ma gsam// mi khrin pi shwa khrag stong // gzhan yang sna tshogs 'thor pa dgra'// glags ma rtse mo lho bsnyen// sor gnyis gyen du stong ba la// khrag zur du zabar bya// sal che nu dag gis nag por gyi/
29a7(rnying rgyud): gsum ceg da dgasam// ma rgya'i rgyal mtshan gsus yang dag // me khyeH mi steng gsum pang // sreg pargya dang bcas tigazha // thugasum dbus kyi la mo'i mag// dum bu lngas gzhag par bya// de yanang dram mo'i sra/ lugs
29b1(rnying rgyud): ma dag gamarwa shing la// 'bur du bus pa bzhugs su gsol// yang na 'phra zan las byas pa'i// mthing nag 'jigs pa'i cha byad can// zhal gdangs spun bgrad mche gtsigs pa'i// ral pas sa gzhi khyab pa la// spyi gtsug mthing
29b2(rnying rgyud): ga'i ral ba 'od du 'bar// g.yas pa bam chenA tsin+d+ha la// g.yon pa g.yu ye sbrang mo phra babs thogs// srung mo 'bum gyis bskor bar bya// thugs kar mtshal gyis trag gcig bri// zhal du brnag pa'i ming rus gzhug/ sngon du
29b3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyol zong bri// le brlan gur dbu zhing yol bri// de ltar bzhengs pa'i ma mo de// pho srog bdag mo yin par bshad// tshe la dkyil 'khor bzhengs gsol la// skangs su tshe yi snying po drung // dang par ting 'dron rnam
29b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis// rang gi sems nyid rtogs par bya// rtogs pa ma yengs brtan po yis// phrin las rnam bzhi'i maN+Dal la// b+han+ta 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// rang byung ye shes chen po las// yi ge trag tu 'phros pa yis/
29b5(rnying rgyud): trag las ma mogs la bsgom ste// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum dang bcas// ting 'dzin brtan po ma yengs bsgom// de yi mdun du mchod pa kun// 'dod yon sna tshogs ldan pa bsgom// bla nag lug nag bskung ba'i rjes// bdud dang gi
29b6(rnying rgyud): pa'ad de bzhin du// rang rang mnyas pa'i rdzas kyang bsham// zhag gsum par du dpal bsnyen bya// drug gi bar du che brlab \u0f7f// dag yo bar dum mo bsten// bcu gnyis par dun mo bskang // bco lnga'i rngub mo thun zor 'phang /
29b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan po'i gzhung la bskyon// de yis dgos 'dod bgra cad 'gyung // ces gsungs so// byed srung rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las ma d+ha das kyi mthu nas bya ti shu bdun pa// bde byed lha mos yang gsal pa// bdag ma yin pa/
30a1(rnying rgyud): de sa // skyernangs sa sgru ba / nyan gyu// dag dgas la bags nas kyang / shA A d+harnams pak+ku phrul pa/ / ba na pa// saman nags ma N+Dag na
30a2(rnying rgyud): lha chen ma hA de ba dang // lha mo u ma de wI gnyis// ma mngal yid kyis sbyor ba mdzad pa las// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mdangs las lha mo u ma'i dpral bar lcags kyi mdzer pa gcig skyes pa las/ yab kyis khye'ur smon lam
30a3(rnying rgyud): btab/ yum gyis bu mor smon lam btab ste/ yum gyi smon lam ma thu btsan nas/ bu mo bzang sdug la 'od chags pa gcig skyes so// ming yang lha mo mdangs ldan mar btags so// bu mo de zas su ni lha'i zhal zas ro mchog
30a4(rnying rgyud): bca nupas/ gos sman na ldan pa rnal gzhon pa la/ bdu yo pa'i gli pa dang bdudam pa ca kun dga' ma'i ba ba da kyang dran dag pazapa'i rtswa g+hu/ de la gnyis kyis dme papa / khyod kyi ga la bag mas na
30a5(rnying rgyud): yang gal med pa la/ khyod lha'i bu mo gsos pas bdud la song ba las/ khyod lus mthing las gnag par song zhig/ zas su mi sha rta sha za ba gcig tu song zhig/ skom du mi khrag rta khrag 'thung ba gcig tu song zhig/ gos su mi
30a6(rnying rgyud): lpags gon pa gcig tu song zhig/ ces dmod pa bor bas/ yum gyi dmod pa btsan par gyur te/ mod de nyid la de bzhin nyid du gyur te/ dme sha gsum la rkan phab pas/ lha'i zhal zas zos pas shin tu ro rgyas pas/ gos su mi
30a7(rnying rgyud): lpags gon pas shin tu brjid che/ ral pa nag pos gzhi / khyab pa gcig tu gyur te/ yab yum lha yin pa'i rtags su/ sde bo'i gtsug tu mthing gi ral pa 'od du 'gro ba gcig ma 'gyur bar gnas pa las/ mtshan yang ral pa gcig
30b1(rnying rgyud): mar mnga' gsol lo// de nas rgya mtsho'i gting du yum mtsho sran rgyal mo'i dngos grub brnyes te/ zag dmar chol zangs 'dra ba la nyin gyi gnas bcas/ mtshan yang me za zag gyon mar gsol lo// de nas ngur khrod gnas kun
30b2(rnying rgyud): nyal bas/ mtshan yang drar khrod klong dgu ma/ gragasum dpal gyi pho zang du// dpal chen khrag 'thung dbang thob pas// mtshan yang dpal gyi gzungs gcig ma// g+ho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang ngu// ya mAn ta ka'i yum
30b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas// mtshan yang sgeg mo ral gcig ma// gru gsum shel gyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gzhon nu'i yum mdzad pas// mtshan yang 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// ri bo ma la ya yi rtser// phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du// gsang sngags
30b4(rnying rgyud): bsrung mar dbang bskur bas// mtshan yang sngags srung nag mo bya// thams cad gsod pa'i las byed pas// srin mo ral gcig sha za ma// rnal 'byor yod kyi grogs byed pas// mtshan yang dgra 'dul nad tshong ma// de yang tsha ba'i nad
30b5(rnying rgyud): gtong bas// mtshan yang bal mo kun sdug ma// khrag rims yams nad gtong byed pas// mtshan yang nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// lhas ngan cho 'phral gtong bas na// mtshan yang mon mo nag mo bya// de bzhin mtshan gyi rnam grangs yang /
30b6(rnying rgyud): brjod kyis mi lang bsam yas te// phyag na rdo rje sprul pa'i sgra// de nyid sprul pa bstan pa pas// zhes gsungs so// za byed sdang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las skye chud lung bstan pa'i skabs te nyi shu brgyad pa'o// de nas 'dus pa'i phal
30b7(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// shin tu mtshar yi rangs nas// ma me tad la mngon par bstod// traM/ gsang sngags gtan 'i lung ma mthum// sngags kya nag ma~M // mngon par bstod kyis dam ma 'das// sra gsum phram gyi mkha' dbyings nas
31a1(rnying rgyud): trag las slar bskyed rdzogs pa ni// thugs nyid mya ngan las 'das kyang // blor grwa khams gsam mdzad pa'i rtags// ral pa mtheng nag 'byur ba ni// chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa yi// don ma thugs sa chud pa'i rtags/
31a2(rnying rgyud): ral pa por tshugs gcig bcings pa// khams gsum dbang du sprad pa'i rtags// phyag g.yas zhing chen cota ni// 'gro drug cud nas gcod pa'i rtags// phyag g.yon ga yu yi sbrang mo phra thabs gtong ba ni// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs gyur du 'dren pa'i
31a3(rnying rgyud): rtags// thugs las srung mo dgu 'bram 'phro ba ni// stong khams dgra po ma skyes sgrol ba'i rtags// zhab sna gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs bzhugs pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor ba'i rtags// ma mo nag myo gdug pa'i srog sgro la ma/
31a4(rnying rgyud): mngon par bstod kyi mthu ma chung // zhes brjod do// de nas phrin las kyi sam mo 'di skad bskul bar bya'o// phrin las rnam bzhi ldan gyis grub// grwa gsum mthing nag klong dkyil nas// sngags kyi srung ma mthu mo che// mu mdog mthing nag
31a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba la// ral pa'i zar bus sa gzhi khebs// g.yas kyi khrag na zhing chen tsit+ta bsnams// g.yon na ga yA yi spyang mo bsdams// ga yu yi spang mo dgu 'bum thugs kyi pho nyar 'gyed// 'dzin byed 'bar ba'i lcags kyu yis// mig gi dbang po
31a6(rnying rgyud): mngon du phyung // lcags kyi sder chen gdengs pa yis// lus kyi khong khrol snying gyung zhing // spang mo stsal pa'i 'phrong du yis// srog tu snying rtsa phyung la shog/ mgo dang lus su phrol la shog/ sha dang rus pakrol la sh+log/ nad khrol dbang po
31a7(rnying rgyud): spros la shog/ dgra bo'i lha lnga dbang du smras// mngon spyod drag pos rdul du rdzogs// zhe sdang spyod cing srid par krugs// mi mngon mkha' dbyings pade chen nas// e ka dr-i ti ral gcig ma/ dbu dgu thor tshugs gcig bcings shib// khams
31b1(rnying rgyud): sa dgas nga// da nanasan rnams gyu// mang gas / da ga ga rnams su la// dugs s+hos/ gas sa su/ ga/
31b2(rnying rgyud): gang gcig ma// snad khams rgya ning mkha' la 'am// bags pas bdud rnams smral par byed// lag na sngags kyi rtse dgra / bsnams// gdag byed rnams kyi sgying byin ma// dzan pa myur rims// dan rtags sa // gan byeng ma thas rje 'dzi nags// bar /
31b3(rnying rgyud): rig nas ga ladag na// kan sde pas shing bdud dpung 'dams// rtag tu dbang lhag stsal rol// dga' ba'i dab gis grogs mdzad ma// 'dod khams gtso mo dbang du spyad// khod nim brgyad ga cim b+ha// ngag gi brgyad la 'thung shing mnams dbang srung // da
31b4(rnying rgyud): nas rkyen gyi gtor ma 'dri mongs la// rdzag nang dag meda' 'dren ci zin las mdzod// de pyir phrin las bdag mamathu ma chung // zhes pas zin las kyi bdag mo bskus// sgras ngan pa dag ma 'di skad bsgral// rbad nag par bya dang // me lang gsab mos gas
31b5(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags gzhan gyi sang mAm ma che// bzhangs shig ni ma na byings nas bzhengs// bsngal la dmachog bdag ma bsgrub// gshegs shig tsha 'brel bdag mo gshegs// su ma dag mthing nag sa ri// ral dag po gang ra// mthing dag dpa
31b6(rnying rgyud): rgyangs su rgyud // gawA ye smin mkhrugs se khyag/ sman mi ga nye bra ba khril pa tsam// khrag gi mchi ma sha rar// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs bskus zam// khrug dang zhag 'dzag du lus// ljags 'dril rgan de pa sems se chem// mi grags g.yang gzha
31b7(rnying rgyud): tshol ma mo// da ga par kyis skyabs sa spyas/ gams kyi ga par ma ched// ga me kyi rgyag sa thababs pa sams// depe dzin las padag mau dpa pa nga // galanas da rnangs pa 'bras// riganas trag mas mams na ga tad
32a1(rnying rgyud): nas dud 'phrul mngon gtong// srulas ther 'thos 'gram nad gtong // khang nas nad song mkhris pa gtong // de byer nad kyi bdag mau dmyal 'dra/ g.yas na gser mi zag chen blangs sa zang // g.yon nag yum mam tshan zil lo// sman
32a2(rnying rgyud): na mon mo mdzes mo sha rar// klad nabal mo mdzes ma ldems se ldem// zhabs gnyis dor thabs da ma nyams snying dang lte bar gzir// lhas ngan la spang tsho de di ri ri// 'dab chags pha thabs mang po zhal la// sha zan sder chags mang po 'phur ltab lbab// sngar
32a3(rnying rgyud): chags stag gzig mang po 'dzum mdangs mu lu lu// sbal nag srul nag sdom sdig ti li li// ce srang khag dngas mang po 'du chu ru// mon pa spre'u sra zhon ye re re// gser 'od g.yu 'od dung 'od lams se lam// bud med nagra mog yab 'dor lings se ling // lha sa ngan yang
32a4(rnying rgyud): sbrul mang po thibs se thib// de phyir ltas ngan bdag mo dam la 'dra// nyid kyi che ba brjod kyis me lang ste// yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i dpal ldan ma// lhas ngan cho 'phrul dgra la dbab tu gsol// ma ma i la ta ka ked kying kying mkha' la lding / ngur du sgo rog ma chug pa la
32a5(rnying rgyud): tshor/ a mo kar nongs zhes yungs kar la bzlas la gtor ro// lhas ngan sa tshogs su shig cis nang bar 'gyur ro// zazed sbrang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud las mngon du bskul ba'i skabs te nyi shu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshang byab// bstan pa'i
32a6(rnying rgyud): bsrung mar dbang bskur te// maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi la// sna tshogs khrag gis chag chag gdab// rdorje sngags spang nag mo ni// lugs sam yang na dar dkar la// mkhas pas rba bya rdzogs par bri// de yi mtha' mar rdzas rnams dag/ ting 'dzin brtan
32a7(rnying rgyud): pas dgug cing bstim// yang nas yang du dmigs pa bskyed// dmigs pa brtan por gyur pa na// bstod cing bskang zhing dbang yang bskur// bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang rtags yin// ru dang nag po rten du bca'// 'bar ba sku yi dbang yang bskur//
32b1(rnying rgyud): drag sngags gsung gi dbang yang bskur// gnyis med thugs kyi dbang yang bskur// ye shes yon tan dbang yang bskur// thun rdzas phrin las dbang yang bskur// 'bras bu sna tshogs gtor mas bskur// byang sems dkar dmar spor ba'i dbang //
32b2(rnying rgyud): rnams gas par shAm ga kyigs / dgas pa na sa// mam paskyes ma/ sa gas niH// zabaduHpa nag sa rdzun pas sa c-i / //
32b3(rnying rgyud): de nas dpal ldan rang byang rgyal mo ngas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// he/ nga ni dus gsum thams cad du// nga yi thugs rdo kun mi 'chad// nga ni bde gshegs sbyor sde mo// dam tshig can gyi dgra 'dul ma// da ni nal 'byar sgrub rje mo// dam tshig nyams pa'i srog
32b4(rnying rgyud): gles pa rnaMn/ / na pa'i// ga gas / sa / /
32b5(rnying rgyud): de dag thams cad nga yin pas// nga yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// nga yi ming ni cir yang grags// nga yi phrin las thams cad byed// kun gyi rtsa ba gcod 'dod na// thams cad nga yin nga nyid ltos// nga nyid yongs su gzung bar gyis// zhes zer te mi snang bar gyur to// yongs su
32b6(rnying rgyud): gtang ba'i skabs te sum cu gcig pa'o// / snying po 'gyur ba'i kyad rdzogs so// de ba tsan+d+ra la bai ros zhus// rgya gar skad du/ DA ki nI a g+ni dza hra dz+wa la tan+ta/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gra ma mA lce 'bar ba'i rgyud/ sred gsum
32b7(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed drag po rdo rje'i sgra// bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal gyur snying rje can// bdud las rnam yul ye shes lnga dang ldan// phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal pa stod// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo gshin rje 'bar ba'i pho brang /
33a1(rnying rgyud): gtsud sbyin sa la 'ag dang gnas pa'i drang khrod/ srin pa ya tad+ha ru Shaka'i 'chags/ bdud gcig phrad nag pa'i kha pa/ rtsub 'gyur gyi rgyal ldan pa/ lha dang l+h+wa ma yin gsal 'gyed pa'i gnas/ 'brung bo dag ga la D+ga g+sa gang nag
33a2(rnying rgyud): sha ka skyes/ srin mo kad+ga la zangs kyi gshog pa me ltar 'bar ba'i zhing khams mi ro gsar rnying mang po yod pa/ nam mkha' las tri shUl dang 'khor lo dang lce 'bab pa/ sa gzhi las ral gri dang / spa gri dang mdung rtse lnga pa skyes pa/ ri bo thams cad keng
33a3(rnying rgyud): nus su snang ba/ chu klung thams cad rdag khrag tu 'bab pa/ sa phyogs thams cad ni mi ro ut+pal sngon po'i dri mnam pa/ nye 'khor na rngam pa dang / dra ba'i pa ro rab tu 'jigs pa drag ste/ shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu sti g.ya' ba'i gnas de na/ bcom
33a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/ rigs sngags dang gsang sngags kyi bdag po// thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang phyug/ sgra dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ drag po chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje snying rje chen po gtum zhing khro ba/ lus bskal
33a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i me chen po ltar 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum dang bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa brgyad khrid dang / sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas stong rtsa brgyad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes las grub pa/ b+h+ra ma srin sde brgyad
33a6(rnying rgyud): kyis mchod cing phyag byas pa/ nyi ma stong gi gzi dang ldan pa/ dbu skra kham pa gyen la brdzes pa/ spyan sdang mig me ltar 'bar ba/ shangs kyi rlung sbom nas bskal pa'i rlung 'byung ba/ zhal gyi mche ba rdo rje zla chos su gtsigs pa/ rin
33a7(rnying rgyud): mo che ma gtus dbu brgyan pa/ rigs rje'i rgyal ba mi bskyed pa bzhugs pa/ bod pasam sngon gyi dbu rkyen dang mgur rgya can/ mchog dang thang sho ka bas brgyan pa/ lag rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis
33b1(rnying rgyud): thaMd du bcings pa/ kra tak+Sha kas rked cings byas pa/ g+hA kun nas gdugs dang / sag ma mad kyis gdan khri byas te/ khro bo chen po'i mazad du rdzas nas bzugs so// de'i 'khor ni tshangs pa dang / 'jug med dang / brgya byin dang / ma hA kA l-i dang
33b2(rnying rgyud): drang srong me bzhi 'jug dang / thang la gnas dang / gshin rje rtel pa nag po dang / srin po rA ma Na dang / chu'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / gnod sbyin chen po ku be ra dang / 'byung po dbang ldan dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / sa bad
33b3(rnying rgyud): lag chen dang / ma mo nag mo ral gcig ma dang / lho 'phyer ba brtan dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung ba pho mo dang / gcan gzan gyi tsho gas ni seng ge
33b4(rnying rgyud): stag dang / khwa dang / srang gi dang / dom dang / chu srin dang / gung dang / gzig dang / ce spyang dang / sre mo dang / khyi li 'du dang / 'bar ba dang / sram dang / bya'i tshogs kyang bya rgod dang / chu klag dang / dung bu kang+ka dang / bzhad dang /
33b5(rnying rgyud): dang / bya rog dang / so bya dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / skyeg dang / srin bya dang / shang shang to'u dang / ne co yang yod do// gzhan yang glang po dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrul gdug pa can dang / rus sbal dang / rnga mo dang / bse dang / phag rgod
33b6(rnying rgyud): dang / ba men dang / khyi swa dang / sha ba dang / gra ba lnga sogs pas bskor te bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de rnams kyi nang nas glang po che rab tu brtan pa gtsug na gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa/ mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum yod pa'i steng na/
33b7(rnying rgyud): nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya phrin zhes bya ba/ skye bo'i gtsug na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba/ lus la gser dang / bai n+da r+yas brgyan pa/ des 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du byas nas/ glang po che'i snyan
34a1(rnying rgyud): // las langs te/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa byas so// de nas brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje 'don pa gsang dbang po// yid bzhin nor bu rab 'dra zhing // dngos gyur
34a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs la mnga' brnyes khyod// snying rje bdag po yin pas na// ma 'ongs sems can skal ldan gyi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro go 'phang mchog/ nag mo me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud// bdag ni khyod la dri bar 'tshang // deng 'dir ston pas skabs 'byed bya// zhes gsol pa
34a3(rnying rgyud): dang / dpal hUM mdza chen po des me 'bar ba'i gdan las bzhengs te/ rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ brgya byin la seng ge'i lha stangs kyis gzigs nas/ glang po che'i 'gying bag tu gom pa gsum bor te/ hUM hUM hUM gi sngags bzlas
34a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi phyag gis rdo dza lan gsum nam mkha' la dril te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yas so// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying rje'i yid kris brgya byin nyon// sbrul ldan dus mtha'i sem sa can rnams/ mi dza
34a5(rnying rgyud): chos sti rgyal mtshan dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma lce'i rgyud// bdag gzhan don la 'jigs med pa// ngas bshad khyod kyi yid kyis zung / zhes bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor shin tu dga' ba dang / slob skyes nas/ la las ni me tog man+ta ra ba da
34a6(rnying rgyud): praN+Da ri ka dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / tsam pa ka dang / bu ram dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / bsil yab dang / bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pus ma chod do//
34a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor la las ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa nang gi mchod pas mchod do// 'khor la las lha mo dang gnod sbyin mo'i cha byad du byas nas gsang ba'i mchod pas phul lo// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la lha'i dbang ba brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
34b1(rnying rgyud): gsal hA// khro can dus mapa'i me ltar 'bar// drag po du mngang rdordza ngon// dA sbyar 'dad pa'i khams 'din// l+h+wa ma nag ma zhes zab// gsum zhing khrol lus kyang 'jigs// seng ga sum skrag pa'i nas mthu ldan// ngas grub dam pa'i gzhir gyur 'di// dang po rma
34b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi chu yi rgyud// slob dpan slob ma gang gi chung // don dem kun rdzob lnga ba'i rgyud// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum gyi gyad// ba kra lha rten sku gzugs rgyud// dben dang g.yog ni dam rdzas gyud// bskyed dang rdzogs ni ting 'dzin byeng// rnga dang khol gre sngags
34b3(rnying rgyud): kyi gung // bcang ba phyag rgya bcu gnyis rgyud// mchod pagator mu sbyin sreg rgyud// 'da' bar dka' ba dam tshig rgyud// grub pa'i drad tshad mtshan ma'i rgyud// sngogs dang gnad la dbab pa'i rgyud// mi 'brel 'grogs pa gzungs kyi rgyud// pra dang mtshan ma
34b4(rnying rgyud): dbab pa'i rgyung // dbang bskur gnang bsnyen pa'i rgyud// so so las kyi bye brag rgyad// mar me dang ni bdud rtsi rgyud// thig le ye shes man dgra rgyud// lha srin sI bkyang bstod pa'i rgyud// 'khor la yongs su gtad pa'i rgyud// tha ma lung du bstan pa'i khyud//
34b5(rnying rgyud): dgos 'brel nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang // ston pas bka' stsol bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad ces gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud
34b6(rnying rgyud): chen po zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so// khyed kyang rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ ngas rnam par phye ba bstan par bya'o// sngon 'dod pa'i khams 'di nyid na/ rI rab kyi rtse brang shar gyi mtshams/ shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bya
34b7(rnying rgyud): mon bye khyang ga dra Na gnas pa/ lo ma la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rang 'byung ba/ 'bras bul rin po che sna bdun la tog ltar smin pa/ yal ga'i rtseg yu'i ze ba'i bar bar na/ lha dang lha mo dang / gza' dang skar ma dang / nyi ma dang
35a1(rnying rgyud): pa tshogs kyis paldan pa/ rtswa bA ngas khrus kyi rdzing tha bdun la/ ror la shong / da / shing d+ha ra la rnam pa bangan/ tha ma ra lagasag yobadun bad+d+has gsag+sas rA ma n+ta bas badz+ran pan // grong ti da na
35a2(rnying rgyud): na/ spyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lha tog gi rigs kyi phrag bzhi rung skye ba can+dan dang / gzur dang / go shrid+d+ha dang / sbrul gyi snying po rdzing bu la brgyas bskor haM/ des bu'i shing de than mong gi bsod nams kyis smos so// de'i rjes pa 'dod
35a3(rnying rgyud): shing de ni sa rnams kyis dbang byed pa'i \u0f7f/ ri rab rtsa ba na 'od mi snang ba zhes bya pa gnastan/ lA ma yin gyi rgyal pa sram biN+Digs dang / thugs pa sa ris dang / tsauran+da ka shAn+da dang / rnam par sbed byed dang / rabasi ma dang / sbagacan la
35a4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa byi bdud b+har tsam/ shrIn tu mI sdug pa'i cha byad du byas nas/ rab tu drum pa'i d+hi ro dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mtshon mthogs nas/ rI rab kyi kha chos bzang sA zhes bya bar lhags so// de nas ri rab kyi kha lu lci bas de ba
35a5(rnying rgyud): da / lha ma hA de ba dang / brgya byin nyid la sogs pa/ lha bye ba dung phyur la lha ma yin rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so// ri rab rtse gnas sum cu rtsa gsum lha// shing 'di'i lha dang lha min thun mong las// da lta 'dod pa'i khyed cag lha
35a6(rnying rgyud): dadang na// da ni nged cag wA min+d+ra bdud la byug/ zhes smras pa dang / lha rnams kyis slar smras pa/ dpag bsam shing la 'dod yon bsam yas kyang // bsod nams dbang gis lha la yongs su grub// gzhan la yod na sems shing med par
35a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de bas khyed la ldan shing nged mi ster// zhes spros pa dang / slar lha la spras pa/ thun mong las grub bde ldan ldon pa'i shing // lha yis dbang bus nged la mi ster na// 'jig rten sreg pa'i mtshon gyi char phab la// lha dang lha min g.yul
35b1(rnying rgyud): chen 'gyed ces zer// ces smras te/ skar yang song nas lha ma yin gyis dmag drangs so// glang po che sa srang gi mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la gnod sbyin sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon te/ dbus kyi mgo la dbang po thags zangs ris zhon te/ glang po che'i sna
35b2(rnying rgyud): la ka ma la nag po btags te/ lha ma yin gyi dmag bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mtshan gyi char chen po me lce 'bar ba 'dra ba'i char 'bebs te dmag drangs so// de nas chos bzangs zhes bya ba'i gdan sar lha rnams
35b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshogs te/ 'thab par btsems pa dang / dang po lha rnams kyis khro ma shes nas srub 'gyur gyi/ khang pa na/ khro bo lang+ga nag po khros pa'i kha chu khro chu'i rdzing bu bdun 'khyil pa las 'brangs so// der lha rnams zhe sdang skyes te shin tu khro bar gyur nas/
35b4(rnying rgyud): bzo'i lha bi sho ka ra mAs nub gra cig la gser khrab bye ba phrag dgu 'bum rang brdungs so// lha ma hA kro d+has nub gcig la mtshon ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / thod pa dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / mdung rtsi gsam pa gyi ba phrag dgu khri dadu
35b5(rnying rgyud): 'bum rang brdungs so// dus de tsam na lha rnams go mtshon thogs te/ glang po che rab tu brtan pa'i mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon/ dbus kyi mgo bo la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon/ lha dmag bye ba dung phyur gyis mtha'
35b6(rnying rgyud): brten te/ glang po che'i sA lu ral gri btags nas lha dngu la ma yin gnyis g.yul pa kye'o// dus de tsam na lhas mtshon brgyab pa rnams ni/ khrag gar phog pa la bdud kyi dmag mi khri khri tsam du 'phel lo// lha ma yin gyis mtshon brgyab pa la ni khrag
35b7(rnying rgyud): la dmag ma 'phel bar shi'o// der wa thams cad gting 'pham ste/ lha me yin rab tu rgyal po'i dus su/ phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis lha rnams rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir/ dpal be'u dbus nas hU~M mthing nag 'bar ba gcig sprul te/ wA biSh+Ta rA dza'i
36a1(rnying rgyud): dpral gyi dbyingasas sngags kyi mdza ba cig tu gyur// / mdzar pa brtol ba'i nang nas zadasad ldan ma daHsa? bin+d+ha r+ya'i rgyun 'ardzangs b+h+yan/ mig ut+pala'i 'das sgra 'drab/ mtshan dang dpe byed du ldan pa cig byung // das rnams kyi
36a2(rnying rgyud): ming btags pa/ lha mo A ma de ba bya bar btags/ lha'i shA ma de kun gyi chung mar 'dod pa la/ nam mkha' la phyag na rdo rje sa nga'i sprul pa'i tshogs bcad 'di bsgrags so// lha yi rgyal sri ma po zhing brtan pa dang // ris drug sems
36a3(rnying rgyud): dge la dgod pa dang // lha min bdud kyi g.yul chen bzlog pa'i phyir// dbang phyug lha lA u ma chung mar byin// zhes bsgrags so// dus de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub byang mtshams/ yak+Sha ka ma la 'bar ba'i dur khrod na/ lha ma hA de ba dang
36a4(rnying rgyud): slong gi cha lugs su 'gog pa'i brtul zhugs drug po la zhugs pa'i drung du A ma de ba khrid nus dgra bdun phrag badran drongal btsas pras/ 'dod pa'i 'khrig pa spyad do// 'khrig pa spyad pa'i dbang gis par snang la gza' dang skar ma byung ngo / der
36a5(rnying rgyud): skye mA bul bu tshe meng sring gnyis kyis so// ming po ni ga shin rje ma b+he kA la zhes grags so// sring ma ni lha mo dam rim swA kyi zhes tha bar grags so// kau shin rje ming sring dri gnyis ches pa ngas kye'i 'drang sa lji nas byin to/ nas drug na/
36a6(rnying rgyud): deni nyid kyis// gshin te sa la/ ma hA swA bad+ma lasun mra bur rtsipA ba'i dbang bsgyur te/ snar bzhin du lha dang yA mA yin gnyis gsul can pa bco'o// de nas gshi na rje ma hA k+Shams/ lag nags lA sha ri 'i tsam gtsigagis
36a7(rnying rgyud): skye mo yin gyig tus dze brel bas g.yul bag sa// sa ste phreng ba zhes thabs/ skye ma yon te rje 'i mgo bcid do// de nas lhadamigs bas pa sros ma banas/ khrag rnams
36b1(rnying rgyud): dmag mir sprul pa 'dra ste/ lha mo tsa mu NI sa he ra Na ke shu'i thod pas/ khrag bcus shing rol pas 'phel ma nus par byed kyi na mtshon gyi char phab nas/ tsa mur+t+ti'i lte ba la lha bye ba dung phyar rnams kyi rdzod byas pas 'thabs so// lha dmag dkar po rgyal
36b2(rnying rgyud): par byas shing dpag bas ma shing gi mnga' bdag tu gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs kyang rang byung du yod do// lha ma yin 'pham par gyur to// brgya byin nyon cig/ de nas lha'i bu mo tsa muN+Di des/ ri khrod chen po mdangs dga'
36b3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya bar/ shi thod zhes bya bra la ma na rgyas/ ma ban du nags pa mi khas pa'i gangs bzlas pa/ skam partag pa'i gzod kyi mtshan zhes ma ra wAr// / denas sa das ma she sang pa ga zhes
36b4(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' de bya khyung ka ru Na zhes bya bas 'tshe ba la/ lha mo par+N+Na sha ba ri des bya khung btul pas klu bskyangs te/ lha mo dkar mo dud skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to// lha mo dung sgong ma de ni ri ra ba rtse mo rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs rtsa/
36b5(rnying rgyud): byang shar gyi mtshams byang chub kyi shing drung na/ rin po che'i khang pa bdun pa rtsegs kyi gzhal yas kyi khang na/ rin po che'i khri stengs na/ gser dngul bai DUr+ya'i dbu rgyan dang mgur chus brgyan te/ lus 'gying bag tu bzhugs so// lha'i rnga
36b6(rnying rgyud): dang bu mo mang pos kyang longs spyod dang / glu dang dbyangs dang / rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa byed do// brgya byin nyon cig/ de nas yul lang+ga pU ri ru srin po'i grong khyer bdun 'bum yod pa la/ lha rnams kyis skyon phrab skye/ srim
36b7(rnying rgyud): po dag grI ba dang / de'i sring mo rna la rtse gnyis lus so// de nas srin pod sha grI bas/ lha dang mi 'dul 'dod pa'i don ched du/ sring mo lha ma hA de ba la btsun mor phul lo// de nas lha dbang phyug ma hA de ba dang / sring mo rna la rtsi gnyis tshogs
37a1(rnying rgyud): pa las/ phas ni khye 'ur sgron lam btab/ mas ni bu mor smon lam btab/ ma'i smon lam mthu btsun pas/ ya mtshan can gyi bu mo gcig zung / pha khros pas thal khung du bar ro// mas slar blangs nas lus kyi drod la
37a2(rnying rgyud): btsas nas/ A yu b+h+rUM zhes tshe drangs gsos te/ phas ming btags pa sbas pa'i bral mdog mar ming btags/ mas ming mi pham khro gnyer ro langs mar ming btags/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes dmod btsugs nas ming btags pa/
37a3(rnying rgyud): dus thams cad du nag mo dri ma ti zhes bya bar grags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrang ba'i nus mthu dang ldan par gyur cig ces ming du btags pa'i tshe/ bar snang gi lha ma srin sde brgyad po yongs kyis kyang de ltar
37a4(rnying rgyud): gyur cig ces bzlas so// de nas skye pa thams cad du nag mo re ma ti zhes bya bar grags so// lha mo drang skyong mas ming btags pa ni/ srin mo dmar 'dub thar pa'i lha gser can zhes bya bar ming btags so// dus der srin
37a5(rnying rgyud): drasha grI ba des/ da ni khyeb po lci ba po'i sgras 'jig rten du grags so// sring mo dang rna la rtse gnyis kyis ming po ma khyab par ci 'dod pa nga la smros shig ces gsol to// da sha grI bas gsol pa/ nga ni lha mu dung skyong 'dod do zhes gsal to//
37a6(rnying rgyud): sring mos smras pa/ nga'i bu mo phrar pa'i lha 'di ni lha mo dung skyong gi khol mo byed du gsol te/ de nas gdod bsdu'o zhes smras so// de nas rna la rtse yis bu mo khrid nas dkar mo dung skyong gi g.yog du phul lo// de nas re ma ti sa dkar mo dung
37a7(rnying rgyud): skyong la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye che zhe chen mo rigs kyi yum// bdag nyid chen mo ga gar ma// dbu bzang rin chen thor tshugs la// bai DUr sngon mo 'od lam lam// zhal bzang pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi zla phrugs gcig rgyan bkod de/
37b1(rnying rgyud): tshems bzang dung la ljags bzang me// khyod 'dra 'jig rten khams na med// bdag ni khyod kyi gtan 'bangs bgyi// khyod kyis bdag la thugs brdzer dgongs// bdag kyang glo ba nye bar bgyi/ ces gsol to/ de nas lha mo'i
37b2(rnying rgyud): g.yog mo byas nas gro ba nye bar byas te lha mo'i yid la ci 'dod pa dgos pa byas so// de nas lha mo yang khol mo de la dgyes nas gces par byed de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yul ling ka pu ri ru/ sme'u 'bal le dang mgrin
37b3(rnying rgyud): bzangs 'thabs pa la lha thams cad ltad mo la 'gro bas/ lha mo u mas bu mo dung skyong ma la 'di skad ces sus so// de ring khyod kyi gan du su 'ongs pas khyod bsla ste 'od pas/ de la ma lta cig ces bstan tsam na/ khol
37b4(rnying rgyud): mos skabs der da sha grI ba la sman no// der srin po da shwa grI bas/ srin gyi bong bu dmar grwa la zhon nas/ lha mo'i pho brang sgor phyin te srin po kho bdag ni mi'i cha byad la shin tu gzugs bzang la mdzes pa cig tu sprul/ bong bu nI ra dgas ga dor
37b5(rnying rgyud): smag po cig tu sprul te/ lha mo dung skyong ma'i spun sbur phyin nas/ rol mo'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs bus pas bslus so// lha mo rol mo la dga' bas 'dzum cig shor ro// de nas srin pos glags rnyed de/ lcags kyi lham sgog sngon
37b6(rnying rgyud): po bkrol nas bzung ste gru 'di skad blangs so// kyi yongs 'du shing gi gnas mchog na// rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang nas// bedade ldan 'phrul gyi lding khang na// dgying bag tshul du gar mdzad pa// dbang phyug sras mo ma lags sam// dga' byang
37b7(rnying rgyud): dud skyong ma lags sam// lha mo mang po'i tshogs dang rol// dbu yi sman cha gdub 'khor ni// rin chen mdzes pas kun nas spras// spun ni ut+pal 'dab ma 'dra// shangs ni bil ba'i 'bras bu 'dra// zhal nas ut+pal dad kyang bro// sku ni 'khril
38a1(rnying rgyud): ldem gzhon tshul 'ang // gsung na tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan mchog/ na 'brur stong snang byed pas 'gyed // snod 'di'i spyan gzhan na dkon// oM ljongs spyod mdzes pas mi thal yang // zhabs kyi chas su lpags sgrog 'di 'bral zhas/
38a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad ci sdug ci yang gsung bstan// khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra shin tu dkon// sems can kun gyis lta bas mi ngoms khyod// bdag gis dbul 'di bzhes par gnang bar mdzod// ces phul ba la/ lha mos lcags sgrog blangs so//
38a3(rnying rgyud): nas rang gi gang pa g.yas pA la dkris te kun byas so// de nas khol mongs/ dza mdud stong mA la zhus pa/ stong mo ba mchog drang srong ma/ bdug zhu ba gcig pachis nA gnang ngam byas pa la/ jo mo nar khyod glo banyibs ci zhus pa
38a4(rnying rgyud): gnang ngo zer ro// de nas lha ni dag bden pa'i sdom pa yod pas/ ji skad smras pa ltar byed pa yin no// de nas khol mos gsol pa/ kye bdag gi yun gyi rjer gyur drung skyong ma// khyod 'dra 'jig rten gzhan na med// 'grogs pas rba
38a5(rnying rgyud): med sbyar ma gcig shar 'dra// deng 'dir mchis pas lcags sgrog 'phrul mkhan de// gtan gyi grogs zlar mdzad par zhub 'byul// bdag kyang drug tu khyod kyi drin mo thong // zhes zhus pa la/ lha mo des sngar khas blangs pa des
38a6(rnying rgyud): b+ha ba'i dbang myed nus/ lha mo nA rI khyor bya'i mi de gdan 'dug/ skya yin byas pa la/ khol mos smras pa/ de ni bdag gi zhang po srin po dA sha grI ba yin/ yul la ng+ge pu ra na 'dug ces smras pa dang / de nas drang stong ma dbang med d+ha srin
38a7(rnying rgyud): ga'i zung mar song ngo // de nas lha mo srams chu mo drung skyong ma la dmod pa bor ba nga'i bu mo rab tu gces par byas d+ha/ sa'i longs spyod modzes pas mi thil yang / ngal gsangs la srin pa'i chung mar so // byin cang du mo myong
38b1(rnying rgyud): kyang srin dang 'grogs/ mai sha za ya mi lpags gyon par gyur/ srog gcod byed cing mo yi thod khrag thogs// bong bzhon la lha yi kha dog nyams// sin gyi kha dog nag la 'jigs par shog/ de yi khol ma r+ya ma ti khyod kyang // nga yi
38b2(rnying rgyud): bskus te srin la byin// khyod kyang mi sdug 'jigs pa'i gdong du gyur// tshe rabs kun du khyo dang ma phrad cig/ ces dmod pa bcu gnyis pa bor ro// de nas bu mo la ma'i dmod pas bsngags nas lha'i kha dog dkar po nyams bye mazhing rtag tu
38b3(rnying rgyud): mi sh+yA za mi khrag 'thung / mi lpags gyon bong b+ha zhon/ gcer thur bud nas 'dug go// bu ni srin po phu gu seng ge zla dang / me tog cod pan dang / gangs can dang / mche ba bdun la sogs pa lnga brgya skyes tsam na/ khyo srin po da sha mra pa
38b4(rnying rgyud): shi'o// de nas bu mo drang stong ma yang yugs sa'i cha lugs byas te/ skra mdun skra lan bu gcig la zlas so// bran mo phrar pa'i lha yang dmod pas bsdigs pas/ srin gyi phag rdzi byed tsam na/ phrag rdzi dun bu srin bya bas mo la dbang ma
38b5(rnying rgyud): du chags pa spyad do// de nas phur pa lha yang nal bu sbram mo// de nas dpon g.yog gnyis kyis srin po'i bong bu brkus pa zhon nas/ da sha gI bA'i ral gri sdig pa can bzlas pa grayas na thogs/ srin po'i nor bu rin po che banus nas ne rul
38b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal bur sbas nas/ lag pa g.yon du thogs nas dris so// gyi nas srin po'i dmag gis bsad kyis dogs nas/ bong bu bskyod nas kha gyir bstan te/ phyin srin po b+ha ra byed cing byin no// tha mar dur khrod gcig tu phyin na skyes pa
38b7(rnying rgyud): g.yul du bsad pa'i ro gcig dang phrad do// de nas khong gnyis shad bsregs nas za 'dod pa la gtsub shing med nas/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram na rdo sol gyi ri la char bab nas me 'bar ba mthong nas ngo sol ma blangs nas sha bsregs nas
39a1(rnying rgyud): zos so// phyen khye dkar po gcig 'brang ba yang bsad nas zos so// pags pa la rgyal mtshan byas so// de nas khal mo re mA ti ldan la phrug skyes so// khong gnyis kyis nal phrug gi shA yang zos so// de nas joms bong bu
39a2(rnying rgyud): zhon khol mos kha khrid byas nas rgya mtsho'i khar phyin nas/ gshin rje rlung gi 'khor lo can zhag bdun bsgoms pas/ rlung nag tshub ma nag po gcig drung der grub bo// de nas lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis/ snang srid kyi lha 'dre mthu bo
39a3(rnying rgyud): bos nas smon lam btab pa/ nga yang tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu gsang sngags kyi grub pa thob nas rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar shog shig/ nga'i bran mo phrer pa'i lha 'di yang dus thams ca da dung 'dungs
39a4(rnying rgyud): par shog shig/ nor du me mgo la longs spyod par shog shig/ zhon pa bong bul brud la/ lag char la gril byed par shog shig ces smras so// rgya mtsho bskong zhing rlung tshub ma la bA ya be bA ya be zhes pos tsam na/ chub ma byung bas dpon g.yo
39a5(rnying rgyud): gnyi sa ka rgya mtsho'i nang du bsgyur te btang ngo // de nas l+h+wa ma dung skyong ma des mi sha zos pa'i mthu dang / rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis/ rgya mtsho'i 'brum du drung khrod chen po ri'i tshal zhes bya bar/ gshin rje'i lha mthucan gyi bu mor gyes te/ gnod sbyin
39a6(rnying rgyud): chen mo la kha dog mthing nag la rab tu 'jigs pa/ mig rtse dmar ba mche bzang yag la ral pi ting za bang du 'dug pa cig tu gyur te/ gshin rje ma ru rtse dang sbyor ba byas pa la bu bdud khram nag po bya ba rgyang / bong bu yang dmar gA la g.yu'i
39a7(rnying rgyud): rna ba can rlung gi gshog pa can/ mig mjug mar yod pa cig tu byung nas nor skal byed do// de nas khob mo ma ti ro langs ma 'di ni skye ba gang blangs zhe na/ rgya mtsho'i nang du bud med lus po phyed skams la chu srin gyi mgo can gcig tu skyes
39b1(rnying rgyud): te/ ming yang klu mo gzhogs skams chu srin mgo klu mo re ma ti zhes bya bar btags nas/ zhag dgu bcu na tshe 'phos nas/ skye ba blangs pa ni yul dri za'i grong khyer gser sdings skyed mos tshal zhes bya ba na/ dug shing nag po 'gyur med kyi rtsa ba na
39b2(rnying rgyud): bdud ri ti 'gong nyag dang / dran pa dbang byed gnyis byi byas pa la zhag drug cu rtsa gcig na bu mo gcig skyes te/ phas ni srid pa gsum gyi blo 'phrog mar btags/ mas ming btags pa ni ya mtshan 'phrul gyi gshog pa can du btags/ bdang po mo
39b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyis rang gi bu mo la sgra nyag re la gser dang / bai DUr+ya'i chun 'phyang dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / nyi zla'i thod gdengs dang / thod pa'i mgur chu dang / sbrul gyi gdu bus brgyan te/ byi byas pa'i nal phrag yin pas/ bdud kyis rin po
39b4(rnying rgyud): lnga'i khang pa'i dbus su thod pa'i gzhal yas khang byas/ thod pa'i nang du yang zod 'phrul gyi lding khang grub/ de'i nang du khang pa bdun brtsegs kyi bdun tshogs kyi nang du/ me ro 'bum gyi khri stengs su bu mo de sus ma mthong sbras kyang mtshor bar mas
39b5(rnying rgyud): sgo spra bo lag rengs dang / nam gya khrab thogs kyis bcad do// bdud kyi dmag gi rgyal mo dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal mo dang / sa bdag gi rgyal mo dang / de rnams kyis khang pa de rab tu srung zhing 'khod do// brgya byin nyon cig/ de'i tshe na lha mo drang rgya
39b6(rnying rgyud): mni/ sngon gyi khol mo re ma ti ro langs ma bdud kyi bu mor skyes pa bkug nas khol 'dod pa las/ phyag na rdo rje nga'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad bzlas pas/ gsang sngags de'i byin gyi brlabs las/ mkha' 'gro'i ting nge 'dzin
39b7(rnying rgyud): grub pa mo/ lag na pad+ma nye drug thogs pa gcig dang byung pos/ ma bdud kyi yul dang po zung kun byen gyis brlabs pa'i chen/ bdud kyi rgyal po dang / blon po dang / 'khor rnams dran pa med par myos par gyur to// bdud kyi bu mo
40a1(rnying rgyud): ti nges sngon gyi jo mo lha mo dung skyong ma dran pas/ yid phyogs te dung skyong ma'i spyan sngar 'gro 'dod pa'i bsam pa drag po byung nas/ bdud ri ti 'gong nyag gi mtshon bdud kyi khram bam nag po de/ bu mo re ma tis brgyus nas/ lag
40a2(rnying rgyud): pa g.yas su thogs/ ma'i tshon gyi gru gu sngon dmar de brkus nas lag pa g.yon nu thogs nas/ nam phar phyed tshur byed na jo mo dung skyong ma'i gan du bros te phyin nas/ lus gcer bur 'dug pa la/ khyim badrag rab sbyin gsal
40a3(rnying rgyud): yang ngo tsha skyes nas/ sngar gyi dmangs rigs mo bsad pa'i rlung bu rked las bkrol te/ nang nad kyi rdzing bus bkang nas/ kha sbrul gyis bcings te/ mchan khung du sbas nas/ sems can la gdug par bya b.raru bsams te/ phyin tsam
40a4(rnying rgyud): na/ btsan skya rdo rje zla ba dang phrad pa na re bdud mo chen mo chags pa spyad dgos/ rngan pa yang sbyin zer nas/ mo bzung nas chags pa spyad pa'i khu ba thigs pa gcig 'dzam bu'i gling du po ba ni dzong ji dkar por song / der btsan skya rdo
40a5(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i lag ni shod ni'u dkar nag gang 'khor bzung bar byed pa bdun yod pal/ mo la byi rjen du byin pa de blangs te/ lag pa g.yon du bzung nas/ grong khyer ljang ldan zhes bya bar phyin tsam na/ rgyal po seng ge rtsal la bsod star
40b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yas+yA te/ sbrang rtsi lgang bzed gang dral nas/ s+yAd rtsa lag tu ldan khar phyag tshang bas thub byas nas mo la sbyin/ mos blangs tsaman/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyis bdud mo/ rgyal po'i khal ma'i lhag ma dang khwa 'phro 'thung ngam/ rgya ba nyamahA/
40b2(rnying rgyud): so zhes zer tsam na/ bdud mo re ma ti khros pas yid 'khrugs te/ rgyal rigs la der rims nang btang ngo // der rgyal po'i dkor zangs kyi drub dgu phul nas rims bcad do// de nas nag mo re ma ti des/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram bu dur khrod chen po
40b3(rnying rgyud): ro'i tshal du sngon gyi jo mo drang skyong ma'i spyan sngar phyin to// de nas dpon g.yog gnyis 'grogs nas/ sred pa gsum gyi sems can zad cing stongs par byed pa'i dus de tsam na/ jo mo dung skyong ma'i zhon pa srin gyi ring bu mang gA dang /
40b4(rnying rgyud): sbrul tshe gyi sne na ma nam sems can y+YA rA h+ma s+yA smai p+tA ts+tsha mA dz+nyA na // ga rten s+yaismaiSh+mang+ga 'gAs/ dka d+ha chag su dang / rkyen mo dang dam d+ha m+be d+hang / s+yo m+bu thugs dang / sna ma dang / bdud mo dang / na
40b5(rnying rgyud): mo dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa mang po yang lha mo rje khol gyi 'bangs bgyi zer zhing bran du 'ongs so// brgya byin nyon cig dus de tsam na lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis/ bud med kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid kyis/ rtag par 'dod
41a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'khrig pa spyad pa'i zad du khyu dgu dang snor ba byed de/ dza mo lA khyo wa khol mo la khyob na yad de/ rdza ma'akhyo wA ni/ gza' d+hAr+thal/ srin pos+thA s+thAn+ta/ gAsh+man dzA mAr+d+haH/ bdud mar kA nag pa// b+ha ban+d+ha m+b+ha dang rmA
41a2(rnying rgyud): khal mam khya bzhi ni/ 'byung ba dge ba dang / bzhags bA na yA ka dang / gnod sbyinA ya thAka pa la dang / rlung b+hU ya ba dang bzhi'o// de ltar dpon g.yog gnyis kyi khyed gra ni/ nyen par ni mtshan khrang g.yon du bsrings shing
41a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa
41a4(rnying rgyud): t+ya sa p+pas+tha bsgrud nas l+h+wa mo dpon g.yogs gnyis kyis u sbya re zug phyog hU~M sbyin pa las bral ze mchog srid sgrib pa pyad pa dang phrad do// byams khyad 'di ni ci byang byas pa la/ bram ze mchag skad kyis sbas pa/ sngon khams 'ja
41a5(rnying rgyud): ni dge slong ba rten pa'i sla dang / dge slong mdar re sde gnyis khrims te nas te rgyal ba'i cha pas bas / bsgo ba 'grus pa/ bdud la 'gre'u rje dang / shu kha'ang gnyis su sbyar te/ ma yang byed par
41b1(rnying rgyud): de nas ngal ba ras bab pas/ ngan padang 'dul ba 'gyur/ aT+Ta A kA drA Ti ngas gtsug ma/ bsgrub pa zhes zar ro// dung spyang man du tan da ban ma ma gsang bslab par byaH/ yan tAn dA pra yang ngam thus pa na/ zam zanar khya
41b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis dngos grub ci 'dod pa yin/ lha mo na re nged gnyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang mo cher gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i grub pa 'dod byas pa la/ 'o na grub par bya'o zhes zer nas/ bram ze dang lha mo dpon g.yag
41b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa byas pas yA ma e kA dza Ti zhal mthong nas grub pa thob bo// yu ma a~M ka dza Tis/ lha mo dung slong ma'i ming ni/ dpal lha mo nag mo ma hA kA li zhes btags so// khol mo'i ming ni yak+Sha re mA ti zhes bya bar btags so//
41b4(rnying rgyud): 'di khyams 'dus parji ba bang bsgyu ba/ m+mut+ma klags gang smra ba ban pa bstsu ma sa byung 'a ma mo// saurba dra ba tas 'dus/ rnan na ba sa/ ba la A tha@
41b5(rnying rgyud): rimA ti swA kyang / oM ru dra ro dra bo ti s+thA ba des/ rag mo tsit+taM kha rag ma d+h+waM b+h+yo/ ma ma trag ragra la mr-in tra bar+Na thag rag+sa/ ts+tshid+ha kha rAg me re ma ti sa ma ya pra ma ya gra ma ma hA ta pra drAn b+hA// dzaHdzaHrba lu b+h+yo zhes phral lo// bdud
41b6(rnying rgyud): nga'age'u ri dang ro sha kha 'dar bsgral lo// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas kyang nam gru mched brgyad kyang 'bangs su phul lo// srin yul du dmag drangs pas/ srin po yag+na ko re bsgral lo// brgya byin nyon cig/ de nas 'phags
41b7(rnying rgyud): paspyan res gzigs kyis/ dpal rgya mthun du sprul pa'i bsgrub pa zlas te/ rgya mthun gyi zhal mthong zhing gsang ba'i gzungs ma byas te/ rje man ming dpal l+h+wa ma nag mor btags so// kham ma'i ming ni rngarje zag mtshan
42a1(rnying rgyud): ming btags so// des phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ro// las kyi lhur byin gyis brlabs so// de'i tshan dpal lha mo nag mos/ dpag rta mgrin la snying po mangs gsol du phul lo// bstan pa bsrung bar
42a2(rnying rgyud): las blangs so// de nas sngon gyi um de ba dang nal rtse gnyis kyang / sngon gyi bum gnyis lnga srin lag tse lana? n+do thugs pas bris nas/ dred mo'i dal pas g.yab mos 'bod de/ bra mo gnyis ma'i dz+dza d+ha ts+tshastA na/
42a3(rnying rgyud): na ma rgyad zu nas 'i byud pa nas
42a4(rnying rgyud): gshog pa can spyi bo n+ya nor bu rin po che yod pa/ dza~M mo la nor sbrul du byin no// byed mo nig mo spyi bron nor bu rin po che yod pa cig khol mo lnga nor skal du b+hi nA nas/ lha mo rje khol gnyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos byin
42a5(rnying rgyud): pA'i ma bya dang / de mo nag mo gnyis gtan gyi nor skal byed cing chags/ de nas dpal lha mo ni gsang ba'i gnas dur khrod ro khang nag po'i dbus mA dro rtse'i sgo 'gram du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i he dr-i kA'i dngos grub sgrub
42a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub grub ste/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes lha mo dpon g.yog la spyi bo gtsug tu dpal rta mgrin gsang ba'i dbang bskur/ lus ngag yid gsum la khrag 'thung he ru ka'i dbang bskur
42a7(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dpal po'i rigs lnga sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur/ sgo snyed kyi rkyen dri phra men me bcu drug gi dbang bskur / lcags kyi dkar dmar la lpags kyi gsang ba'i dbang bsrung ngo ro// gnad mdo chen drag tu tshom bu gsang ba
42b1(rnying rgyud): babyung bskur ro// gsang pa pa hra la thig la la shes sha ba'i dbyung byuHdu/ dang baHma drAgrAn+d+haH bzhi 'khar du dbang bstAr/ badz+rag rA m+bu dbang phyug nA swAl+la pa dang yAng sbrul drA dab bskur/ ngang cha 'dzag tan gyi khams
42b2(rnying rgyud): 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes jo mo'i ming ni dpal ma hA kA li zhes btags so// khol mo'i ming ni gnod sbyin shan pa nag mo re ma ti zhes btags so// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar
42b3(rnying rgyud): gnyer gtad do// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje nyid la/ dpal lha mos rang gi snying po phul te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dus rtag tu bsrung bar khas blangs so// de nas dpal lha mo de mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab
42b4(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa'i tshe/ lha tshangs pas nyi ma'i can phul// khyab 'jug gis zla ba'i rgyun phral// nam thos smras kyis seng ge'i rna cha thal// nam mkha'i lha bran rnams kyis gser gyi dzal
42b5(rnying rgyud): bu'i rgyan phul/ srin po dang sha za rnams kyis thod phreng dang khrag dang zhag gi thig le phul lo// klu dga' bos sbrul gyi gdengs ko phul/ lha mo de srid pa gsum na 'gran pa'i zla med par gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis gsol
42b6(rnying rgyud): kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'di/ dang por lha'i bu mor gyur pa dang / bar du srin po'i chung mar gyur pa dang / da ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa 'di/
42b7(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi rkyen ci las thub pa lags zhes gsol pa dang / gsing ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ bcwa byin nyon cig/ da ltar lha mo nag mo 'di sngo nasangs kyis 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan pa laM lha mi 'od zer can du gyur te dge pa badz+re shrI s+ye/
43a1(rnying rgyud): spya da // danas sangs rgyas gsar thub tu bstan pa la lham dpa' brtan ma zhes bya bar gyur te zhe sdang rang kha mar spyad do// da nasas sa nas 'ad srang ga bstan pa la ma maHzhes thabar gyur ta/ dus btsam na
43a2(rnying rgyud): shAkya thub pa ni dge slong dbang phyug dpa' bo zhes bya bar grags so// dge slong de la lha mo many+dzas mchod gnas byas shing smon lam gcig tu btab bo// brgya byin nyon cig/ de da wA na ni lha mo 'di la sangs rgyas gsum
43a3(rnying rgyud): gyi ring gi rnam par smin pa shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la dus gcig tu smin no// lha mo 'di dang por ma hA de ba'i bu mor skyes pa ni/ dang por dge ba spyad pa'i mthu'o// bar du srin po'i chung mar gyur nas rang lteb pa na zhe sdang spyad pa'o// tha ma dang ltar
43a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa srung ba ni sngon shAkya thub pa la sdig bshags byas kyi smon lam btab bo// khol mo re ma ti sngags kyi bsod nams las grub
43a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// mkha' 'gro mA mo lci 'bar ba'i rgyud las glang gzhi'i le'u sta dang po'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad rjes gsol to// kye bcom ldan mgon po gsang ba'i
43a6(rnying rgyud): bdag/ ma 'ongs phyi ma'i sems can rnams// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor rab bsgrub pa'i// slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan ma'i rgyud// gang yin bdag gos nyan par 'tshal// / zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/
43a7(rnying rgyud): sde sa sa ba jom pa' 'dzum/ khrir ming sa yin kun gyis bya ba sa 'ang ba minam na na / brib dab gyis yi ma 'drod pa/ rang me pazhi ldan spong na// byezang bab ba 'dab sa
43b1(rnying rgyud): dam tshig srog bzhin 'dzin byed cing // bden pa gnyis rtogs lta ba can// sngags dang phyag rgya ma spong zhing // rtag tu phyag rgya tshal gnas// sems can dan byed man ngag ldan// da ni slob dpon mtshan nyid de// srang /
43b2(rnying rgyud): ma dral la dad pa can// bla ma'i zhabs la rab 'dud cing // dang dang gtang ba snying rje can// 'dul dang sdom pa dam tshig 'dzin// lha dang slob dpon rtag tu bcang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i snod ldan la// slob mar gyur
43b3(rnying rgyud): nga yis bshad// dpal mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyiste/ dpal phyeg ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces
43b4(rnying rgyud): gnal te// dzad+ha sems dpa' dpa' bza// dus mthu' rnal 'byor bsgrang skad du// rdo rdzags ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i// lta ba dam pa bdag nyan 'tsha// zhes zhus pa'i na/ dpal phyag na rjes bka' stsal pa/ bdag
43b5(rnying rgyud): dang rnga mkha' 'gro ma la// gdod nas ma skyes gzung 'dzin yul dang bral// de nga da ngadag 'dzin mtshan ma'i rtog pa bcom// don dam kun rdzob skyeb meng pa'i gzhi// gnyis myed chos kyi dbyis su dbyer med cing //
43b6(rnying rgyud): chos sku nam mkha' ye shes lnga// sprul pa'iphyag rgyu lnga dang lha mo'i mtshan par snang // mkha' la 'ja' 'dra rang bzhin ga la yod// snying+ga rje'i dbang gis 'gro don byed pa na// mdor na sangs rgyas sprul pa yin pa ste// khol mo byung
43b7(rnying rgyud): rlabasams dpa'i sprul pa'o// mtshan ma'i srin mi bdud ma rab tu ma bya/ mkha' 'gram mthu 'bar 'a'i rgyud las lta ba bstan pa'i 'du sa gsam pa'o// / nas la dbang ba brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsu
44a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdan pa yi nas phyugs canan// donarna ma pa' than dngas grub bsgrub pa gyur// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gyi rgyad bshad 'tshal// zhes zhus pa'im/ phyag na rdonas bka' stsal pa/
44a2(rnying rgyud): byin la sogs 'khor nams rab tu nyon// dkyil 'khor nam gsum mtshan ma'i phyag d+hA ni// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor byung shar ri rab rtse/ ting 'atsun kyil 'kho na la 'gyur sems kyi yul// gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor
44a3(rnying rgyud): na s+'um+b+haH/ na tsam zas ldang rus rnams dang blugs/ ma nag smra bzhi'i dbus ni e s+ya gsus// dbus stu ga ci zlog na rdorje hrI// hU~M l-i ga ya smras myon gas ste/ galan d+ha
44a4(rnying rgyud): dzin sgrub pa'o// gcaba'i mdun du kha mo mA tA// de ya~M b+hA ma srid pa ma mdong // ga spyang bla na ma ga ltung gis banar// b+ha mthang zing ma'i gang rnas thA/ tsakA l+ya'am yig 'bru / n+ta
44a5(rnying rgyud): ga sum lnga 'byur ba'i da na 'khor bskrun pa'i lda m+b+ha bab+h+ri // / de nas sbyi na dbang po N+DI byin gyis dang sa N+Dag na rdul 'di skar rgyas gsol to// ye 'jigs cad na mchog 'a
44a6(rnying rgyud): na 'am btsun no// ngan ma 'a'agro ga ma dam pa yi// dngas sgrib bsgrub pa'i d+d+ha smarnamus gdu stegs pa'o// gas pa'i bdag pa bdag la bshud du gas sa// gus lus pad+ma/ pras da rA d+has bka'
44a7(rnying rgyud): na no// da mkha' ni mngangs su ba da pa'i sros/ sarnams mngon dris su'i bab / mas pan gzu gangag rgya brdzun du/ sun na dus srung rtson ma gyur/ mnga'i rlom
44b1(rnying rgyud): ni rnam pa bdun// bod pa'i rdzas dang ma ma bsnyen rdzas dang // mchod pa'i rdzas dang dmachog bas pa'i rdzas// bskul ba rdzas dang mtshan ma dbab pa'i rdzas// tha bar gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog pa'i rdzas// bdun pa 'di chang grub pa'i mtshan ma
44b2(rnying rgyud): 'thung // gtsa ba ga na dzan 'dumardzas ni// gar tsa nA gan ba ba pa 'jas// gtso bo'i rten ni snyid ldeng sa rus phrar// gsal ba lnga dang bdud rtsis gtso bo mchod// dam tshig bcwa yis rdo rjes na mdzad// grwa phral nag po yungs nas
44b3(rnying rgyud): til gyis bsku// spos dang lce pog mi tshil mtshan ma 'bebs// gats+tsha bo gnad la 'bebs pa a mr-i tI// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i bod rdzas ni// g.yab dang dang nI tab+hU mi tshil dang // tsong kun ltos lngas bsregs la bod/
44b4(rnying rgyud): mo'i rten ni bu mo gtsang ma dang // rgya mtshor shi ba'i bud med thod pa gnyis// mkhar du brtsigs la dkyil 'khor dbas su kha smad la// mi gsod mtshon gyi ral gri sor brgyad pa// yu ba ma bris dkyil 'khor dbus su gzugs/
44b5(rnying rgyud): ma b+ha seng ge g.yang gzhi go zung nag pa'o// rnga mo lha mo nag mo'i ngam rdzas na// dge slong sha dang me ro seng ge'i steng // tha rgong sha dang dbang po rnam pa lnga// ru tA nag pa'i sbrang dang bdud rtsi lnga// spyan ma'i khrag dang sha khrag
44b6(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs dang // bye mu lnga yis gto rabs gur kum brda// pad+ma'i rags thugs la d+ha rA gtor b+ha// lha mo nag ma 'ang dang dam chag bsre pa'i rdzas// rba t-i rdo rje pad+ma med sngags// bsgral rdzas ma ma tshal dadagra rdul brna
44b7(rnying rgyud): mi bebs pa cu ma gtsang ma 'o// gnang la 'bengs shing bzlog pa lugs sa'i dang // thal mo rab te yi ba dus ni// drod mo'i ralabs ga' ba cing srin lag bstan// pu phugul dang na mchil gdu gyis pong / le ma ti yi rten du luganagagam// da mo nag mdzu ma 'thad pa'o//
45a1(rnying rgyud): mtsha par cad ngasan// rnam pa gang bal khrag dang sa m+b+haH/ nam thu na du ca zad da// dan nga rtag du du gyu/ bcug tu sa mas// mas sa
45a2(rnying rgyud): nag dang tsang zar// mtshan ma 'babs pa bu mog rlung ma'o// gnad la 'bebs shing bzlab rdzas dratshu la dang // 'di rnams gtsang zhing mnyams tshogs 'gyur nA// dz+ha rnga mkha' 'gal mi tshogs rnams na//
45a3(rnying rgyud): u dum bA ra mthong ba ltar// dga' ba skyes nas mi la dngos grub ster// de bas nan tan bskyed la brtson par bya// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las dpon g.yog gi dam rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
45a4(rnying rgyud): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje 'dul ba'i gtso// bsgrub pa'i rten gyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro sgra// thang ka 'dri ba'i nan tan 'di par 'tshal// zhus
45a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe/ gsang ba'i bdag pas bka' stsal pa/ mkha' 'gro'i rten gyi sku gzugs ni// mes ma 'phrigs par dur khrod 'gro// dang po phyag na rdo rje dang / lha mo'i bstan pa 'bum 'bum pa zlas// de la sbyin sreg gtor ma 'bral/
45a6(rnying rgyud): mkhan la dbang bsgyur ro// dam tshig rab tu sbyin par bya// de nas bud med zhabs ma dang // ro dkris dag gi ras dag ni// ro bsregs mgal pa'i shing gis kyang // bri ba'i tshon rtsi rnam pa lnga// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'gro 'du las// rgyal
45a7(rnying rgyud): rigs sngar byin parlabs la// dbus su phyagan rdo jo ga// mdun du lha mo nag man// khong zhing ral gri phyogs par blo/ g.yon du la mo tsha// de'u zhan kham pa mthogs pa'o// g.yas su bram ze mchog sring na// mgrin pa /
45b1(rnying rgyud): dang // gan+ta'i stan la long thung 'dzin// ma byan na mthogs par// da la g.yon du bdag tud ni// kan+d+ha'i stan la long zang 'dzin// mthA' spang ngan nu ma thogs// de nas rang gsan khrag gis// sku gzugs rnams
45b2(rnying rgyud): phye la// mdun du gtor ma'i sbyin sreg dbul// zhabs la btud de phyag byas la// dngos grub gang 'dod gsol ba gang ba// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// lha yi sku yi thugs kar ni// srin lag khrig gi
45b3(rnying rgyud): ma bri// de yi dbus su snying po bri// de'i dbus rgyus chen sum sgril gdags// rtse mo bdag bzung bzlas pa bya// yang na lugs ma dag la bya// de ltar byas na dngos grub tu// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud
45b4(rnying rgyud): las sku gzugs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye gsang mdzad drag po hUM mdzad che// dpal lda
45b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i// ting 'dzin bsgom thabs bdag la shod// ces gsol pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyon cig/ skye ba med pa'i ngang las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul ni// hU~M las
45b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rtse ni lnga pa ste// de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje yin// mdog ljang sngo la khro bo'i chu byad de// lus 'gying bag nAn/ dbu ska ral pa gyen la brdzes pal/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtsi lngas
45b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba/ lus la glang chen gyi ko ba dang / mchog gi g.yang gzhi dang / stag gi sham thabs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba dang / sbrul gyi chun pos lus brgyan pa/ spyan mig dmar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/
46a1(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i me dpung ltar 'bar ba'o// de'i mdun du dpal lha mo nag mo bskyed de/ ma hA kA li bA ya be s+pha ra NA yang / de ni rlung nag chub ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o// mU hA kA li dz+wA la raM/ de ni mye'i
46a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskyed pano// de'i dbus su~M dz+nyA paM shra baM shAd+d+he ka pA lA hU~M/ de ni thod pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo // gar+b+ha pa nAM/ don bong bu dmar gA la mig mjug man yod pa/ rlung gi gshog pa can no// tir gyi/ bang
46a3(rnying rgyud): zlog tu zhing bsnol ba'o// ma swar+tha man+tal e/ nyi bla'i gdan no// b+h+yo nag mo'i 'pho 'dra las/ lha char ting nge 'dzin/ oM da bI shrI ma hA kA lI hUM zhes pa la/ rang gi byang chub kyi sems la/ lha ma nag mo ni kha dog nas
46a4(rnying rgyud): mol/ ral ba gting za pang du 'dug pa/ mig rtsa dmar ba kha gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lus la sbrul dang / thod pas brgyan pa/ lag na ral gri dang / ne'u le thogs pa'o// thal ba dang khrag dang zhag
46a5(rnying rgyud): gis mtshon pa'o// nA rgya na dril bya dang seng ga la byas pa/ nyi ma dang zla bas lus brgyan pa'o// skra spang glang gag pas brgyan pa'o// nang pa la lcags sgrog gis brgyan pa'o// lha mdo'i spyan sngar re ma ti khal ma bskyed de// mahA
46a6(rnying rgyud): yA ben+ya g+h+ra~M ts+tsha bA n+d+ha'o// hU~M bat+tA rANatrA~M/ pa gan la sa / dadu duk+Sham+b+ha la hUMl mthong ba'i gzhal yas khang // nga'i nang d+ha na s+t+wa b+h+rUM las 'phrul gyi ldi khang ngo // de'i nang sa khang ba bdun pastod de// nga na
46a7(rnying rgyud): dra rlung ga gau shag pa can po spyad // da'i steng du bsa'i gdanan// nga'i sbrang du min na mi 'a buM 'dra mas/ 'akAr ma tu hUMgs palas/ bdud kyi bu ma mjed nag mor le pa kham pa la/ mthag dang ngan pa chas brgyan pa'o// mag ma
46b1(rnying rgyud): ba mche ba gtsigs pa// re lde nag po dang mi lpags gyon pa/ lag pa na khram bam dang / shod rde'u thogs pa'i sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang / nyi zla'i thod gdengs dang / nad kyi kha rlangs can/ stag gaM sham bu dang / zangs kyi dra ba
46b2(rnying rgyud): dang / mtshon gyi gru gu dang ldan pa rnams bskyed do// D+hAts+tsha b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod pa las/ 'khor nag mo 'bum bskyed do// dpal me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas lhang da
46b3(rnying rgyud): bo brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sku bsnams gsang ba'i lha// mtshan ma 'joms pa'i dpa' brtan drag shul can// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma lha phreng ba yi// srog snying bslab pa'i sngags rnams bshad
46b4(rnying rgyud): par zhu// zhes gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ sngags zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro'i srog rtswa yin// grangs kyang mngal zlar yang ma chag ste// gug skyed tsheg drag dag kyang ma nor na// lha mo nag mo sngon du 'gugs pa yin// zhes bka'
46b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rje de/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes rang gi skang po 'di thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma d+hA ro Sha Na hU~M/ ga tse ba phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa 'dzi sngon du 'bum tsho bdun du bzlas pa byas la/ ga
46b6(rnying rgyud): ma dang ni sbyin sreg gis mchod de// des ni phyag na rdo rje'i grub pa thob// lha mo bkug cing dbang du byed par nus// de nas gdod cig lha mo'i sngag sde la 'jug/ sngags ni dpon mo'i snying dang g.yog mo'i srog// mngon du 'gugs
46b7(rnying rgyud): srog gi snying po'i sngags// gtso ba'i skyon 'drin g.yog mo 'gugs pa'i sngags// migayo bton po rdo rje gdan gyi sngags// mnyes par bya phyir gtar ma dbul ba'i sngags// gang du dbang bsrung dmal gdags pa'i sngags/
47a1(rnying rgyud): mang ga zhugs phan gnod pas la bskul ba'i sngags// mi bya dbang med gnad la 'bebs pa'i sngags// sgra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang ba'i sngags// zhabs la 'dud pa'i sgrub ma dbang bsgyur sngags// lha dang bgegs kyi nyams len brtag
47a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i sngags// brda dang mchod pa rdo rje gsang baSh+Ti sngags// bar chod mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa'i sngags// bcu gnyis rdo rje'i gsang sngags bstan par bya// dpal lha mo nag po'i srog snying la// oM ru ru be ti sta ba do saM/ ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha da do si/ pa tsa la a shug maM
47a3(rnying rgyud): las rnaMm snyi la/ oMn du dzaH/ rbaN+Di Sh+Ta t+ta sa/ rag sa / d+han mir+d+han+tu/ mamag 9/ barban+d+ha d+hu ga gas/ ra ta la pa/ tha mu mdun sa dun kya du/ dan tshig las 'dren pa'i sngags pa
47a4(rnying rgyud): saM yaM bzlas na ma mo mngon du yod// bye ba bzlas na phyag rgya ston par byed// 'bum phyug gis kyang dngos grub mtshan ma ster// khol mo'i snying po bzlas ma thog nas 'ong // sa ma ya du ling rak+ta si/ he rak+Sha/ b+h+yo rAk+Sha/ dr-i rak+Sha mA rAk+Sha si/ mA mA mA mA/ ru lu ru lu/
47a5(rnying rgyud): rU lu ru lu/ b+h+yo T+ya b+hU b+h+yo/ ru d+ha ru ru/ daM ni 'khor ma mo 'bum gri smai'i snying ba'o// oM ma hA kA lI maN+Da la mthe/ A gats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be shA ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bA lo kaM/ a ba lo kA yaM/ tsUH/ d+he ni spyan drong ba'i phyogs so// oM mran+thatA
47a6(rnying rgyud): li ma ma sa mA yau/ shaM tai tiSh+Tha s+t+waM/ ma hA kA li A be sha ya/ r-i ma ti sa ma yaM be sa/ de ni gdan gding ba'i sngags so// oM mahA bi ma hA kA li re ma ti ba liM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mya hI bAdz+ra hoH/ a mr-i ta kha kha le le/ de ni gtor mo 'bul ba'i sngags so// ma ma sa ma
47a7(rnying rgyud): ya ma hA kA le sa ma ya/ ma~M hA kA le kA ya~M sa ma yaM/ ma hA kA le bAg sa ma ya/ ma hA kA li tsit+ta sa ma ya/ ma hA mu tra ka pA la hU~M/ de ni dmachog bstan pa'i sngags so// oM ba~Mtra~M dza~M gi na~M ti ma hA kA li sa ma ya/ ba kro d+ha ka rma rak+Sha hI/ di ni las la bskul ba'i/
47b1(rnying rgyud): sngags so// oM ru ru ru tsa hU~M/ a shug me ba tI ru tra kha sha la nag mo hU~M/ rak+Sha tsid+d+ha ma hA sa mA d+hi/ ma ru kha tsit+ta nan/ rag mo ti ki ma dzaH/ ma ma ti ti d+d+hi b+h+yo/ de ni dpon g.yog gnang nas bskul ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra DA ki ni de ba ma hA kA la re ma ti/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya/
47b2(rnying rgyud): phal A bi sha ya a/ de ni dngos grub blang ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kA li ye hU~M phaT/ ru ru ts+tsha ba la a shrug me hU~M mahA kA li a d+hiShiSh+Tha/ ka pA la hrI ne/ mA hA dz+nyA nA/ kA ya wA ka tsit+tA sid+d+hi hU~M/ de ni dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// thing hri tsA mir+t+ti gur+b+he hU~M/ daM ni nyams na brtag/
47b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags so// hUM phaT/ ma hA de bi kA lI duSh+TAn+ta kA ha nA da ha pa ts+tsha hu lu nan/ da ha pa tsa mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de ni mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa'i sngags so// hU~M hU~M hrI hrIM hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hr-id hri nga hri hring hring hring hring hring / ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta kaM/ b+ha ga ma thu ge mtho ga ma
47b4(rnying rgyud): b+h+r-i ge ma thi ge ma bru~M gau ma b+ha ge ma/ hU~M dr-i hU~M dr-i hU~M hU~M hU~M du hU~M duM hU~M hU~M hU~M dr-i/ phaT ta ka phaT ta ka pha Ta kA~M phaT ka ba Ta ka pa tsA ka pa Ta ka/ de ni rdo rje ma hA mkha' 'gro mo'i rnga sla'o// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas
47b5(rnying rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan mgon po rgyal tshab lAs lci lha// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnal 'byor ma'i// gsang 'di phyag rgya bdag la bstan par 'tshal// zhes zhus pa dang / phya gan rdo rjes bka' stsal ba/ rnal 'gror
47b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya dam pa ni// spang bar mi byi rtag tu bcang bar bya'o// dang po gaN ba rdo rje rgyal la gnas// mu gis me sbar bong zhon dbang phyug me// lcags kyus bzung nas gsheg pas zil gyis gnon// bong bus gdan rings thod pas dbang bskrur te// tha~Md
47b7(rnying rgyud): dam brtan gnyis med dngos grub blang // rtag tu mtshan ma ngan pa phyag rgyas bzlog/ dang thog tso'i rdo rje rtsa lnga ni// lag gnyis sor ma rgyab tu bsnol bcangs la// mtho bong gung mo mthe'u srung gshibs la bskyed// rdo rje rtsa lnga brag na rdo rje'i rgyan// deng ba drung nag
48a1(rnying rgyud): ma'i phyag rgyan// lag na thal skur gung sprod bsgreng ba dang / man chung srin sa gtsigs bsnol bgrang pa dang // nga brkyang man bo glang gtad mdzub po gnyis bsgreng rdzong // rta mo bkug parlang ga phyag Na'o// ma ri s+tha gnag 'bar ba'i phyag d+han/
48a2(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis ni sor mo dgug byas te// mthe bong bkug ste de la gtad byas la// gung mo mthe'u chung bsgreng ste phyang ba'o// lha mo nag mo'i ral gri'i phyag rgya ni// lag g.yas mthe'u chung bkug ste mtho bos mnan// gung mdzub srin lag gshibs te bsgreng ba'o//
48a3(rnying rgyud): khol mo re ma ti ye phyag rgya ni// lag pa g.yas bkug man pos mnan byas te// lhag ma gsum btang bas ni khram 'am phyag rgya yin// ma mo dgug pa lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis rgyab skang mthe' chung bsgreng nas ni// mdzub mo gnyis bkug gur srin ma
48a4(rnying rgyud): bzang stebras nas h+lA gang lcags blag nyis// zil gyis ma na ljang gau shog rgyag tshan// sman pa gnyis gshengs seng thog sheg ltar bcing // gad ma tshig pang ba dag gargyag tan// pa'i'i rlung bkrol bas smin lag mnan byas te//
48a5(rnying rgyud): mthe bas mnan pa'o// de bzhin gang mo gnyis kyang nang du bstan// byin brlabs dbang bsgyur thod thang phyug rgyan// lag pa g.yas g.yon khu tshur bcangs pa'i/ mthab mdzub bzhi pa ljangs zlog lta bur spel// lag gnyis thod rnon dmachog lcag rgyaH/
48a6(rnying rgyud): bong mdzub mo bkug nas bkrum byas te/ bkug nas srin lag gnyis bcug mig 'bras 'dra// gung mo mthe'u chung gnyis ni thod rnon kha// dngos grub blang ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa ni// lag gnyis so rab tu rtse bsdus bkug la zlum// mtshan ngan bzlog pa ShI shUl
48a7(rnying rgyud): gya ni// lag g.yos mthob mdzub srin lag mthil du dgug/ mthe ba gung mo mama'u chung phyar la bsgreng // mkha' 'gro ma malce 'bar ba'i rgyud las phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u lce dgu pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la'ang
48b1(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// kye stobs po che la gnod sbyin grags pa can// rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs kyi mnga' bdag gis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// mchod pa'i rim pa bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa la/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka'
48b2(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub myur bya'i phyir// mnyes par byas te mchod pa rtag tu 'bul// dang por mchod pa'ardzas kyu gtor ma 'bul// gnyis pa la ni sbyin sreg dbul ba'o// de bzhin gsum pa gsang ba'i mchod pa dpral// dang por gtor ma
48b3(rnying rgyud): sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga// mchod pa'i rdzas dang dze gad rak+ta rnams// pad+ma mdzes pa'i snod du bkang byas nas// rlung gis me sbar a yis thod pa bskol// d+haM gi rdo rjes rab tu dkrugs nas kyang // a dkar 'bar bas kha zas dug bcom lu// dpa' bo 'bru lngas bdud rtsir
48b4(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs// dang pos gtso bo phyag na rdo rje mchod// gnyis pas lha mos 'thungs par bsam// tha ma re ma ti yis rngubs par bsgom// oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ DA ki nI ma hA kA li/ yak+Sha re ma ti/ ma ma sha d+h+r-i a mu ka/ ma tsa me ta ba sa mas/ ru ti dzi paM/ prI ya bak+Shi naM/
48b5(rnying rgyud): i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ gsang sngags des ni rtag tu gtor ma dbul ba'o// de nas sbyin sreg dbul ba bstab par bya// sku gzugs mdun du me thib bskor byas te// 'o mtsher ma yod pa'i shing brtsigs la// bram ze khyim nas me blings me spar
