48b6(rnying rgyud): bsreg rdzas mi sha mar nag sbrang rtsi chang // khrag la sbyar la khri phrag gcig tu dbul// bsgom thabs me nyid me lhar skyes zhon pa la// phyag bzhi g.yas na dbyug pa dang ni mchod sbyin no// g.yon na g+han+d+he dang ni bgrang phreng rab tu 'dzin// de yi snying gar phyag
48b7(rnying rgyud): na rdo rje dang / lha mo nyid dang khol mo re ma ti// gsal bar bskyed la sbyin sreg dbul bar bya'o// gnyis pa gtso bo phyag na rdo rje mchod// gsum pas lha mo nag mo de la dbul// de bzhin tha mas ro ma ti la mchod// so so'i snying po bzlas shing dbul
49a1(rnying rgyud): na/ na dug ba shAhA/ / / ba na saH/ 'dud da du na/ danas su dngas bab shAdaH/
49a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'grogs la la ma ting 'dzin la// gseng ba y-i shes hU~M dang a~M gnyis la// dzaHbadris dgrags nas kyang // rlabs mkha' 'ag N+ye shes 'gyur te// thugs kyi thig las bdag ga gas byin pa skyed// thugs kyi dngas ba dam pa'i yan dag pa
49a3(rnying rgyud): kA laM sa ma ya bad+hi tsid+d+ha/ pahA brA kra d+ha s+t+wa~M spro ba'o// mahA kA li sa ma ya/ ma hA raH/ guN+Di b+h+rUM/ A baM sha sa/ bsgruba'o// mkha' 'grom me lnga 'bang ba gyud las mchod pa'i la'u gyi bcu pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngas// dpal phyag mdza
49a4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes lngar ldan dpa' brtan thugs ni can// dpal ldan mo bstod rdo rjesams dpa' khyod// rdo na mkha' 'gro ma yi dngos grub na// srog dang 'dra ba'i dmachog bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol ba dang / dpal phyag nardo rdzas pa
49a5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ mkha' 'gro ma yid mag+sa ni// gas pa'i tshig cha' nga dag/ mi shags rnam pa sa dbang bskru // rdon maldan pa 'dams pa'i g+ha// dumachi ga teng rab ba shad bya/ 'das narnga na dmyal ban// ma 'das sa grwa ba mapa' nA/
49a6(rnying rgyud): bapyug na rdo rje dang // lha mnag me pon g.yag la// sku gsung blugs kyi ma chag na// gar+b+ha pa'i sna yid ma gan// swa yA Sh+TAn sa spong zhing // dang rje ba po nyis pa \u0f7f// ts+tsha spyan lagadung ba bstong // gats+tsha ba gas skye dmachog //
49a7(rnying rgyud): skyed pa rgyun mi gcod// mi yengs rdzun spangs gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo'i thugs kya mchog no// gsang ba gzhan la mi spel zhing // stan gad 'bral bu lnga la spyod// de nas gtso mo'i ngamatshig bshad// lha mor sku yi dam tshig ni// yong bu la ni byam
49b1(rnying rgyud): par bya// khal gyis mi mnan dbyug mi brdeg/ rma bya'i mdongs ni rtag tu bcang // me yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba na// me tog skyes ltar dga' bar bya// rtag tu yi dam mi 'da' ba'i// zhag re phyag rgya gnyis gnyis bstan// lha mo gsung gi dam tshig ni// rgyun du
49b2(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa byed pa dang // ne'u la mthong na bstod pa bya// phyag rgya bstan zhing dga' bar bya// zhing pags rdzas kyi snod du bya// tshub ma dag dang phrad gyur na// rked par mi gcod rgyab mi bstan// chos grangs shis dang nam gung la// phyag rgya bya zhing bstod pa bya// lha mo'i
49b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dam tshig ni// 'jig rten gang dang gang dag na// bud med yugs sa yod pa la// byams par bya zhing chags pa spyad// rtag tu bu mo gtsang ma bsten// lha mo zla mtshan rgya dus su// gsang ba'i mchod pas dam bsre'o// lha mo'i khol mo re ma ti'i// de yi sku
49b4(rnying rgyud): yi dam tshig ni// byis pa dag gi nal phug la// gos dang kha zas mgron du sprin// rtag par de la byams par bya// shing lo sor bzhi rked par gcad// phyed la ma mo'i sku bris te// phyed la dngos grub gsol bar bri// de ni rtag tu bcang ba'o// khol mo gsung gi dmi tshig/
49b5(rnying rgyud): ni// ma phebs bar du srog snying drang // nub re gtor mA la dar mi rung // kha 'phro dag kyang bsre ba min// phreng ba la yang reg pas srung // bdag gis dgra la byad byas te// phyis ni bcos par ma bshad do// khas blangs yol du ga la rung // phud kyang nyams par bya ba
49b6(rnying rgyud): min// rdo sol chur ni bsgyur mi bya// khol mo thugs kyi dam tshig ni// nal bu yod pa'i sdum ma la// me tog gtor zhing byams par bya// kha zas sbyin zhing dang ni mi bgrang // sna khrag zla mtshan blang bar bya// dam tshig yod rung med rung ste// bdag ma yin pa'i rnal
49b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor la// rang gi lha dang snying po dang // rdzas dang phyag rgya mi bstan no// mtshan mdze so la zhu bas bsku// bya nag lug nag rtag tu bcang // the tsom zar ni mi rung ngo // dpon ga/ yog spyi yi dam tshig ni// du ni rdo rje pad+ma'i mi// rtag tu bcangs la bstan cing mchod/
50a1(rnying rgyud): sgyu la chud// gyu das rdzus m+b+ha// smra sa / na / ma na nan grug+sa/ ga tu sa ga
50a2(rnying rgyud): drugasapa// b+ha na rdo rjes bka' phral pa// rab tub shad kyis pan myen rten// gtsab byug na rdo rje'o// sgra yi mchog nyams pan// sa 'dung byed la ma chad// gsung gi ma nyams pan// kyang dngas srab sa // ga
50a3(rnying rgyud): mdzu med par ri// phyugs kyi mchog nyams pa na// mkha' 'gro'i chad pas rab bcad nas// nges par rdo rjid myal bar phye// dngos grub med par bar chod 'byung // dpal ldan lha mo nag ma y-i// sgra yid mchog nyams khyen// rgyal po'i chung drang sAle gangag dang /
50a4(rnying rgyud): me dang chu yi bar du chod// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na// bsgrub la g.yel zhing nus mthu med// bsgrub pa rtsom res par chod 'ong // thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na// nyams len 'ong zhing rims nad 'ong // khol mo bdud mo re ma ti'i// sku yi dam tshig
50a5(rnying rgyud): nyams gyur na// 'khor la rims nad smyo 'bog 'ong // dgra rnams tshe dang bsod nams 'phel// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na// bu dang chung ma 'chi ba dang // snying mi dga' zhing kha yang yo// nor dang longs spyod zad par 'gyur// thugs kyi mchog nyams pa
50a6(rnying rgyud): na// rang gi tshol bar tshad 'ong // mdze dang rgyu gzer na zhing 'bog/ phyi ying mtshig nyams pa na// rtag par bsgrubs kyang 'gyub dus med// rtag par dgra dang spyi 'bral lo// yad nI wA dbyung ba sa byin nyon// dumatshig bsrung ba'i yon tan la// gtso bo phyag na rdo d+hi'i/
50a7(rnying rgyud): yang cig sa tu ba phyog nis mas ni mi pa pa'i ma ma gro ni lu
50b1(rnying rgyud): rnams mngon du 'khol// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsams pas 'grub// dpal ldan lha mo nag ma yi// bla yi dam tshig ma nyams na// lha srin ma mos phyag byed de// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rna la sang thob// gsung ga dam rgyag ma nyams na// sngags pa
50b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro mngon du 'ong // bar chad med par dngos grub ster// thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na// bdud dang ngag yis mi tshugs shing // rtag tu rims nad mi 'byung zhing // dgra rnams the tshom med par 'chi// lha mi yongs kyis bkur bar 'gyur/
50b3(rnying rgyud): rang nor dang ldan par 'gyur// de nas nag mo re ma ti'i// sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na// 'khor ni bkra shis der zhing rgyas// dgra dang bgegs rnams phung bar byed// gsung gi dmatshig mnyams na// bu dang rlung ma dar ba dang // nor dang longs spyod rgyas par/
50b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// mig non rkang mye gyogs ro langs 'grub// thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na// tshe ring grags pa thob pa dang // lus la chad kyis mi thebs shing // sems la sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// mthu rgyal chen po thob par 'gyur// smr-i yi mA
50b5(rnying rgyud): chog ma nyams ni// gaN+DI bo phyag na rdo rje dang // lha mo nag mo dpon g.yog kun// rtag tu bdag dang mi 'bral lo// ji ltar 'dod pa'i don de 'grub// gang ltar mngag pa'i lus de byed// mkha' 'gro me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ da ma chog gi
50b6(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// hU~M mdzad b+h+rUM gi rgyal po rdo rje che// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i drod tshad mtshan ma shong // ces zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo
50b7(rnying rgyud): rjes bka' stsal pa// skyes bu blo ldan mni ngag rtsal can gyis// gsang sngags ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rab ldan na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i grub rtags 'di ltar 'byung // grub rtags phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// nang gi grub chags mig
51a1(rnying rgyud): na / ga na rdzu rnan / na tum na tu na du na na nga nga/
51a2(rnying rgyud): ji 'dzin// mkha' 'gros gtam zer zos na lha mos bstan// bud med 'brug sgra sgrogs na re ma ti// sA la gA pur dri ni rdo rje 'dzin// ku mu de yi dri ni lha mo nyid// spos sam gur gumagron ra ma ti// lce la dam chos 'chad na rdo rje 'dzin// lce la gsang
51a3(rnying rgyud): zlos na lha mo yin// legs nyes mtshan ma sma na ri ma ti// lus ni 'gron phyag ni rdo rje yin// lus las 'od 'byung ba ni lha mo'i rtags// lus po 'dar rAm sbyi sha bung ba dang // sha rtsa 'gul na re ma ti yi rtags// glal lam sngags shing mchi ma 'ong ba na// lha mo dpon
51a4(rnying rgyud): g.yog yog phebs pa yin// gal te snying gis skye ba dran pa na// phyag ni rdo rje'i dngos grub mtshan ma'o// snyita ni dga' la 'tshig na rje mo yin// snying 'di khri la 'tshig na khol mo yin// da ni gsang ba grab rtags bstan par bya// sngags dang ting 'dzin nas pa skyed
51a5(rnying rgyud): tsa ma na// rdo rje dbus kyi rtsa yi nam mkha' la// byang chub sems kyi dga' bde skye ba na// mkha' 'gro rang la shar bar bshad// da ni phyi yi grub rtags bstan par bya// phyi yi rtags ni rab 'bring tha ma gsum// rab ni lha mo nyid kyi sku mthong ste// nam mkha'i dbus
51a6(rnying rgyud): su phyag na rdo rje mthong // bud med dkar mo bzhad cing byung ba na// gsang ba'i ye shes dngos grub ster bdo// nag mo ral ba can du byung ba na// 'dod khams 'dus pa'i mthu rtsal dngos grub bdag la ster// dmar mo bas yi ral ba tsan du byung ba na// 'jig rten dbang
51a7(rnying rgyud): sa grub / sa mad pa zabs // sas rgya mtsho grub babye/ nga sardzog sas kyi na mam par 'asang brag pa na/ mthum byung ba rgyabs pa/ spang ba ma du
51b1(rnying rgyud): gan tu ga/ ma tog car 'bab 'brug dang rdung dbar drung // bud med ga zugs dang ga dunan ston par// zhal gyur ba tu m+b+ha rgyugs // 'brug dang rlung dA rla/ rung yang thoga' ga/ khyas pa bas ma nan dang gal pa smra bar// bya rtags na ma ma/
51b2(rnying rgyud): dag tu ston// byang chub sems dpa' rmis na gtso bo yin// ma dang sring mo rmis na ngo mo yin// chung mkhol mo rmis na g.yog mo yin// bor bu sha ba rmis na rje mo yin// dre'u dang bya nag rmis na khol mo yin// ma mo grub nas dbang du 'dus pa na// bud med dag
51b3(rnying rgyud): gis bdag la phyag 'tshal na// 'dzum zhing 'khrig gro byed pa spyod pa yin// ma mo grub nas dbang du ma 'dus na// mi sdug gzugs su ston zhing rje mor rdzu// gcan gzan zar 'od ma mo phyag skyugs so// dam tshig nyams nas ma mo 'khrugs gyur na// ma mo nang 'thabs/
51b4(rnying rgyud): mtshon gyi char pa 'bab// b+ha nag nang 'thabs khrag gi na bun 'khrigs// ltas de mthong na bka' chad 'ong ba'i rtags// gal te lte bur nag mo la sogs pa'i// dam sri rnams kyis bsgrub par bar gcod na// grang la 'khrigs shing khyim du 'gro snying 'dod// kha
51b5(rnying rgyud): b+hU s+yA 'dod la khron dung rdzog/ dra chung rlub da pa ca tsun pa mi// gum hA badz+ra ma rnas 'am yal bun// mAmatshan da nga de ston cing byang gyus ston// dub la khrigs nas thang mi thal pa mthong // thad cid dubya mthon rnams pagarjo// tshig ni rnams
51b6(rnying rgyud): pa ting 'dzin g.yel ba'i rtags// thal mo deb na dam tshig ma tshang zer// lce rtse ston na snying po chad pa yin// so sgra 'khrigs na gzhan dang 'thab mo 'ong // rgod pa thos na dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i rtags// khron bar chad 'ong ba sbron pa yin// sbyor bar byed na dngos grub
51b7(rnying rgyud): ster ba yin// rgyang glu len pa mthong na grub thag ring // mchi ris ngo la yod na rims nang 'ong // gar thabs byed cing byung na ci bsams 'grub// gling bu 'bud pa mthong na gtor ma 'dod pa yin// phreng ba bgrang ba mthong na sbyin sreg 'dod pa yin// kha la'o byed
52a1(rnying rgyud): smyor ba 'dod pa yin// bong san pa rnaMs nanas sbyin/ rdzasazhan pa masun ma na// sams 'gas pa mang na dang la chags// gas ba dang / gas pa mthong na dang la rgyags par// mamang las pa da chung na 'das la chags/
52a2(rnying rgyud): sbyang stabs byed pa slob ma'i lus la chags// bya dang gcan gzan gtor ma za ba bzang // kha rog 'dug na snying po phyag sa nor// 'dzum pa mthod na bdag nyid na ring rtags// gos lnga me rag yod na slob ma nyams// sha ba zhon na nor rnams 'phel ba'i rtags/ @
52a3(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i rtags rnams gang byung yang // de nas grub rtags bzang po mthong ba na// bdud rtsi bum pa'i phyag rgya bcas la ni// dngos grung blang ba'i sngags ni bzlas byas la// snying la ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub byung // ma dang sring mo khol mo dmya la gdags// mtshan sa
52a4(rnying rgyud): ngan pa dag ni mthong ba na// mtshan ma dun pa bzlog pa'i tri shUl phyag rgya bca'// mtshon ma ngan pa bzlog pa sngags kyis bzlog/ gal te bdag ni gzhan du don gnyer na// bud med 'ag na rdzas ni gang ba thogs// bya dang gcan gzan mngon du 'gron bzang //
52a5(rnying rgyud): gtor ma phul la don la 'gro// lhad stong thogs pa mthong na don mi gnyer// grub pa'i drong tshad rnal 'byor spyil gces// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las rjod tshad bstan pa'i le'u ske bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas dpal phyog na rdo rje la/ lha'i
52a6(rnying rgyud): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// thabs dang shes rab mda' mdzad rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgrubs kyang ma grub na// spobs shing gnad la dbab par zhu// zhes gsol pa dang / dpal ldan phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// skyes bu ting
52a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin blo ldan rtsal can gyis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags gtsor blangs te// gang 'dod dngos grub mi thob mi srid do// 'on kyang bsgrub thag ring ba na// de la nyes dmigs rnam pa bzhi// sngon gyi las 'phros ma 'brel ba// bsnyen pa zhag grangs tu rab
52b1(rnying rgyud): dang // bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa dang // rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa bzhi// bsgrub thag ring ba'i rgyu bzhi yin// de bzhin mtshan ma ngos bzung ste// sngon gyi las 'gros ma 'bral na// bslabs kyang dngos grub mtshan ma med// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa grangs tu
52b2(rnying rgyud): na// grub rtags 'ong zhing las mi nyan// bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa na// snying mi dga' la 'gro zhing 'jigs// rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa na// bar chod rkyen dbang drag po 'byung // 'on kyang mi gzhag bsgyur zhing bslab// sngon gyi las 'gros ma 'brel na//
52b3(rnying rgyud): dang po bsnyen pa yun rings la// de nas gnad la dbab pa ni// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byang shar du// dur khrong sa la gru gsum daskyil// 'phang du khru gang yod pa brtsigs// mi yi khrag gis chag chag gdab// de nas zhing sogs g.yas pa la// lha mo nyid kyi sku'i
52b4(rnying rgyud): la// rgyas pa'i gzungs thag snying gar gdags// gru gsum steng du gan rkyal mnan// gzungs thag rtse mo sos bzung la// hU~M mdzad chen por gsal bsgoms la// ma mo gsod pa'i snying po bzlas// rag mo tsit+ta rak+ta sti ra ti ti mA ra ya hU~M/ dzaH/ de skad gsang
52b5(rnying rgyud): sngags bzlas nas ni// mu mo'i snying khrag rngub par bsgom// ma mo bong bur bcas pa rnams// ma trang bzhin du 'gyel bar bas ma~M// de nas snying gar rdog pas mnan// tsit+ta dz+wa la r-i zhes pas// bdag gi zhal nus mi byung bas// me mo thul gyis bsregs par
52b6(rnying rgyud): bsdum// me mo'i sa bon mo nag mo// bdag gi zhabs 'og rgyud pa las// ma ma ru lu zhes brjod pa las// bdag nyid dpal gyi zhabs 'og nas// lha mo nus pa'i thod phreng can// thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par bsgom// rta mgrin phyag rgyas dbang du bsdu// khrun
52b7(rnying rgyud): gshog phyag rgyas zil gyis mnan// gnad la gdab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg/ de ltar lan cig bsad pa des// gzugs ni rdog pa'i 'og nas dbyung // byang shar mtshams su bzhugs sku gsol// smre bshags bya zhing gdung glu blang // bdud rtsi rnams
53a1(rnying rgyud): yis gso// mtshang nas zla zhing gnang nas bskul// de nas bslab pa bsgyur la brtsam// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen bzhag grangs nyung ba na// mi rus sam ni ru rag sha// lung thang dag gi gang ba lA// ma yengs grangs kyi bstan
53a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni// 'bum tsho bdun du bzlas kyang rung // yang na mtshan ma'i bzlas pa shis// bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa na// gru gsum e dong nag po brko// mi khyi phag gi chag chag gdab// kham sa rdza yi ling+ga la// snying gar dam sri'i ming bris la// rabs chad nag
53a3(rnying rgyud): po'i thod par gzhug/ thod pa dong gi nang du gzhug/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom// dam spyi bkug rdzing bstim byas la// mi rus sor brgya gyur pa yis// mi g.yo mgon por gsal bsgoms gad ba// mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog sngags bzlas// de steng
53a4(rnying rgyud): rdob nag po la// ri rab rdo rje gya gram bri// 'brub khung de yi kha bcad la// de steng sku gdung nag po brtsig/ de ni dam si mnan par bshad// rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa la// mkha' 'gro ma yi chad pa 'byung // nyams tshad chen bka' chang che// bsgrub pa grub rtags
53a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // rang nyid srog la bab pa'o// nyams pa 'bring gi bka' chad ni// 'khor la rkyen dang rims nad 'byung // nyams pa tha ma'i bka' chad ni// dgra dang nor la god ka 'byung // de nas nyams pa bslang ba bstan// nyams pa chen po bskang po ni// gtor ma
53a6(rnying rgyud): khri dang sbyin sreg khri// de bzhin ra tsa gsum gyis bskang // des kyang skongs par mi 'gyur na// dang po mkha' lding gsum gyis bskang // de nas shel nag gsum gyis bskang // bka' chad 'bring po byung ba na// gtor ma stong dang sbyin sreg stong // mkha' lding gnyis
53a7(rnying rgyud): dang sbyi nag gnyis// de bzhin ra tsa gnyis kyis bskang // mdangs kyi mar me bsdu brgyad dbul// bka' chad tha me byung ba na// gtor ma brgya dang sbyin sreg brgya// mkha' lding gcig dang shel nag gcig/ ra tsa gcig gis slongs par bshad// mkha' 'gro ma
53b1(rnying rgyud): gi skye 'bar ba'i rgyud las stsogs shing thugs das slong ba'i laT sku bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya sbyin gyis dpal b+hag na rdo rdul 'ad skad ces gsam to// dag po dpal 'a bar gnod sbyin khros pa rig to// rdo rje mkha' 'gyu ngas grub
53b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas// rtag tu bsten pa rdo rje 'dzin pas shod// ces gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// nyon cig mkha' 'gro rtag tu bsten pa ni// dang po grub cing mtshan ma thob pa gces// de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bstan// dpon mo'i phyi yi rten ni ma
53b3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// rma bya'i snying gar b+h+yo las lha mo bskyed// khol mo'i phyi yi rten ni bya nag mo// snying gar b+h+yo las re ma ti bskyed la// rma bya de mo nAka ga ma shel nag la// sA la ma mo dpon g.yog legs par dbab// de nas kyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur la// dus su gtsa
53b4(rnying rgyud): mas mchod cing rten du bzung // nang gi rten ni sgra dang gsang mtshan no// rang gi gzugs dang gsang mtshan kha spang la// bar du ru ti rdo rje pad+ma mi// gsang ba ga bu ri stsal te lus la bsrel// gsang ba'i rten ni lhan cig grub pa'i lha// gsang ba ye shes thig le la mor
53b5(rnying rgyud): blta'o// de nas rtag tu sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin rdzas dang dam tshig mi spong ngo // rtag tu zas kyi phud kyis bsten par bshad// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las ma mo rtag tu bsten pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpal phyag na
53b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye dpal 'bar chen mo nyi ma stong gi gzi// rdo rje lha mo mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi lha mo'i// pra rtags dbab dang slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// ma mo dbab pa'i gsang sngags bdag la shod// ces gso
53b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lha mo 'bebs shing slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// slong dpon nyid kyis ma mo grub pa gces// de nas ma mo grub pa'i slob dpon des// dur khrod chen por zhag bdun bsnyen pa bya// sngags dang man ngag rdzas su ldan par bya/
54a1(rnying rgyud): dang ba dang lam mo phebs par dbab// de nas slob ma dpapa 'khor 'jug pa dang // ma tog dar dang lhung bstan b+ha dang // dngul phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bzhi bsgyur// du rdo rje rtse lnga 'byung ba'i dbang // nyis bu shas ma dz+wal zhwa drug gi dbyung //
54a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gsum pa la ni dbu rgyan te// bzhi pa rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang // de nas lha mo nag mo'i dbang bzhi bskur// dang po la ni thod pa'i dbang // gnyis pas shes rab ral gri'i dbang bskur te// gsum pa la ni ne'u le'i rdul bu'o// de bzhin bzhi pa dpa'
54a3(rnying rgyud): hAs+ya sbyin// de nas rem ti yi dbang bzhi bskur// dang po dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i dbang // gnyis pa rdo rje Dam ru yi dbang// gsum pa kha N+Da bdud kyi khram pa ma dbang // de bzhin bzhi pa chu gri 'dod pa'i dbang // dbang ni bskur ba'i sngags kyang 'azlas par bya// brgya
54a4(rnying rgyud): rim pa sngon du rjes pa dang // sku dang gsung gi dam tshig dpog par bya'o// de nas gasdang ba'i dbang la 'jug par bya ste/ dbang po bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs kyi// bu mo brgyad dang bcu drug nyi shu ma// mig gi dgras rings sngo bsangs nu ma rgyas// ska bzang
54a5(rnying rgyud): dkAr ut+pal bro// de la khrus byas me tog gser gyis brgyan// dbang po lnga la bdud rtsi dag gis gdab// dpral ba phyag na rdo rje'i gsang sngags bri// de yi snying gar lha mo'i snying po la// lte bar de ma ti yi snying po mi// spyan lnga bdud rtsi lha yi zas byin pa// gsang
54a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i pad+ma ra r-I hi rdo rje stsal// de nas bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor nub phyogs su// dbang bskur stegs bu zlum po dmar po brtsig/ de yi snying du bu mi de bzhag la// phyogs mtshams kun du tshil dang song za ba sreg/ steng 'og kun du zhing gi bla ri gdan// mdun dang #/
54a7(rnying rgyud): tu gtor ma sbyin// de nas ma mo'i snying po'i bum du gdon// de nas rdo rje slab dpon gu ru yis// Da ma ru cung ma mo drag tu dod// srog snying drang zhing g.yab dar g.yang // de nas bu mo de laM sems gtad la// sngags 'di bzlas shing gdong du rtag tu blta// bum me yengs
54b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa bsgom dug zhug/ oM \u0f7fs+t+wa ma d+hA ra Sha Na trAs ma ya pra bA ru ru ra ru tsa pa la a shug ma sa ma ya pra thA/ kha mAn+t+ra pra ma ya ma ti s+dza pra yo gas d+hi sa ma ya prathA/ A be shA A/ drag tu ma mo brgal zhing dbab par byan// thabs par dka na gnad la 'bebs
54b2(rnying rgyud): bzeg/ lan gsum ma mo 'bum gyis nges par phebs// bzang ngan legs nyes mtshan ma pAl thA la smra'o// yang na me smra bar yang phebs par byed// de nas bu mo de yi lus po la// spos dang me tog mar me dri chab kyis// dang po la ni gyi yi mchod pa bya//
54b3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga dang bza' brkang gis// de nas gnyis pa nang gi mchod pa dbul// gsang ba mchod ga khra 'i'i bgal ngas// dang pos gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa btsod// gnyis pas lha mod pa ni g.yog mchod par bya// gsum pas khrab bdag bzung dngas grub
54b4(rnying rgyud): gzungs ma mkha' 'gro yin par des bskyed la// gzungs ma'i khre la gzhag la dam tshig brtse// de nus thig le slob ma'i lce la gzhag/ de nas ma lo thugs kyi 'byung sbyin no// de nas bu mo de yi mdun du ni// dbang gi rtags su thag ma dmar po bcig
54b5(rnying rgyud): slob ma stegs bu'i kha la gzhag/ mkha' 'gro kun la sbyin sreg gtor ma dbul// de nas bu mo shes rab ma de yis// ma mo 'dod kyi slob ma de la dbab// ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas rnams bsreg par bya// phyi dang nang gi zod tshad mtshan ma dbab// mtshan ma
54b6(rnying rgyud): phebs nas thugs kyi dam tshig dbab// dam tshig bsre ba'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// des ni mkha' 'gro mngon du 'grub par bshad// ma mo mkha' 'gro thugs kyi gseng rgyud 'di// dbang dang dam tshig med pa'i slob ma lnga// tshig gcig bskrun
54b7(rnying rgyud): yang tshe yi 'du byed bskul// myur du shi nas rdo rje dmyal bar skye// de bas dbang bskur gnang ba thob la sbyin par bshad// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/
55a1(rnying rgyud): dpal phyug na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma phyag na rdo rje che// ngo mtshar byin brlabs rnams kyi mchog/ lha mo grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// las kyi rim pa bshad du gsol// ces gsol pa dang / dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka'
55a2(rnying rgyud): smras pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po brgya byin nyon// lha mo'i grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// so so'i las la ched du ma brtsams kyang // yid la ci 'dod bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub// 'on kyang ched du sgrub pacom pa ni// las kyi bye brag dam pa ngas bshad
55a3(rnying rgyud): ngo// ma mo grub pa rnams kyis bya ba yin// dang po'i las can rnams kyis mi brtsam mo// brgya byin nyon cig/ zhi ba'i las kyi khyad par ni// bu ram sbrang rtsi gi'u wang dang // gu gul spos dang 'o ma dang // mar khu til dang 'bras chan dang // a ga tra dang
55a4(rnying rgyud): du ru swA// gang la bya ba'i ming drang bcas// ril bu khri tsho gcig byas la// zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po dang // 'o ma yod pa'i shing brtsigs la// mkha' 'gro ma rnams dkar po la// bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas kyang // gang la bya ba'i spyi bo nas// dbang bskur
55a5(rnying rgyud): lus po zhi bar bsgom// me sbar ril bu rim gyis bsreg/ gong ma'i srog snying bzlas shing dbul// srog gi snying po'i gzhug rgyan du// shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA bzlas// 'bu mtsho bzhi ru bzlas byas la// bdud dang bgegs rnams zhi ba dang // dgra dang nad yams
55a6(rnying rgyud): da bang shing brdzogs pa// gotso ba phyag na rdo rje dang / ma khe'i 'grom sun sor pa la// rin chen mang dang bram po thog sa// gleng la bya ba'i snyi gas// dbang bslar srung po byas par rdzog// ma la zu ma sras dbul// oM ts+tshaSh+ma
55b1(rnying rgyud): sna ma thag sus d+hAs swA// / 'thun ma na d+ha // dang sa da// nga das sa byung shAgyu// dang dgasas su // myu na du lag tu na dang // gangs na mag nga
55b2(rnying rgyud): bajig par bsgom// me s+phar ri la byu ma gyis bsreg/ oM d+hir+tha mu hU~M / trA~M/ pa tsa la a shug me/ za ma ma hA s+t+rai pra che ge mo A/ rA ma nA ya hrIHdzaH/ 'brum rdzobacudrug bzlas pa na// 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po dang // stag du byung po nor zla dang // gro
55b3(rnying rgyud): dang blon po dang // dmag mi dang ni lha mi dang // klu dang gnod sbyin bu mo dang // kun kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// bslang ba'i las sku bstan pa ni// drag po'i me thab gra gsum du// drug shing tsher ma'i me brus pa// rta dang mgrin ring sha dang tshal/ khA
55b4(rnying rgyud): dang thar nu'i chang // gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas// 'bru mo tsho ru ni bzlas pa bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rlung gi rnga mo ston mo 'askyon// dra steng gar la bya ba bskyon// rem ti ya~Ms snga nas khrid// lha mo nag mos kyi nas dang// phyag na rdo rjes rgyab nas
55b5(rnying rgyud): phul// dpag tshad brgyad khrir bskrad par bsam// snying po bzlas shing ya sngags bsreg/ snying po tha ma skrod ces bskul// yul nas de byung zhing 'khyams par nus// phaT tsa pa la a shug me// smA ra NA ma yaM phaT baT slong ga ga/ dbye ba'i phas su
55b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// rta g.yag bya dog drug pa'i pha// btsan drug skye tshe spang ki'i tshol// mdzer bo gnyis kyi ming bcas pa// tsher ma'i shing la me brus la// 'brum tsho gcig tu bstabs pa bya// srog gi snying po'i tha mar ni// me me thag rag shA ru tA mA
56a1(rnying rgyud): smye \u0f7f// klu rtsub nanas na bzlas pabya// natsam meng padu bya bar dus// thad pa 'phags par sbyor ba/ lan byugs nas pa dang// slong dbar shA dang// smra mangs khyag dang // gangs bya ba 'i mang ngamam/
56a2(rnying rgyud): mim 'dzin / sa// da /
56a3(rnying rgyud): tAn pa ni// kham pa'i rdzas la dbyig nas// drug nas steng shes ste// de m+b+ha gar gzhug pa \u0f7f// ba sa nang ga gzug/ 'a tsa mas gcang// ga gas kya gzhags/ @
56a4(rnying rgyud): gas ma ban / ra she / na na na/ sa / ga da
56a5(rnying rgyud): go// sdig pa'ir dang b+he chung // gang la zla ba'i ming dang banas// de nyid kyi gnas sra bzlog/ rmug sa dz+nyAn+da na/ shAb ma m+mA dzaT/ tsam med par 'jog cing b+h+yo// rangs par bya ba da/ ba ni// tha na dar 'brags ba dang // a dra na
56a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu dang // dmangs rigs khyim gyi dud pa dang // byi la'i sha dang btsan dug dang // phabs dang sug pa gu gu li nag po dang // phye mo dag tu rab sbyar la// sngags ni 'dzum du bzlas pa bya// oM pA Na badz+nyA ma hA ka le tsa pa la hUM/ sngo ta grum sngos pahU~M
56a7(rnying rgyud): dri rnams kyis ni byas // gang la ga to bas rings par nus// rang lus smra ba'i spyod ba ni// na kyang zhing la// mjal dge bom khrabs byug// hUM 'i gro gyi dbye na// bdud pa'i dkyil 'bar dbus su ga zugs// b+hage
56b1(rnying rgyud): sa// dA dus blan d+hA d+hAn// wAn pa ldanA dadu sbrel la gzhag/ lhag dpon g.yug song po bzlas// seMn byal rnam pa shang la gdugs// skyes ma mthong bar las lwa bcang // bdag dus sa sung po rjong dang / tan drug lung ba
56b2(rnying rgyud): byin nyon// bstan pa gnyen po bshig pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon brnyas pa dang // gsad pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bshad// rnga mos gsad pa'i las bzhi dang // khol mo nag mo'i thun drug ni// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// gsad pa'i las bzhi ba
56b3(rnying rgyud): pA ni// dang por khrag nad dbab pa dang // gnyis pa rims nad dbab pa dang // gsum pa tsha ba 'brum nag 'bar// bzhi pa snying gzer 'byur ba'o// nang bzhi gang 'dod 'byar bas bsad// khrag nad dag gis dgra gsad nA// ro tshas ras la len
56b4(rnying rgyud): tshwa ba gsum gyi khu bas bsku// bzlas pa bya zhing gtor ma gtang // phebs par dbab cing bskul bar bya// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/ oM ru ru tiSh+Ta ba to saM/ ru ru be ro ru be tiSh+Tha ba to se/ tsA pa la a shug me/ che ge mo rak+Sha ro ga na ga mA ra ya hA
56b5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ khri tsho gcig tu bzlas byas la// ling+ga gtor mar dbul bar bya// khug nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// da ni rims nad dbab pa bshad// btsan dug meda' dug rgya gzer khrag/ chang dang lo dug khrag dang bzhi// thod pa dum bu brgyad pad stsal/
56b6(rnying rgyud): zhi da ras dag gis kha bcad la// sngags 'di sum 'bum bzlas pa bya// oM badz+re tsar+N+Na ma hA ro ShaNA hU~M/ ru ru ba tiSh+Ta ba tA saM/ ru ru ro ru ho ruSh+Ta ba to saM/ tsaM pa la a shug me hU~M byA ha di ma ro gai na ga A be sha ya/ mA ra ya phaT/ rang nyid khros pa
56b7(rnying rgyud): lugs bya// dgra yi phyogs su mtshan mo gtor// rims nad dag gis phung par nus// tshe ba'i nad kyis gsad pa ni// rabs chad nag po'i sha khrag dang // bya rog 'ug pa'i sha tshil dang // sing stag bya rgod phyung ka'i snying // rta nag rog
57a1(rnying rgyud): phag gi snying // sbrang ma'i snying dang rma gri'i sha/ zong zhun dang ni gi'u lang sbyar// dug dang khrag kyang bsres byas la// ril bu khri tsho bzhi byas la// ma thang nag po'i zhal bcas la// ma trang de yi kha nang du// dug shing nag po'i hom skar te/
57a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje mkha' 'gro dpon g.yog kyang // nag mo ral parngam bag can// lag na ral gri thogs pa yi// dgra sha bcad cing zla bar bsgom// ril bu re dang dgra ming re// bsgribs shing bsregs pa'i lus bya'o// ma mo bskul ba'i rjes re bsreg/ nag mo chen mo'i
57a3(rnying rgyud): dmod pa ni// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/ ru ru be tiSh+Tha ba to si ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Tha ba to si/ tsa pa la a shug me/ ma ma sarba shu tr-i a mu ka shI g+h+ra~M mA ra Na/ dz+wa la r-i tsit+ta dz+wa la dzi bai ru d+hi ra~M mA ra ya nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ de nas thA pa ba ho khung mnan// cho ba'i nad la the tshom med//
57a4(rnying rgyud): snying gzer 'bar bas dgra bsad na// lcags sam dug shing phur bu la// lus la bcangs la bsnyen pa dbul// spyi bor phyag na rdo rje bsgom// rked par lha mo nag mo bsgom// rtsi mor ri ma ti yod bsgom// logs pa 'khor kye ma mo bsgom// kI la ya la
57a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa rnams// d+hA stod n+dan dang lhag char ldan// rked par zhe sdang sbrul gyis dkris// sku spang gadrug pa'i phur bu 'bar// lus la bcangs la bsnyen pa dbul// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ra ShaN NA~M/ ru ru ba ti tA ba to sa/ rba ru ra rA ba tiSh+Tha ba to si/ tsA pA la a
57a6(rnying rgyud): shwag me/ ri mA ti badz+ra kI lI kI la ya ts+yai mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ rtag tu bsnyen pa dbul byas la// gtor ma sbyin srog dag gis mchod// de nas dgra yi gzugs byas la// rkang lag dag la btab ba na// b+h+r-ing la btab na de chi bar byed// snying gzor 'bar ba'i cho ga'o/
57a7(rnying rgyud): khol mo nag mo'i thun druga~M ni// 'gu bo nage mo'i thod pa'i thun// nir te nag mo mda' yi thun// rat+ta nag mo khrig gi thun// tsa ri nag mo sgo nga'i thun// bye sha nag mo dug gi thun// tsit+ta nag mo snying gi thun// nag mo'i thun drug rab bshad bya// 'gu li nag mo'o//
57b1(rnying rgyud): thod mang ni// mi ro dkris pa'i dkris ma la// drug dang khrag gu skrag tsha yis// dbus nas bskor la yig bri// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro dzaN+Da dz+haM/ zhes bya ba dbus su pra// da a bya ram duru rlab tAd+ha ba ra sa/ ru rba ro ru ba tAd+d+ha ba da sI/ tsa pA la a shug tu rdzogs
57b2(rnying rgyud): de'i phyi rim du ru ru be ro ru hU~M tiSh+Tha ba do si/ rag mo tsit+ta kha rag ma hU~M dz+haiM/ ma ma hA ga rak+Sha kha m+b+ha na ta pA tra ba tra ga rang+ka tse tra kha rag ma/ rI ma ti sa ma ya ma hA pra masti pra dun b+h+yo dzaHdzAH/ ru lu b+h+yo b+hA zhes br-i/ de'i phyi ma du ma nag mas bskor// de'i phyi rim du byos bskor// da~M
57b3(rnying rgyud): nas sngags kyi 'khor lo de// nel thod dum bu brgyad par phul// thod pa de yi nang du ni// po dang khyi rgyar rog snying // yugs sa mo yi mngal khrag dang // nad gang 'dod pa'i sha rus khrag/ drug sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs// chang dang sbyar la rgod par blug/ drod
57b4(rnying rgyud): g.yang gzhi'i steng du gzhag/ de rag dzi ti ta bo dang // mkha' 'gro ma la phul nas ni// ske tshwa yungs nag thal chen la// sngags 'di bzlas la thod par blag/ oM ru ru be ro ru hU~M ti t+pa ba to so/ hUM hUM/ tsa pa la a shug me kaR+Ya de byi mu di rA ga po hU~M h+Na tsa pa~M la a
57b5(rnying rgyud): shug me/ mya yaM rak+Sha thum du na nan/ kha rag tsa mun ti hU~M hU~M tsa pa la A shrag me/ a ka ma mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ sngags de khri tshe thon pa'i tshe// go ro tsa nas kha bcad la// dur khrod dag tu ke nas dag ste// nam byed thod mda' dgra la 'phang // me mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas
57b6(rnying rgyud): bsreg/ de ni phung zhing rlag par byed// nir ti nag mo'i mdang blun ni// mda' sgo bya smyung ka yos sbyin// drag shing nug po'i mde'u btsugs la// bam gyi snying khrag yugs sa'i khrag/ btsan drug yungs kar bye tshe dang // mi dregs dgu yi so sen dang // bya dang gcan
57b7(rnying rgyud): dgu'i sder mo dang // tshor ma dgu dang mtshon dpal dgu// gri rgod khrag dang g.yul spangs// de rnams bsres pa'i phye ma la// ma mo las pa bskul ba dang // gnad la dbab pa'i sngags kyis gdab// de mo gting ba rdzun gyi mthu// dme gre nag mo'i zor sngags
58a1(rnying rgyud): bdas// sh+tsa/ hrul te 'i ma mahA/ bajam pa gsags rgyab+h+yo/ bu dz+ra ma mataH/ drA ska sngags ni bzlas nas nA// dzas dang thar thun mda' sbubs d+ha// mda' nyid drug dang khrag gas b+hag/ dud tha~Md blags pa gan
58a2(rnying rgyud): bdungs la// mde'u yi rtse mo bsreg byis la// mdang de nam byed dgra la 'phang // gar la bya ba gr-i ru 'chi// rak+ta nag mo'i khrag blun ni// mai rtar khyi phag khrag dang // rims nad khrag dang gu gul dang // tsher ma dgu dang mchu sder dgu// klu yi chu dang btsan dug
58a3(rnying rgyud): dang // rang bye 'brum tri nang du stsal// yungs kar dag la thun sngags 'di// bdun khri ba zlas la khrug gi nang du thug/ ru ru sa drug/ a shwag mi pa ti ru wa kha shal ma/ che ge mo a mu ka rika/ tsAr nan/ mA ra yA mAr ya tI ri/ A kaR+Sha ya~M a t+ma haH/
58a4(rnying rgyud): khrug la sngags bzlas la// ma mo las la bskal sngags gdab// de nas khrag gi zor mda' de// ro dkris dag go 'ur rdor sul// nam phyed dgra la 'phang bar bya'o// des ni gang la bya ba 'chi// tsar nag mo'i srong blan ni// bya monag mo'i sgo nga yi/
58a5(rnying rgyud): brtol ba'i sgong stong du// rims kyi khrag dang po tsan dreg sul// yungs kar thal che na mtshon dpal la// srog gi snying po 'brum du bzlas// tha mar sgong thun gtab sngags bzlas// kha mun tra ba tra ba trag sha rag mo taM ka ma~Mdz+dza/ kha rag taM ke ma/
58a6(rnying rgyud): nas sgo nga kha btsad la// has+ya lag par bcug pa 'phang // ma bar la brtsub cang 'jig par dus// dag la 'phro na the tshom med// byi sha nag mo'i drug blan ni// me he bI ru bum pa men ru// mda' jug btsun drug lo drag ring // rims rkad thig dang
58a7(rnying rgyud): cheng drugs la// rA ru nang ny-id khar badrug la// dang la mkha' 'gro'i snying po dang // las la bskul sngags ming dang bcas// de nas drug gi dpal sngags bzlas// d+hu me ti ma ma ru lu rig khyu// ri ma ta Sh+ya sha ma ya stA yak+sha kro d+ha che ge mo mA ra yang /
58b1(rnying rgyud): rjeH za ba zad par ni// drug+sa ga khu ba ma rags gter/ me mgo dgugs khengs tsamun// ma mo b+ham+b+halta pa'i rdzas bsregs la// kham pa pa phyag rgyab cas pa no// nam byed khros te dag la 'dung// rdo rlom med par dag brtag go// ng+ka dan zung da/
58b2(rnying rgyud): ni// s+yAng gi stagu dang skye mong snying // khyi dang 'ug pa pra yi snying // kho dog khrag dang sbrul gyi spring // zod pa'i nang du stsal la ni// dang po ma mo dpon g.yog gi// gnad la baphrul ba'i sngags bzlas shing // ma mo bskul ba'i de la rjes 'greng// de nas ste
58b3(rnying rgyud): sngags ni// trag rag+na tsi ta dung ro ta ma ta sma ra ra ta b+h+yo// de skad bzlas pa'i spyir thun des// grong la brgyab kyang phung bar byed// nag mo 'bar ba'i thun drug 'dis// mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig pa la// g.yul ngo chen por brgyad kyang bzlog/ gzhan
58b4(rnying rgyud): dang sngags kyang bzlong// dgra dang bgegs la the tshomi med// yang ni bshad kyis brgya byin nyon// bstan pa gnyen po'i sku dgra la// ltas ngan bya nag dbab pa ste// dang po bya nag bzung byas la// bcu gnyis dbang gi rim pa bsrur// de nas bya la me mo dpa
58b5(rnying rgyud): phyi de mig rtsa rgod pa dang // skad 'byin gshog pa gdeng ba na// ma mo phyebs pa'i rtags yin pas// phyi dang nang gi mchod pa bya// phyag rgya dgu ni rab bstan la// dbang bskur dam tshig smin par bya// de nas ma mo bad+gal sngags bzlas// las la
58b6(rnying rgyud): bsgral pa'i dam rdzas bsgreg/ sngags de dIs bya de s+phar la gtang // au k+Sha rAg+ha shrA tsi ta kha rag ma tsit+ta tud tu dza sha yu tA ti b+h+yo/ re ma ti rAk+Sha si ru lu ru lu pr-i ma ma hA stau pra dung b+h+r-i/ ka ra ma sa ma ye b+h+yo b+h+yo b+ho zhes gtang ngo // des ni bya nag gang du smos par
58b7(rnying rgyud): coM'o// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i las kyi rgyud las las sos mi mo'i bye brag bstan pa'i po'u s+t+wa~M bcu drug // de na si m+b+ha'i dbang po brgya byin dus/ de la phyag na rdo rje la 'di da ces gsol to// kyi rig sngags gsang sngags
59a1(rnying rgyud): bdag po gsang dbang po// phyag na rdo rje thig le bstan pa bsrung ba yi don du// bdud rtsi 'chad bzhin mar me gsod pa yi// skyes bu chen po mnga' bdag bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa la/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lnga ban+d+ha tha ma
59a2(rnying rgyud): ni ltar dbar ba'atsho// nyams pa gsod pa'i sbyor ba bshad gyis nyon// dang ngo mkha' 'gro me l-I bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor bas// skabs su gsang pa'i las la 'jug pa ni// ngang la mtshan ma khebs pa'i bsnyen pa bya// gtor ma sbyin sreg sti ras bu bya/
59a3(rnying rgyud): khams rkang rjes d+hi chu swa shad la// gangal bya ba'i snying gar med// dug dang bdud rtsi'i gtor ma na du yul// de nas ma mo lag bdun dbang cid bsgrub// bskul bya gnang la dbab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg/ gnad la dbab cing las la bskal sngags
59a4(rnying rgyud): bzlas// ting 'dzin khrag 'thung bdud mo'i bar du ni// snying gi 'od zer dag gis drungs byas te// bdud rtsi drangs pa'i sbyor ba ston pa ni// gsal ba dngos grub ste log pa yis// gsang lcags bdud rtsi bdud mo'i zhal drungang // thugs kyi dgar dmar dad+ha
59a5(rnying rgyud): gur spro// bdag gi sbubs na thugs kyi dpal be'u rgyas// de nas mar me gsad pa'i ting 'dzin ni// bzhis bsdus dbus nas nA~M las 'od 'bar ba// bdag nyid bdud mo'i rang bzhin gsal ba la// spro ba'i rlung gis mar ma gting nas slar// bud pa'i rlu'i
59a6(rnying rgyud): gis mar me khad kyis gsang // 'dren pa'i rlung gis thig le'i rtse mor drang // dang pos bkrag shor gnyis pas sramA cha nyams// gsum pas phyed la bzhi pas sum gnyis med// lnga pas mun khang ltar gyur bdag la gsal// mar me bdud rtsi lo grangs bu
59a7(rnying rgyud): pon zug/ de nas dgra gzugs 'gru ling nig por gzhug// tam khrung dang du rtsang nang phrar zus bskor// nan mor zin pa lam 'bar me// ma 'dzod rgyal po skrag pa'i snying rje rkyen// khrag 'breng re mo ti yid mod pa ni// thag rag sha ri ma ti hU~M a bruka sr-i
59b1(rnying rgyud): klos par nas mngag so ma log sa pal bya// rag su b+ha ba ga ma / rag / sa pa/ bsu na// spyug tugs bu du b+ha/ ma gaganas / rgyag ma par ba d+hA / gsang grags dan gnyisas gdag/ lung ga
59b2(rnying rgyud): chen dag la sngags la gdib// 'gu ling dur khrod rnying pa'i gting du mnan// gang la bya ba de ni zhag bdun len// mkha'i 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las mang me bstan pa'i le'u skyeb rje 'dun pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dpal rgya
59b3(rnying rgyud): rdorje la 'di byung ces gas pa // ba pa can pa rdo rje 'byu // 'khong pa'i rgyun lam bcad pa dang // shes nus pa bskyed pa'i gyur// thig+sa mi ye shes pan ngag 'di// snying rjecan gyis pa shang drug so// zhes smras pa ma/ la rgyag nan blangs
59b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes rdo rje thig le ni// thun mong ma yin shes par dka'// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su bshad// don dam sems kyi snod
59b5(rnying rgyud): yul lo// kun rdzob las kyi phyag rgya dngos// rgyal rigs bu mo de la bsten// rang rig rtsal gyis rlung g.yos te// rlung gi thig le ye shes me// rdo rje gsang bas sa bon bskul// rtog med gsang ba'i thig le la// mi bskyod mnyam par sems gtad na// mor
59b6(rnying rgyud): me'i rtse mo lta bur brtan// gnas pa'i rtsa yi nam mkha' la// srog 'dren thig le bsgom pa'i tshe// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// bden gnyis byang chub don gsal nas// dang ba'i chu la gzugs brnyan bzhin// rgyal ba'i go 'phang rang la 'char//
59b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' 'bru ma yi rang bzhin 'grub// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ma ngon// mkhar 'gro ma ma lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las ye shes kyi thig le ba shang ba'i 'i gyi rjeb byung pa'o// / de nas snang dbang po po rgya byun ngas/ dpal phyag rdo rje la 'du
60a1(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// bgegs kyi gtso bo dbang phyug rje// 'gro bzugs rjes bskyang ba'i phyir// bcu drug rdo rje 'phrul gyi rgyud// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes zlas pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs kyi ma'i
60a2(rnying rgyud): mas can rnams// dang dang sprob bskyed pa'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul bcu drug bshad kyis nyon// dang po lha yi rnal 'byor la// drod dang mtshan ma thob par bya// de nas 'phrul la 'jug pa ni// a nu sa ti'i ril bu sbyar// ma bya khyung khrung ne tso sha// nyi dang spre'u dang b+hi la'i shA/
60a3(rnying rgyud): za mo khA ta ngang pa'i sha/ ne'u le so bya mthing ril sha/ de rnams skams pa'i phye ma dang // bil ba'i shing dang a ru ra// shing tsha sug smel rus sbal rus// ka ka ru dang me khyer srin// mi rus dang ni bag rgod khrag/ mi rgod sgra dang chu klag sgo// de rnams bsres la di la
60a4(rnying rgyud): bya// slang rgod dag gis mgo bsdus la// dur khrod thod pa'i ga'ur stsal// phyag na rdo rje'i snying po dang // ma mo'i srog snying bdun 'bum bzlas// bar bar bram ze'i me la bsro// de nas sgra yi ril bu la// 'od dang me stag 'phros tsam na// zangs sam lcags kyi
60a5(rnying rgyud): ma// sa rnam pa gyub// ga dang thag sa na // mi / / du ma ma gas/ b+ha nam nga/ ju
60a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i man la rngu basmras pangs// chu yi sbyang du 'gro bar byed// ma po d+ma 'grong po nagayog+sal// chang dang bya rgod sbyi sreg dbum// rim bu yan 'gru bzhi la bsgre// bdag ni nam mkha' dag la 'phur// rdo rjem par 'gro dag la// me sha'i mung khwa snyen
60a7(rnying rgyud): dbul// ril bu lci la myangs pa na// gr-I ba swa phyi dran par nus// ma mo dag dang mkha' 'gro la// mar dang ra khrag sprin sreg dbul// a pu si ti'i ril bu de// bud med gang gi dpral bar bsdus// de ni bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje nag mo chen mo la// chang dang
60b1(rnying rgyud): slang rgod sbyin sreg dbul// de nas ral bu mig la bsku// srid pa gsum ka dus gcig mthong // rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo la// mar dang khA ta'i sbyin phrag dbul// ril bu rkang pa'i mthil la bsgra// tan gcig dpag chad brgyang khrir phyin// rdorje lha mo nag ma
60b2(rnying rgyud): dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul// ril bu mchan khung gnyis bskus na// rang lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo // dpal ldan lha mo dpon g.yog la// 'bras dang bu ram sbyin sreg dbul// ril zla khod par 'thungs pa na// tshe lo stong ni thub par nges// dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo
60b3(rnying rgyud): 'bru dang mi khu'i sbyin sreg zus// deng bu lus la bkrol ba na// nor gyi gter la smad par 'gyur// de nas ba' 'gro ma la ni// ti la dang mi 'i sprin srog dngul// mthusi t+tang ris bu // mi ris raba'i khar bzlug nas// mamo'i sbyong pa 'thung pa
60b4(rnying rgyud): na// mi ro langs nas dngos grub ster// gser dang dngul du 'gyur yang rung // yang na de la ral gri sbyin// ci 'dod pho nya'i mngag gzhug byed// phrin las rnam bzhi gang bcol 'grub// rdo rje dpal ldan lha mo la// go ro tsa na'i sbyin sreg dbul// ral bu nad pa'i lus
60b5(rnying rgyud): la bsku// nad pa rnams ni 'tshe bar byed// yang ni rdo rje lha mo la// chang dang gi wang sbyin sreg dbul// ril bu bgyis pa lte bar bsku// sri bu dag ni 'tsho ba'o// rdo rje dpal ldan nag mo la// til mar ske tshe'i sbyin sreg dbul// ral bu me ru bsregs pa na// dgra /
60b6(rnying rgyud): thog dang ser ba 'bebs// rdo rje lha mo nag mo la// mar dang mu tig sbyin sreg dbul// ril bu dpral ba'i dbyings su bsku// rgyal po'i chad pa mi 'byung zhing // me dang chus kyang mi tshugs so// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma kun la// me tog bu ram sbyin sreg dbul/
60b7(rnying rgyud): ring bu lte bar bskus pa na// sbrul dang btsan gyis mi tshugs so// byad stems kyang ni bzlogs par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyu de las rdzu 'phrul bcu drug gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas/ lha'i dbang
61a1(rnying rgyud): sa n+d+ha / nan na nga/ bam ldan mganaganapa // sgragazung po gas na ldanas// thAbs dang shes ba spyad // / rmugs sa sa gsu su pa // da du/
61a2(rnying rgyud): dpasgyur ba'i gnas// sbyin brgyad kyis mtshang ci spyod// nyon mongs bdud las rnam par rgyal// phyag na rdon rdul rgyag 'tshul bstod// dpal lha mo la dag bcu sngon pa bskod pa/ ba byiran gyis bstad pa/ de nas dpal lham pa rtse mgron
61a3(rnying rgyud): da byu nga/ nganas ga pa na / brdzu blags/ na na su rjid pa/ skye'ang pal 'am// dang byag thas pa myig bldan pa// sa sa
61a4(rnying rgyud): cig ma // ma ma ti'i theg 'a bting / bdud la dbang gyur bdud mdapapa 'byurang ba// ti gzu ba sbyi to// nasu mo mya dgra gnas sdi ga babya// drang mdes te 'jug 'phrul brjod// bral dang byer bya
61a5(rnying rgyud): gan na rkyen zlum ma ngaste/ ma bdun gyiganas gcom ste// bu mar ma la phyag 'tshal bad/ pad sbyin dang gyur gad sbyin la 'bar ma/ gang byab dang pa'i bu gags danas
61a6(rnying rgyud): cig / nad sbyin rnye tI lajug 'ardol bstod/ bskyed pa'i 'as kyi zla ba ni// de nas dpal thug na rje sa/ nga gdon par sgri ba 'di na dkyi 'al to// sras mjig kha gying du phyub /
61a7(rnying rgyud): spyod ni seM dang nas ma spong // bgags dang gshin rjes mdang // shAbrag 'byung za dang // smon 'phrus tham bdu da pa ma// drug sang ba rnam 'byung gnang myed dang// nga se la por rnams pa nyan par gyig// pa'i nga na
61b1(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// ngas ni mtshan ma 'joms pa'i phyag rgya rnyed// ngas ni thun mong ston pa'i bdud las rgyal// ngas ni snying rjes 'gro kun dag la bkod// ngas ni thabs dang shes rab kun la byed// ngas ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gsang rgyad 'di// thun mong ma yin ma lha
61b2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ma 'di// ngo mtshar thabs mchog dngos grub dam pa'i gzhi// ngas ni bshad zin khyod la rab tu gtad// skal ldan dang dang brtson 'grus yod la gtad// snying rje gzhol zhing brtul zhugs che la gtad// bden gnyis don rtogs yi rangs brtan la
61b3(rnying rgyud): gtad// brnag pa'i gzungs thub stod ldan yongs la gtang // zung shig chongs shig snod ldan rnams la shod// 'di yi don rnams rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// 'dis ni mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po thob// 'dis ni chos kyi dbang phyug go 'phang thob//
61b4(rnying rgyud): 'dis ni yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba thob// 'dis ni ci 'dod thogs med dngos grub thob// blo dman shes chung nyan thos rnams la gsang // log pa'i mthar 'khyams mu stegs can la gsang // dmu rgod mi mkhas sbyar pa mkhan la gsang // dad med
61b5(rnying rgyud): snying rje spangs pa rnams la gsang // ma rig rmongs pa'i le lo can la gsang // zhes bka' stsal nas/ brgya byin gyis skyobos blangs so// 'khor la gtad pa'i le'u stany+tsi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la
61b6(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa ma khye'u 'gro ma lung bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal ba/ mkha' 'gro ma lha mo nag mo 'dis/ bskal ba mang po'i sden
61b7(rnying rgyud): yonas// dus gsum chal ba'i zhal mthang sa// dman pa'i zhing 'dir sprul smra yis// lha ma'i thul du smra bstan naso// 'gro ba'i don pa rab tu brtson// nyon mongs sgrub pa rab tu spangs// da ltar shes bya'i sgrub pa spyod// de ma khob mo hAt+ti//
62a1(rnying rgyud): sa gas du/ pa du ga // ga na sa
62a2(rnying rgyud): rlonam par rom byed// yang dgardzogs pa'i sangs nas sa// 'a dpa lnga 'a khya di// 'i skyes lung brta to// dag gas ga mar mate// gtan ci zhing 'ams de// bde ma byeng chub sa byas pa
62a3(rnying rgyud): na sa sa
62a4(rnying rgyud): srungasabyang gyi mo dag mi bas chu nga 'bab tsam la mtshan maud byu // pa dkar bang 'jig namatshon ra byung // dkon mchog dpa' bang rjod na mtshan char byung // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'angag na mngon par chu
62a5(rnying rgyud): 'ag tu srid nam chen byung / sa don pa / zlarlang pal sa ga la spya byas bklung nam shing gdams sa/ dang/ twe ma hA a na nAb+h+yan+tu/ bdag dang / 'dags
62a6(rnying rgyud): srung babang ba'i sbyin \u0f7fsa bya ba/ dkon mchog bsum pa phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zhus pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa/ da ba'i dgashegs pa sras dang lo bar du bcas pa rnams shes rab
62a7(rnying rgyud): mi'i dbyings rtag rnam par dag pa'i mkha' la bzhugs so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor mang tshogs rab tu mang po 'ang / na mngor rom cing bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma te sdung chen po dang / rdal 'byor mji ba'i rnga mo dang / rnapa
62b1(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma gshin rje'i rngo mo dang / rnal 'byor ma klu'i rje mo dang / rnal 'byor ma gnod byin gyi rnga mo dang / rnal 'byor ma drang srong garngo mo dang / rnal 'byor ma srin mngan mo dang / rlung sta rnga ma dang / dbang ldan pan mo dang / tizla'i rngo mo dang / sa bdag
62b2(rnying rgyud): rje mo dang / thams cad kyi rje mo dang / rnal 'byor ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo la sogs pa dang thabs cig go// gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma'i bdag mo dpal nag mo chen po la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i tshi gla du ma dang yang thab su cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag 'khor
62b3(rnying rgyud): gsog so so sde tshan mang pos gcig tu bskor te/ rngam par rol cing yongs su bstim nas bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos nag po'i gang gi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs sa// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mdus dpa' dag po chen
62b4(rnying rgyud): rang gi snyan pas langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po lag yas phyogs nas la nab rgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ dam pa'i chos zhu 'a'i cho ga byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 'jug ste/ 'di na 'thos gsol \u0f7f// bcom ldan 'a
62b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus na he sdung chen mo'i mthus/ kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba'i dus mchis te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni 'dul ba nyung / 'phags pa he sbud chen mo'i rnam par sprul nas 'dul ba ni shin tu yang mang bar mchis te/ de'i dus
62b6(rnying rgyud): na sems can dag te phud chen mo la la la ni blta/ la pas ni mthong / la las ni mi mthong / la las ni dag par mthong / la las ni ma dge par mthong / la las ni mchod/ la las ni tshul dang mi yin par mchod/ thams cad tshul dang mthun pa me yin par/
62b7(rnying rgyud): las kyis/ ha skad kyi 'khor gtum pa rnams shin tu mi dga' zhing khros tshe 'jig rten du yang dus ma yin pa'i bar chod mang du btang bas sems can rnams nyams dman pa dang rtsi pa'i dus mchis pas/ de dag pa ban gdags pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gsheg pa thams
63a1(rnying rgyud): cad mkhyen pas/ ha spang chan ma la bar dang bcas pa dga' bar gyur na grub pa chen po lags pas/ ha thung rgan ma la bar dang bcas pa dga' bar babya 'don bstan dragasal/ zhes gsal ba btab nga// da
63a2(rnying rgyud): dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nag po chen po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na he srung chen mo dga' ba ma yin pa las/ sems can rnams byang chub kyi dmigs pa'i lam dang bral bar/ mun sbal dang bar kha' las
63a3(rnying rgyud): la 'gran dor gyis ston par 'gyur te/ de'i rkyen gyis he srud kyi 'khor rab tu mi bsrungs pa rnams cher 'khrug par gyur rngam par gyur/ drag po'i mthu che bar gyur/ thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten du dus ma yin pa'i gnod pa dus ma yin pa'i rkyed ces
63a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba nyi ma zag par 'gyur bas/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i don gyis khyod de lte bu zhus pa legs so legs so// ri phyi rangs khyod la legs par bstan nyon la yid la zung zhig ces gsungs so// 'phags pa te sdang chen mo dga' bar byed pa/
63a5(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos te sbrad chen mo dga' bar byed pa zhes zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dadi skad rjes ba sungs so// chos rnams kun gyirang bzhin ni// @
63a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i thig le las// 'gro ba mtha' dag rtog pa yis// btags pa'i chos ni rtser yang snang // bde bar gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni// byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul men// so sa rang rig ting 'dzin gyis// rnam dag chos spu thob pa'i tshe// 'khrub pa
63a7(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ji bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa'i cha 'phrul ni// chu klung nam mkha' sogs dngas rmongs// 'gro ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// mo gsham bu bzhin kun tu brtags// tha ma tha ma'i dus rnams la// tha mtha ma' sems can rnams// tha maH/
63b1(rnying rgyud): nga la mchis// tham pa ma' 'bras byu bshad// sad pa dgag pa chad ma yang // d+ha r+thag mas ma dzod de// mangs pa rtag bzhin// yadang na bzhag dang ngas// mi gas las rnams tsam pa'o// ba.A ma nga sangs yang
63b2(rnying rgyud): mig gis mthong ba'i spyod lam dang // de bzhin shes rab dbang pos kyang // gsal zhing mthong ba'i man ngag bral// brtags pa'i sgo gsum mdzes pas kyang // ji bzhin kyang ba'i stobs med par// zo 'tshams la ni ston pa dang / phyogs gsag
63b3(rnying rgyud): pa yis// he srung dga' ba ma yin pas// 'khor rnams kyis cang gnod pa ston// lo tog rnams la dus med par// bcud dang kha dog bsad pa ltar// thams cad nyams par gyur pa ste// de dag dus la khungs dbyin no// dper ma bzas
63b4(rnying rgyud): mchog ni// du ma'i nang du bcud zad dag/ chung yang thams cad phung ba ltar// sbyor ba nyams pa gcig gis kyang // dngos po mang po rlag par 'gyur// las mthun mang pos dpag tu med// mtshan rnams rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin no// gang
63b5(rnying rgyud): gis mtshan gyis bsdus pa'i las// de dag rnam pa 'dir bshad bya// lha mo zhes bya'i mtshan nyid ni// dus gsum kun tu zhi ba'i mtshan// dpal chen mo zhes bya ba ni// dus gsum kun tu rgal ba'i mtshan// chen mor grags pa'i mtshad gra
63b6(rnying rgyud): pa// yon tan sprul pa gsang ba'i ming // byin brlab dbang bskur smon lam mo// dga' bar byed pa'i spar bas ni// gang gi phun sum tshogs pa rnams// bum pa nang gi lag pa dang // dpag bsam shing la phreng ba 'am// ngag na
63b7(rnying rgyud): rin chen lta bu ste// nyi ma sprin las byung ba bzhin// gang gis te srung dga' mi byed// cung zad yon tan srid pa yang // dus kyi sems can ji bzhin du// srog dang 'byor pa de bzhin no// 'phags ma he sdang dga' bar byed pa'i rgyud
64a1(rnying rgyud): da na mas na // sa su snyams / pa man na// spyan nga das
64a2(rnying rgyud): kyi nang bshags pa gzhung du ltogs// maN+Dal byi dor legs byas la// thig dang chag chag la sogs pa// spyi yi las kun 'dra bar bya'o// mthing nag gru gsum bya ba yi// zur la logs bstad thaMd pa'i ra// lce mthar lde ri bzas
64a3(rnying rgyud): par bri// dbus su nag po raM ma ti// de mtha' gsum du re ma tri'i// skul pa sku gsung thugs kyi'o// de mtha' nag mo dbum gyi 'khor// phur pa gsum dang dbus dang bzhi// de mthar 'khor gyi ma mo dgod// snying po bris shing gdags
64a4(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// bya lug thugs dam bskang rten gzhag/ gtor ma sha khrag spyi gzhung stegs// ra khyi mi rta bzhi snying gzhag/ dpal gtor rten ni bcas la gzhag/ nang nub nyin mtshan bzhi la gzhag/ 'dzab dang snying po rgyun du gtang // bstod bskul pa
64a5(rnying rgyud): sogs thang re bya// de ltar rtag tu byas pa dang // rnal dgyod pa de gtsangs dang // lha mo nyid kyang dkar mor byon// 'bring nad mngal tha mnag/ gang ltar byas kyang gyon par nges// 'bring dang tha ma bshags shing bskang // ting 'dzin gang mos lha gsal
64a6(rnying rgyud): zlab gces// gang gsal bsgom pa'i thugs ka nas// nyi ma'i gdan nas shing phro 'dus// lha mo nyid kyi sku bskyed pa'o// tad+ha drA thAg shag gra ru nan/ mug ste thaM mA mA ru ru dza dza ru lu rul byo/ zhes bskyed/ mthing nag gcer bu rde'u rta rkang gsam zhon/
64a7(rnying rgyud): zhing lpags pa sogs rgyan dang ldan// gsod byed phyag na ba me 'bar// mi gnas khrag 'dzag sna nas dud pa 'thul// snyan nas 'brug rmogs sngags nas klog dgru ma// lus las 'od 'gro kha rlangs nad gtong ba'o// sprul pa khrag gi ral can steng gsum
64b1(rnying rgyud): khengs par 'byed// de lha'i sku bo nas bskyed pa// bab+ba te gyur ma taHSh+ThaHA nga ma b+ha/ zhes pas gyud dad par nag ras ldanag pa gsul/ rba ba gan nas gang bzhin pasam pa gyul// gsung las sprus pa 'ad ltar// da nga
64b2(rnying rgyud): byed dun teng byo// zhes pas ser nag rma bya'i la'u gsol// yu chung sha ba bcibs pa gong dang 'dra'o// thugs las bskyed pa 'di nyid do// oM u te dur du ru tshal pa me dza dza las la b+ho// ldang nag dar nag thal ba gsol// rnga mo 'dab de 'ang ngo //
64b3(rnying rgyud): snyi pos spyan drang ba'o// ma mnag mo b+h+yo// nag mo dran ting nyid ma las la dran du na dzarje/ nag mo ha hor rtse// nagu mo nywan thar to// nag mo dran ting te ste// nag mo pa sha dgra po'i sha lang ngo / nag mo dag po'i skar yangadza dza/ nag mo gzo 'artse la dza
64b4(rnying rgyud): nag mo dgra bo'i srog la dza dza/ nag mo dgra bo'i dbugs la dza dzA/ nag mo dgra bo'i snying la hur hu ra dza / thad pa 'di kho na'o// mA b+h+yo dza mA dz+yo dza/ nag mo ba ri li/ nag mo sha la ri le li/ nag me khrag la ri lo li/ nag mo rtsa lA ri li li/ nag mo ti
64b5(rnying rgyud): la ri li li/ nag mo srog pa ri li li/ ba ma ri li li dza N+yo// au dza dza re ma ti pa sha tsa la dza dza/ snying rgyud rtsa la dza dza/ rbud srog la dza / sha rgyud snying la dza dza/ skyeng rgyud dbugs la dzad/ ngo dza nga ma ti pa sha tsa pa la dza dze/ dgra bo'i snying la d+ha d+ha/ nga stod
64b6(rnying rgyud): bskul mtshang 'bru gzhung ltar ro// srog la gcod pa'i stong po'o// mched bzhi zer yang ma yin te// ma mo kun gyi las mkhan ma// re ma ti zhes bya bar grags// de yi las mkhan ma mo gsum// sku gsung thugs las sprul par byung // ma nyid kA las
64b7(rnying rgyud): babyed pa yin// gsum pa ru las bskyed pa ste// srin mo yin phyir ru las bskyed// ming yang de las zang btags par// gsod pa mo dang 'gugs pa mo// stob byed ma dang gsum du bstan// 'dzugs byed ma ni rdeg pa yin// 'dzum med ma ni
65a1(rnying rgyud): 'grags pa yan// tham byu na m+b+ha ba yin// gcod ca sa da pa sbyin// gan/ ldan grangam brtan gas su la// dani sgra sngags 'di lta shAts+tsha/ \u0f7f/ ma ga Sh+Ti mAr+d+hamAn// dngas las bsung nga/
65a2(rnying rgyud): blon// ma mo kun gyi gtsom ste// dam la gnas pa'i sring mo yin// yid la gzhungs pa'i grogs mo yin// sras la bskyed pa'i bu mo yin// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i rgyal mo yin// gling bu bsgrub pa'i blon mo yin// las la gshin pa'i zed
65a3(rnying rgyud): mo yin// ma mo thun gyi bdag mo yin// dam tshig can gyis bskul ba'i tshe// 'gro ba'i tshe srog srid gsum la khrums// da ni nam mkha'i grang la bab// da ni chu bo'i gzhung la bab// dgra srog kha ga nas byung la shog/ ma gling chen mo badz+ra che/
65a4(rnying rgyud): dmag dpung bskyed la bdud dpung tshoms// ru mtshon gyor la bgegs dpung tshoms// dam la gnas pa'i masring tshogs// ming po rdo rje bdag 'bod tshe// bdud ci sman gyis g.yab 'dor na// ming po'i ltangs ma 'dzin du skyon// bdud phreng gting
65a5(rnying rgyud): nas g.yos pa'i tshe// ci la yang ni rtags byin yang // rnal dbyor dgra la rtags ma byin// ma sring che mo dgral chem// ma srid khrol khrol dgra la khrol// ces bskul lo// de ltar gdung zhing gtong ma gtang // rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bya/
65a6(rnying rgyud): gtor ma rtag par sbyin par bya// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bya// gzhu bdungs 'dra ba'i ba dan gyur// raM las me yi maN+Dal bya// gru gsum me res mtshan pa'o// paM las pad+ma'i b+han d+ha ru// rngas lnga'i steng du lcags kyu lbu bsam ste// de steng oM AH
65a7(rnying rgyud): hU~MswA hA bas ma// lcags grus bcug nas rjes lnga 'od zhu nas// 'bru lngas 'gro 'dus rdzas lnga 'od zhunas// bdud rtsi'i gong bu gcig tu gyur par bsam// mdun du lha mo lcags kyus dgug/ mdun du gnas bsam pa 'i dbul// oM dr-i du dag
65b1(rnying rgyud): gas yul lam yang ma mdung ming yagadus dang / ma ma thus mamyong ba bye b+he ya thASh+Tani mi dam pa la ga ShA/ bras hru ts+tsha pa pa ti ma sa nyam thA hA thA/ rnaMs mal ShAH/ zhes gtar ma dpral/ dras drag na
65b2(rnying rgyud): gtang bar bya'o// ga sbar zhag/ 'phags ma te srud dga' bar byed pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor rdzas dang sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de ltar bskyabs shing brub khung thun bya ste// lin mtshan nyid gzhung dang mkhyen pa
65b3(rnying rgyud): bskyal zhing brdeg pa dang gsad pa'i las bya'o// rang nyid bdud kyi bu mor bsam/ spyi bor sla bcings gdong pa khrag gis bskus/ bdud kyi phra mo nyid bskul ba 'di skad do// d+ho d+ho/ ma bdud kun gyi gtso mo ste// nag mo chen rde'u zhan
65b4(rnying rgyud): khyod ni ma bdud rgyal mo ste// khams gsum srid gsum zas sra za// khams gsum srid gsum skom du 'thung // des nyams sha khrag zas skyo ma yin// dpal gyi bka' las ma 'da' bar// dam nyams snying nas drangs shig 'a
65b5(rnying rgyud): AM ku sha dzaH/ pA sha trUM/ s+pho Ta baM/ g+han+te hoH// thag sha dgra bo ni dzaH/ nag mo hA ra hur ni che ge mo ni lus lus che ge mo nidzadzaH// dpal ldan nag mo re ma nyi// skye 'gro kun gyi srog gcod ma// gnas ni khrag gi mtsho la gnas// mthong snga
65b6(rnying rgyud): ban+d+ha mkhar na bzhugs// sgra la re lde nag po gsol// khrag gi ral po hi li li// ral pa dmar po'i sgra gseb na// zhe sdang me stag za rar// dpral ba'i dbyings na mig gcig gis// khams gsum mI mdzod gcig kyang med//
65b7(rnying rgyud): dgra bo gang yin rtags la bob// sman mig bzlog pa'i rje ma la// lcags kyi tsha tsha skar ltar 'khrug/ dam nyams snying nas drongs shing khrag/ sA ni dri rnams sdom byang ste// dam nyams rje dag tshor ba na// dpag tshad brgyang khri bzhi gang yang //
66a1(rnying rgyud): kyis sa // 'dun rnam na gas sa/ / // da nyas na da// sa mag gnas na// /
66a2(rnying rgyud): tshor grangs kyi gsos mdzad ma// g.yas ni rkang yang nag pa yis// dmanyams ca nas gcod par mad// g.yon na thul ce gsum tsas// sing gsum dgras thal par rdzogs// khrig gi phyogs kyu byung ba yis// dkang nag marnams
66a3(rnying rgyud): rdzongs shig / khrug/ dmanyams kyad nas gcod par mdzad// nad kyi rnal pa sngon dmar gyis// dam nyams dgral nadaka rjong // yu la bus pa'i spyod pas bstan// lcags kyi 'i Ta rta dang gsum bcings// tshon gyi gra gus cad btags// khyam pas
66a4(rnying rgyud): mang pa N+DI shad btags// mtshanan r+dz+dza zhags dmar po bldog/ N+ya ni num gyi gung la rgya// 'khor ni bdud mo 'brum gyis bskor// bdud ni mi lcags kun gyi bdud// mtshan nas bu mug grol la shog/ ma ma hA ga ra k+sha phaT+Ta// che ge mo ni dza m+bA ra yan
66a5(rnying rgyud): sgyid kha rag ma d+h+yaH/ che sa mi ni'i snar ya ni / nyid kha dag ni // dpal ldan nag mo de ma ti// rjo gi brgya // thad med pa 'i tshul ba byas ma khyab// nad dang mabyis pa sna tshogs gto// b+ho/ dpal
66a6(rnying rgyud): ldan na/ mi de mati// snod kyi kham sa ma / thad med dam po'i sbrul/ khabasam rma thal// khrag na rgyang khyod sa tshogs gtong // / de la lan dag mo de te// khyod kyi rla sa sngon po btad pa'i tshe// bud med sngon ma'i rdul
66a7(rnying rgyud): bas ma mi ma// dkyis drug mig slon tshogs gar// / dpal ldan nag ma // khyod kyi bzungs sdug pa // drang me mug mo'i ga pang sa mi zag/ 'brang nang shi ma sna tshogs gtad// / dpal
66b1(rnying rgyud): khyod kyi kha rlangs nag po btang ba'i tsha// bud med nag mo'i sprul pa bsam mi/ khyab// bal na srong brag dazang kyog pa sku tshogs gtong // D+ha/ sku yi grul pa re ma kI// 'jig rten kham gyi dpal ma brtson// bzhugs ni rnam mkha' cil na
66b2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// rgyab phyogs bcud rgyu mdzad ma// ngal pa ser pos stong gsum khengs// srin mo re bshal chen mo'i gzugs// chu ris ag tsho ma ser nag la// mi rus phreng ba glad la bskor// glang chen po/ blon skul gsol// gcanas
66b3(rnying rgyud): stag gi sham thabs can// g.yas kyi lcags mdung dmar po 'bar ba yis// nyams pa'i dgra la gdab par bya'o// b+h+yo/ gsung las sprul pa'i de mdza// bar snang khams kyi bdem// dmar nag mi srun mche ba can// ral ba g.yas nas gsod
66b4(rnying rgyud): du 'khyil// sdang mig dgral 'bru tshugs blta// mche ba zla tshes gtsigs pa yis// nag po shal chem che ma za// sdang mig dmar zlog dgra bo 'dul// mi lpags rlon pa sprul gsol// smyug ma'i ro ldes sku smad dkris// bus pa'i thod pa
66b5(rnying rgyud): byas// srul nag stong gi ske rags can// mdung thung zla med rgya mtshon gyis// dgra bo'i snying la gzer bar byed// nad kyi rgyal ba kha thong la// dgagra la nad ka da la ka phob// glog dmar zhon la lcags brdabs te// dam nyams khug la snying nas d+hangs
66b6(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo/ thugs las srul pa'i re mdza// 'jig rten khams kyi glog ma srin// sde skya mi srun mche ba can// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// gti mug mun nag tshubs mnga' tshu bas// ral gseb me stag cho tsha 'phro// rnod bal mche ba ga
66b7(rnying rgyud): pa yis// dam nyi mas snying rtsa gcod mdzod ma// chu dang khro bo sbrul gsol// rin chen sna lnga'i dbu rgyan can// thod skam phreng ba dbu yi zod// rdo rje 'bar ba rtse dgu bsdams// dmanyams dgra bo rdul du rdzogs// khrag skam ljags kyu re/
67a1(rnying rgyud): dusmra / na sa// na na na/ na du chu
67a2(rnying rgyud): pa rtog ci / klu da/ sa ma sags de da bar byed pa'i klung las zug sung thugs ba skye zhi / nga pa
67a3(rnying rgyud): ga rjod tu dza tsan khyim pa 'gas r+b+bahU~M// ba rdzas 'byur bdag/ ma bangs papa'i skye na/ ng+ya sa mas la gam // mazhes rnas kyis 'dzin
67a4(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i tshigs sa / na pa sadang / sh+le/ sh+'u / ma ga/ ga gamazhis 'ang/ gas nam mtha' bang /
67a5(rnying rgyud): kyi sa / ba byas pa /
67a6(rnying rgyud): pa gas su pa / gas sbyi / na bdag pa mas du sa lung dag/ dugs gsas bstsu ba / mdzad ladangs bad na/ nga meng ma
67a7(rnying rgyud): na 'angs sum na/ rgya ba pa ga sa/ gzugs dang 'i dang sheg su 'dus na rgyag brgya nga/ ma /
67b1(rnying rgyud): dbang 'dus bzang po yin// nag mo ral bsnyil mdog mi sdug/ brtson ma jo mo chung mar 'ong // gcan gzan rdzus dang phyag 'dod pa// grub kyang dbang du ma 'dus te/ lta ba'i thabs bskyed/ nang 'bab mtshan cha mang ba dang / hA/
67b2(rnying rgyud): tog mang po bya nag 'thab pa dang // khrag gi na bun stug po 'phrul// ma mo 'khrugasA tI khrag bskang dgos// lho bkres g.yal dang du snying 'dod// stu chub ston cing dbang rtags ston pa dang // dud pa mang po lhag pa dang // je na sa dus las yol
67b3(rnying rgyud): bas bskang ba mang po bya// legs nyes ji ltar byung yang khor cag gyon pa yin// de yi phyir na gzabs la bya'o// las byed du mi 'dod cing drag pa'i las bya na/ he sbud kyi nang gi mchod mkhan skabs su thong / gduH b+huH khA/ rtags kyi le'u ste rdza
67b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / thog mda' nag po'i las 'jug 'phang ba la// gang mos bsam pa 'dir ma smos// thod pa nag po tsheg tsher byug/ khrag chen dag gis byug par bya// nang bskang sngags bzlas pho nya gtong // ne tshen bun 'dzin du
67b5(rnying rgyud): shed// sngags de bzlas pa'i thod pa la// ma mo 'khor lo dI da gdong ma// dre'u'i lus la mdog nag po// so ni ral gri gtams pa 'dra// sngags bzlas bskul ba 'di dag go// dz+haiM/ srid pa gsum gyi gtso mo la// khams gsum khyab par
67b6(rnying rgyud): gsod byed mo// 'khor lo chen mo dre'u gdong ma// mig ni skar chen rdol ba'ang // brang ni chu srin gtams pa 'dra// dre'u skad mkha' la btang bas kyang // srid pa'i rtse mo tshangs pa yang // thal ba bzhin du gtong bar byed// ze'u spangs la btang
67b7(rnying rgyud): bas kyang // rgya mtsho'i gting gi klu rnams kyang // dre'u srung 'byin zhing zhal la blta// rje'i mgo mkha' la brdabs pa yis// ri rab rtse nas skyil zhing lha rnams thal bar rlog/ dre'u mgos la brdabs pa yis// rgya mcho ga ting skam dun
68a1(rnying rgyud): zung la 'byin// je Ta gdang ma yi ngas la bab// ces bskul lo// thod pa klad la bskor la sngags 'di bzlam sa// kha lu kha lAng zlakhal nan ten nad/ shAblangab pa/ sma sa la nan nang /
68a2(rnying rgyud): le'i/ thod pa de ltar 'phar ba yin// mda' thun brdeg pa 'di yin te// khyer ba mi bsad khyi bsad la// spyi bzhur rtse mos ltong byas te// 'ug pa bya rgod gong rus gnyis// khyi rgya bo'i snying khrag sbyin gyis sbyar// re khri'i chu sres
68a3(rnying rgyud): rgyud du byas// ming rus gzugs bcas snying ga rgya// mde'u rtse gtad la sngags 'di bzlas// hUM tsa pa la thun kha/ khrag la thun kha/ khrag ya ma yam/ pho nya gtong ngo // yul phyogs su 'phang bar bya// gzugs byas snying gar brdeg par bya/
68a4(rnying rgyud): hUM/ khams gsum sgrol byed chen mo yis// lho yi phyogs su zhabs brkyang bas// zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor nyed las kyang // mi bzang 'bar ba'i su phyung ste// su ni sngo sgra chen mo la// zhal lda ma la phyag bcu ste// dkar dang ljang du rung ga ste//
68a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i zhal lngar bstan pa ste// g.yas kyi phyag rgya lnga byung ste// khro bo bcu yang gsod pa snyam// g.yon gyi phyag rgya lnga byung ba// khro mo brgya yi snying yang gzer// rgol ba ngan pa smos ci dgos// zhal nas khrag gi ral gri 'byung // phru ni mthing nag ral
68a6(rnying rgyud): pa can// ral pa'i zar bu re re la// mchong gi spyang mo 'bum 'bum 'byung // srid pa'i lha 'dre kun/ thugs dam dus la bab/ ke'u ri ke'u ra~M/ 'bum bzlas/ 'grol/ de nas grol na 'di bzlas so// ti ma ti ma kha/ byas te brdeg/ gsul la ba snyen
68a7(rnying rgyud): pa rdzogs par bya'o// ga ma ra tha/ thun gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / khrag thun brdeg pa 'di yin te// thod pa nag por ling+ga gzhug/ hUM rgya mtsho mer ba'i gting du ma nas// khrag gi btsun mo chen mo ni// lag na zangs kyi gzha bdu
68b1(rnying rgyud): nas/ khrag gi mda' 'phen tA la la// dgra bgegs gdug pa'i snying dum d+ha// khrag mda' dmar po brengs se breng // ya ma dam sri ngan pa la// khrag gi dpal la gdab 'tshal lo// khrag dug dpal gyis bsad 'tshal lo// khrag dug
68b2(rnying rgyud): gis li ng+gal gdab bo// mkha khyim la brdeg go// ma mthag snying khaM rag b+h+yo// b+h+yas la brdeg go// sngags srir yang bzlas so// khrag mda'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / thal ba rdzas kun klu la gtad pa ni// chu mgro byung ba
68b3(rnying rgyud): par gtad// klu 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin duzla// gru gtor gzhung bzhin du gtong ba gces/ nA ga NA tsa'i sngags dag bzlas// dgra bo ming rus gtor ma rags la// klu gnyan khyod kyis sngon ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du dam nyams pa 'di bzhes shig
68b4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa zhes sam bka' bcug na/ be ta li ta ya grI ba dang bya khyung gdu rdzas klu'i rgyal khams phrang bar 'ong ngo // gla'i gtor ma 'di la byung bar las kyis shig/ ces byas la gtang pa'i las 'o// ga mtha ma/ klu la gtang pa'i lerje ste dag pa'o//
68b5(rnying rgyud): bcan la gtang ba 'di bzhin 'o// rten na na ngas/ b+hi sa N+Di ma dpangal dadu dzam/ ces phyag 'tshal ma/ tsa khyod 'dras po 'di gtad // a b+he brang ma ti shang bris ma sa trA~M phaT/ 'di ba zhes skye gsum/ tshon dkyis bcangs pa
68b6(rnying rgyud): che sar munan no// dang po gru ba rtags phebs pa dang thun rnams myur bar brdeg go// phur thun khrag thun nyung thun zan blun thod thun sbyin bsreg gi rim pa bya/ tha ma k+Sha btsan dag la gtad/ ma ma thag rakle ru lA drA lu/ re ma ti tri ru ti ru ti snying kha rag rag mo tsa tsa modza/
68b7(rnying rgyud): bcu rnaM// nan / sa mabs ma/ da nga ma 'dzul la/ dag grog ma tsug ma ma// ma gyi// dngangs /
69a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ rag sam na mran na ngag mi dag ma sbrul bathanamatsam/ bral grolas ma brdungs/ mkhas la 'o// ma tha thal nanags // taN thA ba / dam+b+ha don/ pas ti badru dang /
69a2(rnying rgyud): shwag se/ i dan d+hu pa s+'ul+la ba/ shI ShAn kha khA ti/ thI di bI ma hA ka wI khA ti/ ma hA rag mo ya g+ha nag mo khA ti/ ma rag mo dran te ShA ti/ ma ma re ma ti ra ga ti da ma la ShA ti/ mang ma ti man+ta rag mo khA hi/ ma rag mo khrag la ma sha ma~Mk+Shati/ ma bsug
69a3(rnying rgyud): gr-iSh+ThaShA te/ ma mnag mo de wa tri ba~Mt+ta khA ti/ thi mo shu shu shwa shi nag mo khA ti/ dza dza ri ma ti pa shats+tsha pa la dza dze nag mo dag po'i snying la thu ma ri la chud / nag mo khra ba 'thog la ba ma ri la zad/ nug mo gra bo 'artsal ba ma ril zad / nag mo pa po'i dbugs la ba ma la
69a4(rnying rgyud): ri ma ti pA sha tsa pa lA dag po mAr ya bla ma ril zang / nag mo no// ga mo kyo// lcag mo b+ho// rig mo b+ho// mA'o ma'o ma'o ma'o// rag mo ta kram ts+tsha \u0f7f// yag mo sod cig rnang rnga b+h+yo// ma ma ngag mo rgyaH// nag mo ri ma ti b+ho// nag mo de ma ti b+ho// nag sa ma // sa pa
69a5(rnying rgyud): dgra po'i shal to// dgra po'i snying la s+ho// dgra bo'i rdul gyi// dgra bo'i khrag la s+ho// byas la thod pa'i khrag thun 'phang ngo // spyir bslab pa thun gyi lce'u ste bcwa gcig pa'o// / ye shes kyi ma mo brgyad dang / las kyi ma mo btud dang / @
69a6(rnying rgyud): nag mo sa ma ya 'bum sde la sogs pa rnams la/ rgyud 'di zung zhig chongs shig/ phyi rabs kyi bstan pa spangs shig/ 'khor rnams kyis rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod pa 'di lta bu'i don yang dag par bstan pa/ bstan pa bsrung bar bgyi'o// bskang bar
69a7(rnying rgyud): bkye'o// zhes gsungs nas mngon par bstod do// re ma ti mthong ba ni phrin las kyi gyang rdzogs s+ho// i ti// rgyag skad du/ TI k+Shi ma hA karma ta tra tri sa mA dza nA ma tan+ta/ bod skad du/ las kyi mkha' 'gro mdo khon nyid
69b1(rnying rgyud): gang su ngas pa zhes bya bya'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dpal laphyag 'tshal ma// 'di gang bdag gas byas pa sa gnagan/ ba shA 'a dru mabyung shar ba ma mas shAng mangs 'da' tshal chan pas/ nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sru dngag
69b2(rnying rgyud): dang thugs kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la/ 'khor lha ma sen sde brgyad la sogs pa/ mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis phyi nang gsang ba'i
69b3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa phul nas/ kArba DA kIs 'di skad zhus so// stobs chen drag po 'joms mdzad rdo rje can// bcud kyis bsdus pa'i 'gro ba bdag la sogs// bstan pa 'di la skye bco ltar smin// ye shes skul bas rang rgyad grub pa mo// de bzhin dregs dang nges tshig
69b4(rnying rgyud): ce ltar lags// khyed kyis dki' stsol bdag cag nyan par 'tshal// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rjes pad+ma'i gdan las bzhengs te bka' stsal pa/ 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol du/ bcud ni bskal pa'i rnam pa'i grangs kyis 'gyul/ lus
69b5(rnying rgyud): med shes pa chang spang bzhin du gnas// 'jig chags gnyis kyis stongs nas bsal pa las// dus gcig tsha thang rlung 'thabs 'bras bur smin/ de min spyi mthun las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// lus la blta bas mi ngoms spyan gsum ma// mche gtsigs
69b6(rnying rgyud): gcid rod chags pa'i gdung ba g.yos// phyag gis d+ha gu bskrad pa rlung gis bskyod// 'byung bzhi 'dus pa lha dang rkyen du 'phrad// 'go drug ma bu til gang bzhin du srin// de min 'byung ba 'dus pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// yum chen mo las brdzus te skyes pa
69b7(rnying rgyud): dbugs dang rjod dang khrag dang shadus las// rlung gi rgyal mo 'jig rten 'degs byed ma// drod kyi rgyal mo 'jig rten sreg byed ma// rlan gyi rgyal mo 'jig rten srung byed ma// sa yi rgyal mos 'jig rten rten par byed// 'jig rten kun khyab rgya ba'i rang bzhin las
70a1(rnying rgyud): spyi mthun srid pa chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'ag de rnams nus pa'i mtha skyes pas// 'od kyis so so'i 'jig rten gang bar gyur// sa so'i nas mthus 'jig rten dbang du 'dod// 'byung ba mi mthun rigs lnga'i ngo bo 'as/
70a2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i yum gyis 'byung ba cha snyoms te// 'jig rten rgyu ba'i rang bzhin las// srid pa cha snyoms byed mkhan mkha' 'gro ma// gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams kyis// so so rang gi lus las mkha' 'gro ma// rang lus 'dzin pa rtsi thog bzhin du skyes//
70a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med mkha' 'gro ma// zhal dang mig dang rna ba las ni skyes// ma rgyud thams cad mngal nas rab tu skyes// bdud dang ga shin rje srin po dbugs las skyes// bgegs rigs stong phrag drug cu brdzus las skyes//
70a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma de rnams kyi lus la yang // skyes pa mang zhing srid pa 'di lta ste// lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro ma// srin po sha za gshin rje mkha' 'gro ma// dri za mkha' lding mi'am ci mkha' 'gro ma// lto 'phye drang srong srog gi mkha' 'gro
70a5(rnying rgyud): ma// bdud dang drad khrod mi yi mkha' 'gro ma// byol stong yi hwags dmyal ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// las dang rab tu dmyal ba la sogs te// mkha' 'gro ma rigs thams cad gcig la gcig/ yid du mi 'ong khro zhing 'khrug pa ni// spyi mthun so so'i
70a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi dbang nyid kyis// nying sha nying khrag pags pa srog la spyod// 'jigs skrag 'dod pa la sogs tha dad pas// la la 'phos la 'dod cing 'tshol ba dang // gab gsod sha za khrag 'thung 'o dod 'dod// mi bzod dub mgo lus thang la rdo ba// cal
70a7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa rgod cing 'al mo rdeb// mi mthun mgo brtan lus ni sna tshogs te// mi lus bya gshog mig gsum sder mo can// mche ba rwa can lus gcig mgo mang dang // mdzes 'ong 'bar ba mi sdug sna tshogs rnams// sdug bsngal mang po'i tshogs
70b1(rnying rgyud): kyis gangs la// sa pas thu bangam 'a gas/ gzhan 'as 'dag sa shing mthanal che ba las// mag jug pa la da cig par mdza pas/ datshogs da 'a nga'am gas gcog dang// rdzum thun las kyim dang /
70b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma nyid pa// khya ba'i tshig ni 'di skad rjes gsol to// kha dog dbyibs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// bad+mag cag las drang rgya 'bras ni// gang yin rigs dang rigs kyi gtso mo gang // yul dang las dang zas dang skal ba gang // zhes gsol to//
70b3(rnying rgyud): yul chen mo de shin tu cha gus pas gdung ba'i sems g.yos par gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu sbyor ba'i grogs gcig bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu stag gi lo'i dpyid rngang ba la/ 'jig rten yum gcig ming dgra'i rmi lam du/ mi nag lus phongs ring
70b4(rnying rgyud): tsam// dbu gsum mdzes pa'i phyag drug gshog par ldan// 'jigs pa'i ngangos lag pas rabardabs pas// mkha'i 'gro'i tshogs rnams brtsalnga zhing snying khrag sngags// sangs nas mgo bcad 'jigs pa'i tshe rnga mnga' das// 'des
70b5(rnying rgyud): chags pa na dron gsum spyang pA rdzis// lhums bde dreg nas de phyi de lo dus su// srin po ldum rdul gnyis skyes par gyur te/ dral po rmil ma dang ni mthun par gyis// de nas ral nga la ru lu ru lu n+yo g+ho'i sde byung bas/ mA bAng 'gro ma thams
70b6(rnying rgyud): shi phyilo rlung gis blangs pa bzhin du 'dus te dbang phyug chen po lnga madral bdag cag gi gtso brag gyi ma mdzod ci gnas gsol ba btang ngo // de nas mkha' 'gro ma rigs thams cad kyis/ dpung dang ni mthong rdo rangs mdzod // nyi'i tshig stong res mcho
70b7(rnying rgyud): da// brgya kyi mdzis/ mang byung / sar+b+barna~M la n+d+han mthu / mi na nas rba/ sarba san/ zhes brnangs mtha' thams cad ga nga mi dbang na dzan
71a1(rnying rgyud): phul pa/ ma rag sha kha mAn dza/ tragA raka sha snying kha rag ma badz+ra dun tid / rag mo yag ma mar Na b+h+yo// TAk+kin+di de wa a sur nA ga yag shA rag sha/ prI tsa sha/ triSh+ma rASh+TA ga r+b+ha Da kin+d+ha ma ho \u0f7fka ag ni barbaH/ ru traH te/ ga
71a2(rnying rgyud): pre tA ka na ra ka karma nA ra ka/ sar+b+ba T+Ta ki bA tA la pA la bA se/ sarba nA mi a nan ti ri ba tsar/ sarba r+thakits+tshib+h+yo b+ha ma ta b+h+yo b+ho ru ru/ zhes phul bas/ he ru ka che ba'i dargyal ltos te/ 'jig rten du he rten haM zhes brjod pas/ snong bzung thams cad gapa
71a3(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs te/ 'og min gyi gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra yang ldeg ldeg 'gul lo// bde gshegs thugs khros brdas mtshon bka' bzos mdzan// gdul thabs rnam gnyis bka' mthun stangs gcod pas// srid
71a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal mo kro tI shwa rIs gzigs// trang ma trad ru trang A gad+hA ya A ga d+ha ya/ ta thA ya ta bA ya/ ra la ra la b+h+yo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// sarba TA krI ru tra/ kro ta kro tI ru ti/ sa mA ba nA daM ku ru zhes brjod pas/ bdud dang khro bo khro mo yab yum gyi tshogs thams cad
71a5(rnying rgyud): sil gyis lhags par gyur to// yum chen pode'i zhal nas 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po/ 'og min gyi gnas na dpal chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po ye shes kyi rdul dang ldan pa zhig yod/ 'khor mkha' 'tsho ma dang khro bo thams cad kyis phyogs mtshams chod kyi
71a6(rnying rgyud): pa bsgo'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab tu bred par gyur/ shin tu bsdangs pas rang gi gnas su phyin nas/ keng rus zod mkhar gsum zlog brtsigs pa'i steng // b+han+ta'i gzhal yas dur khrod 'jigs pas brgyan// ta babs mu khyud lcags ri me
