71a7(rnying rgyud): bas pas// rngag khrag ba shad ga ci klung parje chad dang // ba mja la zag pa mang mazhing dgu bdang // migatsang rnam pa sna tshogs pas pa blo nga // rtsi mdzar khrod ma brtsed bka' nyan dang // rim pas 'jigs byed 'bab rgya yis bskyed// sred pa
71b1(rnying rgyud): bu dpag chen mda' bzhin 'phen// de yi gyi ri ma dbang phyug ma yis bsgyur// gzhan yang ral brtan gyi tshogs rnams dang // mche ba gshog pan+d+ha ma sngar mo can// mgo brtan mchags sna tshogs pas bkar ro// dpal chen pa dang nar byas dgra bsan/
71b2(rnying rgyud): brda' ni rnam drug byed cing 'bod pa ste// skyugs pa g.yab mo thal mo so gol dang // rkun po glu ste so sos go bar byas// 'ja' dang 'brug glog stong gi skra 'byin zhing // 'bru dang rin chen sna tshogs sman dang chu// 'gro drug mkha' 'gro sha rngas za ba rnams
71b3(rnying rgyud): ba nAs nad kyi rnam pa sna tshogs skyugs// kun nas bskor te btsan par byas pa yis// bdud kyi sems de rab tu der gnas pas// ma trang ru tras dpal la skur pa btab// dpal chen bya ba med par nges pa las// srid pa'i rgyal mos bcos pa 'dra zer ro//
71b4(rnying rgyud): chags skyes 'khor la gdams ngag byas// dpal gyi srin po'i lus kyis gnas su phyin// sna tshogs gzugs su 'jug pa'i 'khor rnams ni// rwa gzengs mig bgrang mche gtsigs sder mo gdengs// 'jigs pa'i skad kyis co long chen po 'byin// khA nas
71b5(rnying rgyud): khrag dang nad skyugs 'di skad zer// gtso bo rje po lags sam gsang brda' ston// dpal gyis so so'i brda' rnams nges bstan pas// dngos nyid yin par mthong ste mchod pa phul// gzhal yas nang du byon te kha T+wAM gdengs// srin mo kro tI shwa rI cing
71b6(rnying rgyud): gyis bzung // bskal bar byas nas rang rtags snying po phul// bka' la btags te khaT+wAM lu gri byin// ma mo'i gtso mo sbyor ba'i yum du byas// dpal gyi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas yul las// srul ba ke rI ser ha khro mdzag po'i tshogs// dur khrod pa
72a1(rnying rgyud): zugs srung lasags sudu// da dpa sbrul 'amang sa // na kyis mamin ga cig dngalal 'dis thas// 'du snre du gas bdas bcung// dug u 'ab na na
72a2(rnying rgyud): zhes srog gi snying po phul nas/ tha tshig blangs te dkyil 'khor bran la gnas par byis so// de yi 'khor rnams sngar 'dus gzhal yas med// srin po gzhal yas med pas spangs par gyur// sang+yas rgyas cho 'phrul yin par rab tu shes// rang gi gnas
72a3(rnying rgyud): su phyug pas dpal dang 'phrad// mthong thos 'jigs pa chen po rab tu skyes// dpal gyis tsham rngams btul zhugs spong ba mdzad// tsa hU~M ba~M hoH'iphyag rgya bzhi yis bzung // sgrol sngags kha ni srin po'i snying gar bzab// mgo bo lce rab dang pa 'ang
72a4(rnying rgyud): bstan// sha dus khrag la rol pa chen por mdzad// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang rol du bcug/ dbang po rnam lnga ye shes khrag 'thung rdzas// khogs par zhugs nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba byed// dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar bar byin gyis
72a5(rnying rgyud): brlabs// bdud sde ldang ba med par bya ba'i phyir// gnas chen brgyad du mchod rten re re brtsig/ dur khrod ma brgyad bkal n+dan bcas pas bsrung // rigs lnga ye shes chos dang rang bzhin lus lngas skyes// rdo rje mkha' 'gro shugs kyi mkha' 'a
72a6(rnying rgyud): yang // chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// re re la'ang bzhi bzhi bcu drug ye shes mnga'// dru khrod kau rI seng ha bcu drug grub pa'i rigs// a b+hi sham sham mun chad sgren mo'i rigs// nges pa'i tshig ni rgya las ma bung rang bzhin
72a7(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub// thugs rje nyi ma lta bur yongs la khyab// don dam gyo med 'khor ba'i bdud las rgyal// rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ye shes me ru bstan// srid pa nyon mongs rgyu mthun srin po'i 'khor// chags pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs sbyar//
72b1(rnying rgyud): zu sadapas rdzu la / sa smra // ma na sum dun du/ dan kun gagags / sa dgas
72b2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin mthu ba ltas skyid pa'i sman mor dgrags// lus kyi mkha' 'pho ma chen mo'i rlud las/ skye rgyud kyi gleng gzhi rigs dang ngas chog bstan pa zhes thab ste le 'u dang pa // de nas lha'i dbang po rma gyi cing / @
72b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rgyag na rdo rje la mcho pa rgya chen po mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// mthu chen rdzu 'phrul 'a slebs thugs rje can// jig rten dang chen mkha' 'byo dag nams// srab thabs gnas dang dmams 'akrol thabs rnams
72b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro rnams gnyis po don phyir bdag gis zhu// kun mkhyeni rig pa'i rtsal chen khyod kyis gsung // zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di lta ste/ gtso mo bsrub pa'i rim pa bsdus pa'i don// gzhan gsal med pas bdag gis 'ang
72b5(rnying rgyud): bzha na// b+he med chos rnams nam ma nga' lta bu las// 'byung chen byung 'gra ma gying po brtsegs// keng dras ri ba nyan d+ha'i gzhalnga yas khang // nang du rtsi rtsibs bzhir yi sto// gnang ga rim pas mapa' 'gron du bskyed/ khwa dag byabs /
72b6(rnying rgyud): dang mthun pa las// zhal gcig tug gnyis snyan gas mdza khyod tan// dbus shAng lho lcags rgyag g.yas ka pA la// bya byang gnyis g.yas kyi thong pa bsnams// g.yang gzhi yul na grang sam+bu zhags pazod// g.yon pa'i phyag ni ma ti thegs par
72b7(rnying rgyud): bsanA/ ce gcig dbang po gang gang spyod yul// bsgom ni dang de yi rang bzhin 'amo// mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byar bas mim// chos can med byi chos nyid yod ma yin// drug tsha'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'i chos 'di bstan// bsam pa po ma
73a1(rnying rgyud): na sa/ sa pa sa ma na mas pa lugasun sa ga/
73a2(rnying rgyud): mdzu po bA las bcol dngos grub mngon bkol rgyud// sbub rdzas gas tshe gzugs kyi sbom bu'i rgyud// de gsu ma 'dus pa'i don ni 'di lta ste// rigs dang grangs dang don gyi nga ste// la.A yul rgyu srang 'dun pa gar d+ha'i phyogs// dmangs
73a3(rnying rgyud): sa ng+yas tshod snang 'grub thabs// rdzu 'phru 'aM shing gakhrugs nyams ca la sogs// don sngags lan cig gyir ni cis chung sbyin// zhes bka' thal ba dang / zhwa da ba pos yang 'di sa tsog gas soto// kun sa byed don rnams 'byer ba ma
73a4(rnying rgyud): rab bdag/ 'gro drug bdag cag rmongs pa'i drin sangs// bskus don de de nas ni bshad par bya// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkrus don de de la yang gnyis gnyis te// bka' dang rang bzhin gnyis su shes
73a5(rnying rgyud): paraH// ye shes chos las bA'i mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rjem pa' 'gro shugs kyi mkha' 'gom// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las mi mkha' 'grom// rang bzhin rigs las 'ang dag cig gnas pa// s+thi ni mkha' 'gra zhugs 'grolas kyi'i'apho//
73a6(rnying rgyud): regasum dag tu thams cad 'das pa yin// de las las kyi mkha' 'gro bzhi yod de// gral rgyug dgon pa gnas 'khyer chu ngas phog/ gral drug bcu drug dgon pa dur khrod gnas// gnas 'khrur chad pas phog pa 'di 'dra ste// gnas 'khrur 'gro ba
73a7(rnying rgyud): ga drug yod pa las// mi dang byol song gnyis la brtag pa ni// spu dang brel ba mig gnyis // sen mo lus kyi dri ma mo mtshon nags// min gakyil ga bzag tshe// mgo ma drug log dang lpags kyu bathul ba rnams// 'di dag mil
73b1(rnying rgyud): yod de nas mthu che// mkha' lding 'khor ba bya yi mkha' 'gro ma// sgra nyan kha dog ston pa khyi yi mkha' 'gro ma// mthong mang sgra snyan 'byin pa sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// bying rmugs mi dga' 'phyo zhing 'gro snying 'dod// 'di dag nyams len par chod mang
73b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma// chad pas phog pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// srung gdong mig rtsa dmar la mchi ris yod// skad chung tse long gzhan rnams swad+d+has bAr nus// dred 'dra lus po kham nag yan lag ring // sge'u gzugs kha dmar lce ring bya byed mang // stag 'dra
73b3(rnying rgyud): dmar sha khrag dmar la dga'// gzugs chung phra wang mtshan ngan mig rtswa dra mar// sen mo khwa 'dra sor mo ring la phra// chad skong du tshul mthun 'jug spyod pa byed// dus ma yin pas spel zhing bde ba yod// ngo bo srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can
73b4(rnying rgyud): rnams// lus phod shes pa num mkhar las kyis 'gro// las ni phyi nang gnyis su shes par bya// kyi yi las la g.yel ba bzhi yod de// srid pa chags 'jig bskal ba dang po'i las// na ma DA dus bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi las// dgun
73b5(rnying rgyud): khrugs dpying 'ju dbyar skye ston sbyin no// 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi las rnams la// sra byed sa ste rlan byed rgya// tsha byed me la g.yo byed drung // nang gi las la dbye ba gnyis yod de// skye bar byed dang 'chi bar byed// skyer mi steng dang mod la skye// mod
73b6(rnying rgyud): 'chi dang 'chid mi sted// sa g.yos 'gul dngas rdol thog ser dang // skar mda' ko rdung / la sogs rang bzhin las// yul ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro shasar gnas// shugs kyi mkha' 'gro khrag dang rgyal gnas// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro drod dang me la
73b7(rnying rgyud): gnas// mas kyi mkha' 'gro dbugs dang rlung la gnas// yul chen brgyad na 'bum sde re reg nas// pho nya nag mo byang shar mtshams na gnas// 'dzam bu gling na nyi khri chig stong gnas// ri nag phog chad mtshe'u bdun na yod// bdud kyi rigs
74a1(rnying rgyud): rnams de / bral gnas// da ma dag dmar pa sha na bzhin mi thug/ srin po'i rigs kyi mkha' 'gro gnas pa'as// sa gzha can dmyal ba largya tshul ba// las cig shi rje la sogs gnas pa'i sa// rga srinan
74a2(rnying rgyud): 'dra shing gcig chu sgyu 'thab// der ni gnod sbyin dgra po gnas pa'i sa// shing rigs chu mig mang po yod pa ni// klu rigs mang po de la gnas pa'i sa// ri rtse thang dmar shing rigs 'ga' skyes pa// gdug pa klu rigs gdol pa gnas pa'i
74a3(rnying rgyud): sa// dbu ma khar rnying rgyal po gnas pa'i sa// dri brags ni mi 'ang mtshon ma can// btsan btsun dmu bdud skya rengs gnas pa'i sa// dbenas re'u rul dgon shul dang // sa phug ri phug rnying pa dang // lam mdo chu gleng tshugs pa dang // yog
74a4(rnying rgyud): gting zab dur khrod dag/ spyan mo nag mo gnas pa'i sa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi rgya srangs// shugs kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang chu// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma yi rgya srang me// lus kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang rlung // dgun zla gsung
74a5(rnying rgyud): la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya// dpyir zla gsum la shugs kyi mkha' 'gro chu// dbyar zla gsum la chags pa'i mkha' 'gro chu// ston zla gsum la las kyi mkha' 'gro rgya// re re la yang rgyu rtsis bzhi bzhi ste// gcig nas bdun du rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya/
74a6(rnying rgyud): dgu na sa bcu bzhi phyogs kyi mA ba'i 'gro n+d+ha// ban+d+ha dru ga nyi shu gnyis su chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgya// te rwa gsum dgu la thub pa las kyi mkha' 'gro rgya// de bzhin kun la so sor sbyar bar bya// sred dang snga rdo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya// ngos chen dros yol
74a7(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// nyin mtshan byed yol chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgya// dgongs dang tho rangs las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// nya stong brgyad la kun gzugs de rgya// ting 'dzin drod nyul nyi shu dgu la rgya// de nyid rnal 'byor yum ni mtshan mo rgya// tshogs
74b1(rnying rgyud): kyi rung tu la nyanas s+ho// dgan pa'i mkha' 'gakun gyu// nam langs nyin pa nyi ma bya// tsa mas bdun pas thab bya// dz+ra srid ladamag pan / nyid krung namag klag pas/ glang gnyis yal bgra bun+d+ha/ k+Sha nam chung bas san/
74b2(rnying rgyud): nub ka tho rangs spen pa rgya// khyab 'jug rgya ba 'di lta ste// lo 'jug zla 'jug yang 'jug zung 'jug bzhi// glang lug 'brug khyi bzhi yi dbyar dgun 'bring // bco brgyad nyi shu dgu la na ma phyed d+hA// byi lag gnyis kyi dpyid dpyad 'bring ba la// bcu bzhi nyi shu
74b3(rnying rgyud): drug gi nye rtse la// rta sbrul gnyis kyi ston dpyi ra ba yi// yang ngo bcu gsum nyi ma sbyar na rgya// bya spel gnyis kyi dgu nad pyid rab la// ma rong nyi shu dgu yi nyin phyed na// stag yos gnyis kyi dbyang dgun tha chung la// mdod bco brgyad nyi ma phyed na d+ha//
74b4(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis re re'i ngos la brgyad rgya ste// bzhi brgyad bcu gcig bco lnga bco brgyad dang // nyi shu gnyis te lnga dang dgu rnams kyi// srod dang nyi dros na ma 'jing nyen phyed dang // nam byed nyin phyed tho rangs nyi ma myang // rim gyi nub nas shar rgya lho nas byang // skor thabs de
74b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin rtogs mtshams khyab par rgyu// dpyid ra dbyang 'bring ston zla tha chung gi// chos gcig bco brgyad bcu bdun gsum la rgya// dbyar ra ston 'bring dgun zla tha chung gi// chos lnga bcu 'dun nye shu gsum la rgya// dgongs dang tho rangs bya zer tsam na tu/
74b6(rnying rgyud): dzam gu'i nyin gung gnyis kyi yol nas rgya// nam gyi srod dang nyi ma dros nas chu// / nyi ma rtse shar mun sros tsam nas chu// grib chung srod kyi bar du thams cad chu// sku dengs shar nas thun gyi klu rigs rgya// las kyi mkha' 'gro nam langs yos bya chu// rtsi shwar
74b7(rnying rgyud): 'bug rgya shar ngos bskul// dros ni na chu phyed na lug/ myur na spre'u dgongs mo bya// srong la khyi chu 'jeng la phag/ gung la byi ba nam chung glang // tho dngas gshed po stag gi dus// mkho' 'gro rnams kyi 'dra nas na// dung khring brgyad dang spyan pa'i zhabs kyis
75a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i
75a2(rnying rgyud): bcags// bya rgod ri dang grub pa thob pa'i sa// dur khrod la sogs mkha' 'gro 'dunas ni// dbyar gsum gangs dkar rtse la 'dra// ston gsum spang snar gong du 'du// dgun gsum dgon par thang la 'dra// dpa dgas ma
75a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus sgrol 'du// tha chung ba zhi la 'dun thag gcod// dpyang zla tha chung stangs kha klu yis gcod// ston na tha chung stangs khas bdag gcod// dgun zla tha chung snang ba ma mos gcod// ston zla ba chung spangs kha btsan la 'dod// mkha' 'ga'i rigs kyi
75a4(rnying rgyud): ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro shar nas nub tu tu// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro lho nas byang du gu// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro nub nas shar du r+g+ha// las kyi mkha' 'do byeng nas lho ru chu// mkha' 'gro mgo brtan bcu gnyis rgya phyogs ni// dgranar phag gi
75a5(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha n+ya// 'bring po bri ba ri mgo n+dan nub tu rgya// thachung klung gi mgo can byang du rgya// 'bying rwa rtag gi mgo can shA bya// 'bring po yos bu'i mgo can lhon bya/ tha zung 'brug gi mgo can nub tu rgya// dbyar dmyal gyi mgo can bya duH// 'bring
75a6(rnying rgyud): mgo can shar du chu// tha chung lug gi mgo can lho ru rgya// ston daspre'u'i mgo can nub tu gru// 'bring po rgya yi mgo can gong pozhin chu// tha chung khyi yi mgo can shar du rgya// btsan btsun dmu bdud gangs gsum rtsibs la chu// ma yams spyan gsum tha chung
75a7(rnying rgyud): rti bas la chu// sa bdag klu srin sa yi srug la rgya// thams cad dus gcig rgyu ba 'di lta ste// phyi rta ston dpyid 'bring po'i bci lnga las// glang lug dpyid ston tha chung nyi shu gnyis// stag sbrel dbyad dgun ra ba'i tshes brgyad la// bya yos dbyar dgun 'bring //
75a8(rnying rgyud): 'i bco lnga la// khyi 'brug dbyar dgun tha yi nyi shu gnyis// phag sbrul ston dpyid ra ba'i chos brgyad la// dus bzhi zla bar 'bring tha chung la// raba'i chos drug 'bring po'i nya// tha chung bzhi yi nyi shu drug/ bar snang ri rtse sa yi mtshams// ris med
75b1(rnying rgyud): thams cang rna ba lan// ngas ni bzu'ajas 'thang ngas te// mamr-ita te shUm glen pa na// bdug nas rin chen mo ga sa tshogs dAng// 'brad nga shing thog ga can can gdug // b+hur da ma ma byis pa dz+ra ldan dug// gsun dag sang bzub thags
75b2(rnying rgyud): rigs// bsrad pa btsan btsan dmu bdud ma ya mas sman// sa bdag klu srin bgegs chen phal pa rnams// gsung chen 'gar sta'i khu bas thabs kyis bslad// ra dang ku ku ra yi khu bas bskrad// mgo rtsi dang bse le shing gis bsrang // gang bsung ba la sbar ba'i
75b3(rnying rgyud): gu gul byugs// las dang dus su 'jom pa ni// las kyi dbang gis dus su 'dzom pa dang // thabs dang man drag shes pas 'jom pa'o// myur du 'grub pa 'di lta ste// man dag thabs kyis myur du 'grub pa dang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas 'grub pa'o//
75b4(rnying rgyud): dus tshod nams ni gong du bstan pa'o// rdzu 'phrul la yang rnam pa gsum yod de// rang bzhin byin rlab thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul te// rang bzhin gcig la sna tshogs sprul pa'o// byin rlabs me 'bar dud pa 'thul ba'o// thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul thun mong dngos grub rnams
75b5(rnying rgyud): sgrib shing nyed dang rtsub dang // rtsub lha yi dargyal lo// ma mo'i grib shing dur khrod rdzas// byung ka khu byug dang ru bdud kyi shing // wa khrag byang chub sems ni btsan rigs shing // khwa sbo ma gi'i rtsi ni klu yi shing // 'ug pa srin bya'i dang ru the'u rang shing // de rna
75b6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu sbyar na mi la sgribs// 'khrugs pa'i rtags ni drug yod de// nyi ma zla ba 'chi ba dang // dus min pa yi rlung byung dang // sgra dang 'od dang sa 'gul drug/ 'di rnams mkha' 'gro 'khrugs na 'byung // mi 'dod 'bras bu byung na nyams pa'i rtags//
75b7(rnying rgyud): bdus su med na chad pa'i rtags// de byung 'khrugs na zhing gis bcos// nyams pa rnams ni tshogs kyis bskang // tshad pa thams cad mdos kyis bzlob// las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po las srub pa'i thabs don gyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// /
76a1(rnying rgyud): de nas dpal chen bka' ya ba sus don ni// yul dang rtswas rigs dang dus tshad sngags// brda' dang las tshogs blta ba bstan pa'o// rnal 'byo gnyis med dpa lta dang mnyam pa yi// phyags chen pa bsam pA ga la na
76a2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// byang chub sems la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu// rtsal shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgya// drod la chags pa'i mkha' 'ag rgya// dbugs la las b+hi mkha' 'gro d+ha// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor 'dun sa yin// rigs ni mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro las kyi mkha'
76a3(rnying rgyud): ma gsum// dpal chen bka' yi dus tshod ni// gang la mos pa'i rgyu dus gang du bstan// dpal chen bka' yi sngags ni 'di lta ste// oM shrI badz+ra shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ sarba mahA DAk+ki nI/ dzA las mabar b+h+rUM/ yo gi nI/ mahA kro d+ha gau NI sar+b+ba du Sh+TA na/ dz+wa ya niH
76a4(rnying rgyud): mU ka s+ye/ sar+b+ba pA pa ma ka ma A ba ra NA nAn shAn+ti ku ru/ kA ye tsit+tan ta byi pa tsa le ba pa tsa le ba/ pe le ba pe le ba/ A kar sha ya A kar sha ya/ duSh+Ta bi lpAn/ sar+b+ba gra ha big+h+ran/ sarba dz+wa rAnAn/ gAM d+hi pi sha dur ni met+ta sarba a ma ga lA nAn/ a ra mi rany+dza gats+tsha hA/
76a5(rnying rgyud): bi d+ha yan ti/ sarba ga ha b+hig/ tsit+ta dak+ta A kar sha ya A kar sha ya/ dA ra ya dA ra ya/ A gad ta ya A gad ta ya/ bar+t+ta brta/ badz+ra sr-i kha le na ba nA ba da ya/ mo hA yi mo ha ya/ ku ru pa shang ku ru/ badz+ra mud ka re Na dran te/ nAt+ta ya nAt+yA ya/ ha na ha na b+hiH
76a6(rnying rgyud): ra prA ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ khAd khAng / bar+d+ha ya pad+g+ha ya/ snong la d+hod la/ drA ha na mA ya mA nga// n+d+ha ya d+hiT+Ta ya/ b+hIrl-i ku ru pa rabad d+han tsho d+ha ya swan+taHkri rba ni ka bo rA nIn/ pra yo gad sha ba lA nAn/ ba la me la ka swa rba'i mr-i Ta ya/ sar+b+ba de tsanan T+Ta pA ta ya/
76a7(rnying rgyud): udz+dza Ta ta ya/ badz+ra he he ru ru ka sa bAn+d+habi yo gI/ a mu ka su/ bud+d+he s+ye/ dz+nyA nas+ya/ shrI bA na~M dza s+ya/ A yu Sha ba la s+ya/ sarbas mthog puSh+Ti ku ru/ yo gi ma hA sA d+ha ka rak+Sha ra k+Sha swA ha/ brda' ni lus ngag yid de dkrug pa'o// las kyi tshogs ni
76b1(rnying rgyud): sa ga / smra / sa// su sa
76b2(rnying rgyud): skamangs dgas// ngo mkha' 'a mo gyu ba hrAH// las kyi mtha' 'gro ldan dgrag par gyi// chags pa'i mtha'a'agro rgya dgas paraH// thugs kyi mkha' 'gathun bsrid pa dag// de bzhi dus rnams gang la bab pa'am// rang
76b3(rnying rgyud): mngag la gdags pa'i// da' sa/ ba sha~Ms tu za ba len brnam/ dbug pa ma// ga nas/ An sha la/ ta d+ya / bas ba la/ skang la mangs/ khA khang / bslad pal/ udz+nyAn pa i rna ma da shAg drug/ sngags myas
76b4(rnying rgyud): bzug dgus par // tshe srang 'gegs pa rtog 'dod pas gtong pa / gang sa byer ba des bya sa shes/ ga tsigs so// thangs rjid / ma ti ma/ Amra ba laH/ dar+dz+dza raH/ ka \u0f7fgnas / zhes brjod da/
76b5(rnying rgyud): dab po sbyin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'am ba'a' bo nyid / 'ad sdig tshogs pa rjem bdul gagags pa'i mang shA/ cad rnamamakha' 'a ba las// sum lta bar 'jal ba mngadu//
76b6(rnying rgyud): bldan pa 'di// ma nI phrul 'i gnas pa// 'jig rte 'phrul ba rtog par dzang / ra bzhid med// mings kyi rang bzhi thom mthag// da pa'i la// gro dang ldanapas ma' sbyor bsgom// thig tu las kyi
76b7(rnying rgyud): ma rgyal gyis ni// khyo 'i drug pams brgyad // de bo drang shig gangs byu // rgya rgyags dngapas mi gta // de banyin la sogs chog mas// de bzhin 'dapa ba ltad bya rnams// smre khyed la nangs pa
77a1(rnying rgyud): na smra byasmra na du
77a2(rnying rgyud): ngabya ma chogs thams ca brtsam pa sems pa kyis mabyod pa dngas tshod de/ tshig rje 'di // te/ chen can dus cang du rigs// ga 'dag bcig sa pa ngasas /
77a3(rnying rgyud): ngas cig snga tus/ drug sa rtags du na pa tshang mi babyed/ sa bathong nas ga sa pa du / ga kyis bdapa nga/
77a4(rnying rgyud): sa la pan
77a5(rnying rgyud): dang ma 'dug gi sa pa'i gas / tshigs / dag pa
77a6(rnying rgyud): mAnga' bang ldan gyis rdzogs pa/ mngad pa gar gyi rgya gargyas bzhugs te/ brtul thugs ched po'i mang 'a bdag// bum pa'i 'khang lo 'arin po che'i 'ad 'ab dang / badz+ra' stsal nangs kyi mu khyu dang gyu pa/ gsung gyi 'khod lo la myo tog gi 'brar 'bang bcan /
77a7(rnying rgyud): bye gzhil gyi gzig su bye/ 'du 'i bag ma rtsas su/ dza du ma du ni gas sapa sa ngas ma sa / gsang la sang pomanas tu ba dang /
77b1(rnying rgyud): bzhis bsrung ba/ chags pad+ma tshogs rigs la mu byung mu tig gi hU~M bdus 'khrigs pa las// thug pa bzhal rngu bzhis mdzes pa/ yum gyi mkha' lnga dbu ma la phrin las bzhi 'dakyil 'khor chags pa/ dbus rdo rje cings mal bya bzhi'i lcags dang sman tes sang+yas
77b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad bskyed pa'i za ma tog tu gnas so// rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rwa lnga las/ byang chub sems lnga'i char bzhugs pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i gnas bzhir bab pa/ de lta bu'i yum la sku las hUM bdun ha lA muM gcig tu shar te/ thugs las hUM muM gnyis/ mu~M bzhi/
77b3(rnying rgyud): gyi mtshan gsum du ldan te/ yon tan las b+h+yo lnga bcu drug tu shar ba/ chu mtshon bzhi la b+h+yo bzhi/ b+ha ga bzhi la hUM bzhi/ de lta bu'i yab yumA la/ sku'i spyi dpal gyi khro bo bcu la ta kr-ita bzhis bskor ba dang / gsung gsang chen gyi khro bo bcwa la tsa kri ta bzhis
77b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / thugs gdeng chen gyi khra bo baN+Da la ta bi ta bzhes bskor ba/ yon tan rdzogs chen gyi kho bo brgyal ta kr-ita bzhis bskor bas/ de lta bu'i yab yum la dkar mo'i mdo bcu gsum dang / nag mo'i mdzo ba co brgyad dang / sar mo'i mdo la bcu drug dang /
77b5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i ma mo brgyad du ldan te thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas srid pa'i phra men rgya mchos 'di skad ces gsol to// yab yum srid pa'i bca' bzhi kun// gtan tshigs rtsa ba ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag
77b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// phra men rgya mtshogs pa'i yum// gtan tshigs rtsa ba 'di rnams kun// srid pa'i rtsa ba mtsho bzhir bshad// phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// srid pa'i rtsa ba mtsho zhing ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa//
77b7(rnying rgyud): mtsho bzhi srid pa'i don bshad pa// srid pa'i bya lung rgya mtsho dang // dbang phyug las kyi rgya mtsho dang // bskang lung las kyi rgya mtsho dang // brtan ma las kyi rgya mtsho rnams// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i rgya mtsho bzhi las/ gleng

78a2(rnying rgyud): rnams gyu ga pas/ / ga min

78b1(rnying rgyud): maH// za gsung po tshogs pa'o// de la stas ngan dgra' gaH// srid pa ma cha bzhalas/ sas ngan gyi dga' kyad 'byung ba'i lan ga/ sa pakra// pa man d+ha mchis yalpags lnga pa// brgyas kyi dam pa ca ltar lags/
78b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// sa yi 'khor lo sbyangs pa la// 'og gzhi rus sbrul khog pa la// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// gling bzhi 'khor yug gling phran ldan// mtha' ma bya
78b3(rnying rgyud): ri nag po la// rin chen sna lnga'i gcal bkra ma ste// rtsibs brgyad steng du klu brgyad gri// 'bru sA lnga yi dar phye la// zhabs brgyad klu brgyad brdzis par bya// zhabs kyi rtse ni phyi ru bstan// zhabs brkyang bang rim mtha' mas btegs// bang rim lte ba'i pho brang
78b4(rnying rgyud): la// dbus su chags 'dzin chen mo la// bud med lnga bcwa lnga yis bskod// rdo rje'i ka ba bzhi yis btegs// de steng bang rim par ma la// dbus su phra men rgya mtsho la// bud med bcu bdun 'khor gyis bskor// rdo rje rI ka bA bzhi yis btegs// de ster ba
78b5(rnying rgyud): rim gsum pa la// bum pa zhal lnga'i dbyibs su b+ha// nang gi dbus su dgod pa ni// dbus su srid pa'i rgyal mo la// dbyings kyi ma bdun 'byung lnga'i yum// bcu gnyis yang dag dkyil 'khor ldan// mtshams dang yan lag mi chen brgyad// dang po dung sgong
78b6(rnying rgyud): bcug rtsam la// mtshal gyis kha mig gshag pa bri// dbus kyi bum pa nyid la'o// spyan gzigs gtor ma phra men sdod// kha khyer dang po 'khor bar bzhag/ dar dkar du mtshon bcu gsum gzug/ thugs kyi bang rim po brang la// lcags sgo nag po
78b7(rnying rgyud): bco brgyad dang // dar nag du mtshon bco brgyad gzug/ spyan gzigs gtor mas 'khor bar bya// yon tan pang rim po brang la// bsgo sgong khra bo lnga bcu drug/ dang ser du mtshon de bzhin bya// gyen gyi gtor ma dgam par bya// yan lag bzhi dang b+hag
79a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i// rgong brgyad dang du mtshon bcad// de bzhin gnas su dgod paraH// gyi khams mda' ba zhim song bzhi// ral gri bzhi dang grang du bcas// gcig gis gzugs me dngos su pa dang // phreng ba 'tsho zhangs/
79a2(rnying rgyud): bcas kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / phra men gyi mtshos yang gsol pa// bkang gi rim pa gang lags pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// hUM/ drang mgyur tho ba'i nang shed na
79a3(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i rgyal mo yum gcig ma// dkar mo mdzes ma shel ltar dag/ sman gyi ga'u bum pa 'dzin// spyan nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char// thugs las me long ye shes gsal// mi bskyod dbyings nas thugs rje gsal// nam mkha'i mdongs la khyab pa mo//
79a4(rnying rgyud): ba yongs kyi mdangs 'phrog ma// hUM/ yum chen dbu las sprul pa ni// dung sgong 'bar ba dkar po gcig/ mtho ste nam mkha'i dbyings su 'bar// dma' ste rgya mtsho'i gting na nyal// lcags kyi sgo nga rang rdol bas// rigs su skum thun ma chu sdum blang /
79a5(rnying rgyud): nas rigs kyi mig dkar ba// rma bya'i bu mo ha lo mgrin// dpral ba'i dkyil na zla ga ma ni// ri rab kyi zo ma dang mnyam// kha dog sna tshogs ni// bder gshegs kyi rigs dang mnyam// spyan mig ni dmar bzlog pas// khams gsum ni dbang du skad
79a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrag le ni g.yas gong nas// dri rab ni gong ltar 'phen// 'phrag le ni g.yon gong nas// rgya mtsho ni zho ltar bshig/ ga yA sder 'bar ba yis// 'gro drug ni gnas nas 'dren// g.yas kyi 'dab gshog bzhi bcwa rtsa gnyis kyis// sangs rgyas
79a7(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis rol pa mdzad// g.yon gyi 'dab gshog drug cu rtsa brgyad la// ma mo drug cu rtsa brgyang rol pa mdzad// bskang ngo srid pa'i rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang // mi la ni srid pa med// byal ni srid pa yod// mi la ni mthong bu med// bya la ni

80a1(rnying rgyud): can// mu gri 'bar ba lag na thogs// sa sang rtog pa'i thugs mnga'ab// tshul khrims ldan pa'i rig pa can// bcas kyi ras ka sru la gsol// gzi'i phreng bas dbul sadzes// rig byed 'di la mdangs kyis bsrung /
80a2(rnying rgyud): rmaganang nams zhi bar mdzod// gser mkhor bu bzhi ldem pa na// ser mo drung gi go nu can// rdo gyi tham zab kyi ba// 'jam pa'i mdangs kyis srid pa gsal// 'dre byi rig byed mdangs ldan ma// zangs kyi zhabs mas lus mangs shing // 'di yin dang sakyis
80a3(rnying rgyud): bskod byas pas// marig nad rnams byang bar mdzod// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ga ma nas// lag nab dan lde brgyad thogs// bsam pa tsam gyis phyogs bcur phyin// srog chags kun gyi dbugs la nyul// 'od ldan bkrag gsal ru zhon pa/
80a4(rnying rgyud): sku ru rgyal mtshan mdzes ldan 'bad// lus la pra mA rA tsAswa bArgyan// 'di yi mdangs kyis bskang byas pas// mjig nad rnams byang bar mdzod// hUM/ nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// phye med 'gro ba bkrag gi bdang // sreng ge'i gdangs
80a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs btu sgrogs// zhe sdang nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// sing ge dkar mo'i mdangs kyis bslang // g.yu bya khrag mig mdangs kyis bskang // sems kyi nad rnams byang bar mdzod// byang phyogs rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas// ldan mo snying gsum khyad pa /
80a6(rnying rgyud): khrung gi skad kyis klu bdud 'joms// phrag dog nang rnams zhi bar mdzod// b+ha khyung sngon mo'i mdangs kyis bskang // kha rlangs nam mkha'i sprin du 'khrigs// rlabs kyis nam mkha' khebs par gcod// 'di yi mdangs kyis bskang byas pas// ma rig nadan
80a7(rnying rgyud): byi bar mdzod// rgya mtsho chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// dmar mo chu yi 'khor lo can// khrag gi ral pas stong gsum khebs// 'dod chags nad rnams byang bar mdzod// dud kha 'bar ba'i mdangs kyis bskang // ma reg nad rnams byang bar mdzod//
80b1(rnying rgyud): mi ri bu gsum 'bar ba nas// me yi 'od las sprul pa mo// ral pa me stag me dbyung 'bar// glang chen mdangs kyis gshin rje 'joms// bak+kul nad rnams byang bang mdzod// glang chen gzugs kyi rgyal pos bskung // ma rig dang rnam pazu bar
80b2(rnying rgyud): gsung kyis gzhi' bang ba nas// ser mdzadza'i dal ba can// lag nas yi kyil labar sogs// gti tsug nad rnams bying bar mdzod// mimi rgyal mtshan 'bar ngas bsrung // mjig da rnams kyang bur mdzod// dkar mo'i kyin dang /
80b3(rnying rgyud): mchigs blon mo gong leng bcas// drung slong dkrur mo bcugasu la// mtshul gyi zhi gzhan 'ab shas brnyan// dka sa'i tshogs kyi thugs dam 'byung // bslang bzlog chen mo'i dus la'ang// dar gyi du mtshon 'bar ba 'dis// dpung bzhi tshogs /
80b4(rnying rgyud): chen nog/ thugs dan chen pa zhing myur mi// dus bskyed pal mig tud ma yis// kyisan 'dun N+DI ming // thugs ma chen // dashad mi theg ma thugs dme cings kyi// mdog payang rjings kyi da
80b5(rnying rgyud): rnams// thugs de'i dbyings nas shang ba'i thub pa mo// mi 'byur rgyas kyi dbyings las phyi rol med// thugs je mi 'gur dbyings nas sme srul ba// gang zag shes bya'i bag chags ci mchis pa// thams mgon khyod kyi spun srang mthol zhing ba gags/
80b6(rnying rgyud): da kyi thugs rje nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 'gro ba kun la snyoms pa'i thugs rje can// rtog med thugs dam ngang gi dgongs nas kyang // nyon mongs sgrib pa ma lus srung du gsol// sid pa'i las kyis mnar ba'i sems can nams//
80b7(rnying rgyud): ga gakhor ba'i gnas la 'khyams// byams mgon thugs rjes dgongs nas sbyang du gsol// dkar mo 'od gsal srid pa'i rgyal mo dang // dbyings kyi ma bdun du kyi srir mo wa// mthun pa'i rjes dang mchod pa'i yo byad rnams// bsrub pa'i dus
81a1(rnying rgyud): gnas su bstab byas na// dam spyong phrin las chen po mdzod du gsol// dkar mo gshog thogs nam mkhar 'gyur ba'i tshogs// brtson 'grus mthar phyin phyi ba shol mi mnga' bas// 'gro drugazugs rjes gnas nas drang du gsol/
81a2(rnying rgyud): sems can lus kyi bag chags dbang gis na// dam tshig chen po'i bsang bzlog 'di byas pas// srid pa'i dag ltas ngan pa bzlog tu gsol// srid pa mtsho bzhi las/ dkar mo'i mdos kyi rgong / bya lung las kyi rgya mtsho las/ dkar mo'i mdos bstar ba'i
81a3(rnying rgyud): e skye bzhi pa'o// / na men gyi mchos yang gsol ba// nag mo'i dam pa gang lags pa// rdzogs sangs kyis la bdag nyan 'tshal// spyi dang la chen pos bka' phrul pa// dz+dza/ yum gyi thugs mchog 'bar 'a las/ @
81a4(rnying rgyud): gau le gra gsum nus// bsgom ga snyed gyi sdug pa la// r+the hA yi phreng bas brgyan// thugs lAswa ye shes 'di gas lam// khyod TI thugs dam banang ba ni// lpags slong zag pa 'ab ba la// ga ya yi theg zan 'bar nga 'ag//
81a5(rnying rgyud): thugs las stsal ba ste// mtha ya de ni ma mtho ste/ sbyin nom las 'phang // dam yang de ni mi dmya' ste// mAm gyi chen pa'ig teng rdzam rgyal// grong dgas dang ma labs// sha nan mchu grag rigs su byung // bya rten pa yang
81a6(rnying rgyud): bAn// di 'bum pa'i gtos dang mnyam// dpra lpag ya yi ba ga// nam ma pa'i khams kyi mthongs su sbrebs// khwa lis kya brgyad dregs pa ni// 'og gi rgya mtsho'i gteng nas 'jed// mig ni nyi ba ba rtse// zla brgya zil gyis gnan
81a7(rnying rgyud): byed// kha nas me 'bang rgya mtsho skems// sems ni chags sdang lnga dang ldan// rdzir mog yu sder 'brang ba mos// rma srin nag ngor snying nas 'dren// brlangs nathun bzhin du chags// dung gi gsheg 'dang 'bang ba las// gsu yi gzhog
81b1(rnying rgyud): zer 'phro bas// thags bzangs ris kyi mgo bo gcod// g.yas kyi gshog pa brkyang pa yis// lha yi dbang po'i gnas la khyab// g.yon gyi gshog pa rlabs pa yis// gser gyi sa gzhi 'bar ba gshog/ lho nas 'brug sngon 'bar ba 'khrug/ kha
81b2(rnying rgyud): nas grog 'khyag ldibs se ljib// lce yi rtse las zog chen 'bebs// mig nas lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// lha nas bu lug chub mar 'tshubs// khyod kyi tsit+ta 'bar ba nas// zur bud lnga pa'i cho 'phrul 'gyed// mkhal ma ag ni de ba ste// mchi pa
81b3(rnying rgyud): ro gling chen po la// mkhris pa gsod byed chen po ste// mched bkyos byed 'bar ba la// glo ba spyod byed stobs can ti// grod pa sde dpon chen po ste// gnye ma dbang ldan 'bar bar sprul// skal tshigs 'khor lo bcu drug la// srid pa'i pho rgyud bcu drug yul
81b4(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi gshog sbubs lnga bcu drug/ khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa drug rdzogs// g.yon gyi 'dra ba gshog lnga bcu drug/ dman mo lnga bcu rtsa drug 'char// mdangs kyi thig le bcu gsum la// yul gyi ma mo bcu gsum 'char// dpal be'i thig sgo bco brgyad
81b5(rnying rgyud): la// sems kyi ma chen bco brgyad gnas// mjug blo'i thig le brgyad du shar// snang sring po rgyud mo rgyud dang // ma mor grags pa thams cad kun// khyud chen sru yi khyon du rdzogs// klu yi rgyal po nor 'dzin dang // srid pa'i bya khyung 'bar ba gnyis//
81b6(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin bu mo rta gdong mas// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting nas dkrugs/ kha rlangs nam mkha'i sprin du chags// klu dang byang chub sems 'khrugs nas// srid pa'i ma mo thugs 'khrugs te// de phyir skong zlog 'di ltar ro// hUM/ ser mo 'od bzang
81b7(rnying rgyud): mdangs bzang mo// mkha' lding nam mkha'i skar mda' can// 'di yi mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang // dkar mo 'od kyi zer 'phro ma// mthing nag 'bar bas thugs dam bskang // dkar mo shel gyi mdangs bzang mo// tshul khrims rnam dag mdangs
82a1(rnying rgyud): kyis bslang // gser bya nam mkha'i sprin dmar mgo/ mgrin bzang mo yi mdangs kyis bskang // dmar mo zangs kyi mig gcig ma// ro 'dren pa'abar mdangs kyis bskrag/ nag mo sgang gdong dazugs 'jog ma/
82a2(rnying rgyud): nag po'i mdangs kyis bskang // me long ye shes kun gsal ma// sngon mo mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang // mnyam nyid ye shes kun snyoms ma// gser mda' rig pa'i mdangs kyis bskang // so sor kun rtogs ma 'ang so gas la// bska'
82a3(rnying rgyud): mo'i mdangs kyis bskang // bya ba nan tan mdzad pa rdzogs// nIr ti ljang mo'i madrangs kyis bskang // bag chags kun gsal dbyings nyid gsal// pro ta nag mo'i mdangs kyis bsang // snang srid longs spyod rgyan du shar// gzi chen ring ba'i mad
82a4(rnying rgyud): kyis bkang // nyon mongs gnas nas rig pa gsol// khwa ri khro mo'i mdangs kyis bslang // nyon mongs gnas nas rig pa gsal// skad cig gcig la stong gsum khyab// dro za drag mo'i mdangs kyis bskang // dkar mo dpal chen yab la brda
82a5(rnying rgyud): dra tshe dang ldan mdangs kyis bskang // nag mo kha 'bar stong gsum grags// srin mo dri za'i mdangs kyis bskang // dmar mo gzi mdangs 'od 'grom// zangs srin dmar mo'i mdangs kyis bskang // ser mo drung zhon stong gsum thab// rig rtser
82a6(rnying rgyud): gser bya'i mdangs kyis bskang // zhe sdang nad rnams byang bar mchod// hU~M thugs rje'i dbyings nas shar ba'i ma chen rnams// rig pa gsal ba'i mchen rgya mtsho ma// thugs rje rgyun gyis bdag la dgongs su gsol// nyi zla'i 'od kyis khams
82a7(rnying rgyud): gsum gsal mdzod ma// byams mgon thugs rjes bdag le dgongs su gsol// mi 'gyur dbyings nas shar ba gsang ba'i yum// gzung 'don spros pa'i mtshan ma gzhom du gsol// ye shes mkha' las kar tshogs byas pa'i yum// ma
82b1(rnying rgyud): mun pa'i phreng tog bas ladugasal// 'khor ba'i rgyun gatshad zugs pa'i byings nasngags bya// las kyis mdzar ba 'thob nga drugacul// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis tubya ga pas sa byung// gan nangs 'brag pa sabyas kya nga
82b2(rnying rgyud): mo// yun ri dadus nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma// tshig nyams 'gal 'khrul ci mchis bzod par gsol// lcags sgong bco brgyad du mtshon 'bar ba yis// nag mo'i rgyal mo blon mo la sogs dang // bang mtshams sngon mo kha sngon gung /
82b3(rnying rgyud): nyul byed gol la sogs blon mo'i tshogs// thugs dam chen po dbyings su skyong gyur cig/ srid pa mtsho bzhi las/ bya lung rgya mtsho nag mo'i mdos bskang bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// ngag nga pa // phra med rgya ma chos yang gsol pa// sde mo
82b4(rnying rgyud): bskang lugs gang lags pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// yum chen chags pa'i lte ba nas// bse slong khro bo rdol ba nas// 'dam za na rigs kyi mchu le' byung // ri rab chen po'i byang
82b5(rnying rgyud): nas// shang shang te'u'i gzi mdangs can// lus ni gser gyi bum pa la// gshog pa gra yA yi rdo rje ris// sdeng mo lcags sder rtse gsum 'bar// mgrin bzangs kyi 'khor lo la// lhan ni 'bar ba me yi lhan// mchu ni zlag ma 'brar ba las
82b6(rnying rgyud): rkye ni na rde ha nA bar// dpral ba zla chos 'bar ba la// tshigs bdung gi 'khor lo'i drud// tsit+ta rin chen 'bang ba ste// slob pad+ma'i rje zu rngan// mkhal ma nu tig cog ma las// gnyem bdu ri zhags pa 'gyel// mche ma mchong gi mching dra
82b7(rnying rgyud): mgrin pa bang ga dkyil 'khor la// skye bzhiba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar // ting gargyas brtson kyi/ gzug sa dzin byu rdzogs pa sgol// las bzod pon tan na 'jogs// srid bachags byed rkyen mo la// 'di 'i dadapas kyis bu
83a1(rnying rgyud): can/ dam dang // da nagasan rnams kyang ba dmang// ga thas lags chag dran// ma rnams ma la thags dmyu stsu // dngag 'byu la sri sa ma// okaca ta 'thugs dam dang / rna
83a2(rnying rgyud): mkha'i 'khor lo mgri na ring su 'bar// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang // nag mo dung gi khol thag can// gyi bud ma yi thugs dam bskang // khra mo gzi mdangs chu gzhung zhon// sring mo bzhi yi thugs dam pa dang // rol rung gi mche ba
83a3(rnying rgyud): tran// dmag dpon bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // da kar dmar 'phyo na ma skra 'byi na ma/ grwa 'degs bzhi yi thugs dam bsdad// 'dam bya nag mo gser mig ma// 'dod khams ni mtshan thugs dam bskang // sdigs ma rgya mtsho'i rlabs la
83a4(rnying rgyud): srin mo bdun gyi thugs dam bskang // dung gi spu ni sa gsor mchu can// shar gyi ma bdun thugs dam bskang // ser mo 'phyo ba'i lding stabs can// lho yi ma bdun thugs dam bskang // dmar mo khrag gi mchu ngas can// nub kyi ma bdu na thugs dang
83a5(rnying rgyud): bskang // nyul byed sngon mo drang la 'gro// byung gi ma bdun thugs dam bskang // nag mo gser mig bum pa'i lus// dus bzhi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskar// bdud bya nag mo srin skad can// gdong mo bzhi mi thugs dmu bkang // 'a
83a6(rnying rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa drug dang // dar ser du mtshon 'bar ba yis// ser mo mdog bzang thugs dam bskang // d+haM/ mi pha mthugs rje dbyings las skul pa mo// yon tan lhun rdzogs sku 'khrungs kyi bshol med// chags byed cha snyoms kun la bzod par gsol/
83a7(rnying rgyud): skye shiH gcod na// me ti'i skul bzod par gsol// drug shul spyod pas khams gsum dul du rngog/ rin mo 'dzin 'i tshogs la bzod par gsal// thugs rje thabs kyis 'gro don mthar byin ma// nam kha'i rgyal mo'i tshul
83b1(rnying rgyud): bzod par dgas la// bu thung pas la pa brgyad kyi gnas phul ma// 'dar khams nag mu tshogs la bzad par gsal// thugs rdo'artan gyis zang gling dgongs mdza ma// lhas kyi slong ma chags la brlad par gsal// gleng bzhid dag du dang rlu /
83b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor sbyor ma// dmag gi rgyal mo'i tshogs la bzod par gsol// ri rab gling bzhi'i khams kyi 'khor spyong ma// gru 'degs chen mo'i gru la bzod par gsol// rnal 'byor kun gyi phrin las mthar gyi nam// dbang phyug rtsa brgyad tsho sa la bzod
83b3(rnying rgyud): par gsol// dus bzhi dbyings nas rang bzhin 'char mdzad ma// rgyal mo bzhi yi tshogs la bzod par gsol// 'jig rten thog dang ser ba'i sna 'dren ma// gdong mo bzhi yi sku la bzod par gsol// bya lung rgya mtsho las ser mo'i mdos skor
83b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// bzlog pa'i las rnams bshad du gsol// yang dag rdzogs pas don gsungs pa// bzlog pa la yang gnyis yod de// ting 'dzin rtsal gyis bzlog pa dang //
83b5(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i mdangs kyis bzlog pa'o// ting 'dzin rtsal la 'di lta ste// yul dang dngas ma rtsa gsum las// srid pa'i mdo gsum rang bzhin shar// dang po lnga gnyis gsum du wan// gnyis pa lnga gsum gsum par snang // gsum pa bcu chen
83b6(rnying rgyud): da drug/ bzhi pa bzhi nyid gar du 'gyo// nam mkha' tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// skar mda' 'bab pa'i tshul 'phros pas// las kyi ba dan bskul byas nas// srid pa'i bskal pa 'od 'bar bas// rtsa yi mkha' 'gro 'od du 'bar// 'od zer lnga ba
83b7(rnying rgyud): drug tu 'phos// dngas ma'i mkha' 'gro thig le 'bar// bco brgyad 'od kyi zer 'phros pas// yul gyi mkha' 'gro gnas su thim// bcu gsum 'od zer mkha' la 'phros// phung po sgyu ma gnas su bsgral// pho brang gsum gyi dkyil 'khor
84a1(rnying rgyud): du// dug gsum \u0f7fbrtsad nas bcad// srid pa mtsho bzhi las ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal gyi bzlog thabs kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / mdangs kyi bklag pa 'di lta ste// bskal ba dang nA bzlog pa'o// bskal ba lan
84a2(rnying rgyud): gsum yin te// 'khor lo gsum dang bzhags pa lnga// sbyor ba gsum gyi bdag nyid do// srin mo'i gzugs kyi ling+ga la// sbom bu b+ha ga'i hom khung ngu// za 'og rgyal pa gser mig can// skyes ngan kun gyi ming zhes la// de yi me rnga 'chag
84a3(rnying rgyud): ni// sro can yi thag pas btags// 'bru sna wa la b+has pa'i gzugs// pu zla ba lonA pa la// mgo bo bya yI mgo bol// lus la lhas dran su yis bcan// lag pa g.yas su 'gyu gzhung la// g.yon pa mchog gi srung ba'o// rkang pa ga ya
84a4(rnying rgyud): thog phur la// g.yon pa shing bu'i mchog phur ngo ro// de yi lag tu gong ma gtad// de yi gnas lngar dgod pa ni// sa bon lnga ni dgod byas te// de yi steng du dgod bya ba// ral gri sa bon lnga yis stangs// mar me lnga yis gnas ldang mtshon/
84a5(rnying rgyud): stong pa lnga dang mnyes pa lnga// thub pa lnga yang de bzhin du// rtog pa lnga yang yang dag ldan// de ltar spangs nas bzlog par bya// hUM/ bdag nyid che mchog he draka/ dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la// spangs rgyas bzhi pa
84a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis bsdams// dur khrod kyin gyis brgyan pa las// tshul drug cu rtsa gca gsul// dbul khyung chen 'bang bas brgyan// khrung gi ral bsdug pa yis// yul sa ma mo kun spyod de// na mkha' sdug nag 'thibs pa'i byad// nged mo la 'dzin
84a7(rnying rgyud): lhas ngan bzlog/ g.yas kyi gshog zung dang po las// steng gi khro bcu 'bar ba shar// seng ge 'brug sngon 'thab pa'i byad// gan ma lcags 'bang ba'i lhas ngan bzlog/ gshog zur 'bar ba gnyis pa nas// gsang ba'i khro bo bcu dra 'bar/
84b1(rnying rgyud): glang chen za la mchongs pa'i byad// stag seng 'dzings pa'i lhas ngan bzlog/ gshog zur gsum pa'i 'od zer las// kye dang la khro bcu 'bar bar shar// gnam la srin dmar mched pa'i byang// bud med ral 'dzings lhas ngan bzlog/ g.yas kyi gshog
84b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa las// rdzogs pa chen po khro bcu 'bar// skar mda' sa la ltung ba'i byad// dbyig gi nor bu'i ltas ngan bzlog/ g.yas kyi gshog zur lnga pa las// ta krita khro bo bcu drug byung // ri rab me chen 'bar ba'i byad// lci ba zas kyi ltas ngan bzlo/
84b3(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi gshog zur dang po las// srog rtsa'i ma mo bdun du shar// rgya mtsho sbrul gdug langs pa'i byad// me tog bcud nyams ltas ngan bzlog/ g.yon gyi gshog zur gnyis pa las// e kadra ga mo spun drug sprul// mkha' la stag mo mchod
84b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i byad// rdzib spyod pa'i ltas ngan bzlog/ g.yon gyi gshog zur gsum pa las// srin mo 'bar ma bdun du sprul// mkha' la bya rgod sder 'dzings byed// gter gyi bcud nyams ltas ngan bzlog/ g.yon gyi gshog zur bzhi pa las// sring mo bzhi dang
84b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo shar// g.yu sha dkar mo rA 'dzings dang // seng ge ngu 'bod h+ya pa dan bzlog/ g.yon gyi gshog zur lnga pa las// nyi shu brgyad kyi sprul pa 'byung // rdo dpal mtshon gyi lhas ngan dang // rma bya g.yeng ba'i ltas ngan bzlog/ ga yu sgong
84b6(rnying rgyud): sngon mo yang ba dang // lcags kyi ser ba zab tu 'bab// shel dkar sdod du drug spyong dang // zangs skong dmar po mthur du 'dril// mi bzang 'bang ba gling la bskor// nyi ma smin gyis 'khrug pa dang // 'tshab ma dmar po'i snying tegs dang // sengs
84b7(rnying rgyud): gdas kyi stongs nas lhung // shel gyi sgo nga yang ba dang // sprin chen ral pa'i rtags bstan pa// bong bu bcud chen zags pa dang // dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// lhas ngan bcu gsum slar la bzlog/ khyung gi mjug spo brgyad po la// rgyal
85a1(rnying rgyud): mo ba zhi dang gdang ma bzhi/ sprul pa 'od kyi phreng bar shar// bas skyong zla ba'i bud bstan te// lhag phran zod kyis 'debs pa dang // gza' spang 'khrug pa'i byang byung ba// zo sbyin rdol srung pa chags// de mi Sh+Tha
85a2(rnying rgyud): ngan slar la bzlog/ khro bo'i rgyal po khams gsum hUM skra can// u la zangs khrab dmar po'i 'od kyis mdzes// phyag na mdung dmar me lce la mas sde lam// ba dan ce gsum srid gsum g.yab mos 'debs// ga yas nas bskor bas
85a3(rnying rgyud): srid gsum dbang du sdud// glad la bskor bas bdud phung rdul du bzlog/ srog dbugs gzugs la dbang zhing kun gyi drod la khyab// lhas ngan dmigs kyis bskal ba'i dus la bab// de nas nyung dkar gyi rgyal pos brab la/ oM rak+kha shrI he ru ka/ gyi bram
85a4(rnying rgyud): ha tham zad/ de la du ni rbad/ de nas bstab ste/ hUM/ 'jigs byed chen po zhal phyes shig/ khro bo 'bar ba'i zhal du bstab// ma mo chen mo zhal phyes shig/ dam can rgya mtsho'i zhal du bstab// pho nya chen mo zhal gyes shig/ meche gshog nu
85a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i zhal du bstab// dge bsnyen chen po zhal byes shig/ ging chen tshogs kyi zhal du bstab// yas kyi bdud g.yos khA hi/ mas kyi sri langs khA hi/ srin po'i dmigs tshogs khA hi/ sngags kyi a b+hi tsa ra khA hi/ gya bsad skyibs ngan khA
85a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bya yi skyibs ngan na// hUM/ las kyi pho nya chen mo ste// lcags kyi bya khwa chen mo la// dmar mo nyi ma'i mig can zhon// na bza' sprin dmar mched pa la// rdo rje me stag tshom bur 'pho// nyi zer zhags pa sdog cing 'phen// snying zan
85a7(rnying rgyud): ti'i dkyil na gnas// shin pa 'brim gyi 'khor gyis 'askod// srog zan chen mo'i dus la bab// rdzing mo khrag gi dreg pa can// gang yi bya ba'i snying 'dren ma// rengs pa jug la myur du tshul// bsgrims la drag sngags 'bang bas gdang /
85b1(rnying rgyud): mas sa rnam cu kun 'anas / nas da // du ny+dzu na/ rnanas ma mngag suganan rdzun sa kAwA / ma thang na tha bags sa da ga
85b2(rnying rgyud): kyo bang gzhag/ so pa rgyal gyi// ngas pa rnam ma pa'i khams sa gzigs// srid pa mtsho bzhi las bya 'ang las kyi khyi ma las rnas kyi bzlog thabs te la rgyud pa / bla men bya rgya yang gas lag/
85b3(rnying rgyud): 'i d+mang krung de ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshul// yang dag chags kyis bkra'aphrul pa// zla ba chen mo ma 'grel dag// nyams na bskang pa'i dim pA'o// rtswa bral ni 'di lta ste// rgyal gA'i bka' thugs mdza
85b4(rnying rgyud): de ni du mas mar// byed gsas pan rgyan migag/ 'di gzang gisam sa// rig pa'i rnal na rje brkos// 'di ni thugs kyis ma la// ngas chen gnas su ba ni// 'di ni man tanas ma pa// rtse gcig pa'a' 'tha'
85b5(rnying rgyud): di sbyi gams sa pa// zlam chog ma myong n-i// 'di ni pa lags pa yi sa ga // 'das na nga byed dag nga rdzu/ nan phun d+han ga 'gyur// bsang na gsang ngas bathab
85b6(rnying rgyud): d+hA da 'gal 'i sa brdzu rlom pa / A ma mig sa pas pa'i mam 'o// mam ltag ba na
85b7(rnying rgyud): gyus sa na gi ba gyis da mam thang byed// bya 'ban gyi // ni ci gsus ma sam nga zhig/ khyi ma 'i nga /
86a1(rnying rgyud): yi ral pas stong gsum khebs// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la rdzogs// bdug gi gang pa'i thig le las// bla na med pa'i yab yum gnyis// phra ma med pa'i sngon du byung // sangs rgyas nyi pas can cad
86a2(rnying rgyud): 'di yi sems dang yul gyis skong // gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'od zer las// mkha' 'gro brtan 'bar sems ma'i mchog/ seng ge brjid pa'i dbu mnga' ba// sprin dkar mdzes pa'i na bza' can// 'dri mi sha yis thugs dram bskang // yum
86a3(rnying rgyud): dang gnyis su med gyur cig/ gti mug nad rnams zhi bar mnod// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'od zer las// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog/ 'phyo ba khyung gi dbu mnga' ma// ljang nag 'bar ba'i na bza' ni// phrin las ldan gyis
86a4(rnying rgyud): pa mo// 'di yi dbugs kyis thugs dam bskang // yu mra dang gnyis su med gyur cig/ phrag dog nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// gnyis med sbyong ba'i 'od zer las// mkha' 'gro gnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ mdzes pa chen ma
