86a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i mchog/ brtan pa glang chen sku mnga' ma// bai DUr+ya sngon po'i na bza' gsol// 'di yi drod kyis byugs dam bskang // yum dang gnyis su med gyur cig/ nga rgyal nad rnams byang bar mdzod// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'od zer las//
86a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dbu mda' ma// btsom gser gyi na bza' can// 'di yi bkrag gis thugs dam bskang // yum gyi thugs dam skong gyur cig/ zhe sdang nad rnams zhi bar mdzad/
86b1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum gsang pa'i sum nA rtag ma/ maman nam tha gsung 'di yum// ral 'byung zhus pas med pa skal// dag ban mtshan ma thugs// 'ad la gsar gyi thig lus bskrad// rba klu ma khams gsam grol// sngon kA sa
86b2(rnying rgyud): na bza' can// tsat+ta bzlas pa'i zhags pa 'phen// nyi ma tha ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes// 'di yi thig les thugs dam bskang // rig pa'i yon tan can mnga' ma// snang srid kun gyi b+ha ga'i dbyings// gcig pra kun tu zab par mdzad/
86b3(rnying rgyud): dargyal bdag nyid ma// 'di yi dang sams thugs dam bskyung // do na ltos pas zhen du 'joms// rin chen khros pas ngargyal 'joms// pad+ma khros pas 'dod chags 'joms// las mchog khros pas phrag dog 'doms// dkar mo la gcig sab/
86b4(rnying rgyud): la bzhed// nag mo ga yu yi phod mthing can// dmar mo khrag gi dul gcig ma// ser mo rlung gi go rtsa can// dngas ma brgyad kyis thugs dam bskang // srid pa gsum gyi skyed byed ma// 'di yi lte bas thugs dam bskang // bdud rtsi yongs kyi bcud snyoms
86b5(rnying rgyud): ma// 'di yi pho bas thugs dam bskang // nag mo ral gcig 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nag mo ral gcig mche ba can// har ting dkar mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dun ting nag mo mche ba can// shan ting dmar mo gshog pa can// grub ti ser po
86b6(rnying rgyud): nu mnan+ta// 'di yi gzhung pas thugs dam bskang // zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'i du mtshon can// dbu brgya stan stong 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mA yA mas chen mo gsang ba'i yum// 'di yi srog tus thugs dam bskang // dkar mo gser gyi lcags kyu can/
86b7(rnying rgyud): dam/ modung gi zob can// srid pa'i me dang rlung gis bskang // rgya mtsho rlob pa'i mthu mo che// ri rab bsnyil ba'i rngam stabs can// mdzes pa'i tshul gyis 'od 'gro ma// brtul zhugs za byed 'jigs pa'i sku// zin las 'byung po kun 'dul ma/
87a1(rnying rgyud): ral ba can gyi 'khor 'dul ma// babyed me za thag gyon ma// dbang po bdun gyis thugs dam bskang // mgyogs mtshan mo lha yi ming // khyung lding ma ni gshin de'i srang // g.yag mgo ma ne klu yi sring // sngar mo can ni
87a2(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin sring // 'phar rtsa bzhi yis thugs dam bskang // sun gcig lha yi dmag dpon ma// ral gcig gshin rje'i dmag dponam// mchu 'jib bru yi dmag dpon maM// las mkhan gnod sbyin dmag dpon ma/ nya sha bzhi la sa thugs
87a3(rnying rgyud): dam bskang // dkar mo gzugs ldan mdangs mdzes ma// dmar mo me yi mdangs 'phrog ma// sngon mo ral bcings glog pas mgyogs// dmar nag rus sbal chibs su bcibs// dmar mo bral pa nag po zhon// sngo bsangs sha bachibs su bcibs
87a4(rnying rgyud): ser po rlung la 'phyo zhing 'gro// ser skya 'phang ba lte brgyad zhon// rnam shes brgyad kyi mdangs 'phrog ma// 'di yi 'bras bus thugs dam bskang // d+hang ga skyang mo mgo mangs ma// lcags kyi srung mo mche ba can// zangs kyi spang mo lce mangs ma
87a5(rnying rgyud): gser gyi 'phar mo mdangs 'phrog ma// 'di yi rus pas thugs dam bskang // lha yi bu mo dung skyong ma// gshin rje'i bu mo dri snyom ma// klu yi bu mo 'od 'grom// gnod sbyin bu mo shan pa mo// 'di yi shwa yis thugs dam bskang // de ba'i bu mo
87a6(rnying rgyud): mo dbang // dpal chen bu mo dpal mo dbang // 'jog po'i bu mo gru mo dbang // gnod sbyin bu mo shan pa mo// 'di yi khrag gis thugs dam bskang // dpal chen thugs kyi bka' sdod ma// dkar mo zhi ba'i las byed ma// ser mo rgyas pa'i las
87a7(rnying rgyud): thod ma// dmar mo dbang gi las byed ma// ldang mo mngon spyod las byed ma// skal chog 'di yis thugs dam bas// zlog sbyar chen mo mang drugasol// dbang chen mo rnams bsangs pas na// dbang byed pho la mi 'tshal lam// rdzogs sangs rgyas
87b1(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// tshangs pa chen po mgo lnga pa// 'di yi klad pas thugs dam bskang // klang gzer nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// gnam ging dkar po mig gcig ma// 'di yi mig gis thugs dam bskrad// mig gi nang na mas zheng 'dzad//
87b2(rnying rgyud): bcu byin ser skya chen po la// 'di yi snying gis thugs dam bskyang // snying nad thams cad zhi bar mdzad// lha chen b+h+r-i gi ri ti la// 'di yi mtshan gyis thugs dam bskang / mchu se'i nang rnams zhi bar mdzod// 'khor lo khyab 'jug chen po la/
87b3(rnying rgyud): 'di yi lte bas thugs dam bskang // smyo yi nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// lha chen stobs bzang ser skya la// gru mo bzhi yis thugs dam bskang // yan lag nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// skos rje drang dkar chen po la// 'di yi phongs thugs dang
87b4(rnying rgyud): bskang // pho mchin nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// kI la ya thA chen po la// 'di yi mkhris pas thugs dam bsang // mig ser nud rnams zhi bar mdzod// 'brang rigs sun dgu chen po la// 'di yi srog ces thugs dam bskang // stod gzer nad rnams
87b5(rnying rgyud): zhi bar mdzod// sa bdag phag chen dregs pa la// 'di yi mchin pas thugs dam bsang // khrag gzer nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// srid pa'i gru bdud dregs pa la// 'di yi glo bas thugs dam bskang // mdze nad thams cad zhi bar mdzod//
87b6(rnying rgyud): lha chen po'i bdag nyid la// 'di yi mkhal mas thugs dam bskang // za khu'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// rnam sprul rgyal chen rigs bzhi la// yan lag bzhi yis thugs dam bskang // 'bum nud nams zhi bar mdzod// gshin rje chenas
87b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs nyid la// 'di yi gnyems thugs dam bsang // 'dus pa'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// d+ha chen po gzugs nyid la// dmajas lnga yis bskang byas pas// spro 'bog nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// byang srin dmang po'i gzugs nyid la/
88a1(rnying rgyud): 'di yi mcher mas bska byas paste// mched nada'ab nga zhi bar mdzad// srid pa'i 'am skang gi la'u bcu par/ srid pa'i mamathugs 'khrug ste// wabacams kyi tham la// mam ldeb rdzangs
88a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrigs// nad kyi bskal pa sna tshogs 'byung // de yi skyong lugs ji ltar lags// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i thugs ka nas// rgya gram 'bar ba'i yi ge ye
88a3(rnying rgyud): lhal// rdzing rje chen po'i sa bon+da baM du sprul// shes rab chen po'i sa bonA bi du sbrul// btad snyoms chen po'i yi ge mu ru phul// ye shes chen po'i ri rab sa ru stsal// skye med nam mkha'i yi ge e ru sbrul// ri rab bdun gling ldan 'khor yug bca
88a4(rnying rgyud): dpag bsam shing dang pad+ma'i shing chen dang // tsan da'i shing dang dzam bu'i shing chen dang // sgra sgrogs shing dang bcas pa'i yon tan la// nyi zla gza' skar rgyan rnams rdzogs par ldan// srid pa'i lha bran mang po rang bzhin gnas// srid pa'i chags lugs de ska
88a5(rnying rgyud): chags// srul pa'i gnas lugs 'di ltar lags// ri rab g.yu yi bum pa la// lha chen tshangs pa chen po dang // kun tu bzang mo thabs cig bakhrugs// ri rab bum pa'i shing mtshams su// gnam gyi dkar po mig med dang // rgyal po lnga
88a6(rnying rgyud): mdangs la gnas// shing dang lo ma'i mtshams su yang // lha chen ser skya chen po dang // rgya mtsho nyi ma'i mdangs su gnas// dri ba bum pa'i lcog bzhin// lha chen TI gau ri ti dang // khros pa'i dbang chen rang bzhin gnas// ri rab kyi yi lcog bzhi la
88a7(rnying rgyud): lhachen 'khor lo khyab 'jug dang // thugs kyi dgyes sde bag la gnas// lha chen stobs bzang ser skya dang // sbas pa'i mamo bzhi po rnams// grwa bzhi dag la rang bzhin gnas// ri ga khong sreng sked pa na// skos rje thang dkar chen po dang // chags byed/
88b1(rnying rgyud): 'dud rings
88b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams nga bzhin gnas// dpag bas ma shing gica ba na// sbrul bdud pobral ba dang // rnamam rnal ma dang bgan gdus// dpag sa pa shing g.yos la// 'du dregs sun dbu 'a nga la dang // mug tan mngang gcag
88b3(rnying rgyud): bdags// de rab rmang gi grwa bzhi pa// sa bdag lag mgo chen po dang // gru 'dregs bzhi po thabs cig gnas// brid pa'i rol mtsho bdun po la// phud byed dregs pa'i klu bdun dang // srin mo bdun po thabs cig bzhugs/ @
88b4(rnying rgyud): bsam shing gi sum chal// de ba nar gyi bdag po dang // 'dod khams nematshan rang bzhin gnas// ri rababang drim bzhi po la// rgyal po chen po sde bzhid du// lam gyi sring bzhi rang bzhin gnas// dpagra bas ma shing gi rtsa ba na//
88b5(rnying rgyud): du rnga'i gzugs nyid dang / dbang mo che brgyad rang bzhin gdus// rdul kyang nyams ni 'khrugs pa dang // sems can kun la sran sa daH// bskang ba'i rdzas rnams 'di ltar lags// yang dag rigs kyis bka' stsal po// /
88b6(rnying rgyud): rjemin ma // ma 'angs 'bud de rnams/ lhanams chog gi 'angagasu gyur ma// mamarnams langs skus pa// de klu ng+gA'i thazhipa la// thugs kyi snre la jug pal// da bangs su 'jug pa brtson// nyon mngasadrugapa
88b7(rnying rgyud): mAhA/ na gtsug zhi zhunani// da rmugs kyi nag pa jug/ lcag gzig sasags bcubazhin// bgazugs kyi lasnang ba dres/ da rtsabatudo// bag zugs 'a chags
88b8(rnying rgyud): nga 'du nga ga / ngan pama'o// sems can kyil la nga du// gnam pa thar nga tshul na/ sam thu 'dus mardzo// 'das kya rdzu sa// rnam rad
89a1(rnying rgyud): shing gi po ma la// ti la gong bdud rtse byam par bcas// sems can thog dang mdangs che rdzas// dbang byed pa yings rnams ne// gsor sems pa men phyogs lngal// ma ba ldan snang ba'i rdza.A// gsal ba'i ma mang
89a2(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa ni// nam shes tshogs brgyad spang ba'i rdzas// dang sA wa yi ru mtshon ni// dug lnga'i bag chags snang ba'i rdzas// stag gi rgyal mtshan 'bar ba ni// dmyal ri bskyang ba'i rdzas// nyi ma'i 'khor lo 'bar ba ni// ma rig mun pags pa pa'i
89a3(rnying rgyud): ngas// shwa dang khram shing mang po ni// phung po'i nad rnams sbyang ba'i rdzas// mkhar thabs mda' la sbrul 'khrel ba// phung po'i bdud rnams 'joms pa'i rdzas// gur gyi dbye ba gang lags pa// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// mnga' bzhi rtsal
89a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan gnam du ye re re// ye shes bzhi yi me long 'od lam lam// ral gri rgyal mtshan dmag dpon bzhi// srid pa'i gur chen lnga ni ldings se lding // ston zla gsum gyi do shed la// khri gdugs brdal ba'i shar phyogs nas// dar dkar gur phub ljongs
89a5(rnying rgyud): ldang // de yi sgo khyud g.yas pa la// dri za'i kha ma thogs ye re re// de yi sgo khyud g.yon pa la// spra bo lag rings rgyangs se rgyang // bzhi zur ma gcig ldems se ldem// zhabs brgyad ma gcig thigs so/ theg/ shar gyi grwar bdag sgoms shig
89a6(rnying rgyud): dgyen rna gsum gyi shad la// mi gdugs brdal ba'i rtswa phyogs nas// mthing gi gur phub ldings so lding // de yi sgo khud g.yas pa la// gshin rje'i kham thogs ya ra re// de yi sgo// khrud g.yon pa la// skra bo lag rangs tshangs sa chung
89a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi klu rim gcig sems so sdom// zhabs brgyad ma gcig khrigs so khrig/ b+h+yo gur bdag sgo gyes sheg/ dpyid bla gsum gyi ngo shed la// khri gdugs brdal ba'i nub phyogs nas// kyi dri'i bur thub rdzings so rnying // de yas
89b1(rnying rgyud): khrud g.yas pa la// klu bdud khram thogs ye re re// de yi sgo byung g.yon pa la// smra bo lag rings rgyangs se chung // bzhi zung ma gcig ldems se ldem// zhabs brgyad ma gcig khrigs so/ theg/ nub kyi grwar bdag sgo byas shig/
89b2(rnying rgyud): dbyar tha gsum gyi ngo shed la// khri gdugs brdal ba'i byang rdzogs nas// gser gyi gur thub ldings se sring // de yi sgo khyud g.yas pa la// gnod sbyin khram thogs ye re re// de yi sgo khyod g.yon pa la// sla bo lag rangs rgyangs sa rgyang /
89b3(rnying rgyud): zur ma gcig ldems so ldem// zhabs brgyad ma gcig khrigasas khrig/ byang gi gur bdag sgo gyes shig/ gling bzhi me la sman slad du// glud kyi bye brag ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// lus ngag yid gsum
89b4(rnying rgyud): dag bya'i phyir// 'bru sna gsum la rten bcas te// phung po lnga po dag bya'i phyir// snying po lnga yis don mtshon nas// nyon mongs lnga po dag bya'i phyir// rin chen lnga yi zer sbas te// dbang po lnga po gsal bya'i phyir// spos chen lnga yi hri
89b5(rnying rgyud): yis brgyan// rgyal po chen po'i gzugs gcig la// 'gron bu'i sa la b+ha ru'i lce// zho sha'i snying la long tang mig/ mu tig klad la zer mo'i sgra// thabs chen lcags la shes rab zangs// yan lag bzhi la bden pa'i// nam shes brgyad
89b6(rnying rgyud): la mar me brgyad// g.yas pa rin chen gser dang dngul// g.yon pa b+ha ruM mtshal dang spos// 'bras srang phyed la matang gzugs// g.yas su zla ba'i 'khor lo la// g.yon du nyi ma'i 'khor lo bri// g+ha dang dmu rje btsan po dang // gnam
89b7(rnying rgyud): khyi dkar po ldem pa dang // bdud la re lde 'god yag dang // btsan la baM tsan rje yag pa dang // btsan la skyes bu'i lung btsan dang // chu srin rgyal po ku ber// shan pa byang sprin dmar po dang // lha la AHdza ma b+ha la// dri za zur phud lnga pa dang /
90a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang // nyi bsad kyi 'khor tshogs dang // sdang srid ma mo 'khrug pa la// mthun pa'i rdzas chen 'di 'bul na// 'bru sna lnga la matang gzugs// mthon pa'i sa la
90a2(rnying rgyud): sogs pa yi// longs spyod 'phan bzang bcu gsum po// srid pa'i bgegs chen bcu gsum gyis// lha gsum de ni bcu gsum dang // mgo dang bcu gsum glud du 'bul// srid pa mtsho bzhi las skos byang chen mo'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
90a3(rnying rgyud): phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol ba// dbang chen rgya mtsho ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// rdzogs pa'i thig le chen po dang // rtsa ba sngags kyi snying po bshad// 'bru gsum gser gyi sgrom bu ni// shel ltar dag pa'i thig
90a4(rnying rgyud): le can// A~M ni ye shes rdzogs pa'i sku// A zhi sna tshogs spros pa'i gsung // mthing nag hU~M ni thugs kyi ste// gcig tu gyur pa'i rin po che// skye shi med par sdug bsngal spangs// 'du 'bral med pa phyag rgya'i mchog/ dus gsum theg
90a5(rnying rgyud): zhe gcig tu 'dus// thig le rnam gsum gcig gi dang // kun 'das byang chub sems chen po// rtag chen g.yung drung rgyal ba'i sgra// gnas su bgrod pas thabs mchog ste// gzhan nas 'ong ba ma yin te// bsgom pas rang gi sems las
90a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung // rnam shes hUM ni rtag pa ste// slar gyur ye shes sems dpa' la// bde chen 'od zer 'phros pas brjid// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i ngang // le brgan hUM gi sbyor ba'i dbyings// kun tu bzang po bde ba'i
90a7(rnying rgyud): mkha'// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ka'i yum// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso// 'bras bu gyur pa bde ba'i mchog/ hUM/ kun gzhi bde chen snying po la// su gyur kun tu bzang po ste// bde chen 'od zer 'phros pas brjid// he ru
90b1(rnying rgyud): kA ni byed pa'o// rgar tsan 'og min gnas// ma chags pad+ma bde ba'i ma khar// rdo rnga rgyang pas spyod pa'i lam// rdo rje rgya gram thub pa'is// a dkar ze 'gag med pa'i dbyangs// skyon bral zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// sgro la ma byung ba
90b2(rnying rgyud): btags nas su// 'og min gnas mchog khyad par du// kun tu bzang mo'i skur bstan pas// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du che// dngas ma chen po'i ye shes te// ye shes chen po nyid kyi gnas// gser gyi nyi ma 'od kyi gtso// 'od kyi thegs
90b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i gdan// bcud kyi gtso bo nyid kyi bdag/ rnam shes gtso bo byang chub sems// skyon bral nyid kyi phyag rgya che// sku gyur mngon rdzogs rgyal po la// khams gsum thams cad lha yi dbyig/ sku las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// gsung lnga mi
90b4(rnying rgyud): bzad mdzod du gsal// thugs la ye shes rgya yis btab// rtsa brgyad rtsa bran stong bshad cing // thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin te// bdud rtsi lnga cu rang gnas kyang // stong gi 'jig rten thams cad na// rtogs pa'i mthu dang bub pa'i mthu// rtsal
90b5(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa bsam yas kyang // 'gran zla med pa'i gcig pu nyid// khams gsum bya ba'i ngang nyid na// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba bzhin// kun gyi re skong gcig pu nyid// byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid ni// gyon
90b6(rnying rgyud): thal bas dag pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab dang nyid ni// bsgrub pa'i lam du ming btags kyang // ci la mi brten bgrub dang bral// khams gsum he yi rang nyid de// yang dag he ni gcig pu nyid// dgyes pa chen pos slob par
90b7(rnying rgyud): bshad// srid gsum khrag gi rang bzhin te// chags pa dbang chen gcig pu nyid// 'byung zhing bsdus pa'i sgra ru brjod// snod bzung kha yi rang bzhin te// mtshan ma'i rtog pa ma lus kun// za yin stong pa nyid du bshad// theg pa'i
91a1(rnying rgyud): bye thag bsam las das/ gnas dang gnas me mad bdun pa// sa ste khyang par bcad dgasas// rta'abras khya par spyad kyi san pa// blabangs shes mchogags/ shAtartag na ma
91a2(rnying rgyud): lo'i phe'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / rba ba'i snying po 'di sa ste// tha myed khrag 'thung sbra ye snying por gsal// oM l-i 'gro ba wA ye b+hi bar rdzogs// de la skye dpal brgya dang ldan// A mAM A.A
91a3(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT phaT phaT/ AM AM la dang ma lnga po rdzogs// bder gshegs gsung gi snying por shar// de la gdeng chen bcu yi dbyings// AM AM AM AM AM AM AM AM AM AM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ khrag 'thung thugs kyi snying po la/
91a4(rnying rgyud): las ye shes lnga tshan lnga// de la gsang chen bcu dang ldan// hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM d+hI trAM d+h+waM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ sA sA la 'byung ba lnga po tshang // khrag 'thang yon tani snying po ste// de la rdzogs che na bcu dang ldan/ swa swa swa swa swa mA swa swas @/
91a5(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT phaT phaT/ dbang phyug las kyi rgya mtsho las rtsa ba sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// srid pa'i ma mo thugs 'khrugs pas// nad dang mtshon gyi char pa dang // ltas ngan byad kyi dgra thabs dang//
91a6(rnying rgyud): dus min 'chi dang u me dang // me dang rgyal po'i chang pa 'byung // de yi bskang bzlog ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// de yi bskang lugs bstan pa ni// srog gis bsang ba 'di ltar ro// hUM/ su rba thA med khrag 'thang
91a7(rnying rgyud): brjid// gzungs me dpal 'bar khro ma rtse// sems su mkha' 'gro nam lpags la// rgyan du 'od chen sna tshogs brjid// 'khor du gsang ba'i yum bzhi gdung // yul dang thugs kyi dgyes sde shar// gnas su khros pa'i dbang chen bzang //
91b1(rnying rgyud): khi chags byed chags snyoms grags// gdeng du bu mo spun drug rje// mchod par srin mo 'dun po bzang // gter du gar gyi mkha' 'gro thas// mkha' la bu mo ldan gnyis 'gro// thugs rje las kyi srin ma cha// dpung rnams dmag gi cang //
91b2(rnying rgyud): mos 'joms// bka' bzhin las kyi dbang phyug mdzad// yum chen thugs kyi cho 'phrul las// 'byung ba lnga yi cho 'phrul 'byung // 'byung ba sa yi ngo bo la// rnam snang gsal gyi ngo bor gsal// shel dkar dgu brtsegs 'bar bzhinang
91b3(rnying rgyud): shed nas// rnam par snang mdzad su ni phyed nub tsam// me long lta bu'i ye shes rang bzhin shar// 'byung ba rlung gi rang bzhin las// yang gsal g.yos kyi ngo bor sprul// rgya gram dgu brtsegs 'bar ba'i nang nas ni// don yod grub pa'i sku ni
91b4(rnying rgyud): phyed nub tsam// bya ba nin tan ye shes rang bzhin shar// 'byung ba rgya yi rang bzhin las// gnyen gsal 'bar gyi ngo bor sprul// b+ha ru dgu brtsegs 'bar ba'i ning shed nas// 'od dpag med pa'i mu ni byed nub tsam// so sor rtogs pa'i
91b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang bzhin shar// 'byung ba me yi rang bzhin las// 'od gsal 'bar ba'i ngo bor yul// mu men dgu brtsegs 'bar ba'i nang nas ni// rin chen 'byung ldan su ni phyed nub tsam// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rang bzhin shar/
91b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba rnam ma pa'i rang bzhin la sa// bkrag gsal gnyen gying bor skul// rdo rje dgu brtsegs 'bang ba'i nang nas ni// mi bskyod pa yi skye ni byed nub com// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rang bzhin shar// srog chags bkrag dang madrangs
91b7(rnying rgyud): nyams na// bzang ba'i rtog 'di sar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal ba// dz+dza/ nag thogs yi khan can// mkha' grong sum gyi rdzas su 'phrul// tshon rdzas mangs pa'i bya nas// mangs ldan dang gyis btsun pa
92a1(rnying rgyud): rgal ma lnga yi zhags dam bskang // nam mtha' shel zhig 'acwa bzhil// tha~Md la gzhun gyis smras pa na// pha men tu mtsho la sogs te// dzam bcu bzhwa'i rdzas su 'phrul// nag ma gyur nag sa
92a2(rnying rgyud): srid pa chags byed rdzas su 'bul// se rA mo dang dkar kha chag can// cha snyoms ma yi rdzas su 'bul// dkar mo gser gyi mtha' chag can// e katsa ti'i rdzas su 'bul// sngon mo drang gi mtha' chag can// nam mkha' tshal mo
92a3(rnying rgyud): 'bul// ljang mo sna tshogs mig mangs ris// gling bzhi spyi phung rdzas su 'bul// gser mig sna tshogs mtha' chag can// dmag dpon rgyal mo'i rdzas su 'bral// g.yu mig tshon lnga gzhan gyis skas// gru 'degs chen mo'i rdzas
92a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul// dmar mo khrag gi pho ma thing can// srin mo chen mo'i rdzas su 'bul// nag mo ga yu yi pho mthing can// sa bdag chen mo'i rdzas su 'bul// sngon mo ga yu yi gzha' tshon ris// rdo rje gar dbang rdzas su 'bral// shel mi ga
92a5(rnying rgyud): gyi pho mthing can// srin mo bzhi yi rdzas su 'bul// dkar mo bdun dang ser mo bdun// dmar mo bdun dang ljang mo bdun// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rdzas su 'bul// g.yu mig dung gi chag can// brtan ma bcu gnyis rdzas su 'bul//
92a6(rnying rgyud): der ba g.ya yi zomace la// gsadra ba'i yum gcig mkha' 'gro ma// rnam par rtog bral kun bzang mo// skye med ma mo kun tu bzang // sku med ma mo rtog bral skya// skye med kun tu bzang mo la// bya chen khyung gi gzugs po che// dug
92a7(rnying rgyud): lngarags pas gzugs po che// khrung gi gzugs kyis thugs ngam bskang // byung gi sgong gsu sgong 'bar// srog med gzugs kyis thugs dam bskang // khyung gi gshos 'dab dkar la 'tsher/ byang gi mdangs kyis thugs dam bskar/
92b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' klong yum gyi b+ha ga las// sems can las kyi sku ni mtshon pa ste// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gas la ma// skyon gyis ma bsgribs 'od gsal ma// glang chen gzugs kyis thugs dam bskang // gti mug rags pa'i gzugs po/
92b2(rnying rgyud): che// e na ya ni gzugs kyis bzlog/ gi'u waM bdud rtsi sman gyi mchog/ stobs bcu glang chen thugs dam bskang // thams cad snyoms mdzud kun gyi yum// gsang ba'i gnas nas phrag dog 'joms// ye shes don gsal lhun gyis grub//
92b3(rnying rgyud): thogs med khyung gis thugs dam bskang // phrag dog rlung ni mkha' la 'phyo// shes rab mthar phyin khyung chen gzugs// / khyung gi gzugs kyis thugs dam bskang // hUM/ thams cad sbyor mdzad yum mchog sku// sbyor ba mthar byin
92b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings su gsal// mkha' la rlung chen pho brang nas// thugs rjes 'byung ba'i skur bzhengs shig/ mdangs ldan phud kas thugs dam bskang // 'dod chags gzugs ni 'od 'bar sku// chags pa'i 'bras bur mdangs su shar//
92b5(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i nang gyis zin pa la// rma bya mdongs ldan / khrag gis bskang // phye med mo ni lhun rdzogs sku// shes rab gsal ba'i rang bzhin gsung // thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes thugs// gang gis mi bskyod gsal ba'i spyan// rdzu 'phru
92b6(rnying rgyud): mdadas ldan rjod kyis bskang // nga rgyal rags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gzugs// dang du drag cing mdangs su che// 'di yi drod kyis thugs dram bskang // mkha' la glang chen pho brang nas// kun du byang chub sems chen po// rtog bra la nam mkha'i mang
92b7(rnying rgyud): canam// skye 'gag med pa'i mdangs kyi bdag/ zhe sdang rags pa'i gzugs kyis bskang // rtsal gsum khyon du rdzogs pa 'i// stobs kyis gcan gzan zil gyis gnon// 'di yi sems kyis thugs dam bskang // ri rab ga yu yi bum ce la// rin
93a1(rnying rgyud): can gsu mig ga ster gyisasmras// le banan 'bar pa'i gdugs kyis bkag/ ye rtogs pa'i mdang sa kyis mangs// drugs dang mthun pa'i mtshon la// tshogs pagyid bas dang sams// yang
93a2(rnying rgyud): dkrug gis thugs dam bskang // gcan wAn rgyal po drug po la// dkar la mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// mkha' drug rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang // b+hUM/ ldan gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid can// thika le 'od ci grong dkyil nas// dpral 'bar nyag
93a3(rnying rgyud): gcig sems ma'i sgra// thugs rje sna tshogs dbyings nas 'char// gzhogs phyed na zhing dbugs yi bde// rma bya'i bu mo ha lo mgrin// sbyin dkar g.yang zhus thugs dam bskang // ji ltar snang ba'i bdag nyid skya// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer can/
93a4(rnying rgyud): kun la khyab gdal 'od gsal can// ma gyes dbyings nas phyag rgyar gsal// ha phreng 'bar ba'i gzu thog lham// thang dkar ga yang zhus thugs dam paskang // skang 'bur nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// hUM/ kye 'gro ma lus gso mdzad ma// 'gro ba
93a5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i mig gcig ma// b+hag gsal ba'i lhan rdzogs ma// dug gsum gsol mdzad khyab pa mo// ri skegs ma dngas kyis thugs dam bskang // hUM/ mtshan ma'i rnam rtog ldan rdzogs sku// lta ba 'gyur med byang chub sems// spyod pa spos
93a6(rnying rgyud): med spos dang bral// ma byung ma lces dbyings nas gsal// shang shang mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang // rnam zlog spos bral mtshan med sku// stong pa 'gyur med kunas khyab// khyab gdal chen po sbas pa'i sgra// ye shes thugs yang
93a7(rnying rgyud): sbas pa'i sems// gsung snyan ne chos thugs dam bskang // hUM/ dbyings kyi mamo ske med ma// rnal 'byor rig pa'i thugs mtshan ma// dam tshig nyams pa'i rjes gcod ma// khu byug mdangs kyis thugs dam bsang // zhe sdang rnam dag khros
93b1(rnying rgyud): kodoka ya
93b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra// gcamatshan ma dbyangs nas gsal// ce la thogs med myong pa ma// kun gzhan byings nas dbyings su sbyang // mkha' lding mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang // ji ltar thogs med lhan rdzogs su// dkyil zhes pa'i thugs mchog ma
93b3(rnying rgyud): spyod bral rnam rtog spos med pa// sems nyid mi 'gyur chos kyi dbyings// gser mig mdangs kyis thugs dram bskang // dbyings nas su 'brangs gsang ba'i yum// brtson 'grus ldan grub mthar byen ma// rang bzhin 'od gsal sems ma'i mchog
93b4(rnying rgyud): blang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings// glang po'i mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang // gsung ba'i b+ha ga'i mkha' dbyings nas// mtshan med mi 'gyur nam mkha'i sku// gyon gyis ma bsgribs dag pa'i gsung // thabs dang shes rab gnyis
93b5(rnying rgyud): mid drugs// rnams rkang mar mdangs kyis bsang // grang babs nang rnams zhibar mas/ sdigasang ba'i dbyings las gtung 'chang mo// za ga dzags pa'i can mang zhing // rang bzhin lhan gyis grub pa'i// gting dpag med
93b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas shar// nam mkha' nyan gyi thugs dam bskang // sed pa'i dbang bsgyur mthu ma che// shin tu rnyed dka' gas pa'i yum// rang bzhin 'od gsal glang du 'khyil// rgyal ba'i sku dang ye nas mnyam// gshog sder lto 'pho'i yang/
93b7(rnying rgyud): sa bdang // dmagros mi dag mun pas // oM shes ma ldan gas la pa thug sa// mkha' sar yangs pa'i thugs mang tsam// sreng byud ma dngas kyis thags dam bkang // gsang bam nga 'bang dpa lag yon ldan// rdzas sa
93b8(rnying rgyud): rtogs gas ba mam/ lce ba dad byings nas shang ba'i sems can las kyi mdangs 'phrog sa/ deb nyiti ma ngas kyis bslang // medangs pa'i dang rnams zhi ba mdzod/ ye shes rje mo bcu bzhil// rdzu mong thun pa'i rjes rgyas
93b9(rnying rgyud): sna dang dkar
94a1(rnying rgyud): bstsu/ ma stsug dang gnag lasags// bab ga gas sogs dang // bcwa ba snyen sa zhes thugs sa // / gam dang ma mdza // nad 'a
94a2(rnying rgyud): wa nga8// gzha' tshon 'bar ba'i ri mo can// ye shes jo mo'i thugs dam bsad// traM/ khams gsum za ba'i mngang bdag mo// tshogs kyi gtso mo 'jigs pa'i sku// g.yang gzhi mtshan phyar nas su//
94a3(rnying rgyud): nges med ldem bu'i stegs mas bskang // mkhal sked nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// thig le bcung bsdus dkyil 'khor nas// gdong brgya 'jigs pa'i cha lugs la// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i na bza' can// snyoms gyad chen po
94a4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sra// gzi chen ldir pa'i snyigs mas bskang // pho mchin nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// 'jigs pa tshangs pa'i rtse la gnas// sprin dkar mdzes pa'i na bza' can// b+han d+ha stong sor glad la sab// rab gcig
94a5(rnying rgyud): bzad 'jigs pa'i su// byi ba dz+ri yi snyigs mas bsgrub// me mjing nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// hUM/ ma ri gu gsum 'bar ba nas// srid pa'i drod la nyul byed ma// mu tig zar bu gos su gsol// bde ba chen po'i gnas nyal ma//
94a6(rnying rgyud): li ka'i snyigs mas bskang // chu so'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// zlag ma rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas// nyag gcig dkar mo mdzes ma la// gung gum lcags yu skad la bskor// dngas ma'i gnas rnams nyul byed ma// gor ra ha ta'i thugs
94a7(rnying rgyud): dam pa skang // lgang pa'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// zlag ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas// dkar mo ngal pa 'khyil ba lo/ kha T+wAM ga yi mtshon cha thogs// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sku mnga' ma// ku ku ra tsa'i snyigs mas bskang // stong gzer nang rnams
94b1(rnying rgyud): zhi bar mdzod// sog kha gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// nag mo mche ba'i dpung rgyan can// 'khor lo 'bar ba lag na thogs// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sku mnga' ma// myur ba sring 'gro'i snyigs mas bskang // rgyu gzer nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// rgya
94b2(rnying rgyud): mtsho kukra po'i dkyil 'khor nas// dmar mo khrag gi pho mthing can// rgya mtsho chen po glad la bskor// bshan pa 'bum gyi dbus nas 'gyings// brtson 'grus wa yi snyigs mas bskang // mdze shu'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// hUM/ rlung nag 'khrug
94b3(rnying rgyud): 'i dkyil 'khor nas// ser mo rlung gi go zu can// shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sku// mi kri bya kri'i snyigs mas bskang // lkog nad skam pa zhi bar mdzod// hUM/ nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sku ni dkar mo mdzes pa la// lag
94b4(rnying rgyud): nga dkar ru mtshon bsnams// 'joms byed chen mo las kyi yum// dge bsnyen chas su zhugs pas bskang // dmyal ba'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// nag mo lcags kyi ral pa can// dang nag
94b5(rnying rgyud): ru mtshon lag na 'phyar// 'joms byed chen mo las kyi yum// dge bsnyen chas su zhugs pas bskang // drag shul gzer nang zhi bar mdzod// le brgan dar gyi nang shed nas// dmar mo khrag gi mchu 'jibs ma// dar dmar ru mtshon gyar nas su//
94b6(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed chen mo las kyi yum// dge bsnyen chas su zhugs pas bskang // skyo 'bog nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// ldang nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ser mo rlung gi ral gri'i so// lag na dang ser du mtshon thogs// 'joms
94b7(rnying rgyud): byed chen mo las kyi yum// dge bsnyen chas su zhugs pas bskang // tsha ba'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// hUM/ thugs rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// me long ye shes rig pa gsal// mgyogs ma chen mo lha yi sring // dung
95a1(rnying rgyud): ga dab sa rnags dam pa na/ smrasu pa saka' dngas na pa shAng busu 'bo da/ na sa gzugasas// rlu mang bgag dung // gsang na
95a2(rnying rgyud): dab bzung // skyeng nad 'bar bzhi bar mdzod// chags pa dbang g-i dkyil 'khor das/ so sor rdzogs pa'i ye shes gsal// dmar po kla sa sring gcigs// rangs skang dmar bas thugs dpags /
95a3(rnying rgyud): zhibar 'dzod// phag dog las kyi dkyil 'khor nas// b+hab grub pa'i ye shes gsal// drug mo gnod sbyin phreng po ste// bas slong kha bos thugs dam bzang // steng chu'i nang rnams zhi bar mdzad// zhugs pa khar gragasu pa 'bang ban/
95a4(rnying rgyud): nag mo ral bas stong gsum khabs// snying ba rnon d+ha'i dkyil nA bzhugs// bdud kyi bram tshon phyur nas so// sred pa'i lha 'dzod m+b+ha la srung// des medad d+hA'i 'bras zas bskyed // 'dagasal mtha'i gzugs kyis pa dang /
95a5(rnying rgyud): sar nad rnams ga par mdzod// hUM/ khrag gi rgya mtsho'i grod dkyil nas/ srin mo 'dod chags mi bzad ma// tha god da ma'i snying gis pa dang // sgrib cad do rnams zhi bar mdzod/ 'dapung 'khregs pa'i dkyil 'khong du/
95a6(rnying rgyud): 'khong 'dul mi bdang ma/ gces mongang ma'i khrag gis bzang // rmi thad nang rnams zhi bar mdzod// nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// srin mo nam mkha'i tshe byed can// phung mod du ma'i rtsa yis bkang // rtse na 'bang bzhi bar ba
95a7(rnying rgyud): gcanan spangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'khor 'dral chen mo sku sprul nas// phaganod 'bar ba'i mkhal mas bskrad// 'on pa'i ning rnams zhi bar mdzod// gzhi 'tshan 'bar ba dkrol 'khor nas// bran mo'i 'bang stong gas ma ngas
95b1(rnying rgyud): r-i bar ba kan rdebs 'bras zas bsang // ga khA'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzad// 'dab chags mang po'i dkyil 'khor nas// srin mo nag mo gshol thogs ma// dred mo 'bar ba'i mcher pas bskang // mchar ba'i mkhan na dag bar brdzan
95b2(rnying rgyud): da med mang po'i dkyil 'khor nas// srin mo lhang gdong dbugs 'phag ma// b+hag can gsod byed mkhris pas bsang // mkhris nad 'bar bzhi bar mdzad// b+h+rUM/ lcags mkhar dgra brtsegs 'bar ba nas// nag blos ba
95b3(rnying rgyud): ka med// rdib len bcos de'i mgo bos bskang // 'brum thu'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzad// thAM/ sbrul nag gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'thog mo 'phral gyi kha sgron ma// tsu nad rig pas thugs dam bskang // sha ba za'i nang rnams zhwa
95b4(rnying rgyud): bar mdzod// ts+tsha/ dung mkhar zo ba'i nang shed nas// dkar mo nyag gcig sems ma'i mchog/ g.yu sh+ya sngon mo sna tshogs mdog/ spyan ni bskal pa'i med pal 'bad// gsung gis khams gsum gnad la 'dod// sder mo lcags kyu 'thi
95b5(rnying rgyud): ba'adra// gshog 'dab yi ge dze bris pas// rgyu mi tshogs rnams 'dul bar mdzad// lhags pa'i nad rnams k+Shi byar mdzod// mthing gi gur thub ldi dang nas// sngon mog yA ye ral pa can// bdud bya nag mo lcags mig ma// mar+tha ni b+ha rung ba
95b6(rnying rgyud): ba la// skad ni srin po'i gdangs skad can// gshog rlabs lnga srin dbang du sdud// skyed de ky-i yi phyogs na dzi ni// 'di yi khrag gis thugs dam pakang // sla ba'i nang rnams zhi bar mdzod// b+hu r+ya 'grer thab lding pan// dmar mo thu
95b7(rnying rgyud): ma kha la 'gro// drar khrong lha srin gadrug pa'i rgyu// gaskye mig 'khyil ga'i 'od 'gro mang // ba ga 'jol bar lus lagon// srog chags dang ngas pa'i gdangs skad can// lhasrin 'dral ba'i bya yang can// gtu gang sngags pa'i rang na
96a1(rnying rgyud): ba mdzad// gser rtswa par sa bkums pa na// sder ma 'phar ba'i lding skabs // / son thata pa b+hu da// ba nam gsar kyi sdug pa la// srang na nam mkha gdungs la rtogs// 'dod chags su
96a2(rnying rgyud): sa bkang // rmo sra ba nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// b+h+rUM/ shar phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// dpal gyi mdangs 'phrog na bza'i gzi// dri za mgo bcad khrag gis bkar// lho phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// dpal gyi khrag
96a3(rnying rgyud): pog nam mkha'i gze// gshin rje'i mgo bcad khrag gis bkang// nub phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// dpal gyi drod 'phrog nam mkha'i gzi// gru bdud mgo bcad khrab gis bskang // byang phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas/
96a4(rnying rgyud): dpal gyi drod 'phrog nam mkha'i gzi// gnod sbyin mgo bcad khrag gis bskang // nam mkha'i khams kyi glog ma srin// dam sri 'di yi thod pas bskrad// bar snang khams kyi klog ma srin// dam sri 'di yi snying gis bskyang // sa yi
96a5(rnying rgyud): phung byed nag mo ste// dam gri 'di yi 'bras bus bsang // byang shar rtag sman zor ba gdong // 'di yi lag pa g.yas pas bskang // nub byang ba ma srin rjed mo'i gdong // 'di yi lag pa g.yon pas bskang // lho nub 'jog srin tshwa
96a6(rnying rgyud): gdon// 'di yi darkang pa g.yas pas bskang // shar lto ba la marde'u snga mA// 'di yi rkang pa g.yon pas bskang // dung gi srung mo mgo dgum// ljang mo dang ma'i steng gis bskang // lcags kyi khyi mo mgo dgra ma// skad mo
96a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i snying gis bskang // lcags kyi sbrang mo mgo dgu ma// lcags kyi khyi ma'i snying gis bskad// zangs kyi 'phar ba lce brgyad ma// 'phar bkan rdeb snying gis bsang // gser gyi wa mo rdzu 'phrul can// wa mo 'di yi steng gis
96b1(rnying rgyud): 'ayag/ l+h+was tha mam dngas 'thags// des med 'di yi sha yis bkang // gzhan nga'i rnam rdo sdom ma// ngas meng 'dil khrag gis bskud// \u0f88\u0f90la tha ma khrag 'a basmram// ngas mad 'di yi dras pas byan / rlung kun tham las da /
96b2(rnying rgyud): ma// nges med 'di yi dbugs kyis bskrang // lha chen bu mo lha mo dbang // 'di yi khrag gis thugs dam bskang // dpal chen bu mo dpal mo dbang // 'di yi khrag gis thugs dam bskrang // gnod sbyin bu mo legs mo dbang // 'di yi
96b3(rnying rgyud): khrag gis thugs dam bskang// / 'jog po'i bu mo mu mo dbang // 'di yi khrag gis thugs dam bskang // tshangs ma rdo rje mgo bzhi ma// khro mo rdo rje gzig gi mgo// khyab 'jug rdo rje dred mo'i mgo// gzhon nu rdo rje pha wang mgo// dbang
96b4(rnying rgyud): ni ma gyi mgo// nag mo rdo rje khrung gi mgo// dbang mo rdo rje zed kyi mgo// shar phyogs kring khams zla ga ma du// da re kar phyar ba gsar bting nas// rta dang bong bye dre'u dang kyang // thig pa zlum por gtogs pa'i rigs// shar gyi ma 'dur
96b5(rnying rgyud): gas dam bskang // phung po'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// chu la rdo rje chu sbyin mgo/ be con rdo rje khwa yi mgo// srin mo rdo rje stag gi mgo// za ba rdo rje phag gi mgo// gcig srud rdo rje \u0f7f rgod mgo// khrag 'thung rdo rje rta yi mag// prad
96b6(rnying rgyud): na rdo gcig gi mag// mo rmugs ming khams sog kha la// mthing nag ma dpags rabati nas// b+ha dang mdzod dri shaM ba gnag/ jig pa kha thug gtogs pa'i rigs// rtsi phyogs ma bdun thugs dam bskang// tshong ba'i nang
96b7(rnying rgyud): bri bar mdzad// grub pa rdo rje thu shung man// rlung mo rdo rje shA ba'i mgo// tham pa rdo rje sing ge'i mgo// gsang skyed rdo rje spying ki'i mgo// mi mdza rje srung ka'i mgo// gtum mordo rje phag gi mgo// rga ni rba ngo rje byung gi mas/
97a1(rnying rgyud): nub phyogs gling khams zlum po n+ya// dar dmar phyar bags bting nas// 'damanan ma na sha ban dang // sra ma thu la sogs rigs gsum po// sbrul dang thug pA la sogs pas// nub phyogs ma 'dun drug
97a2(rnying rgyud): spang // 'du shes nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// sna tshogs rdo rje ba glang mgo// klu mo rdo rje srul gyi mgo/ bdag nyid rdo rje kun grags mA// bum sna rdo rje srin mo'i mgo// dmar ser rdo rje ra yi mgo// bu ma sgra rdo rje sbrel gyi pa'o//
97a3(rnying rgyud): rje 'ug pa'i mgo// byang sogs ming khams grwa bzhi la// dar ser phya ba gas bting na// spa dang spel dang shang shang dang // mi la sogs te gdong pa can// byung tshogs ma bdun thugs dam bsrung // 'du byed nad rnams zhing
97a4(rnying rgyud): sman phran yongs kyi bka' sdong ma// bod khams rtsod par mtshon grags pa'i// phra men gser phye mas mchod pas bskrad// rims nad thams cad zhi bar mdzod// ri rab gling bzhi'i gtor ma nI// rdo rje rgya gram mig mang ris// dri
97a5(rnying rgyud): sna lnga rim brtsegs tshul// dpag bas ma shing bu bdud rtsi'i bcud// lha srin sde brgyad bskor phyag 'tshal// tsu ta'i shing dang grel pa'i shing // 'dzam bu'i shing dang sra sgrogs pa// phyogs bzhir byu ru'i sgras btsugs nas// gtor thogs
97a6(rnying rgyud): gnong thogs lha mAn rnams// byang chub shing la skyes shing mchod// de bdun par rim brtsegs pa'i tshul// ro drug rgya mtsho sna tshogs mdog/ bum pa bdud rtsi rgya mig bzhi// lha rnagrags pa'i gsos su che// lcags ri 'brang ba'i mtha'
