98b1(rnying rgyud): gzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// dbus su d+d+ha mr-i yab yum bskyed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ dbu dgra phyag ni bco brgyad la// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bstan// gshog pa rdo rje 'bar bas gtams
98b2(rnying rgyud): khrong chas brgyad su 'dzegs// po tI shAd+hi sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ yab dang gnyis su med pa ste// che lugs thams cad gtso dang mthun// 'khor lo bzhi lagasang ba'i yum// tsar ma nu phaT/ ra dzad ru phywaH/ padz+ra g+har pA ya phaT/ gang po
98b3(rnying rgyud): ta ya phaT/ dkar mo nyi ma'i gzhu can// ser mo rin chen 'od 'bar ma// dmar mo pad+ma'i bcad 'dzin ma// ljang mo rdo rje rgya gram can// gyi yi shar gyi 'khor lo la// dngul gyi phur pa bcu po dang // sgo bzhir mchog gi phur pa bzhi
98b4(rnying rgyud): yang sram mkha' nas khro brgya dgod// sgo bzhir tra kri ta bzhi po dgod// badz+ra gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ rat+na gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ pad+ma gar b+ha kI lA ya phaT/ ka ma gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ me tri kI la ya phaT/ ka ru Na gAr b+ha kI la ya phaT/
98b5(rnying rgyud): lo ka k+Shi la ya phaT/ bi ru kI la ya phaT/ gar d+ha kI la ya phaT/ ya g+ha kI la phaT/ sarba d+ha sha dzaH/ sid+d+ha shi phaT/ gar shra he phaT/ dza ga sha phaT/ oM ma hA shwA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swab+hA pra It+ma ko&haM/ Ad d+ha a haM/ sa man ta a hAM/ prA ti bek+Sha Na a haM/ kr-i
98b6(rnying rgyud): nuny+dzan/ a hAM/ kA ya badza swa b+hA ba At+ma ko NAM/ wAg po swa bA bA At+ma ko&H/ tsit+ta bedz+dza mra b+ta ba au.au&taM/ \u0f7fhUM baM hoH/ thugs rje byams snyoms 'gyur ba med pa'i sra// hU~M wa 'brel po'i gsung las 'gro don mdzad// thugs lnga mi rtog cir yang sa ler mkhyen/
98b7(rnying rgyud): u ga ra thugs kyi gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje dbyings rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho khol// dpal tshon khro tshogs zhal du mchod par bzhes// dam rdzas rnam lnga rang bung bdud kyi wa// dug lnga bcom pas ye shes mchod par bzhes// srid pa'i sha chen
99a1(rnying rgyud): 'o// rgyags sa sa sa
99a2(rnying rgyud): ga pas gangags/ dang patshan ci da byu / chos nyid bka la bdan pa 'ang // gas ma ldan dadang byas te/ byi zung bags kyis kyang / dmigs pa rtsegs tha thab ba pa// rang mi rdzob dri ma/
99a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i mal bsred// bal+la ba gnong pa'i sa rbasa?// bya ba'i rgyal par gzugs bzug la// TI ba de 'gas pasmra btags nas ni// rgyal po de la zab par bya// oM hrI hi rba gdan ladun nang / kha 'dir ling / phyogs phrag tu na/ shi na bral bang na
99a4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug las kyi rgya mtsholas kyi dpal phur dag ke le me bcwa bdun pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi du las// sgol 'khor lo'i gdan ste ste// yag sam mapa' nas spyod sa paste// kho bdu byed pani gas so// gso
99a5(rnying rgyud): nas/ zla bzh-i sa lde chung pa dgod// lagra kA la la ba Ta mra kI la la baT/ bi tsAk+Shi la ya hAH/ bI sha trai la yA phaT/ tAM shA kI la ya phaT/ kaM shas+t+rai la yA laT/ ba shra kA la la wiT/ be sha kI lA ya phaT/ d+h+we sha kI la ya da / shaM rnaMs pa baT/ she
99a6(rnying rgyud): bag sha phaT/ rba'i bas/ reg rje phaT/ dbang dang byin brlang ldan par bya// mtshad dang bzlas pa gong bzhinaH// b+h+yo yi 'khor po'i lte ba la// grwa bzhi b+hag 'i byings nyid ce// brji dang ldan pa'i gzugs nyid la// man sreg tu le gas ba ma/
99a7(rnying rgyud): byung ya nga san// lungs sum sananas thos bcu/ phyogs brgyang khyab par byungs// ngan lag pa'i la gyur// gang ba bgrong gi sngags kyis ga // srung ma thal te ba pa par // de nas byas pa'i sprin 'a breg \u0f7f// thal bag
99b1(rnying rgyud): sarbas// sdug myo dang ma'i rgyam pa cu// gzugs dang drug gangs b+hA la// lugs dang zangs kyig gyes gdag// dung mams ca/ #// lems / grag la \u0f7f/
99b2(rnying rgyud): phyag las kyi rgya mtsho las phur nag gdeng chen gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas skad cig gsum pa la// nub kyi 'khor lo'i dkyim nyid du// yab yum thabs dang shes rab las// gsang ba sngags kyis brjed pa'//
99b3(rnying rgyud): pa ban+da bkod nas// sgo bzhir ster ba'i phur pa dgod// hUM kA ra kI lA ya phaT/ bi dza ya kI la ya phaT/ nI la daN+Da kI la ya phaT/ ya mAn ta kI la ya haH/ AHkI la ya phaT/ ha la kI we kI la ya phaT/ a pa ra dzi ta kI la ya phaT/ a mr-i ta kI la yA \u0f7f
99b4(rnying rgyud): lo b+ha kI la ya phaT/ mthab la kI la ya phaT/ dza la waT/ ke d+ha raM phaT/ dreg sha phaH/ phaT/ dbang la byi na gasnga ma ldan byas nas// mnyes dang bstod pa'i las su b+ha// bsnyen pa dmigs pa'i don du zhen// drub b+h+ri rje mag mdu// gdug bzag po'i ga
99b5(rnying rgyud): nyid la// yan lag lnga po rnams cad la// mnan dang skur ba'i sngags kyis bskor// dza yis drangs shing phaT kyis bstim// nyi zla ldan pa'i rgyal ba yis// rten gyi phyogs bzar sbyar byas nas// hrIHla hUM ges bsdu byas te// yan lag ta na te phyar
99b6(rnying rgyud): bA bya// lha dum bral to zos gas ma nas// dbang gi sbyin bsreg de bzhin bya// phul ba gral gtad de gnan// zangs srin mang dmar srod rten d+ha// rten gyi gsal phur drag pos zab// A~M shrI he ru ka/ zer ba khathun li gri rgyam/ srog la ya ya/ khrag la
99b7(rnying rgyud): thibs sA hA/ dbang phyug las kyi rgya mtsho las phur nag gsang chen gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// de nas skad cig bzhi pa la// byang gi 'khor lo'i dkyil nyid du// yab yus thabs dang shes rab las// lcags kyi phur ba nag po bcu// sgo bzhir rgod kyi
100a1(rnying rgyud): thag zu sa/ la sa/ 'than taN la la/ ram la la/ rgyas nas san la la/ rathA la m+b+ha/ cwal dag 'al ga/ b+h+yaHkAl la/ byungs ny+dza la la/ ga daN la sa/
100a2(rnying rgyud): rig sha phaT/ gang b+he phaT/ ru be phaT/ ki ta rad ta phaT/ byin brlab dbang gis mdzes byas nas// mchod dang bzlas pa gong bzhin bya// byang gi pho brang lte ba la// ma te bzhi yi ling+ka la// lngas kyi phyogs su nges par sbyad// ta kr-i ta yan lag pa di /
100a3(rnying rgyud): gis a yi 'od bsdus nas// mkha' la bab nas phaT gyis spro// lha dum phral te zos bsam na// rdo rje brag yang 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin dag po'i sbyin bsreg bya// thal ba gnod sbyin brag la gtad// gtor nag pa'i lung sa du// kha
100a4(rnying rgyud): lto bdag zug/ gsal ba'i mdongs dang bcas par gzhug/ zir nag pos zab par bya// oM shrI he ru ka thu ra ta kr-i snying la rbad/ khas da ro che la rbad/ na rA tsa dur rbad swA hA/ de nas rjud pas skyugs pa na// nub ka'i 'od dang nam langs nas// pri
100a5(rnying rgyud): dmar zag zer du 'gro// drab se tra gu la ka bi ru tra kha du ya sa to rbang / thig le'i nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// dbang phyug las kyi rgya mtsho las dkyil 'khor phrin las kying bor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// po yi skong lugs
100a6(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// de nas pheM rigs mchod 'dod na// ri rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// ri ba bum pa'i nang du ni// tshangs pa mgo lnga'i gzugs su bya// ri rab bum pa'i shing mtshams su// dkar mo mig gcig gzugs su gnas
100a7(rnying rgyud): shing dang lo ma'i mtshams su ni// brgya byin dbu rta'i tshul du gnas// ri rab bum pa'i lcog bzhi la// TI gi ra ti'i gzugs su gnas// ri rab gyi yi lcog bzhi la// 'khor lo khyab 'jug gzugs su gnas// ri rab bum pa'i grwa bzhi la// stobs bzang ser skya'i gzugs su gnas//
100b1(rnying rgyud): dpag bsam shing gi sked pa la// skos rje drang dkar gzugs su gnas// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// kA la bdud kyi gzugs sa gnas// dpag bsam shing gi sked pa na// 'byung rigs sun dkru'i gzugs su gnas// ri rab rmang gi grwa bzhi pa// phag chen po yi gzugs
100b2(rnying rgyud): su gnas// rol mtsho bdun gyi nang du ni// srid pa'i klu bdun gzugs su gnas// dpag bas ma shing gi snam cha la// nor lha chen po'i gzugs su gnas// hi rab bang rim bzhi po la// rgyal chen bzhi yi gzugs su gnas// ri rab kyar shar mtshams su yang // byang rgan
100b3(rnying rgyud): dmar po'i gzugs su gnas// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// rlutra chen po'i gzugs su gnas// de yi mthun rdzas bstan pa ni// rgyal po chen po'i gzugs gcig la// yan lag lnga la rin chen dgod// gong ma 'dra ba'i gzugs gcig la// me mad brgyad kyis mdzes
100b4(rnying rgyud): par bya// gong ma 'dra ba'i gzugs gcig la// dar sna lnga yi tshe mabus brgyan// rgyal po'i gzugs dang 'dra gcig la// stag gi rgyal mtshan lag tu bskur// gong ma'i gzugs dang 'dra gcig la// nyi ma'i 'khor lo lag tu bskur// rgyal po'i gzug dang 'dra gcig la// /
100b5(rnying rgyud): glang po che la zhon pa bya// gong ma 'dra ba'i gzugs gcig la// shod kyi rde'u thogs par b+ha// mi nag gzugs su byas pa la// khram shing lag na thogs pa bya// 'brang rgyas gcig la mi thung dgu// phyogs mtshams dbus su dgod par bya// mul 'khyil pa yi steng
100b6(rnying rgyud): du ni// phag gi mgo can lta bur bya// 'brang rgyas gru bzhi pa gcig la// klu rgyal bdun gyi gzugs su bya// gong dang 'dra ba'i gzugs gcig la// ne'u le thogs pa gcig tu bya// gling bzhi ldan pa'i 'brang rgyas la// rgyal chen bzhi yi gzugs su bya// thod pa
100b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan dan nang du ni// da khyi'i khrag dang 'bru nag chan// sme bzhi rgyan dang ldan par bya// 'brang rgyas zla ga ma kha gcig la// za 'og mda' la bse blud ldan// bre cha gsang phye bre bzhi la// lcog mo b+han d+ha'i gzugs byas la// mkhar thabs mda' yis rnam par brgyan// zhing
101a1(rnying rgyud): gri 'phan gyis rnam par brgyan// sun gzigs zas dang ldan pa 'di// de ni pho rigs kyi yI rdzas// hrI/ ri rabag yu yi bum pa la// chags pa'i longs spang skud pas grol// shal dkar modzes pa'i skrag pa la// ga ya yi zhig pa
101a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba can// dbu la nyi ma'i phreng bas brgyan// phyag na gser gyi phreng ba thogs// yum dang gnyis su med pa ste// srid pa kun la longs spyod mdzad// 'dir byon tshe srog glud longs shig/ srid pa de yi bka' nyan ni// pha ma med pa'i da las sprul// wa ni gang
101a3(rnying rgyud): riri 'tsher ba la// dung gi ral bzod tshugs 'khril// srid pa gsum sti byad mkhan de// 'dir byon tshe srog grud bzhes shig/ srid pa de yi bka' nyan ni// 'od kyi rdzu 'phrul las sprul pa// rin chen 'bar ba'i na bza' la// zhabs la nyi ma'i phreng bas bgyin/
101a4(rnying rgyud): su la longs spyod pa rgya brgya sbrul// 'dir byon che srog glang bzhes shig/ me las skul pa'i sid pa de// a 'bras shing gri skrag pa la// me tog ha yI phreng bas brgyan// lug ni p+lak+Shi'i phreng 'brokra// grul nag stong gi sku rags can// 'dir byon tshe srog
101a5(rnying rgyud): klung bzhes shig/ nyi ma'i 'od las srul pa ste// bcom gser gyi skrag pa la// swA te ga shar bu'i 'bru thig can// nyi mA'i lha gri glad la bskor// 'di khyon tshe sog grud bzhes shig/ chu yi sbyar las sprul pa ste// gser dngus 'bar ba'i skrag pa la/
101a6(rnying rgyud): trig 'bar ba'i shar bus brgyan// zla ba'i 'khor lo lag na thogs// 'dir gyon tshe srog grung bzhes shig/ nam mkha'i mdangs las sprul pa ste// dpag bsam shing gi sked pa nas// gser mkhar ni ser po la// gser sgo ni thabs se zabs// ga yu bad
101a7(rnying rgyud): ni srin pos bskor// de yi ni nang shing na// sbrul spri na kar ga yang gzhi can// gzha' tshon 'bang ba'i mtha' chag can// 'dir byon tshe thog klud bzhes shig/ dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba la// rin chen ni stegs bral// lcags kyi ni mu khyur/
101b1(rnying rgyud): 6/ wad pa nanag 'a // sngags can lag pa sa// dza d+h+r-in+da ha yis brdzun// lag na mdzu dam bang smras cang // musag na da grus shig/ dbugabs ma shing gi gag na// lpags ma nga na ldan pa la// nas smin mthu' 'gar rtag/
101b2(rnying rgyud): stsalalo// ma hA de wa lha chen po// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'i na bza' la// thod pa 'bum gyi mtha' bskor can// be con 'bar ba lag na thogs// srid pa gsum gyi mthu mo che// 'byung rigs spun dgu'i 'khod kyis bskor// mangs bdag chen pos
101b3(rnying rgyud): mdos pa zhes shig/ rgod ma kha yi sprul pa ste// sa bdag phrag chen mi bzad pa// rgya sin 'bar ba'i skrag pa la// mu tig shar bu'i gshas ba rgyan// lag na nu srin rgyal mtshan thogs// mangs bdag chen pos mdos pa zhes shig/ srid pa'i mtsho bdun nad shad
101b4(rnying rgyud): nas// glang byed rdegs pa'i gzugs su sdang // dbul yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// phyag na don yod zhags pa bsdams// mkha' la yid bzhin char 'bebs shing // rgya mtsho mtha' bzhi na rlabs nas// klu bran thams cad che de brdung // 'dir byon tshe srog lgad bzhes shig
101b5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa ste// ma hA de wa lha chen po// btsun mo u ma 'khor dang bcas// bi DUr sngon po'i zag pa la// gza' skar thod phreng phreng bas brgyan// lag na dung gi zo ba thogs// nor lha chen po'i ming nas byung // mdos bdag chen pos mdos pa zhes
101b6(rnying rgyud): shig/ rgyal po chen po sde bzhi yang // 'jig rten skyong bar mtshan grags pa'i// lha mi yongs kyi 'khor skyong zhing // lha ma yin gyi g.yul bzlog pa// kha dog las bzhi'i mdog tu gsal// rkyen rnams rin chen shar bus mdos// dbul sangs rgyas la
101b7(rnying rgyud): yis mdzes// phyag na rin chen phyag rgyas mdzes// mdos bdag chen pos mdos pa zhes shig/ nyi ma byang shar mtshams shed nas// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// keng rus brtsegs pa'i gdan steng na// dmadzes lngal longs spyod cing // zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i skrag
102a1(rnying rgyud): pa la// shA'i thig la 'bar bas brgyan// da pa cha dgas sgral brgyan// rags banan can byas brgyan// sa ma thab cad bsanas 'thar// mangs padag can pas ma sa pas / brgya gang pa sa she sa
102a2(rnying rgyud): mkhar ni khra bo la// dngul gyi ni mtha' bskor cing // zangs kyis ni sogs la la// de yon bdag mo la// lus la zangs kyi skrag pa la// dung gi thig rgan grang bas brgyan// g.yon pa lcags kya 'bar ba la// g.yas pas phra gis gsod cing gcod// mangs bdag chen pos mdzes pa
102a3(rnying rgyud): sheg na srid pa bskang lung las pa kong gi leng ste nyi shu na gcig pa'o// / tha men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// brtan ma'i rtse thag gang lags pa// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' nal dra// mo brtad ma'i rtsa
102a4(rnying rgyud): rnams// ngas bstan pa la sems bud cig/ dkyil 'khor bzhi yi byang shar dra// maN+Dal tha gang 'khor rgyud las// dbus sa yab yum bskyed brus te// dpal gyi gtor ma btegs byas te// bcom ldan che mchog he ruka/ mdzad pa mthar phyin che ba'i phra mnga' ba/
102a5(rnying rgyud): thugs rje rgyud kyis 'grongan rdzogs par mdzad// yab yAm gnyis med bka' yi ga tor ma bzhes// maud pargod pa'i phyag rdza mdud pa/ oM shrIti ka tsa~M d+hi shA d+hi sa ma ya a mr-i ta ba l-i t+tA Sha haM/ zhes bstab sa/ bcom ldan dpal chen te ru la// dkar mo bcugs
102a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis bskor ba ni// thugs rje las kyi 'bras bu ma ches par mdzod// mr-i daMSh+Tha yo gI nI a mr-i taSh+Tha tI/ bcom ldan dpal chen tI d+hi la// dge mo bco brgyad tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// thugs rje las kyi 'bras tha mchis par mdzod// kha mun pa ti ya hU~M dz+yo khA ta/
102a7(rnying rgyud): zhes bsgrub/ bcom ldadang pal mnata // sku le khrob bcwa drug pasang ba ni// mchog 'bar ba'i phrin las mdzang dru gsol// oM ts+tshin druka Ag rgyal hU~M hU~Ms te/ zhes 'bru ga/ bcom ldan dpal chen tu la// gsungag khro ba bcwa drug bskor bani// gsung
102b1(rnying rgyud): mchog 'bar ba'i phrin las mngad du gsal// oM shI ti drug b+ha ga zhan ga la khAhaM/ bcom ldan dpal chen tA rdul/ thugs kyi slob brgya drug bskor ba ni// thugs mchag 'bar ba ldan las ma jugs la// nA/ Na d+ha la cwa ram rdzun/ sa ldan
102b2(rnying rgyud): rul// rdzogs chen khro bo bcu drug bskor ba ni// yon tan 'bar ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// sA shrI he ru ka ra t+na ke tu puSh+TiM khA nA~M/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// sprul pa'i bu mo brgyad kyis bskong ba ni// bka' yi gtor ma 'di / las sa
102b3(rnying rgyud): mchis par mdzod/ kro N+Di shwA d+hi ba sA ta rag ta khyA hi/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// ser mo lnga badz+ra \u0f7f drug tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// bka' yi gtor ma 'di 'bral na// las kyi 'bras tha mchis par mdzod// pho Sh+Ti hrIt+ta rag sha deg ba / com ldan da
102b4(rnying rgyud): chen he rul// shwA na mA khwa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// sru yi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// k+Sha ya du ra ga to ya tiSh+Tha hU~M/ bcom ldan dpal chen te rul// gsung gi pho nya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// grA ma hA \u0f7fkhadur tra~M ka nar khA Na/ bcom ldan dpal
102b5(rnying rgyud): la// thugs kyi pho nya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// thugs kyi phrin las 'bras tha mchis par mdzod// rak+Sha kro d+hi shwa rI tA ri ka ta ra khA ti/ 'jigs byed yang yum 'khor bcas la// kha 'bar rje 'dren brgyad kyis bskor ba la// thugs kyi min las grub par mdzad
102b6(rnying rgyud): gsol// tsa dur kha sa pa ti rag ti rag dur khA hi/ de nas dpal chen yab yum la// bdud mo bzhi dang gnod sbyin bzhi// sman phran bzhi yis bskor ba rnams// bka' yi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// srid pa'i phra men rgya mecho
102b7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa la/ srid pa gsal ba'i don du gtad pa'o// sgrub mchog rnal 'byor rnams dang 'phrad par shog/ srid pa'i brtan ma las kyi rgya mtsho'o// srid pa mtsho bzhi'i le'u tha ma ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po srid pa mtsho bzhi'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs//
103a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang mo la phyag 'tshal la// 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i phun rol na/ sems can thams cad sems mya ngan las bzla ba dang / the tshom bcad pa bcad pa'i phyir/ rdo nga sems dpas gsolal/
103a2(rnying rgyud): gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi chos rnams la// sems nyid mya ngan ji ltar bkra// rtag chad mtha' nyid gang dubadz+ra// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gas na nas kyang // nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsa'ang
103a3(rnying rgyud): gnas zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// gnas la nges pa du zhig mchis// dus zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// dus la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig g.yung dung yang dag pa// ston pa rnam gsu myi rig pa'i gter//
103a4(rnying rgyud): 'pho 'gyur med pas gnas zhes bya// yang dag don rtogs dus zhes bya// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// lha la rnam pa du zhig mchis// 'khor la rnam pa du zhig mchis// lung la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' rtsa
103a5(rnying rgyud): tsig/ nyon cigag yang drung yang dag pa// lha la rnam pags mtha bstan// 'khor la rnam pa gsam du bstan// lung la rnam pa gsum du bstan// gnod 'dral lha yis yang gsal pa// hud ces b+ha bdi ltar 'grus// wang zhes b+hA
103a6(rnying rgyud): lags// man ngag bgyi ba ji ltar lags// nyon cig gsung drung yang dag pa// s+yAd ces zab 'bral ba'i don// lung zhes thab ston pa'i bka'// min dag zlab la bzlan// gnod 'dul lha las yang gsol pa// sum gyi dbyings
103b1(rnying rgyud): gas gangal ba'o// yab kyim pa' zhes gang la brtse// 'khor pa gnas 'ang ma 'dul na// maung zhes tha ba das bu// nyan cig gsung drung gapa dag pa// 'dra 'thal da'ang bya gsadub na
103b2(rnying rgyud): pa bad pa'i slong // bde ba chen po don rtogs na// brang dor med pa de yis grub// gnyis mdangon togs de yi dang // gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol// / chos nyid rtogs pa ga yang drung ste// sems nyid rtogs pa'i la dong pa// 'drar khrid
103b3(rnying rgyud): brjod pa gang // ngan gsol pags na nas myang // mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' dral ba// nyon cig gsung dung yang dag pa// chos nyid rtogs pa'i gsung drung ba'o// sems nyid rdon gyur ba la// rdzogs pa'i lta ba 'dor ba'o// gnod 'dul lha sa yang
103b4(rnying rgyud): gsol ba// mags bya ba gang gis ba/ rtswa zhes bya ba gang gi song // ma mo'i gtad tshigs de ltar lags// 'byung bas po gang las grub// sangs rgyas su nyed gang gis grug// bdab chan po dang nyid las// rkyen gnyis kyis bgying lagasusam// bar
103b5(rnying rgyud): brtul shid las// 'dil 'ab gyu rgyas lags sa// cagags sa dadas sa/ bas che bzab ma // shes bas la ba thob// mdang sa ya stos smran// ma babyu sa rnamasangs par dag/ 'ang ba sa
103b6(rnying rgyud): zhes nyim dang la shapa/ chen pa sgom pa nyid du// thams cad ma rnamasangs rgyas so// hU~M// gsang ba'i mam chen pa'i leb sna pag/ ting 'don dbang chend kyil 'khor babyed// bdag nyid pa rajog gyur bsgomapa pa
103b7(rnying rgyud): sa sus / chu pa / gal gyims / de su na/ ldan pa ga 'a sa 'gas/ sa
104a1(rnying rgyud): su sas smra des na tu na tu
104a2(rnying rgyud): 'i ma du sa pa das dang byugs/ ga pa ga
104a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyag mi byed ma// bkang ngo bskal ba'i thugs dam bskrad // dacings kyi mchen bcad rnams dang // yul gyi srid mo bzung rnams snang // bkang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam 'akang // bskal li chung chags dpa ma bur chung gi le rba gro ga wa~M/
104a4(rnying rgyud): da sa sa gas sa// na pa ga / pas 'ag byed // sngams na la mdag pa sams nas// sa sams su sa nga bas
104a5(rnying rgyud): sa// gsas sa rgyas la khri / dus dag lamags nas kyang// macoM k+Sha g-i bka'adzi pa// gtsugadrug pa // mi rnamasas sa pal dzAg/ 'dus sa dngas sa pan/
104a6(rnying rgyud): gagasas nga yang dag pa// 'ag 'i snying thal na rgya// rgya ga zug pa'i ding rung // yadang rnaMme yig sde/ dam pa ga kyi tshig pas bskrad// nog shig tso gang sra bzhil// sgra dang ma la ming bris la// tshod zung rjems tha nim
104b1(rnying rgyud): kAng dung d+har bcug nas ni// 'og te sbyin phyogs dag tu bstan// dur nag po'i rta rkang bsdam// gong ma'i las rnams bsgyur la bya// des ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// des kyang mtshan ma mag+ha // / 'da' rab nyid srog pa la// maN+Da la pi daH/
104b2(rnying rgyud): gyis dge// a ti ra yi thag pas bcings// da ra ba ti rgyud pas gdags// pra ma ti yi dud pas bdug/ 'jig sha shing la btags nas kyang // dad la phyar te snga mig blta// a ta ra yi lcags kyis zab// rda nA ti yi drud pas bdug/
104b3(rnying rgyud): ma ti'i mda' yis brdeg/ gra par yi mgul tu btags// ma la ti yi mdoms nas dbyung // sa 'bar mA yi snying po bzlas// rna mnyan phra ma'i gzugs zis la// lha dang mi yi bar du gzhug/ ma ra Na yi sngags kyis dbye// mtshon cha'i phyag /
104b4(rnying rgyud): bcas nas sa// gzugs pa rnam par brdeg par bya'o// rak+Sha t+ya'i jag sngags kyis gdab// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// aM ku sha ye sngags kyis drang // zhags pa'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// pA sha hUM gi sngags kyis bcings/
104b5(rnying rgyud): lcags sgrog phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// s+pho Ta baM kyi sngags kyis bsdam// dril bu'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// g+haN+De ho yi sngags kyis gdab// bdag nyid dbang chen srur bsgoms te// slob drug rnams gnad la gdab// gong ma'i las rnams
104b6(rnying rgyud): brgyar la bya// des ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// des kyang mtshan ma ma byung na// 'da' da pi ti'i sog pa'// nu ta na yi khrag gis bris// 'da'i na nag ni sa dong du gzhug/ che mchog yab yum bsgoms nas ni// sman mo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas//
104b7(rnying rgyud): dab// bskul ba'i phrin gyis gzhung bzhin bya// nye 'byed kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing // lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed pa// sems can kun la
105a1(rnying rgyud): gan zad pang// rtagatsugadrug pa'i sems sngar la// nAn du pas rnams ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag shA // des sa stsal ba gakun dag ga/ dam cang gagasu paka tham
105a2(rnying rgyud): sa
105a3(rnying rgyud): khrag gsol ba yis// dgra po'i gzugs dag bris nas ni// tsher ma can gyi shing dag la// rdzas kyi tha d+ha'i shing bu la// dmar ti dmar po'i lcag 'bras gdags// dgra po'i gzugs la brdeg par zung // yang neka sa'i shungs la//
105a4(rnying rgyud): prarba ta yis ni// 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro lnga mo yang // tsar ma ti ti lis ni// lte bar chags 'dzin spyan gnyis ze// gang pa gnyis la ma bdun ni// g.yas pa'i dum thu bzhi po la// phung zed klas pa'i ma bzhini// g.yon pa bum grungs ma
105a5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa'i dbang ra ban po na// gsang ba'i skam bzhi snang pa la// nyi na thong phreng nying ge dky-i'o// masrid ta mtsham pa'i la'o// phung gi bdag mo bzhugs sugasol// khyi ma'i dmar po 'khor rnams kyis// grang rtsibs 'bor dang la
105a6(rnying rgyud): ga/ a b+h+ya chen po gzungs pa la'o// dus drug rgyu ba'i dag po ni// shang gnyan dang bgreng ngo // 'di rnams nem me gung la g+ha// rta dang lhag dang ragasam ni// 'di ni nyin bzhin rtsa pa'o// rdo khol drug d+hAHbskyed dang // dus drug smra ba de bzhin no//
105a7(rnying rgyud): ltar du bkras pa'i sngags rnams ni// gong gi sngags rnams bzlas pa yin// sngags nyung dag la khri 'bum du// bzlas nas dpra la brdeg par bya// g.yon gyi dme lag bcad nas ni// rang gi dpral ba'i dbyes su bzhag/ bdud kyi chas su zhugs
105b1(rnying rgyud): nas ni// skra bshig mi gnas mchi ma phyung // da phyogs nyid du bstan pas ni// nga ro dag rngu bzlas nas kyang // g.yas pa'i phyag tu sdigs mdzub kyis// sngags 'di dag tu bzlas la badz+rag/ snying la bdag ldan sha/ ral po lag 'thung ka
105b2(rnying rgyud): yang ta sa ral ho// shal gyi spyad la he kra he/ badz+ra baN+Da d+ho ru lu ru lu/ sha khrag skams pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / gdod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dam las 'das pa'i sngags gzer dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma grol ba dang /
105b3(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul drag g.yos na// ngan sngags rdzu 'phrul ji ltar bzlog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// dam las 'das pa'i sngags gzer dang // 'jig rten
105b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma byol ba dang // dregs myos pa yi rdzu 'phrul dag/ bzlog pa'i las rnams ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngan sngags par bu bzlog pa'i phyir// gtan tshigs man ngag 'di gsungs so// ba ko 'dra ba'i maN+Dal byas
105b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten mtshan ma byol ba dang // maN+Dal mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya// swats+tsha tsa ti mang du gdab// phyi yi bshags pa gzhung bzhin bya// de nas gsang ba'i mtshams kyang bcad// de nas dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bya// nang gi chu pa sarba
105b6(rnying rgyud): btang // bskang gso sdang skong grangs kyis gdon// bskang ba'i gnas lnga gzhung bzhin bya// ma hA shAn+tiM mchod par bya// ma mor gyur pa kun kyang bskang // yo byad nag po gzhung bzhin btang // rtags dang mtshan ma zhib tu brtags// rtags dang mtshan
105b7(rnying rgyud): ma zin pa dang // song zlog cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// des ni mtshan ma bzlog par 'gyur// de nas bskyar te yang gsungs pa// bskang ba des kyang ma skong na// dbang gi rgyal mo'i srang bsgoms la// rtsa ba gang yin ma mo de// ku sha la ni gzugs byas la//
106a1(rnying rgyud): yan lag bsdus te \u0f7f yis bsdam// sman mo lnga bcwartsa gsum yang // shang kun dag la gzugs byas la// dang ngata la rgyad pas/ gdags// ya shas rnam bcu ban yang // cha mchag sung ba rnams nas na// man
106a2(rnying rgyud): lus bsnol te gdan du gding // des ni ngan sngags zlog par 'gyur// des kyang las rnams ma grub na// brtags te rtsa ba gang yin la// shog shog dag la gzugs byas la// mchog gi phur ba dag gi brdeg/ sman mo lnga bcu rtsa gsum yang //
106a3(rnying rgyud): 'jag ma dag la gzugs byas la// zangs kyi phrar pa dmar pos gdab/ dbus kyi ma mo nam gsum yang // zhing gi shun pa'i ras ma la// khrag dang mtshal gyi gzugs byas la// gser ram ser po'i phur ba gdang // des ni ngan sngags
106a4(rnying rgyud): zlog par 'gyur// gal te las su mgyur na// dbus kyi che mchog yab yum gnyis// skra tshil dag la gzugs byas nas// lcags sam nag po'i phur pa yis// thugs ka nyid du gdab par bya// las rnams 'bab par gdon ma za/
106a5(rnying rgyud): kI la ya yi sngags brjod nas// chos nyid dbyings su 'dub par bya// che mchog tugs kyi phyag rgya yis// 'gyur med dbyings su phrar pas gdab// ngan sngags par bzlog pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gas /
106a6(rnying rgyud): pa// de ltar bar bu bzlog nas ni// sngon du sngags kyi sngags gzer des// tshe srog nyams pa ji ltar gso// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// sngon du sngags pa'i sngags gzer des// tshe srog nyams pa gso ba'i phyir// gso ba'i
106a7(rnying rgyud): gangs bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de dbus su// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad bri// pad+ma chen po de dbus su// rin chen 'bar ba zur brgyad bri// de dbus zla ga ma/
106b1(rnying rgyud): zlum pa la// b+han+ta mtshan dang ldan pa bzhag/ rin chen 'bar ba'i zur brgyad la// lnga la rtag pa'i rtsal mo la// gnyis pa skra sha pa moH// gcig la cha la sbyang ba za// pad+ma rgan pa'i 'dra ba brgyad la// phyogs pan pa sa pa 'das#
106b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed// mtshams su gsang ba'i yum bzhi dgong// 'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa// phyogs bzhi phyag mtshan chen po ste// gnyis par rtsa mtsho dzod phreng dgod// gcigs che yi snying po dgang / mang rgyas
106b3(rnying rgyud): sa'ags pa byu / zhi yang dag / la man na rgyan cig da ca pa sa rnams pa/ 'thugs kyis bsgrub pa nga// mams
106b4(rnying rgyud): u ta'i b+ha ba'i sngags kyis gdag// dngos grub rtags dang myur nas ni// gso bskyed bzang shing gtams par bya// tshe sgrub pa'i rim pa sti 'i 'drug pa// / gnod 'dral lha yis yang gsol pa// dpa' bo theg la rnams pa
106b5(rnying rgyud): thig le'i spyod pa nyams pa rnams// las de slar la zlog pa'i phyir// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang drag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de las smrar la zlog pa'i phyir// nges pa'i man ngag ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung //
106b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba'i tshe// bsdam pa'i phyag rgya bsol nas ni// dag pa'i yul phyogs bstan pa ni// srog shing thun ras la sogs// mr-i de'i ming nus bris nas ni// de yi lag tu bskur bya'o// shugs sgrol mA yi
106b7(rnying rgyud): gyis gdag// khrag dang drug gi gto mi yang // rabs cing thod par bshams nas ni// yul sa 'i phyogs su ga ta ma gtar// steng gi phrer ba byung nasar+b+ba// amr-i ta yis mchod zas na / dam rdzas cang ba'i gtar ma la// kra par mi
107a1(rnying rgyud): mdu du na nasmra su /
107a2(rnying rgyud): tsham rnams ca// ngag phra la dbang gis bapyod la btung // 'di sar ma mjug rgyal gyi// dpal gyi dbang gis bzlas la btang // las kyi mi 'byub mi srid do// 'arnams pa'i rgyugacas bkros rna / 'brog na 'i zhing ni lcags kyis bsdam/
107a3(rnying rgyud): na sa sa smra
107a4(rnying rgyud): 'phangs la gtang // zhing gi rga thi la risogs kyis// ma mo rnams la gtang rag gtang // las rnams 'grub par gdon mi'aM// ngan grags par byas bsad pa'i oMn+d+ra hUM bdun pam// gdang 'dral lha yis yang gsol pa/
107a5(rnying rgyud): na pa gnyin sa da // sa bachung la 'a phyi / sems na nas bgyung pa// rgyab cu drug pa dun pa nas// na sa ma du das// rdugams sa nga na du
107b1(rnying rgyud): gsan nas byung // rom char lha yis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur pas// sems can sun la gnang byung dang// nan tu ma las rnams ngas bstan nas// nyan ga gam
107b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa'i mi gzugs la// mkhar thabs mda' yis rab brgyan nas// gling bzang dang dkar zas kyis brgyan// mau byed tshogs pa'i gdong pa dang // 'jog mnga' yis rnam par brgya// kye yi /
107b3(rnying rgyud): ri grwa rnams la 'di skan nor// sol ba'i dong ni khwa gang par// nang du krung gyi rgan du mnan la/ de'i nang drags pa ram ga yu brdu la/ dgra gang yin par sog la gzugs bris la kha bub tu mnan no// de'i snyed rdo rgya zam gyis gan/ das
107b4(rnying rgyud): gzugs zis te 'dod pos lwa bldang / las myur bar 'grub bo// skrag rgod la dpag bsam shing gi gzugs byas la/ yang na glog pa ming rus bris la snying gar rgan/ gsar ga yu gnyis gos rje dreng kar la dza/ de nas mnad la 'drar drug tums pa 'ang
107b5(rnying rgyud): grwatis gdags so// a ti pa ti thag pas gdags so// 'dod drug tu 'dod/ des ni sgro 'bog drag pos 'debs par 'gyur ro// lcags dang gseng gsu bsres la khrol mo zhig 'dzin la bzlas te/ gong du bstan pa'i gzug dang bsngo ba'i las sta
107b6(rnying rgyud): la rus thal thun pas gtums la par ti'i dong du gzhug go// ye shes ma mo'i phyag rgyas gdab// de yis dbang po mi gsal ba dang // lha rig pa dang lpags par 'gyur ro// lcags dang gser dang zangs dang bskum brdar la ya bdud chen po la bsngos
107b7(rnying rgyud): la/ gang du bstan pa'i gzugs dang bsngo ba'i las sngags bsres layul 'i dang du gzug go// rgya mchog rteg kyi rtsag rdzas gang / des ni ma zur dru che bar 'gyur ro// 'bru ba nani zi gang la gling man bcu gnyis kyi gzugs byas la dgang mas brgya pa
108a1(rnying rgyud): yar la shad kyi skyes to ral bsnga'o// de nas 'jag ma la gzugs byas la dgra ba'i ming rus bris la gzugs kyi snying gar bla nan// zas la za ba'i rgyal byad du gzug go// dza dod drag tu 'bod do// de/ byas
108a2(rnying rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rus pa sna tshogs bsdus nas gshin rje la bsngos nas yas stags de'i gseb tu khams la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la ming rus bris kha bub tu bstan la 'da' 'gengs pa'i tshul du bya'o// ci yang rung ba'i zhing lpags bsko rna la gshi nag po
108a3(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis gdags so// des ther 'chi'o// mi nor du btags pa'i gzugs byas la/ sa la u ma de wa'i gzugs byas la/ u ma de wa'i steng du bskyon la 'dod chags spyod pa'i tshul du bya'o// ma e ba ni zan tsam ni phaT/ bya ba'i sngags kyis ga
108a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// mkhal sked na ba dang / pho mtshan spangs pa dang / chu 'gags nas 'chi'o// dung gser g.yu dang bsre dang mtshal la sogs pa'i yas stags sna tshogs pa dang dgra po'i ming rus bris la/ ra ti tsha ra'i pags pas gtums la swa ti sa la ma ran
108a5(rnying rgyud): bzlas te de la gdab par bya'o// des ni myur du 'bog par 'gyur ro// bse dang drang dang lcags dgra bo'i ming bsres te rdza nag po'i nang du bcug la/ ba ta ma na'i sngags kyis btab la bos shing gtad na rbab dang g.yang du 'gro'o// cho ga byed pa'i dus sum bdun
108a6(rnying rgyud): kyi chas su zhugs la ro khrag gis byugs te/ bdag nyid dbang chen ting 'dzin nam lum mu kha le'i ting 'dzin du zhugs la/ gzhung bzhin bskul la las bcol lo// pho rigs phyi mal las bcol zhing gtad pa yod na 'khu ldog che la rgyang 'gyur bas 'dir ma gsungs so//
108a7(rnying rgyud): dgra go bdud nag po la gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa // / chu srin pir gyi kha nang du// gre bar rin chen song bltar// bskal par bzhag kyang mi gtong ngo // rmongs pa 'phyar bas byin gyur na// dus med par ni srog zad nas// bskal pa
108b1(rnying rgyud): bdun du nag par 'gyur// gsang ba gtan tshigs zhes bya'o// ma mo 'dus pa'i/ N+Da rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ man+t+ra a lang zlar bu rgya ti la ka taH/ 'ad ska du/ ma mo srid pa zla gsang thig lang byung / dbang 'a thams
108b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas khyab gdal chen po/ bde ba can dang pad+ma can du thub pa mos pa can du snang bar byed pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
108b3(rnying rgyud): po za med te n+ya ka de ni/ nam mkha' chen po mi gnas pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rtsal po dang / gang yang ma 'gags kun snang chen po dang / ma gsungs pa gsung ba'i gsung ba chen po mdzad pa dang / gseng mchog bdag po blang na
108b4(rnying rgyud): du na tha sa sa smye pa spya dus gsum pa sa sa na sa pa gas pa/ dan ma
108b5(rnying rgyud): sa / na nyid// stong pa da sa da ba da 'i nga sa
108b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / las las grub pa dang / zhing las skyes pa dang / sngags las skyes pa dang / dam la gnas pa dang / bka' la btags pa dang / mos pas 'dul ba du ma dang bcas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum gyi b+ha ga las sku bzhengs nas zhal
108b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros pas 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang la la ni skad cig tu dga' ba bzhi nyams su myong / la la ni gyi'i gnas bzhir dga' ba skyes/ la la ni nang gi gnas bzhir dga' ba skyes/ la la ni rnam togs
109a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dga' bas lag rtag spangs/ lal na chos nyid rang ga ba nya masas kyang bad dga' bas rtags par shar/ kun tha gas 'aza ma dang zugs shig la rgyud ngan rtags par ba rang chu gyu ca gnas sa// da
109a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams kyis bachod pa dang rdzas dang phyag rgya bsgyur ba dang / sngags dang dbyangs brjod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin pazang pos bcom ldan 'das la bsngags pa 'arjod/ phra men mchoms snga drangs nas mthon gcig tu 'di dad ces gsol to// ma // gas
109a3(rnying rgyud): brlang byung ste zhes che// thabs byin thags thig le 'di// kye hong ba tu brtag dka' ba// dbang po'i ltar gnas pa kyi// gsang ba yi shes bzod pa lam// rnam pa mngon du gyur pa yi// thig legasang ba'i thig pa rnams// gas 'byed pa 'ang stonam
109a4(rnying rgyud): 'di// ji ltar gnas pa ci rtse shod// 'dir 'dus ma 'ongs kun don du// zhwa ga rang bzhin gnas pa yis// rgyud chen yang dag bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// 'a sa kyis ni sems sa
109a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus// sems kyi cho 'phrul cir snang yang // sna tshogs sems la bsdu ba'i phyir// skal dang ldan pathang la nyon// ces gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i zla gas thig le las/ s+yAd 'byur ba'i bya phreng gzhi dang / rkyen gleng spong ba'i le'u ste dang pa'o//
109a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad yongs su 'dus pa las klan 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// thams cad chos kyi rang bzhin no// ye nas sangs rgyas rnam dag cing // ye nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dorje sde/
109a7(rnying rgyud): mi 'byar yongs su grub pa yis// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kyi dang // ye nas lhun gyis grub par gnas// snod kyi chos rnams rang bzhin ni// thams cad mnyam par bkod pa'i gnas// gsang ba bas kyang yang gas zhing // kun ga'i chos kyi pho ba la/
109b1(rnying rgyud): gsang chen yum gyi mkha' dag pa// thig la brdal ba chen po'i klor// ya 'byams rmad du grags pa'i gnas// smyos pa med pa'i gzhal yas khang // phyogs bzung rgya yongs ma chud pa'i// chos dbyangs chen par kho na// ta
109b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas// rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// bcud kyi rang bzhin chos rnams ni// ston pa chos kyi mnga' dbang rdzogs// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin thams cad dpal// che ba'i yon tan thams cad la// dmas pa'i spyod pas spyod pa yid
109b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes de nyid kho na la// kun nas kun tu bzang po yin// thams cad chos skur sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad la snang ba'i ye shes mi 'gag par shar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na
109b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // mun pas bsgribs pas de ma shes// sems can rgyu yang sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas rgyu yang sems can yini// rig pa stong pa chos sku la// ye shes 'od gsal chen po gsal// dngangs
109b5(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes yab yub sbyor// chos su 'od gsal gnyis kyi sras// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// 'jig rten rgan mo long ma 'dra// kye ho ku ku ra tsa ni// yid kyis kun tu 'tshol ba ni// min pa'i don la yin par sems// de la nges par 'jog
109b6(rnying rgyud): dang // log par yang dag gtan la 'bebs// 'jigs dgras tho la mir 'dzin 'dra// lus ngag yid kyi dge spyong pa// mtho ris gnas su skye ba'i rgya// de ni mi ldan sdig la gzhol// de ni ngan song 'gro zhes bshad// la la lung du ma bstan pa/
109b7(rnying rgyud): rang sbal tsam du snang ba yin// nyon mongs lnga la zhen spyad pas// swa kyi 'khor ba drug tu skyel// la la 'jig na la lar chags// la la stongs na la lar gnas// lhun po gling dang mu khyud bcas// shi ba med pa'i bcud kyang grub// mkha' la 'phyo ba'i
110a1(rnying rgyud): gnas kyang gsal// 'og nas brten pa'i gzhi yang grub// stong ni chung ngu zhes bya dang // de bzhin stong gnyis bar ma dang // stong gsum gyi ni skyong chen pa// snod nas bya bar rgyal bas bshad// de yang las kyi srid pa las/
110a2(rnying rgyud): rdzas dang ma sa las byas pa dang // dradag ga nang migs pa dang // byung ba dang spa ma rnams pas// gcig gin tan dag cig se nas// rlung mkhris padag na dus pa pos// rgyung dang ba zun tus// zung brtag pa sa /
110a3(rnying rgyud): yum chen dang du rdzogs// ma rig chen po'i rdzir gyur pa// rnam shes rten dang bral ba yin// de min sdug bsngal gsum brgyad spyod// drug gi las bskal brjod mi lang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po ye shes dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
110a4(rnying rgyud): par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// ma bsags tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs pas// dge ba'i stobs la zad 'phel med// ma bsal sgrib gnyis rang dag pas// sgrib par gyur pa thams cad dag/ ma sbyangs thams cad mkhyen grol bas// yon tan thams
110a5(rnying rgyud): cad lhun gru ba rdzogs// de ni skye dang 'jig pa med// des na mya ngan 'das pa yin// ngo bo dag pa chos kyi sku// rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa che// mdzad pa sprul pa'i skur byung bas// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid
110a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ston pa yin// rdzogs sangs rgyal ba rigs lnga ni// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan// sprul pa grangs med sna tshogs ni// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po// sku gsum rim par snang bas na// thams cad kun gyi ston pa mdzad// ces
110a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le las 'khor 'das spyi'i gnas lugs dang / ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i gnas lugs dang // rtogs ldan sangs rgyas kyi gnas lugs bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom
110b1(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis thugs rje chen ba rgyun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lag rtog nyid kyang byang chub sems// sangs rgyas nyid las mi gzhan gyid// dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du// rgyu bo lta bur chad pa med// thugs rje'i nyid
110b2(rnying rgyud): kun la snyoms// ma shel dag la brten nas ni// rten 'brel 'dos nA ma du sdug/ chu shel dag las rgyu 'byung ba// de bzhin sngon dang rjes 'dug/ byad dang mi long bzhin du gzigs// thang dar med pa'i mdzod spyod ni// yul dang yul can gni las zo'//
110b3(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin chos la mi gnas yang // rang sems dag pa'i bsod nams yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zag pa thams cad rabatugs la bzhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// nyon mongs stong zag brgyad cu yi// gnyen par chos kyi sgom spro// chos dang gang zag pa dag/
110b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyang // dal brjod rnam gsum smra// nyan mongs sbrul zhen pa yang// nyon mongs lam slong gsang sngags s+ho// mas bachung ngu'i don ched du// spangs pa'i ban tanang cu gnyis dang // gang cag cos la bdag blta zhing // rba ba yan lag tshu khrims
110b5(rnying rgyud): 'asrung // lus ngaga'i dgesum dge byed// bden pa nan me don bslabs nas// 'bras bu rnam bzhi 'grub par 'dzad// dmigs bzlab 'dul don du// 'brel cing byung brten 'brul zhor// gang zag chos la d+ho grag cing rtogs// rang gams grags kyis
110b6(rnying rgyud): dka' thub srung // rdu dbul smras kyis gro dan myong // dge bzhis mi snyom mngon goms bslabs// na tshobase rlas bur gnas// rab cing rgya che 'bul ba ni// bden pa gnyis kyi sgor zhugs nas// gang zag chos la bdag med cing // byang chub sems ldan 'jug
110b7(rnying rgyud): pa bsrung // tshad med bsdu ba'i dngos po spyod// pha rol gyin bcu sgrub par ldan// sa bcu grod nas sangs rgyas gnas// bya spyod 'dul ba'i don med du// goms byang sgom lugs byin rlabs skor// don rtogs byin brlabs ze khol tshul// rang gi rtsa ba yan
111a1(rnying rgyud): lag bzung // srin las thus dang gcas ma/ drag zugasas dang ldan pa nags/ gas gsum mnan pa'i sa ladag/ mnyam pas du bad rnad// drag grang
111a2(rnying rgyud): byed// lta ba sbub thabs 'bras bu ni// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes su bsgrubs// gnyi ga'i rgyud ces grags par bshad// rigs padi rdo rje chang sar gnas// zab chos 'dul ba'i don mo da// mngon par byang chug sa 'i na// don rtogs
111a3(rnying rgyud): grogs por blta// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig bsrung // phrin las bzhi la ting nges spyod// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bsgrubs// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'grub par 'dod// tshogs kyi sgrub pas 'dral don du// ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas/
111a4(rnying rgyud): dbyer med skye 'gag med par blta// rtsa ba lnga sogs yan lag bcas// sgrol dang sbyor la rab tu brtson// thabs shes gnyis med bsnyen bgrub bzhi// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen po// mnyam pa'i spyod pas 'dul don du// yongs rdzogs ting 'dzin kor zhugs
111a5(rnying rgyud): nas// dbyings dang ye shes yab sras lha// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa bsrung // mtshan ma spyod med snod bcud med// ma skyes brjod pa'i tshul du bsgrubs// pad+ma can gyi sa la 'gro// zhes gsungs so// ma mo'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las/
111a6(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes gzigs pa dang theg pa so so'i gnas tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad yum gyi mkha' las shar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// yang dag pa
111a7(rnying rgyud): sa nyid ldan// mtshan dang ba kyang rgyan thun// 'gros don mthun byed can// deni myags ma zhes su bshad/ kun ga'i byang dang nyon pa byung // sgos sbyang dang rnam pa'is/ nga / di dag dang mashes
111b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang gsum yin no// de ni dag pa zhes su bya// las sgrib byung ba sprul pa ste// nyon mongs sgrib byang longs spyod rdzogs// shes bya dag pa chos kyi sku// de ni sgrib pa byang ba'i rim// dang po ma nor yang dag su// su gnyis kyi ni gzhi yin no// sgra gnyis
111b2(rnying rgyud): btags pa tsam yin te// de nyid min pa'i sgra med do// chos kyi sku yi gzug brtan yin// dper na me long rgya zla bzhin// sku gsum lhan grub ces kyang bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad yum gyi mkha' la gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug
111b3(rnying rgyud): nas 'di gsungs so// kun gzhi rin chen gzhong bcu// nyon mongs goms pa'i yid byung ba// gos pa med pa'i ying gnas te// 'dzin pa brda 'a sbyor sgo lnga las// chos dbyings me long mnyam pa nyid// so sor bya grub ye shes wa// yu ma gyi mkhar la
111b4(rnying rgyud): sra shar bas// zhal gyi nang du gzugs su thab// thugs la ye shes rnam lnga shar/ dkyis sum du bshad pa mdzad// ces gsungs so// ma mo g+had lung blags thig le'i rgyud las phywa gsum dang ye shes lnga bstan pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// / de nang/
111b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad kyi lam yongs su gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba// bkra shis yid 'thad gzung mthun par// ston pa 'khor dang yo byad rdzas// dus dang bcas pa ldan nas ni// sa yi b+ha ba tsun
111b6(rnying rgyud): tu zin// dkyil 'khor bzhed dang zag chag gdab// thig dang tshon dang bri ba rnams// co ga yan lag tshang ba dang // rgyal chen bzhi dang khro bo yis// phyogs mtshams phur pas gdab pa dang // mgon pa mchod dang phyogs gtor btang // bgegs la sogs pa/
111b7(rnying rgyud): zhi ba dang // saM r+b+ba mdo 'don srog myob cing // bskang bzhags dam gri sgo byang rnams// tshogs kyi lam du bshad pa yin// dkyil 'khor steng du dmadzes dgod// gnas khang rnal 'byor mchod pa'i rdzas// byin brla ba nang mtshams bcad pa dang // ting 'dzin
112a1(rnying rgyud): gsum dang thang bam// gnas sras pang dang bcas pas// mab shis tu da/ gyur ba'i lamanas bkung stsa// tshigagasas pas rabathus bu/ dadag brlams par badra rung / ma
112a2(rnying rgyud): bsdus rgyal mo lnga// sku bskyed spyan drang bstim pa dang // sprul pa'i khro mos sman mo dgug/ dam btags mna' bor dal du bkod// phrin las bcol ba'i gnyer gtad pa// bsgom pa'i lam du bshad pa yin// tshogs kyi phud kyis ma mo mdzod// lhag ma
112a3(rnying rgyud): skra na mo'i tshogs la dbul// tshogs dang lhag ma la sogs te// lha gsung ba sres la phrin las bkrol// ting 'dzin pasar la bzlas paH// rtags dang mtshan ma mthong ba dag/ bzlas pa them par gyur baTI// mdzong ba'i lam du bshad par ni// brtson pa
112a4(rnying rgyud): thim par gyur ba dang // rang gi 'dod pa'i dngos grub rmang // slob ma'i tshogs la dbang bkur ba// bya ba'i las rnams grub pa ni// mthar phyin pa yi lam du bshad// de'i don rnams yongs rdzogs pa// rig 'dzi nas la bzod pa'am// yang na sangs rgyasas lnga
112a5(rnying rgyud): 'gro// bcu gsums la gnas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// mamo'i rgyud lung gas ba'i thig le las/ lam sngamathar byin par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba rnam par dag par rkyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting
112a6(rnying rgyud): la rnams pa grangs te 'di ga sum so// byung bas yi dngas mni// rdzogs kyis par 'grom// rnam hAng gsal du mya ngan 'das// sa nas rtag tsam ming gis stong// rtswa ni dra'i rigs yin to// gnyen gas la kyang 'das ming gis stong // na ra /
112a7(rnying rgyud): che ni rigs su bshad// mya ngan 'das stong 'dags la 'bar// rlung ni las kyi mamatsho// yang gsal 'das stong rtag tsam thal// rnam mkha' kun gyi gnas byur ma// bde gshegs yum gyen bklag gas la mnyam// 'byung lnga'i mkha' 'gro 'di lnga /
112b1(rnying rgyud): mi rtag pa rgyal mas// dbang ni 'byung ba thal ma dang// las ni ba da thams cad 'drag/ sems can thams cad tud par mdzang// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par dzad/ thag cad na gas dag na na sa
112b2(rnying rgyud): nges shes kye// g.yo'i dzin rlung ni las kun byed// ye shes nam mkha' nas gud stongs// 'byung ba lnga dang stong pa nyid// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gror sgom par bya// rdo rje 'jigs pa'i 'od zer gyis// zhe
112b3(rnying rgyud): bco kyang rgyangs// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil gnas par// rin chen mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// rin chen 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// yi dgas sgrib pa sbyang bar bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil gnas par// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya//
112b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis// 'dod chags mi yi gnas rnams sbyangs// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil gnas par// las kyi mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// rdo rje rgya gram 'phrong du yis// ngadargyal phrag dog lha min sbyangs// nam mkha' dacings kyi dbus
112b5(rnying rgyud): gnas par// de bzhin mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// 'khor lo'i 'od zer 'bar 'bros pas// gti mug kyol mo rigs rnams sbyangs// u mi las skyes pa yi// bu mo rab tu mangs pa ni// pad can dung can grang sde can/ ri dgas can dnga'i socang/
112b6(rnying rgyud): b+hibyin brlab dbang bskur mnyam 'dod pas// rlung dang shes pa nyid 'dzin gyis// bde ba chen po skyed byed pa// bcu drug dngas shes ting 'dzin gyis// bde ba chen po skyed byed pa// bcu drug dga' ba myong bar bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bud
112b7(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi dngos grub 'dis// mkha' 'ab spyod pa'i gnas su 'gro// gsang sngags gsang ba'i mdzad spyod ni// thabs chen zlags thig le yin// ma mo srid pa'i thugs thig le'i rgyud las/ mtsho'i rang bzhin dbyings su bstan pa dang pra mo'i ting nges 'jo jog/
113a1(rnying rgyud): srung ba dang / chags pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas par 'gro ba ste le'u drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi don yongs su bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa 'di gsungs so// sngangam ba nyid kyis stu/
113a2(rnying rgyud): sto zhing gsal ba'i rig pa nyid// rang rig ma mo'i ngang du grol// de ni chos kyi sku ru 'dod// de ltar rtogs na ma mo yin// dman pa'i spyod pa yongs mi spong // yang dag don la smad pa min// lus ngag spyod pa mtho dman rnams// ji ltar mthun par spyod pa yin//
113a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po nas// gzugs brtan dral du rgyan 'dren cing // dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin grub pa ni// de ni ma mo'i dkyil 'khor yin// bum dbang rdul tshon dal du bskur// rig pa'i dbang lnga rdzogs par bya// gsang dang shes rab bde chen
113a4(rnying rgyud): po// rdzogs par bskur ba ma mo'i dbang // yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// skyon med bsrung dang nyams na bshags// rang gi srog ltar mi gtong ba// de ni ma mo'i dam tshig yin// zhi rgyas dbang drag bdag gzhan don// de spyod ma mo'i phrin las yin// bsnyen
113a5(rnying rgyud): pas ye shes ma mo la// bsgrub pas las kyi ma mo 'khol// mchog tu thun mong thob pa ni// de ni ma mo'i sgrub pa yin// ces gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi dngos po bdun gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//
113a6(rnying rgyud): sa bcom ldan 'das kyis bgrod pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// 'char nub rnam rtog rnal 'byor rtsa// skye 'gag ye shes dngos grub gnas// rgyu ni yid las byung ba las// de yi bdag po bsal bar
113a7(rnying rgyud): bya// mdun du yul la dmigs pa ni// bag chags de ma thag pa 'dres// rtsa nang lha mo rab tu sad// snang mched thob pas nyer gnas pas// yul drug la ni rnam par spyod// ye shes snang ba 'char ba'o// nub pa de dag zhan pa
113b1(rnying rgyud): dang ni 'od 'phel dang // gzi brjid ma ni gsal ba dang // 'bar ma 'od can dmigs sogs rten// mun sa la dang ni 'od ma dang // sdang ba ma dang gsal mangs ma// gsal byed ma dang 'od 'dum// nyi mar gsal drug gzugs sogs spyad// bcu gnyis
113b2(rnying rgyud): yul la zhen pa log/ yid la byed pa rang la zhen// dbang po skying dkyil hU~M ring la// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i grong khyer du// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// ngang gis ma bcos ye gnas phyir// yongs kyi 'od kyis rab tu gsal// nyi ma'i snying po lha
113b3(rnying rgyud): bas// 'char nub ye shes chen po ste// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// snang srid rnam dag dang du shes// phyi nang gzung 'dzin 'gegs yin pas// pags pa rdo rje ba spu me// lus ngag yid kyis las byas pas// sgrib pa byang ba bshags bdag sems//
113b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad rten 'brel che bar gnas// de pyir bdud rtsi lta bsham// chos rnams stong pa nyid las byung // dpyir dang po de bzhin nyid// nang du stong pa'i rtsis zin na// phyi rol snying rje yongs la 'char// don mdzad rang sems snang ba ste// de phyir rgyu yi yi gegs
113b5(rnying rgyud): sbyang bya snod kyi 'jig rten pas// skyong byed rim pa 'byung bar brtsegs// bzhugs gnas chos kyi dbyings yin pas// ma bsgrubs pa brang gzhal yas bskyed// bag chags gling snong dbang spyad kyir// mkha' 'gro bcu bzhi gdan du gding // rgyud dang
113b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun byang bas// bla med mu ka yab yum rol// thams cad chags pas rang bskyed pas// dga' dang / ba dga' bral ba'i dga'// lhan cig skyes pas 'khor 'das kun// sgrib sbyangs thug bskul mkha' 'gro'i rgya// thig le 'bar ba'i sa bon
113b7(rnying rgyud): las// rang rig 'byung ba nyid du kye// nam ma pa'i mkha' 'gro ba thagags la mnyam// sa yi mkha' 'gro rnam snang gsal// me yi mkha' 'gro 'odags pa 'bar// chu yi mkha' 'phrog tan gsalam// rlung gi mkha' 'gro yang gsal g.yos/
114a1(rnying rgyud): 'amatho ga nags cal da// byung ba rdzalas ba ngas thag/ thugasam dbang ma rgyalag// smyan dang ma tshad ba gas pams// rnags las tham pa mnangan/ bcugasu ma byas bas ma'ag/ nga
114a2(rnying rgyud): bsdus dam btags dkyil 'khor du// nyi shu rtsa bdun las la 'gyed// rdod dang rtags dang mtshan ma yis// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub kun// sku gsung thugs la thim gyur na// bum pa rname snang chu yi dbang // cod pan 'od gsal mnyam pa nyid//
114a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gnyan gsal 'dod chags dag/ dril bu yang gsal rlung gi b+ha// rdo rje ming ni bklag gsal zan// kun 'dus mu ka b+ha med bye// 'dir sbyang bar mdor dran pas// rig pa 'dzin nam gang mos sam// sangs rgyas thams cad thob pa yin// grol/
114a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam du brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor kun gyis bsgom par bya// chags pas chags pa grol byed pa// lus kyi g.yas g.yon dbus gnas pa// gzung 'dzin med pa'i dngos po ste// 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug dang // rlung dang makris pa bdakan dang /
114a5(rnying rgyud): nyin mo mtshan mo mtshams kyi Ni// 'dod gzugs med pa'i khams gsum dang // rgyal ma 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor gusum// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // stong nyid la shes rdo can// pa las byung ba'i gtur ga// mA yis byin pa'i sa nA mo// rang gi phyir
114a6(rnying rgyud): pa chags su bshad// srog gi rnam pa 'di gsum du// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa grub// brgya tshan gsum dang de steng gnyis// rus mtsho klad pa de la yod// rkang gnyis la ni skad rnams 'byung // de la zas kyi longs spyod gsol// bzhi gnyis rang gi snying yin te// rdo la
114a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das chos gnas so// bcu tshan drug dang de steng bzhi// ma ste bu ste 'brel bar sprul// me dang rlung gi gnas ni cho// de yang bya gsum 'od ma'i gzu// g.yas kyi nyi ma dmar zhing gdangs// g.yon gyi zla ba dkar lags la// dbus kyig pa bstan pa ni// ba'i
114b1(rnying rgyud): gas kha gas/ mgasus sa// na/
114b2(rnying rgyud): chen bcu gnyis sra shad 'dzings// stong phrag la sogs 'thag brkyangs// 'bar ba gzung ring 'khor lo gsum// mechu mtshal gyi dbang pos mthong // mtshams la g.yal byung mkha' mar mig/ rngam byer ma ni rol spyod// mkha' ma'i rlung gnyis tamar byed/
114b3(rnying rgyud): kun/ rgyal badri la spyod// rab gas la thogs ma tha yin te// byed pa chen po thams cad da kyis// rkang lag mthe bong mya ngan 'das// de bzhin srin lag gdon dang rje// gsang ba rdo rje bang+gA 'dra// b+hag bde ba chen po mongs phyongs// d+ha mi zhigacig le chen por/
114b4(rnying rgyud): dag sr-i t+te A dum rgya gasreng// sa ser yon tan las niH// des shing gi ba'i dka ba y-i// thabs dang ldan pa sngon pon// zhing gtum pa ser po dri// 'bras shing sgom pa'i dimi rje// then zhing grags pa spug rnan de// cha brang dra dag gnas rnangs byung /
114b5(rnying rgyud): a ra yi ni 'og tu bshad// kun la a li ka li sogs// khyab par 'dres dang so sor gnas// d+hu gA yangs pa'i sdong po la// bsam gtan oM dkar shes rab a// dmar zhing zung 'dug mthi ga r+the// snying po dbyibs kyi a dkar las// drag po Ta
114b6(rnying rgyud): dmar hU~M nag stobs// skya srin dbyibs nang srog dmar pa// khrag gi zigs pa bcu gnyis lung // khams kyi dri chen rnam snang la// chu yi thig le gnyen gsal ma// ma ni khrag ste 'od gsal 'bar// rlung ni bsil babyang sems yang // kun 'dus rtag pa'i mu
114b7(rnying rgyud): kham// t+ya gnas dro tha tham las// yang gas yin mos ni btu'abar// pa mdud ma mngangs rmi ni// phrirnon pa gas sa chen po lang// 'byung 'drug gnas pa rnams kyis brgyad// 'dags la 'ab ni rab tu mas// nam sangs nyi shar dra bltar/
115a1(rnying rgyud): zhi ldan nam snang gas la yang bskal// bzag gsal bde ba'i ros gang ba// dang po rang nyid sbyang bar bya// bud med 'dod pa'i chags pas blta// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' ba la// pad+ma ri na mnyam bya rabs// shin nachas mA
115a2(rnying rgyud): thig le dbab// mi mkhas thig le myur du nyams// rus gral 'gros kyis mkhas par bya// rnam par smin pa mchog tu dgang // 'bobs phyir thig le 'bar ba'i drod// bsrubs pas mi rtog bde 'bar ba// rnam par 'joms pa bral dga' yis// g.yos
115a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i drod la thig le gzung // mi mkhas bde ba yun thung bas// lus ngag 'gyur ba'i las rnams bya// rtags byung thig le zin pa na// pad+ma ling+ga kha sbyar bas// bde ba g.yo ba brtan par sbyor// n+ya mtsho re rab ngos la sbyar// gling bzhi rang gi gnas lnga/
115a4(rnying rgyud): ro 'jon rang gi gnas la sbyor// dbang mchog nyi ma'i steng du bzhag/ hU~M ring hUM phaT mda' gzhu bya// ske rags bcang zhing zhags pa 'phang // bu chung spyod lam rab tu bya// mtshan nyid bral ba'i lhan cig skyes// bzlog pa ma shes chu dang bsdang // de phyir dung 'gre
115a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba bya// 'grims pa ma byas nad yin pas// de phyir rnam thal phyag rgya bya// lus kyi khol bu phar cher ram// thams cad snang dngos bde ba kye// nang gnas spyi mgrin lte steng gsang // bdag yum gzung 'dzin tog gsum 'gog/ de phyir grong
115a6(rnying rgyud): yin// bde ba chung che mi rtog dang // bde stong de yang lhan cig gyes// sra dkar bral dang stobs rdzogs gsal// mtshan dpe tshang zhing 'chi med pas// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag po ste// tshe yi rig 'dzin thob pa'o// zhes gsungs so// ma mo chud lung
115a7(rnying rgyud): gsang thig le las/ lam gyi ma pa ste'i 'ub kyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i ngo bor gyur pa 'di gsungs so// kun gzhim skyes bu ba li// dbu la phyag drug zhabs brgyad la// 'khor bcas sdong bzung ma lus kun// rang de
115b1(rnying rgyud): skal bzlas la bskum// mi ting gzhi sul ma ba r+N+Na shA d+ha/ badra ba thong 'dus na s+t+rai shA shas to \u0f7f/ skyeg drug ma thar mthabs bcang byed// bklag gas la mnyam kyang btad// zhal gsum thug drug ldan dang cas// bzags kyang ma chen mor bajugs/
115b2(rnying rgyud): mgrin pa pad+mar gnyen gas la ma// gsung gi mkha' 'gro rab tu bsgom// snying ga dpal be khyen ma sdang gsal// rdo rje mkha' dgro 'khor dang bcas// lte bzur brgyad 'od gsal 'bar// yon tan mkhang 'gro rin po che// gsang nga rgya tham yang gas
115b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du dang byung ba// dpal 'bar khro ba gsang yum bzhi// khams gsum cud gcod skye shi gcod// drug gsum dbang sdud pa d+ma dbang // gnod sbyin srin po dam chog khro// gsang ba'i khro mo dpal 'bar khro// ka ma le drA ta d+hi / ces gsungs so// mtsho
115b4(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i rgyud lung zla gsang las ye shes kyi gtso mo sprul pa dang bcas pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor lus kyi ri rab la// srid pa bde 'gro chen mo dang // de sbrul nyi zla
115b5(rnying rgyud): thod grang dang // der bsgrogs pani'i dgyes rje bzhi// nal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo bzhi// phung byed klas pa'i mamo 'i// gnyis ni srid pa yongs kyi dpal// ban ni dpal gyi dazungs ma mdzad// bzhin rnal 'byor chung ma ste// 'jig rten byed byed chen mo ba'i//
116a1(rnying rgyud): de dag dam tshig brjod pa 'di'o// oM badz+ra kro tI shwa rI ba ga pad+ma r+ya hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra shan+tiM pad+ma ga ru ti b+h+yo// oM mu tri ni/ a shan+ti ni/ ba ga dun+ti ni/ kha mun da na tri ni/ oM badz+ra sur+ya byi ta ma to ye/ badz+ra pad+ma byi ta ma to ye/ badz+ra kha rag b+hi ta ma to
116a2(rnying rgyud): badra sring 'gro byi ta ma to ye/ oM badz+ra kaM ma badz+ra ki ma/ badz+re ta ke ma badz+ra ta ke ma/ badz+ra ni la badre ni la/ badz+ra lan+ta badz+ra lan+ta/ ma mo thams cad chags pa che/ oM b+hi She ka tsi ri las/ lus kyi rtsa rnams bum pa ste// sngags ni gsang ba zhes su bshad// khams kyi
116a3(rnying rgyud): sa pa nasanam bye // tham pas rgya rdzogs pa las// sa krigasang pa 'dib gas kyi// shes rab la gsas gnyis gcan/ bad can gisas byung du gran// yong bye pa yab la// gnyis pa pa
116a4(rnying rgyud): gsum pa las kyi 'khor lo ste// bzhi pa rdo rje'i rba rlabs bstan// dang por sbrul sku'i zhing khams dbang // gnyis par longs sku'i zhing khams la// gsum par de bzhin chos sku las// bzhi par ngo bo nyid sku thob// dang por lus kyi dkyil 'khor mthong
116a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis par b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor yin// gsum par byang chub bdud rtsi sems// bzhi par dus gsum bde gshegs bcud// dang por 'khor 'das dbyer med pa// gnyis par ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// gsum bzhir bde stong chung dang che// de dag mthong
116a6(rnying rgyud): spyong lam gnyis kyis// rgyud rtags 'bras bur bsdus pa las// nye dgu dbang dang lam gnyis las// phyi nang rten 'brel rnam gnyis dang // thig le rlung dang de kho na// phyi nang sems kyi rtags zhes bya// yang dag mya ngan 'das pa thob// de phyir ye shes
116a7(rnying rgyud): rngo mo yin// shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba// haM 'dus mgrin par dga' ba ni// nyon mongs pa dang me bzhi las// mos pa chung ba'i lam chod nas// snying gar mchog tu dga' ba ni// gnyis gsum bzhi cha zhi ma yin// dmigs pa phra ba'i lam yang chod//
116b1(rnying rgyud): ma tham dang ma dan/ rtswa tog sa cang rgyan// dag du gnas nga zlab na// bga' nyal dag zhug// zlas pan sa/ gas pa'i gnas sa snyam pa'adu/
116b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin mnyam pa nyid rtags kya // phan ma nyan chos rnams rtags// thams cad gnyis med le shes thab// mitan dan thachos kyi dbyings/ legs rnam pa rdzog da// legs rnam snga du b.las// thaman po dang ga
116b3(rnying rgyud): gamakhan ma dang chos mi dang / gtam mo ldan rgyag pa nyid// rigs na bud med la rdzogs byed// 'dad yon dmatshig ye shes dang / ming dan ma med te druga'i// ming bris bcu gnyis rdzogs pa dang // rtswa dang kyi mar phyag rgya sbags// de nyid

117a6(rnying rgyud): lag sus / rtson pas su su du /
117b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis dgag/ rlung tu nyu sams sgra yis drangs// bad 'phrul ni sbyor bar byed// ma med na chod mthun pa ra// bsangs dang 'gegs bskrad ltar bskyed ltar// dang byor gnas snang bsrung 'khor bsgom// nyen la gnas mchog mnyas par bya// sA
117b2(rnying rgyud): nas gzugs shing ltung ba ni// rtags dang nges par ldan pa na// mi sems gcig la lus gnyis par// nas g.yas g.yon snying gang thugs// gang du bcug pa'i gnas der song // gzhan gyi grong la thugs zhes kyi// rdo rnams yang ni dgag pa dang /
117b3(rnying rgyud): tshungs pa stong par dbye ba dang // snying ga hUM mthing drangs pa dang // dzod gsher mngal sgo bde gnas su// mda' 'am phyogs kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra// yang gsal g.yos ni sde dang nang // haM zhes bya bas rim par ni// hi ma thab tul// ga
117b4(rnying rgyud): yis zin par gyur ba na// phyag tu chen po'i rig 'dzin thog// ces gsungs so// ma mo'i byed lung blags 'jig le'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor ba zhi pa'i lam ye shes su rol pa sti le'u ba rgya gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dkris
117b5(rnying rgyud): 'ang rnams kyis bstod pa/ yem to// rab tu bzang ba'i la shes ni// dngas po san la rab tu gnas// dbas po 'dzin pa log pa te// lag par shes partson dang bral// don sus kyi drabu las// sbal pa'i srabyung ngas gyur ba// de nas sngags
117b6(rnying rgyud): kyi yi gan// yongs spyod rdzogs brtang byung chos// sems can lus bcud khams kyi bde// datid mi rton chos su gnas// yang gas la rang bzhin snying po med// de nyid nga pa nyid du dag/ sra bzhi'i snying bar ring shar bas// dri theg pa pu mra'i bdag
117b7(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang // sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// bud med rgyud kyi don rnams ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyud las grub// gsang ba'i dbang phyug dpa' bo la// rig pa'i ye shes ngang du 'dras//
118a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'gyur \u0f7f// hanaka la 'dud phyag bstod// ces gsungs so// de nas ston pas rgyad yongs su gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gang gis 'byung ba nam mkha' 'angan// da ni bzag gas la mnyam du
118a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// sa ni rnam snang gsal du bstan// me ni 'od gsal 'bar ba las// chu ni gnyen gsal ma yin te// rlung zhes bya ba yang gsal g.yas// 'byung ba lnga dag mu kha le// chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyud 'di yi// bud med stong pa nyid du gnas//
118a3(rnying rgyud): de mtshon thabs kyi phyag rgya che// dra ba'i nges brgyud 'di long // thabs kyi sbyor ba'i stong nyid 'di// bde byung bud med lag tu byin// de zla gsang ba'i thig le nyid// mig ldan dbang phyug sbom du ltos// ye shes gsang ba'i rdo rje 'di// rnal 'byor dbang
118a4(rnying rgyud): phyag chen po dang // ye shes ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // sku gsung thugs kyi mi zad rgyan// gatshar lo gsang ba'i dang la bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khod rnams dgyes te rjes s+ye yi rang bar gyur to// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung rnags thig le bud mod
118a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ rjes su bzung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / ma mo zlagasang thig le'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta gu h+ya gsang ba las/ 'brog mi dpal gyi ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / thugs kyi yang snying ma mo
118a6(rnying rgyud): 'bum tig gi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rtag pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems khyab gdal ba'i rang bzhin la yum dngos grub chen por bstan pa dang / thugs kyi sbom bu las byung ba'i dgongs pa'i brnag pa mthar phyin pa'i don du gsungs
118a7(rnying rgyud): pa las/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi chos rnams las// sems nyid mya ngan ji ltar bzla// rtag chad rnam gnyis gang du bsdu// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pags na nas kyang // nyag
118b1(rnying rgyud): gcig yab kyis bka' stsal ba// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// snod kyi 'jig rten kun bzang po// brgyad kyi 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyu// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rtag chud rnam gnyis mya ngan 'das// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsal pa//
118b2(rnying rgyud): ston pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// sdud pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// gnas zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// gnas la nges pa du zhig mchis// dus zhes bya ba ji lta bu// dus la nges pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad
118b3(rnying rgyud): gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ston pa rnam gsum ye shes slu// skud pa rnam gsum rig pa'i gter// 'pho 'gyur med pas gnas zhes bya// yang dag don rtogs dus
118b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya// rdo rje sems pas yang gsol pa// lha la rnam pa du zhig mchis// 'khor la rnam pa du zhig mchis// lung la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis
118b5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// lha la rnam pa gsum du bstan// 'khor la rnam pa gsum du bstan// lung la rnam pa gsum du bstan// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rgyud ces bgyi ba ci ltar lagra// lung zhes bgyi ba de ltar
118b6(rnying rgyud): lagra// man dag bgyi 'di ltar lakra// de skad gsol pags na nas kyang // yang dag rdzog kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// khyud ces bya ba 'brel pa'i bka'// lung zhes bya ba smyon pa'i bka'// man ngag ces bya la bzla'o// g.yung drung lha mos/
118b7(rnying rgyud): yang gsol pa// yum gyi dbyings shes gang la bgyi// yab kyi mkha' zhes gang la bgyi// thang dor med pa gang gis 'grub// 'khor ba'i gnas 'di mi 'tshal lam// klong zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag
119a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'dra 'bral med pa yum gyi dbyings// kye shi med pa yab kyi mkha'// bde ba chen po'i don rtogs na// blang dor med pa de yis 'brab// gnyis med don rtogs
119a2(rnying rgyud): de yi dang // rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// chos nyid rtag pa'i g.yung drung la// sems nyid rtag pa'i blos bzhag na// 'gyur med don zhes rung lags sam// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// chos
119a3(rnying rgyud): nyid rtag pa'i g.yung drung la// sems nyid rtag pa'i blo bzhag pa// rdzogs pa'i lta ba la rdor ro// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// ma zhes bya ba gang gi dbyings// mo zhes bya ba gang gi klong // ma mo'i gtan tshigs ji ltar lags// 'byung
119a4(rnying rgyud): lnga po gang las grub// sangs kyis dgongs pa gang gis 'grub// bde ba chen po'i nga nyid las// rgya rkyen gnyis kyis bskyed lags sam// 'byung ba lnga yi nga nyid las// 'di la 'pho 'gyur mchis lags sam// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka'
119a5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ma mo'i don rnams rtogs pa'i phyir// ma mo'i sa rnams nges par thob// yid bzhin nor bum btsal rnyed// ye shes nyi ma rang la shar// chen po lnga yi dang nyid du// thams cad ma lus spangs
119a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas so// gsang ba gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dang pon// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// zag pa dman pa'i 'og ma dang // muHdam med dam nyams la// mi bstan skya ba'i dam tshig gang // bdag gis nan
119a7(rnying rgyud): tan ji ltar bgyi// mngon sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gas na nas kyang // mngon sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// theg pa dman pa'i 'og ma dang // mya bod ma med dam nyams la//
119b1(rnying rgyud): mi bstan ma pa'i dam chog no// tha tshom med par ngas brtan bya// ngas gsung pa la rtsa gcig sems kyad cig/ zag pa 'gam rnams lagasang bA ni// rtogs pa'i lta ba zan pa gsang// mdzang byung ram thar zan pa bsag/ dza bu ban
119b2(rnying rgyud): rogs gsapa// ma mo brten pa'i dam rdzas gsang// sgrub par byed pa'i lag chagasapa// bzlas par bya ba'i sngags rnams gsad// bsgrub pa'i gnas kyang de bzhin no// bsgrub pa'i dus kyang de bzhin no// bsgrub pa'i rtags kyang de bzhin do/
119b3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub rtags kyang snga ma bzhin// blang ba'i thabs kyang gsang bar ste// dbang du bsdu ba'i thabs kyang rab tu gsang // bkol ba'i thabs kyang de bzhin no// gdams pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// gdams pa bzhin du mnyan te// gsang ba mthu bas

119b5(rnying rgyud): zab mo'i don spyod la// lta ba'i don gyis phan gdags pa// bdag gis nan tan ji ltar bskyed// rtag chen yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// rtag chen yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rtag chen yab kyis//

119b7(rnying rgyud): rten rig pa ste// yul dang rig pa gnyis med don gyis blta bar bya// ma mo mkha' 'gro skyabs dang grogs su blta// snod kyi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings// bcud kyi 'jig rten ye shes che// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med don gyis blta// thabs
