120b2(rnying rgyud): pa// ngas gsung ba la sems ma yengs// de la dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ snang srid thams cad ma byung ma skyes par bsgom/ de nas kun tu sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo ltar// sdang la rang bzhin med par bsgom/
120b3(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM dkar po bkra sa le bsgom/ oM de las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa'i thugs kyi rgyud bskyal/ 'gro ba sems can gyi don byas nas/ slar 'dus pa las ye shes lngar gyur par bsgom mo/ ye shes lnga yi 'od zer las/
120b4(rnying rgyud): oM taM maM chu ka N+yai laM b+h+rUM/ zhes brjod pas/ yi ge de rnams rin chen rtsar la bzlas pa bzhin dkar khrigs sa bsgom mo// de nas e b+ha ga wA pad+ma maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ yi ge e las gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gcig tu byur nas @
120b5(rnying rgyud): srid kun la khyab par bsgom mo// de'i byin 'drabs las 'og gi phyogs su taM taM zhes brjod pas rlung gi 'tshub ma la rdo rje rgya gram gyis kha bcad par bsgom mo// de'i steng du maM las rak+ta maN+Da la zhes brjod pas/ rak+ta'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dam
120b6(rnying rgyud): tshil bar gyur par bsgom mo// de'i steng du su las badz+ra suM zhes brjod pas/ gser gyi sa gzhi dper na mtsho la dar chags pa tsam mam/ 'o ma la spris ma chags pa'i tshul du khad kyis chags par bsgom mo// de'i steng du kau las kau ni ri dz+wa la maN+Da la
120b7(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas/ kong rus kyi'i rab gsar rnying brtsegs pa la/ gnam lcags kyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i gzer gyis btab pas rtsibs la nyi zla 'char bar bsgom mo// de'i steng du phyi las ag+ni maN+Da la zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba me yi dal gyis 'byung ba thams
121a1(rnying rgyud): cad tsanyams te/ zo'i zlum langs pa bzhin rgyal gyis btang bar bskams// de'i steng du rgya las su badz+rasum mo zhes brjod pas/ ri ba rin pa chas lnga las grub pa shar shal kags spyir dka ga/ rno \u0f7f
121a2(rnying rgyud): ya ltar sngo ba/ nub pad+ma rAg ltar dmar ba/ byang in+d+ra nI la ltar ldang ba/ dbus su sha ra ka ltar ser ba/ dpag tshad bcad khri bzhi stong du phyin pa/ kha khyer gyen du byung bas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched 'phang gcad par bsgom mo// de'i steng du ma
121a3(rnying rgyud): dmar mo gcig gsal nas/ de'i steng du b+h+rUM spug nag gcig bsgom mo// de las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags pa'i thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ 'gro ba sems can gyi don byas nas slar 'dus pa las/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra b+haT+Ta trAM/ zhes brjod pas
121a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang lnga pa/ sgo khyud rta babs dang ldan pa gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo// gzhal yas khang de'i nang du dur khrod kyi rgyan mang pos brgyan par bsgom mo// de'i steng du ma dmar mo gcig gsal bar bsgom mo// de las
121a5(rnying rgyud): ma sUr+ya maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsgom mo// de'i steng du a dkar po gcig gsal ba las/ a tsan+da maN+Da la zhes brjod pas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsgom/ nyi zla'i steng du tsakra maN+Dal zhes 'arjod pas/ 'khor
121a6(rnying rgyud): ma rtsibs bzhi pa gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo// de'i steng tu ma hA de la 'o ma bsgom la/ mahA de wA u ma de l+li ba T+wAM ga ting po zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po gan rgyal du bsgyel nas gdan du bting bar bsgom mo// de'i steng du chu'i yi ge oM dkar po bkras
121a7(rnying rgyud): le bsgom mo// oM de las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems su gyur par bsgom mo// de yang snang srid sen mo tsam yang ma g.yos pa'i thig ler gsal bar bsgom mo// thig le de las oM gu ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka hU~M/ zhes brjod pas/ tha med/
121b1(rnying rgyud): kA'i thur stsal gyis gyur to// ting nge 'dzin gyis lcogs tshad du dbu dgra phyag bco brgyad par bsgom mo// de ltar mi gsalan su mdog mthing nag la g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ dbugasum phyag drug pa zhabs bzhi phyogs bzhi gtams par bsgom mo/
121b2(rnying rgyud): gshog pa phyogs bzhir brkyang ba/ glang po che'i rdo rlon gyi stod g.yogs dang / zhing lpags kyi g.yang gzhi dang / zod rlon gyi phreng ba tshar gsum gyis smras pa/ dbu rgyan mgur chu do shal byas/ klu rigs bzhis skya la brgyan pa/ mtshan ma rnam pa gsum gyis
121b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan pa/ stag lpags kyi sha ma thabs kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ dbus skra dang mthun te mthing nag phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje rtse dgu pa thogs pa/ g.yas bar ma na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yas tha man zhags pa bsnams pa/
121b4(rnying rgyud): g.yon dang po na dril bu bsnams pa/ g.yon par man rde'u chung g.yon tha ma na dgra sta bsdams par bsgom mo// de ltar gsal ba dang / g.yon gyi phyogs su gu ya kro d+hi shU rI hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ lus la grib ma byung ba'i tshul du yum nyid gsang ba'i yum
121b5(rnying rgyud): chen mor sal gyis gyur par bsgom mo/ sku mdog dang phyag cha gtso bo dang mthun par bsgom mo// zhal lnga phyag drug pa'o// g.yas dang po na dril bu bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na b+han+da rak+tas bkang ba thogs pa/ g.yas bar ma na zhags pa thogs pa/ g.yas
121b6(rnying rgyud): tha ma na bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga thogs pa/ g.yon par ma na b+hAn+ta ltag sprod kyi rnga bsnam pa/ g.yon tha ma na g.yang gzhi bsnam pa/ zhang+gA rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa gcig gsal bar bsgom mo// de nas yab yum gnyis su med pa'i brdas bskul nas/ sbyor ba
121b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad nas byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros pas lcags kyus srid pa'i ma mo kun bkug nas gdan du bting / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ kro d+hI shwa d+hi ti ra baM shan+ti ti ra baM/ mu thi ti ra baM/ shan+ta ti ra baM/ duSh+Ti ti ra baM/ dan+ti tir baM/ s+phur+ya tir baM/ kha ra ka pi ti tir baM/ sring 'gro tir baM/ badz+ra
122a1(rnying rgyud): na kun nga du sas / /
122a2(rnying rgyud): su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las/ yi ge ta re re gsal bar bsgom mo// yi ge ha 'phros 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems su gyur par bsgom mo// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ sgrol byed ma dang dkar mo mig gcig ma gnyis bsnol ba'i
122a3(rnying rgyud): gdan steng+ga su byang chub kyi sems yi ge ha las/ oM gAM swa mu ma ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal gyi skur sal gyis gyur te/ sgra mdog dkar mo la dbu gsum phyag drug par bsgom mo/ g.yas dang po na rdo rje/ bar ba na da la b+ha/ tha mA na
122a4(rnying rgyud): seng ge bsdams pa/ g.yon dang po b+han+d+ha rak+tas bkang ba/ bar ma na gtun shing rdeg pa'i tshul ston pa/ tha ma na mchog chen stod par bsgom mo/ zhabs bzhi brkyang bsum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs ste ng+ge su/ dbang phyug ma dang ral gcig
122a5(rnying rgyud): ma gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ byang chub kyi sems yi ge ha las/ oM byi yang yang te ta d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas/ mkha' 'gro ma yang gsal g.yos kyi skur sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog ljang gul dbu gsum phyag drug par gyur to/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams
122a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ g.yas par pa na dbug tho chen po bsnams pa/ g.yas tha ma na sbyang mo bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na b+han+d+ha bsnams pa/ g.yon par ma na rgyu phreng bsnams pa/ g.yon tha ma na zhing chung bzung zhing bsdams nas lhod par bsgom mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang
122a7(rnying rgyud): bsum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ bdud rtsi mo dang dmar mo gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ byang chub sems yi ge ha las/ oM b+hi sha si d+hi ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ mkha' 'gro ma gnyen gsal mar lal gyis gyur
122b1(rnying rgyud): sku mdog dmar mo la zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur to// phyag g.yas dang po na ped+ma bsnams pa/ bar man zhags pa/ tha man ce srung 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po na b+han+ta bsdams pa/ bar man tri shul bsdams pa/ ba ma na zhing chen thogs nas lhod par bkra
122b2(rnying rgyud): mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom mo/ lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ dbang phud ma dang ral gcig ma gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stangs su/ byang chub kyi sems yi ge ha las/ oM dra la ri ha ti ga ces brjod pas/ mkha'
122b3(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal 'bar gyi sbur sal gyis gyur te/ su mdog sngon ma la zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgom mo// phyag g.yas dang po na rin po che 'bar ba bsdams pa/ bar ma na me dpung 'bar ba bsnams pa/ za man stag mo 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po naH
122b4(rnying rgyud): bar ma na dbyug zo 'bar ba/ tha ma na zhing chung sbram po bzung nas stod par bsgom mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na/ dpal chen mo bsgom pa'i g.yas phyogs su/ ma mo za men ma rgyam
122b5(rnying rgyud): sadang / nyi zla thong phreng ma gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ byang chub kyis sems yi ge ha las/ oM ma hA li te ha d+h+ri ga ces brjod pas/ yum bkrag gsal mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog ser mo la zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgom mo// zhal
122b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dam dab/ dbus ser ba/ g.yas dang po na 'khor lo bsdams pa/ bar man rgyal mtshan/ tha ma na thug pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po naHn+ta/ bad man s+tha gri bsdams pa/ tha man zhing chung bzung nas stong par bsgom mo// zhabs
122b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi brkyang bsum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// de nas bdag nyid dpal chen po'i thugs kar rin po che stug po gur phub pa 'dra ba'i nang na dpra ma bzhi zhig yod de/ rtsa'i dngas ma dang khrag gi drangs ma dang / dbugs kyi drangs ma dang / 'od kyi dngas ma dang bzhi las/
123a1(rnying rgyud): shad kya'i mamams can gyi rgyal ma 'argyal ba'i kun na mas/ dus sa las/ gamyal pa 'i ga rgyas padubs gsang ba'isas cas 'dabs ma nas byas / smrabadag das sum can nasas
123a2(rnying rgyud): ban+dan gyis gang gcig parnam ma// snron ba tu byings phyag ma bsgyel ba'i gdan gyi spangs sa// drug gi dngas ma las/ TIgasas ga / thes brjod pas gsang ba'i sum babyed pa'i srungasam gyis su ti/ mdog mamangon pal gyu sa
123a3(rnying rgyud): gang ba/ phyag zhag gis gangadab cig bsgom mo// nub byang bdud rtsi ma bsgyel ba'i stengs su/ dbugs kyi dngas ma las/ oM ka ma la shwa rI ta d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas/ yum rmongs byed mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dmar me la tsu lus khrag gis gang ba/
123a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rlung gis gang bcig bsgom mo// byang shar du gcig pu ma bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ 'od kyi dngas ma las/ oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+r-i ga ces brjod pas/ yum tshe 'phel mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog ljang gu la swa Sha dkan gyis gang 'a/ phyag
123a5(rnying rgyud): ser gyis gang bar gyur te/ de ltar gsal ba dang / byang chub sems las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pa las/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ma ma b+h+yo phaTan na/ ma ma duSh+Ta dzaTan na/ ma mdzag rak+sha pra we she baTan na/ shan nan ting baM zhes brjod pas/ srin pa'i dbang chen rnams kha gub gan
123a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal du 'asgyel bar bsgom mo// yang byang chub sems las sbas pa'i ma bzhi dang / dgyes sde mo bzhi dang brgyad bkyil ba'i gdan stengs su/ bdag gi rnam par shes pa mig gi dngas ma las/ A ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas/ yum khams
123a7(rnying rgyud): gsum ga dag gcod ma sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dkar ba la mar bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhal rngams pa'i mche ba gcags pa/ phyag na 'ug pa dang byang la sogs pa'i bod gtod bsdams par bsgom mo// e ka tsaN+Di spun drug 'gyel ba
123b1(rnying rgyud): gdan stongs su/ bdag gi sbyangs pa las/ a ka ma la shA rI t+tha d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas/ smye shi byad dag cod ma ngas la gyis gyur te lha mdog dum rab sar bsgrags pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ zhal rngams pa'i mtsho ba gtsigs pa/ phyag nasatshon
123b2(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bsdams par bsgom mo// srid pa chags byed yun gnyis bsgyel pa'i gdan stengs su/ gsang ba'i byang chub sems las/ oM ka ma la shA hrI h+Na tri ga ces brjod pas/ dus gsum dbang phyung ma ru sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dkar bag la zhwa
123b3(rnying rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis pa/ zhal rngams pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa phyag na rgod gtong gi phyag brgyan bsdams par bsgom mo// 'dod khams kyi gtso mo spun gnyis bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ bdag gi tsiN+Da la AM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+r-i ga ces brjod pas/ pad+ma
123b4(rnying rgyud): rIng 'byed/ dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsgom/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis kyang gan rgyal bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ bdag gi srid la mdo bsdus las/ oM ka ma la shA rIt+tha d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas/ yar+tha kro d+de shwa rI ma dasal gyis gyur te/
123b5(rnying rgyud): mdog spug nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom mo// ma bdun bsgyel pa'i gdan stengs su// yid kyi rnam par shes pa las/ A~M ka ma la shwa rIng+ga tri ga ces brjod pas/ rag mo bo Sh+Ti shwa rI ma dasal gyis gyur te/ sum dag sngon mo la zhal gcig tus
123b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis par bsgom mo// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ thas dang shes rab las/ oM ka ma la shwa bIts+tsha d+h+ri gces brjod pas/ sa ma ya kro d+hi shwa dI ma sal gyis gyur te/ spu mdog dmar mo la zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom mo//
123b7(rnying rgyud): nga bzhi bsgyel ba'i gnan stengs kyi/ steng 'og bshang lam gro bzhi las/ A~M ka ma la shA d+hid+ya d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ bi shwa bo d+hI bA dI ba'i skung babyed sgra mdag ljang nag la/ zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis par bsgom/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa
124a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdan rjesmra smra/ nyan mongs pa'i yod 'astan/ ka ma la shA ng+ka ng+ge/ zhes brjod pas/ gral mo tig mngasal gyis thar te/ ska mdog dka bka' zhal gcig cag gnyis par bskam sa// da yang dang
124a2(rnying rgyud): chen po yab yum dang / thugs ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid/ gsang ba thugs las bskyed pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbang btsan du// lha rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang // ye shes rang gnas yin pa ste// byin brlab dbang dang ldan bya'i phyir//
124a3(rnying rgyud): mo de dbang du bsdu 'am 'dul/ bko la yang de ltar byas na ji ltar du bkol yang btub po// 'grub kyang des 'grub po// zhes dpal chen pos bka' stsal to// 'khor rnams spo bar gyur to// bsgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / gno
124a4(rnying rgyud): 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen ma rnams kun// gdan du gding na ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka
124a5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// srid pa'i dbang chen mo rnams kun// gdan du gding ba ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// drag po'i 'od zer lcags kyu yis// dbang can mo rnams bkug nas su// chags pa gnas su sbyang
124a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// rgya mtsho nyi zla thod pang gnyis// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// zhe sdang gnas su srung ba'i phyir// srol byed dkar mo mig gcig gnyis// zhi ba'i gdan du gding bar bya// nga rgyal gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// dbang sdud ma dang ral gcog
124b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis// rgyas pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// 'dod chags gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi ma dang dmar mo gnyis// dbang gi gdan du gding bar bya// phrag dog gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// gnas 'phrul ma dang ser mo gnyis// drag po'i gdan /
124b2(rnying rgyud): gding bar bya// rgyan gyi rgyal mo dbyings phyag dang // bdag nyid ma dang gcig pu ma// mtshams dang mtshams su bsgyel nas su// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// dbang can drug cu rtsa brgyad tshogs// spangs shing bred nas kha srung 'gyel// de nas
124b3(rnying rgyud): srog 'phrog pa'i snying po 'di brjod do/ AM badz+ra a mr-i ta/ u tsi ta/ tsit+ta nan/ tra tha pra we sha nan/ tsit+ta snying kha rag nan/ gdan du gding ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen ma rnam
124b4(rnying rgyud): kun// 'dul ba'i snying po ji ltar lags// dbang chen yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// dbang chen yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // dbang chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ma
124b5(rnying rgyud): mo rnams kyi gnyen po ni// dpal chen khrag 'thung ma mo'i ji// yum chen nyid bzhi mu khA le// nyi mthod phreng dkar mo dang // khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po dang // de rnams la bas gzhan rnams dang // ye shes las bskyed ma mo yis// srid pa'i ma
124b6(rnying rgyud): mo thams cad 'dul// de rnams bsgoms shing bskul bas 'dul// yang na ma mo'i gnyen po ni// snying khrag dbang du bsdus nas ni// mi sran gnyen por de che ste// ma mo rnams kyang dur khrongs rgya bzhin// brgyal bar 'gyur zhing 'gas par 'gyur//
124b7(rnying rgyud): thugs la brnag pa'i sngags 'di brjod// ma nas ma ti ti i oM tsat+ta nan/ tra tha phaT nan/ de skad ces ni brjod nas su// rang dbang med par dbang du sdud// yang na bdud mo bcu gnyis ni// 'jig rten 'di pag nod byed na// dbyings phyug ma dang bdag
125a1(rnying rgyud): nyid chen mo dang // gcig pu ma dang kun gyi rgyal mo dang // khros pa'i dbang po che bzhi dang // thugs kyi dgyes mo bzhi rnams kyis// snod ma bcu gnyis dbang du sdud// dbang du srung ba'i sngags 'phyir/ sa sa
125a2(rnying rgyud): thA la/ taM ba ya baM/ nan tsit+ta nan/ zhes brjod pas/ de phyir dbang rnams che ba'i mchog/ de skad ces ni bka' stsal pas// 'khor thams cad yi rangs par gyur to// gnyen po'i le'u ste drug pa'o// bdod 'du
125a3(rnying rgyud): yes yang gsol pa// ma mi dbang du bsdu ba ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzog sangs rgyal gyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo dbang du du
125a4(rnying rgyud): dos// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// sems rtse gcig tu bsgoms tegs lanam mo dbang du 'dra'o// yang gcig tu gsal bar rtogs na ma mo dbang du 'dra'o// de yang man ngag tu las kyis su la spang bas sgra phyag mtsha
125a5(rnying rgyud): phor dgod do// ngag gis gsung la myang bas/ sgyu ma rnam par sbyang bas rnam par dag pa ltar/ sems kyis thugs la snang byas/ rnam par mi rtog pa dag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid gsal bar dgongs// rig sngags yid la brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang
125a6(rnying rgyud): so ma midang do// ma mo ni snying po'o// snying po ni 'bras bu'o// 'bras brani bdag nyid do// bdag nyid ni byang chub kyi sems so// byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas so// mamon 'di ltar gnas pa dang / bdag nyid ni las ma gtogs pa logs na gnas
125a7(rnying rgyud): bdam gsu sus/ des rtogs nam ming bar du 'dus pa ragasu sa so// ting 'an ma pangs gsas bgaces so// ma mong bang du bsdu ba'i bdud do// / sams dpas yang bsol / 'an du ma na ga sa rag //
125b1(rnying rgyud): ma mo'i man ngag bdag nyan 'tshal// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba gas nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// man ngag ces ni bya ba'i don// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso
125b2(rnying rgyud): man ngagazugs kyi rang bzhin te// man ngag gsung gi rang bzhin yin// man ngag skya yi rang bzhin te// thugs ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi spyod// gsung ni sma ru grag pa ste// su ni 'jigs byed khro bo'i sku// de ni ma mo'i man ngag dgongs// yang nam
125b3(rnying rgyud): mo'i man ngag ni// snang srid thams cad gsal bar bsgom// snod bcud 'jig rten thams cad gsal bar bsgom// de la ma mo'i rang bzhin ni// byang chub sems kyi sprul pa yin// rang byung dang sar gdal ba yin// bdal bas mtha' dbus med
125b4(rnying rgyud): par khyab// dus gsum 'gyur med rin po che// mi nub rgya chen g.yung drung yin// mu ru ba lam/ gsung du grags// thugs su gsal/ de la thugs su gsung sbas/ gsung la mu thim nas 'dre ba la man ngag ces bya'o// ma mo man ngag gi le'u ste
125b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rtogs pa'i khyad par di lta bu// sems kyi khyad par ji lta bu// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas
125b6(rnying rgyud): kyang // mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// rtogs pa'i khyad par chen po dang // sems kyi khyad par chen po'i don// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso// nyan thos don la mkhas pa dang // dang rgyal byang chub
125b7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dang // kri ya dang ni gnyis ka'i rgyud// yog dang ni theg pa drug/ kun gyi don la mkhas pa dang // bskyed pa'i don dang rdzogs pa'i don// rdzogs pa chen po gsum la mkhas// lung dang man ngag phur thug pas// man ngag gdeng can
126a1(rnying rgyud): gas pa das/ mamo'i bcus ni mA bats+tsha/ ma gyu sa na// pa bas ga \u0f7f/ ma mna' ng+yas // dal spyo bad/
126a2(rnying rgyud): med pa// khyad par du yang gzungs mar bzung // ma mo sgrub pa'i grogs po yang // khyad par du yang brtag par bya// sgrub pa'i mched dang lham dral yang // khyad par du yang btag par bya// sgrub pa'i rkyen dang ya byed la/
126a3(rnying rgyud): bkur byed pa// khyad par du yang brtag par bya'o// sgrub pa'i rten mo brtag pa ni// mig kham pa la skra ser ba// dpral ba'i dbyes na sme yod pa// ma mo thams cad mgu bar shes// de ni rab tu bsten par bya'o// sgrub pa'i zhal zas ye byad kyang
126a4(rnying rgyud): rdzas dang gsur chen sman chen rnams// yang dag nyid du bsag par bya// de nas sgrub pa brtsam bya ste// ma mo thams cad bsgrub pa na// mi 'grub pa ni yod mi srid// 'grub pa nyid ni the tshom med// lngar len rnal 'byor mo ldan pa// gnyis
126a5(rnying rgyud): med rtogs pa'i khyad par gtso// rtogs pa khyad par gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rnal 'byor yongs la sman slad du// lung la rnam pa du zhig mchis// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal/
126a6(rnying rgyud): mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor kun la phan gdags pa'i// lung gi grangs ni nges bstan gyi// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso//
126a7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la gdon mi za// lung la rnam grangs dgu zhig mchis// dus kyi lung zhes bya ba dang // ri rab lung zhes bya ba dang // gsang ba'i lung dang ma mo'i lung // drod kyi lung zhes bya ba dang // gsang ba chen po'i spyi lung dang // khrag ni
126b1(rnying rgyud): srung dang rdzas kyi lung // dmachog lung dang dgragag yod// smras pa'i phung dang dgra nas bshad// gnod 'dul skya yis la da gsol pa// lung dkrung kar 'tshal ba brtsa// mang chags dpal gyis bka' byol // dan dgas pa pa /
126b2(rnying rgyud): nus kyang // mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// dus ni sa phyi med par shes par bya// ri rab rgyas pa'i mchod rten du// rang gi sems dang phung por shes par bya// gsang ba'i lung na thugs lagag// ma mo byang chub sems las byung /
126b3(rnying rgyud): nI gnyis sa skyed pa drid med do// gsang ba sti ldang rtogs par dka'// khrag gi lung ni phan yon mang // dmardzas lung ni tshong bar bya// dmachog lung ni ma nor par rtogs par bya'o// rlung gi le Ta ge bcub // gnod 'dra
126b4(rnying rgyud): yis yang gsol pa// dus kyi lung shes ri ny-i \u0f7f// yad dgatogs la bdag ldan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' tshum tsa// de dbus phrags na nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' rtsal pa// dus kyi su shes byab dzin/ sa
126b5(rnying rgyud): gsung pa la blo tshom med// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yig tso// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// sngon med kyi med gdod nas rnam par dag/ de ni dus kyi lung zhes bshad/ dus kyi lung gri le'u ste bcugacig pa'o// / gnod la
126b6(rnying rgyud): gis yang gsol pa// ma mo rnams kyi mthun rjes gang // nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// nyag gcig pa bgyis bka stsol cig/ de da gsol pa gsan nas kyang // nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo rnams kyi mthun pa'i rdzas
126b7(rnying rgyud): de/ nyid dungs bstan gyi// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha lagaH// zhing chen skam po medan mi 'grub bo// bcu bdun lon pa'i gzungs chen medan mi 'gri sa// da mer to me na mi 'thu po// bdud rtsirnam lnga'i gsung chen med na mi 'thu go/
127a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i dathugs / ste da ga tsun me na mi 'asgrug// cig marnal ma nan 'ju pa// rnam ldan gam na gru sa/ spyan drug napa / ga /

127a4(rnying rgyud): yis pang gsol pa// ring lung zhes de lta bu// don du ny+dzar 'tshal ba bgyi// nyag gcig yab kyis bkra' sngol c-in// de sa bus pa gsan nas kyi // nyag gcig lab kris bka'abral pa// de rab lung zhes bya ba'i don// ngas gsu
127a5(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ri rab tu ni rin po che// wA las grub pa'i mchod rten des// de ni phye yi ri rab lung // nang gi ri rab bstan pa ni// de 'dra'i sems can phung po yang // rin po che las grub pa yi// rgyal ba'i mchod rten chen me yin//

127a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i byanam pan nyis// thog tu skal thab cu bye mad// zung gnyis kyi thugs martsam sa na// dbyings rgyag can gyi kyil mo gnas// yong gyi gnyis kyi thugs marnams na// da/ ma \u0f7f dang nag ma gnas// maso la ka'i ga par mang

127b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung 'dug sgo bzhi'i rtsa bzhi la// las kyi srin mo bzhi yang gnas// gsang ba'i rtsa ni zugs mtshams snga// nam mkha'i rgyal mo kun gnyis gnas// dbang po bdun rtsi thugs mtshams na// ma mo bdun ni de na gnas// rnam shes brgyad kyi mes mtsham
127b3(rnying rgyud): na// khros pa'i ma mo bzhi rnams gnas// de las 'phros pa'i mdo rtsa las// gsang ba'i dgyes sde ba'i rnams gnas// 'du byed phra mo'i thugs mtshams na// tri shu rtsa brgyad de na gnas// dngas ma'i dngas ma thugs mtshams na// yum chem lda ni den
127b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// mi shigs pa yi thig ler nI// yab yum mi gnyis der gnas so// 'od zer 'byung gnas thod phreng ngo // shing gi srog shing yal gar bcas// ye shes ma mo rang gnas la// nang gi ri rab lung zhes bya// phyi yang de dang 'dra ba ste// srid
127b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mamo rang gnas yin// ri rab lung gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gsang lung chen po ji ltar lags// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de sad gsol pa gsan nas kyang /

127b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab mchags thabs dang ldan// don de shing tu rtogs par dka'// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// thun mong ma yin rtogs par dka'// shag dang ni badz+ra'i don// shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'o// skye med dbyings dang ye shes bya

128a2(rnying rgyud): smad cing blang bar 'gyur// de ni gsang ba'i wang zhes bshad// gsang ba wang gi le'u te bcu bzhi pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// dzad srong chen po ji ltar lags/ da sring chen po bdag nyan 'tshal/

128a4(rnying rgyud): yum gnyis su med pa las// dang po rgyu 'byung ba lnga 'byung // de las skye 'gro kun kyang 'byung // skye 'gro rnam pa sna cho ga pa'i// bad+ma kun la drod 'beg pa'o// de la rjod kyi rang bzhin ni// snying rtsa dang ni srog car 'bel// de ni pad+mar 'dus te 'jug/ snying na yu mchen nyid

128b2(rnying rgyud): la 'dus// sram chen nyid kyi drong 'bebs pas// s+thi mi bdag mo'i sram yin pas// yum chen nyid ni gsang bar bya// don de gsang bas gsang ba'i lung // rtogs pa dka' bas gsang ba'i wang // zhes bshad do// gsang ba'i gyi phung gi

128b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rtag pa de la bya// chos kyi dbyings chen bdal ba la// mtha' dang dbus su ga la yod// nam mkha'i gzhal yas gdangs pa la// steng dang 'og ni ga la yod// sha chen dmar chen bkram pa la// khyod dang dug la dbye// sems kyi

129a3(rnying rgyud): yab kyi mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings// de yi don rtogs dam tshig go// de yang man ngag gu bya'o// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// de gnyis snang srid cha yod na// dam tshig nyid kyang nyams pa med// de yang man ngag gu ya'o// rang sems don rtogs sreng

129b2(rnying rgyud): zhing khrag dang // gson khrag mang la khrag sna tshogs dang // mkha' la rgyu ba'i zag rnams dang // gcan zan gadrug pa'i khrag rnams dang // sder chags mang po'i khrag sna dang // rmig zum kha zag khrag rnams dang // bsad dang gso ba'i las rnam

132b1(rnying rgyud): a shad+tha yi 'dab ma'i bar du bcug la/ nub bdun bzlas pa byas na no// rkang pa'i bangar du 'gro bar 'gyur// thal ba yam shrIng me bus la// gya rag drug pa'i sgo btsugs te// nyung dkur mar la byugs nas ni// brgya stong bar du bzlas 'asreg na/ kham
132b2(rnying rgyud): gsum mthong bar gdon mi za// gsang ba'i phur bu nges pa la// brgya stong bzlas te bskor btab na// gdug pa'i tshogs ni gang yang rung // 'phral du 'bros par gdon mi za// ske tshe lan tsha sgog pa gsum la/ bsngags te sa la sbas pa na/
132b3(rnying rgyud): 'phral du skrod par dogra pa med// dur khrod kyi ni dbus nyid du// sa shi dum bu'i me bus la// sngon po gos su gon nas su// thal chen khrag dang sbas pa ste// brgya stong bar du bzlas bsreg na// tshangs pa'i tshe yang mod la 'chi// khrom shing
132b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba bzlas nas su// bdag gi lus la rma byung na// dug 'thung bde bar 'dug pa yin// rdza chags phru ba'i kha sbub bdun/ bzlas kyang blangs te sngags kyis btab nas ni// de yi gnas su khyim gyi steng // dus gtor byas na rtag tu ngan dme byed
132b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dgra yi phyogs su brtags nas su// dur khrod dang ni khrag dag la// brgya stong bar du bzlas bsreg na// dpung gi tshogs rnams 'jigs par byed// lag pa la ni brgya stong bar du bzlas te sa la brdabs na/ gter gyi bdag po 'gres
132b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// yo byad sngon pos bsgyur nas ni// mdang gsum yon du phul nas su// lag mthil sa la brdabs nas ni// myug cing zhag bdun bar du brgya stong bzlas// gter khugs pa ni gdon mi za// ring par snying nas bzlas byas te/
132b7(rnying rgyud): gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten la// mchod pa rgya chen byas nas su// zas gtsang ma dag za bzhin du// brgya stong bzlas na mkha' la 'gro// gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur zhing // kun gyi blan spyod pa dang // gnod sbyin kurda dang lhan cig lding // phyag

133a3(rnying rgyud): gsum dag la byas pa yi// 'khor lo rdzas su bzung nas su// sku gsum ldan pa'i mchod rten dang // phyag na rdo rje ge tso mchod do// zhag gcig skya gcing 'khor lo bzung // lan stong bzlas brjod byas pa na// rlung g.yos mtshan ma 'byung ba dang
133a4(rnying rgyud): lag pa dag kyang de bzhin 'bar// 'khor lo yang ni 'od 'gyur ste// rig 'don 'khor lo bskor ba yang // 'ong nas rig 'dzin 'khor lo'i dngos grub ster// gzhan gyi mi mched gnas mchog la// bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur// rtsub pa'i/
133a5(rnying rgyud): lcags su gyur pa las// sor drug po yi rdo rje bya// sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten la// sku gzugs spyan sngar mchod bsnyen bya// ri rtse la sogs gtsang 'gram du// skra yi gzug brnyan gzhag nas su// dril bu bdug spos la sogs
133a6(rnying rgyud): pas// 'byung po'i tshul du rdo rje mchod// sngon pa'i gos kyang bgos nas su// rdo rje'i rigs la mchod pa bya// de nas rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa dang // sa yang rab tu g.yo byed pa'o// rlung yang drug tu ldang ba dang // nam mkha' nas ni ha ha dang /

133b2(rnying rgyud): zhin// d+h+r-i zhes pas ni ri skyil ba'o// de nas rgyal po'i sa bzung ba// ras sam shigs pa'i ngos dag la// bcom ldan 'das ma bri bar bya// bdag gamar yi khrag dag las// gtor margya cher byin+da nas ni// ba sha'i sha chen pa /

133b4(rnying rgyud): son mo byin pa'i sgra// bdag gi khrag dang bsres nas su// ny+tsi thaH lja gA sreg pas nA// sbyin bsreg mtha' du dag med do// bdag gi khrag gis s+t+wa~M ga ru// dgra yi ming dus bris nas sra// gos gsher ba drang gos pa swA/

138b1(rnying rgyud): mchog ca snyam dugasal/ haha hoH/ sasram sa d+ha/ zalams rgyan/ mtha la hA/ sa tha mangs man+ta/ mahar \u0f7fla / zhes khrag la gdab po// 'a zag la yang gdab pa// ma rnams snyam pa'i le' snyam gnyis pa

145a1(rnying rgyud): dub d+ha kya nas s+ho// sun ma / nangs ga nathas/ trA saH/ rgyug shes cas du med ma madru bar smras so// da sa pa zugs pa nal ma padag/ mubyugs bya
145a2(rnying rgyud): tshul ston nges 'grub bo// dgra bo'i dpung bshig pa'i le'u nye so bdun pa'o// / gsung drung / yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gtan po 'jig byed dang // nal 'byor thams cad sun 'byin byed// dam pa'i chos la spyod pa dang /
145a3(rnying rgyud): bdag la dam byang byed pa rnams// rtog pa'i cho ga ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de yang gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs rdzas bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig pa
145a4(rnying rgyud): tham cangasam ca dang // dmi chis pa stod pa dang// bdag la makyang byung pa ma sa bstan te// gas ma ba 'a drug pa/ ngas pa na pa la bachol dzad/
145a5(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin gyi 'dzag rten la gnas pas/ 'jig rten mchog tu gyur ba'i spyod yul/ longs spyod du gyur pa'i gsung chen dang / gu gul gyi dung pes mang byang la bdug/ thal chen gyis khang khyim lnga gtor la/ thugs la banag pa'i sngags 'di rnas so//
145a6(rnying rgyud): la sa dang 'adz+ra mAr ya byaM/ zhes babyas shing gtong ngo / 'ang bathag ri na ya?'i phyogs su kha ltas la gang la bya ba der dmigs la/ sngags bzlas shing thal chen gtor ro// de ltar byas na mu stegs kyi byad bzlog go// mu stegs brlog pa'i la'u nye bo brgyad pa'o//
145a7(rnying rgyud): gnod 'dul d+ha yis yang gsopa pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byang cing // lu du byud las 'gal byed dang // sems can kun la gnod byed dang // bdag la sdang sems byed pa dang // yul nas dbyung na ci ltar dbyung // rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal/
145b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' byol cig/ dam gsal pa gas na nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byeng dang // lkug cung lus 'gal byad dang // sems can kun la gan byang dang // bdag la sangasems cadadu
145b2(rnying rgyud): rnams// yul nas dbyung ba'i cho ga ni// gtan tshigs ba gtan la dbab// nyon cig gnod 'dral lha yi gtso// ngas bstan pa ma tha tshom med// mi mang po phung ba'i ro thul gyis dang / srab ma'i lo ma dang / tso'i drung ma dang / thal ched dang
145b3(rnying rgyud): de rnams bsres la/ rnga mo'i steng dang / khyi dang srung ki'i khrag gis b+has la gzugs byas te/ grog la ming rus bris/ mgo bor d+hi bris/ mjug tu par bris la/ tsit+tA na rak+sha/ tsit+tan rag+ga kha/ tsi d+ha ya r+tha khA/ tsit+ta thAm ri 'i li rbad / ces phog la
145b4(rnying rgyud): bris la ming rus dang gnyis snying gar blan/ yaM nag po bdun bris la kha brag tu sman/ de nas gro ga'i rgyal bu'i nang du bajug la/ rdo rje rgya gram gyi phyag rgya byas la/ sngag pa 'di la na nyi shu la gcig bzlas pas dmigs bya myos shing dbyung bar 'gyur ro// sngags la/
145b5(rnying rgyud): pa nyitan tha bzud/ nam shel saH/ yaM theg pa zhes bzlas shing mthun pa'i byang la bslar na yul nas dbyung ba la the tshom med do// yul nas dbyung ba'i 'jam sa dgu pa'o// / gsung drung lnga yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po'
145b6(rnying rgyud): byeng // zug rgyad las 'gal byed dang // sems can kun la gzhing byed dang // bdag la zung se las byed pa rnams// mams pa cing ji ltar badzi// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag tan 'tshal/ rdzogs sangs cad cing dka tshol cig/ das
145b7(rnying rgyud): sol pa gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing // lu gre rlung las 'gal byed dang // sems can kun la gnod byed dang // bdag la sdang sems byed pa rnams// ma mos pa bcing ngas bstan
146a1(rnying rgyud): nyan cigag sung drung yang dag pa// ngas bstan pa ma tho tshom med// snrums b+hubabI pra la/ me 'phar pabyan pa thod pal/ lhag ma'i sgra dang grad par badris lazad pa'i bang 'drug pa/ spad pa bla du
146a2(rnying rgyud): gis kha bcings la/ chu srin gyi phyag rgya bcas la phyogs bzhir bsgyur zhing bstan nas brdeg pa'i sngags 'di bzlas so/ oMn la thig nal phra btsugs shA la med thu las bu lcags kyis kyi gzed sA hA/ zhes bzlas shing phyag tu bsgyur ro// bzog pa
146a3(rnying rgyud): mchil ma rang gi khong par mi gtang bar bya'o// las 'dis bdag la dgra mi srid do// nges dgra bo stong yang kha bcing bar 'gyur ro// ma mos dgra bo'i kha bcings pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnya
146a4(rnying rgyud): po 'jig byed dang // lu buM rgyud las 'gal byed dang // sems can kun la gnod byed dang // bdag la ngan sems byed pa la// nan tu las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// rdzogs sangs kyis la bdag nyan 'chol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsol
146a5(rnying rgyud): drind gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed dang // lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang // sems can kun la gnod byed dang // bdag la ngan sems byed pa la// nan tu las dums ngas 'du
146a6(rnying rgyud): nyon cigag nga rgyu yang dag pa// ngas brtan pa pa med// de lta d-i d-i bang nas sa na// rtsamatshogs pa'i gnags pa// ma 'ang sa mda' mas brgyad nas ng+ge// jichub dang dag panas kyis bcan// mabyang rdzogs pa
146a7(rnying rgyud): 'di'adri sa rgyan// kyim sa thong chu rgya/ nas sbyin gyis sa ga nyi kyi zhin // thogasarnams pa / de mig sung rjod// ma da 'a
146b1(rnying rgyud): n+yAng+ra du byin na du mnan la/ da'i steng dur sog la dgra gang yin pa'i gzugs zis la/ khwa thub tu marnyanan// de'i steng dung rgya gram gyis mnanan// de nas dgra pa'i ming bris te/ 'dad 'bad la gtung las myung du 'grub pa// s+yAg rgad la dpag bsam gyig /
146b2(rnying rgyud): gi gzugs byas la/ gro ga la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ snying gar khrag gis ming bris la gser ga yu gnyis kos rba drang dkar la bsgos la/ de nas man ta la'i dang du btum la/ 'da' rab tis gdags so// a ti pheM ra'i zag pas bzang ngo //
146b3(rnying rgyud): 'drod drug tung bod do// des sgra rgong drag pos thebs par 'gyur ro// lcags dang gser du g.yub sres la khol po zhig 'dzin la bsngos la/ gong du bstan pa'i gzugs dang / bsngos pa'i yas sngags bsres la dra sal gyi thun pas gtums la/ @
146b4(rnying rgyud): ta'i dang du gzhug go// ye shes ma'i phyag rgyas gdab po// des ni dbang po mi gsal ba dang dag pa dang lpags par 'gyur ro// zangs dang lcags dang gse gsum badz+rar la/ ya bdud chen po la bsngos la/ gong du bstan pa'i gzugs dang / bsngo
146b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i las stags bsres pa mu lan dang du gtsug go// tshe mchog rtags kyi phyag rgyas gdab po// des glo bur dung chi bar 'gyur ro// 'dra sran dag pa gling bcu gnyis kyi gzugs bris la/ dko rdzas brgyan la yang lgang shod kyi skyes tor la bcos la/
146b6(rnying rgyud): de nas ga ma la mi gzugs m+b+has te/ dge bo ming bris te gzugs gar glanan// thun la zaba'i tshul byed dug drug go// dzad d+hA/ dza du// de ltar byas nardung drung nga ngo // sa pa sna tshogs spangs la gshin rdo rgyal po la bsngos la yas sa
146b7(rnying rgyud): ji digase tha'am sa yi dgadong gzugs zas la/ steng gar ming rus bris te'i srung te baspel la mdang ngalen pa'i tshul nga byas pa'o// ci yang rung ba'i zhing grags yang bzhin no// gshen rje nig pa'i sngags kyang gdab bo// des ze na gyi 'o// man
147a1(rnying rgyud): du btags pa sna tshogs kyi dkyil du/ hra la gzugs byas la grog la ming bris te/ sa la a ma do lce'i gzugs zlas la/ umra do lnga'i gzugs steng du ba sgra la 'dod chags spyad pa'i tshul dbyung // ma oM bA nin rnam
147a2(rnying rgyud): phaT ces bya ba'i sngags kyis gdab po// mkhal sked na ba dang po mtshan spangs pa dang / chu 'gags nas 'tsho'o// dung dang gser dang g.yu dang bsde dang mtshal la sogs pa'i yas lcags sna tshogs dang / dgra bo'i ming byang bris la ba ti dbang ba'i pags pas
147a3(rnying rgyud): gzums/ bA rab ma sbya na ces bzlas so// de la gdab par bya/ des ni myang du smos par 'gyur/ gser dang dung dang lcags gsum la dgra bo'i ming bsres te bsdigs la rnga nag po'i nang du bcug la/ ba ti mA sngags kyis btab la sba zhing gtad na za dang
147a4(rnying rgyud): brag g.yang du 'chi/ tshig byed pa'i dus su bdag nyid mukha lo'i ting nge 'dzin nam/ dbang chen gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la gzhung bzhin du bskul lo// pho rig kyi phyi ma la las brtul ba ni yad na/ bkru ldog tsha la rgyag 'gyur bas 'dir ma gsungs so//
147a5(rnying rgyud): la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// seng ge b+ha glu nang 'dzings pa'i// mi ltas bzlog ni ji ltar rtog/ gsang ba'i thabs ni ji ltar lags// yang drag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag
147a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// seng ge phu gu ning 'dzings pa'i// mi lngas bzlog par byan 'di ltar bzlog go/
147a7(rnying rgyud): lham kyi nang nas 'bo ba phyung la// de yang sa la bdab par bya/ be dag dang su 'dud yangs la brdab par bya'o// de gsum gdab pa'i ljags la/ oM mo a ma la me swA hA/ me ti me ti mA ra ya ti nas swA hA/ des ji ltar la yang zlog go// gsad pa'i thabs

147b3(rnying rgyud): rnams
147b4(rnying rgyud): da kyi sa / sa ma / / mi

148a1(rnying rgyud): nyon na ga rjes mas dpa'an no// dkya bstan pa la sa chom myed// bad ba'i gnas nams su nga srod namasu sa d+hug // sagasas pa dag rgyags sa da nas brgyad// dadus rgyang byad/
148a2(rnying rgyud): shAs/ chu kyigs nan/ ga sa dzin/ gas / ga na na
148a3(rnying rgyud): gas kyi gtso// rin chen dbyings phyag mi phyed mA// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bsgreng // nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi ga tso// badz+ra dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskung // byang rdzogs las kyi rigs kyi ga Ni//
148a4(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings phyag mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal ba'i thugs dam bskang // dbyings kyi mchen brgyad rnams dang // yul gyi mchen brgyad rnams kyi// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // bskang ba'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//
148a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpas yang gsol pa// dmi tshig 'das pa'i sngags gzer dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma byol ba dang // lha 'dre rdzu 'phral phrag g.yos dang // ngan sngags rdzu 'phrul ci ltar bzlog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas
148a6(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig 'das pa'i sngags gzer dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma byol ba dang // lha 'dre rdzu 'phrul drag g.yos dang // ngan sngags rdzu 'phrul bzlog pa
148a7(rnying rgyud): ni// thog pa'i las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig rdo rjes mes dpaben to// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// nga na sngags phu dbus 'azlog pa phyir// gtan tshogs man dag 'di gsungs so// bko 'dra ba'i maN+Dal ma// phreng srong btal ga
148b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin bya// dzA rdzaH ti mang du gdab// b+hi yi bshags pa mang du bya// de nas gsang ba'i mtshams bcad de// las kyi dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bya// rlung gis rbarba ba btang // bas gso srang skong mang du gdon// bslang ba'i gnas lnga gzhung bzhin du/
148b2(rnying rgyud): mahA shin+tiM cho ga bya// ma mor grags pa kun kyang bslang // yo byad nag mo gzhung bzhin btang // rtags dang mtshan ma zhib tu brtags// rtags dang mtshan ma zin pa dang // bskang bzlog cho ga brtsam par bya// des ni mtshon ma bzlog par 'gyur// de nas
148b3(rnying rgyud): bsgyur te yang gsungs pa// bslang ba des kyang ma rmongs na// dbang gi rgyal po'i sbyar bsgoms la// rdzab gang yin ma mod// ku sha dag la gzugs byas la// 'da' ra ba ti'i rgyas pas gdags// ye shes ma mo bcwa bzhi yang // ze mchog te ru ka
148b4(rnying rgyud): srur bsgoms te// mgo lus bsnol te gdan du gdig// des nI nga na sngags zlog par 'gyur// gal te las su mgrub na// btags te rtsa ba gang yin pa// shog shog dag la gzugs byas te// mchog gi phur chus gsang bar brdeg/ sman
148b5(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gsum yang // 'jag ma dag la gzugs byas te// zangs kyi phur bu dmar pos brdeg/ dbus kyi ma mo bcu gsum yang // zhing gi shun pa ras ma la// khrag dang mtshal gyis gzugs bris te// gser ram ser po'i phur pas gdab// des
148b6(rnying rgyud): ni ngan sngags zlog par 'gyur// gal te las su mgyur na// dbus kyi che mchog yab yu ma gnyis// spra tshil dag la gzugs byas te// lcags sam nag po'i phur pa yis// thugs ka nyid du gdab par bya// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za/
148b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid dbyings su gdab par bya// che mchog rtags kyi phyag rgyas brdeg/ 'gyur med dbyings su rgyas gdab po// dam tshig 'das pa'i sngags gzer dang // 'jig rten mtshon ma gyol ba dang // lha 'dre rdzu 'phrul drag g.yos pa// ngan sngags phur bus
149a1(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa'i leT ste zhidrug pa'o// / gsung drung lta mas yang gsol ba/ dbang po'i thig la nyams pa dang // thug pa spyod ba nyams parnams// myur du gas dpa' byor// yang dang rdogs la
149a2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gas na nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// slar la bzlog cing gsad pa'i phyir// nges pa'i mnang gi 'di bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung ying dag pa//
149a3(rnying rgyud): ng+yas bstan pa la the tshom med// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba'i tshe// bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bsol nas ni// dgra de'i yul phyogs bstan nas ni// grog shing shunar sog la// / mi de'i ming byed bris nas ni// de yi lag tu bskur nas ni// shugs
149a4(rnying rgyud): grol ma yi sngags kyis gdab// khrag dang dug gi gtor ma yang // rabs chad thod par bshams nas kyang // yul ba de yi phyogs su gtor// las rnams nges par gdon miza// snying gi phur bu phyung nas ni// a mr-i ta yis mchod byas nas// dam
149a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas gtsang ma'i gtor ma la// ku saM ra yi rak+tas bran// gang yin de yi phyog su kha bltas te// gtso 'khor gzhung bzhin bskul nas ni// lus kyang gsig cing phyag rgya bsdam// bdag nyid dbang gi skur bsgoms te// dbang drag phyag rgya bcings nas ni/
149a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs de nyid la chom rngams bya// drag shul dbang gis bskyod la btang // de ltar drag shul gyis spun mo rnams dbang du bskus la btang ngo // de ltar byas na las mi 'grub mi srid do// 'dir ma bu gu h+ya de btsan+da'i thugs kyi man ngag go// bsdams pa'i phyag rgya
149a7(rnying rgyud): bkrol nas ni// brig sha'i lcags kyis bsdams nas ni// bong gi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // rdo rje gnon 'bros gom pa yis// phyogs dar bdun du 'gro ba'o// yab phye ma sngags kyis btab nas ni// pi gi phyag rgya drag bsgyur nas// des ni
149b1(rnying rgyud): bas rnabs 'brub// lan gsum byas nanabar 'gyur// lanas byas na 'a bar 'gyur// lan ga sum pa dang dril nas na// snying gi sur bgrang nas na// b+h+yon+ti / ts+tsha ga pab skye// gags sas zung rtsal// dbang dag smras nadang /
149b2(rnying rgyud): gzhung bzhin bya// des ni nges par gdon mi ze// mon nam rabs chad thod pa la// nang du ma bdun snying po bri// skyi gtsug nyi ma thod zeng bri// chags 'dzin spun gnyis ni lhag go// tshon srad gnyis kyi mong nas gdugs// rak+shan+d+ha d+ha'i sngags
149b3(rnying rgyud): g+saswA/ 'a gi tu gnyis bsgril// / drag tu krol te 'phang sa la byit+ma// gyus nams 'grub padag don m-i // zha ga gatshal sa ngas kyis// mtsharnams lag gas nga // rtser du tha~Mg kyang bsad pa'i phan
149b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa
149b5(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// ngo mtshar lhal bdag nyan 'tshal// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing // lce gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang // sems can tun
149b6(rnying rgyud): laganod byed pa/ bdag la ngan sems byed pa lnga/ nan tu las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig ga yung drung yang dag pa// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// srog lhas rtsa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir// rwa srog thog shing shun nam// g.ya
149b7(rnying rgyud): pa na 'i des dgal// khyod nga gsal dkris// dkyi po'i zugs ni rjes ngaM/ tsho rgya shi rnams // rdzas kyi 'breg rgya shing thung // / ga pa'i lca ga 'bras patags// dab po gzugs pa bajig rtsa/
150a1(rnying rgyud): tI kani ba li shun pa la// nas 'gra rbat+tA yis bris// mgo la mkha' 'gro lnga po ni// tsar ma ti ta yis bris// lte bar chags 'don sru na gnyis bri// rkang pa gnyis lam bdun bre// g.yas pa'i drab bu na la/
150a2(rnying rgyud): pur byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi zi// g.yon pa'i dum gru bzhi po la/ khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po bri// gsung ba'i yum bzhi skud pa'i rdzas// nyi ma thong phreng snying gi dkyil// phra men rdza mtsho mkhal ma la// ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo ni// phud rgya
150a3(rnying rgyud): mor bzhugs su gsol// phyi ma sran mo'i tshogs rnams ni// gdung rtsig khar dang ko ra'o// ab+hi chen mo rgyangs pa'o// dus drug rgyu ba'i dgra bo ni// sha ba gnyan dang baglang ngo // 'di ni nam gyi gung la d+hu// rta dang lug nir dang gsum// 'a
150a4(rnying rgyud): ni nyi ma'i gung la rgya'o// rje kho la drug cu rtsa bdun ni// dus drug rgya ba de bzhin no// myur du bskal ba'i dran sngags rnams// gong gi sngags rnams bzlas pa yis// dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg par bya// g.yon gyi dme lag bcad nas ni//
150a5(rnying rgyud): dpral ba'i dbus su bzhag/ bdud kyi chas su zhugs nas ni// skab shig mig nas mchi ma byung // de'i phyogs nyid du bstan pas ni// nga ro drug tu bsgrags nas ni// g.yas pa'i phyag rgya sdigs mdzubs kyis// sngags 'di drag tu bzlas la brdeg
150a6(rnying rgyud): panubaci pa ma sha la rol// dgal 'thung / kang ka shAT+Tan/ yai ti pa la ts+tsha/ shal gyi sdung / bang hUM gang hoH/ g+ho ru sa nA rmA tidz+yo hU~M/ zhes brdeg go// khrag rnams kyi 'a s+ye zhe brgyad pa'o// / rtsa ba'i d+ha
150a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// rgyag na de / ma tho c-i su d+ha T+Ta/ bod skad du/ ma mo byang chub kyi sems gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal nye dug yab mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i
150b1(rnying rgyud): ro nas/ yab kyi sbyin pa yon nas dam pashegs man nu d+hung ga 'ing ba'i phyir/ 'byung ba la'id byings las bskyed pa'i bud ma pa zugs la smra bskyod pa 'dum dang / dbyings babyud pa ba ma dang / mtha' das bskyod pa ba ma dang / dra
150b2(rnying rgyud): dam bsgom legs ma mo'o// 'das pa dang mabyung ba'i le'u stizhi dgru pa'o// / ba co la g.yung drung gi gnas nas/ thig 'i chen po'i tshul du bzhugs su gsol nas/ yab mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos 'byung ba lnga srid pa'i
150b3(rnying rgyud): bshig nas skye 'gro thams cad de las shar bar mkhyen te/ yab mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ thig le chen po ye nas mnyam pa las/ le nas mnyam pa'i slad bzhin du/ 'byung ba lnga ye nas sangs rgyas par mkhyen to// 'bras bye byang chub sems
150b4(rnying rgyud): su la bzla'o// byang chub sems su la bzla ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// / kun gzhi yongs su gtan la dbab pa ni/ ma mo lta ba byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo myod pa byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo bsgrub pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
150b5(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo rgya byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo 'bras bu byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo rgyu 'bras rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo thugs rje 'byung ba byang chub kyi sems dang / ma
150b6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'gyur ba byang chub kyi sems dang / mu mo rig pa brnyes pa yang dag pa byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo snying rjes grol ba byang chub kyi sems dang / ma mo gnas tha dad pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang / mtsho 'dod dam pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
150b7(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi sems su 'dus te/ sems can la don brgyas bstan te/ ma mo sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa dang / ma mo sems kyi 'bras bu bstan pa dang / ma mo sems kyi yul bstan pa dang / ma mo sems kyi rnam grangs bstan
151a1(rnying rgyud): dang / mamasams kyica ba brtan pa dang / mam sams su man tan bstan pa dang / mam rnams kyi rgyan bstan pa dang / mam sems cig pas bskrun pa dang / mamasams ca gnagababs tan pa dang / rnamasam
151a2(rnying rgyud): ngo bo nyid bstan pa dang bcu'o// ma mo khrong yangs pa'i thig le dang / thams cad rang gi rig pa'i ye shes 'phros shing 'dus pa'o// kun gzhi lta bas thag bcad pa'i le'u steng gcig pa'o// / 'gro ba 'tshams par 'jal ba'i tshang
151a3(rnying rgyud): bzang po brag tshol zangs 'dra ba/ sgo chung la phugs ring ba'i nang du dkyil 'khor zhal dbye ste// sa bslar ba dang / sa brtag pa dang / sa sbyang ba dang / sa'i lha mo ldan no// sa ni byang shar mtshams las blang ngo // rtsigs pa'i chu ni lho dang po nas blang ngo //
151a4(rnying rgyud): sngags mkhan ni nub drang por bzhugs so// khra bo bcu la sogs pas mtshams zag tu bcad do// 'byung ba chen po lnga ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i srad bzhin du byang chub ye nas ma g.yos pas dngas grub dang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag rmad byang dkyil 'khang du// nul par
151a5(rnying rgyud): chag chag gdab// bka' gsang dam pa'i gnas mchog tu// dbus su dri chen chag chag gdab// bka' gsang mchog gi gnas 'di ru/ shar du byang chub sems kyi chag chag gdab// yon tan dgas kyi gsang mchog chen po ste// dmor gzugs lho ru
151a6(rnying rgyud): sa'i chag chag gdab// bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khod du// byang du dri chu'i chag chag gdab// yang gsar thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gzi byin bskyed phyir tshol chen chag chag gdab// de nas gnam thig gdab par bya ste// nga mod gzugs chen
151a7(rnying rgyud): srung 'khol du gzhug/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thig tu gdab// theg ras ba las thig ni// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i thig tu gdab// lte ba zlum por bskor la zla gam bya// phyi rim sor gsum thod pas bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi zlum por bskor//
151b1(rnying rgyud): nga du thang ba gang babs/ bya ban pasanapa / sa rnam thas 'das/ zha gsums sa ngas / bamangs nam pas sa da spya sa/ tu stong dub ba/
151b2(rnying rgyud): la/ an jugs la pa gangs pa'i tha sa rgyas thags sa// gatshan gyi sa mangs pal/ sum ngan pa dbyer sa rnams bdag ma bzugs su gsal// rtsibs pa rnamam pa'i bzug sa smrab sas/
151b3(rnying rgyud): ma dkar pa mchos kyi lha'i rang bzhin no// dmang ngan sangs srung rngugs pa'i rang bzhin no// can chags su ni snang ba ni// skal ba'i bu'i rang bad pa/ blan ba ca dang ma tha'am gsum bgrang de/ rgyal ma lazhi'i sngags gas phyogs pa zhing dag dang/
151b4(rnying rgyud): mang gzigs gcig te/ mtshal chen gyi thegs gcigags na/ lcags kyi cis yang ba ba/ lag sdig pa dang bcas la ma nang byug pa/ canagapar bya ma yang sa dang / byed rid bachen dpang pa med
151b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems su rnang bas 'phags pa dang ma gro'i thugs dam btung // ye shes kyi na gsal bar bsgom ma// ye shes khrag rdza mang ma dzi bca' ba gi pang gzhi dang ma thal ba yang dgam ma// dkyil 'khor bta' bzil la bye
151b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs med kyi sa rang bzhin no// dmigs med sum gyi dbyings sngags pa// ti rnganam mkhan pa las/ dag pa'i ye zhes padu can mkha'// dpags su med pa'i mkha' dbyangs pas
151b7(rnying rgyud): gsag par bsgom/ maN+Dam mab dz+nyA ng+ka rna btAM/ tsun rin pa las grub pa/ dang na d+ha'i gzhal la sa/ khang / gnam rgyags kyi gzang can btab pa/ phy-i dang slang ya nga bzhin med pa/ dbus phrag sum phrag ma dpang pa gang mabyas pam /

152a2(rnying rgyud): mchog gad na du bting bya/ de'i steng du mo hrIti dru d+d+he/ zhes brjod papa/ dpu gu phyag brgya brgyad par bskor/ oM bo t+ti n+da hU~M/ zhes brjod pas yum yang bskyed/ de nas rab su rol te/ ar+tha sha \u0f7f/ bral ga na/ pA na t+yai/ ma
152a3(rnying rgyud): sgo dran/ badz+ri d+hIN+De hoHsems las bskyed pa'i mamo bcu gsum dang / ye shes mtho brgya bzhidang// drug tu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor rdzogs// yang dgazugs kyi mamo bzhi// dang po bskyed gyur thugs las bskyed// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga cu'o// nga
152a4(rnying rgyud): chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u steng gsum pa'o// / da ni yum chen mo spyan drang ngo // ma gcig kya na bzang dbyings kyi chos bdag mo// spyan 'dren mchod kyi gshegs su gsol// du 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dgyes shang brtan par
152a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs su gsol// ya mtshan 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsol// dang po sems las bskyod pa ste// brnon chen mo spyan drang ngo // sngon tshe dpal chen spyan sa rba// / brtson chen mor zhal bzhes kyi// thugs dmargyad bsngal gshegs su gsal/
152a6(rnying rgyud): nu 'argyal mtshan zhes kyang bya// de nas sgo blon chen mo spyan drang ngo // sngon tsha dpal chen spyan snga cu// sgo skyon chen mor zhal 'ches kyi// thugs ngam rgyud bskul gshegs su gsol// de nas phrin las chen mo spyan drang ngo // sngon tshe dpal chen

152b1(rnying rgyud): g+ha dang// zas btsug dmu du mangs te// thugs da pa ga shegs sa gsos// nang tu bas smra b+h+yo ma d+ha du tad 'dun dang / rgam byung ga/ mtham ba dag/ dran na na
152b2(rnying rgyud): rAk+Sha mor ga lci kha ga dzang / dz+ha mr-id+d+hi'i snying po/ Sh+T+r-iHdza mr-it+ti bir d+ha ya tiSh+Tha dz+wa la ni hUM phaT dzaH/ gong gi ma mo de rnams ni/ rgya chen po bzhi las bskyed pa'o// 'byung ba lnga las rtag pa'i tshal mo sran lnga babyed do// 'bris mra d+hiH/ dz+wal paraH/
152b3(rnying rgyud): si ti ha/ grod+hI shwa rI ha/ b+hI yA yaM te hai/ kro d+hI shwa rI hi ka ma la shwa rI ha/ ka ma de le he si/ so so'i gnas nas bskyed par bya// byed pa po dang bru ba mo// pha ma med pa'i bu mo gnyis// srid pa sngon du byung ba yin// sangs rgyas pas kyang shin tu bkres/
152b4(rnying rgyud): las srung ba'i bud med / g+hany+dzis med srid pa'i g.yung drung yin// bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsu ma ni// cing mi 'ong ba'i spun drug yin// mtshon du med pa'i nam mkha' las// gza' skar meng po'i char ba ltar// skye 'gag med pa'i chings su dri ma

153a1(rnying rgyud): sems la bskyed pa'imam dan dang / dmya la gnas pa slong sa/ yi la gzu pa'i mang ma ste/ smras la bskyed pa'i maso / bdu thub pa thalas tan/ d+hA thazla pa da nga na/ ba
153a2(rnying rgyud): da kyi gtso mo bzhi/ ma mo thun gyi bdag mo bzhi/ las la gshen pa'i bran mo bani/ dgra pa'i snying 'brog lha mo bzhi/ thams cad yang gas skya mo bzhi ru 'dus/ nyi ma brgya dang ni nub bo// thugs rtsa ba'i man ngag gi le'u steng lnga pa'o//
153a3(rnying rgyud): yang gapa dbang gi rgyal mo bzhi la sogs pa/ ma mo rnams spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ trag rAH mung / kha mun tra rag mo dza dza te khu ma kha la ma ti b+h+yo b+ho/ rgyun ma chad par de bzlas pas ni/ rang dbang med par nam mkha' la sprin 'dus pa bzhin rnams
153a4(rnying rgyud): cad kyang tshogs so// rbad pa'i snying po ni/ trag ra T+Ta mu dra stong kha rag rbad/ chu mas thum ril li zad b+h+yo/ ma ma ra tsa ya yA bran b+h+yo/ snying po sngags kyi li'u steng dgu pa'o// / Nan+t+ra'i nang du khrag snga stong rtsa brgyad dang / sha sde stong rje brgyad dang / ting
153a5(rnying rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad blag la de nas sbrengs shing bskul 'o// dam rdzas ci brgyad dang / rak+ta brgyad kyang dbul lo// ma rnyed na 'byor tshod de/ khrag gcig dang / mngal khrag gcig sbrengs shing thugs dam bskul ba ni/ gling gzhi mun pa'i g.yung drung 'das pa'i pha rol na/ gser
153a6(rnying rgyud): gyi 'dun 'das pa'i pha rol na// lcags mtshonag po 'khyil pa'i pha rol na// gser gyi khri la gA mu yi gdan 'dir ma// sdang srid thams cad dbang du sdud mdzad ma// phye 'gro mtha' la legs nyes stangs 'dzin ma// thog gi rgyal mo glog phreng ma/ sr-ing
153a7(rnying rgyud): gcig chen mo klu yi rje// sul rma bya'i thul pa gsol// tha ma ga yu yi rdo rjes gtams// bud med gser gyi go ldog can// spyan mig g.yas pa zla ba 'khyil ba tsam// g.yon pa nyi ma 'khyil pa tsam// bzhugs ni nyi ma lhon bzhugs// mtsho sngan chen mo
153b1(rnying rgyud): ldegrwa nyes skyabs 'dzin ma// sku ni mi bskyod dbyings na bzhugs// phyag na 'phrul gyi me long bsdams// rnam par thar pa'i lam ston ma// sangs rgyas rnams dang dgongs pa mthun// dbang phyug phra men rnams kyi dgongs spyod can// sred pa gsum gyi legs tes stangs na pa/
153b2(rnying rgyud): phreng ba'i sems can cha tshad gtan la 'bebs// rgyal rig rnams dang las stabs gcig/ legla ldan nag po pho nyar 'gyed// glu yang pho nyar phyog bcur 'gyed// glu rnams kun la dbang bsgyur ma// khan gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// gnas ni ma pang mtsho la gnas// zla
153b3(rnying rgyud): rje mtsho ni chos kyi dbyings// srid pa gsum gyi mtsho chen yang // dbyar ni mi skye rgun mi 'khyag/ ma pang mtsho la dpal gnas so// g.yas na srid pa'i 'khor lo bsnams// g.yon na 'phrul gyi me long bsdams// tshe yi bum pa phyag na bsdams//

153b5(rnying rgyud): thibs su 'jigs pa'i mgo dgu bcipas// sru ni shel sgod dngas pa 'dra// nyi ma'i zer bas shin tu 'tsher// zla ba'i 'od las dkar la dngas// sku yi 'od kyis stong khams khyab// zhal nas 'jigs pa'i skar mda' 'phro// dgu tshigs gzhung du

155b7(rnying rgyud): nam mkhas 'byung ba dbang du bsdu ba dang / chos nyid kyis chos can dbang du bsdu ba dang / sems can srid pas dbang du bkru ba dang / spyod pas dbang du bsdu ba dang / lta bas dbang du bsdu ba'o// dbang du gang ba kru na/ ma mo don gyi lha dgu dbang du bsdu'o//

156a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med de/ nam mkha' 'byung ba bzhi la shis bstan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bdag dpal chen pos srid pa gsum shis bstan pa dang / de gnyis ni lta bas shes bstan pa'o// spyod pas shis bstan pa ni/ he ru ka nyid kyi sleb dkar dag las bskyed

156b3(rnying rgyud): gci ni dkyigs kyi kyi gang la btags/ phrag ga yas na sngags kyi bas gab chen pa gcig zogs/ g.yon na 'phrul stim yang gcig bsdams/ khrul ma bu'i bral pa gcig man paso/ yid kyi ba bam stong gis 'dig rten gi khams g.yogs pa/
156b4(rnying rgyud): g.yag g.yon du ti zla 'khyil ba tsam/ ci bka' ba ma zhes zeng nas mdun du 'dug ga/ nub phyogs kyi rdza dang la'u bgan gyi lce 'jab/ skye nas tsam las/ rtar mar shang dzaH/ zhes brjod pas/ lum dag dmang po ma su chad pa 'dung / ngas

156b6(rnying rgyud): mags mi/ sla rags bral gyi zhags pa bcings shing / phug na dung gi gan gcig bsnams pa/ ci bka' stsal zhes zeng ding mdun na ye re 'dag pa/ byang phyogs kyirtsa ljang gun sa skranas tsas las/ nArdzam mtham dza dziH/ zhes brjod pas/

156b8(rnying rgyud): gagangasu ni ma matugs pamatho pas byung ba ga cig sa dang du/ bsrong / ldan pagasas su phyo byas rgya ba rgya sags su dang ba ba sdusas pa gti cud du/ kra ldan sa pa ngas na
157a1(rnying rgyud): mo las la gzung ba'i le 'u ster bzhi pa'o// / mA mo mtshan gyi rnam grangs dang bzlas pa las kyi sngags sa// yum chen mo sems kyi bu gcig mni/ yum nan rmugs ma bya ste yum chen ma nyid nga/ dkar mo dbu dgu mar ma
157a2(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// / rgya gar skad du/ dkar mo re ma ti/ saM skr-i ta'i skad du/ ma sar dbang phyug ma/ rdo rje dbang phyug ma/ rdo rje sa many+dza zhes bya'o// bod skad du/ dkar mo dbu dgu ma zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i mtshan gsol ba/ rdo rje
157a3(rnying rgyud): gcig pad+ma'i sring zhes bya'o// bzlas pa'i las kyi sngags ni/ trag kha mun+na b+h+yo ru lu he mo a lo tsit+ta na ma la b+h+yo ru wa he mo ya b+h+yo ru lu/ nA ga dan ha mo ya b+h+yo ru lu/ ya ma sha ka kro ha b+h+yo ru lu/ snying kha rag srog thun b+h+yo ru lu/ ma mo b+hu srid b+h+yo kun b+ho/ mtsho sman
157a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo'i mtshan gsol pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya re man+ti zhes bya'o// saM skr-i ta'i skad du/ 'o de'i sring mo zhes bya'o// bod skad du/ mtsho sman chen mo dpal ldan zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i mtshan gsol pa/ gnyen gyi lho gcig bru 'bum pa
157a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// bzlas pa las kyi sngags ni/ badz+ra snying god tshad/ te kha la za mun za mun long tar+b+hi rbad/ yun tan ti rbad/ da ra dzaM rbad/ thim rnga ma rbadade/ sha khug thig na rbad/ srid pa'i bu mo'i mtshan gsol pa// / rgya kar skad du/ gu ha re ma
157a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// saM skr-i ta'i skad du/ smug nag dbu lnga ma zhes bya'o// bod skad du/ srid pa'i bu mo zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i mtshan gsol pa/ nam mkha' mkha' 'gro dbyings rum bsil zhes bya'o// bzlas pa las kyi sngags ni/ tshal pa dum bu khrag ti rbad/
157a7(rnying rgyud): sdang na ni zad/ sheg ti shag ti zad/ za na zar za tha zad/ dum bu dum bu tshal pa rbad/ rak+Sha rak+ta ru tra rbad/ snying nag snying nag srog rtsa rbad/ tshal 'tshal pa te ni zad/ bai ril dam pa dam lu dI p+ta tsakra rbad/ dur khrod kyi ma mo dza mun+ti'i mtshan gsol pa/

157b3(rnying rgyud): zad kyi thod pa dang / spyang thod phag thod/ gu gul nag po dang / dug sna tshogs de rnams dgra bo'i khyim gyi sgo nas rkang 'dom bcu gsum bcal ba'i sa der gza' mig dmar gyi nub mo/ nam gung phyed shing phyed na/ mgo sde ngal gyis phur la khang sel du sbas nas/

157b5(rnying rgyud): ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste re drug pa'o// / rtags ni nam mkha'i dbyings nas sku mdog dkar mo dbu dgu ma ston te/ de ltar rngom shes na yang rang gi mdangs dkar la/ mig sprin dkar du bdug mchags pa g.yon grub pa'i rtags yin no// sems

158a3(rnying rgyud): ra ya dzA dzAH/ du mA ra ya/ mA ra ya du/ ya ma sIng yam khrag ya ma du/ ya ma rbad/ tshal ba paM ril/ daM pa dum bu mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod do// tsit+ta'i yang snying mtsho sman gyi thun 'di la/ yas sngags ni thod pa bya rog rjes drug par dug sna tshogs dang / dmo

161b2(rnying rgyud): la/ ar+tha raka sha phye/ bya ba bris la bar du gzhug/ rtsa ba tshan srud kyis dgra/ yang gog bu gsu ma ka thi gus btags la sngags par du gzug/ ma mdzag ra k+ka ma rash+tsa/ zhes brjod la/ cung dkar la sngags te gdab/ rlung chen po la rtsa /

161b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mnga' la/ b+ha rog gi gung du mnga' tshad ma gcig gudags so// shog shog tshon gang pa gcig la khrag gis bris la bya rog gi gung ru la gdags so// drug pa'i gung dral bris pa ni mda' khra bo la gdags so// shog shog tshon gang pa gru bzhi pa gca
161b7(rnying rgyud): la/ khyi khrag gis bris pa ni rdeg pa'i thung dral gdags so// gnyis po 'thab tu gzhug pa'i sngags ni/ oM swa mA trag su pA ra ya/ ma mkhrag ma kha' bring / trag hU~M ru lu mu Ta wa/ sa ser dang / yungs kar dang / sa nag bsres pa la sngags partsa
162a1(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shog shog gung ru gnyis la drag tu brdeg go// de ni dgra dang dgra bla phral ba'i sngags yin no// mkha' lding nang 'thab tu gzhug pa'i sngags kyang yin no// gnas ni lha 'dre mi ldan pa'i brag phug da
162a2(rnying rgyud): par kyang // bsnyen pa zhag bdun gyi bar du tshugs na ji ltar dgra bla bzang po yang 'ang ngo // rtags dang sbyar la bsreg rdzas lngas kyang bdug cing dbye'o// dbye ba gsum gyi le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// / yang rnam pa gcig la/ de khwa gang
162a3(rnying rgyud): sum pa gcig brkos la/ nang rgya sol gyis bkang la lhang tshor la dgra bo'i ming dang rus dang / gzugs bris nas mi shi ba'i lag pa g.yas par bcug la/ dong gi dkyil du bcug la/ sha rus za ba'i snying po nyud dkar la bzlas te/ zhag gsum
162a4(rnying rgyud): banyin po brgyad te/ phrin ma te/ / lugs kyi dang gsum mdzad cing / dang mtshan nan pas bab da// banyan pas kyi nying badz+ra/ tung byas shing / thang dgang kyis zab pa nyi yang btad ldag thang bram gsum pa gcig tung gang nga ba dang sa 'byung
162a5(rnying rgyud): du ma byung zhig par bsgo'o// nam phyed tshud phyed na dong ba bsubs la/ da mod gzug la mnan pa'i las bya'o// rdo rje spun yin yang gdon mi za bar nges so// dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa 'jig nges pa la bya'o// bab tshol du mi bya'o// byas na sdig
162a6(rnying rgyud): cheno// yang na g.yam pa sngon po la dgra bo'i ming rus dang gzugs bris/ shing sreg sha'i lcags kyis brab dgra bo'i gzugs la gdab cing / ma mo rdo rje dpung sgrol ma zhes bya ba mdog nag mor dadug pa/ ser bu lu zhon pa gcig bsgom mo/ tra ga raH
162a7(rnying rgyud): swa sa/ rus dz+dza/ zhes brjod cing / bdag nagag bdun nas rtags dzang // yang na mi lagags pa'i nang drug tangam pashas/ gtangs pa shas pa'i thabs la/ dpying bya nag pa'i nig la gter mabya/ dbya ma rtag tu chags
162b1(rnying rgyud): zug bsres pa gtor ma bya/ smon 'brusna tshogs dang khrag bsres la gtor ma bya/ dgun shing srar bu'i thal ba dang khrag bsres la gtor ma bya/ dus bzhi dang sbyar ba'i gtor ma'i nang nang ngu zhing lpags dang dgra bo'i ming rus dang gzug zas la gzhug/ sha rus
162b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po 'di bzlas so// snying za ba tsit+ta ma ma sha/ rol khrag 'thung / kang ka sha zan/ yang tang par do shal khri spang / grang steng / gra he badz+ra bAn+na d+ho ru lu ru lu/ zhes bzlas te/ dam lag la khrag phyung ba rang gi dpral ba'i dbyes su thugs te/ dang
162b3(rnying rgyud): chen gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gyur te/ bsgoms shing bskul nas nyi ma nub khar btang na rdzun chad par gyur to// dus bzhi dpung sgrol gyis bsad pa'i le 'u ste don lnga pa'o// / yang na rabs chad kyi thod par chu gtsang ma dang khrag bsres la zag
162b4(rnying rgyud): snying po nus tshad bzlas nas/ khyim mam mkhar la gtor la zhag bdun na rtags 'ong ngo // yul phyogs su gtor na yul du mi dge ba sna tshogs 'ong ngo // tha ga rak+ka mu tra sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes brjod de/ thod pa 'phang ngo // yang na rabs chad kyi thod pa
162b5(rnying rgyud): nang du khrag sna tshogs pa dang dug sna tshog nyung dkar dang bsres te blugs la bag zan gyis kha bcad nas migados nas tshon skud kyis btags la/ bdag e ka dzA ti'i ting 'dzin du zhugs la/ tshon sud bdag gi sos bzung ste dgra bo'i yul phyogs su kha bltas te ljags
162b6(rnying rgyud): 'di drug tu bzlas so// ma mdzag rnam ma b+h+yo d+ha lu ru lu dz+ha/ zhes brjod la/ gang la dmigs pa'i khyim dang / yul dang mkhar la brgyab na mtha' phung ngo // cho ga 'di gnyis ni dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgrang dang ba'i dgra bo'am rgyal khams yongs su phreng bar
162b7(rnying rgyud): byedapadri mi srun pa'am/ bstan pa 'jig pa smad cing spyan mig 'dzing ba'i rA dza la bya'o// thod pa dkar nag gis bsad pa'i le'u ste don drug pa'o// / yang na phud gtsang ma byas la/ lha bshos zung gsum pa byas la dkar po gcig dmar
163a1(rnying rgyud): po gcig nag po gcig byas la/ mdag dang sbyar te phung bus na gang ba gsum gzugs// gzhong sgor gcig gi nang dus nas phral gdab pa phul gang / sa ba mchu dang phul gang sna phul gsum zhugs la/ gang nge'i steng drag
163a2(rnying rgyud): bshos ri zhag/ ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis bskyed de/ las kyi lha ha ya gI wa gsal bar bsgom/ sring mo bzhi dbang du bsdus la las la gtong ngo // pho nya phyi ma yang gtong ngo // pho nya btang ba'i rjes su rgyas pa'i lha ba shos yang btang ngo // chos
163a3(rnying rgyud): sa
163a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo bcu gsum sku g.yas su sras/ dbyings kyi yum dgu su g.yon du sbas/ mtshan mar snang ba thams cad sems su sbas/ sems ye shes su sbas/ ye shes chos kyi dbyings su sbas/ man ngag ston pa'i phyir yang 'byong / don stong pa'i phyi
163a5(rnying rgyud): 'phyong / lung brgyad pa'i phyir yang 'byong / rgyud dang wang dang man ngag gsum/ rgung du bstan pa'i le'u ba rgya nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ lung du bstan pa'i la'u brgya nyi shu rdza gnyis/ man ngag tu bstan pa'i le'u ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ sum ba rgya drug tuHma dang
163a6(rnying rgyud): las smyan bkol/ kun gyi don bkol ba'i phyir na bkrol/ las dang dkyil bsgrub pa'i bkol bus bkol/ don cheng bar ston pas lde'u lags/ sra gsung thugs kyi 'alding bkol ba'i litshu lags te dan brgyad pade// nal 'byor chags pa'i
163a7(rnying rgyud): cha ga byed las zung ba'i bud// yab yum gnyis mad da byed rlo// ting 'angan can du mtshogs pa gyung te gnas// mni shes rab mchags dmyongs// gzhithobs mchag gnod mdapa 'o// gnyis su mad pas na shes bya// thul ba 'thung dang
163b1(rnying rgyud): rkyed ces bya// mngan sangs smras pas lung zhes bya// dang sbas pa'i byer/ gsang ba las kyi theg pa/ skye snod kyi bsus pas phram \u0f7fdzA/ nang brgyad bzlas yab gyid/ gnyis sa dgacig pasang rdzang dang / rang ba na gas ba'i 'gyun// sras pa ga
163b2(rnying rgyud): dr-idwa man ngag gsang // yid bzhin 'byung bas pa zhes bya// thabs rnams ston pas las zhes bya// kyi ni gong 'og 'brel ba'o// thig ni ma nor byang chub sems// les ni ma khyab med pa'o// don gyi bcud rnams 'byung bas 'phyong gi mdo// sna gsung thugs
163b3(rnying rgyud): kyi bcud kyi 'phyong ste le'u ste don dgu pa'o// / dad pa dang brtson 'grus su ldan pas/ snod dang skal bar ldan pas gnas gzhung dang mthun pa'i khyad par can du/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin du bshams la/ srub pa'i dkyil 'khor gang
163b4(rnying rgyud): yang rung ba bzhengs su gsol/ bdud rtsi sna lnga'i chag chag btab/ spyan drang pa la sogs gzhung bzhin bya/ 'bras bu chen po lnga la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga stsal/ gyen gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i zhing lnga ni/ rta dkar po shel mig byi dkar po sna dmar/ glang dkar po ste dam
163b5(rnying rgyud): bya dkar po ze dmar/ mi shel mig tu 'dug pa'o// byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i zhing lnga ni/ rta khyi mi sogs mdog nag por 'dug pa lnga'o// 'bras bu lnga ni shing la gnas pa'i ne tso// nags la gnas pa'i spre'u/ sa la gnas pa'i dred ma/
163b6(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' la gnas pa'i shang shang / chu la gnas pa'i sbal pa/ snang zhing srid pas bsdus pa kun la bya'o// slob ma snong dang ldan mi ldan dang rdzas kyi le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o// // ta na zhes pas sgrol ba'i man ngag ston te/ ba ba
163b7(rnying rgyud): shis dag pa'i zhing bcu dang / smon lam 'brel pa'i zhing bcu dang / thugs rjes sprul pa'i zhing bcu'o// mi bskal du mi rung ba'i zhing bcu'o// mi bsgral du mi rung ba'i zhing bcu la ni/ nam mkha' la rlung lter 'phyo ba dang / phug na skams ltar thems pa dang /
164a1(rnying rgyud): bcu drug tshags na nyal ba dang // um tshang na rjod pa dang // rngam pa'i drug shul byed pa dang // bdag spun skyi la gnang ba dang // dmyal ba'i rdo byeng ba dang / thig la spyod pa nyams pa'o// 'di rnams
164a2(rnying rgyud): de meng bral mi // thabs rnam pa bzhis bsgral/ gnas gang du bskal/ thebs gang gis bskal ba'o// gar+b+hags pas myong ba'i mad ngag ston te bzhi pa'o// myong ba ni sbrel chos nyid stong ba nga/ rig pa ye shes su rkyong ba dang / thabs
164a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab du sbyor ba dang / dbyings dang ye shes sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ rgyu la chags pa'i 'bras bu yin// drang por rtogs pa sku gsung thugs// log par rtog na 'khor ba'i chu// 'dod chags chu ni khrag las
164a4(rnying rgyud): byung // khrag ni 'khor ba'i gzhi yin pas// dang po bskyed kyang khrag las bskyed// tha ma 'jig kyang khrag las 'jig/ gzhung las mchod pa dang / mthun pa'i rdzas bsags pa dang / gyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i yon tan gzhung
164a5(rnying rgyud): bzhidan gyis// pad ma can dang rtsug po bkod pa dang // yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa gnon no// ta na ga Na spyod pa'i le'u ste gya gcig pa'o// / da ni ma mo dbang du bsdu ba'i thabs bshad do// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol
164a6(rnying rgyud): pa// 'og gi dbang chen ma ma rnams// dbang du brdzun ji lta bu// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdug nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas byung // yang dag gzigs kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyon cig gad de 'dul lha yi gtso// ngas
164a7(rnying rgyud): gsung pa la gdon min// nga yis bshad pa gangazhin// yul dang dngas ma can mas la// ris gyis ma mo la sogs te// gru la gas pa'i yum bzhi dang // rkyen gyi ma sring shes par bya// des nim mo dbang du sdud // dbang du bsdubal/
164b1(rnying rgyud): mas sun sa da bdang na ga byas du sungs pa pa dang / lag sa la dgas pa da sa su/ na pa gyu sa pasas gags pa su
164b2(rnying rgyud): spang ba'i dbang ni yab Am byang chub sems kyis bskur/ dbang bskur ba de gshegs so sa'i dngos gru 'a thob/ dbang yin 'bral ba ni/ bu dang drung ma 'khor bcas dbul/ zang zing longs spyod ma cang zhes// rab 'bring tha gsus dngos kyi
164b3(rnying rgyud): thob/ mchid kyi ma mo na ma'am chung ma'am/ sring mo'am zan bzhin du las skyed do// dbyings ldan khyab gsal ye gnas ma// gdod nas yod pas ye gnas mo// mkha' snang dag byed ye gnas ma// dag pa chen mo ye nas mo// yul
164b4(rnying rgyud): dusnang bag nas so// deb nad cing dbang yon dmyal ba'i la rtsa gsum pa na// dan 'di la snyid na rnam pa las stan te/ byabyas nas pa la/ dekhon nyid rnam pa la/ dgas tshod pa kyam dang / mjug tuman dag gsum dag
164b5(rnying rgyud): thig le chen po gsum du bsdu'o// thabs kyis sna tshogs 'byung bar byed/ de zer na skya/ kho zer na gsung // na zer na thugs/ nyid ni man ngag don la bya'o// thugs kyi dgong pa yin pas dgos ched/ las kyi man ngag yin pas dgos ched
164b6(rnying rgyud): dgos 'brel gyi mjug bsdus pas mjug/ don thams cad kyi mjug sdud pas mjug/ snang srid sems las bzlog pas mjug/ thig ma nor ba/ le gdal ba ma nor ba gdal bas sems nyid yangs pa'i klong / gser gyi srog rtse'i le'u ste gya
164b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / de la thabs rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ bdag ma tsho'i dbang du mi 'gro bar 'dod pa'i thabs dang / dbang ma skyes pa'i chos kyi dbyings la/ thabs shes rab gnyis mya med pas ma mo/ dngos po dang mtshan mar snang ba thams cad
165a1(rnying rgyud): ma nyid sugs pa sla dun rA/ man bya rnas sa chu ba tugs sa ma mas/ mam bdug / du / ma bas
165a2(rnying rgyud): pon gyi snang srid kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i dang du sangs klas par rtogs tsam na/ s+yAng srid thams cad dbang du 'dun gzhan lta ci smos/ bsgom pas dbang du bsu ba ni/ tI ngo 'don rnam gsum rim gyis bskye/ de ni mi rtog rtag las
165a3(rnying rgyud): 'das// kun snang yid bzhin nor bu ltar// rgya yi chos nyid dbyings nyid las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim gyis bskyed// slob spu rnam gnyis bzag gzings// hU~M me ta~M ma~M laM su~M dz+nyA badz+ra dz+ra na tsa hUM/ gzhal yas khang cu khon dpag tu med pa/
165a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i khams deng mnyam pa zhig lam gyis bskyed do// de'i dbus su paM pa s+t+ra maN+Dal la ma sU r+ya maN+Dal la/ je'i steng du n+ya a da nyi shurtsa brgyad bsnol la bting / de'i steng du lha brgyad ba ting / de'i steng du klu brgyad bting / de'i steng du gza' brgyad
165a5(rnying rgyud): bti/ de'i ster du phyogs skyong rgyal chen tshangs pa/ brgya byin bsnol ba bting / de'i steng du hUM las me mchog he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa babyed de/ zhabs g.yas kyis tshangs pa'i snying brdzis pa/ g.yon gyis brgya byin barmas pa/ ga
165a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas na gser gyi rdo rje thugs kar 'don pa/ g.yon gyis gser gyi dril bu dkrung brten pa/ dbu skra kham nag ral pa sngon du bskyil ba/ thod pa skam rmon gyis se ral khang brgyan pa/ zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi/ stag lpags kyis sham thabs byas pa/
165a7(rnying rgyud): sbrul gyi chun 'phyang gis su la brgyan par bsgom mo// yab kyi su mdog gsal bar bzhoms la/ ma mo dbang du sdud pa'i le'u ltogya lnga pa'o// / g.yon du gdan nyi zla las/ brtan ma bcu gnyis bting ngo // de'i steng du

165b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa rnam
165b3(rnying rgyud): byabs leb mas smras/ ma byang ge gi sung du du// gan gdun dus sa ma 'du dzum ma kyis bags pa / mi mjug 'an pa thabs pa ng+yas stug pa /

165b6(rnying rgyud): dul / sems nyid tu rgyang me pa ma brag 'dzin pa'i 'angags 'du mkhon nyid yang da nga/ rang ba gi zhisang nyid gnyis te gang zhing/ rnyeng thang bas
