166b3(rnying rgyud): rang ki na la gnyis te/ phra men rgya mtsho dang / dbyings kyi yum lnga'o// 'on phra men rgya mtsho la bsrub tu med zer te/ bsrub tu yod/ skad cig kyang 'di'i drang las 'dir mi rung bas chun du bsrubs pa'i lha yin no// ub rdzas gang zhe na/ lu
166b4(rnying rgyud): sems tshigs su bcug la/ rig pa skad cig ma de yin la/ ma yengs pa'i don ston/ sbubs pa'i rtags gang zhe na/ chos thams cad b+ha ga dgyes pa'i gnas der lhun gyis grub cing / sangs rgyas pas rang gi rig pa lhangs kyis rtogs
166b5(rnying rgyud): pas de kho na 'grub pa'i rtags yin no// yum lnga bsgrub tu med zer te yod/ yum ltar snang ba chos kyi dbyings yin/ chos 'jug rig pa'i ye shes yin// lnga khA ltar sdang ba ni 'asgrub pa'i rna ma lta bu yin/ rig pa dang dbyings kyi ngang du chos rngams
166b6(rnying rgyud): cad lhun gyis grub pa ni 'grub pa'i rtags yin/ 'gro nya la 'dug sdod spyod lam rnam bzhi skad cig kyang ma yengs pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'o// ma mo gnyis rang bzhin gyis bsrubs pa'i le'u ste go gcig pa'o// / gzug can gyi sgrubapa
166b7(rnying rgyud): la ngahU~M dgu/ de la khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i dkyil 'khor srub pa ni/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bzhed du gsol/ rigs bzhi'i sbu brdzas yang bsagargyang zhi yang bsogs te dgongs pa ting nge 'dzin gzhung bzhin bslub/ zhag
167a1(rnying rgyud): gcig nub mo gsang ba'i yum du dam bca'o// grub rtags ni 'od dang spu mngon du 'byung ngo // grub nas che mchog gi ting nge 'dzin zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis kyi/ ma hA de ba la sogs pa'i mthu chen brdzis shing phyag na 'jigs pa'i
167a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nasna tshogs bsnams pa/ skr-i r+g+han dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom/ de nas bdag gim mor sbyang ngo // byang chub sems drong la dbab pa dang thA sgyang sAl bdag mtshad/ de nas sru bzlal sbyin grub ba'i yon tan ni bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa/
167a3(rnying rgyud): gi ma mo sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bshams la gser tshwa la sogs pa la bsrub po// rtags 'od dang sgra snyen me chen 'byung / dpa' bo sgeg po'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pas pad+ma dbang du bsdus la byi mod dam bca'o// grub pa'i yon tan dgra la drag de
167a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sa sems yid bzhin du 'grub po// shugs sgrol ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni/ b+har+b+ha tshal bu bzhi'i nang / byang chub sems sha chen rak+ta ba su ta sogs pa blugs la bsgrub po// rtags smi naM grarta skad 'byung / pad+ma ba spu zhing chung mang dam bca'o// grub pa'i yon tad
167a5(rnying rgyud): dka la 'debs/ khros pa shugs sbol gyi le'u ste go gnyis pa'o// // e ka dza ti'i sgrub thabs ni/ ste gla bu 'dom gang gru bzhi pa gcig byas la dbus zlag ma gcig par dris te/ dam tshig gtsang ma'i gtor ma bshams la dang dmar pos kha bcad la/ kha rngub phyogs
167a6(rnying rgyud): bltas te/ sru brtag kun geng ma pas/ nub mo e ka tsa ti bsrubs te/ stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi gcig la dbus su zla gam gcig bri/ d+han+t+ra mtshan dang ldan pa gcig gi nang du byang chub sems kyi dngos gzhi kyal la/ kha nub tu bltas la dang dkar gyis kha bcad dkyil 'khor bsgrub
167a7(rnying rgyud): po// b+ha ga dbang du bsdug kun gong mar 'gro'o// 'dug sgrol ma sgrub pa ni/ steg bu khru ga pa gcig la zlag ma gcig par byas la/ padz+ra rigs kyi ted+ha mtshan dang ldan pa gcig gnang du/ pad+ma dak+ta la kha gnam la bstan dbus su bzhag cing bsgrub po// yon tan skang srid kyi bde
167b1(rnying rgyud): bkun dus gcig pa skyems par mang dang // thug sung mangs bdag can ma sgrub pa ni/ smye 'gru ga sum gcig thugam gcig bris la// mtshan dang rgan pa gcig tu srog mad pa'i dbugs te/ ba sa tang thugs kyis bka bad rtsin zag ma steng bgag/ rlu
167b2(rnying rgyud): bu zlum po mtho gang gcig la rin chen zung brgyad bris la/ rin po che gang yang rung ba cig gi phong pa ru/ rin po che sna tshogs dang 'bru sna tshogs dang / za ba dang kun nang du stsal la bsgrub po// gru dngas bdag bran ma bzhin du 'khol lo// phyogs bzhi 'jug sgom ma bzhi sgrub pa
167b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa gcig byas lnga zla gam bzhi bri/ mtshan dang ldan pa bzhi la phyogs bzhirapa/ bo d+hi mAM sa rak+ta dri chu bsten cing bsgrub po// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dngos grub thob po// sman mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste go gsum pa'o// // tshe bdag chen mo'i spa
167b4(rnying rgyud): ni/ dkyil 'khor num po khru gang pa gcig byas la zla ga ma gcig par bris la/ b+han+t+ra mtshan dang ldan pa gcig gi nad pa tsit+ta ste tshogs dang raHsa bkang la kha shar du bstan la shing shun gyis kha bcad la bskya ba nA nag bdun nas zla bzhung ngo // bcu bzhin nyi ma lung / hi shun hA
167b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang ldan pa'i nang du snying dang rak+ta bsres par byung / yon tan gzhan lta ci smos// zos pa'i ma bzhi dang thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi yang ma sring bzhin du las byed do// he ru kas nr-i man chad su bskyed pa tsam gyis 'dang lkug lug las byed do// yid bzhin du 'greng ste 'ang /
167b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo bzhin grub pa ni/ dkyil 'khor rin chen mkhar thabs su// thig gdab zla gam bzhi bkod de// b+hat+ta mtshan ldan bzhi rdzas bkram// shar du bo d+hi dang dri chen dang / lhor sha dang mI sa/ nub pad+ma da d+ha/ byang du dri chu dang chu'i dri chu bzhag go// a ma la da wA sha N+yo ru lu/ nus tshad brgya
167b7(rnying rgyud): sa klag ma 'bul du 'ong ngo // dam pa sre slo bsdu bya'o// de phan chang zan bzhin las byed do// bran bzhin sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor pa blang dab ma bzhi'i thig tu gad ba/ de la dbus su blag ma dgod/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i d+had+ha gong ma dang mthun pa'i rdzas gzhang/ 'od dang dra
168a1(rnying rgyud): dang gzugs kyang ston/ pho nya ba'i bsgrub pa ni stegs bu lu bzhi phra gcig 'thod pa dang ma bzhi'i nang du byor tshad dmadzes sbal la shing shun gyis khabacang la des bsgrub po// rtags kun gang ma rabs yon tan ni kun dbang du skad pa// tha~Md ga dzin/
168a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i chub zab kyi le'u nyi go bzhi pa'o// gnod sbyin stobs bzang gi grub pa ni// dkyil 'khor thun po khru gang pa gcig la DA ga ma ga cig byas la/ zla gam steng du ya r+tha kro tI shwa tI zhes brjod pas/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo stobs bzang sbra'i rgya khron ni 'jig rten byu ga
168a3(rnying rgyud): tsam yod la sgra mthing nag 'bar ba la spyan nyi zla stong gis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams pa/ g.yon na gyi 'bar ba bsdams pa/ ga yas 'og man sbrul zhig sbyong gi zhag pa 'phen pa/ g.yon 'og man bdud rtsi bcud kyi bum pa bsdams pa/ mu ye shes
168a4(rnying rgyud): lum 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ ye shes kyi me ris nyon mong pa'i rtog pa rmang nas bsreg pa/ 'khor gnod sbyin mang pos / sangs rgyas pas mthu che rkang mgyog pas bang mgyog pa srid pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang 'khrug par nus pa/ shar phyogs kyi rtul po yul 'khor
168a5(rnying rgyud): gi yum mdzad pa bdud rtsi bum pa las longs spyod rgyan tu mdzad pa/ rnal 'byor pa tham cad kyi grogs su 'gro ba rgyan tu mdzad pa/ sgrub pa po rnams kyi dngos grub sgrub pa gnod sbyin pho mo nam+ba cad dbang du srud pa/ 'jig rten dam ka thams cad kyi dpung gnon pa nyi zla phrag gcig pho nyar 'gyed pa/
168a6(rnying rgyud): gza' chen po brgyad kyis sku la brgyan pa'is ni bdu rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po nas/ zad kyi lhung bzed kyis rgyal po bzhi'i zhal du 'dud rtso skyems stob pa gang su zhig dang du len pa'i sgrub pa pos de nyas su 'dra shing bsgrags na/ rdul 'thor ba rnam cing korje pa ying bzhin du sbyar ro ma chu yang dus /

169a7(rnying rgyud): las// a mr-i ta ne kha shug+sa la// de ni bsdig pa lnga bu'o// ma mo 'khrug pa'i sgor thab bstan// mi bde lnga cho ga gang byung yang // bzhang rdzas bzhin du nges pas bcos// gong mgong pas 'og ma ba de// de nas las la gzung pa la gsum te/ ma mogs pa'i las lagazung ba dang / dam bcas pas
169b1(rnying rgyud): las la gzud pa dang // bcol bas las la gzung ba dang / man ngag rnam pa gsum las dang po gang nas byung ba'i man ngag ni/ gang nas ma byung bdag nyid las byung / phung po lnga la yab lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ko'u ri brgyad// de'i yul brgyad la
169b2(rnying rgyud): se kyad/ yan lag bzhi lha mo bzhi tshe bus gne'u sag gza mo/ sgal tshigA dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ bdag gi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las/ tsha bdag chen mo gas pa'i gzungs ma gnyis bskyed// khrag gi dngas ma dbugs kyi drangs ma/
169b3(rnying rgyud): kyi dngas ma rnam par shes pa'i dngas ma las/ 'jug sgrol ma bzhi bskyed/ rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyi dngas me las/ sgrol gang ma bzhi shugs sgrol ma bzhi ste brgyad bskyed/ bdag gi byang chub sems las/ srid pa chags 'dzin ma spun gnyis bskyed/
169b4(rnying rgyud): bdag gi sgal tshigs las e ka tsa ti spun drug bskyed/ bdag gi srog rtsa las 'don khams ma mo spun gnyis bskyed/ bdag gi lte ba las/ steng 'og sgrol ging ma gnyis pakyed/ bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa las/ srin mo brgyad bskyed/ rkang lag g.yas
169b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon bzhi las/ dmag gi rgyal mo spun bzhi bskyed/ steng 'og bshang lam sgo bzhi las/ las kyi srin mo bzhi bskyed/ bdag gi mkhal ma g.yas g.yon gnyis las/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug gnyis bskyed/
169b6(rnying rgyud): mchis pa las nag mo khrag 'dzags paskyed/ lag mgo gang mgo gnyis bzhi las/ pho nya chen mo zhi bskyed/ bdag nyid rten mongs pa'i yid las/ brtan ma bcuganyis bskyed do/ deng po gang nas mi ma byung ba ni bdag nyid las byung / de skar byung bas
169b7(rnying rgyud): mgag go// mamo byung ba'i rgyud dang gsang pa'i las la gzung pa'i lekhru ga bdun pa'o// / dang po gas pa'i las la gzung // bur khrod ning la po nyer bting zhing gzud// bar du dam bca' zheng las gzung ba dang / jo mor gzung na rnga mau gzung do//
170a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya/ tha ma bcal pa'i las pa gzung pa ni/ dgra bo'i lus la gzung pa yin na// kun kA'i sprul bdag dang // cha bdag can ma gnyis las la gzud // dus kun gAzhi nyams sug byu ga/ thamang martags nga
170a2(rnying rgyud): dag ni/ sngang skyid kyi chos thams cad nyon mongs pa'i yid la bsdu'o// de las rim gyis kun gzhil bsdu'o// kun gzhi skye dashug med pa'i dring ngo // thig le rnam pa gsum las/ dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis mo dang /
170a3(rnying rgyud): de ni ma mo'i thig le'o// grub pa'i thig le ni chos thams cad drang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ni dz+wal sems dang bral ba ste// ye nas bcos su med pa'i klong chen po yin no// len+de pa'i thig le ni/ thig ni bdag gi kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems yin no// l-i ni dang rig gi yon
170a4(rnying rgyud): tanA yin/ gnyis su med pa'i drang las 'jigs byed 'bang ba ri su/ dur khrod kyi chas kyis gdug pa can 'dul ba dang / rgyan dang cha lugs su snang ba las/ rdo khab len gyis lcags rnams srung tshul du/ ma mo thams cad 'dang zhing 'dud/ thams cad ni
170a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrel/ rgyal mo brgyad curgya ba ni bran du khol// blon mo dgu ni dmigs pa bzhin du 'gyed/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad gsal ba stan/ ma mo 'bum la sogs pa ni tsi kyi zeng zhing bka' sdod/ ma mo bkrol ba'i lugs kyis ni/ tshogs kyi rngam
170a6(rnying rgyud): dmo bzhin du bkrol/ me mo bcu gsum chung ma bzhin du bkol/ b+ha gA'i kha srung ma la sogs pa drug ni bol mo bzhin du bkol/ cho bdag chen mo la sogs pa bu mo bzhin du bkol/ bad+mAn ma dar+b+ba gnyis gsum bkra bzhin du bkol/ drag shul gyis dbang du bsdus
170a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma bdun ni gyo ma'i tshul du bkol lo// 'jig rten 'das pa chen mo las ni byung // 'jig rten la ni gnas te de gang nas byung na/ ma mo'i le'u stong phrag drug cu rtsa lnga pas/ man ngag gi le'u 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u brgya nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung ba'o//
170b1(rnying rgyud): pa mo dbang du bsdu zhing / bkol thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste go brgyad pa'o// / ting 'dzin rnam pa gsum bskyed pa// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin ni bskyed la/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni// dmigs med yum gyi rang du gsal// bya ba gang la
170b2(rnying rgyud): dad rdzogs par ldan// ma ny+dza shUn+ya tAdz+nyAn maN+Da la hUM/ kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin ni/ ngag pA'i ye shes pade chen mkha'// kun tu snang srid khyab par gsal// gnyis med lhun gyis grub pa'i mchog/ d+ham tAta maN+Da la b+h+yAM/ de nas r+g+ha ting nge 'dzin gyis/ dbang
170b3(rnying rgyud): med kyipa'i khyong bskyed/ gnyis su meng pa'i mkha' dbyings pos// byang chub sems kyi sbyin tshogasu gtigs// bdem chog yid bzhin na du 'babs// thams cad ma lus bsred pa'i bya// drin chen 'bar pa'i 'dadi zeng las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor
170b4(rnying rgyud): zlas pa yin pa bang 'i rnams par byas/ ra thaMd da gcogs kyis nubya tems/ gas pa'i rtsam / nga bkyil// ni rkyen gnyims pa'i rig 'tha 'dubyas padang / gang ngas bang ba'i dadang

172a3(rnying rgyud): 'gengs byed cing // bud med ser pos sA gzhi 'gengs/ che zhes mkhris chen sha ya gtong // nam ma pa'i mthong sa ma thod gnas pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dpal mo btsan// sems can kun gyi lam ston ma// bar sdang mkha' la bzhugs pa'i tshe// b+ha ga tri

172b1(rnying rgyud): na phyugs phur grod dril ma// nang gtong rims kyi rkyen bdas mo// ming nas pas na migs na nam// dam tshig bsrung na mi dges sam// bdud kyi yul du dmag 'dren ma// srid gcig re ti dam li 'dra// dgra bgegs ma lus rdul du rtogs/ ma rung dpyo//
172b2(rnying rgyud): mA pra d+yo/ de ltar byas na gang la dmigs pa mi 'grub mi srid do// res ti byang gAr ming gcig gi le'u ste brgya dang gnyis pa'o// / gab po// gsang ngo // mi brel lo// rang sgrol gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya la/ bsgom zhing dbang du brdzum
172b3(rnying rgyud): ni/ oM badz+ra satwA nA dang ya rbad/ byin+da gyis brlab pa'i gsang sngags la/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra rbad/ gai shi dar ya nad/ khrag ti rbad/ khaM ri la rbad/ oM badz+ra mug thig zig rbang / oM pu ragA sha ni thim/ pu ti dz+nyA Shang dathim/ oM badz+ra sun ri la rbad
172b4(rnying rgyud): ti ma su tsan+d+rA rbad/ oM badz+ra dar lcib/ oM badz+ra snying gong chod/ kha la za pu lo dan ti/ yo ti dan tid d+ha ra ya rbad/ dbang po lnga la de skad brjod la/ sgo bzhi dbye ba'i pho ha btang ste/ shar phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sprin gyi snying pa du ru ka/
172b5(rnying rgyud): stong 'bum phrig zhabs brgya la// phyag g.yas chu drug tsit+ta bskams// g.yon na rdo rje sna tshogs bsnams/ mchan khung g.yas kyi sgo phye la// tsit+ta phyung ba'i dus la bab// dmar 'byin chen mod tshur spyon// thar lam ston pa'i dus la bab// oM badz+ra
172b6(rnying rgyud): khrag ti tI nan ma nang / lho phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yongs nas// rmA yi snying po ni chom// chu srin 'bar ba'i kha nas ni// 'od zer mang po stong 'phros pas// 'od zer mang po'i 'phro 'du yis// mtshan khung g.yon gyi sgo bye la// tsiN+Di byung ba'i dus la ba'/
172b7(rnying rgyud): da namo tshur sngon// thar la mngon pa'i sa la bab/ oM ba rung dang/ mchod/ rung phyogs na sa 'i dkyil phangs nas// nagamo mtha' lang bang phyug tso// phe sa sgral byin 'cha'/ rgya tsho'i gting dun @#
173a1(rnying rgyud): nas// phyag gis spyong khams songs sal// rlung thogs dablags kyi spru la// kyid dbyu ba das la dang // dmang kyid byed me kyang rjon// thangalam spyan pa' stsal bab// a ba byung rgya sa du
173a2(rnying rgyud): byang phyogs nam me pa'i dkyil yangs nas// dbang drag ngal ba 'joms mdzad ma// ral ba ma po gtibs 'phros par // ral pa mang po'i 'phro 'du yis// byang phyogs lugs kyi sgo phye la// tsod+ha dbyung ba'i dus la bab// dmang 'byin chen mod myeng ljin/
173a3(rnying rgyud): thang la ma ston pa'i dus la bab// badz+ra pa ri shu ba ru ka mkhrag par dang / lag pa g.yas kyi sor mo gsum lcags kyi srung mo mgo dgu gcig tu bsam la/ mthan khung g.yas pa'i rtsib ma yang gnyis mar gnyis bar du btsugs la gdab// lag pa g.yon
173a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sor mo gsum la 'dzin pa'i lcags kyung bsam la/ mtshan khung g.yon ma'i 'og tu btsugs la/ sngags gdab/ ljags kyi steng nas rdo rje lcags kyu grangs med pa zhig 'phros pas phung po bsgyel ba'i pho nyar gyur te/ ljags kyi steng du dgra bo ri tsita dmang po
173a5(rnying rgyud): sul gsum drang ngo // de'i 'gros pas/ ha dmar po gcig tu gyur te/ ye shes kyi gzhal yas/ khang las/ b+ha ga'i dkyil du tsi t+tarlu gsum drang bar bsal mo/ dur khrod kyi sgo bzhi rtse bas/ dbang po lnga dpung ba'i sngags ni/ badz+ra ka du/ glob ma
173a6(rnying rgyud): lnga bu wA grol/ snying / ga khrag rbad/ chu bai ri li li/ 'brusi ti sa maN+Da chod/ dang dbyugs dang khums dang tshod/ sdang srid dang grol gyi le'u skye brgya gsum pa'o// / ma mo b+h+yo// ru lu dulu/ snying kha rag/ ma rag sha/
173a7(rnying rgyud): ra reg pa/ snying khrags nga chun/ drug dag / ma nyi to// sa d+ha/ dus du / nyi pa dag/ sa ma mdzad/ dzang / grom thal/ gros tshal/ dgrab rnam pa yang / mamo ni snying tha la zung rjen/ snying khrag mthun/
173b1(rnying rgyud): tata mam nga la smras/ mam thag/ mamathong dzad/ smrams/ smra / dgrang bya pas dam / mamal nga 'ang/ sbyang bams pa/ saH/ rag sa tung la na/ dag sa gas/ drangang capa lnga/ dgrangs da
173b2(rnying rgyud): rak+sha ma dz+ya/ tsa ba tsa pa ma~Mts+tsha/ khrag la mu sha ma b+ho/ ru snying khrag/ kha la rag shini nang / ri li li rbad/ snying la rag shan/ shAtit+ta nAd/ b+hi ri li li/ ni shang ku rlung thA/ ro/ ku ni ku ru kha re/ trag dag sha su tra/ snying kha rag man+tu/

173b4(rnying rgyud): d+ha~M/ rab tus sbyin gyilan// badz+ra rtsi/ ba sa / skye sa na/ Sh+Ta ni cing / na kya \u0f7f/ snyi pa shA\u0f89\u0fa4/ sati kha ra d+he/ slong bdag kyi/ mahA
173b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi snying badzub pa'i 'dre ge ba zla bzhi pa'o// / dpal ri rab gyib ni/ la n+ti d+hA mar+b+ha/ d+hA yab+h+yAM/ mthun d+hi li hU~M/ lingags ting sang / chub si ti ta sad+ma/ shan ting bar sad/ sa skyigs tIs /
173b6(rnying rgyud): r-ish+tsa ti ni draba~M/ mAr/ saM ti rub/ dwe wAg ti ma sha ljom d+his sha/ myos ti mA raM/ kha di ti ri/ r-i ti ma shaM/ shaM li gi r+g+haM/ ma long gi nit+tha/ khar gAn tAM/ shA ka ni d+haM/ sra ba gi ni dz+r-i/ tsit+ta g+ha ni d+h+waM/ yaM ya la sa/ yaM yi gan chu ba ma
173b7(rnying rgyud): sa rog mad+hi mi/ byi bi ma yaM/ kra krim yaM/ kha du ti ya~M/ gung krung / gung krung / mgung sam krung / mthung makrung / snga dgas ting / sha rog sra ti ra~M/ dbug yos ma ri/ lo bte mor/ shig bdub ting / sha kha la ra/
174a1(rnying rgyud): matsug sar/ thal/ rA/ baT/ zab jam sna / na rgyan ma b+haH/ gang / zab/ mun ta thab/ grota tub ba/ grin te/ zab/ dral nga la/ dral ma/
174a2(rnying rgyud): sa te/ mtha nasapal/ mas/ nga dul la/ smras sa ldan ma/ sa la hAs paral
174a3(rnying rgyud): mapa/ sa pa / b+h+ya/ nga za tsal pa/ skyeng zagatshal ba/ taN+Da// sanaH/ mi ba na/ gangags/ phyag gsas sa/ gnyi sadz+dza/ thabyi mabya/ myeting dag/ mya ba
174a4(rnying rgyud): gas hU~M/ shonam sna badz+ra d+hi/ oM ts+tshahrI tsa brdung/ kye 'gro kun la mnga' mdzad ma/ drung drang ma mdung / sngags 'di 'dzab tu bzlas so// me spo bas pa drug sngags kyi le'u ste bcu la 'aM// mtshan gyi rnam sa
174a5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni/ thams cad sgrol bas na sgrol ba'i le'u zhes bya/ zod pa'i las kyis thams cad gsod pas na sgrib pa'i thong mda' zhes bya/ ma mo thams cad kyis las thams cad khrag gis byed pas mamo' khrag mnga' zhes kyang / dug dang khrag tu
174a6(rnying rgyud): bkris nas las byed pas blag zing nag po zhes kyang thu/ ma mo sbyong rtsa brgyad 'bum du sprul nas las la gtong bas zed pa'i lo nya zhes kya bya/ sngags kyis las thams cad byed pas gsod pa'i ngan sngags zhes kyang bya/ chos nyid las ma g.yas pas
174a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i thig le nag po zhes kyang bya/ ma mo rnams kyi srog 'dzin pas na ma tsho rnams kyi srog ces kyang bya/ ma mo rnams kyi thabs rdzogs par ston pas na ma mo 'bum gyi ti ka zhes kyang bya'o// ma mo dbum gyi las thams cad kyi mtshan bstan pa'i
174b1(rnying rgyud): 'khya brtangag par// mam byung brgyad kyi sgron sa sang byablag+sas spyan/ ma ma thi pa ga N+DI bdag byed ba gags gsangags 'thus pa grus stsu sa drug byu sha na tu// sa masacan /
174b2(rnying rgyud): ngag mA ma ya/ daM da dzadza/ ma mo stong rtsa brgyad zad pa'i sngags bstan pa ni/ ma mo ni snying tsit+ta thun thun/ snying khrag mthun/ sha ta sa ma snying la ya ya ma b+h+yo/ ma mo stong rtsa brgyad kyi bsad pa'i sngags ni/ ma mo shag ma mthid rdzing / ma mas ma
174b3(rnying rgyud): !dgra bo rna ma na song / ma tsata dz+wa la raM/ nyid la ma rol/ b+h+r-iTi ril la d+ho/ ma ma las myur du mdzod cig mdug la bskyal ba'i tshig dbang bar du btang / sngags kyi chog gsum gyis thams cad 'thub par byed pa gsang ba' yang thig thugs kyi bdag
174b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// la mo stong rtsa brgyad kyi bsdus pa'i ngan sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya bdun pa'o// / de gsum gcig tu dril nas bzlas pa'i thabs bstan pa ne/ rdzas nam yang rung ste gsupa gcig tu 'brel nas zung ma chag par grangs ma
174b5(rnying rgyud): bzlas te/ yungs kar la bsngags shing khrag gi nang du gdab po/ rgyan mi 'chad par bya'o// gang la bya ba la brdeg pa'i dus su mjug la gdags pa'i sngags bstan pa ni/ dgra bo'i yul mkhar dang dub mtshang dang dgra phas 'ong ba'i mdun du brdeg pa dang / de gsum gyi
174b6(rnying rgyud): gas 'ang / dgra bo na dpal ya/ stong la ma/ dpal la ya/ mam snye canam \u0f7f/ kha 'di ba dang // bya ba 'das sngags gong ma gsum gyi mdun la gdags te/ khrag dang yungs gang sres pa de gtor zhing ge yab mos g.yab Ta/
174b7(rnying rgyud): la brdeg na/ nA ga tA ga shig dri ba hral shig/ nA ga sa/ nA ga las myur du gyis shig/ bya ba mjug la btags le brdeg go/ btson la badzag na/ btsan stem dang ma/ sman krim ngag sha/ rdul chos dri mdza/ btsan gris las byung du gyis shig tu
175a1(rnying rgyud): mjug la btags te brdeg go// gnod pa'i 'drel brdeg na/ kri ling gakhrung khyung dzi tsab la shig khrung khri tshomam/ du khri ka ma ma las drag tu mdzod cig/ byab 'dis mjug la btags te brdeg go// ngan sngags bzlas pa'i thabs dang gzer sngags brtan/
175a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste brgya brgyad pa'o// / bsgrub pa'i dus bstan pa ni/ bcu bzhi bco lnga nya gsum la bsgrub po/ chos brgyad dang nyi shu gnyis dang / gnam stong la bsgrub po/ brdeg pa'i dus bstan pa ni/ nya gsum la bsgrub la bcu bdun gyi nang par nyi ma phyed nas brdeg
175a3(rnying rgyud): ma stong chos brgyad nyi shu gnyis la bslab la bye de rab mo brdeg par bya'o// brdeg pa'i dus bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dgu pa'o// / bslab pa'i gnas bstan pa ni/ dben pa'i dur khrod dam/ sa zhug gam/ ri brag nyam nga ba'i brag phug gam chu gling dang nak+Sha tshal sug
175a4(rnying rgyud): po'i gnas sub grub par bya'o// bsnyen pa bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rang nyams gang bde ba'i gnas su bya'o// brdeg pa'i gnas ni klu yod pa'i chu mig tu brdeg pa dang / btsan gnas pa'i rten la ba reg pa dang / dgra po'i dur ma chad la brdeg pa dang / grong khyer lcir pa rdeg pa dang / dgra
175a5(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i khyim la b.reg pa dang / yul gyi phyogs su brdeg pa dang / gnod nas chags pa'i 'dra chen po la badzag pa dang / dgra pa pa 'ong ba'i mdun du brdeg pa'o// gnas bstan pa'i le'u sde brgya bcu ba'o// / brdeg pa'i thabs bstan pa ni/ gang la
175a6(rnying rgyud): bdeg pa'i gnas su rma bkrol la/ mi shi ba'i lag pa g.yas par thug la gtor ro// gdug pa'i sngags bzlas mi'i g.yang gzhi 'am/ khyi nag po'i g.yang gzhi gang yod pas g.yab cing brdeg go/ grong yul rang sa la gtor na phyin phyogs su bskor zhing khrag gtor g.yab mo nag
175a7(rnying rgyud): ba / ngur mchad la bdeg na gong ma'i steng du bud med kyi zhabs ma rnying pas bdag/ l+h+wam gyi 'bog dang gsung chen dang gu gul sbyang ba'i dud pa gtang / gru la brdeg na// khrag dang ku gul dang tshil chen gyi dud pa btang na/ dgra dang klan dang thog ser myur du 'ong ngo /
175b1(rnying rgyud): na pang dgas thag dang suyul da ma ma rgyal ba dang sa gras 'dudu brta na/ btsan sa dang thog sung du dza // dmyal ba dag sa khranan tang ngur dgrwa lag zugs su gzhab btu / dasu se dang thog myur du yang ba/ spa la ba nag na zagag steng du gsul dang tsho can dang
175b2(rnying rgyud): tshal bsregs te ngung pa btang na// sman ser dang thog myur du yong ngo // yul gyi lha la brdeg na khrag dang dathug gi mang kha'i dri ma dang ngaganyis bsres pa'i phud pas bdug naser ba dang thog 'ong ngo // gnod pa'i 'jal brdeg na/ khrag dang gu phul gyi dung pa btang nas 'dre dang bral nas
175b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro'o// dgra las 'ong ba'i gdong du phyag brgya ba nu mod la rtags 'ong ngo // sngags zung chag tu mi rung / de nas slar log nas gtor ma kun khwa gcig tu bsres la phrin las bcol/ byang shar gyi mtshams sum mo 'bum la bsngos la btang ngo // de nas las kyi rjes yi mngon
175b4(rnying rgyud): pa bya/ rdzas rnams kyang mis mi mthong bar sra'o// 'ardeg pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste brgya bcu gcig pa'o// / rgyun gyi ting 'dzin bstan pa ni/ ru dong khyadam po'am phrug dong dam po 'am/ shing dong kha dam po'i nang du gong du grags pa'i rdzas de rnams btsal
175b5(rnying rgyud): lus la yungs kar gyi sgye'u btags la/ khril na 'dug kyang rung 'gro yang rung / baM mdal gyis sngags zung ma chag par yungs kar la bsngags la khrag tu thugs so// yul du 'dug na mes mi mthong bar sla'o// byas su 'gran lus la bcang / dgra byung na sngon du
175b6(rnying rgyud): gtor/ nub mo khyim dang grong yul du gtor na rtags mod la 'ang // rgun gyi ting 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya bcu gnyis pa'o// bslang ba'i cho ga bstan pa ni/ mdos chen po bshams la/ sha sta mang po dang / bya spu'i rnam grangs dang / gcan gzan
175b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi spu dang / dar sna tshogs pas brgyad la/ b+han d+ha gling bzhi pa'i nang du mthun pa'i rdzas rnams rgyal la/ gling gi phyogs bzhir bzhag go// de nas phrin las gzhung bsrangs la/ 'dzab shas gcig byas la bskang ba'i cho ga bya'o// gsang ba'i cho ga ni snying po
176a1(rnying rgyud): bzhi gang yin pa'i gnas bzhi ru btags la/ de las ma mo bzhi'i gzhal yas khang du brkyang ngo do// nga'i nang dum mo bzhis gtsam byas nas/ mamo 'dus gnas par byal/ nga' ma phrag byed kyis brlab par byas shang gsa'a'i las bya'o//
176a2(rnying rgyud): na gta ga la bkris pa rjod kyi sa 'a gangs pas rgya pa/ de lta nga ma mams rgyas pasas/ sa pa byung zhing bangs sprulas lab tu // bkang 'dun rlu ragasas pa
176a3(rnying rgyud): kyi brtag pa ma mo'i snying zor bya na/ rabs chad kyi thod pa'i nang du nas sngon mo'i ngar phye dang / pha bong gi dreg pa nag po dang / ti la nag po dang / ske tshe dang / de rnams ra khrag gis spus la gtor mar bya/ de la chad phud kyis kyang can no// zhing ras la dgra bo gang yin pa'i
176a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs byas te/ snying gar ra khrag gis ming dbris te/ de dril nas mgo thur du bstan te/ snying gsar ba'i nang du bcug la/ nying ge kha dar zan gyis bcad de gtor ma'i nang du gzhug go// mdun du dong grwa gsum pa phyag gang pa gcig po bcas la/ de'i nang dog pa'i 'o kyi kun
176a5(rnying rgyud): do grags pa'i sol bas byug ste/ de'i nang du gtor la bcug ste/ rgal 'byor yal byang phyogs su bltas nas zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed de/ sa ma ye du yaT zhes bya ste ma me 'bum las la gzhug pa'i seng po 'di stod rtsa btung du rung ma zag par
176a6(rnying rgyud): bzlas shing / mi khrag khri khrag zangs kyi lcags bye rdo phye/ dug kyi lce nag po dang de sdug pa'i rtsa ba dang / chang phud dang kha char gyi chu dang bsres te/ snyed po Sh+Ta kun sum+bAr spol sngags bzlas shing / lan ga sum thugs so// snying po 'di brjod do// ma ma sa ya du la sha ma~M/
176a7(rnying rgyud): thug dag sham kyo// snying nying / khrag khrag/ ti thun bran ma thun duH// rlom pa ya ya/ nin khrag de dza dza zhes brgya rtsal rgyad bres pa dang / ringags ma nyes pa'i dbang gzugs dong gi la g.yam pas bcad la dang byang du gdan bting la bdag nyid 'dug la/
176b1(rnying rgyud): lcug ma mtha ga ba bzhil zhing 'gras kyi smos bskyon la/ rtser pa'i mang sar gsum pa brtags te/ stang gi bu gnas ma nang nag la/ sgrol gang sngags 'di caN btud ba zlas ste zla nas stug ma'i nang bangs pa dang bang man pas bcang la/ sbya nga/
176b2(rnying rgyud): ga'u byas te gtor ma'i nang na mo'i snying la kha byang phyogs su bltas la/ phyogs bzhir mda' re re brdeg go// rtags zhag bco ldan 'ong ngo // dus ni nya gsum la bya'o// bstan pa 'jig pa la byi phran tshogs la miH'o// sngags ni yungs nag la 'di brdzas so//
176b3(rnying rgyud): ti klo dran srog la dun du rnam ma thog sha ti sha Thamadun pa zhes pa zlas so// de nas mdang phyung la gtor ma'i nang du snying dang gzugs du ma thur gtubs la phyogs kyi lam du gtong ngo // mis ma tshor bar bya/ zhag bco lda nas rtags 'ong ngo // dus ni ta gsum la bya'o//
176b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa 'jig pa la bya yi phran tshogs la me bya'o// ma mo snying zor gyi le'u ste brgya bcu bzhi pa'o// / dgra po bdud thams cad la gtad na gnas dben par song la kham por gyi nang du nas nag sran ma gro til de rnams btags pa'i gtor ma byas la
176b5(rnying rgyud): nang du rin po che sna bdun dang / lug gi sha rde dang gtubs pa thugs la gtor ma bya/ phyi nang gsang ba'i steng du bzhag/ ngar zan la krud sor bcu gnyis pa gcig byas la/ kha sta dang gzugs legs par byas la/ zhing ldegs la gang yin pa'i ming rus bris te/
176b6(rnying rgyud): ji snying gar gdug/ de gtor ma'i nang du gzhag go// gri phyed gi steng du dang mthing nag gi gur dbab/ de'i nang du gtor ma gzhug bdag nyid dpal rta mgrin gyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la che ba'i dargyalang skyed de bdud thams cad la gtad pa'i snying po 'dabung ma chag par stong rtsa brgyang
176b7(rnying rgyud): zer bar gyigs mo// bdud dzinir chung/ mngon zung / tri tsab la nir zung / chums nigayem nir zung / thun rje brjing dun / ma mchi/ dran \u0f7f/ maradzang / ya~M sa ti ting zhes bzlas so// de nas snying po tham pa dang / gtor ma dang bu gnyis gzud
177a1(rnying rgyud): mo las la gzung ba'i le'u ster bzhi pa'o// / mA mo mtshan gyi rnam grangs dang bzlas pa las kyi sngags sa// yum chen mo sems kyi bu gcig man/ yum na rdzogs ma bya ste yum rkyen ma nyid nga / dkar mo dgra dgu mar macan
177a2(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// / rgya gar skad du/ dkar mo re ma ti/ saM skr-i ta'i skad du/ ma sar dbang phyug ma/ rdo rje dbang phyug ma/ rdo rje sa many+dza zhes bya'o// bod skad du/ dkar mo dbu dgu ma zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i mtshan gsol ba/ rdo rje ma
177a3(rnying rgyud): gcig pad+ma'i sring zhes bya'o// bzlas pa'i las kyi sngags ni/ trag kha mun+na b+h+yo ru lu he mo a lo tsit+ta na ma la b+h+yo ru lu he mo ya b+h+yo ru lu/ nA ga dan ha mo ya b+h+yo ru lu/ ya ma sha ka kro ha b+h+yo ru lu/ snying kha rag srog zun b+h+yo ru lu/ ma mo b+h+yo srid b+h+yo pun b+ho/ mtsho sngan
177a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo'i mtshan gsol pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya re man+ti zhes bya'o/ saM skr-i ta'i skad du/ 'o de'i sring mo zhes bya'o// bod skad du/ mtsho sman chen mo dpal ldan zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i mtshan gsol pa/ gnyen gyi lha gcig pu 'bum pa
177a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// bzlas pa las kyi sngags ni/ badz+ra snying god tshad/ ti kha la za mun za mun long tad+d+hi rbad/ yun tan ti rbad/ dar dza zad/ thim rnga ma rbad/ sha khug zig na zad/ srid pa'i bu mo'i mtshan gsal pa// rgya gar skad du/ gu ha ra
177a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// saM skr-i ta'i skad du/ smug nag dbu lnga ma zhes bya'o// bod skad du/ srid pa'i bu mo zhes bya'o// gsang ba'i mtshan gsol pa/ nam mkhang mkha' 'gro dbyings rum bsil zhes bya'o// bzlas pa las kyi sngags ni/ tshal pa dum bu khrag ti rbad/
177a7(rnying rgyud): spang na ni zad/ sheg ti sha ga ti rbad/ za na zar za tha zad/ dum bu dum bu tshal pa rbad/ rak+ta rak+ta ru tra rbad/ snying nag snying nag srog rtsa rbad/ tshal ba tshal pa te ni rbad/ baM ril dam pa da ma lu dIp+ta tsakra rbad/ dur khrod kyi ma mo dza mun+ti'i mtshan gsol pa/
177b1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bsgom pa'i thabs bstan pa ni/ dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin stong zhing bdag med par bsgom mo// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin rkyen gyi rang bzhin sdang la rang bzhin med par bsgom mo// rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems nyid yi ge hUM du gsal ba/ de'i khyad par las
177b2(rnying rgyud): zhal yas khang la sogs pa gsal bar byas pa'i rjes la/ che mchog he ru ka gsal bar bsgom mo// g.yon du yum 'dod pa'i dbang mo yang lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gsal bar bsgom mo// che mchog yab yum rol pa'i byang chub sems las byo bzhi 'phro
177b3(rnying rgyud): lcags/ blo smug nag gcig su zas rkyong gi dbang mo cha bgyed de/ su ma dog mthing nag phyag g.yas pa brgya yis lpags kya dang mdung bkra bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon mda' gsu bsnams pa/ zhabs brgya char gcig gis lha chen rnams gnon pa zhig bsngang
177b4(rnying rgyud): rgyo gciga'i theg chenas gzhi'i dbang mo che ba phyed de/ su mdog ser nag phyag g.yas brgyan dang nagu 'brum bsdams pa/ g.yon mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o// lho gcig la ri rab gling bzhi'i dbang mo che bskyed do// sru mdog ldang nag phyag
177b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa brgyad zugs kyi 'ar bar rnams pa/ ga yon pa nanan ta ba rnams pa'i// zlogacig pa khyim tsho gling gdabang mche bsdad la/ lum dag seng dag cag g.yas pa brgyan mtshan cha'abang ba bskams pade// g.yon de grags bya ba skams pa/
177b6(rnying rgyud): rnaM / pas 'du du thug pas gajug brtan thams cad brdzis pa/ stag lpags kyi shas thabs can/ sbrul nag sbyong gis wal bskyen pa/ dang wA lam nag byed du 'arngas pa/ mche bi gtsigs pa/ lpags 'dril ba/ kan dab pa thod pa/
177b7(rnying rgyud): dus du dusra/ da kyinyi mi dkyi mi su tshol ba/ ban 'a nga'i bang sa sring ma tsu btsu // dbye'i 'i ming byung ba ba byed rgya brgya bdud pa/ dengs pa mdams su rdzu tu/
178a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan che mchog he ruka/ mthing nag 'bang ba'i zhal mda' zhing // phyag drug phyag chas srid pa sgrol// yum dang gnyis su med pa ste// thugs rnga'i dbyings nas rol mdzod gsheg/ srid pa bde 'gro khams gas
178a2(rnying rgyud): kyi lus mchog ma// ges dkyil nas 'phel 'grib mdzad// zur gsum 'khril pas sdang srid zil gyis gnon// sha khrag dmadzes 'di la brtan te gshegs su gsol// khram kha stong gi dbang mche// su ma dog mthing nag 'bar ba la// phrag na ma
178a3(rnying rgyud): cha 'bar ba bsnams// ya bdud rgyal po'i snying yang 'byin// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di la brten te gshegs su gsol// theg chen sa gzhi 'degs pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ser nag 'bar ba la// phyag na bdud kyi khram bam bsnams// gnam sa gnyis
178a4(rnying rgyud): pab+h+yo bklog mdzad// klu chen brgyad kyi snying yang 'byin// dmadzes 'di la brten te gshegs su gsol/ rgya mtsho gling gi dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la// phyag na mtshon cha 'bar ba bsnams// klu rnams kun la mnga' mdzad me// dmangs 'a
178a5(rnying rgyud): lnga te gshegs su gsol// ri ba gling bzhi'i dbang mo che// sku mdog lding nag 'bang ba la// phyag na rab gling bzhi bsnams// snang srid kun la mnga' mdzad ma// dmardzas 'di la brten te gshegs su gsol// mam b+h+yo ru lu dul/ stang kha rag/
178a6(rnying rgyud): snying khaM nga// mang g+ha ma ra b+ha/ rag mo snying khrag mthun thud/ trag rag sha snying te ke ma/ ma mam b+hu b+h+yo ru lu ru lu/ snying kha rag sa ma ya dza dza/ gro ma dz+wa la/ kro ma dz+wa la/ dzaHhU~M ba hoH// zhes spyan drang bar bya'o/ spun drang ba'i le'u ste brgya bco brgyad pa'o//
178a7(rnying rgyud): do ni 'phyag 'tshal te/ gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms kun bzang he ru ka/ lha yi lha khyod bdag la dgongs nas kyang // yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// yab yum rdzogs pa'i yul phyag 'tshal lo// dbyings ma bzhi yi yum
178b1(rnying rgyud): mchog dbang spyad pa// rkyen shA ba cad kyi 'gro kyad mdzad pa// khams gsum snang srid srungs thob pa sbyad // dbang byad rtson ma bzhol phyug 'tshal lo// khams gas pa grub mchag la sags sbyong dang 'bum// kun tham nga' bdag lag pas na
178b2(rnying rgyud): tsur// byi 'gro kun gyi tshe srog babyed len ma// ma lus sprul pa'i tshigs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag btsal ba'i le'u ste ba rgya bcu dgu pa'o// / mchod cing thugs dam bskal ba ni/ sha khra ga da'angs su sung bstan d+ha'i nang du lus 'acwo
178b3(rnying rgyud): pad+ma b+han rta 'phrul gyi gzhal yas su// dak+ta dmar gyi thaklong 'khyil pa dang // khams gsum sgrol ba'i dam rdzas sha chen dang // snying gsum chu gsum sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi chen po 'dis// dpal ldan yab yum su la mchod par 'bul// ye shes 'phrul
178b4(rnying rgyud): grub rgyal du gsol// ma ma mthong nag 'khyil pa'i su// gnas ni nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas// dbu yang stong la phyag yang stod // stong gsum stong gi 'jig rtenan// khro mo mi bzang su byung ba// su ni rin chen nam mkha'i su// phrag ca dang dag pa
178b5(rnying rgyud): bsdams// bdud kyi dmag dpung rdul du rngog/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la// bdag gis bcol ba'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// ma mo ser nag 'khyil pa'i lu// 'khrugs nis gzhi nyid la bzhugs// skad srid yongs la mnga' mdzad ca
178b6(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum char dbang du srung // gnams gnyis la phyo ba zlog mdzad// dam rdzas bdud rtsing bar ba 'di gsol la// bdag gis bcol ba'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// ma mo mang nag mthum che// bzugs ni gling bzhi kun na bzhugs// gling ba'i kun 'byung
178b7(rnying rgyud): trig maN+Dal// bdud bye yul rnams drul du rdzog/ dmadzes bdud ci 'bang ba 'di gsol la// bdag gis bcol pa'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// ces brjod dmadzes rnams glengs shing las bkyil bar bya'o// thugs dam bskul zhing mchod pa dbul
179a1(rnying rgyud): 'ang rgya brgya zhun // nas thugs / sam sam Sh+Ta/ ma mas nas sa sasab+hUk+Sh+ma na ma na
179a2(rnying rgyud): rmu ga/ gyu ma ga cwa sa// myi kyi ga nga/ na gnas
179a3(rnying rgyud): ga su grub pa brgyang pa'i'i theg nas sani 'dags pa'i srog gi nying po'o// ting la dag ga skye/ rdung tho pas bya/ rnas pani dag 'dags pa dbang sargya'i grog sa la thab dag gsung nyi brang
179a4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang lani stong ngam khri la sogs pa bzazlas shing ba bar du baphrul zhing dag ta spang / de nas ma mo skye'i srog gi snying po dang / rga po 'di'i phrog gi
179a5(rnying rgyud): na/ gas ga
179a6(rnying rgyud): la te bcas lartan 'i nang spangs ng+yas tab rgya tugs mas bcad das btsugs paco sbrul rtags gyur/ thub pa'i rtags kyang ba nga bzhin pa sa ma'o// ba la bya bcugs na/ gis rtags nga // ngaca ga
179a7(rnying rgyud): da 'asal bya ste/ gsang dgas 'ad bzlas// mi brjod pa da lha ga nga// dal ldan mdan da nga ma nad/ oM dru thug kyi snang bzag/ ba ca ba du yang ngas pa yadag byed kyil bang chungs na
179a8(rnying rgyud): dgas bra sum 'a pas sri sa 'as gyi ma gang 'phrung ga / myi byig pa dmis pa thug sa babyu pa'i'i ba rgyaganyis sa das mardzog sa bya/
179b1(rnying rgyud): ldanas/ ngas// dam ngan lug sun sa / sa//
179b2(rnying rgyud): ngas// ngam kyang dongs yul s+ho// rjes pazhin te/ bdag nyid kyi cag nag ma zhugs ma ma'i ra'agri ba rnams pas/ ma marnams pang sa myed pa thog gi sbying nas pa sa/ 'ang med me 'ag pa nas/ sa na /
179b3(rnying rgyud): shab tsa rag sha pa tsa tshal ba tshal ba/ gro mtshal lo ma dzal/ zhes drag tubazlas te a mr-i ta gteng bas rang dbang med par las byed par 'gyur ro// yang ma mo las byed bus 'dod na bdag nyid kyi mchog he rukar bskaras la phug na lugs su btsaral pa cad kyis/ ma
179b4(rnying rgyud): mgo nas brgyab nas mjug tu 'gems par bsgom zhing / sngags gong ma bkas shA pas mr-i ta gta na las byed do// des kyang las byed dus 'dod na/ tshig dang dbyangs su bcas pas bstod do// mamo shis bstan pa'i le'u gyi brgya nyer gsam pa'o//
179b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang khyang par du las la gtong zhing myung du bas dpa'i las thams 'di dag gi/ mang gyi chas brgyad nyi shu gsum dang gnam steng lagasang pa'i las byas/ gnas dben par song la he ru ka'i gtor ma dang khrag gis bskul bar \u0f7f/ nub mo ha dru ka 'brug sum dang pa
179b6(rnying rgyud): mo'i 'brugasum bzlas pa ni ma mo'i las la btang ba'i 'brug sum dang / ma mo bas dpa'i 'bru gsum dang / brgya rtsa brgyang bzlas te las byas na 'grub po/ krog 'am shing shun nam shog shog la dgra ba'i gzugs ming byed dang bcas ta/ bya rgod kyi khrag dang byar rdzi
179b7(rnying rgyud): dang/ datsug pa lam sbyar nas bsregs na sul 'di sa g.yo bar ci'o// sngags kyang 'thus par byed/ byang ga ge gzug spang dang meng sa la sngags brgya rtsa brkyang bzlas nas baphrog natshangs pa'i tshe dang mnyam pa yang gad cigags 'tsha'o// 'ug pa'i sha rjeg
180a1(rnying rgyud): smrams/ ma na ma na ngas sa smra sa sa da //
180a2(rnying rgyud): nga na // / na/ sa/
180a3(rnying rgyud): sun sa
180b1(rnying rgyud): bsregs nga ngas dang rdzas rnams spel la zlas// bsreg pa 'thal pa gtang bar thugs te/ chu mig bskul ba'i dbusas ma/ las thagamasas/ ma ba 'i lung du sas la gagags/ gsang ba smras pa thagasum kyi la rgyab rgya nyi nga/
180b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni/ zhing gi snam bu la thig btang la gru bzhi khru gang gi tshad du bya/ gru bzhi pa la ma mo'i zhal bri/ ma mo bzhi'i dbus su gu gsum bri/ de'i phying ma bum pos bskod dbus kyi gru gsum rabar mi khrag bla khrag mi dus bsregs pa'i sa
180b3(rnying rgyud): dang bsres lA dmar nag du byug bla ga ma khrag gis dmar por byug re kha kun b+hal chen dang dug dang re lhag pa brdungs pa'i khu ba dang bsres la dkar por btang / ma mo'i zhal dmar pos thug sman dkar por bri/ dbu nag par bya/ phyir ma sngam bu sor gsum pa gcig btangs/
180b4(rnying rgyud): gzhi khrag gis dmar por byug thod pa'i phreng bas bskor/ sgo mi btod do// de ni bar snang gi dkyil 'khor ro// sa'i dkyil 'khor bstan te/ mdun du dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba zhig byas la gzhi khrag gis dmar por byug la dbus su gru gsum sri/
180b5(rnying rgyud): tha ma thA ga sa gsum gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim dul khor lohUM bas bzhi pa bri/ de'i phyi rimatho dang zlum por bskor/ de'i phyi rim gru bzhi bya/ sgo mi btod/ dbus kyi gru gsum la dpal chen po zhal gcig zi/ kla ga ma gsum la yang zhal ra tra/
180b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi la nyan d+ha re bri/ de'i phyi rim la mda' gzhu bri/ de'i phyi rim la me ri bri bar bya/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya nyer drug pa'o// / gsang ba'i rdzas bstan pa ni/ sa bdag rgyal po'i snying gsang ba gcig dgos
180b7(rnying rgyud): de med na ba mags rapas bya'o/ seng ge dkar po'i snying dgos/ de med na khyi dkar po'i snying la bya'o// stag dang mi'i snying dgos/ de med na sre mong gi snying ngo // glang po che'i snying dgos/ de med na glang khru ba'i snying ngo // de'i stongs bzhi la/
181a1(rnying rgyud): rgyam mtshal du snang dang / nyam khang pa'i skad/ lag nagam mkha la dkrung gi ti dang / sam sbyang 'azhal g.yan na ya sbyangs su klang pa tshogs pa bsgrag par shA'o// gsan phyog gsasapa
181a2(rnying rgyud): gdang na da la khrag dang // khye skyes pa'i ste khrag dang / mtshon gyis thog pa'i khrag dang gsum ma/ de'i spongs su gyur pa'i 'i khrag bye khrag ta khrag gsum mo// dril sogs pa khrig snga mang ba bsag par bya'o// chus gsum la gangs rgya/ chu meg zugs pa'i
181a3(rnying rgyud): na
181a4(rnying rgyud): thugs lnga gsum la lcags bya zangs kyi rdo gyi gsum mo// de'i stongs su gyur pa la zug mig khrag thal chen gzhan bdud rtsi lnga dang chang luphud tshil chen sha chen gyis gzhi bzung nas sha sna tshogs dang / gtor gzhong chen po gcig d+han d+ha gnyis/ ma mur gtsag// yung
181a5(rnying rgyud): kAr dgags byugs pa ljor gang / zangs ma'i dal thog mthil nag sgrub par skrod rabs rgyad kyi thod pa dung bgrasum pa me nyams pa gtsug/ zhing gi rgyas pa bkal ga khrag gis thugs pa dang / tI gi zhum bkal ba'i thag pa khrag gis thugs pa dges so// rabs rjed
181a6(rnying rgyud): nga ba dan/ khams gang mo bstar lags pa nying ma'i dkyil du rdzo lung rang bzhig tod la/ bakhrag ci zhag mi thag gsum gyis zhan par bkrus la me 'gog par thug/ phyogs pa'i mi magling gzugs khan tshang ba labs par ze / mo rab grags pa'i
181a7(rnying rgyud): solabs ma// gsang nga'i rdzas bsnyen pa'i 'dra smra ba rgya nyer ba mang 'o// / de nas yang gsang pa'i rdzas dgram pa bstan ni/ mdun kyi thus sum steng du na ram bzhichen po'i nang du thag tshe khrag mi khrag gsum dang / sha mang ba dang
181b1(rnying rgyud): u / cadapa man sa lda dang/ nga dad tshal na d+hu ngas su mgasas ma pa nasas pa/ la la lagasas sa / dmang ba dang bag/ sa rnanas pa rgyags pad+ha nA gag gan gam thanags tung/
181b2(rnying rgyud): zur gsum pa bcu gsum bzhag la/ logs gsum dgra bo gang la bya ba'i ming dus bris te dgod do// de'i nang du yang snying gtubs pa dang / chang khud sha yi dam dum dang / ra khrag kyi thag mi khrag yang rtsal la bzhag go// g.yon gyi tha ga ma la b+ha
181b3(rnying rgyud): nang du yungs kar blug la bzhag go// 'khor lo dang mthun pa'i rdzas bzhag go me ril zhing chen gyi sgal tshigs dang lha dum dang / tshil chen gyi me mar dang / gsung chen rgun mi 'chad par btang ngo // dbus kyi gtor ma'i nang du lha bshos zur gsum pa khrag gis byug
181b4(rnying rgyud): pa gcig kyang bzhag zlagam gyi rtsorol 'khor lo bzhi'i rtse mo la/ skyer ba'i chang khrag gis drug pa mad 'gang pa bzhig drug go// de la nam ma pa'i dkyil 'khor la phyogs bzhir drug pa phug la rtsang bzhi tshon phud kyis dum bus btags so// gtor ma tha
181b5(rnying rgyud): gang gi mtho bar byas/ de'i dbus su gru gsum thod pa rabs chad kyi thod pa'am/ kham por kha sbyar te gzhag par bya'o// de'i nang du snying lha gsum dang gson khrag gsum dang / chu sna gsum dang / dug sgra gsum dang / lcags phye zangs kyi rdo h+ya chang
181b6(rnying rgyud): ma stsal te// gyi zhags kyis dam du bcings la/ phyogs bzhi 'og dang steng dang lngar rtswa zhags kyi thod du khrag gis spras pa'i zan la ya~M ga~M hU~M ga~M n+ya rtsal lo// de'i dbus nas nus pa'i gzungs thag ma btags la gzhag go// de'i nang du steng ba'i rtsangs mtho
181b7(rnying rgyud): tsam gyis mtho bar zhing chen dkyil 'khor khengs par dang mthing dag gam zhing chen gyi ga yang gzhi 'am/ khyi nag po'i g.yang gzhi 'am/ de rnams gang yod pa gcig gis brib pa g.yogs so// rdzas dgod pa'i le'u ste brgya nyer brgyang ba'o//
182a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa sgyu pacog sa na grang na gas la na / hA/
182a2(rnying rgyud): tA/ dbab/ mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dbu'/ yi dam gang byed pa'i gzhung bgrangs/ 'dzab shas gcig byas la/ de nas ma ma'i yid kyil ma mo'i ces gos rnams gon la/ ba lto phyogs su banyas la/ ma mo'i dkyil 'khor ba byed la/ tshe mchog ga ma gtso gang khyis
182a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsal dang ldan pas gzungs thag bzung ste/ yungs kar rkad par thug la/ ma mo stang rtsa brgyad kyi'i 'ang ba rdung sa chag pa brgya'am tong 'jam ji tsam dus tshad thun mi 'chad bar bzlas shing / bar bar dum mo 'bum gyi rngos bskul zhing yid la ba nag pa'i bren las grub par mdzod
182a4(rnying rgyud): cig/ sa bzu gang sngags kyis btang 'i'i lungs kar thod pa'am kham pa'i galu mthod lkugs sa thag nang du byug na/ yang lungs kar la sngags brnyas shing de bzhin dubya/ nyin la ga gsum ma man lan gsus dkyilal ba dgas la bar banom so// brjo nga /
182a5(rnying rgyud): sa ma bcaca dag tham// gas pa'i lagag pa krol ban/ gtsal bzhi'i mazhin nga dag pa ste/ kham myong gi tha bdu/ mas ny-ing par ga tha ba da yo nga // thug gi bgan pa bzhal pa/ 'phrul
182a6(rnying rgyud): dkyis dngogs// 'i mchogs zin// sras na kyang 'byungs// rkang brgya naga'abs partson// mam na 'i nan 'dzigs pa'i tshul tan nga // dmyag pa dag par dang 'bras pa'imig/ jig 'than rgyam thas bas papa'i thobs shing
182a7(rnying rgyud): go nag dang sa nas khams gsum zhal du rngubs// kha dgu gdangs nas sred gsum zhos du 'thung // bar snang khams kyi ye shes bgyis// u lus nag mo rlung gi 'khor la can// mgyogs ma'i chibs su lcags kyi srung mo chebs// ngam pa'i cha lugs

182b2(rnying rgyud): ba yang ched pa'ig gapa nyaM// bsu se nag bsags pa'i lpags pa nas// phul ba'i bony+tsa lcags kyi mtsha 'jug/ las su sri pa gsus kyi phyo bzlog mdzad// khyod na bdud dang srin po'i br-i ka te// dam pa'i da ngos stod khams rtsol mdzad pa/

182b4(rnying rgyud): hU~Mng nas ni tshangs 'debs// yA yA sa? su/ dgra bo'i snying la than thun/ snying cit+ta smyeng tsita/ kha sha thAn ri la yam snying khrag sha mam snying dbyig maM/ ya thibs tsa ti baM/ shan pa du la sod sod/ ces khrag sbrengs shing snying po bzas la mda' bur ba dag par bya'o// 'ja
182b5(rnying rgyud): maudan phye na tsa mo dang / ma mo khrag la bya ba da gyur la/ srog gi bshan brjin min// sru mdog mthing nag rjen mi la// khrag dang zhag gi zig les brgyad// dal pasar ran gnam ma pa'i khams sa gtibs// spyan gsum thog cing la bzhinan gsor blta/
182b6(rnying rgyud): yam bul lding zhing bar snang thams su ba/ ma mkhal bshal nas dgra bo'i sha rdum za// mi snying bkrus pa'i srog pa yu la gsol// dbug sum dus thal nag po'i thod pas brgyan// g.yas kyi phyag dathod pa'i khrag zor 'ban// g.yon gyi phyag gis dpral
182b7(rnying rgyud): g.yab mo 'dir// zhabs drug bgrad cing dgra bo'i snying rtsa gcod// dur khrong klong du lcags kyi gzhu bdungs nas// bayul ba'i gnas nas gser gyi mda' 'phen ma// dgra bo'i nam shes brkyad la gzer 'debs ma// dpal kye ma mo srid pa'i khrag 'thung ma
183a1(rnying rgyud): mtshugs pa'i chibs su 'phar ba rkang gsumachibs// ngag sha dbug bdag srog gshan pa ma// dngas par thags la dgrapa t+ta byung // rlung nag 'argyab ma 'khyim pa'i dkyil la ba nas// mkha' la drang ltar gting
183a2(rnying rgyud): shing dbugs la b+h+yo// khrag gi rba klong 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rag mo khrag 'thung khong gi snying la dz+haiM// dam nyams dgra bo sdang byed snying la yA// ma ma trag shA hA pA~M tsi ya/ mu ti zad/ sha ta mA ra yA sod sod/ snying khrag lus ya sod/ mas du sod
183a3(rnying rgyud): mA ra ya/ shIg shig ma snying ya du dza dza/ ma du ma sha mdza dza ces pas raka ta sbreng ngo // sman phran kun gyi gtso ma dang // mam pa sha bya ba dang // srog gi bshan pa chen mo ni// sru mdog dmar nag chen mo la// sten dmar gzha' tshon gos mu gyo// chibs su rdung
183a4(rnying rgyud): nag 'tshu bas mchi bas// rngam pa'i sku mdog za tshul bstan// mi lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gon// lag na tsat+ta'i phreng ba bgrang // kha dug lce 'bar bdud kyi bshan pa mo// dbu dgu gsigs pas bskal pa'i mi rtag 'phro// kha dgu gdangs shing khams gsum
183a5(rnying rgyud): zas su za// zhal du rngubs pas srid gsum skom du 'thung // spyan gsum bzlog pas khrag gi rgya mtshor 'khyil// kha nas me 'bar bdud bzhi sreg par mdzad// khros pa'i kha bzhin mig rtsa dmar por ston// dbu dgu ral pa thung ngu bsigs pa yis// gnam
183a6(rnying rgyud): ljags srung mo'i thog dang ser chen 'bebs// phyag na spu bri mtshon cha sna tshogs bsdams// dam nyams dgra bo rnams kyi snying tsachod// zhal nas lhaglas pa'i brda' skad srog bcur 'brod// lhal nag 'khrigs pa'i zhags pas bcings nas kyang // ngag sha mda' thor/
183a7(rnying rgyud): snying gi dkyil du kyob// tshe srog gcod cing kun gyi phudang nyul ma// lcags kyu bar bas snying gi dkyil nas drongs// dam las ma 'da' bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// mi mgo stong gi zod phreng bsigs shing spyon// 'dod chen po phyogs bzur 'bod cing skyon// dang/
183b1(rnying rgyud): ngi dzin dang khrag la langs srungs// dgra la tshangs 'debs shing gshegs su gsol// yA mAs mA dzang / Sh+Tab shig la/ mA ba ya Ta dung snying du zung / sha ya/ bta sham/ nya sha ya biHtA sha ya zang shag ma mthul/ snying du rjo/ wIng kau ma ra blon
183b2(rnying rgyud): tor mar ldeng ngo // nyul le ma kun gyi gtso mo dang sngags dang sbyar/ bshan pa ni/ gdug byed gsod pa'i pho \u0f85 ni// sru mdog cing yang mangs te// sprul pa'i mnga' bdag chen mo ste// lcags kyi spyad mo brgyal chibs// shin tu gdungs shing rbad pa'i tshe/
183b3(rnying rgyud): yi lce 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// ba spu nyag ma re re nas// srin mo 'bum gyi gzugs su ston// gdong dang mig ni khro tshul blta// phyag na lugs kyu 'bang ba bsnams// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas drongs// mchi ma khrag gi thigs pa las// lcags kyi spang po
183b4(rnying rgyud): dku byung ste// zas su dgra bo'i rnam shes za// skom du dgra bo'i khrag la 'thung // ya so lcags kyi spu gris gtams// ma so gser gyi sog les gtams// mche ba rno dkar zla tshes bzhin// seng ge'i spu ltang gcig nas skyes pa yis// ba spu ser nag bskal pa'i
183b5(rnying rgyud): me ltar 'bar// spyan gsum bgrad pa'i khro tshul ston// rngams pa'i zhal nas 'brug sgra drag po sgrogs// chibs su phag mo mgo dgu chi bas// khyod ni srin po'i bu mo ste// srin mo 'bum phrag bran du khol// nyams pa'i snying 'byin chad par bcug nas rba/
183b6(rnying rgyud): ma mi snying mAr ya dza dza snying tset+ta/ thun dza dza/ snying sha sha mA ra ya/ snying ti mA ra ya/ shin tu ya baM/ snying du baM yaM/ snying kha dag/ sha pa ya ni sod ya/ kyis yang sod/ ya gdun ne sha sod/ ces pas brdeg go// cho ga zin pa dang khrag zong spyan drangs/
183b7(rnying rgyud): la mkhar ngam nga ma chad la brdeg go/ dgra bong phyogs su 'phen na/ mda' la bya rgod sder mo mad du ru bcug la/ mda' khrag gis dmar por byugs la/ sga la dmar gtor 'phang ma mo rbad la mda' phyis la 'phang / pho nyin makyo bya ba btang ngo // nam yangs

184b1(rnying rgyud): zhabs kyis ri rab gling bzhi gnon// bdud kyi g.yul yang 'jom par mdzad// g.yas kyi phyag na bsdams pa ni// spu gre 'bar ba'i zhags pa dang // zheng gi dbyug pa bsdams pas ni// bka' las 'da' ba thams cad sgrol// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni/
184b2(rnying rgyud): ljags mdud 'bar ba 'bum phrag la// dang nag 'bar ba 'bum gyis bklubs// lha srin mang po'i dpung yang bzlog/ sku mdog dmar nag sgeg pa la// dbu gsum rab tu 'jigs par snang // dbu skra ral nag 'bar ba la// ral pa gyen du gsigs pa yis// ste
184b3(rnying rgyud): gi lha rnams dbang du sdud// ral pa thad kar gzigs pa yis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// ral pa thung ngu gsigs pa yis// mi yul dgra bgegs rdul du rlog/ thugs dam dus la bab kyi phrin las mdzod// srog gi snying po dam las ma 'da' zhig
184b4(rnying rgyud): sman phran kun gyi gtso mo ste// sa gzhi 'degs pa'i dbang mo che// de bskul ba ni/ theg chen sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi cha byad byung ba ni// snang srid kun gyis sku brgyan cing // dbu ni lcags mdud mes bsregs 'dra// pa spu kun gyi bu gnas// lcags kyi
184b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phro// rab tu 'bar bas dgra bgegs 'jil// phyag rgya g.yon pa bzhi byung bas// lcags kyu me 'od 'bar ba bsdams// dgra bgegs ma lus snying nas 'dren// phyag rgya g.yas pa bzhi byung bas// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba bsdams// dgra bgegs
184b6(rnying rgyud): ma lus snying chen 'byin// zhabs dgu thur du byung ba ni// rdo rje phurang bu dgu 'dril zhing // dgra bgegs ma lus snying la 'gems// khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhe sdang gis// pha rol gdug pa'i zhe sdang gcod// thugs dam dus la bab kyi phrin las mdzod//
184b7(rnying rgyud): srog gi snying po dam las ma 'da' zhig/ nyul lo kun gyi gtso mo ste// rgya mtsho gling gi dbang mo che// de bskul ba ni/ rgya mtsho gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi cha byad byung ba ni// su ni rin chen 'bar ba la// g.yu yi dbu la shel gyi gdong // sru las 'od zer 'phros

185a2(rnying rgyud): ne// rnarnam ma mya ba du babs// mi bzad ga ngan dang dag ba gags sgrol// cag na mdung mar ga bas pal// dang nag bum gyis bzung banas ni// ras kyi gsul tshig par mdzad// thog cig thugs dmangs la 'ang // krol ba'i

185b5(rnying rgyud): byin rab mthuchen rtsol ba'i dus la bab// drag phul mdu yi dus thab hral ru gas pa// zhes dngos grub byung ba'i lang ste bcamo gnyis pa'i/ de nas yang ser ba'i thabs la khyer bar 'dadun lab 'di byang // zhing gi g.yang gzhi yan lag pa'i 'a
185b6(rnying rgyud): byed na ba shan pa mo bzhi zis la sbyar ro// ser ba la myar na gdong mo bzhi spyan drangs te/ shAr rdzog sa nam ma pa'i dkyil yangs nas// gar gyi stag srin zer ba gdong / phyog mad 'a thams cadag geg shing gshegs/ myo blo glanas ma pe dbyil yang pa nas// bring gcig bam sring dang ba gdong / sdi
185b7(rnying rgyud): gcig gzeng thabs bdag mod cur spyad// du phyogs nam mapa'i dkyil yang nag// tsu gyi kong min pa namang gdong // gling gcig zung thabs bdag mod rgyang myo/ byang rtsis nam ma'i'i dkyil langs nas// byang gi 'phrog sbyin tu srin gdang // ji ma nas 'phrug ga
186a1(rnying rgyud): ma// 'brug lding klog 'gyur tshad skyon// skyes spyan drangs la// dwe nas grags kyis brtan par bzhug su gsol ba ni/ rag mo dag mo myang ca sha ma ma sa ma ya ti Sh+Tha wAn/ rag mo rag mo ru ro ru tshab la dgra bo'i snying kha rags ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ rag mong ga mo cang
186a2(rnying rgyud): motsab mo/ khrag la mra sha mas ya tiSh+Tha lAn/ rag mo rig mo drag mo thag shig shig dgra po'i snying kha rag la ma sa ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ ma mo rnams dam tshig gi dbang gis sa ma ya tiSh+Tha g+han/ zhes pas bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o// sun drangs pa dang bzhugs su gsol ba'i
186a3(rnying rgyud): le 'u ste brgya so gsum pa'o// / de nas mchod pa 'bral te/ sha khrag sa chog pa dang ral mdog gi sha khrag gi mchod pa dbul bar bya ste/ 'di skad do// shAr phyog nam mkha'i dkyil langs nas// shad kyi stag srin zor ba gdong // nam mkha'i dkyil nas pog 'bebs ma// 'di
186a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs rnal 'byor mchod pa ba zhes// lho yi ba ma srin dred mo gdong / bar snang khams nas 'brug spog ma// 'dir gsheg rnal 'byor mchod pa ba zhes// nub kyi kong srin glog 'grum// 'dir gshegs rnal 'byor mchod pa bzhes// byang gi 'brog srin chu srin gdong // 'dir gshegs rnal
186a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor mchod pa bzhes/ zhes pa'i rteng ma la sags gong gi mchod sngags te/ de'i mthar swA hA zhes btag la gnar bu'i nang du rak+ta sbeng ngo // nga'i snying nang du ming dus dang bcas pa'i gzugs bcug la bstab par bya ste// rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyi thog mdzad ma// sha khrag dmar gyi'o/
186a6(rnying rgyud): rjes gcod ma// tsa ra'i snying dang khrag la dgyes// legs nyes kun gyi stangs 'dzin ma// shu khrag dmar gyi rjes gcod ma// phrin las dam nyams gshed dmar gshegs// dam nyams gshed dmar zhal 'ches ma// mna' zan gang yin brid la shong // sngags gong ma la kha raM khA hi zhes
186a7(rnying rgyud): pas bstab par bya'o// mchod pa dbul ba dang bstab pa'i le'u ste brgya so bzhi pa'o// / gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa ni/ pu si dan ma dpral skyo/ u duSh+ma sha dgral skyo// baM kha zad sha dpral b+h+yo/ snying pa rag ma dpral rgyo/ kyo/ chu mo po thog la gyo// sa shar bab

186b3(rnying rgyud): yul gang du las byed pa'i sde snga tshang bar grangs la/ de rnams brdungs la khrag gi zangs su bu mchod pa dbul lo// tshil chen gyi dud pa btang / de nas mthun pa'i rdzas gang byed pas lha bsang / gang la byed pa'i grul lha yang rung ste gzungs la phra rabs gad ba/ phrar bu 'angs bzhi
