188b2(rnying rgyud): te/ bai ni ra he ya ga b+ha ya/ gur ba sa ti ya be ha ma shan ting ning rding yid/ sa b+han tI phaT phaT/ rab zhing kas ni ki na ya dang / sI sI la gri gu dun ti ya/ guM graM/ pra ti yA graM graM/ pa ya ta na/ oM shi la ngan tid aM/ bas lang bas maM oM/ oM aM oM/ d+h+waM d+h+waM/ dz+wa la dz+wa la sarba
188b3(rnying rgyud): mA rA rU baM/ nI ti le/ e dan da na/ nad gri pa lang / ha ra ha ra/ bar 'bre/ hri ba chings shig/ grang cing tar swA hA/ nyung dkar dang chu le brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gtor ro// oM ha ra ha ra pra ma yA/ tsang shi gtsang shig ha ra swA hA/ ma mo sdang srid dbang du bsdu ba'i li'u ste brgya ma dgu
188b4(rnying rgyud): hUM/ pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang // pho brang 'byams klas sprin gtibs shing // pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang // rin chen mdzes pa'i rgyan lhab lbub// shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi nas// 'jigs pa bzhi yis sgo bkag kyang // mgyogs ma bzhi yis sgo phye zhig/ kha
188b5(rnying rgyud): blam tha be sha shag/ ces bzod la skad byi'o// hUM/ yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas bde chen yang dag pa// yab yum sras dang 'khor bcas rnams// rigs kyi lhar ni nam rtogs shing // gnyis med don gyis 'brel ba la// me phyed dad pas phyag 'tshal lo//
188b6(rnying rgyud): hUM/ yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje slob dpon ye shes ltar// bka' drin rjes su dran pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal lo// hUM/ yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dam tshig gzung gis 'brel ba'i mchod// mthu'i 'dra shes nyer gzha
188b7(rnying rgyud): nas// gdung ba'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// zhes phyag bya'o// hUM/ dgongs shig ye shes mngon chags lha// yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa la// dgyes shing ye shes mdangs phyung zhig/ byams pa phyogs med sman gyis
189a1(rnying rgyud): gzigs// 'khor ba'i sems can bdag cag rnams// ma rig 'khrul pa'i rang dbang gis// gzung 'dzin gnyis su bzung bas nongs// sdig la ma 'dzem mi dge sna tshogs spyad// grib ma ngan pas na bun bzhin du gtibs shing mchis// mi gsang mi
189a2(rnying rgyud): 'cha' ye shes lha la mtho la// ye shes lha yis bzod par bzhes// a la la to// brda' sgo dbye zhing bshags pa byed pa'i le'u ste brgya bzhi bcu pa'o// // hUM rin chen in+da nI la'i bum pa r+ya// 'bru bcud stong las sbyar ba'i 'dza' gad dpa' bos gtams// gnyis med byang chub sems
189a3(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin te// 'thungs pas tshims pa'i longs spyod chen po 'di// mchod ni ye shes lha la mchod// skod ni ma mo'i thugs dam skong // 'bul ni slob dpon lha la 'bul// a la la ste bzhes su gsol lo// mdun du drang ngo // hUM/ gzhong pa zla gam dkyil 'khor du// tshe dang ga la
189a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis mthun bsdebs so// dkar gyi thig dgye dmar gyi gur phub pa// longs spyod mchod pa chen po 'dis// 'phags pa mtshang la ma mo skangs// a la la te// raka ta khrag gi rgya mtsho'i thig le dang // snang srid khrag gi rba rlabs tshi lo le// mkha' dbyings rgyal ba ma lus mchod pa da
189a5(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa mchod pas ma mo'i thugs dam skongs// a la la 'arjod la dra nga // dza gad gtor ma drang ba'i le'u ste brgya zhe gcig pa'o// // rdo rje rgyal thebs yab yum langs la/ rdo rje rgyal po la rgyan chas gsol pa 'di skad do// hUM/ gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'kho roru/
189a6(rnying rgyud): zhin mtshan ma'i dus ni 'di nyid du/ rdo rje rgyal por mnga' gsol lo// theg pa kun las dpags pa dang // ma mo dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// shun chen ral ka 'di gsol bas// mi 'khor chos nyid rgyan du shog/ oM gu ya sid+d+hi hUM/ zhes stsal gsal la/ dbu chud mchagags
189a7(rnying rgyud): panga' gsol bas// rngog pa yongs su 'phags pa dang // sred gsum dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// sred la spyi thugs dbu zhwa 'di gsol bas// sred pa'i dbang can rnams la dbang skur shog/ oM gu ma ha~MH/ zhes brjod pas dbu la gsol lo// de nas zhing gi sor grang dbul ba 'di sra nga /
189b1(rnying rgyud): gling brtsan ngas 'anga'agam la ma/ theg pa yangs la 'phags pa dang / mam brog nyid drang ba'i phyir// gang gis dathang 'dibral bas// mamonams la dbang sbya gag/ au gra lam mar nyaH/ phyag tung dul la// phug na man pas mang 'gas lal// bdud dang thugrags 'dul ba dang / du
189b2(rnying rgyud): kyis gang de 'i byer// rtse lnga 'bar ba'i rtsag cu 'di rnams la// bdud dang mug ga bang nga smrapa// oM kra la ta ta/ zhes bdo la bral la// rtag lagag yang gnyis ma 'gasal la// bdud bani du' rdeg pa dag/ na las rnam 'ani sgrub pa'i phyir// stag lpags g.yeng gni 'dag sa la 'as// na
189b3(rnying rgyud): byed rgyan dang ldan par mag/ oM gu la b+hAr+tha hUM/ zhes brjod la yul gsol lo// de nas yum la rgyan chas gsal te/ gtso bo las dang mthun na/ de nas las kyi ka mas rdo rje rgyal thabs la rgyan zas gsol te 'di skad da// bruM// bka' gsang dam pa'i gnas mchag 'dir// rngo margyal thebs gang
189b4(rnying rgyud): dag mugasal// rdo rje rgyal po bsnyel cing ba nyel ba mcha// thugs dam 'gro nas gzung nas bskul ba'i phyir// rgyan chas gsum gyis mnga' gsol lo// zhwa dag mas chen dbu rgyan dang // mchogagi phu dbu bcing ba dang // dung chen phreng bas dbang 'asrung // rgyan chas gsum sus dbang 'phru
189b5(rnying rgyud): brdung dang mu steg rdul du rlog/ de nas mched kyi rdul mtshan ma gdab pa 'di skad do// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang // ye shes chen po'i slong dkyil nas// da'al chen kun dang gcig pa dang // ma ma g.ya kyis gdabab dang // mkha' 'gro dbang du bsu ba'i phyir// thal chan mtshan ma dpal ba ga
189b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma dpral bar mi ga ba tu// dpal chen kun dang dang namra gcig/ pa d+ma 'i dak+ta'i mtshan ma 'di// smin mtsha smra pa du thig ler dgod// zhag gis sor ris la 'gram la// bdud rtsi tu brag+sa kA la// oM kara'i bsi ha/ i dkar sing dag na mi te/ zhes kun gyis de di de 'bras shing kun la gdabang /
189b7(rnying rgyud): pa rgyal thabs mnga' gsol zhing mched la mtshan ma ganga' ba'i le'u nye ba phya ba zhib cu zhe gnyis pa'o// / bstan pa bsrung ba'i man nga gzugs kyi yang nying ma mo 'bum thig 'di/ rtsa ba'i hud la le'u zhe bya/ khyi ma la le'u su dug gnyis 'byong gi 'acu gnyis te bsngo spabs 'byu bani cu ni gnyis pa rdzogs pa
190a1(rnying rgyud): ma na sa sa rnal pas nag rgyas / pa das ma byung ba na'adu marnas pa sma smra na na
190a2(rnying rgyud): sa/ med pa bams cad yum mapa' las sha dbang mthan nas/ mchin marnyed pa'i la ma ma pa'i 'daci can pa'i slong gsang ba'i gnas nas/ ga sa chen pa'i dzi'adu ba sa daste/ dgas bya'i brags sa
190a3(rnying rgyud): dkang ngo nig las gsang ba'i dgyes pa'i sgo bsdumanas gtsang par bya ba las/ um chen ma nying gaT+wA~M mu kha la'i zla ga dadakris pa chen po'i tshul duthim par mdzadang// phram chen ma nyid gzhi su kha la dadagyes pa can pas thim par mang nas/ badz+ra'i
190a4(rnying rgyud): 'ab pa byas par mdzadan// badra'i 'dab ma rgyas par mdzad nas/ snang gi 'dag nan gyi khams khabs par mdzad // nam snang gi 'dig rten gyi khams ni/ ragang chags pa thams cad brtagayas pa gyur na// das sring pa'i 'jig ca
190a5(rnying rgyud): mas rjer byar bathams cad rgyal btags par thar \u0f7f/ chags pa'amams gams nas/ gan tung ma mar skyes nas/ chu 'phrul gyi thags kyis chags pa'i gan pa gal bdi dung / nga nas gags kyil 'amang mgasu pa'i
190a6(rnying rgyud): gangasan phyir nas/ dang ngas rnams san gus pas phrag 'tshal ba / ga lung drung wa'i na tha ba gnang 'dul rtswa'i rtsal ba la sags pa/ zhag sungadu drung dmags dang / nya'i gsung dang gargyal mthod pa sa man ma tsha la sags pa/ ma lo cu
190a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dang / srid pa sum ma tshogs sa ma/ spu'i cha ga kyi rlo ma lechags pam ma'i chog sa thams cad dang / gzhan yang mama'i tshogs thams cad chags pa'i mdangs phyung nas/ bskor zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang / brjod pa
190b1(rnying rgyud): sa / na s+ho/ sa sas lag smra sa smras// donas ma cad ma na/ ba
190b2(rnying rgyud): cad chu dag na
190b3(rnying rgyud): sa
190b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
190b5(rnying rgyud): da
190b6(rnying rgyud): su ku/ sa su
191a1(rnying rgyud): nA/ rdzogs la bdag tan 'tshal// de skad gsol ba gsan nas byung // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha mi rdzogs// rnal 'byor rnams kyi las dab du mchog/ mamo rnams kyi gtan tshogs/
191a2(rnying rgyud): su// srid pa kun gyi bca' gzhi rnams// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya// del ma mo bcu bzhi 'ardo mo bshad par bya ste// yum chen mo nyid gzhi mu la le zhes bya ba/ spu'i khyon yang gling bzhi tsam yod pa/ sgra gcig la zhal rnam pa lder sbyang ba/
191a3(rnying rgyud): bad+me ka 'jigs pa'i mtshon ma thogs pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ tsat+tha'i rtsa ba gcig la rtse mo rnam pa ltar 'bar ba/ shar gyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar gsang ba'i mkha' glang la 'dred pa shel gyi phyag la rdo rje'i ge sa can no// lho phyogs kyi zham
191a4(rnying rgyud): nyis kyi bar la/ gsang ba'i mkha 'dro la 'jam pa ke ke ru'i b+ha ga la/ rin po che'i she sar can no// nub phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar nas gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la rlan pa pad+ma'i b+ha ga la bye ru'i ge sar can no// byang phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar na
191a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' thub la grang ba steg sar dpal can no// de ltar mkha' bakhris sru brgyan pas/ de bzhin klong sgra'i gting khung du bsdus pa ni/ g.yu'i bde klong la chags pa'i ge sar can no// zangs kyi ral pa 'dab mi stong dang ldan pa zhig yod do/ de la
191a6(rnying rgyud): rnamapa thal/ sh+yang gyi zhal dgang la rjos mchi ba ga rdzogs pa'i dru sa/ gyur gyid gra 'dzin pas 'byung bas ni bye gyis parnabs te/ nordo'i dgas sa // rgyags kyi zhal sra la gdangs pa/ mgag cig par nga ngas/
191a7(rnying rgyud): ga se seM su su ma nga sa/ yung 'i bye sa pa / na pa ci gas / mas na 'dir bathod sa/ ma na rtsog ci pa'i ma sa/ badz+rad bya rdzags bcu pa/ lnga bcwa yang sa
191b1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs su gyur to// byang phyogs kyi zhal ljang la gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ rdo rje rgyu bras dgu brdegs bzung bas/ 'byung ba rdung du byin gyis brlabs te las kyi rigs su gyur to// thams cad de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor /
191b2(rnying rgyud): kye thal ser la ldem pa'am/ cir yang 'gyur ba mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa zhig bzung bas/ 'byung ba nam mkhar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su sbyar to// 'byung ba lnga par de ltar
191b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed do// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyang dri ltar byung ngo // zhal ma mo'i bar bar na la pa mo sa'i rigs dang mthun par rnye // tsid+ha rtsa ba gcig la rtse mo lur ldang ba / rtse mo lnga las rigs lnga ye shes lha yang de las shar ro// rgyab gcig la rjod
191b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dbyings kyang de la 'dus te// mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang grags sa// rtse mo lngar 'bar ba la me thog gis bsdus pa'i kun gzhi la sogs pa'i dran pa thams cad kyang de las 'gyung ro// rtse ba gcig las sems can gyi rtag
191b5(rnying rgyud): yang de las 'byung ngo // shar phyogs kyi gsang pa'i mkha' brang la 'dred pas dgun du byin gyis brlabs so// byar phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha'o brgyab pazang bas/ dpying du byin gyis brlabs so// rdzabatshogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la dran pas dbyang
191b6(rnying rgyud): brlabs so// nyo phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha 'grol 'jam pas ston du byin gyis brgyabs so// dus bzhi yang de ltar chags so// cha yang de ltar snyoms so// bu snod kyi zhal nas babyung ba'i rigs wa he ru ka 'i sa ngas rgyas rnams/ sgra sngad gsang ba'i b+hag
191b7(rnying rgyud): byed nu pa tsam du bzhugs pas/ skye ba bzhi'i rigs drug so sor yang der 'thon to// rigs so sor brtul ba yang der btul lo// phyag bzhi pag las g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis bol lo bcu bzhi'i gtso po srid pa bde 'gro ma dang / nyi zla tho
192a1(rnying rgyud): ra nag kyi sa/ gsusu pa na rgya rnam pa 'dabang macan / sa pa'i phyug ma sa nga
192a2(rnying rgyud): mdzan du du rung ba/ thabs brgyad kyis dbyings kyim bzhi dngapa / thugs kyi kyis tha ma bana' snying ba rjes pa dang / dbus kyigal dpral ba'i dbyes nas mig thar gsum gcig gtsigs pas/ ma po
192a3(rnying rgyud): ma sring mags byeng ba kun gan N+Di la gtsugasrel grags pa 'dang sdug gabyung ba/ das gas nas grubadus / da sa
192a4(rnying rgyud): rbad kyi snying kyang kyis 'byin pa'o// ma mang bang du yang de sang 'dum sa// dbus kyi thal gyis mkha' phel yol pa yang dasu ngag sas// srid pa gsum gyi gcapa yang deng dgas so// sragasang pa'i theg la phra ba kyi ma' 'bed
192a5(rnying rgyud): zhes kyang de la rgyal// rnam par shes pathams cad kyi brgyad yin pas shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa zhes kyang del byal// sna rtag pa can po'i gzung drang du ba zhugs pas/ seM ga 'das pazhes kyang nga'i ma/ ma ldan 'phral zla
192a6(rnying rgyud): myang dulas 'das pazhes sngang byar// des bul blang dang mad pas kun tu bzang mags ldang ngal byor// 'byung ba nga lardzogs kyis/ 'thung ba kyil gas pa dub bya'o// ma 'i byi sa la shang byung / dras pa ma tsam migs kyang de bye
192a7(rnying rgyud): spyod kyi zhal nas byung ba'i rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyang / skra srung nas byung ba rigs pa 'di thug 'arlab pas/ dr-in gyi rul zhes kyang de la bya'o// smras pa'i phyag gnyis nas kya bdud rtsi rngab pa ldam mongs spyod mngon du ma dadapas/ 'du bya
192b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// snang ming thams cad gtan la 'bebs pas/ srid pa'i rgyal mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// skra gcig la mtshan dgram zhes kyang de la bya'o// de la zhugs nas drang ba'i snying po ni/ nyi gzhi mu kha la'i grod+hI shA rI b+ha ga pa d+hA
192b2(rnying rgyud): bde klong 'dus na snying dzaHsha yu ha d+h+r-i b+h+yo dz+ha/ yang ma mo zhes bya ba ni/ ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi yum// mo nI srid pa kun gyi ma// ma ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong // mni thabs mchog tog med mkha'o// ma ni shes
192b3(rnying rgyud): rab chags med klong // de lta bu'i yum chen mo la sku stod nas byung ba'i rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang / sku smad kyi b+ha ga sbyor ba mdzad pa'i sras mo lnga yod de/ gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal zhes bya ste/ sku mdog dkar mo la shel gyi ral pa can/
192b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' shel gyi gzhung 'khyil ba ma chags pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar zhes bya ste/ sku mdog sngon mol rin po che'i lan phran cin/ gsang ba'i mkha' rin po che'i ga'ung 'khyil ba mi len pa'i
192b5(rnying rgyud): thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal ma zhes bya ste/ sku mdog dmar mo la skya ru'i ral pa can/ gsang ba'i mkha' bye chu'i ga'ung 'khril ba gnyis su med pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rtsal mo yang gsal
192b6(rnying rgyud): g.yos zhes bya ste/ sku mdog ljang gu la/ rdo rje'i lan phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' rdo rje'i gnyu 'khyil ba grub pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam zhes bya ste/ sgra mdog cir yang 'gyur ba la/ g.yu'i
192b7(rnying rgyud): na phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' g.yu'i gzung 'khyil ba gnyis med brten pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// 'di lnga na mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi yum lnga bya ba yang 'di yin/ sems can dus chen po las bab pa yang 'di lngas dbang byed
193a1(rnying rgyud): cha'i bdag ma yang 'dus yin na// srog las drang ba'i ltung ba na/ mis padz+hiH/ dul bar daste/ b+hi shas tan/ b+hal yatata/ mthu' nyag/ da ltar bdag nyid ba rnam pa de/ dang bar dang ni cad
193a2(rnying rgyud): kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bsgom pa ni/ thugs ka nas yi ge oM dkar po gcig las/ ye shes lnga'i gzhal yas khang / chos kyi dbyings stod khyab gangal ba'i dbus su/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge'i dzin du phyogs la/ snying gar su
193a3(rnying rgyud): lasaM/ ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo bsgom/ mig g.yas pa ha las/ mkha' 'gro ma rnam snad gsal bsgom mo// mig g.yon par ha las/ mkha' 'gro 'od gsal 'bar bsgom mo// rna ba g.yas par ha las mkha' 'gro ma gnyen gsal 'bar bsgor
193a4(rnying rgyud): rna ba g.yon par ha las mkha' 'gro ma yang gsal 'bar bsgom/ sde la ha las mkha' 'gro ma bkrag gsal mnyam bsgom/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ 'og ma'i tshigs bcad dang sbyar/ ma mo rnams kyi gtso mo dang rngo ma'i yang gsang jig le
193a5(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ srid pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang // bdag nyid phyag rgyar bskyed bya ba// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid las// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi/
193a6(rnying rgyud): mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid las// ji ltar dkyil 'khor ba skyed bya ba// ngas bstan pa la gdon mi nga// nyon
193a7(rnying rgyud): cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// 'byung ba spo ba'i ngo bo la// 'jug pa bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid de// sa bon gyis ni bstan par bya// bdag nyid thig ler mnyam sbyar nas// rnam gsum rim gyis ting 'dzin bsgom// dmigs med nying 'dzin rnam dag cing /
193b1(rnying rgyud): sbyi ma tshas nyid dbyings su thim// dmigs med ma chags sa bon gyis// de bzhin nyid du rnam par drangs// snying rjenam mkha' ba ltar// blang dang med par spang ba yi// batshams su stong ba'i mabon gyis// kun tu snang zhes grags pa yim// bdag
193b2(rnying rgyud): ga zuHlas skur ba yis// 'og gi phyogs sus bon brtan// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yis// de yi steng dus bon btan// bdag gis las gyur pa yis// sa bon las ni bris ma brtan// bdag gi me las gyur pa yis// sa pa na las ni tshung du ldan
193b3(rnying rgyud): bdag gi nam mkha'i dkro las// sa bon gsum gyi snang srid bsgom// dbyings las 'thung lnga'i rgyu bskyed nga// mkha' la rlung brtan 'grol gnas// b+hag cid du gsal ba las// sa bon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khar lus pan
193b4(rnying rgyud): kyis srungs nas// rtsibs brgyad pa ru rnam par grags// gdan gyi sa bon rnam sbyangs nas// rtsibs brgyad steng du bcu bzhi 'asgreng // dkyil du rgya ma mthong tshong gnyis// shar dang nub tu mgo bsnol ba'o// grol byed dkar ma mig gcig
193b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis// brgya byin phyogs su mgo bstan pa// dbang snaspyang na ga tshar la gcig gnyis// gzhan rje'i phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o// bdud rtsi byed dang dmar ma gnyis// chu bdag phyogasas pag bstan pa 'o// gnas 'phral sar ma las ma'
193b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis// gnod sbyin phyogs su mag bstan pa// rgya gri rgyal ma ma yi phyogs// dbyings mug mni bden bral phyogs// bdag nyid mni drang gi phyogs// gcig phra ma ni dbang ldan phyags// rim gro basbed phyir 'khar rnams bsrel/
193b7(rnying rgyud): gabacu bzhi'i gdan stong ni// bdag nyid byang chub zig le las// snying pa ye shes mngon du shar// byed pa po ni kun tu bzang // rnam par bar po'i dpur ldan zhing // ye zhes drug ga phyag rgyar bcas// mtshan dang dpe byang yang dag sa na/
194a1(rnying rgyud): ldam na sa ya dungs/ bdag gi sunas stsol// rna nyi sa nags/ can ma mas kyi rdzus/ sgru pa dasas cun/ da na mangs nas 'dres// chu
194a2(rnying rgyud): yigal ma ba zhed// ye shes drug gi sdug rgyar bcas/ phyogs mtshams gnan pa'i 'byas brgyad kyis// ma gshegs par ni sri par byin// rdzas pAzhi 'char ba'i b+hag ya~M// hU~M shrI rje pa'i slong // srid pa gsus kyis smrab
194a3(rnying rgyud): skyed pal mchog la 'di skad gsungs// ye shes snying po ma 'a ched// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi dpal// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' klong kun gyi gter lags te// mkha' klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// lce 'tsho yongs kyi thur pa
194a4(rnying rgyud): 'o// sangs kyis spongs kyor gor byung // bar lam bde ba langs spyad do// 'dzum pa'i mangs kyis 'bral lags kyi// dgyes pa 'i gsang nas kyang / slong bcu phyi'i chang me mdun/ ra tem nyid mi shes pad+ma byeng /
194a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung gnas skye 'gro zang pa'i lam// den drad kyil bang mthong bangs su/ skyed pa la do rigs pa'i gted// roslong ri chang can sa bcoM// rje b+hag pa dkyil 'khod 'drir// 'dab ru pa pa'i dkyil pa'idi ldan/ gyi lpags ning sa slo /
194a6(rnying rgyud): bcas// drin chen dkyil 'jam gdan ba tid ste// bla sbed 'phral gyi lde 'igagis// lcags sgrol gdan bye gdan la bzhugs// rin chen barmugs pa'i gzha na// bla med khrag 'thung sru bsil nas// bdud rtsi chen po'i bum pa yis// sring
194a7(rnying rgyud): gsung 'gro ba'i bgachags bdu// mi dmigs pa la da gas parje// mchags pa mtshogs paca/ thangal 'ab ba rgyag dkyil// blang dor med pa'i grong yangs su// srid pa'i bag chags bcud 'byed// byed pa'o blan med pa pa/
194b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don ldan mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gyi ste// ye shes rgya bos khrus chen mdzod// oM thabs las dbyings byung bar pa'i lam// dbyings las thabs pazhengs pa med sgra// bla med dbyi sa dang shes sbya bas na
194b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen po'i char chen sred par spro// phyogs bcu rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchod par spro// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro skong ba'i tshogs su spro// 'gro ba rigs drug sgrib pa skyong ba'i phyag rgya chen por spro// mu stegs bdud 'dul khro rnal rdzogs
194b3(rnying rgyud): ldag bsngal zad phyir bdud rtsi'i char chen spro// dbang po gsal byed ye shes sgron mar spro// 'dod chags tshim byed gsang ba'i sems su spro// hU~M byang chub sems kyi thig le las// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// thams cad thig le nyid kyi rang /
194b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis med sbyor ba'i thig le che ho// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'od zer las// 'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du byung // bdag gi sa yi ngo bo las// sa bon las ni sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro brtan 'bar sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'jigs pa yid
194b5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtor // mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// saM bdang
194b6(rnying rgyud): gdan la brkyang bsum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog/ thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum zhig leng sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin
194b7(rnying rgyud): drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong // sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog las// ljang gun bza' biDUr+ya// rdzu 'phrul bzhi pi zhabs dag gis// gnod sbyin gdan la bzung bskum bzhugs// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yi// sa bon
195a1(rnying rgyud): smra//
195a2(rnying rgyud): mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog las// dmar mo dbang gi na bzas brgyan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// chu bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi me las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro 'od gsal
195a3(rnying rgyud): sems ma'i mchog/ stobs ldan mchog gi dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thig ler sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag d+ha gtong // mtshon du med pa'i sgra mdog las// rin chen sngon po'i na bzas brdzun//
195a4(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// gshin rje'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi bkag las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni srur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'gyur ba yi dbu gsum gyis// s+ya
195a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' la sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// mi 'dzad pa yi sbyin pa gtong // cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku mdog las// btsom gser gyi na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// brgya byin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs
195a6(rnying rgyud): bdag gi gab pa'i thig le 'di// sa bon las ni srur bskyed pa// bla na med pa'i yab yum gyis// sbyor ba'i gdan du drug po 'ding // bdag gi 'od can sna tshogs las// sa bon las ni sbyar bskyed pa// dpal 'bar khro mo nyid kyi sku// bdag
195a7(rnying rgyud): dngas ma bzhi po las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// gsang ba'i yum bzhi nyid kyi sku// bdag gidangs ma brgyad po las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// khams gsum ga dang gcod nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dpag bas me shing bu las//
195b1(rnying rgyud): bon las ni skur bskyed pa// skye shi rtsad gcod nyid kyi sku// g.yang gzhi dag gi gdan sted na// bdag gi bde chen gsal ba las// sa bon las ni srur bskyed pa// dug gsum dbang spyad nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dpag bsam shing bu las/
195b2(rnying rgyud): bon las ni skur bskyed pa// srid brtsad gcod nyid kyi sku// bdag gi zangs kyi bu gu las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// pad+ma shan ting dbang gi sku// 'dod khams chen mo gtso mo'i yum// bdag gi srid pa'i mdo sdu las//
195b3(rnying rgyud): las ni skur bskyed pa// yak+ka kro d+hI shwa dI'i sku// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// kro d+hI shwa dI sa ma ya// bdag gi dbang po mdog sdus las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// rak+Sha krod+h+ri shwa hI
195b4(rnying rgyud): bdag gi srid pa 'jug byed la// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// g+hu ya kro d+hI shwa dI'i sku// de ltar rtag tu bsgom pa ni// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// pha ma med pa'i bu mo gnyis// srid pa'i sngon du byung ba yin// sangs rgyas pas kying shan
195b5(rnying rgyud): bkres// lha las gyur pa'i bud med lnga// gnyen med srid pa'i g.yung drung yin// bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum ni// cir yang mi 'ong g.yung drung ste// rus med g.yung drung bcu gsum yin// mtshon du med pa'i nam mkha' la
195b6(rnying rgyud): gza' skar mang po 'bar ba ltar// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// reg pa'i phyag rgya cir snang yang // skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings su thim// gsang chen bde ba'i rdo rje la// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga spros// rtse nas thim zhing dkyil 'khor
195b7(rnying rgyud): sgyur// / ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i bza' gzhi/ gab pa'i thig le'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'thob sems can thams cad kun// rtog
196a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i nad kyis zin pa la// bdud rtsi sman btang ji ltar lags// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // bla med dpal gyis bka' stsal ba// rtog pa'i nad gzhi la sman chen na//
196a2(rnying rgyud): sa bstan pa la po tshom med// ngas bstan pa la gdon me T+Ta/ nyon cig g.yung dru yang dag pa// chu gcig dang ni rkyen gnyis las// sa bon gyis ni rnam myod pa// slong gsum spangs pas dri mchog 'gyur// drag gi sum nad kyi
196a3(rnying rgyud): yin// rgyu gnyis dang ni D+ya na gsum las// sa bon gyis kyang rnam sbya pa// sngo dang bsgrub man+ta pa las// rtog 'dul nam rtag thams cad 'dul// nyan mangs lnga yi nang rnams zhe// sngags mi dang na rten lnga las/ ma tha gyis
196a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag ste s+t+wa~M/ hrIs d+hagams pa sa pA las// rnam na ku d+har+tha/ gus pa'i ning rnams na par byed// ba gas/ rjemaldan pa mo// sa ban gyis ni nas stengs hA/ bsam man tan gnyis dang ltar/
196a5(rnying rgyud): po gti mug yin// 'jig gi dngas panas la/ ma phan gyis ni na na ban// sa na yon tan gnyis dang ldan// dengs grung rgyad pa bral yin// bdag gi khag la sre su~Mng ba yi// sa ban kyis rdo ma spangs te// zas naman pa
196a6(rnying rgyud): sa/ su gyud pa 'dang chags nasadun rnams sna sa// sa dge pargya na/ sems tan sa na/ bgrib ldan pa tha ba dag sa// 'dag pa gtsung bangam /
196a7(rnying rgyud): zhes ni rnam sbyangs na// thos mayon tan gnyis dang ldan// dngo sa grub chen bzhi sdang yin// phran 'das gcig tu gyur pa yin// phra ma stong dang sdom pa brgyad// bsus nas gang bung rin pa las// bsku ma'i mtshan gyis sbyangs pa'o// rlob
196b1(rnying rgyud): 'dradu gyur pa la// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya yis// zos nas dpal chen dngos grub thob// mkha' 'gram rnams mgu bar byed// sku gsum rkyen lnga bdud kyi chen po las// snad chen snang srid 'chang ba'i rgyud// dus gsam thal bkun kyi
196b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung gnas te// mkha' 'gro dam can kun gyi srog gi rgyan// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i 'byung gnas ni// rang byung rnam dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// bdud rtsi lnga yi sdong por nyid bzhugs pas// dug gsum rtog pa'i nad kyi gnyen
196b3(rnying rgyud): po yin// theg che na sa gzhi chen po las// rdzi mchog mang po kun skyes te// 'gro ba'i gsos su gyur pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po'i bdud rtsi'i 'khor lo las// srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad kun// rnam rtog nad kyi ga sa
196b4(rnying rgyud): sache// rgyu gsum rkyen lnga'i bdud rtsi de// ma rig dmyal ba'i dong zhes bya// de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa 'khor der 'dus pa rnams bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ gtan du rnams
196b5(rnying rgyud): nas mi 'chi ba'i dngos grul thob bo// bdud rtsi rin po che lngas rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma bcom nas// chos nyid du gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i bca' gzhi'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa/ srid pa'i
196b6(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad kun// 'dod chags kyis ni khams gsum 'khor// zhe sdang gis ni ngan song ltung // de la nan tan ji ltar bgyi// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol sngags na nas kyang // nyag gcig yab
196b7(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar chags sdang rnam pa gnyis// dngos grub chen pongs bstan gyis/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag lha// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// pha dang khu bo tsha bo dang // lha dang bu mo mdzes sdug dang / bran dang
197a1(rnying rgyud): g.yag ma lasags te// ke brgya gtu ldan pa la// lung ba gsod byed spring krung na// ngos grub la mtshan man por 'gyur// 'dod chags chen pa'i nyid 'dzin grus// mdang bum sbeng ma rnams// ma
197a2(rnying rgyud): slar rigs dran dag// zan rtsag lag ma lasogs// gdal pa ma dang phyal ba dang // chul du krung sbyang bas ma gyur zag// chas bka' phrul bas/ wag sung drung la mags pa la mtshan gyur nas spangs te/ ci yang ma snang
197a3(rnying rgyud): dang / 'khor de dag las 'khor gyi gtso bo dpal rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te/ ye shes bzhi'i phyag phyogs bzhir 'tshal te/ ba ga bzhis la brdabs te lus brkyangs nas/ rgyal po rdzogs pa'i zhabs spyi bo la blangs te/ dngos grub
197a4(rnying rgyud): myur bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ phyag rgya bcas nas gsol pa/ pha dang nye bzhi zhing bcu dag/ bsad nas dngos grub thob pa yi// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin la// zhing bar bsad na dngos grub thob// rtogs pa sna chags las bya'o// ma dang nye
197a5(rnying rgyud): phyal pa la// sbyar na dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos grub chen po bdag 'tshal na// sde dpal chen pos bstan du gsol// zhes zhus te/ lus sa la lan stong du brdabs pa dang / bag
197a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi sa la btud nas/ srid pa thams cad dus gcig tu g.yos te/ 'khor thams cad dus gcig rgya khams 'khrugs nas/ thams cad bag bzhi sa la brdabs nas ya mtshan te// spyod pa la chen po ya mtshan to// rdo rje sems dpal ya mtshan

197b1(rnying rgyud): gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'khor la gdung ba dang // sems can kun la thugs bcu'i phyir// no rje sems dpas zhus pa legs// kun kyang dran pa gnas su s+thAs// srid pa thams cad pa de la 'khod// ngas kyang bdud b+hi'i snying po sbyin// sbronas pa/

197b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ gnyen sdug dang ni zhing bcu la// gsang ba'i phyir ni zhe sdang bsgom// spyod pa gsum gyis rnam sbyangs pas// srid pa'i bag chags ma lus 'byung // lnga yi tshogs su sa bon gyis// sgo lnga bkug nas tshor ba med// snying brtsa
197b4(rnying rgyud): thugs dag gis// bsdus na rgyal po ri lu bzhin// sgo 'byed pa yi sa bon gyis// rba d+ha tsir+N+Na'i sgo phye nas// rna brgyang byin nas bsgom bzhu blugs// mas yang zlog pa'i sa bon gyis// spar te 'dra bzhi sa bon gyi la// chu dang 'o ma 'dra
197b5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// mya ngan 'das la phyagaH yis// bcings na pa de snyid g.yung drang yin// rkyen la sgo 'byengs por gyis// yi nga rjen pa'i blo byeste// ma pa ni phyag rgya yis// lcags sgra'i sa ban sbyang nas su// rgya gcig dbyangs nas
197b6(rnying rgyud): nas su// mtshams su sbyar ba'i sa bon gyis// ye shes g.yu drung 'dal ba la// ste dpal chen pas mtshams sbyar nas// gser dang dngul du bsres pa bzhin// sdig pa spyod kyang ye shes 'bar// yang na dgra lnga 'khor gsal smos te/
197b7(rnying rgyud): phung po mngon rdzogs lha la mchod// rtsa ba gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis// sras su bskyed na bsod nams mchog/ bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yis// srid pa'i bud shing sreg pa ltar// sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes
198a1(rnying rgyud): 'bar// ye zhes med byung 'bar ba'is// 'thob kun gzugs bzegs// mal shing shes brtan pa wAr// pasdud kyang po zhes 'byur// kye+e thal nga // stod ba gyu na dod chags
198a2(rnying rgyud): 'dom// lha yis bon gnas sbrul// gcig la wA yi tshom par sbyar// lam du bde ba'i sa bon gyis// thAg la ni padras brgyan// sten du bde ba'i sa bon gyis// klong chen bde ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs su bcos// las kyis 'o nag gas paso
198a3(rnying rgyud): gyis// dbul mkha' 'gro lnga po nyid// dril bu'i sa bon nang mthil lA// zhags pa'i sa bon lag gnyis la'o// bdag nyid snying po brtan pa'i sgra// gnas sngar ral gri'i sa bon lnga// gcig la mkha' 'gro lnga las bskor// 'dren
198a4(rnying rgyud): bon sbrul tshigs la// dgyes pa'i sa bon g.yas g.yon la// bstim pa'i sa bon gsung ba la// lcags kyu'i sa bon rkang gnyis la// lcags srog sa bon lag gnyis la// bskyod pa'i sa bon mtshams su ste// smos na gnyis su med pa'o//
198a5(rnying rgyud): pa tshom bu kun bsti ma ste// mchod pa bzhi yi sa bon gyis// stong khams bkang ste mnyes mchod la// rigs drug 'gro ba'i sdig spangs nas// 'jug pa'i sa bon chen po yis// bslus nas kun bzang mkha' la bstim// gting dpag med pa'i

198b1(rnying rgyud): rgyul nga ba pas bka' stsal pa/ de phyir nyon cig darjes mas// mngon skad mchod pa sna tshogs te// bdag nyid 'kha' 'gro 'dikyil 'khor ldan// mun dang bgro pa'i longs spyod la// 'dim gang 'od kyis po na gyis// spangs nang byol 'khod d+ha /
198b2(rnying rgyud): yin// bza' dang bca' ba'i mongs spyod la// bsreg pa'i sa bo namathar bzhag la// bdud rtsi'i sa bon mngon sbyangs te// mnyes shing dgyes pa'i sa bon gyis// mdzod cing zos na dkyil 'khor mnyes// btung bas rnams pAr ljong
198b3(rnying rgyud): la// bzhig pa'i sa bon gyis spangs te// rtswa yis bon rgyan po yis// skrang sa te 'thung na kyi la 'khor de kris// par gtong pa dang tshu len pa/ po dang mo yis pon gyis// spangs rnathabs dang shes rab thob// mchod pa 'od kyi dkyil 'dzi
198b4(rnying rgyud): sa dul/ sa shig sa na sa sa / ga
198b5(rnying rgyud): pasuM smya sa~M// myong ba stong pa le nas dbyen// bsags pa'i snod kyang dngos kyis spyong // rnam par smid pa stong pas med// byed pa pa dang thub mo// gdong nas spyong pa'i 'bras bu yin// rtags pas stong pa'i 'bras pa zhen// lam
198b6(rnying rgyud): sa bu gnyis mad// theg maben pa yin pa med// gad ni/ khyen pa rgyal po min// de skad ces bka' phrul ba dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor sa nas mardzogs pa rten/ sbyor ba'i 'bras bul se mas mi 'as
198b7(rnying rgyud): na no/ denas rgya 'dus skye sum na/ sgyid pa sa byin pa'i zhabs kyi gad 'dul chen thos gsol ni/ dag sa sheg pa chen po zhes te// srid par phrul pa'i dog pa mas// sems kyi 'phru
199a1(rnying rgyud): mchis pa// zhabs la spyi bo sreg tu gra nas sku// stong pa chen por bzod par gsol// 'bras bu chen por bzod par gsol// byang chub chen por bzod par gsol// de nas mi dmigs pa'i tshad pa chen
199a2(rnying rgyud): rdo thob po// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' des langs nas srul thog le sbrul ltar 'khrilnga/ mdze sa pa chen po'i mchod pa byas// phyi dbang chen po bdag la gsol// ning dbang chen po bdag la gsol// gsang dbang chen po bdag la gsol/
199a3(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang / spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// nga yi ga sang rgyang chen po 'di// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las mi mnga' bas// gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang ba'i
199a4(rnying rgyud): gter// gsang ba'i mchog gi spyod pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' khyed la gtad// 'gro ba kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nga yi spyod pa mtha' dag dang // nga yi byin brlabs chen po rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' khyed kyis zung // deng nas
199a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' khyod// gsang ba kun gyi byed pa'o// gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang ba'i bdag/ sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba'i// gsang ba'i dpal du dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ste// rnal 'byor kun la bde sbyin
199a6(rnying rgyud): pa// rlong sems dpa' khyed kyis gzungs// gu ya rA tsa ma hA rA tsa sa ma yA la ho ho// zhes gnang ba dang / de nas rdo rje sems dpa' des// rgyan dang cha lugs bkrol byas te// spyi dpal bachog la mngon par gtor// gsang dbang chen po
199a7(rnying rgyud): 'atsal ba'i phyar// rting / snying gi grogs modade// sbyin pa 'i mthog la yon du 'bul// rkyen dang cha lugs mang po chen// gsang bang gnang nas yon rung zhes// mngon spyong dang med po laT rtse lnga pa'o//
199b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpas yang gsol pa/ sa ma la zhes bgyi bgrang // sa ma ya la du zhig mche ste// sa ma la khri don rnams gang // de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang // nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// sam pa zhes bya ba ni// 'da'ang
199b2(rnying rgyud): dka' ba'i dam tshig go// dam tshig grangs la bas mu mi khyab// bstan rnam pa gsum yin no// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol ba// sa ma ya zhes bka' stsal pa// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan/
199b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje sems// ston pa bde gshegs kun gyi dpal// skra yi phyag rgya mi spang zhing // bsgo ba'i tshig rnams mnyan par bya// rdo rje spyan la gdung ba bskyed/ 'di ni lus kyi sa ma ya// bskyed rdzogs sa
199b4(rnying rgyud): pon gyun mi 'chad// rgyal po phyag rgya gsal bar bsgom// 'di ni ngag gis mA la// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i don// snod danA rnams la srel ba min// 'di ni tsa t+ta sa ma ya// ta na ga na dang ni 'bras bu lnga// spang bar mi bya spyad pa
199b5(rnying rgyud): 'don ma lags pa la// dkrugs med spyang pa mtha' dag san// 'bra na rdzogs pa'i snam pa// sa zung 'i do \u0f7f// 'da'i bdu mi mang rjorjodapa// btsal pa'i las rnams byed pa ni// mtha' mo rnabugs zas mal// zhes
199b6(rnying rgyud): bros bshad de// de skad ces skyed pa la chen pos bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ni gsang ba'i bdag por gyur/ 'khor med pos ni g.yung drung gi dngos grub thob
199b7(rnying rgyud): ste// gsang ba dgyes pa'i dmatshig can du gyur to// dmatshig bca' gzhi'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / rnal 'byor kye rgyud lung chen po/ ka ma la de khris d+d+hi ma hA tatA las/ dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang / bdud rtsi cheng po'i
200a1(rnying rgyud): bca' ga zhi dang / ting 'dzin man su mtshogs pa'i bca'agazhi dang / sa m+b+ha pa'i ban 'gaN+DI sa/ 'iganyen gyi len gyi bdun pa'o// gnod 'dul smra yis lang gsol ba drod
200a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang chen po rnams kun// spyan rnams drang na gang gis drang // dbang du bsdun ji ltar bsdu// las la bkrol na ji ltar bkol// tshogs kyi mchod pa ji ltar dbul/ de skad zhus pags na nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bku'
200a3(rnying rgyud): la pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dgra pa// las rnams 'og ma 'di ltar bya// hUM srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong // dus gsum bde gshegs 'byung ba lnga yi dang // skye 'gro ma lus 'byung ba lnga la rdzogs// 'das dang mgyon
200a4(rnying rgyud): byung ba lnga ldi dbyings// 'byung ba lha nyid b+ha ga yum gyi klong // bde chen yum gyi klong la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M khams gsum thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i rgyan/ snang srid thams cad 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// bu chad sgo bzhi b+ha ga'i tshul du 'a
200a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo skya ba lhod cig/ hU~M/ 'khor lo 'bar pa'i lte dbus su// ya bdud bsgyel ba'i gdan stongs su// yum gyi rgyal mo spyan 'dren te/ bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshoms gnon// mkha' bzhi bde glong gcig tu 'khyil/
200a6(rnying rgyud): many+dzu' 'a dus bzhi rtsa snyoms ma// dbug cig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// zhal nas 'byung ba lcang char ma// phyag drug phyag cha sna tshogs bsnams// dang po rdon dril bu dang // bar ma b+han+ta zhags par bcas// tha ma bdud rtsig yang gzhi 'bar/
200a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs 'phreng ba'i su me dag ma// ni ba rdzogs shi tung mer// 'bang ba ma ni rtson pa/ rkyenas kyi bdin cigashegs sugasom/ hUM/ sha phyogs 'amar ra thobs stong sa sa// sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// ma
200b1(rnying rgyud): pa dasasu 'a // rtag pa'i rgyam do rnam dgas pa/ sngags 'gyur pa'i blam gal// nab 'dag shol du// dbabasgra ga napas sa byung/ dang tu byud/ dun drung
200b2(rnying rgyud): rdeg/ tha ma se ge mchog rten snod// 'dzu bas kyi ma bdag no// 'gre ba sa la mnga'i blang dam// dras pa'i bdag mo bzhugs su gsol// hU~M/ b+h+ya phyogs 'khod mo'i slob sa stengs sun sbyin bsgril ba'i na sa /
200b3(rnying rgyud): byung gi mkha' 'gro byung chen zhi // rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gas lag yos// sgo mags 'gyur ba'i sgra mdog la// nab pa' 'ang ga shin tu 'bar// dbugs ma phyag drug zhabs bzhid batha~Mng // rlu po rgyab sa 'dar// bar po da
200b4(rnying rgyud): chu phreng 'dren// tha ma spyang mo zhing chung stod// 'byung ba rlung gi mnga' bdag mo// 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// dbugs kyi bdag mo bzhugs su gsol// hUM/ nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// chu bdag bsgyel
200b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdan stengs su// nub kyi mtha' 'gro dur b+ha'i gdung // rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal ma// sku tshogs 'brar ba'i sku mdog la// na bza'ang ma mo dbang gis mangs// dbu gsum phyug drug zhabs bzhir bya gyur//
200b6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tri shwa la// tha ma ce spang zhing chung skrod// 'byung ba chu lA mnga' mdzad mo// 'gro ba khrag la mnga' mdzad ma// khrag gi bdag mor bzhugs su gsol// hUM/ lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs
200b7(rnying rgyud): su// gshin rje bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lho yi mkha' 'gro ba glar gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo bklag gsal 'bar// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sngon mo bai DUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/
201a1(rnying rgyud): dang po rin rtenaHn+d+har 'bar// pad ma med pal dbyu po bsdums// tha ma stug s+ho zhing d+hA stod// 'byung ba mal mnga' myadad ma// rdod kyi bdag mod bzhugs su gsol// dz+haiM/ dkyil mtshams 'ang
201a2(rnying rgyud): na/ brtsa kyil bu'i gdon sbyangs sra// nam mkha'i mkha' po dzi'i maH// rtag pa'i rgyal me ba pags gsul matag// satshogs 'thur ba sra ba dgal// na bana'i ba po tsa migs // dgrags
201a3(rnying rgyud): drug zhangs bzhir bzad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+ta 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spa gI 'dzin// tha mjug pa zhing chung stod// nam mkha' stong la dbang bsgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// bkrag gi bdag mor bzhugs su ga
201a4(rnying rgyud): kyang ba shes ma kha'i 'grom// mdzu ba tsan la gtsigs ning tata pa zhang // 'digs rgyal rdul snying nge ldan// po shes rgyag dang ldanapa ste// po ro'i phyin pa de bzhin // sems can phrin ma thugs pa kyi phyi// 'gro pa
201a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// da ni ma mo dbang du bsdu ba'i bkol thabs bstan te/ nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// gtso mo la sogs drug po 'di// bdag nyid chen por bsgom par bya// bcu bzhi man chad gdan du bting // bdag nyid chen por bcwo
201a6(rnying rgyud): mni da skyes ldan nag pa'i na n+tu// ma ni pa chen mongs spyong da// ma rtag zha pa chung drung ba dang // skyon chags skyed kyang chu bad// 'di srog sang byugs kyi / lus gas gas 'a/ narna
201a7(rnying rgyud): mtha// man 'gag pa med pa 'phrog// mni bapas mchog gnang med mkha'// don nas de bachags me rjo// mninam mapa'i dbyings nyid mthong / na sa // badzin sa bya da pa
201b1(rnying rgyud): mni pade chen b+haga'i thog// ma ni sgyu bzhi ba de ldan cings// seMn nam sa dz+nyAn+dan 'byung// mkha' slong gnyis sgra bdag bskums shing // thog sa chen por ba tan nAs// lus la mamod bang du bsdus// zhes 'byung na/ @
201b2(rnying rgyud): ma mo lus la d+hi wAr bsku rten// mig don du ni 'di skad skyon// ye shes thig le chen po dang // gsang chen 'ad pa'i lam mchog dang // man+ta dag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// yang gsang ma mo drug pa // chags pa'i gdan du
201b3(rnying rgyud): par bya// 'od chen kha dog sna tshogs kyis// srid pa'i bde 'gro thams cad dang // nyi bu'i thod phreng gdan du gding // zhig le chen po'i rgyan bzhi yis// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po dag/ chags pa'i gdan du gding Shar bya//
201b4(rnying rgyud): pa sa
201b5(rnying rgyud): lugs gnyug ma yis// e ka dza ti spun drug bkun// chags pa'i yum chen dmad mo yis// 'dod chags gtso mo spun gnyis bkan// srid pa spyi yi mdo sdud kyis// nam mkha'i rgyal mo spyan gnyis bkan// dbang po spyi yi mdogs pa
201b6(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i mchen bdun rnams bkan// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab kyis// dmag gi rgyal mo sman gnyis bkan// srid pa'i 'jug byed 'phro 'du yos// nyi shu rtsa brgyad gar+b+ha rgyal mnan// de ltar gdan du bting bar bya// snyir 'dren phyag rgya ba
201b7(rnying rgyud): sasu// drug pa'i phyogs kyis gnan par bya'o// rje mra la e ta na/ hahan/ d-i/ rdo rje drug gi sbyin na/ mal dge sring 'phrinan/ sarji sbyinang / mdzas ldan na ga tan pa 'di ldan da/ mam hU~M phaT/ dang pa mdu ldan pa nan/ ma
202a1(rnying rgyud): na du rgyu // dun rgyus/ rgyu su/
202a2(rnying rgyud): te/ ganganas snyid ga nas ngas// drugs la bar pazham/ rnaM ga na nas pagyinams// bsgrub pa'i bas rnams byed par bsum// ji ba'i phrul myed byung// dani sa
202a3(rnying rgyud): kyi / ni sri ga sum snying 'i bdag/ da ni sa na rtsong// byams smran gyi skyeng zhag dag kyi grong lathod// 'i sa dmas kyid kyis skabs/ mam ta la / /
202a4(rnying rgyud): shes rtsal 'phang thig le yis// bsgom byam mo bzugasum la// drug cu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor rdzogs// zhes 'byung ste/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsal bar byas la/ sems las skyes pa'i ma mo bcugasum dang /
202a5(rnying rgyud): mo drug tu rtsa brgyad kyi srog gi snying po bsdus pa 'khor du bzhug go// de nasan la 'byor gyis 'byor tshogs kyi mched pa gang bzhin pa shams la/ sbrul ye shes bu las bskyed pa rnams brjod/ ha~M/ thig khri dbyings las bsnying po'i kho rgyal
202a6(rnying rgyud): yu ma ye shes thogs pas bskyed pa'i rngo mo'i sgra ston pa// gnyis meng hA ha bzhad cing rnam pa'i sgra li b+h+yon byin// mche bar mar mo gtsigs nas snying 'dren rgan sl-iHna// smye skye ba garjod nas pade slo rtags pa badz+ra// srang kya mA
202a7(rnying rgyud): dog khro mong bzhugs shing dbang chend dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ phyag nas sprul pa gtong zhing dug gsum dbyings su spong // mchogs 'khor du bsdus nas zug mang mdzad ma// drug rngu rtsa la rgyad tshogs kyis rdu lasangs kyi rnam pa'i spre hU~M zhig
202b1(rnying rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i theg le che// dgyes pa'i bzhad pa sa slo ga rol pa'i tshul bzhin mdzod// m+b+ha las babyung ba'i bdud N+DI chen po 'di// rnam rtog gzhos myi rjod kyi skul tham par mdzod// hahU~M him b+h+yon+ta/ rba lu dra wad+d+he/ dra lu ru
202b2(rnying rgyud): ts+tshiH/ Alal to// oM hoho// ska las bsnyen pa ston nas su// 'khor gyi drug po sgra n+yamyung // ma man mtshogs da kyi 'khod nas// sun 'byu ba pam pa'i bdag mo// bzhi zur zhabs pand zhalta rdza 'bar// mkha'
202b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi ba de klong dbyings nas gsal// mkha' la srog gi mnga' mdzad ma// dkyil 'khor glatso mor bzhugs su gsol// hUM/ ma mo chen mo rgyu bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum shar gyi mkha' 'gro ma//
202b4(rnying rgyud): can mo dbugs bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sgra mdog la// zhal gsum byang gi mkha' 'gro ma// b+h+rUM/ ma mo chen mo dran bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sgo mdog la// zhal gsum nub kyi mkha' 'gro ma// b+h+rUM/
202b5(rnying rgyud): chen madrong bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sgra mdog la// zhal gsum lho yi mkha' 'grom// hUM/ ma mo chen mo bakhrag gi bdag/ sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sgra mdog pa// zhal gsum nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma// yang sbas drug gis
202b6(rnying rgyud): dAky-il 'khor rnams// thigs dam tshon po rjes dgongs te/ bcol pa'i las rnams grub pa mdzan/ de nas bcu zhi man chad kyang // dung chud lugs pa na spel bar bya// me mo bkol thabs dang / dbang du bsdu ba dang / tshogs
202b7(rnying rgyud): la du bye chu pa// gdo dul lha'iris pa gsolab// mi mgrin gyi byag rgyarnams// den du ltung tshal ba gas sangs rgyas kyis ga tshul /
203a1(rnying rgyud): nad pas dgas nas nga // thugasas sanas gi / stsa ba// mam rnams sa ga rgya rnanas// 'du na nga sgyu spya pas// rgyun cigs du sa masaH// to/ stsa
203a2(rnying rgyud): s+t+waM/ lag gi 'du byed bsgom pa ni// g.yas g+ha yon thabs dang shes rab las// rdo rje gar du bskor ba las// shes rab mchog gi snying gar bstan// sbom po dbang mo rtse smad de// thabs kyi phyogs mtshams bskor ba ni// ma mo tshogs kyi
203a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo'i rgya// rdo rje srer mo ma bsnol te// oM bsgreng rtse mor rgyu bcing bya// ma mo d+horje nus pa'i rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// hU~M dang ha gnyis rje sprad de// 'bru gsum bzung nas gshog pa'i tshul// nAr haM sar gzung ba ni/
203a4(rnying rgyud): ma mo rdo rje dbugs kyi rgya// rdo rje khwa tshur bcangs pa las// oM dang swa gnyis rgyab bsnol 'khyud// 'bugasumartse smad sku gsung thugs// bzhad pa'i thad kar gzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje khrag gi rgya// rdo rje khu tsar dam bcings nas/
203a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis rtse sprad gyen du bsgreng / oM gnyis rtse spyang thang kar brkyang // sra bsgreng rtse spang zhur du brkyang // 'bu gnyis so sor dam bsnol nas// gu ya'i thad kar gzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje me yi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// oM
203a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis chub bsnol lu gu rgyud// 'bru gsum so sor rtse sprad de// hUM g+ha nyi sta drag tu g.yob pa ni// mu mo rdo rje bkrag gi rgya// rdo rje thal mo btung ba las// thabs kyi mo dang hag/ nyis las// shes rab AHyis brten par bya// shes rab
203a7(rnying rgyud): dang tu gnyis las// thabs kyi hU~M gis brtan par bya// shes rang oM dang hUM babyang ste// thabs kyi oM dang sras bkab pa// sems kyi dkyil du bkan bkab pas// ma mo ye shes mkha' 'gro ba'i// rdo rje tshogs chen rdzogs pa yi//
203b1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya min par dpa' bos bshad// gtso mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sems nyid 'jig rten lnga bzla pa'i// phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags// dbang phyug gtses
203b2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyan 'tshul/ dbang phyug g+hatso yis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol phyags na nas kyang // dbang phyug gtso yis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul m+b+ha yi ga tsi// thig le rjen po'i phyag N+Di ni// don lha tshu bskrad de//
203b3(rnying rgyud): rdzog gi phyogs nas su// oM ai ta gsum gyi skad pa// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsu mchu// thabs mchog spyong ba'i phyogs nas su/ oM ma~M hA ga sum rtse smad pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rgyu// rngabs hU~M d+h+r-i gi sgo gsuman/
203b4(rnying rgyud): rig gi shes phyag rgya yin// shes rab sa yis sku gsung thugs// thig le byang chub sems kyi rgya// shes rab hU~M gi rtso man+do// thabs kyis swa yis spyir mnan pa// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya zhes// yang dag rdzogs kyis nges par bshad/
203b5(rnying rgyud): nga nas// mangs khar bams nas so// blan med pa dgas la b+ha nas// drugags ng+ge nyis dmigs sel ba dngos// des gas pral tshom med// dus gsu ma mganams das gsungs// sems
203b6(rnying rgyud): bai pa'i rtag rgya'i le'u stebarnga pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gtso mo rnam gyi phyag rgya bstan lags na// badra bzhi zhes ni bgyi ba yi// phyag rgya rnams ni ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhan
203b7(rnying rgyud): 'tsha'o// \u0f89\u0fa4 gso la pags nanas kyang // rdzogs sa rgyas kyi'i bka'aphrul pa// nyin cigagasung nga me dag pa// bcu bzhi nas bya ma/ phyag turnams nings bstan na// g.yas g.yon thabs dang zhes das pa// shes
204a1(rnying rgyud): mchog gi ting gan sa skyen// shas ngas cog sum tsams gagang 'an// bla men nas rgyachags kyiH// dan TIr mo bcad pa las// gnyis kyi byu the 'i dul// 'brub d+hA dbya nas gdang sta na// rlung
204a2(rnying rgyud): pra bod zang rgya// thabs kyi oM ni gyen du bsgreng // oM dang sra dang aM dang ta// oM la sbyar te zur can du// tshogs pa'i tshul du phyar ba dang // shes rab thal mo drang brkyang nas// sgra yi kha rub rkyang ba ni// rdo rje nyi ma khas pa'i rgya// oM hUM sa gsum che ska
204a3(rnying rgyud): su
204a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i na// babs kyi do rnaMzi la mo gnyis// byar te drug tu rgyab pa ni// sred gsum ban m+WAr khros pa'iH// rdo rjel lam sbyar nas ni// gdang dang dpral bar rab gtugs te// gus pa'i tshul gyis lus btud pa// 'di nim bzhi'i phyag tu/
204a5(rnying rgyud): ha dang hUM gnyis zhags pa'i tshul// phyi ma phyogs bzhir brkyang ba ni// 'di ni rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i rgya// thabs kyi phyag rgya khu tshur ha cang // bsdigs pa'i thabs su 'phyar ba ni// 'di ni dbyings phyag chen mo'i rtsa// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni/
204a6(rnying rgyud): yi mdakar gzung ba ni// 'di ni bdag nyid chen mo'i rtsa// g.yas g.yon sor mi brgyang nas ni// hadang rje gnyis rtse sprad do// gshog pa'i tshul du btung pa ni// 'di ni gcig pu chen mo'i rtsa// yi ge 'bru lnga rtse spang nas// rdo rje thod pa'i tshul

204b1(rnying rgyud): rnamam sa sug suM/ dngapa yang ma 'grol \u0f7f/ na du / zhab byu shes ngas rgyu d+hAl// / rtswa shAganyis rna / da da pa na / sa ma las mapan tu//

204b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yi gtso// 'jig rten ji ltar dbang bgyi ba// ngas bstan pa la sems bud cig/ 'byung ba lnga las bskyed pa ni// kun tu bzang mo'o// dbang bsgyur ba'i bu mo spyan lnga/ cha snyom ma ni srid pa'i bde
204b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma/ 'byung ba lnga'i nyul le ma ni chags 'dzin srun gnyis so// dus bzhi rdzogs par byed pa ni kun tu bzang ma'o// dus bzhi la dbang byed pa bu mo spun lnga'o// dus bzhi cha'i thul le ma chen mo ni phyeg ya bdud kyi chung ma'o// ma mo rang rang gis
204b5(rnying rgyud): bkol thabs ni/ yum chen mo nyid kyis mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo gsum dang / dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum dang / yi dam bsgom legs kyi ma mo dang bdun 'khol lo// des sring pa bde 'gro ma bkol lo// des rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang
204b6(rnying rgyud): mo che dang // pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// nges srid pa chags byed ma 'khol lo// des/ e ka tsa ti la sogs pa ma mo bdun 'khol lo// des 'dod khams lhazhi gtso mo dang / rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma gnyis 'khor lo//
204b7(rnying rgyud): des nam mkha'i rgyal mo dang // gling bzhi gyi phud ma 'phel lo// bu mo spun was ni srid pa thams cad dbang du byed de// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bklag gsal mnyam gyis naM/ nyi ma'i phreng can 'khol lo// des med pacha sdoms ma 'khol la// dmas bdag
205a1(rnying rgyud): mams la// mam la// dadums smras!/ nam sus // pa rgyus napa da gas sa // rgyas mas da pa pa 'du ma pa/
205a2(rnying rgyud): sa dkar mo mig gcig ma 'khol lo// des ni rgyan gyi rgyal ma 'khol lo// des klu 'degs ma ha ra tid dkar mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo dkar mo mche ba can 'khol lo// des sring mo bzhi ste gleng bzhi sde 'gram 'khol lo// 'di rnam
205a3(rnying rgyud): shar gyi tshul le ma ste/ nam gyi srod la bu'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar gyis ni/ srid pa'i bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde mo nag mo ral pa can 'khol lo// des dbyings phyag ma 'khol lo// des
205a4(rnying rgyud): 'dregs mdun ting nag mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo nag mo kha rgan ma 'khol lo// des sing ma mkha' la khung lding ma 'khol lo// 'di nams ni lho'i nyal lem ste/ nam gyi 'jing la rgya'o// rtag pa'i tshal ma gnyen gsal mas
205a5(rnying rgyud): rje rje mkhos pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo dmar mo dbang bsgyur ma 'khol lo// des ni bdag nyid ma 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma shan ting dmar mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rtsal mo dmar mo ma chu 'jib ma
205a6(rnying rgyud): lo// des dkar mo g.yag zhang can 'tshal lo// de rnams na nub kyi nyul le ma ste/ nam gung la r+g+ha'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos kyis ni/ pad+ma khrag 'thung zas pa'i dbang po che 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dgyel snga ma
205a7(rnying rgyud): ser mo las mkhan ma 'khol lo// des srin mo bdun 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma grub ting ser mo 'khol lo// des dmag kyi rgyal mo rkang lhag ma 'khol lo// des srin mo sder chen ma 'khol lo// de rnams byang gi nyul le ma sta/ nam
205b1(rnying rgyud): kyi khro rings rgya'o// yum chen mo nying ni/ nyin ma tsham khyab par rgyug ga ma gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad la mnga' mdzangs// skyi dbang ni yum chernams rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga la sogs pa ma mor grags pa dang / srid pa gsal la
205b2(rnying rgyud): mnga' mdzad da// rtag pa'i rgyal mo lngas ma ma chen mo bdun 'khol lo// des srid pa bde 'gro ma dang / nyi shu zod phreng ma gnyis 'khol lo// des khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi 'dul lo// des dgyes nyi mo bzhi 'phrul lo// des sbas pa'i
205b3(rnying rgyud): ma mo bzhi 'dul lo// des srid pa chags byed dang cha D+ho mA ma gnyis 'dul lo// des e ka tsa ti spun drug 'dul lo// des ma bdun 'dul lo// des 'dod khams lha yi gtso mo ni mtshan 'dul la// des rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma sngan 'dul /
205b4(rnying rgyud): sa su sa
205b5(rnying rgyud): rngu rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs zhes bya'o// ma mo mo so'i dbang mad kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba/ 'chu bzhi zhes ni 'gyi ba yi// rabs chung rtsa ba ji ltar lags// dgug dang 'dren
205b6(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams ni// rnal 'byor mchog sa bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rnal 'byor mchog gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi ge ho// bcu bzhi man tshang dri tshal gyi// rabs kyad 'gugs 'drem
205b7(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams pan// gtan tshogs rgya bsdus pa rnams// bsu nyid du gzhan la dpag/ ral gling bzhigang du rtags pas rang lugs su yo pa / gcig dang la gcig dang / caganas kyis ra
206a1(rnying rgyud): kyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i snang srid thams cad tshig nas/ ci yang myi gnas pa las/ ri rab kyi nang ring thung ngu dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol zhes kyang bya ba yod pa las/ shing gi rtse mo rI dkyi
206a2(rnying rgyud): bum pa'i nang na/ yum chen mo srid pa bde 'gro ma/ khams gsum yu ma mchog ma zhes bya ba spu mdog mthing gar bzhugs pa/ dbu dang / phyag dang / spun cir yang ston pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ral pa can/ smras pa'i spyan gnyis las
206a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas sa nas ga ga mche ma/ g.yonan bdud rtsi'i mthil ma/ smras pa'i zhwawA nas/ 'bras sbyirnam pa lnga'i brgyud 'a bye ma/ sras pa'i phyag gnyis la/ g.yas pas spyod pa thams cad N+Dig / g.yon pas dgag dang ga na padzu
206a4(rnying rgyud): yan chad gzung ba'o// sbas pa'i zhabs gnyis kyis/ g.yas pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang che ba thams cad kyi spyir brdzis pa/ g.yon pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang che ba thams cad kyi snying rtse gnon pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' ge ser gyi dkyil
206a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas snying sred thams cad 'phel 'grib mdzad pa/ ye shes rang snang shar ba las/ ma rtogs pa ku na mkha' gting du bsdus pa/ spyi ga tsug nas khrag gi ral phra gcig gis/ srid pa'i ma mo thams cad dbang du spyad ma/ ri rab kyi rtse mo bum
206a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dubus ni bzhugs so// de'i khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang tshwa snyom na gnyis shing gi sked pa na ga nas so// yum chen mo'i byol mo sring pa zhig 'dzin dang / skyid pa bya nA mkhan gnyis ni shing gi rtsa ba dgra nas te/ ri rab kyi phyi rol nu gnas pa'i
206a7(rnying rgyud): snang zhing srid pa'i skye 'gro thams cad tshig nas ci yang mi snang ba las/ srid pa bde 'gro mas nyi zla dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'byung ba lnga'i 'od las byung ba'i bu mo mdog dkar mo lag yu'i ngal ba can/ dpral ba'i dbyes na mig zur gsum gcig yod pa/ nga
206b1(rnying rgyud): dang blangs kyi ma bar nag skyid bzlas pa'i nags pa 'phen pa can byeg bskyed pas/ de geg slong thod dang phreng bar bcings nas/ nyi na zung gcig pa tang byalas/ gdang skyed pa na snyoms so// de nas yum pad 'arloms kyi ngom pa snang pod dus byung/
206b2(rnying rgyud): de nas dang tsho nyi pa'i zung can/ nyid byo gsang bar grus/ razugs pa shi sas pa 'is gas/ lug can pabyug/ raraba'i gtumatsha ga ti nas pa chis parnyes naba'i la
206b3(rnying rgyud): gcig byas pa las/ glang gri lol bu mo sbyin bzhi skyes pa dang / khol mo srid pa cha snyoms kyis lte ba gcad do// bu mo bzhi'i snying ma yis btags so// dbyings phyag ma dang / rgyun gyi tshul mo dang / bdag nyid ma dang / gtsug pu ma
206b4(rnying rgyud): bzhir btags so// de yang ming ches nas ngo bzhis srid pa phung ba dang 'dra dar lan gcig byas so// de nas nga nyid kyis ni ye shes kyis ye shes kyi sprul pa bkye nas su/ 'jig rten phung byed bzhi'i mngal la sogs pa dbang du bslus/ hUM las
206b5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i bu mo bzhi// de bzhi la ni bskyed byas te/ de bzhi'i ma srid pa chags byed mas byas so// ming phyi mo dang mas btags so// rdo rje rje ma khros pa'i dbang mi cha da / rdo rje pad+ma khrag 'bung myos pa'i dbang mo che dang / rdo rje srid pa bdi stor
206b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang po chu dang / rdo rje khams gsum 'tsho byed khros pa'i dbang mo che dang / de ltar bzhir btags so// ming de legs nas/ bu mo de bzhis mA bzhi dbang du bsdus so// des srid pa bde la bkod do// srul pa'i bu mo bzhi dang / rigs
206b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba bzhi po ru/ dpag bsam gyi shing gi yal ga la/ 'brug gi lo la rtsed 'di byos pas/ mu stegs snga ma las mong nas su sdig cand mod pa'i mtshon chas rdzi/ mdza' na sdug pa khyed cag rnams/ nal bu lho ru zhugs nas su/ ngo tsha bu ya
207a1(rnying rgyud): da pa so// du sa/ sa sa ba/
207a2(rnying rgyud): rlag pa / tang ba ban+d+ha la~Ms me za ba'i byed med bzhin 'phrul che zhing mtshan dang ldan pa zhig gdul de skyed pal chen ma'i skun byas gzigs nas/ hU~Mgs kyi dgyes gragasang po'i bu mo bzhing gang/
207a3(rnying rgyud): 'a ciganas 'dibs mo da / g+sa dul rkye mongs byid mad / dam ma dbang bskye bskyed su ngas sa 'di ma gas gas pas meng dpe po gas so// thetho brgya ni 'ing ba sa rgyar rjem gyi rgyags par/
207a4(rnying rgyud): nas ngan pa'i byod mden ma sa kyis kham mo med pa chags byed med de/ lal ba srid pazhig 'din gnyis kyil dpying blang pa la thag tu 'as pa las/ ngag gi b+h+ri gang ga cig sa/ ngo bya'i 'ang bya sa
207a5(rnying rgyud): skyes rje drang drakA d+ma ming btags te/ blon par bskos sa// de nas shes rje drang dkar dang / srid pa b+h+yom+b+ha su mtshan gnyis khyo shug tu 'dus te/ srid pa cha bskams so/ de gnyis la bri slod drub byed te/ bzhin khros pa'i'adabang na ldanas/
207a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa rgyas blo ba 'i thung cir gra smras// dechos de rab gyi na 'digasusu bcug ste/ gre 'dugs ma med pa pa zhi mang bdugs s+ho// bra ma chung dum gnyis la/ gcig ni sring pa pon ni po ma bangasaso ngo nyim tho zer byan /
207a7(rnying rgyud): nga ma sra gsung pa'i bu gyi du rdzugs mas bya ni byangs rgyags ldan na lakhri nagan gro rjesurgyas ca du la ni du rnam byed dang /
207b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ran ma dung/ dumar mo ma chu 'a ba ma dang / sa mo nang ldag ma bzhi skyes te/ de bani ni thugs byed kyis mo ldan bzhi'i khol mur zan ste/ dmag gi rgyal mor bskos so// de nas mos pa'i dbang mo che bzhi khol mo mo gtsa drugs rgyun/
207b2(rnying rgyud): po lha chen po bdun gyi chung ma srin mo bdun po de/ 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa las/ yu mtshan mo'i thugs kyi sprul pa las/ dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsu ma dang / mkha' la chu ba'i ma mo gsum dang / gsang ba 'dus pa'i ma mo ga
207b3(rnying rgyud): skye/ thugs kyi sprul ba'i ma mo bdun gyis/ sring mo bcu na btul lo// de nas gtso mo bzhi lngas rgyun gyi tshal mo srun bzhi b+ha ba mang gis nas/ bu mos ma'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs thogs te/ dbang yang med/ mthu yang chung ba las
207b4(rnying rgyud): zhi ben sha sta ga byed do// de nas rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang / khol po phyal bdud dang gnyis byi ba'i lo la byi bgyis pa'i bu/ glang gi lo la yang la shod kyi skyes tor dang / 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo meng sring gnyis skyes so// 'dis 'byung ba'i
207b5(rnying rgyud): nad gtong ba'o// de nas yang ra la shod kyi skyes te re dang / jo mo na yang jo mo/ su mo nA yang su mo/ bdag nyid ma zhes bya ba gnyis/ shing na phyi sa la'i rtse mor/ rta'i lo la tshes bco lnga la mdza' na brgyahA/ nad par
207b6(rnying rgyud): sor gyis pa las/ phra mo'i ting pa la khrag thig gcig 'jug pa mthong ste/ mi gtsang ba'i sems skyes te mchil ma gcig pasgyur ba las khrag dang mchil ma 'dres pa'i bu ming sring gnyis mtsho'u mar skyes te lug gi lo tshes brgya ba'i
207b7(rnying rgyud): la gnan gyi lha dkar po skyes/ chos bco lnga las bdag pa rmaphreng skyes so// de yang dbyings phyug ma dang yar la shod kyis skyes to gnyis spre 'u'i lo la byi bgyis pa'i bu/ bya yi lol ming sring gnyis skyes te/ ming po shar gyi shel ge shel ge/ srong
208a1(rnying rgyud): gtsung rmugs yon/ sa sa u tas sa rgyu sa sa m+b+ha / smras s+ho/ g+sa/ na sa shA \u0f7f/ hA kyang
208a2(rnying rgyud): zhes kyang bya/ 'jig rten dbang spyad ma'o// srid pa rba ste sgra ma ni/ he nugs sIr zhes b+ha ste/ srid pa rgyags kyid ma ni lha mi tshogs kyi na mo zhes bya'o// e katsa tan mi yongs kyi tshogs kyi bdag mo zhes bya'o// gang dag
208a3(rnying rgyud): dkar mo dang / dun ting nag mo dang / shra na tI dmar mo dang / grub ting se rI mo dang bzhi'o// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po brgyad la/ yu ma sred pa bde 'gro ma ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i grub ldan ma mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o//
208a4(rnying rgyud): dkar mo nye zla'i thod phreng can ni/ zod phreng gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi nI/ snying rje byams pa'i maN+Dal lo// dkar mo mig gcig ma la sogs pa bzhi ni/ gsang bad gyes pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbyings rdug
208a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi ni phung byed skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang rnam pa gcig tu yum chen mo dang / dkar mo nyi zla'i thod phyeng can gnyis ni yongs su rtog pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/ spyi dpal chen po de gnyis su med do// khros pa'i dbang po
208a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin/ 'gro ba yongs su skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang 'dra'o// thugs kyi dgyes sgom bzhini/ ge sar yongs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsang ba'i drod chags 'dzin gyi bdag mo ldan no// de rnams kyi khol mo'i tshogs
208a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad ni/ srid pa chags byed ma ni chags 'dzin chen mo'i chags so// srid pa che snyoms ma ni/ mnyam byed chen mo'i tshogs so/ srid pakru 'degs me ni gleng bzhi phung nyul ma'i tshogs so// e kaMH ti ni pho nya kun gyi tshogs so// dam
208b1(rnying rgyud): gi rnal mo bzhini dri za la sogs pa'i rigs so so'i tshogs so// 'dod khams lha'i gtso m+bi ni/ zad med nag mo'i tshogs so// rdo rje gar sti dbang phyug ma dang / pyad+b+ha gar gyi dbang phyug ma gnyis ni/ nyal le mra'i tshogs so//
208b2(rnying rgyud): chen srid 'degs ma dang / gling bzhi spyi phud ma ni sma na phran gtso mo'i tshogs so// de la e kA tsa ti'i chu mo e ka dza ras bsam nas/ jo mo kun gyi nang na yang bdag gi jo mo khyad par yang dbang chung la/ bdag cag khol mo rnams kyi nang na
208b3(rnying rgyud): yang bdag khud par dbang chung bas/ de ngan thabs zhig bya snyam nas/ jo mo gcig pu mas byi sna byas nas/ rgya mtsho'i gting na chu srin gyi rgyal po kun+ti ra ma hA ha ste zhes kyang bya/ ma ka ra zhes kyang bya ba cig bkug nas/ dug shing gdug pa
208b4(rnying rgyud): can drungs pa gcig gi rtsa ru/ stag gi lo la nyal po byed du bcug pa'i bu ni/ yos bu'i lo la dkar po mig gcig skyes/ sring mo ni nag mo khrag 'dzag ma skyes te na gtong ba'o// de nas ming pos ma'i gze mdebs phrogs nas/ 'jig rte
208b5(rnying rgyud): yongs kyi mthu rku bar bdog pa la/ su lo e ka tsa tIs tshor te/ jo mo khros pa'i dbang mo che rnams la zhus nas/ rje 'bangs lngas bskal ba las/ mi gcig gi khong pa'i nang nas tsi t+ta ba tu phyung ba las/ gcig ni snying gi bdag po la
208b6(rnying rgyud): phul lo// dgul gsum ni rgyal the'u khra bo dang / tri shang kAr dang / dkar thor thor dang gsum ste/ rgyal po'i rigs la gnod do// gsum la bar the'u sbag po dang / legs skye 'u bo dang / sa ze'u drag pod gsusa'i khri mongs la ga
208b7(rnying rgyud): do// gsum la phyogs bcur gyur te/ brag srin dang / chu srin dang / shing srin gsum du gyur to// dgu ka'i rkang pa la re bcag nas/ ga na ma byi dkar po'i ri bol du bcug go// de nas 'brugag lo la me gtsang ma mnga' ming de nas/ ma
