212a1(rnying rgyud): mod mibral mkhas zhing / gsang pa'i sa stsam so// de lan mad kyis sa mo brgya ba ni'i bsgru nags ma smra sos pa'o// na meng pa'i san ma bskal ba s+ho// rje/ phrin ma rang
212a2(rnying rgyud): yo sham gas mo// ma byi sen mom bzung ma// gos bu nang chen lpags thon la// mtha' sa than+ta skyong gis pa rjo // phyag gas sa shing kyi nas tha~Mng batha // g.yon na ma mgo bo ba cu// me zhug steng tshal sa mas nas sa// rang gis
212a3(rnying rgyud): rang la khyim par skyob/ g.yang gzhi'i chu mtshon byar nus su// bcud dang sra stegs thal bar rdzogs// 'jig rten thams cad sgrol bar byed// srid pa gsum gyi phung nyal ma// de ni ro ma nyid la mchod// las su bcol na kun kyang lpag//
212a4(rnying rgyud): 'dir skyon ma skong phrin las mdzod// ces bskul ba ni a gyi chen mo ste// srid pa chags byed ma'o// hUM// khyim bdag chen mo rnal 'byor mo// rnal 'byor chen mo srid pa'i bdag/ rnal 'byor chen mo khyim bdag mo// khyil bdag
212a5(rnying rgyud): chen mo thig le dgu// ye shes lnga yi rol pa yis// phyag na rtse gsum 'bar ba bsnams// khrag 'thung yab yum rnams la dbang sgyur zhing // mthu chen rnal 'byor kun gyi grogs mdzad ma// dung chen khrag 'di sgra la snyim par mdzod//
212a6(rnying rgyud): khyed kyi 'khor 'di rab tu mi bsrungs te// sla snyan yid 'phrog ma mo khyod kyi 'khor// 'dod pa lnga la 'dod cing rab tu bskul// khrag gis rlan par mdzad cing dbang du sdud// drag shul gtum mo rab tu rmongs byed ma// kun gyi yid la 'dod cing rab tu
212a7(rnying rgyud): mthu chen bskul// me yi bskal pa gtong zhing snying rje'i lam la sgrol// gsod pa don du gter zhing khro bo kun dang sbyor// bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag shul che// 'o dod chen po 'don zhing zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// dgra snying tshal bar
212b1(rnying rgyud): gams shing ma mthod kyis// dmacha gnas sgrub bco gshegs sa gsol// zhes las gnyen po bcol/ ni thas pa'i mam/ sred pa na snyoms so// / sbrul khyod can momed pa'i ba/ na ta la gcigs
212b2(rnying rgyud): mig gcig ma la dkar sham mdog/ rang chas sprin dkar go zul// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i mtha' chag can// lag na kha T+wAM ga yi mtshon thogs shing // za 'og zhabs ma'i dbu rgyan can// bstan pa tsam gyis khams gsum rmongs byed
212b3(rnying rgyud): ma// brdabs pa tsam gyis the rang 'gong po brlag gcod ma// dam skong phrin las gnyen po mdzod// ces bcol ba ni e ka tsa ti'o// da ni ma mo bdun bskul te// b+h+rUM/ rgya mtsho chen pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dpal ldan shugs 'gro gartse mo ste/
212b4(rnying rgyud): nag mo chen mo ngal pa can// ri rab bsnyil ba'i rngam stabs can// kha nas med bar rgya mtshoska ma// rdo rje kun bzang gshegs su gsol// hUM/ khro bo rngam pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mdzes pa'i tshul gyis 'od 'phrophyo zhing // 'jig rten 'chi bdag
212b5(rnying rgyud): 'od 'gro ma// kun tu bzang mo gshegs su gsol// b+h+rUM/ dbang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// nam mkha' stong la dbang bsgyur zhing // bdud dang drag snyems spyan 'dul ma// rdo rje kun gsal gshegs su gsol// hUM/ da mchog chen po
212b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// pho nya drug tu'i gtso ma ste// sha chen tshogs la longs spyod cing // gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ma// rdo rje chen mo ye shes mchog/ dam tshig chen mo gshegs su gsol// hUM// khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor nas/
212b7(rnying rgyud): mag tum chen pa byed ma// rdo rje drapa 'drang thugs ma// byang phyogs rang gi 'khong 'dul ma// rdo rje 'od chags gshegs su gsol// b+he/ 'od srung gzigs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhags pa stong ga gdangs phra zhing // 'byung pos
213a1(rnying rgyud): ca/ lus 'ching mdzad ma// rdordzogs pa 'jo gshegs sugs la// d+hu/ dbang phyug zan pa'i dkyi la 'kho nas// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'gro 'dums// dam mog rnams rnams sreg mdzad ma// bka' las 'dun
213a2(rnying rgyud): rkyen sa// rdordzogs ston gshegs su gsal// zhes bya pa nimam bdunam/ waM/ skum can ma bang thugs// den chen med 'jigs mangs pa'i bamatog/ mdag bzang blan ma ral bcan// rang kyi ste shig gcal/ @
213a3(rnying rgyud): dang g.yu ye phra bkye zhing // tha ma rin chen 'bar bas bskor// g.yas nag yu ya~M ba matog/ g.yon na dung gi thob thogs// khyod ni srid pa'i ma mra ste// cho ga yang spyad cig rin chen srid 'degs ma// traM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma ste mthum
213a4(rnying rgyud): tshe// bdud kyi sring mo gshin rje mo// mdog bzang dkar la ral ba can// ral pa'i zar bus mun nag gtibs// lugs kyi lus la zangs kyi 'dab ma can// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dang ldan// lag pa g.yas nagashin rje'i kham pa ma
213a5(rnying rgyud): thogs// g.yon na bdud kyi sho rdo dkar nag 'grems// mtshan na nad kyi rgyal ba sbed// khyod ni 'jig rten gyi bzlog mkhan// khra ma kha phyis la shwe rnge spos// nad kha chings la dal kha sbyar// hUM/ rnal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug ma// mdog
213a6(rnying rgyud): bzang dkar mo ral pa can// byed ni gling bzhi lci 'gro ma// rang chas dang dkar go thul// g.yu bran 'a'ang ba'i mtha' chag can// gser gyi gong lag 'bar sha la// g.yu mi cod pan 'od 'phro ma// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas phyogs
213a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrin// g.yas kyi phyag na bsdams pa ni// gser gyi lcu gu 'bar ba la// g.yu yi lhag 'bras 'gyur ba tags// gnam la bskor bas bdud dpung 'joms// sa la brdab pas dgra bgegs slol// gzhan gyis rbad kyang mi nyan
213b1(rnying rgyud): pas// btsal ba'i zin las grub par mdzad// zhes bya seM na rjes padang lan par byas la/ las bcos pa'i/ nam mkha'i rnal mnasu na// / dadag sbyi ba spyugs// dbub sam la spyan stong sa/ dag pa
213b2(rnying rgyud): rnams pa'i cha byad can// phrin las 'byung po kun 'dul ma// rdo rje sgeg mo gshegs su gsol// traM/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sa bdag chen mo bad+ma phreng // lag nathod pa khrag gis bkar// grong rnams kAn la 'thor byed ma//
213b3(rnying rgyud): bdag zin mo gshegs su gsal// zhes brjod pa nA~M/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang // pad+ma'i gar mkhan ma'o// da ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chung ma dang / bu mo bzhi yang bskul par bya ste/ hUM/ de rab bzhi'i grwa 'degs ma/
213b4(rnying rgyud): ting dkar mo chen mo la// byang shar mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// dun nying nag mo chen mo la// shar lho'i mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// shAn ting dmar ma chen mo la// lho nub mtshams kyi gru 'dogs ma// ku ba ting ser mo sdang ser ba/
213b5(rnying rgyud): rngub byang mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// mtshams kyi gru 'degs chen mo la// rgyal chen gzungs ma las mdzod cig/ hraM/ dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo ste// shar gyi dkad sbo mche ba gtsigs// lho yi nag mo kharban ma// chu'i byed pa
213b6(rnying rgyud): maM mchu 'ab ma// byung gi ser ma rkang lhag ma// rigs bzhi'i dmag dpung mang pas bzhid// dmag gi rgyal mo gshegs sri gsol// tra~M/ gling bzhi'i mthugs ma lha yi sring // shan gyi sa rgyags pa gshegs stegs la/
213b7(rnying rgyud): nga dzang gshin nga // la ma byags gsheg sun nga/ dmang bag na phyog+sas ma gshegs srogs so// da rjo na nis rgyags gshegs sus da/
214a1(rnying rgyud): bya ba ni las kyi sring mo bzhi'o// 'di man chad la mo rnams kyi las byang dang // bskul tshig gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten dbang chen je sted kun//
214a2(rnying rgyud): sred pa'i me la sman slad du// tshul bzhin bslab na ji ltar bgyi// rdzas dang mthun rdzas ji ltar brjen// rtags dang dus tshigs ji ltar 'byung // rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba// nyon rdzog
214a3(rnying rgyud): g.yung drang yang dag pa// dben la gnyen zhing nyams dga' ba'i// pad+ma'i mtshan dang ldan pa yi// rigs su gyur pa'i yum gsum yang // srub pa'i don phyir gzhag par bya// rdzas su gyur pa'i yo byad kyang // thig le me mar kha dgu btang //
214a4(rnying rgyud): tset+ta bcu gcig yang dag ldan// b+han+ta lcang lor ldan pa ni// pad+ma'i rigs su gyur pa yi// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rak+tas bkang // gsung chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// gsang rnying zhing gi mchod pa dgram// ci 'byor yo byad gsum sogs la//
214a5(rnying rgyud): bdun gsum tshul bzhin bskal bar bya// rgyan dang chas gos la sogs pa// shun chen ral ga gtso ba la// srid pa spyi blugs zhwa bgos te// rtse gsum 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bsdams// phreng ba chen po de bzhin bgrang // yum yang g.yang
214a6(rnying rgyud): gzhi'i sreg pa la// rtse gsum 'bar ba'i g.yab mo thogs// phreng ba chen po gtso dang mthun// dngos grub zhal bu rin chen rigs// dar dkar kha bcad de bzhin bzhag/ rdo rje rigs ldan rtags su gsol// bdag nyid man ngag he ru ka/
214a7(rnying rgyud): ma mang srid pa 'grom// gnyis su me dpang bzlam byaH// danalan srid pa'o// nga gi kyil nas tha nas n-i/ mngon dung bar bsam pan// sadag dkar mal nyi ma dang // zab drim bya mang mang bya// dpram par
214b1(rnying rgyud): dbyes na mig zur gsum pa gcig yod pa/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis med pa'i pad+ma thams cad kyi ges bzung ba// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la/ snying ba rgyas pa'i zhags pa 'phen pa// mig gnyis nas zin pa che sna tshogs kyi ma chi ma /
214b2(rnying rgyud): ba/ gsu'i ral pa can la mchod pa gsal zhing bden dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni/ trAM/ me zhes chen mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thig le sbyor ba'i yum gcig ma/ dkar ma nyi na'i drod zer can// grags ma 'brar ba'i mig gcig la/
214b3(rnying rgyud): gsu yi ral pas srid pa sbyor// sbas pa'i phyag gnyis chags pa'i pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mchi ma skye 'ga'i gsos// tsid+ha'i zhags pas su skyegs sgrol// thig le gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// sngon mchod sbyor mdza nga bzhin du/
214b4(rnying rgyud): bdag dang gnyis med sbyor bya zhing // gsang ba'i gzungs su rab bya'o// zhes dam bcas la/ grangs ni zhag bdun za gcig bsrung ngo // bcu bzhin nyi ma gcig bsdu dzang // nyi shu rtsa gcig na dngos grub kyi b+ha stAr snying gtubs pa dang / d+han+ta
214b5(rnying rgyud): rak+ta bsres pa gcig 'ong ngo // de min na gzhan ltung 'ong ngo // kyi byang yang mtshan ma spang ngo // nyi shu rtsa gnyis na su meng mdu 'byin no// der ting 'dzin gsal bar byas la// gsar gyi rak+ta dbang du bsdus te// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bcings
214b6(rnying rgyud): gam 'bul zhing sbyor ba'i tshul ston/ bdag chagri pi ma skyes pa dang / mos rkang dkris bor nas/ mdzes pa dang chas nas sbyor ba 'bul lo// der mngon du sbyar te/ gsang ba'i byang chub sems des sba la bdag nyid la mchod pa bya/
214b7(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i grogs mo la sbyin/ de nas tha tshig dang dam bsres te/ gsang ba'i gzungs mar ngam stsal lo// de nas phrag dog spang ba'i phyir/ sgrub zla gsum chad sbyar nas su/ srub zla so sor dam bsre'o// de yan chad ci yang bya mi dngos
215a1(rnying rgyud): du na sa/ na du nas sasmra du
215a2(rnying rgyud): gces slas mi 'grub pa med do// 'di bsgrub pa'i dus su dang po gtor ma rnam pa gsum btang ngo // bshags pa bya/ tshe rabs kyi lan chags kyi gtor ma btang ngo // da ma skong bgyi/ 'di nyi zla thod phreng can gyi sgrub thabs so// srid pa
215a3(rnying rgyud): bde 'gro ma'i sgrub pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ 'gro ba'i don thugs rje'i 'od kyis mdzad do// bsgrub pa'i ma mo ma yin no// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su/ rigs bzhi'i yum dang ldan par bya ste/ yo byad bzhi yang de bzhin pa sha ma// gas
215a4(rnying rgyud): bzhing gi mchod pa yang bsham// rigs bzhi b+han+ta yang dag ldan// zhing gi dud pa rgyun mig cad// mchog gi phur ba bzhi yang dril// dung chen phreng ba yang dag bgrang // shun chen dbu rgyan de bzhin gsol// stag lags g.yang gzhi gos su
215a5(rnying rgyud): mnabs// rgya ma bsgril ba'i zhag bsdog la/ chu dang ma bsres dngas ma'i khrag/ dam rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rtse gsum g.yab mo thogs nas ni// bskyab cing brten pa'i lha mo de// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che/ rdo rje rigs
215a6(rnying rgyud): kyi ma mo ste// sku mdog dkar mo ga yu yi ral pa can// spyan gsum rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' shel gyi gzur 'khyil ba/ ma chags pa'i sbyor bas srid pa 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa/ g.yon
215a7(rnying rgyud): pas zhing gi g.yang gzhi'i g.yab mo bsdams shing / bdud rdo rtsa sngags dbang du spyad du/ ma thun gyi rgyal mo la khros pa'i tshul ston pa/ sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// rdo rje srid pa pade sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo chen/ rin che ni rigs kyim mo ste/
215b1(rnying rgyud): su smra sum nasgyu su
215b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' la bye ru'i gzhur 'khyil ba/ 'od zer dmar pos nub phyogs dbang du sdud pa'o// khrag gi dngas ma 'thor zhing bdud dang mu stegs kyi spring 'byin pa/ gnyis med sbyor bas srid pa 'khyud pa ma bdag nyid mal khros pa'i tshul ston
215b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// rdo rje khams gsum rdzogs byed khros pa'i dbang mo cheni/ lus kyi rigs la dbang byed de/ spu mdog ljang gul/ rdo rje dril bu'i ngal ba can/ su na gsu mardo rje rgya bram gyi mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'od zer ljang bus
215b4(rnying rgyud): byang phyogs dbang du lhud pa/ lag pa g.yas pas g.yang gzhi rdebs shing bdud dang mu stegs kyi mgo gcod pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' gser gyi gcur 'khyil pa/ grub pa'i lhor byas khams gsum 'khyud pa/ ma gcig pu ma la khros pa'i tshul ston pa/
215b5(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// spyod pa gsal zhing spyan drangs/ gnas nas 'byon par gsol zhing dbyangs snyan pos bskul ba ni/ hUM/ che zhe zlos pa'i dbang mo che/ sku 'dog dkar rdzog su yi rol pa can// spya na gsu mardo rje mche ba gtsigs
215b6(rnying rgyud): zhang chen g.yab 'os mu stegs sgrol// shel gyig zer gnas ris 'cha'// gnyis med sbyor bas khams gsum 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum pa blo zhing srid pa'i gsos// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor//
216a1(rnying rgyud): sus / su na tu man/ sa na na na du/
216a2(rnying rgyud): rnas na na
216a3(rnying rgyud): nga gyi nartogs/ gagang sa na dud dpung hU~M/ khye gakyang gnas sa / bdag med kyang bas stong gsum 'byung/ sbyor ba'i mangs kyis sunas sgrub// mam la khro nas khyod stu// bdag dang
216a4(rnying rgyud): sa pa 'a nga / me nga gig sa// 'dus/ thums kyi kyas ma ga tams/ TIg snyas pags rlo// dzeg ga
216a5(rnying rgyud): ga / da ba'i sa ga su/ la ba na sa kyim pa gyur// na pa rgya sa rgyags pa
216a6(rnying rgyud): san/ 'gang byi chug baphrul/ 'dams panas pa migs ba'i chu 'dung bcwar/ gsus kya ba pa / 'du
216a7(rnying rgyud): sabyas su ma byang du sadate bya gi rgya 'dus ci ba pa kyid bsu chus pa mi byung pa/ 'angs babyed pa brjod na gsas pa'a'as pa/ zhigan pa pa na de'i
216b1(rnying rgyud): sbrul nag gi chun po dang / zod pas brgyan pa gsal ba'i dbang gis dang la bsten pa bya/ gnyis su med pa'i sgor bya dpral/ dgu la mngon du 'byung ba dang / bdag nyid dbya' bo sgeg pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsal ba dang / 'dzum pa'i mdangs/
216b2(rnying rgyud): byas pa 'ad nga sa byas su/ stsasna tshogs sems kyis/ med pa'i bu / pa'i kyi thugs kyi/ dab ba'i byos gso/ rdo ming 'a kyis 'a / bdugs pa'i bad sa
216b3(rnying rgyud): sa// dkris pa chen po'i nga nyid kyis// chags pa chen dung byin gyis bas// degod pasnyed de sbyor ba dbul// de nas bdag dang myodon spyor la// drod kyis zung chub sems nyid dang // dbu ngas ma 'asres nas su// stsal ba
216b4(rnying rgyud): gcol mchod// de nas sgrubazla bzhi la sbyin// kun dang dam tshig bsres nas byung // mnas bsgrag go// de nas bsgrub pa'i ma mo la sbyin/ de nas dam bsres mnas ban gus nas/ rtog pa'i phrag dog snang ba'i phyir// srabazang /
216b5(rnying rgyud): dang bdag skyong te// kun dang dam pa sres ma nus bsgrag go// gtod ma gzhan ni gong ma bzhin// 'di 'grub na 'jig rten gyi bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub la/ lhar yang tshe ring ba dang / sri'u la mkhas so// ma mo 'go nas 'byung
216b6(rnying rgyud): lha spos kyang ci dgos/ ma bzhi yang bran mor 'khol lo// 'di ni khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi sgrub thabs so// 'di bzhi'i ma bzhi ni/ bsgrub tu gyon che ste/ spyir bu mo bzhi bsgrub na/ bu mos ma 'khol bas/ bsrubs lhag par mi dgos
216b7(rnying rgyud): so// da ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'byung ste/ rta'i lo tshes bdun la sgrub pa pa sham brgyad la 'jug ste/ nye'i bar du bsgrubs/ bslab pa'i ngo byad du 'tshal ba/ dka' mo mig gcig ma'i bar+d+ha ni/ thu rba pa raSh+Ta
217a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa/ 'das bar mnyung ba// gcig tushAg 'byung ban// dkar mo tshan mo'i b+ha rdzum sa// blon mang 'o thabardzu// sngon gang ldadun rtsom yod pag/ nagasanan pa gyu
217a2(rnying rgyud): bsnams// bad+ma 'a dang brgyad kyang thos la// ma dag gtsug na 'ad pa ni/ dper mi bang snang phyag na bsdums// snron zhing dris pa gnyis 'dug pa// rdon zlags ca 'dug ste// si mo la sa m+b+ha lananagan pa stsusmras// gtsun
217a3(rnying rgyud): srabs nang du rlabs pa las// sarnams ga ng+gAg rgya gyings pa laste// n+dan dpa ni ba ba s+ho// pal che N+Di kyi na pa smrams/ b+h+ya ste/ tharbA pa drug zhun// shes rgya zhil du byeng dge pas/
217a4(rnying rgyud): su stsal ba dang // gzhan yang dmadzes sna tshogs pa// skrag pa chen po gtso bo la/ zhwa dkar po yang dbur brgyan no// 'jig rten gzungs bzhi'i rigs bstan pa// sha mdog dkar la mdangs bzung ba// so thags bzang la mig dgyes rden/
217a5(rnying rgyud): ze bzhi ring la mthe // sha mdog gro la bcul zhugs che// ser mo lngas mkhan tshul du spyang // yum bzhi gzungs su s+thAn byas te// yum bzhi bsnyen pa so sor ba zang // bdag nyid man+ta dag sa kyis ldan pas// bzhi che bsnyen
217a6(rnying rgyud): sa byed kyi nyi pa'i rdzun sa mas kyim ga kyi zung na sasu
217b1(rnying rgyud): pis// shar gyi sred gsum phur 'debasam// rin chenu shel gyi thod gdengs can// zhag gi lan phran gsegs pa yis// skyeng du la bdud gdul zhing 'jung // bar du brgya byin srung bar byed// 'og tu dmyal khams stongs par byed// mag dang /
217b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje gsang ba'i gzungs// trAM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i lho gyogs na// ma mo chen mo mche ba can// na bza' zhing lpags go zul// b+han+ta dkar po'i dril bus brgyan// rdo rje lan phran rin chen 'khrol// ljags kyi mje ba gtsigs pa
217b3(rnying rgyud): yis// lho phyogs srid gsum phur 'debs ma// gser ga yA spel ba'i thod gdengs can// dri chen lan phran gsigs pa yis// skyong du ma hA de wa 'ching bar byed// bar du gshin rje phung bar byed// 'og tu byol song stongs par byed//
217b4(rnying rgyud): ma g.yel zhig le gsang ba'i gzungs// b+h+rUM/ ri rab thing bzhi'i nub phyogs na// dmar mo chen mo dbang bskur ma// na bza' rak+ta'i go zu la// sbal nag 'khril ba'i chun 'phyang can// pad+ma rak+Sha'i lan phran la// mche padamar po
217b5(rnying rgyud): gtsigs pa yis// thub phyogs srid gsum khur 'debs ma// mi khrag rlon pa'i thod gdengs can// rak+Sha'i lan phran gsigs pa yis// steng du tshangs pa chen po 'ching // bar du 'chi bdag phung bar byed// 'og gi yi dwags stongs par
217b6(rnying rgyud): byed// ma g.yel thugs rje gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs nas// ser mo chen mo las mkhan mo// mdzes pa'i na bza' chen po ni// mAMs chen po'i thul pa can// de zla khol ba'i ya bas bskor// lan
217b7(rnying rgyud): gran dri rgya 'bar ba 'byung // gser gyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// byang phyogs srid gsum mur 'debs ma// gres spungs pa'i thod gdengs can// dri mra'i lan phran gtsigs pa yis// steng du thogs kyi bdag po 'jing // bar du
218a1(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin srung bar byed// 'og tu bgegs rigs stongs byar byud// mab ye la thugs degs pa'i gnangs// D+ha/ gleng bzhi gsang pa'i gzungs gcigam// bad rtsirnam hA dgral rdugs// gang /
218a2(rnying rgyud): nagayang gzhi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnas phyags chen pos 'debs// mu stegs nag po'i snying 'byin ma// g.yon na b+han+ta khrag 'dzag pas// bud med thams nAd dbang du sdud// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i 'khor mnga' zhing // srub
218a3(rnying rgyud): nga Na ga pa ya
218a4(rnying rgyud): pa po la brtse dgongs ma// 'dir spyon sgrub pa'i las mdzod cig/ ces bskul ba ni/ zhag bzhi'i nub mo dngos grub kyi rtags dang por rak+ta dang tshil chen dang mchog tu ga~M hU~M bis bi'i b+hin+ta dang bzhi'o// dgu yi mtshan mo b+han+ta pad+ma rak+Sha dang / snang
218a5(rnying rgyud): srid kyi sman sbyar ba'i byang chub sems la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bsres pas gang ba 'od ste/ dga' ba mi skyed par myur du longs spyod dang / de'i nub mo chu bzhi yang byeng bskal lo// bdun gyi nub mo bzhi car yang sku mngon du 'byung ngo //
218a6(rnying rgyud): rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pa/ shin tu ying du 'ong ba'i lha mo bzhi'o// bdag ldan dag gi ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgoms laM/ rmugs pa'i mdangs phyung la/ ge sar gyi rak+ta dbang du bsdus la/ pad+ma'i nang du rdo rje 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings
218a7(rnying rgyud): la/ rim pa bzhin du nA gam phyed cing sbyor ba dbul lo// gong ma'i bsgrub pa'i lha mo bzhin du tshul de bzhin du bgyi/ de nas de'i phyi de nub mo mchog phran chas su stsal ba bskal ba dang / khams gsum bskul ba'i dngos grub kyang ster ro//
218a8(rnying rgyud): 'di bzhi 'go la phrag dog chung la/ dbang che la gsang ba'i dam du rub ste/ bsam dgu yid bzhin du 'grub ste/ gsang ba'i dgyes sde mor lung bstsal te bzhag go// de phan chad ci yang bya mi dgos te/ sbyor ba yang dus su dbul te/ las
218b1(rnying rgyud): nga tshul bzhin du byed do// bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i tshul ni gong ma dang 'dra'o// 'di ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo gsang ba'i yang byi mo bzhi'i sgrub thabs so// 'di yan chad kyi ma mo grub na/ tshe 'di'i yon tan lha ci smos/ phung po 'jig pa'i/
218b2(rnying rgyud): dus su yang glu dbyangs dang rol mo la sogs pa 'od dang rtags bzang po dang / nam mkha' la sma 'ong ba dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan la sogs pas bsus nas/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su sgrub mi dgos par dkyil 'khor dang 'og min du skye
218b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// 'di yan chad kyis ma mo grub na/ ma mo 'og ma thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'du ba dang / lhag par yang slub mi dgos so// 'di ni ma mo'i gtso mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas ma mo bdun
218b4(rnying rgyud): bslab par 'ad na/ gnas dur khrod du mang la/ yumado rdzo rigs kyi mtshan dang ldan pa gsum/ dbang ni slob dpon gnyis kyis bsgrub ste/ b+har+g+ha mtshan dang san pa bdun nam gsum du bdud rtsin ma pa lnga ma bsgrubs pa'i smon pa bsngal/ gsum
218b5(rnying rgyud): du 'jig rten pa'i sman sna tshogs bstsal/ gcig tu byang chub sems dang rak+ta'i nyi tshe bstsal/ b+han+ta rin po che mtshan ldan gyi nang du bdud rtsi a mr-i ta ba stsal/ shel lding nag gsum/ shel dkar po gcig/ tse ra nag po gcig/ ku kur tsa dkar
218b6(rnying rgyud): po gcig/ nam mkha' lding gcig/ mchog gi stod dam smad sbom pa gcig bcas chas gos thams cad nag por bsgyur te/ gsung chen gyi dud pa rgyun mi gcad par gtang ngo // 'dzab drangs pa dang / zhag bdun na sgra chen ngo zhig 'byung
218b7(rnying rgyud): der zung gcig pa sgra me \u0f7f/ mtshad pakra/ ma 'i kyi sa ng+yas skyes/ zhag sun pa sdug pa cha 'phrul rnachags byung ba// dang drang gcig sbre la/ zhag bcagacig na nyin ma zan 'byung / dang zung gcig 'a ng+gA m-in/
219a1(rnying rgyud): tshul du bstan/ zhag pa na bdun cu sgramangon du byung // bdag tu byang rdzuthog mnyams na mdzes pa dang ldan // nyams nan ma la bcan bdun mi sdug pa gaHga byud dang/ zab dang
219a2(rnying rgyud): ba 'dug par chog/ man gagasu na/ bdag nyid kyi ba bahU~M/ sogs pan pa da pa nasul hU~M/ bslang bar bya'o// bdage sa na ga dang ldan / dang pong gi sdug pa las kyang sbyi/ pa rtson no// drang po nas sngag ma
219a3(rnying rgyud): dbyung du bsdus pang rgyal bskyed lca smra ba'i tshul du brten na// de lta phyag 'tshal zhing dpon ning nus ni lhag byed // de nas padz+ra sh+tsa d+d+he gis bskus nas/ chen por nas gsumags sna dang bcur byas nas/ mi la Ad+ha rI la'i ma
219a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis dbul lo// sA la gats+tsha mo dang sbyor ro// de nas lo dang sbyar ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni kyi 'dod po bzhi du me 'apre s+t+wa~M/ ngi lo rdeg pa'i las kun yang sbubs shig par lung stsal lo// za na dang bran mo dang smas dang byi mo yin pas mnar/
219a5(rnying rgyud): mthu zas lung sbal lo// de phyin chad bran bzhin du las byed do// de na smras pa'i ma mo bsgrub par bya'o// yo byad gong ma kun gyi steng du zhing gi rgyu zhags gcig/ srid pa b+hi thAg+sa kyi zhwa la pa can/ dunga'i chung dang / bye ru dang /
219a6(rnying rgyud): gas dag sus pa rgyan pag ga/ rten gyi rje thigs nas bsgrubs na/ rtags ng+gA gang dang mthun/ skyabasabapa grong dang mthun/ yin tan ma bdu man rgya 'o// bsam pa thams cad 'dzug/ spa po dbul

219b1(rnying rgyud): nga nan/ kha nub phyogs su bltas la/ zhag bdun du bskyen pa brtse/ yumamatshan dang ldan pa la dbab bo// dang po bskul ba na/ thA/ sred pa'i ma mo mu ga pa la thugs dmatshan// bya 'ad+mor la gcig 'jig rten thog// moganas
219b2(rnying rgyud): khrag 'ba' stong khams bsreg/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho gting nas skems// ma gcig byung ba'i dus mtha' nas// 'jig rten las kyis dbang bsgyur te// sems can donal rab tu brtsam// snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// ba
219b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i thugs kyis gshegs su gsol// zhes bskul lo// yu ma la ldab ste/ dris na snang srid kyi gA tam sla'o// da ni bu mo spyan gnyis bsgrub par bya ste/ bskul ba ni/ hUM/ ma mo chen mo ga yar dam can// nam mkha' dbyings kyi
219b4(rnying rgyud): dpal mo btsan// gnam phyed dgos su gyon pa mo// sa phyed gdan du gding ba'i bdang // 'khor ni gnam sman 'bum gyis bskor// tshibs su gser gyi shA po brdzi bas// mgo la ga yu yi rA bcu 'bar// phyag na gser gyi dril bu bsnams
219b5(rnying rgyud): bdud dang mu stegs dbang du srud// tshe zhe sring gcig ma g.yel cig/ da ni bu mo chung ngu bsgrub par bya ste/ hUM/ ma mo ma g.yel ga yang dam can// dan ting gser ga yu'i gro cog can// ge yuM yi dril snyan 'bum gyis brgyan// tshir

220b1(rnying rgyud): mo nyes 'bus byed pa// 'don gyi rgyung yog yin// b+hUHsa bzlabs n+ti// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bra stsa la// dad kyi the gsum brtul nas ne// don chen sna tshogs sde btugs nas// sa mchag cig la ring pag zugs// rigs su mnan ts+tsha/

223b1(rnying rgyud): chen mo mdos la gshegs// blud bdag chen mo krud la gshegs// b+h+rUM/ sbrid pa byung gi phyogs nas mnga' bdag mo// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag nathod pa'i rgyu gra ma bsdams// len par byed pa'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag

223b7(rnying rgyud): rgyung// mangs padag chen ma mdos la gshegs// klung ba dag chen mo srid la gshegs/ hUM/ ri ring gling bzhing bu dgas ma// rba byad dkar ma zhig pa la// kha gnas yid kyila'i bar thogs// gar ting dgar ngo'i ming nas sbyang //
224a1(rnying rgyud): bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// spyad bdag chen mo spyad la gshegs// nA myang nag ma tshan mo l+ya/ lcag na me yid kyil 'khor phyogs// du rnying nag mo'i ming nas byung // mdos bdag rkyen mo mangs la
224a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs// glung bdag chen mo glad la gshegs// cha byad dmar mo theg pa la// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// shAn+ti da mar mo'i ming nas phyeng // mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// grung bdag chen mo d+hu t+pa la gshegs/
224a3(rnying rgyud): hUM/ cha brad ser mo sgeg pa la// lag na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glung bdag chen mo byud la gshegs// b+h+rUM/ dmag gi rgyal mo thun mo bzhi// shar
224a4(rnying rgyud): dkar mo mtsho gtsigs ma// lho yi nag mo khin+da na ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byung gi ser mo las mkhan ma// dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// rigs bzhi dmag dpung bzhi lis bskor// kha rje za ba'i bdag mo ste// mdos bdag
224a5(rnying rgyud): chen mo mdos la gshegs// glung bdag chen mo blud la gshegs// cha byad nag mo chen mo la// 'jigs su rung ba'i ral pa can// su stod stag lpags g.yang gzhi la// sku sprad zangs kyi 'dab macan// mi phyugs gsod pa'i kham pas
224a6(rnying rgyud): thogs// 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo ste// gshin rje ma chen ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glung bdag chen mo blud la gshegs// hUM/ lha chen brgyad kyi ma chen mo// srin mo chen mo sha ma sham mo// srin mo
224a7(rnying rgyud): tu snyam pa dang // srin mo chen mo po thogs ma// srin po rkyen mo sdomam// srin mo chen po g.yang gzhos// srin ma chen mong ba tu ga mo sbyong mo// srin mo chen ma rab tu tha'am// srog chags kun gyi khrag bkru ra// srog chags
224b1(rnying rgyud): kun la gnod byed ma// mkhal ma dang ni nAs khrol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang nas su// rang gis rang la thim par stod// ma mo chen mo'i ming nas myung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo rgyud la gshes
224b2(rnying rgyud): shAr phyogs khams nas shin tu rgyug/ mi mgo'i phor pa khrag gis bkang // grong sbyor 'thor zhing nad 'phyen ma// ma bdud chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mings bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// klung bdag chen mo gud la gshegs/
224b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi kun gyi rgyug 'gro ma// phyogs bzhi gnas sring lor grags// sring mo chen mo po rta'i tshul// so nyi chen mo'i ming nus gyung // mdos bdangag / chen mo mdos la gshegs// grung bdag chen mo gud la gshegs// sa dog nas nig
224b4(rnying rgyud): byed cing // 'jig rten gyos byed zab mo// sa bdag chen po'i ming nas byung // mngos padag chen mo mongs la gsheg me+e / smad bdag chen po byud la gshegs// rAg mo hA la ha la mo// the'i dang zlos/ srin sdong ste// ma mams
224b5(rnying rgyud): chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// klud bdag chen mo brud la gshegs// gzhan yang bod yul du glags pa'i dpeng phyag ma dang brtan ma'i ming brjod do// gtor ma btang / kun tu 'a khor rje dang rdza rnga yang dung
224b6(rnying rgyud): ste// klu dbyangs s+thAnA par blangs nas // khro ma lam dang rdi rje brgyal// man dag wa rlabs tshe dpal drangs// des ni bsam pa yid bzhin 'brub// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// lha rnams 'ji bas 'jig 'gyur te// srog
224b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs gzhan tu smras cid kos// gnod 'dul lha yis pang gagol pa// lha yi srog kyang 'bring byung na// 'jig rten man yon chog gang // 'jig rten ni laji ltar lags// yang dag srog la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag zugs kyis
225a1(rnying rgyud): bka' stsa pa// 'deg tan pan man bas ma mi byab/ 'jigatan me la grags pa ni// sbru ma yangs sa snang ba de ba'i sas// ngas bsnum byed pas rtogs mi dgas// gleng bzhan 'dus can pa'i na
225a2(rnying rgyud): paro// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskang ba ji ltar lags// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // nyug gcig ya
225a3(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid pa'i dbang can 'di rnams kun// srog gis bslang ba 'di rnams so// hUM/ gtso mo yum gyi mngon spyod ma// spyi gtsug g.yuyi rdo rje rtse dgu 'bar/
225a4(rnying rgyud): g.yu yi ral pas stong gsum khyab// g.yas kyi phyag na rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i longs spyod 'gyed// ye shes sprul pa'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs// khams gsum srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur ma// rtag
225a5(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i grogs mdzad ma// bltas pas mi mthong gcig kyang med// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskar // rje/ shar gyi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba sal dbang bsgrar// 'gro ba'i rus la mnga'i mdzad ma/
225a6(rnying rgyud): 'di mi rus pas bskang byas nas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ lho yi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba chu la dbang bsgyur zhing // gro ba'i khag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi
225a7(rnying rgyud): khrag gis bslang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ nub phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'gyur ba me la dbang bsgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i drod la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di
225b1(rnying rgyud): yi drod kyis bskang byas pas// mthun pa'i zas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba rlung la dbang bsgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad
225b2(rnying rgyud): ma// 'di yi dbugs kyis bskrang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// btsal ba'i las rnams grub par mdzad// b+h+rUM/ nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nam mkha' stong la dbang bsgyur zhing // 'gro
225b3(rnying rgyud): bzag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi bklag gis bskang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// btsal ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// tu bskal ba'i 'byung ba chen po lngas ye shes lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / gtso bo yang
225b4(rnying rgyud): yum yang bskang // da ni 'dod khams kyi lha mo rnams bskang ba ni// hUM/ srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste// sku mdog mthing nag chen mo la// dbu dang zhabs kyis stong khams khengs// rin chen ral pas snang srid
225b5(rnying rgyud): gsal// khyed ni 'do khams gtso mo ste// sred kyi bdag mo 'i thugs dam bsang / btsal ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga la// dkar mags ga ral pa can// ne zla byang gri thong gdas
225b6(rnying rgyud): dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong 'oganas khrag gi dri snam ma// ral pa'i zar bu g.yon nas gcig tu 'khyil// sred pa'i sa gzhi ga ya gA zhing khebs mdzad ma// lag pag pas na ljags dang zangs kyi dril zhags bsdams// snying gi zhags pa
225b7(rnying rgyud): cing 'phen// lag pa g.yon na b+har+g+ha mgo bcad ba cu bar mdzad// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// nyi zla stong gis sbrul brgyan cing bklubs// sdang srid snying gi bdag mo ste// 'di yi snying gis bslang byas pas// mthun
226a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis bcol ba grub par mdzod// che zhecan mo dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs// dkar ma ral gcig zugs dam bskar// chan rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mche// khams gsum
226a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad gsal mdzad ma// bsang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam spongs// che zhe khams gsum 'tsho byed khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad gsang bar sbyor// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bskang ngo bskal pa'i
226a3(rnying rgyud): thugs dam skongs// che zhe chen mo dmar mo ral gcig ma// srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad dbang du srung // mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis bcol ba'i las rnams mdzod// bska
226a4(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i thugs dam skongs// che zhe pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// srid pa thams cad bde la 'god// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis bcol ba'i las rnams mdzod// bskar do bskal pa'i thugs dam slongs//
226a5(rnying rgyud): sdang srid kun gyi rgyan mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang // bdag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo'i thugs dam bslar// mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen mo ste// lag na mi mgo'i phor bathogs// bsgre 'ongs
226a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i thugs dam skyongs// mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo la// lag na mi yi ga yang gzhi thogs// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs ma skongs// thugs kyi dgyes sde chen mo ste// gsang ba'i man ngag yang bya mo// sgrub pa po la thags phyung zhing // chag
226a7(rnying rgyud): tu dbang phyug chen mos grogs mdzod cig/ srid pa shar gyi bdag mo ste// dkar mo mig gcig ral pa can// shar gyi dkar mo 'bum sder bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skongs// srid pa lho yi bdag mo ste// nag mo chen ma
226b1(rnying rgyud): mche ba can// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum sder bcas// bskad do bskal pa'i thugs dam skongs// srid pa nub kyi bdag mo ste// dmar mo chen mo dbang bsgyur ma// nub kyi dmar mo 'bum sder bcas// thugs dam gnyen po bdag/
226b2(rnying rgyud): bskong gis// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// srid pa byang gi bdag mo ste// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// byang phyogs ser mo 'bum sder bcas// thugs dam gnyen po bdag rgong gis// bcol ba'i las rnams grub
226b3(rnying rgyud): par mdzod// de yan chad ni ma mo bcu bzhi'i snong thabs so// da ni khol mo rnams sha khrag dmar dang bsres pa a mr-i tas bskad ste/ srid pa kun gyi khyim bdag mo// he ru kas ni thugs dam bskang // har ting dkar mo'i thugs dam bskang /
226b4(rnying rgyud): dun ting nag mo'i thugs dam bskang // shAn+tiM dmar mo'i thugs dam bskang // gru ba ting ser mo'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa'i gru 'degs chen mo yis// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// dkar
226b5(rnying rgyud): mo chen mo mig gcig ma// nag mo chen mo kha rlan ma// dmar mo chen mo mchu 'jib ma// ser mo chen mo rkang ldag ma// rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// thugs dam gnyen po bdag gis bskang // bcol pa'i las
226b6(rnying rgyud): rnams grub par mdzod// e ka tsa ti dpal gyi yum// lcags kyi so la zangs kyi sba// sna tshogs zhal la zhing sgrol ma// thugs dam gnyen po bdag slong gis// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// oM ka tsa ti'i thugs dam bsku
226b7(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i ma bdun thugs dam bskang // ma mor grags pa kun gyi thugs dam gnyen po bsgred // de ltar nang gi dmadzes dang ldan par byas la/ shel smug po 'am/ nam mkha' lding la sogs pa rgya gang bskal yang rung / 'byung ba chen po lnga mis
227a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi mkha' 'grom lnga dang gtsemo bsrung / shakhrug dmar dang ma mra tas 'khyor rgyam mo'i thugs dam bsrung na// skyab bya po bsnyam pa yid bzhin du 'grub ces dpal rgyan ba rgyags bshad de// na
227a2(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// cho ga 'di bstan phan yo na gang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsa ba// nyon cig
227a3(rnying rgyud): g.yung drung yang dag pa// lha rnams srog kyang 'chi 'gyur na// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// srid pa'i dam can 'di bskang na// dus min 'chi ba bzlog par 'gyur// dus su bab na chung bar 'gyur// 'jig rten longs spyod
227a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// rabs rgyud chad pa'i mi dang lha// chog 'di la rten byed na// sman bzhi bu yi 'dra bar nges// cho ga 'di la rkyen byed na// 'chi bdig zhagrabs zin pa yang // zhags pa nag po bcang nas su// skyo 'bogaHda kyang rnam por
227a5(rnying rgyud): 'jig/ tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// 'jig rten 'dir na bde skyed de// rig 'dzinas la de bzhin gshegs// cho ga 'di la rten byed na// bra na g.yog sleb rnams 'phel bar byed// gzhan gyi dmag gis bku dang // rgyal po
227a6(rnying rgyud): mongs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// chog 'di la rten byed na// dbul po longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// nor gyi dbyig kyang de bzhin rnyed// tshig 'di la rte byed ni// byed pa rta ga cing bas me dbung drung // rdzongs po 'phe la yang 'gyu
227a7(rnying rgyud): de nas na tshe sdug bsngal med// pha rol dmag dpung 'jigs par 'gyur// lo phyogs rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// cho ga 'di la rten byed ni// 'jig rten dbang can thams cad gyis// byang chub sems ldan bzung skye nga // rdzo zlas srid 'phel
227b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyung // bsgo ba'i tshig rnams pan bzhin nyan// 'di'i yon tan bsod nams kyis// phyi ma'i dngos grub mchog phyin te// bsod nams nyid du gdun med// 'dis byon tan brjod mi lag// dag gsungs pas lha rnams dga'// rdzuru
227b2(rnying rgyud): gyi phan yon gyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// dbang can mo rnams skong ba yis// dbang byed pho la mi 'tshal lam// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yi gtso/
227b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags nga rgyal che ba yis// zhe sdang byed pa'i dbang mo che// srid pa'i ma bzhis 'jig rten bskyed// 'di bskangs zlog pas thams cad 'grub// de nus pho rigs mchod 'dod na// stegs bu go 'phang mtho dmand bye// cho ga'i rdzas ni
227b4(rnying rgyud): 'di dag go// 'bru sna bcu gsum ngar phye dang // rin chen sna bdun bdar nas su// rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bya// de la lag pa g.yas g.yon rin po che// gsal byed brgyad kyang de bzhin no// 'bru sna lnga dang tshom bu lnga// lus
227b5(rnying rgyud): dang yan lag de bzhin brgyan// bdud dang drang dkar chen po dang // de wa nor gyi bdag po dang // gra shin rde rA tri'i rdzas yin te// skyes to re la de bzhin no// 'bru sna gtsang phye bre bzhi lnga// mkhar thabs mda' yis rnam par brgyan// lca
227b6(rnying rgyud): bzangs dar dkar bkra ba'i rgyan// de bzhin sha dang drin chen chang // dkar blur skyems dang bcas pa yis// dkar po che la de bzhin no// bre cha gsang phye zla ga mA la// za 'og mnga' yis rnam par brgyan// le'u bzangs dar dkar na bza'i
227b7(rnying rgyud): rten// de bzhin sha dang rin chen zang // se glung rkyen dang chas pa ni// byang shar mtshams su de bzhin no// nas dang yungs kar mngon gyis brgyan// srid pa kun la de bzhin te// 'byung po phal la sgegator sbyin// de skad pagyis pa re
228a1(rnying rgyud): !/ tshe 'di skad brjod// dpag pasam shing gi skyed pa la// gsar mkhar ni se pol// bsanan thams sa zhum// gum pad ni sngon pos bstod// de yi ni bdag po ste// smos rje rje drang dkar zhig
228a2(rnying rgyud): mkhan ni ming nas phyung // mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// grud bdag ni glud la gshegs// gser mkhar ni rtse dgu nas// rin chen ni stegs bu la// lcags kyi ni sgo khyud can// de yi ni steng na'o// srid pa'i ni drang dkru ba
228a3(rnying rgyud): zhig 'dzin gyi ming nas byung / mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// blad bdag ni glang la gshegs/ rim pa ni brgya gsum la// ri rab kyi rInA pa la// gnam sbyi ni steng shA~Md na// lcags mkhar ni sngon po lnga// gser gyi ni 'ang
228a4(rnying rgyud): bskor zhing // zangs kyi ni sgo stsal pa// de yi ni bdag po la// dbang phyug ni chen po la// ma hA ni shA rI zhig/ nag po ni chen po zhig/ ya bdud ni ming nas phyung // mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// khyud bdag ni rgyud la gshegs//
228a5(rnying rgyud): yi ni gling phran na// yar gyi ni yang le shod// bdud pas ni thabs mkhas te// bdud pas ni drag shul che// 'gro ba ni kun gyi bdud// 'gro ba yi tshe dpal phrog/ skyes bu ni skyes to re// ma bdud rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos pa dang //
228a6(rnying rgyud): ni mdos la gshegs// glung bdag ni glud la gshegs// nyo phyogs ni gling khams na// rus mkhar ni gling dbul// de yi ni bdag po la// shi bdud kun ci khram 'debs pa// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// grung bdag
228a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs// 'dzam du gling gi nor gyi bdag/ ma hA de wa lha chen po// btsun mo u ma 'khor dang bcas// nor lha chen po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// zung bdag ni glud la gshegs// gan
228b1(rnying rgyud): yang steng na// dung ma bar ni dkar po la// gas y-i ni pad bskod la// bras yi ni sgo sbal te// de yi ni bdag po pa// rtsub 'jug drung gi bor tshugs can/ gnam myi dkar po'i ming nus byung // mdos bdag ni 'dos la ga na/
228b2(rnying rgyud): glang bdag ni klud la gshegs// byang shar gyi mtshams shed na// bsre mkhar ni khra bo la// dung gi ni bad bskor la// lcags kyi ni sgo sbrul te// de yi ni bdag po pa// shar phyogs gnams phyed kyi bdag/ tshangs pa'i lus la thor tshugs
228b3(rnying rgyud): mgo// btson mgon rgyal po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glang bdag ni gyad la gshegs// shar phyogs nI la gi na// dung ma khar ni sgro dmyal// bse yI ni sgo stsal pa// shar phyogs gnams phyed kyi bdag
228b4(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa'i lus lakhor tshugs mgo// shar phyogs rgyal po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// gung bdag ni gud la gshegs// so btsan rol po tshu rol po// btsan gyi rgyal po'i ming nas byung // mdos bdag chen po madros la
228b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs// grung bdag chen po glad la gshegs// btsan la rol bde bzhin no// da ni many+dzu shrIn+tiM ga cho ga bshad de// gser phyug cing mkhal phyed la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs bshams la// dkor cha spyan gzigs yang dag ldan// don gyi
228b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud shAn+ti'o// de la 'jig rten shas bskos te// dmar gtor dam rdzas ldan pa ni// shAn+tiM nang gi tsha ga'o// gnyan pa'i sa ni dben pa ru// gru bzhi spros chu'i maN+Dal bya// zas kyi stegs bu gang bar bya// las dang phan yon go d+ha ma bzhin/
228b7(rnying rgyud): brirjes te dang sla ba shus te bzhan// kyi rgyud mthun de dkar po yin// gseng ba mthun de gnyis ka 'dra// 'di brtsams pas mepa ma 'grub na// 'jig rten dbang chen zung bar 'gyur// las rnams kun gyi brnags s+ho// chog lung chen rdzos/
229a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'di/ ngas gsungs pa la ba mam med// dgad cig ni bku' stsal ba smra// mdag tan dbang man mngon par dga'/ karnams papas rgyang mAn rjes / sems can pan la ldan pa sdug// dmamag mnga'
229a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas// mngos kyi phan yon gyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'gugs dang 'dren pa'i las rnams ni// ma \u0f7f'i las rnams bdag tan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal
229a3(rnying rgyud): na cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid gsum 'dul ba'i pho nya ni// bdag nyid man ngag ldan byas te// sems kyi dkyil nas bskal ba ni// hUM dpal gyi po nya bka' sdod ma// klung gi khwa chen lding ba la// ljags kyi ma ma/ blang mag car/
229a4(rnying rgyud): mug gsum pa la la gzugs// g.yas na nga 'dzeg/ bdam bu bris ming gsum smos// am mra b+hags rnaMl zhags 'ching // gsanA nA t+tan+na nyas pa dang // bar gA la la bskal pa'i ma// thA ma lcags kyu 'ja'adubyan//
229a5(rnying rgyud): nga pa / bzungs ni thugs kyi dkyil du 'asrungs// brtan ni sngags kyikyi la gtan/ dab ni skyed ga gsum la byed/ bani ste yangs las// rduman gleng ba sa rtsub par gyug// bdurnaM rnas par chag las mthugs
229a6(rnying rgyud): gra gang tha' sa sa
229b1(rnying rgyud): can bang dngos pa gcigs pa/ gang sa thab grang pa byung / dam bya 'arjod gtan na gang gab ba ga// gangs cang gas ma man gan na// rnal pa dazugasas byung ngan/ mnam thal kyis nan
229b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ni sprin dkar go cog can// phyag gnyis pad+ma stong gzung zhing // mtshan ni 'jig rten kun 'dul ma// g.yas na zhing gi bya zhags 'phen// bdud dang mu stegs 'ching byed ma// mtshan ni dbyings phyag chen mo la// g.yon gyi dang
229b3(rnying rgyud): bsnams pa ni// me mag smon pa'i bor ba rtsa// mkhrag rlon pa'i nang bsngal zhing // bdud rtsi'i brgyad dang bkres nas 'thor// drangs shig d+ha gra ba gags rdul du rjeg// mtshan ni bdud rtsi'i langs spyad ma// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni/
229b4(rnying rgyud): mi yi rus pa'i phur bu 'dril// dgra bgegs mnan pa'i las mdzad ma// mtshan ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon gyi phyag na bsdams pa ni// zangs dang lcags kyi dril zhags la// mi snying brgyas pa'i zhags pa 'phen// srid pa gsum char
229b5(rnying rgyud): 'ching bar mdzad// mtshan ni gser gyi dril zhags ma// sprul pa'i 'phro 'du mang po can// g.yas g.yon rol ba'i g.yab mo yis// khams gsum rdul du rlog mdzad ma// mtshan ni g.yang gzhi rtsa mtshon can// na bza' mi lpags rlon pa la/
229b6(rnying rgyud): stong khams thams cad myos mdzad ma// dgra bgegs thams cad rdul du tshogs// mtshan ni zhing gi na bza' can// kha nas mi khrag rlon pa 'thor// stong khams thams cad sreg mdzad ma// sru la mi mgos ngal kha// skye 'gro thams cad myong
229b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad ma// mtshan ni me tog rgyun 'phyang can// 'bar ma gtum man khrim 'dul// tha rgyal chen pa gzhin rje gshed// bka' yi panya ma grags ma chags// nga rgyal can rnams dbang du sdud// gang la bya ba rdul du drags// 'dam
230a1(rnying rgyud): gtsam bya// bcol pa'i las rnams thub par smra // 'azhin gyun pa// 'anan pa ma byam sa nas// byug+sas rgyas pa pa sadus med mad 'od//
230a2(rnying rgyud): sdom zhes sba bar nges// ma btang myur du la 'u khug/ phoT drug cu'i gtso mo ste// e ka ra Ti ral gcig ma// ral pa'i zar bus srid gsum srung // za 'og zhab ma'i dbu rgyan rkun// gnam la bskor bas bdud dpung bzlog mdzadas
230a3(rnying rgyud): sel brdabs pas dam sri 'byung po'i bla gcod ma// sgrub pa'i dgra dang bgegs thul cig/ mtshan ni khyis bdag chen mo la// chibs su rlung 'chu bas mdur gom bstod// drongs shig dgra bgegs ang ku sha/ dngos grub par chad byed
230a4(rnying rgyud): dang // sgrub pa po ye mthu 'brog rnams// sgrol bdag chen mod tshur spyon// mthu chen dam can de sbyor gyon// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// zhes las la bskul ba khrags par bya'o// po nya chen mo'i le'u blo nyar bzhi pa'o//
230a5(rnying rgyud): rgano 'dral lnga yis ying gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'dig byed pa'o// lugu rgyud las 'gas byed da // sems can kun laganod byed dang // rtag tu gdug sams gyur pa la// nan tan las rnams palta tshal// rdzogs sangs sa
230a6(rnying rgyud): la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur te// sems can kun la gnod pa la// nan byung las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung zung yang dag pa/
230a7(rnying rgyud): ji ltar yid 'thad gnas zla// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan par bya// dbang gi dkyil 'khor kha sprod pa// dbus su kun tu bzang mo mkha'// 'dzub gsum pa las drang por bri// zeb sor bzhi che snyoms pa// dgug dang spar 'phang sngags
230b1(rnying rgyud): kyis 'gengs// dbang gi dkyil 'khor khar na la// gnon dang 'phang ba'i sngags kyis bsgyur// de nas khar na klu bzhi la// sor lnga pa yi tshad du bya'o// rdo rje pad+ma sbrel mar bri// de nas maN+Dal rgyas pa la// 'od phyung thod pa'i phreng bas
230b2(rnying rgyud): brgyan// sgo bzhi mda' bzhis brgyan par bya// de nas rdzas kyi ngo bo yang // rgya yi gtso bo dgu bsogs te// grub pa'i rnal 'byor dgu rbad pa// gnyis la chags 'dzin spun gnyis bri// bdun la ma bdun sngags bris te// drag po'i kha na
230b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar bri// dbang dang drag por ldan par b+ha// lcags zangs shing bu gang yang rung // dbang drag phur pa dgra po la// mgo la mkha' 'gro lnga lnga bsam// ngos la rnal 'byor bcu bzhi bsgom// sked par chags 'dzin la sogs bsam/
230b4(rnying rgyud): rtse mor me bdun bsam nas su// dmigs pa'i dngos po gang yang rung // dkar nag dkyil du rgyab nas su// dge sdig las kyi mtshams phye nas// dngas ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// rngubs nas ma mos zos par bsam// de ltar 'chab na lha yang 'a
230b5(rnying rgyud): dngos po bdag nyid bsgom bya ba// phra men rgya mtsho nyid kyi sku// dbang drag sku mdog chen mo la// dbu gcig zhal lnga 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu la mkha' 'gro lnga bsgoms shing // mche ba can la gtsigs zhing bzhad// ma mo thams cad dbyings
230b6(rnying rgyud): nas dgyed// phyag na dbang dag phur pa 'gyed// 'dren dang gnan dang sbar ba yi// sngags rnams dag tu bzlas nas su// rnal 'gyor ma rnams rbad nas su// gdul bya ba'i dngos po de// dbang drag dkyil du gzung nas ni// rnam shes
230b7(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bsdus pa dang // dge sdig lag rnams sbyangs nas su// lha gzugs phral te zos bsam nas// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'a
231a1(rnying rgyud): de na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te/ gar gyi brda' phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol pa dang / dbang drag dkyil 'khor byin rlab dang // dbang drag phur ba'i cho 'phrul dang // 'dren mnan spar 'phar sngag
231a2(rnying rgyud): mthu// mgon po chen pos bstan du gsol// de skad rdo rje sems dpas gsol pags na nas/ ci yang mi gsung bar dbang drag gi ting nge 'dzin la khrugs so// ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la bzhen// badz+ra dza d+hi dz+wa la maN+Dal/ thA ga ru ta b+ha ka
231a3(rnying rgyud): na sa
231a4(rnying rgyud): kyis brgyan pa steng nas char du bab ste/ dbang drag bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te rigs lnga dang lha gnod 'dul kha srub tu brgyal/ dbang drag gi dal gdengs kar/ srid pa'i ma mo dbang can gyi tshogs ni gan rgyal du bkyem nas
231a5(rnying rgyud): snying dkar nag gi mtshams su phur bu 'og te dag sdig gi shan thang phye nas/ byang chub kyi sems su byin gyis brlabs nas/ de ltar thams cad brgyal ba dang 'di skad ces gru blangs so// dbang drag dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha'// mkha' yi dkyil
231a6(rnying rgyud): bder gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas su// dbyings nas dbang drag phur bu yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// rang chud nyid la drangs nas kyang // dbang drag mkha' la bzhag nas su// slan chad gsang ba'i dbyi
231a7(rnying rgyud): su sbyor// g+hu ya b+ha ga sa ma yA s+t+wa~M/ laM laM ma hA tsit+ta ho/ zhes gsungs pas/ brgyal ba thams cad slar dran pa rnyed nas/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor na 'dar yid yid 'dug par tshor ro// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas gsol ba/
231b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po a la la// dbang drag dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po a la la// 'dren gnon spar 'phang cho 'phrul ste// mtshan cha chen po a la la// dbang drag phur bu dag sdig spyod// khrag 'thung chen po ma la la//
231b2(rnying rgyud): bla med khrag 'byung rje btsan mchog/ mkha' 'gro chen mo a la la// ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i tshogs// ces smras so// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po thabs kyi mchog/ mu stegs thams cad kyi gnyen po
231b3(rnying rgyud): bdag lags te/ bdag gi ming yang rdo rje sems dpar btags pa lags na/ 'dir bla med bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho 'phrul gyis/ bdag kyang brgyal na mi mthun pa gzhan smos kyang ci 'tshal/
231b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid gsang ba mchog kyang de bzhin 'dzin/ ces gsol to// de nas dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho 'phrul gyis/ mu stegs kA la chen po yang gtan du gnon par gyur to// rnal 'byor
231b5(rnying rgyud): dgra bgegs mnan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rdo rje rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// rgyud lung chen po 'di dag la// skye 'gro gang dag yi rangs te// mos pa'i dngos grub ji ltar lags// gang
231b6(rnying rgyud): gis 'di la ma dad pa'i// skur pa 'debs pa'i skye bo la// rnam par smin pa ci lta bu// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa//
231b7(rnying rgyud): ngas gsung pa yi lung 'di la// skye bo gang gis brtson 'grus pa// lung 'di nyid kyi srid pa brje// tshe 'di nyid la dgongs pa rdzogs// rgyal po bzhin du che bar nges// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// rnal 'byor gang zhig dad mos pa/
232a1(rnying rgyud): sod bsum dpang ldan pa chu/ sa h+lA gnas brnyan // ga pa tu ga su rjod// da banam pa gal na/
232a2(rnying rgyud): sa na
232a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pade// ra ba'i dris myed 'i dang 'a'// mun cid thosazhes ska byud// ngas gas pa 'i rgyang srung la// minyad pa la sems can // gshin che zhags pas brgya byas // des kyang sa dmyigs rnam pa'i
232a4(rnying rgyud): lha gzugs thams cad 'jal par rjes// ngas gsung po yi rgyud lung la// skye bo gang zhig dang myos pa// 'jig rten 'di la yon tan yang // dza tha~M na chen 'ab sbya// nang pa bde ba'i 'bras bu man// ngag 'dzi nas rno gdun maH
232a5(rnying rgyud): 'gag med pa'i dngos grub kyis// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang srid pa'i phra men rgya mtsho la sogs te ma mo stong
232a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang // lha chen po gnod 'dul la sogs pa g.yung drung lha'i rigs mang po dang / rdo rje gzhon nu ma la sogs te rig 'dzin gyi bud med mar po dang / nI la sogs ste 'jig rten gyi dbang mo che mang po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang chen ma
232a7(rnying rgyud): gus pas yi ngas te/ thar pa'i bde ba yang thob ste/ a la la'i sgra byung nas/ rig 'dzin gyi mtshan du gyur to// he n+yaga'i zhal nas dmod bcug pa'i ledz+ra ste nyer drug pa la/ cho ga rdzogs lung chen po 'di// gang gis rnyed
232b1(rnying rgyud): du su
232b2(rnying rgyud): dang 'thad par sho// bya la gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po/ slob pon rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal dang 'dra ba'i nas bsgrubs pas 'di 'gru ba byar gyur skye ngos gru ba chen pa thob ste/ mr-id pa 'angam can thams cad bran bzhin sh+tsa te/ ba ma me
232b3(rnying rgyud): pa las/ gsang ba'i slob dpon ye shes spyan dang ldan pa kun kyang 'dir 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes slob dpon ro lings bde bas gsal bar bshad do// rdzogs lung chen po'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// / gnod 'ardul lha yis yang gsol pa/
232b4(rnying rgyud): mamo'i spyi bskul ji ltar mchis// yang dag / rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo bskul 'di ltar bskul// hUM bas ma 'phrul nor bu rin po che// ma bzhag de ni 'dod dpung the// nang gi rin chen sna lnga la// shrI ya~M lu tra~M nang 'gros dang /
232b5(rnying rgyud): mchod rdzas 'phrul lo tog rgyas par spel// thang cig yud la 'dus tshogs zhing // nyo zer 'dod chags 'phrul mo che// mnyam nyid sbrul rtse ste bzhes// ma gaphel ma g.yel ma yi tshogs// gong gsum stug phran rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// yum gu
232b6(rnying rgyud): rgyamachu ma lus la 'dra// yun ring gong nas bsnyen pa'i zhwa// rtag tu ming dang mtshan nus 'bod ci 'tshal// ma 'da' ma 'da' dram ma 'ad// ma 'phang ma 'phang lha ma 'phang // khyung chen gral gshog rdzogs ma/ kha mkham chog tshog grog
232b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyu// me sdug 'bar ba'i 'gro 'du can// thos ni ni spyan ma sa// byer cing ni gong ma g.yel// 'dris shing ni mgur mkhyen// 'grogs shing ni gzhung ma ngan// ma bdud ltar grags zang // mdu ma rgya 'o dbang mngon// phreng mong brgyan
233a1(rnying rgyud): gdung ma chung // dgra blar bkye na mthu ma chung // gzungs ma rabagyi na brtsam chung // dga' mar bgyis na gdung ma chung // grogs mor bstin gzhung ma ngan// pho nyar bgyis na pad ma thal// bdag cag sems
233a2(rnying rgyud): can las bris mnar ba las// re ltos dpung gnyen khyod las mi bzhugs na// khyod la thugs rje mi mnga' 'am// bdag la g.yar dam ma mchis sam// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten raba'angs na// rnal 'byor ches su slob pa mang yod kyang // ceg
233a3(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i ming po bdag tsam dkon// ma g.yel ma g.yel srung ma 'chags// g.yel du dogs nas rdzas la brten// 'das su dogs nas 'dzab du 'dren// ji ltar dngos grub gnyen po ru// dmar kyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// tsit+ta mang
233a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lhags// mAM sa sha chen phung por spungs// ji ltar gsang chen gnyen po ru// rdzas kyi mchod pa gnyen bkram zhig/ dmar chen dmal gsol ba yi// de tshe khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod
233a5(rnying rgyud): bud med bu ltar dang mthung // dwa phrug srong ltar shed ma chung // dus la bab bo sa ma yA// ma ma d+h+ya d+ho/ ma mo spyi bsngal gyi le'u ste nyer brkyang ba'o// / gzhung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// ma ma gsang chen dkyil 'khor
233a6(rnying rgyud): las// sgrub pa'i rdzas kyi dbang bskur ba// bdag gis nan tan ji ltar bskyed// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// bon cig g.yud drung ya
233a7(rnying rgyud): dag pa// bsgrub pa'i las kyi dbang rnams ni// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ngas gsung ba lanan tan bskyed// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / gzung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// rtse dbang chan pa bdag la // nang dbang
233b1(rnying rgyud): ba bdag pa rdol// gsang dbang chen po bdag la dz+wal// kyi dbang chen pa bdag la tshul// de ska zhus pa gsan nas cas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba// byi nang gsang ba'i dbang rnams ni// nga ye thugs kyi cung
233b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// nga yi thugs kyi gsang rgyud 'di// gting nas bzung nas khyod la gtad// khyod kyis sems la brnag par gyis// lcang lor ldan pa'i d+han+ta 'di// nga yi lag tu gzung nas ni// snod ldan khyod la dbang bskur ro// b+had+d+ha mdzes
233b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bde chen gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// ltag sprod zur gsum bde chen 'dis// ma mo thams cad bsgrub bya'i phyir// bdud rnams zil gyis gnon pa dang // rkyen bdud dbang du bsgre ba'i phyir// sgrol byed chen mo'i
233b4(rnying rgyud): dbang thob shog/ dung chen dag gis dbang bskur bas// snang srid thams cad bsgrags pa bzhin// deng gi yon bdag bu khyod kyang // chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra sgrogs shing // ma mo sgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ zhing chen dag gis dbang bslar
233b5(rnying rgyud): bas// zhing gi khyad par bres pa bzhin// bdud bzhi g.yab kyis bor nas ni// hUM gi me chen 'bar ba yis// bdud bgegs zhi bar bsreg pa bzhin// 'bar byed chen mo'i dbang thob shog/ rnga chen dag gis dbang bsgyur bas// dza ya
233b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba yum gyi dang // shes rab thabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya bskyed nas ni// rnga yi bye brag 'di las byung // gsang ba rnga yi dbang thob shog/ zhing mchog dag gis dbang bskur bas// thor to rgya mdud khro bo brgyad// thugs
233b7(rnying rgyud): kyi sprul pa'i dgra yang 'gyed// sred pa'i rgya mdung gra brgyad la// gsang ba'i ma mo brgyad phyung ste// thugs kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// rtse mo dag gis zur gsum pas// sred pa'i ma mo dbang du sdud// khams gsum thams cad dbang du
234a1(rnying rgyud): srud// zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang ba bzhag/ pa/ sas dbang bslar bas// mam gas can dgyes pa 'an// rnal ging chen pa skad skur bkram// ngaka ma snam ma nan/ mang sgrub pa dang
234a2(rnying rgyud): thob shog/ tshil chen gsur gyis dbang bsrung bas// srid pa thams cad dri snom zhing // dri yi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// gsang ba'i ma mo dril dang // gsung dang dri la snom pa mo// ci ltar gong du btsal ba bzhin// sgrub pa'i las rnam
234a3(rnying rgyud): dbang chen po'i dbang thob shog/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swab+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&ha~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta lA ka badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&ha~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&hi sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa thA
234a4(rnying rgyud): wa At+ma ko&haM/ ma mo gsang chen 'dus pa 'dir// snying po lnga yis dbang bskung bas// de reng phan chad bu khyod kyis// tshe yang shin tu ring ba dang // dngos grub gzi chen thob pa'i phyir// rang rtags gsal ba'i dbang bskur ro// 'di ni ma mo rang
234a5(rnying rgyud): rtags kyi// dbang chen lags so dbang gi mchog/ sgrol ma chen po'i brtul shugs kyis// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa dang // rkyen dbang thabs kyis 'dul ba dang // de phyir gsang chen dkyil 'khor gyud// man ngag bcud kyi don bstan pa//
234a6(rnying rgyud): kya kyi thun mong mi lags te// 'di bstan ga'anal bstan du na// dngon so shes gas pa pa'i du 'gyur// ngo mas chog brten du 'gyur// smon nagabs thazags pas// nas drang chog pa bzhin du 'gyur// don 'jig
234b1(rnying rgyud): te// rang gi sems la bcangs pa na// dngos grub nyid kyang rtag tu thob// mthu dang gzi mdangs thams cad 'phel// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ zhes bka' stsal to// man ngag dbang gi la'u sta nywar dgra pa'o//
234b2(rnying rgyud): gnad 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma mo ngos bzung ji ltar bzung // mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo ngos gzung 'di ltar gzung // sems nyid ma bcos mu kha le// sems las bskyed pa'o ma mo bcu gsum dang // dbying
234b3(rnying rgyud): kyi ma mo bcu bzhi dang // ye shes kyi ma mo nyi shu'o// snang srid kun khyab shu re ma// thugs dam bskang ba'i yum chen lnga// dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i shugs sgrol drug/ dag shul dbang chen ma mo bdun// gnod byed snying gcod srin mo brgyad//
234b4(rnying rgyud): bka' sdod blon mo chen mo dgu// yang gab dbang gi rgyal mo bzhi// sems las bskyed pa'i ma mo bzhi// dam la gnas pa'i sring mo bzhi// yid la gzhung pa'i mdza' mo bzhi// lus la bskyed pa'i bu mo bzhi// ma mo kun gyi gtso mo bzhi// bdud
234b5(rnying rgyud): rtsi sgrub pa'i rgyal mo bzhi// phur bu sgrub pa'i blon mo bzhi// ma mo thun gyi bdag mo bzhi// las la gshin pa'i bran mo bzhi// dar dbug 'phrog lha mo bzhi// ma mo ca khro bdag mo bzhi// dgra bo'i snying phrog lha mo bzhi// kun gzhi gnas gyur gcig
234b6(rnying rgyud): ma// gling bzhi dbang sgyur grags mo rgyal// stong gsum dbang bsgyur tsa dza shwa re ma// dgra bo dbang bsgyur dpal ldan re ma ti// 'jig rten dbang chen dman mo'i tshogs// gshin rje'i lham mo nyi shu gcig// las mkhan ma mo brgyad bcu gcig/
234b7(rnying rgyud): byang shar mtshams kyi srid gcig ma/ thugs kyi sprul pa nag mo bdun cho ga nag mo nyi khri'i tshogs/ sku yi sprul pa dkar mo bdun tshogs dkar mo ni khri'i tshogs// gsung gi sprul pa dmar mo bdun tshogs dmar mo nye khri'i tshogs/ yon tan gyi mamo ser reg bdu
235a1(rnying rgyud): chags par nag ge 'i tshugs/ min las khyim masbyang nag bdanachags spang nag N+DI khri'i tshogs// mamangs gzung gi lasasas ma thu / gsung yos lung gsal pa// rlung med cigs nga/
235a2(rnying rgyud): ma 'jigs la ba kyis bka' stsal ba// snang srid theg yang 'di ltar bsdu// de yang gang shen/ yid dang sman gzi dang rnam par shes pa las/ ma mtheg la dgur gsal te/ ma ma ldan gyis rdzogs pa'i theg la dang // zhag gnas kyi cig me dang /
235a3(rnying rgyud): sa ma lung gi thig la dang // ma mo sgrub pa'i 'og le dang // ma mo skal ba'i thig la dang // ma mo thabs kyi thig le dang / ma ma shes rab kyi theg le dang / mam sku gsung thugs kyi theg le dang / ma ma byang chub sems kyi theg pa'o// kun rnam pa
235a4(rnying rgyud): zhig le zhes kyang bya/ grong yangs pa'i thig le zhes kyang bya/ brjod du med pa'i thig le zhes kyang bya/ ma nor ba zhes kyang bya/ gtan la 'bebs pa zhes kyang bya/ ma btsas pa zhes kyang bya/ rgyu rkyen med pa zhes kyang bya/ ma 'gags pa zhes kyang bya/
235a5(rnying rgyud): macad par gnas sa// ma mo sdang srid mig la 'i la Ta stes gcigs ste// slad srung byung shor rtsa rgyud ces bya brtags sa// garlabs nam mkha'i snying bas bsgyud cing thas te gtan labab pa'o/ can kyi ma// bcom ldan 'das dpa
235a6(rnying rgyud): bdang pa latheg 'tshal la// ldan 'das pa'i dus mabyung ba'i ldan lan/ mang pabams cad byamams panamyangan las dar bami/ tham ca pa'i byeng dengasams dpas thas pa/ dajas pas dpas yang gsul pa dang / 'jig rte pa
235a7(rnying rgyud): cad bya dang sa du/ gyi ma ga / rdzag na gas pag / ga gsagapas rgya na sa/ cagags sus pa da
235b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig tan can bzang thong // bzad kyi 'jig rten sangs rgyas bya// byin ldad bzung rnam par dag/ rtag chad mtha' gnyis mya ngan 'dus// gsung drungs yis yang gsal pa// snyan pa rnam gsum gang la ba gyi// spang ba rnam gsum ga /
235b2(rnying rgyud): bgyi// gnas zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// gnas la nges pa du zhig mchis// dus zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// dus la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ston pa rnam gsum
235b3(rnying rgyud): shes sku// sdung pa rnam gsum rig pa'i gter// 'pho 'gyur med pas gnas zhes bya// yang dag don rtogs dus zhes bya// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// lha la rnam pa du zhig mchis// 'khor la rnam pa du zhig mchis// lung la
235b4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// lha la rnam pa gsum du bstan// 'khor la rnam pa gsum du bstan// lung la rnam pa gsum du bstan// rdo rje sems dpas yang gso
235b5(rnying rgyud): pa// rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags// lung zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// man ngag zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rgyud ces bya ba 'brel pa'i don// lung zhes bya ba ston pa'i bka'// man dag ces bya la
235b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// yum gyi dbyings zhes gang la bgyi// yab kyi mkha' zhes gang la bgyi// / blang dor med pa gang gis 'grub// 'khor ba gnas 'di mi 'tshal na// klong zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// nyon cig g.yus
235b7(rnying rgyud): rung yang dag pa// 'du 'bral med pa yum gyi dbyings// skye 'chi med pa yab kyi mkha'// thang dor med pa bde chen grong // bde ba chen po'i don rtogs na// blang dor med pa de yi 'grub// gnyis med don rtogs de yi rang // rdo rje sems
236a1(rnying rgyud): dpas yang gsol pa// chos nyid rtag pa'i g.yung drung la// sems nyid don gyi la dor na// rtog pa'i lta ba la dor ro// don sems dpas pang gsol ba// ma zhes partsi ba gang ni dbyi sa// mazhes bgyi ba gang sa
236a2(rnying rgyud): slong // ma mo'i gtan tshig ji ltar lags// 'byung ba lnga po gang las grub// sangs rgyas m+b+ha nyid gang las grub// bde ba chen po'i nga nyid las// rgya gyen gnyis kyis bskyed lags na// 'byung ba gnyis kyang nga nyid las// 'di la 'thol
236a3(rnying rgyud): mchis lags sam// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// che bas che ba'i zab mo 'di// che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub// ma dang mo yi don rtogs na// ma song ba na nges par thob// yid bzhin nor
236a4(rnying rgyud): la // she ci la dang bas shing / chen pa lnga ya nga nyid du// bam byed ma thas sa sa nusan/ dung ban kyil 'dza ngas basbyin paskyed/ ga dbang rkyen lung bgams pa sas na da 'dud brdzus
236a5(rnying rgyud): dgra dgu bco brgyad phyag skye zhabs kyang brgyad du bstan// min dag 'dzu ba tsugs drug gis don rnams tshang bar ston// rdo rje sems dpas pang gsol ba/ sems can dus min 'tsho ba rnams// dri la zlod naji ltar bzo// bkang ba'i gnas pa
236a6(rnying rgyud): legs// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol bu gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can dus min 'chi ba de// bskang ba'i gnas lnga 'di rnams so// hUM sdang srid thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga
236a7(rnying rgyud): dus gsum bde gshegs yum gyi grong nas bskyed// dbus kyi che mchog sgra dang gnyis med bzhugs// mu mapar khyab pa'i thugs dam bdag slong na// thugs dam bad+mo ng+ga nas dbang dang dngos grub stsol// sher phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi gaH
236b1(rnying rgyud): dbyings lhag mi byud ma// bsang bskal pa'i thags dam bya dang // gags dan men rigs kyig tu// ngan can byings phyag mi byed pa// bkrung po bskul ba'i thugs dam dran du/ chub phyogs parna dgas phyin // bad+mad kyi byu/
236b2(rnying rgyud): mi byed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bzang // byang rdzogs las da rigs kyi ho tso// las kyi dbyings rgyug mi byed mya/ bskang po bskal ba'i thugs dem bskang // dbyings kyi mchen brgyad rnams dang // yul gyi phreng ma brgyad nam
236b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskar// bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing // lca gu khyud la 'gal byed dang // sems can kun la gnod byed pa'i/
236b4(rnying rgyud): rtag tu gdug pa'i sems 'chang rnams// lus sems so sor dpral ba'i phyir// lha dang dbye ba ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de srad gsol pa gas na nas kyang // ngo mtshar lha yis bka 'gyel po/
236b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa gtan po 'dig byed cing // was rbad la 'ag 'a byed dade// sanas can kun lagan byed pa'i// sdug tu gtsug pa'i sems 'tsha nams/ rgyas sems sa skyid drag ba'i byer// hA ba las rnams ngas btad te/
236b6(rnying rgyud): g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'go ba'i lha dang phral ba'i phyir// b+ha ro gzug pa'i gyang cal// ma ding nr-i yi yi ge shrI// me ba rkang gi theg pas sbyin// shog shog gru bzhi tshon ro lA// lha dang mi yi ming bris la// tshon phrad lnga lngas byu
236b7(rnying rgyud): ngadu rtsa dur bcug nas ni// 'og gi phyin phyogs dag tu bstan// ngu renas pas nang du bsdum// maN+Dam mi dang gyis zing // ma rjes pa'i theg pas ba cing // 'da' ra ba ti'i rgyas pas gdags// par ma ti'i drabs gtsu// blo /
237a1(rnying rgyud): labatag nan ga/ sa tang mags// N+Dal ma lhags smras pa// na sa rgyabs 'ju// cang ta la ma bas 'das/ thab kyi mal du gnags/ mal tA ma nanas zug/
237a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i snying po bzlas// rnar nyan tha ma'i gzugs zis la// lha dang mi yi bar du gzug/ mA ra Na yi sngags kyis dbye// mtshon tshwa'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// gzugs kyi bar du brdeg par bya// rak+sharu pa'i sngags kyis gdas// lcags
237a3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// ang+ku sha yi sngags kyis drangs// zhags pa'i phyag rgya gnyis bcing la// pA shaM hUM gi sngags kyis bcings// lcags rlog phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// sgo Tab kyi sngags kyis bsdam// dril bu'i phyag rgyag
237a4(rnying rgyud): bcings la// g+har+Ne ho yi sngags kyis spar// bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms te// po nya drug cus rten la dbab// gong gi las rnams sbyar la bya// des ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// des ni mtshan ma ma byung na// 'da' ra pa ti'i sog
237a5(rnying rgyud): pa la// mal ti yi khrag gis bris// gdang ta ga na'i dong du gzhug/ che mchog yang yum bsgoms nas ni// sman mo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gdab// sgrub pa'i phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// nye 'byed kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
237a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpas yang gsol pa/ dmachog 'das pa'i sngags rjer dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma'i thal ba dang / rje dras por g.yos pa 'o// ngan rdzogs rdzu 'dral ltar klog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag tan 'tshal/ den dag

238a5(rnying rgyud): yi snying po bri// pargya chen po 'dab brgyad la// phyogs bzhir khros pa'i dbang rtsen paskyed// mtshams bzhir gsang bu'i lu che ba ni dpyod// phyogs gzhir phyag rgya zin pa ban// gnyis la thod phreng rgya mtsho ga nyis// gcig la tsho mo snying po//
238a6(rnying rgyud): NA m+bu mdan gyis sbyar// dkyil ma 'i phyi'i n+dar+tha// bab shes brgyad kyang dgod pa // rko ba zhi ga thu ba bzhi pang dpyod/ ma chen mar mthun byig kya// mi byed tshogs pa'i rjes rnams la/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btabal ba zhag
238a7(rnying rgyud): spyi yi phyag rgya brtsod/ A bya ba'i sngags kyis gdab// dngos grub rtags dang sbyar nas na// gso bskyed bzlas shing bstim par bya// sgrub pa'i 'a'u lda // rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa/ zin za spyod pa nyams pa dang /
238b1(rnying rgyud): dpa' ba'i reg le nyams pa dang // las de slad la klog pa'i phyir// nyug gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal ba// las de skur yar zlog par phyir// nges pa'i man gangs brtan gyi/ ton cigag sung drang nga

239a1(rnying rgyud): la// nA snru pa n-i// ga r+dz+dza/ da bang // gas 'ang sun sa na stug/ / rgyas mas na sa/ dan na da

240a2(rnying rgyud): le'u bzang sme'u dgra yi rkyen// rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis brgyan// ma hA shan+ti gzhung bzhin brjod// pho rigs rnams la gzhung bzhin pazo// de nas gzhung bzhin bsngos pa dang // sol ba'i dong gyi gsum gyi nang du grad d+hi gan tu mnan pa/
240a3(rnying rgyud): dgra gang yin pa'i gzugs sog la bris le kha srub tu mu nan te/ de'i steng du rdo rgya gram gyis mnan no// de nas dgra bo'i ming bris te/ 'odod pos la gtad do// las myur du 'grub bo// skrag rgod la dpag bsam shing gi gzugs byas la/

240b7(rnying rgyud): brji du'i sa kyi ma// blo rigs kyib labs gta ci 'as rgyal pani/ yo rdzog rje la rgyang 'byung chubs 'ad pa gsu ro// da'agro lagata pa'i rnams// grags pa gan nung bdu rangs ni/ te rtsa gnyis brgyang
241a1(rnying rgyud): drag po'i dan sngags bdun po ni// chu srin gre bar rin chen song ba bzhin// bskal par yang ni mI btang ngo // rmongs la 'chal bas byin gyur na// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bskal pa bdun du brlag par 'gyur//
241a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol ba// ma mo gsang chen dkyil 'khor du// sgrub pa'i rtsal gyis dbang bskur ba// bdag gis nan tan ji ltar bskyed// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal/
241a3(rnying rgyud): de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// bsgrub pa'i las kyi dbang rnams ni// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// ngas gsung pa la nan tan bskyed// ces bka' stsal pas//
241a4(rnying rgyud): g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// byi dbang chen po bdag la stsol// nang dbang chen po bdag la sgrol// gsung dbang chen po bdag la stsol// spyi dbang chen po bdag la stsol// de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka'
241a5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rnams ni// nga yi rgyud kyi thugs la gnas// nga yi thugs kyi gsang rgyad ni// gting nas gzungs la khyod lag da// khyod kyi sems la brnag par gyis// lcang lor bcas pa'i b+har+N+Na 'di// du yi lag tug
241a6(rnying rgyud): nas ni// stong ldan khyod la dbang bskur ro// b+han+ta mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bde chen gsang ba'i dbang bsgyur ba// lhag spod zur gsum bde chen 'dis// ma mo thams cad bsgrub bya'i phyir// bdud rnams thams cad zil gyis gnon// rkyen drug
241a7(rnying rgyud): dbang du bsdu rgyur// sbrul byang dag gis dbang thob shog/ drung chen dag gis dbang bskur bas// sngang srod thams cang bsgrags pa bzhin// deng gi yon padag tu khyod kyang // chos kyi dbyings kyi bu sgrogs nog/ ma 'o sgrub pa'i dbang thobashog
241b1(rnying rgyud): deng chen dag gis dbang bskur bas// ring gi khyad par bres pa bzhin// bdud bzhig yab kyis bor nas ni// tsug mtshan 'bar ba yis// bdud bgegs ni 'du thigs du bzhin// 'bar byed chen pa'i dbang tho' shog/ rnga tshan dag gis dbang bsgyur ba //
241b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba yum gyi ngang // shes rab thabs kyi sgra sgrogs pas// thabs kyi phyag rgya bskyod nas ni// nga yi bye brag 'di las byung // gsang ba rnga yi dbang thob shog/ zhing mchog dag gis dbang bskur bas// thor tho rgya mdud khro bo brgyad// thugs kyi sprul pa'i grwa yang 'gyed//
241b3(rnying rgyud): sked pa'i rgya mdud gra brgyad la// gsang ba'i ma mo brgyad phyung zhing // thugs kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// rtse mo dag ni zur gsum la// srid pa'i ma mo dbang dubasdu// khams gsum thams cad dbang du sbed// zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang thob shog/ 8
241b4(rnying rgyud): mAM sa sa dbang bskur bas// ma mo gsang chen dgyes pa 'dir// sgrol ging chen po skar ltar bkram// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho mtsho ltar rlabs// ma mo sgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ tshil chen gsur gyis dbang bskur bas// srid pa thams cad dri snom zhing // dri yi
241b5(rnying rgyud): mchod pa dam pa 'dis// gsang ba'i ma mo dri la dang // gsung dang dri la snom pa mo// ji ltar gong du bcol ba bzhin// bsgrub pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa bzhin// las kyi dbang rnams bslabs nas ni// dpa' bo chen po'i spyan sU ru// 'khwa ldog bran ltar
241b6(rnying rgyud): mi byed cing // sems kyi dag pa nyer bzhag cing // ma mo'i las dbang 'di bsku bas// sgrub pa'i bran po bran mo bzhin// las dbang chen po thob par shog/ sarba ta thA ka ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko ts+yai/ sarba ta thA ga tatsit+ta badz+ra swadz+ra ya ga hU~M da ha~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta wAka
241b7(rnying rgyud): swa b+hA Sh+Ta At+ma kan te/ sarba ta thAg ta prA tsa badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko hu~M/ sarba ta~M thA ga ta a nu rag badz+ra swa b+hA wa A ko&ha~M/ ma mo gas tshan 'dus pa 'dir// snying po lnga yis dbang bsrung bas// de ring lan chad kyi khyod kye// tshe yang shin tu ring ba dang /

242a2(rnying rgyud): dab 'das kyis 'dul ba dang / 'gags sa ched kyi 'khoras// mun gaskyed kyir ni bstan pa// bran kyi thun po smralag ste/ sa du gzhanas bab gangs// sa pan pam mig pa 'du 'gyur/ ngan 'byas pa'i
242a3(rnying rgyud): nas ngan tshogs pa bzhin du 'gro// don 'di gzhan lam phral te// rang gi sems li 'chang bas// dngos phrab dam kyang drug tu thog// mthu dang gzo brjid thams cad 'di'o// dngos brab chen patho ba par 'gyur// ces bka 'gyel te// man ga

242a6(rnying rgyud): mi dam chad/ bkang spang las kya dran mi / yang dgadra ni rgyal kyi na/ ma sa las kyis shis ma ni// dede sa gnas pa'i nyis pa'o// ming la gzhang pa'i ma ni pa'i zab /

243a1(rnying rgyud): rgyag skad du/ A \u0f7f brjod ThA lI tha na ma sa T+Ta dang / bdag du/ 'phags par rje nag ma bang sdug sa zhes bya ba'i sngags kun gyi rgyal ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthan rdzogs kyi thal po la phyag 'tshal ma
243a2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po la thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bzhugs gnas/ yum rdo rje mu kha le ma'i b+ha ga rnam par dag pa'i dbyings na bzhugs so// gzhan ya
243a3(rnying rgyud): las me gzhan pa'i 'khor/ thig le'i chos mthar thug pa'i ngang nas sprul pa/ sdang srid kyi bdag mo chen mo sdod bcud la dbang sgyur ba 'byung ba'i thul mo la dang / ye shes chags kye ma mo bcu bzhi dang / dman mo ltar sdang ba lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dang /

243b1(rnying rgyud): dang khrag gi dri tshor na/ mthan gcig la dpag tshad btud khrir rgyug par byed pa'i srin mo chen mo dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang / e ka tsa tid mod pa'i mtshon cha can dang / dmag gi rgyal mo dmed pa'i mtshan ma can dang / ma bdun sring bzhi mod pa'i mtshan
243b2(rnying rgyud): cha can dang / bdag mo dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang / ma bedun gnod sbyin dpon g.yog dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang / bdud mo gnod sbyin spun gsum dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang / dus kyi zhags pa dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang / de la sogs te pri

243b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud gnyis su mngon par sprul te/ gsong ba'i bdag po nyid kyi rgyung ni/ don dam pa 'dri bar gyur to// srim mo chen mo'i rgyud ni/ nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zil mo sbyang te/ dbang tshong bar gyur to// de nas macom ldan 'das mngon thogs rgyal
244a1(rnying rgyud): bas/ sus kyi rtag la gsung ba'ing rda ba zlas pa / nye zla'i steng du gnas thal gyi ma gyur te/ nyid gca gyur ba rnams/ snyam pa dang dbang ma gnyis kyis drang / ga d+ha/ ba

246a1(rnying rgyud): 'og grwa yul du 'das pas thu rigs bzhis 'jug ta ba sar te/ rgyal rigs ni phrag dog rgyus/ rnga rigs ni 'dod chags byung par mdzang / bra mtha'i rigs na bsra par mthong / rigs nganan shin

246a7(rnying rgyud): gam du 'ong du ma 'dod do/ phag rdzi dang 'chos pas/ nal bu btsas par gyur te/ rgya mtshor ldeb tu phyin pas/ tshe'i nang du e ka tso ta ma'i zhal mdzod/ de nas e ka tsa ti la dbang nas te/ e ka tsa tis tsho bas snga ma'i gnas

246b3(rnying rgyud): kha po rbad/ gzhan yang / e ra tsan me tse ra tra li ta Shi tsi t+ta mA ra ya/ tsa thang tsa thang / thang mu le thang mu le/ dza li tA'i srog rbang zad/ mr-i nAM la sogs pa'i dkod pa gong ma dang mthun par dmos te/ gzhan yang ni dun ta
246b4(rnying rgyud): drang tsha la ni ha na badz+ra/ du mar badz+raT/ nA ga rAg/ kyi mthog kyi ma tsa/ na mar tig na mAr ting // tso tsan mar tig/ ces lha dang ska ma yin dang / gru la sogs pa'i dazod pa rang spags te/ de yang mi'i rigs la rgyu ga

246b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra bon gnas/ mtshan mo ni ra khrod 'a sogs pa nyul bas/ rnal 'byor pas kyang gnas de lta bur bya/ 'dag dang rdzogs pa'i 'bor martsod cing rten 'di rdza ni/ lage nag po skye ka la 'dre' bcang / nang drang shal lta ba

247a2(rnying rgyud): thig srung bya/ snying gis gtor ma'i dbus b+ha/ glo ba dang mkhal ma dang mtshon pas mtha' byas te bzhag/ gzhan yang nal bu'i rkang gis gling thaH/ skad ni bu rba rU pu ru ru zer/ thod pa ltag spyod kyi rgal zhing gi pags pas g.yogs byas pa/
247a3(rnying rgyud): rnam nang gis rjong / ska ni cing cing tig nga cang drag rnyer/ nal bu'i ba dag gnyis po sdus bya/ dani bu tog zla tu ra// rnam ga gnyis la na lang bya/ skaduni thog thogasang dag ga zag ci thug zer ro//
