253a3(rnying rgyud): bsti bsgrub sgos sgrub kyi// sa kyi na ya rtsi ba ni// sngags tshur dgra po dag la yang // zlog mar bcu bzhi de 'og dgra// de 'og bdun te bcwa drug rdzo// wab bdun te drug bajug/ bdun drug bdun ldan brgyad pa'o// dgra pa de nyid
253a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag ldan// thog ma lnga ste de 'og bdun// gsum pa bdun te de 'og brgya// dang po lnga pa gnyis pa bdun// gsum pa bdun te bzhi pa lnga// thog ma lnga ste gnyis pa lnga// gsum pa lnga ste bzhi pa drug/ lnga pa brgyad du grags pa'o//
253a5(rnying rgyud): rdog ma brgya gcig gnyis pa lnga// gsum pa drug skye bzhi pa drug/ lnga bdag kyang de dang ldan// mjug la mA ra ya Sh+TA na pa gdags// 'phags pa rdo rje nag mi dbang phyug ma'i sngags rgyud kyi rtse bye bo las/ thun sngags sgrib pa dang / nam
253a6(rnying rgyud): bcoM pa'i long+ga sna drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byub// drag go las kyi bya ba bshad// oM ni ye shes lnga ldan pa'o// ru n+ya kIng+gi ris dbang bskur ba// sre gnyis kyi 'og tu legs// ro Tasatwa brgyad dang ldan/
253a7(rnying rgyud): oM // rab pa gcig sa'i byag kyi min// sa thug ma ste gnyis// gsang pa'i ma bdun gi yog da sa // ma myong zhes// ti'i 'thun du rgya // dkyil la bor rje ma na drin// sngon na
253b1(rnying rgyud): mamyong srog sngags te// dbang phyug ldan ru ru srin mo chu ba'i nang / ro rba rab tu tsha ba'i nad// tsa pa la ni bslab mi ste// ma myo bdun ni a shwag ste// d+h+r-i zhes thams cad sud byed du// b+h+yo zhes thams cad las la sdud// na
253b2(rnying rgyud): dza yis yang dag 'bugs// gnyis pas bslab kyi'i ngo bo gugs// rgyal ba rnams kyis byin brlab pa// sngags de dang por bzla bar bya// A~M dang tsa pa la zhes te// oM shug me dang mi zhes sme// gnyis te swA hA gzhig par bya/
253b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga ste u e e// sa swa wa ste nyin mo dang // nub mo drag dang zhi ba bzlas// zhi bangs/ yi ge dgu la rtsa ba'i sngags// oM drang badz+ra kha rag snying kha rag/ thag sha tsa mu na tsaka sha zhes// yaM ge lde dang dza lA me// sa nyaM ma~M sti ta la mA/

253b6(rnying rgyud): I sti ta la me// srog dang AM u u uste// e ka tsa tI yang rje mo// dzag raka sha snying khrag snying // b+h+yo zhes ta mes snanya// de la mi stau ba la me// sa nyi mi smon bzhin srog/ mtha' can re ma ti yi sngags// sU te sU ta b+h+yo las/
253b7(rnying rgyud): yis de spras gnyis te srog/ khri sprin drag po'i sngags zhes pa// sha sha rdzag dang shA rbeg ces// ta gnyis mdzes mtshan rjerba rnam// drag mo drag pa snying rjeg ces// mdza tu snying dag tal mdzes// oM ta me saM hr-i //
254a1(rnying rgyud): nan smra/ sa/ nasun / su smra// smra// su/
254a2(rnying rgyud): drug dril la bzlas// dag spyod la sogs kun lang \u0f7f// de rjes lding dag pa shad rnag// ma maHga dang rag shA zhes// de nas muH pa rba hA// ta ne k+Sha tA rjes rnas pa// u s+yet+ta la gang bzhin me// sran sa pa zhes//
254a3(rnying rgyud): der phyog cu 'bras// b+h+yotra~M g+h+ring+ges ma ga rgya rtags// srog gnyis par dru u ma~M/ dzag rag sha ba r+par+d+ha zhes// ta ma mran ti yang ma// dza ti ste ga sha mo// nas sogs sa brdzun// namadu sten 'og
254a4(rnying rgyud): dum khon su mos mtshan// hU~M zhe kha la rag sha brjod// sa la taste yis smras pa// rbang ga tubs bcad sngags u dang ldan// tsik+Sh+Na zhes mi ai ldan// khal gri gyis snying khrag ces// swaste la sa ris mtshan//
254a5(rnying rgyud): hA// de la med pa kha la mes smras pa'o// has run gyi zhes pa// u gsumagang dus la mes// mi pa ny+tsa ma ste/ mi u gnyis// du bu bra buM zhes pa// drug su maM skabs sus pa me// dum lan yang 'jug pa ste// moganyis kyi
254a6(rnying rgyud): midzin par bya// si mra na dang sa mal// thibs thibs la shar yang ngas srid// ya ya sa d+d+him+b+ha nA~M// a~M mra oM gsu mA I hA ldan// ma s+thA r+tha mA ta yi sa mdzes// slong ldan sngags man par bshad// ma ma ma chu thibs thibs nas//
254a7(rnying rgyud): i rje man rgyas// tha ma thung dag pa shab sa// sal ni skye ldan// ma zhes pa// oM sa e me rkyen ldan// de bdegag cig mang ma ma sa// me yis brgyan pa legs par bya// gnyis rtag pa
254b1(rnying rgyud): tam// radag da pa la// gnam mangs kyi da nga lugs srog zlog// thun pa la dral sa// 'jog sasas stug/ dab ma mal mas// mang u wAn// bdun pa na mju chung rjod// dpa rdzun ma canaH
254b2(rnying rgyud): mA ya thanam gi dgas// grong rtsag cig bla na sngags yin/ bai ti badz+ra badzod tat+ta badz+ra byes/ dza n+de ye dang dz+ra mI mi/ ta mi brgyan snyoms smras pa'o// bajim nyim te zhes// me m-i mi a mis smras// nag la rnag pa/
254b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis steng du brgyan pa'o// sum+b+ha le dang sam+ba le// Am mra es brgyan du bya// tsan ye con ma zhes pa ni// mi i gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o// le na yang len yang zhes pa yang // e es steng nas mtshan pa bya// nga shang dang la sha/
254b4(rnying rgyud): oM ai gnyis dang ldan pa'o// mdzangad mdzu b+h+yo// zhes u A brog dang ldan mam// brgya nga bcu brdzun gcig ldan pa// rgong drug dang khrag dang thun// thams cad kun la sngags pa yin// 'phags pa rdo rje dag mo dbang phyug ma

255a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// hatrang dang ni mi d+de tAng // ru u d+huta me gnyis// a mra i zhes yi ga digra// brgyad kyi rna mar srog cung byung // bsgral ba'i sngags te sbyar bar bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bod dang rbang dang bsad dpa'i sngags/
255a4(rnying rgyud): rbagwa rag sha dang me tra ya// snying kha rag ma \u0f7f zhes// ta me gnyis te dbus sasra// sa sA hA ste de la mi// ma mo skyog snying gnyis mtha' can// zad sngags yi ge bcu gnyis pa'o// dzagar k+sha dang khwa mya rba// rA su ru lu hU~M
255a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis de dbus sus// sa pa'i la ma can// rang zlogs ba drug sum pa'o// rig mo tI sam tsas ngas s+ho// oM e mra dang ma thog/ dekri dang ldan par ba shad pa'o// rgyal ma sum // u bzhi mye srog rje rna
255a6(rnying rgyud): drug dag shid jug// mang dag sa// rtags sto byas sus// mamo par byargya mes sbas/ y+r-ig bcu gnyis gsang ba'o// rkyes byab pa skye zhes// khyis tha rdzun padzin// bong ba des kyi'i gsang sngags so/

255b2(rnying rgyud): sai sh-i pra shi zhes// sa rlung gA zhes pa shad pa ni// mi gsum pal la 'og legs// u smras pa dgra par bshad// lo shib pa rag bshang dang // nad na rdzo sti ma yi bcang // pra li hA smras de yang dgra// du na ser rnams na
255b3(rnying rgyud): baH/ oM a~M ha las ma mdzes// yi ge khyedun pa dag chu bshad/ byudugs pa rdo rje nag mo bang phyu pa'i sngags rgyud smras/ bod pa dang / tha dang / bai sa~Mng pa dang / kha nas rgyun gyi la ji ste ba ba'o//
255b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad rdug/ spyan drang mchod dang chog ldan// snying po 'di yis bya bye ba sgyad // rlug N+Di la~M ma mdzad b+h+yo// spyan rje 'o// d+h+rU mI ga yong sa rlom la ta // / dag sha ma'i gram pad+mas ma
255b5(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'o// ma ma kA lIs te ku mu lu ha harba/ mAM sa khA hi/ rakrA ShA ti/ bAny+tsa sarba taSh+Tha hi/ mchod pa'o// ma ma stog khrag tshol bdun ti na ts+tshan+ti/ las bcol ba'o// trag dag sha ma hi dran ts+tsha/ ma hA ya ka sha tig rdzaka 'a
255b6(rnying rgyud): khyer/ srog snying du shes par bya'o// rag mo rig mo ma mdun ting her ma hed b+h+yo// rjod pa'o// dA dzA kA n+da na rbad/ snying khrig tshal ba rbad/ gzu rad/ mugs thugs rbad/ snyig rdzag la rdung / tshal bus na si du ng+ga/
255b7(rnying rgyud): srog la zad/ phru pa gdab pa'i sngags so// rbad du nga du nang du lag mo song cig sod cig rnaM chum po'i nang / chung ngu bsgral ba'i snying zi // traka sha muH sbyid par ga Na ts+tsha// mdun ma gnyer ba'o// yang tsunam/ la na/

256a2(rnying rgyud): gtad cing ma nan pa bshad/ pha mes rjod par ming dang a// khar nag dag gis dkris byas la// ral thebs na tho tshom med// wa kA ma ka me shwa rag ka kha ha ha Na l+r-i \u0f7f/ de nas thod pa'i dngo po de// bco lnga lo na nas de bzhin du/
256a3(rnying rgyud): khang dur khrod pham po che// de dag tu ni kun na bar bya// ma mo las byed ma brlab na// zhing shan dag la gzugs byas la// gzugs de brdungs shing dbrug sngags bzlas// dza dza le he his mAl snying khyer // de dag de bzhin bzlas kyi dang /
256a4(rnying rgyud): la ya na brjod par byas// 'phags pa rdo rje cheg mo dbang phyug ma'i sngags rgyung las/ mchod pa las kyi mda'u byung bstan pa'i le'u spyi dgu pa'o// / de nang yang dag bshang bya ba// spyod pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ni// gnyis med lta bas sa
256a5(rnying rgyud): bcad de// spyod pa chen po la do rag/ 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// rtogs na de gnyis ga la srid// rtog pa log pas gnyis sdang ste// de la mi mos log rtogs can// rang la dzin byeng 'dul ba'i sems// bstan pa sgrar 'dengs da
256a6(rnying rgyud): byed pa// de yos 'khor ba'i ngan 'gror lhung // thags rje chen pos bskal bar d+hi// de lta bu yi bsnun pa dang // ldan na sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// de yi ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas// shin tu gdug pa'i zhe sdang can// ji srid 'di ni gsad par bya/
256a7(rnying rgyud): ridag yin nas// na chen sa rtogs 'khrul pa'i sems// zhe sol ba'i sdong po 'dra// de nyid 'khor ba'i g.yengasar sbyang // gzhan yang phra mo'i sgru ba ni// spyod la makun dum 'khrul bar// bdag nyid mngon rdzogs rgyal por bsti// g.yon gnas/
256b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad yum du blta// g.yas gnas ral gcig phyag rgyar blta// mdun gnas thams cad ma mo gsum// bka' lung nyan cing las byed blta// rtsi shing nags tshal la sogs kun// thams cad ma mo'i tshigs su blta// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo// longs spyod tshogs su
256b2(rnying rgyud): snang ba kun// thams cad ma mo'i rdzas su blta// snod kyi jig rten gzhal yam khang // bcud du gnas pa 'bor tshogs blta// steng na zhing chen ga yang gzhi'i tshogs// 'og na phrag gi rgya mtsho klong // bar ne kai rus brtsegs par blta// spyod lam kun tu blta bar bya// 'phags pa rdo rje nag mo'i sngags
256b3(rnying rgyud): gyad las lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzhan yang spyod pa bstan pa ni// longs spyod mi khrag sha la rlom// nal bu'i tshil dang sha dang rkang // bris spu'i g.yas g.yon kun tu yang // sgros kyi ne bu na 'grib par bya// mdo ba dre'u rta zhon par nus// bud med tshul du la ba chu
256b4(rnying rgyud): gno// sor tshigs phreng ba 'bral mi b+ha// na chung gzhon pa'i mgo lpags gon// mi dbang mar me ba lhams rgyas la// bris s+yA de yi mtha' ma ru// 'gro dang 'dug dang bskor dang 'bud// rkang gi phreng bu cha mang brdab// gang ba'i d+ha gakyi sla dag kyang // mis ma char bar drag tu zlas// gr-ing dang bu ji bris dag la// ma
256b5(rnying rgyud): par mi bya rgod pa'i rnga// brdud zhing 'du lang lha blang // ngagaso dag pa 'jug pa'i tshe// phyar ba gon la mchi mang byung // gdung ba'i smre sngags 'don par bya// thun la zhing sgra btags pa 'dzin// sha chen dag kyang bza' bar bya// skom na khrag kyang 'thung bar bya// de ltar byas dang glang par 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal
256b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor chen po des// ras chen dag kyang blang byis la// bya gsum tshad byis rem ti// mdog nag mche ga tsig ra la gcig ma// sku la dang seng ge'i rnamachen// rus pa'i phreng ba'i thod chen po// lagA nar rung ba ra krican// gos su mi yi dgas bgon// sAd du de rje meng pos g.yog// steng gas ga ga
256b7(rnying rgyud): su rgya sa sa
257a1(rnying rgyud): bgan// bya mo nag mnan nus ni// g.yas nam dung thogs gdonan de// dzod dbyug sa pa rnyeg pa // det+ta ru yang spyod pa pa so// gzhan ya na pa bul ma ni// shA dang thag dasol la bogs// gtonadab tu na tA ba bya// 'a du
257a2(rnying rgyud): sngags rgyad las spyod lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ni// snying rje dus dang rnam pa ru// chu bo chen po'i rgyan bzhin gyi// lha ni mi smad bla ma bkur// dam 'dres gsang ba'i mchod mi dra/ dman la mi gshe snying rje bskyed// gas
257a3(rnying rgyud): sku dang ting nge 'dzin// spyod lam kun tu rgyun mi gcad// bza' dang btung ba thams cad la// lha la phud 'bul nongs pa bshags// da ma rdzas ma tshang lha mi 'bod// bud med tshogs la smad mi bya// rang gi nyes na dbang mi gzugs// rnal dbyor rnal 'byor thams cad la// dus dang rtag tu smad mi bya// dkon mchog kyi chad
257a4(rnying rgyud): tung du blang // de ltar byas na spyar du 'grub// 'phags pa rdo rje rnag mo dang rgyug ma'i sngags cung pes dmachog brgyan pa'i lethe skye ba cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshid bya ba// re me ti skyed po nagayog gdum// tshes gcig logs gtun pa la// rgyu ste gtor ma sbyin par bya// zla ba gcig

257a6(rnying rgyud): byed na// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs la// ma mo de gsum shes pa gzir// dur khrod ro ras 'khar sil la// ma yi mtha' mar rang snying dri// dur du seng lding lcags skyer kur// kyang shar gtor ma smi na zes rkyo'u rus su zo mas degang // kI la yang ma che mchog gi/ rgyal bskyed de
257a7(rnying rgyud): thug ka paT// grangs med hU~M sa mgrang sa bskor// bsnyen gyis phrer bug yon krung la// shas re gzing ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas// ma 'jig nan de ma// tal res smras der maM/ 'atsun par bya// pa / i bye pa ches mtshan gyi// da mun da bye rdzun/ ngan
257b1(rnying rgyud): ngog rigs// tra nga me ste u ru dbang // yi ge nyi shu bzhi ni// mamo ga sum po gnang 'a khor// 'bum phrag gcig ni zlas pa bya// b+h+rUM phaTanag po'i 'od rjer gyis// srid pa'i ma gsum dbang bsdus te// mar thim nag so ral pa can// tri ma'i go zla mdog dmar can// khro bos dbu mnan mdangs bkrag rdzo// kla
257b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya/ s+t+waM zhes mats+tshe ta sa spras pa// de pa wa ldan a aM ste// thig na na sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes// ta la mes te steng du i// sa la ti ste de la wa// de steng o ai ldan par bya// yi ge bcu bzhi de dag ni// phur btab bdud rtsi blud pa yin// dza dza ri ma ti dza zhes// e i mdzes pa gong ni sgra dra// dbug+h+ra d+hu D+Da ni
257b3(rnying rgyud): a dadA sngag sa u// da yis swA pa Na yis sgras// rtsa rgyun de ni slong bya// ra sA ha ster l-ig/ de la us sAms sA tra// daM pa i t+te mthar ma srog/ raklo/ har hu dun d+ho// o um ste thamar srog/ rag mo kA kyi byo zhes// o u i srog gnyis mtha'// rtsa bdun sngags kyi phreng ba ste// thod par 'bogs pa'i las byan /
257b4(rnying rgyud): dpa'ang 'jig par 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje nag mod pa phyug ma'i sngags byung la sa shes bstan pa'i le'u ste ba rje bzhi pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenangos rgya ga ma rje sogs pa'i khor 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzen rdzogs kyi rgyal po dang ral pa gcig mang bstod pa/
257b5(rnying rgyud): so tshar mngon rdzogs che// e ma hoHsangs rgyas kun gyi skye// 'ab rang chen po'i gar dgu yis// don byed rang bzhin khyod la 'dud// e ma e maya mtshan che// sgra ni ri rab babun bstil bzhin// sems can thams cad dbang du sdud// hUM phaT sgra chen khyod la 'dug/ e na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// shin tu zad pa rgya
257b6(rnying rgyud): gtid// nyon mongs thams cad sreg par byed// mi ga zugs chen khyod la 'dud// e ma dpa' ldan dang gcig ma// ya mtshan chen mo dngub zu dun// rkyen ni lnga bcug mi ldan byu ni ru mgyu bzhi ste// shin du 'jig pa'i drug mtshan can// srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dul byed ma// 'jig rten rnams ni
257b7(rnying rgyud): la bdod// thugs rje che la phyag 'tshang 'dud// ces bstod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes bu yi per gyur te// 'phags rdo rje ni rmo dang rgyun ma'i sngags rgyud las/ bstod ci rje su yid dra ba'i le'u ste bco lde 'o// // rdzogs so//
258a1(rnying rgyud): dang sno kya // de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pa lag na rjes mngo rdzogs rgyal po pa 'di skad ces gso // sangs rgyas na rgyu thugs bya la cag/ hA ga ces phyag padang// dam cag tu rma
258a2(rnying rgyud): sems can don// rdzogs par mdzad la mgos phyag 'tshal// stong nyid dang la ma bzhugs par// bdi chen ma nal nas ci ste bzhugs// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don ched du// the tshom chen po zhu bar 'tshal// de nas he ru ka'i chos nyid la mnal bde las bzhengs te/
258a3(rnying rgyud): byas na don zhes bos nas/ the tsom thams cad khyod kyis dris shig/ ngas bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces smras so// kye kye thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ dbang phyug chen mo'i rgyuda'i don// mdor na tshul ni de ltar bsgrub/
258a4(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gang zhig lags// dam rdzas gang dang gang gis bgyi// mchod pa'i tshul ni ji ltar mchod// srog snying yang dag gang zhig lags// grub pa'i mtshan mji ltar dbyung // thun rnams bskrun ji ltar bsdu// gsad pa'i las ni gang gis
258a5(rnying rgyud): bya// gsang ba'i dus sumatshan ma gang // chu 'khrugs las la ji ltar bslab// ming po gshin rje nag po yi// grub thabs kyang ni bshad par mdzod// bu gcig bdud kyi sgrub thabs kying // thugs rje chen pos bshad par 'tshal// khyod ni gnod sbyid rjes
258a6(rnying rgyud): thab// de yang dbang pos bshad du gsol// de la dab 'a byos bka' yul pa// dbang thug nag mo'i dkyir 'khor ni// slob pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlas pa ni// byed nga na dang gsang ba gsum// byi ni rgyu du mda' tshad la// dpangs su bu phyed ldan gyi te// bsren
258a7(rnying rgyud): wAs bye byas// grags TIg bzhir ldan// man ma sa drug pa ni// ga ma pa ci ga chug ma mar// srung nga gro ni regs// sprin ngas sheg // ga bar ma tha na// ru ba tu ga ga // /
258b1(rnying rgyud): 'dom gang nyams dga' ba// de phyir gzhal yas brtsig par bya// dbus su gru gsum mtho la// ras rus phra mos brtsig par bya// dpangs ni chag gang tshad du'o// dpal thar gnyis kyis gdung gi tshul// rtsib mas gdung gi sbaspa lag dgod// sha chen khrag gis
258b2(rnying rgyud): thog sub bya// steng du rjing ril rkang gcig la// nAl bu'i rta rgyal mtshan tshul// thod mkhar de yi phyi rim du// lcags gyes nag bsres pa yis// ri yi tshul du lan bdun bskor// de ni ma bdun gnas pa yin// nang gru khams sha chen la// rnge'u rta dar byas sra
258b3(rnying rgyud): mthur can// rnab pa ni dril bu 'phyang // de lta bu yi gzugs gcig la// steng du zhon pa'i mamo ni// grags gyes las b+ha ba ste// mgo gcig lag gnyis mi tshul can// ral gri mdung thung g.yas dang g.yon// ko rlon stong la de lde sbed// sprul gyi sker
258b4(rnying rgyud): bcings pa ste// kha nas khrag gi zar bu 'dzag/ rkang pa sgrog tu bcug par bya// de yi mdun du gzugs bya ba// mtshan mo nag mo rig pa'i gzugs// mgo gcig lag gnyis gri gug g.yas// b+haT+Ta g.yon khyer gcer bu'i gzugs// sra ni grol ba'i gzugs
258b5(rnying rgyud): s+yaH// de nas thugs kyi sprul pa ste// gzas pa'i snying la gzung bar byed// de nas tshonaniH bzang po yis// bong bu gra la ma mo dze// mtshan mo nags sngo bslar bri// g.yog mo gnyis rdzi nga bzhin ldan// spyod pa'i mkhar gyi sgo dag ni// lho chu ba tong lam mo gnyis
258b6(rnying rgyud): thod pa'i mkhar du gzhug par b+ha// lho ru kha bltas bdag kyang rung // lcags ri bdun lam mo bdun// bya nag bdun gyi gzugs subya// de ni gang gi dkyil 'khor ro// da ni gang gi dkyil 'khor ni// mi khog rgya mo'i nang du yang // gong gi ma mo'i gzugs brtan ni/
258b7(rnying rgyud): dugasang ste gzhug par bya// mi log de yi mgo bo ni// byang shar na pa sgo nub tu 'o// yan lag lnga dang li ng+ga dang // ting ga bdun po dag tu'o// phyagag bdun ci gzugs kyang bzhag/ dkyil 'khor mdor bsdus bstan pa ste// 'di las lhag pa'i rtsipa 'khor /
259a1(rnying rgyud): ma bAshad yang migasung / dadu na pos pa / nug so nga byug pa phyim rgyu pas gas pa'i dkyil bakho tho pa skye ba'o// / s+yA pas bstan no// rmugasang gag da
259a2(rnying rgyud): bstan// byi yi dkyil 'khor dam rdzas ni// dbus su seng ge dkar mo'i snying // 'bras bu sna tshogs gtor ma la// spyan gzigs dag gis brgyan pa gzhag/ lha mchog ya ba yum dag la mchod// sha dang khrag dang nal bu dang // shI l-i thab chen nying
259a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi dmardzas ni// thod par bsngal la byug mA gzhag/ g+ha dza sa la sogs gzhung dag dang // mchin mkhris la sogs rnam pa kun// thod pare rer bskul la bzhag/ ma mo re la gtor ma re// rgyun du d+hU ba'i dus su btang // zhing chen ga du du
259a4(rnying rgyud): dang // sha chen yang ling la sogs pa// gyi yi mchod pa'i rdzas su gzhag/ nang gi dam rdzas bstan pa ni// thod mkhar phyogs bzhir na la ro bzhi// rtsang la gdags te 'phyang du gzhug/ nal bu'i lus po mgo mjug tu// til mar dag gis byug par
259a5(rnying rgyud): spyi bor mi mgo re re gzhag/ dpral bar mthe bong re re gzhag/ snying gar rma bya'i mdongs re gzug/ sked par dar ci ske rags bcings// lag tu g.yab dar re re ste// de la ma mo 'bar bar nges// gtor ma sha dang khrag la bya// ma mo gnyis kyi mdun du
259a6(rnying rgyud): drangs// sngags kyis btabra la len du gzug/ sra zhig dngos grub 'dod pa yis// nal ro bzhi lnga nan tan bskyed// d+hu nag bdun gyi mdun dag tu// sha khrag gtor ma b+han+ta rI// sngags kyis btab la lan du gzhug/ mtshan mo nag mo'i gtor ma la/
259a7(rnying rgyud): gzas pa'i ming rus bcug la byin// the tshom med par las byed do// gsang ba'i dam rdzas bstan pa ni// mi khog sgyu ma'i mdun dag tu// skyes pa shin tu legs pa yi// ro ni rmi med bcal byas la// gsal shing bzang por btsugs pa la// dar nag data gra la
259b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyung du gzhag/ de yi lus kyang mgo mjug tu// tel mar phyug ci byug par bya// mgon thor co gzur phud can// de la rgyun gyis mdzes par bya// rje da lte ba'i bar dag tu// dar gyi sha ma thabs lags par brgyan// nang gcig brkyang ste yid bskul tshul/
259b2(rnying rgyud): ma la ldem zhing bsgyings pa'i tshul du bzhag/ lag tu mdzes pa'i me long bskur// ma la stegs pa'i tshul du bsam// de lta bu yid ma rdzas de// ma mo bos la sbyin par bya// de nas the tshom med pa ru// rnal 'byor ma la gang 'dod ster// rdzas mchod dam pa
259b3(rnying rgyud): yin par bshad// gzhan yang dmar gyi gtor ma dang // zhal zas sna tshogs mdun du drangs// rgyud phyi ma las rdzas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas mchod tshul bshad bya ba// dang po skye ba med pa dang // gnyis pa snying rje'i bdag nyid dang /
259b4(rnying rgyud): gsum pa rang sems hUM ru snang // 'byung ba rlung ste nam mkha'i steng // gru gsum e dang gzhu 'dra yaM// chu ni baM las zlum por bskyed// su las gser gyi sa gzhir snang // ko las rus pa'i ri rab steng // b+hU las gzhal yas khang du ldang // gru
259b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi sgo bzhi yang dag ldan// gru gsum zla gam gru chad dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom// dbus su gdan khri nyi zla dang // ma hI chen po gsal bar bya// zla ge ma gsum la ma mo re// de la cho ga'i yan lag gis// rang nyid sangs rgyas lus
259b6(rnying rgyud): su g+hang // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi 'am// yang na mchog gi he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad tshul// cho ga mkhas pas yab yum gsal// ro gsum steng du ma mo gsum// gar thabs byed cing gnas pa ste// nag mo chen mo bong zhon ma//
259b7(rnying rgyud): ral gri 'debs shing mdung thung 'phen// ny+tsa ma'i dril bu 'gram par 'byung // ko rlon to dang De lde smad// rma bya'i blo chun gyi zor btsugs// lte ba'i phyogs nas nyi shar ma// dpral ba'i ngos nas zla ba 'char// rna ba g.yas pa'i khung bu na//
260a1(rnying rgyud): margyan ma rdzogs mang mcho sa// ga bas na na la na sa gnyis dzin// banas rtag gi ba // dgatsug stsa / jug pa na// rlung ba byu pa ma gyi// gcon drug sa nga rnam// nanang nag
260a2(rnying rgyud): g.yon 'grems// mtshan mo dag la rgyu bar byed// ro gcig snyed na 'dug pa ni// gsod par byed pa'i ma mo ste// dur khrod ro ras hrul po las// dbul mo tshul gyi cha lugs 'dzin// mthing nag mig dmar mdung srung can// thod waka khe ru 'thung bar byed//
260a3(rnying rgyud): nyin mo rgyu shing mtshan mo nya la// mtshan mo nag mo bsgom pa ni// bong zhon ma yi mdun dag na// bka' nyan gsung sdod ma mo gcig/ lus ni rid cing thal ba'i mdog/ mig ni gting nas khrag mig blta// lag na kri gug thod pa thogs// gang zhig gas
260a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying rtse la// gri gug gcod cing thod par blugs// thod khrag khengs pa kha la 'thung // nyin mo nyal nas mtshan mo rgyug/ lus la gos med skra g.yengs ma// de lta bu gcig bdag nyid bsgom// thod pa'i mkhar gyi phyi rol na// lcags de bdun la ma rol du
260a5(rnying rgyud): bya nag bdun du sprul nas ni// 'phur zhing lding zhing chags tshul ston// rnal bkyor chen mo de ltar bsam// de nas grub pa'i ma mo de// rang nyid hUM gi lcags kyu yis// drangs nas mchod pa'i tshogs dbul te// ba li A la dbul bar bya// ma hA ba li kaM khA hi zhes pa
260a6(rnying rgyud): sngags dang bcas la sbyin par bya// che ge mo zhig mA ra ya/ gsang sngags de yi sgra yang brjod// de nas khrag gi ar+g+haM dbul// kAN+Da rak+ta pUHho// de nas dbang po'i me tog dbul// ma hA puSh+pe swAHho/ de nas tshil chen pos me dbul// ma hA d+hU po pUH/
260a7(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid dri chen de la dbul// ma hAgar+b+he \u0f7f// de nas tshil chen mar me dbul// ma hA dwe pa s+thAH ho// de nas dri rgu'i mchod pas mchod// ma hA ga r+b+he hrI ho// de nas mthun pa'i rdzas chen bstag/ de nas gtor ma gtong ba ni// nyi ma'i zer la mi hUM// brtsa
260b1(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i zer dag la// mtshan mo nag mo rgyu bar byed// gsod par byed pa'i ma mo ni// nam gyi gung la rgyu bar byed// lung bar byed pa'i ma mo ni// nyi ma'i gung la rgyu bar byed// dus bzhi dag tu gtor ma sbyin// rgyud phyi ma las las kyi ngog dbub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
260b2(rnying rgyud): de nung ngags kyi tshul bshad pa// ma mo chen mo'i srog snying ni// blo 'di snyid zlang du 'dra ba// mtshan mor srog snyed ni// shin zab pas sngar ma bstan// bshad kyi gsang pa'i bdag po nyon// oM thika pa'i baTaM/ gsang ba 'dag po sa gas par gyis//
260b3(rnying rgyud): bco lnga pa// phung byed ma mo bong pa yin// kha mun tra ba zhes pa ni// gsod pa'i ma mo'i snying po yin// dang po rnal 'byor de yis ni// da mod mo byed na bcu bdun te// kham bu byed na nyin mtshan mdar// sgong byed na tsa ba la// phag rjod byed na kha mun tra// khru ga zor byed na
260b4(rnying rgyud): khrag sha// mda' thor byed na lu gsung blugs// sngags khyabatsab pa yin te/ thod pa dgu ni kha mun tA// de rnams las la sbyar ba shis// thun ling kA pA la gnyis te// shin tu gsang ste bzlas pargyan// thun ling nyin la ka ling mtshan// rtag tu bzla zhing gtor ma
260b5(rnying rgyud): gtong // rgyud kyi ma las rgyan tu drang ba'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas grub pa'i mtshan ma bsten// ma ma nag mo'i mtshan ma ni// thum thu ma skabs su bya nag mo// thod pa'i mkhar la dbab pa mthong // mtshan mo nag mo grub pa ni// bsam
260b6(rnying rgyud): gtan byed pa'i yid lan ru// yi dgas 'dre gzugs mthong bar 'gyur// phung byed ma mo'i mtshan ma ni// tshul bu shug zungs ston par byed// gsod byed ma mong mtshan ma ni// ser ga bu 'phang chen por byed// rgyud khyim las mtshan ma'i le'u stelnga pa'o//
260b7(rnying rgyud): thun rnams thams cad bsrub bstan// thun gyi byi nang gsang ba gsum// byi yi thun rnams sngar bstan pa// sgor kham bu la sogs yin// nang gi thun zhes bya ba ni// thod mkhar chen po'i mdun dag tu// nr-i ru'i mi zod pa'i nang // khrag gsum dag dang dug gi
261a1(rnying rgyud): na / na na na / shA sa/ / d+ha k+ko /
261a2(rnying rgyud): bskor sngags kyis gdags// mtshan mo nag mo'i snying po dang // shin tu gsang ba'i dmod mo dang // rdebs nas nag mo dgu bskor te// dgra po rigs drug bdud du 'bab// 'dzam gling mi laganyen du che// chu tshod brgyad bu rdzogs pa dang // bla ma
261a3(rnying rgyud): byas la// gcig ni gzas pa'i gzugs la brdeg/ gcig ni thun gyi gta' ru gzhug/ de nas thu na gcig yul phyogs 'phang // nag mo bdun bskor thun gyis ni// bdun gsum lon pa 'chi bar byed// gsang ba'i thun zhes bya ba ni// maM khog skya ro
261a4(rnying rgyud): mdun dag tu// sbyar ma mi ring lag pa ru// g.yas su me long g.yon du bran// khar nag thun la btags nas ni// mtshan mo nag mo'i lag tu gtang // 'bur khung nag mo'i sngags kyis btab// 'drar khung nag po zhes bya ba// kham bu dgu yi sngags da
261a5(rnying rgyud): thang sngags dmod pa sbags pa yin// bcu drug dag nas dbu btsugs pas// nyi shu dgu pa mi ro yi// lag gi b+han+ta khol bar byed// 'brar khung nag mo drag tu 'phang // the tshom med par dpa' bos bshad// rgyud phyi ma mas drag po'i thun thams cad kyi snying po
261a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas gsad pa'i las bshad pa// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba ni// rnam pa gsum du bshad pa bya// thun ci las rnams rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan dag gis gsad pa ni// mtshan mo nag mo'i ting
261a7(rnying rgyud): ni// rnal 'byor gyis bas ma zhe sdang bskyed// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'phrul nas ni// gzas pa po'i drung sbyin nas// gri mug dag gis 'od bzlog/ srog rtsa bcad nas byud+ha bkang // ba nyid kyis ni 'brangs pas gang // bkrag dang gzi mad
261b1(rnying rgyud): ldan par bsam// ri bdun dag la gnas pa yi// bya nag bdun rjes pa/ rnams zos// steng rje med pa'i lha tshogs kyis// lhag ma med par zad par byas// lan grangs pargyu de ltar bsgom// rgyun sngags gsang ba'i sngags dang bcas// gtor ba
261b2(rnying rgyud): nar mar gtung bar bya// rgyud phyi ma las gsad pa'i man ngag bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / 'chi ba'i mtshan ma bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor mthu chen 'phan pa'i tshe// thod pa sgrub na 'chi ba yin// mchi ma byung na 'chi ba yin// srog chags
261b3(rnying rgyud): gsad na 'chi ba yin// khrag chen khol na 'chi ba yin// shing chen gcod na 'chi ba yin// rdo chen 'byin na 'chi ba yin// b+hud phyi za las lces kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas ming po'i slab pa thams cad ni// gshin rje nag po zhes bya ba// la
261b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud lnga la dbang yang byed// gi'u ti shan bya ba yin// gshin rje sngon po zhes bya ba// lcags mkhar bcu drug la dbang byed// chos kyi rgyal po zla ba yin// gshin rje 'jigs pa zhes byab// sha khakra dbugs la dbang byed pa// nar hi sa zhes bya ba yin//
261b5(rnying rgyud): rje chen po glang mgro tsan+d+ra// byol song rgyal po zhes bya ba// gshin rje rgyal po zhes bya ba// ma mo'i ming po yin pa ste// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru gsum gcig la gru chad bzhi// mthing nag tshon gyis dgad par bya// tha mar me ri dmar po ste/
261b6(rnying rgyud): mi 'chi bdag bzhi bkod pas// mi rbod phyugs tse bzhi dag la// 'chi bdag zhal bzhi tshon gyis bri// rang rang snying pos mtshan te dgod// bam chen dag gi sha zag gis// gtor ma chen po dbul bya zhing // snying po 'di dag bzlas par bya// ya ma rA tsa 'ge'u
261b7(rnying rgyud): shAn/ d+harma rA tsa ya ma nar sed ta ya/ pre te mu kha'i ti ya sa ma ya dzaHdzaH/ de nas rtags chen 'byung 'gyur te// ma reng gcer bu byug par byed// mon pa bla rkun nag por ston// btsun pa rlung nag 'dzubs ma 'byung // rgyang po chen po'i tshul du ston// de nas
262a1(rnying rgyud): par byed 'dod na// khams pa ni gshin rje'i gzugs// gnag cing mtho ba'i mi gzugs bzhi// lag nad byug pa zhags pa dang // lcags kyu ba zag thags par bya// de nas byin brlab gshin rjer dmigs// gtor ma mnga' dbul
262a2(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor lo bri ba ni// bu gsum gcig la gru gsum bzhi// dbus su gzas pa'i ming dang gzugs// gsum la sngags dgod dang po la// nyi ma bzhi ru lta ba zhi bsgom// 'khor lo sgo zhing rkang pa'i 'od // gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas par bya// ya ma
262a3(rnying rgyud): 'ge'u te'u sha na/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ d+harmA tA tsa ya ma hA tsa che ge mo ma ra ya thad/ mar hing ha ya mar tsa che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ pre te mu khi tri ya ma rA tsa che ge mo mA ra ya thad/ 'am chen nyung dkar skye tshes thab// thon nas gzugs dang 'khor lo mnan// zla drug rdzogs nas 'a
262a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// rgyud kyi ma las gshin rje ming po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / bdud chen po yi sgrub thabs ni// dkyil 'khor mda' tshad gru bzhi la// dbus su zlum po phyi rol du// gru gsum chen po bcu dag bya// rdo rjer bsgo bzhi yang // kun nas legs par bri bar
262a5(rnying rgyud): dbus su ngade gshegs chen po ste// gru gsum chen po babu po la// bdud ni lha mjal bcu po dgod// ming po bdud chen bcu po ni// yang rje nag po zhes pa dang // 'bar ba yam chung zhes pa dang // nag po bdud rje zhes pa dang // sog bdud nag po zhes pa dang /
262a6(rnying rgyud): bdud yor po zhes pa dang // srog bdud dmar gyi stag re dang // srin mo smin mo 'bar ba dang // ser po 'bar ma zhes pa dang // dkar mo 'bar ba zhes pa dang // dmar mo 'bar ba zhes pa dang // blon po sha 'dren skya bo gnyis// khol po 'dzin po sngon po gnyis/
262a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag la dgod par bya// de nas mthun pa'i dam lda ni// ming po drug po dgang ni// 'isgrib nyid phre'u sti dang // kyi nag lug nag byanag sbyir// gtor ma byas te dngul da bru// de rnam snyi gyes nas ni// gser byams bshos pra nag po'i gzugs/
262b1(rnying rgyud): pa chen shar bal// ming nas 'bod cing sbyin par bya// sring mo ba ma bzhi po la// sman gzigs tshogs tshogs pa yis// gong ma bzhin du mchod par bya// khol ma thon po ba byol// sug ma dag la / rtan bcas la// gtor ma gsar byams dag gis mchod/
262b2(rnying rgyud): de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni// a bdud pra ma ya kharu hUM/ da ru hUM/ ru tra ga hUM/ hUM du ra na hUM/ shar ka hUM/ d+h+r-i ga sho hUM/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// glog dmar ral gri tsam ni 'ong // grub pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang // dgra rnams gsod par 'dod pa na// gzas
262b3(rnying rgyud): pa po yi ming bris la// sod cig chod cig rmA yis ni// drag tu brdung zhing phye mar gtang // gser skyems nang du phye ma blugs// zla ba nya chen shar ba la// ming srid bcu po mchod chas bod// gser skye mas gtor zhing bsgrub par bya// thog pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur//
262b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud phyi ma las bu bdud sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin bsgrub bya ba// gnod sbyin lcags kyi 'khar ba can// bdud dang ma mo'i pa yin te// dur khrod ras la gnod sbyin gzugs// nag mo chen mo zhal gcig pa// skra ni gyen du 'bar ba la/
262b5(rnying rgyud): lus la dre'u nag pags pa gsol// lag na lcags kyi 'khar bya thogs// de nas gnod sbyin bkugs nas ni// gnod sbyin rten la bstim par bya// lha chen tshal bu'i sha khrag gis// rtag tu gtor ma mdun du drang // bshos bu ce nag gser lcems kyis// chos
262b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad nam phyed dag la mchod// de nas srog snying bzlas pa ni// oM badz+ra yak+ka pre twe na b+ha ra dang / tiSh+Tha hUM phaT dza/ bzlas pas khrag chen ral pa'i sgra// 'byung ste de nas gsad 'dod pas// gzas pa po yi gzugs bris la// ting nge 'dzin gyis 'od zer gyis// bkug ste rten
262b7(rnying rgyud): la bstim par bya// gsang sngags rting la ta tha ya// btagla pas thal ba bzhin du btags// gnod sbyin pos la gtor ma gtang // gser kye mu gcugs bsres brgyad la gtor// 'odod ngos la sod cig brjod// zla ba phyed na 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyad phyim
263a1(rnying rgyud): las gnod sbyin grags kyi bar ba can gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' lag na dang / dpes sems can kun gyin nas byer/ 'di la grwa zhes du thams cad kyi gtan por bshad pa na/ kun la dag
263a2(rnying rgyud): mi bya ste/ khyod kyis spos shig/ sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos gzhung bzhin du byed pa rnams ni/ chos byed du mi ster zhing / bstan pa 'jig na cha rkyen du bshad pa las ma rtogs par thams cad du byas na ljon shing za ba bcad pa dang 'dra ste/ byang chub kyi 'bras bu
263a3(rnying rgyud): nam yang mi thob cing las kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje nag mo dbang phyug ma'i rgyud khyim pas/ mngon par gtad pa'i ye
263a4(rnying rgyud): steng zla gnyis pa'o// / ba'i rgyu dang bcas pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po/ thig le'i ngang las snyoms pa zugs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / 'khor
263a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ thig le'i ngang las bskul ba'i glu 'di blangs so// a gyi chos nyid thig le rang la ci bder snyoms par zhugs so// don nyid dran par mdzod cig chos nyid stong las bzhengs// 'khor bar bcings pa malus sol cig 'gro don mdzod// tha
263a6(rnying rgyud): ma rnam par mchis kyis don rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / mngon rdzogs rgyal po thig le'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs pa las bzhengs te 'di skad gsungs so// e mngon rnams thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya// mthu rtsa 'dus pa khyodakyi
263a7(rnying rgyud): don ma dus pa kun// the tso ma med pa thams cad dris shig ngas bad kyis// brjod na bsam pa thams cad pa sgrung bar byal ton// de nas byang chub sems dpanga' byeg no nges pas thangs cad kyi rmo bar phyir/ 'di ga gsungs so// e mang rnye pa nying sten sur
263b1(rnying rgyud): nams 'ang mags// gsas pa gas// ba madran pa // dngag su bas pagang tha du// dal tan pa sa// gnamasas pa na pa dang// da byuga' bzla pa s+ho// na du nga
263b2(rnying rgyud): 'arjo pa 'dod na// bsam pa thams cad kun srungs la// the tsom phra ma med pa yis// rdo rje sa bur mardzogs pa dang // thag chen lta bur btun pa yis// namadas pa snying rjechen// gdams dag kun 'angs dbang rnams rdzogs// chos tid rgyo gas lA bang // sa
263b3(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis kyis mnyes byas te// dad pas dang po thog ma nyid du mnyes byas la// gnyis brgyud gyis mnyes byas la// bla mas gnang ba gnyis rnams ni// dbang rnams gnang ba dang por gces// mnang ga gnang ba gnyis pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor chen po des// thoka
263b4(rnying rgyud): mar pa gnas btsal ba ni// shin tu bar chad med pa'i gnas// 'du 'dzi'i rnam pa med pa dang // dngos grub nye ba'i cha mig ste// nad dag med pa'i gnas chen der// bsam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir// bya ba'i las rnams thams cad can// ma lus pa rnam ma rdzogs
263b5(rnying rgyud): bya// sa rnams bdag po las bslang ste// dkyil 'khor maN+Da la mnga' gang la// ba yi rnam lngas legs byas te// dang por bsod nams tshogs bsags khyer// yan lag bdun pa'i smon dam dang // gyi bshags nang bshags rgya cher bya// mngon par rdzogs kyi 'pho
263b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs la// rnal 'byor bya zhing mchod dang bstod// de nas mi mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// blag ma gsum pa tshul bzhin bri// rtsa ba'i rgyud las grags pa yi// dam rdzas na lus tshang bar bya// shin du dam pa'i mtshams bzad de// mu 'gul shor na dngos grub med//
263b7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gnang ba'i tshul du bya// ma 'grub par du dam bcing // dus sun du de srung bya 'o// ting 'dzin ni nang gsum// de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa dang // b+hu zhes byang ba sgom par gyi// de nas dang can gnal yas 'ang // denas dpal chen ta sa/
264a1(rnying rgyud): zhes pa'i rgya ni sgom pa // grus kang zagag rnam pas// mug sa zhugs steng drags sa// denas dpal ldan pa na g.yog gsas// tshu bzhin 'gas sumapa dang // mthong pa rgya sastod bya// de nas
264a2(rnying rgyud): rdzog pazlas pa// rnapa byor man dag can cis de// dang das bza' gang yin pa// dme 'i rgyun dgas brgya bdun te// a tha'i d+han rdzogs nyin mad / sam// gas kyi grub po tsa ba la// sod du sus ga nan
264a3(rnying rgyud): zong rdur mi// thags dag yin nyid nas yang // 'jal gdon bya// zag zunapa man rgya ba s+ho// rtsod po par ba sbyin pa pa// mi so ban na dag ba dang // dmyong po'i ltar gi sbyangs pal// shA ngag tsan par brtson na//
264a4(rnying rgyud): bar// dragasung rdzug pa yin sa ni// dedang del gdon par bya// jig su'i srog gi sdigs mi don// las rnaMm 'gro ba sa // drang srong rnags yi no// g.yogag btsun// dang ba ste//
264a5(rnying rgyud): 'du rdzob// ba ma thu rnams kyi zed sngags so// dadang phrin 'dra shes par bya// thad rdzogis mtha' ni gnanang ste// lamatha'i mtha ni dbang pa 'o// sgo nga mthang ni theg pa ste// 'ag rdzu na mthu ni brdeg pa 'o// srog brgya'i mtha' nig dpa
264a6(rnying rgyud): sngags po chung zo pa dgu brtsegs dang // sru gsung tugs dang dzin pas ni// gnan cing 'phang bar bshad po // bsnyen pa nye bsnyen gnyis dag la// bar ma chad pa'i 'ad 'grangs dang // bre 'dag nom rtsol bar// phrin pas byas na rang m+ba// de dag par du
264a7(rnying rgyud): gdon de// gag dpar lagangs pa// 'ag dag gas mgasus tor// dkor ba sa / gte ma rje da sa thang chung // bzlas brjod pa ni // gto ba zlang brjo rdzogs pan//
264b1(rnying rgyud): dad kyadang rgya chu chub/ mdangangs tug pa dang // dang bya sngal pa gan ba // su smras ga// tha pa dag pa man pa shud// na dun ma tu dim 'ab/ spya bya
264b2(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// phrin pas srub pa'i sngags pa yis// shin tu bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang // las 'phro yod pa'i rnal byor pas// bzlas pa mjogs gong du yang // lha mo de nyid su ston 'gyur// gang dang ldan pa sa dru ba pa /
264b3(rnying rgyud): kyis byas na jug par 'gyur// dung po nga grub pa'i gnas btsal ba// shi na tu hwags che ba'i gnas// rnab 'byor ldan na de ru stsus// / dang mo'i gnas pa'i gnas chen dra// dngos grung thob pa de raH// chupo chen po'i 'tham dag rtsa// mdo te ra
264b4(rnying rgyud): dadug ste// rdzas rnams gong du tshogs par bya// de nas mchod sbyin cig sbyin te// nam T+Ti gung nga ma ti me'i gus// drag po 'di kyi la 'khor gang byed bri// thun dang gzugs dang dkyil 'khor dang // las kyi bya ba thams cad kun// mkhas pas byang na
264b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams grAH// rjes rnams thams cad tshogs pa dang // mngon rdzogs b+hal mchod pa bya// lha groni kun la dbang btsugs te// mchong cing dag gis mnyes par bya// bla rje dkar nag paci byas te// de'i mo kham pa gdas par bya// del
264b6(rnying rgyud): bsrub gang yin pa// tshul du byas pa'i phrin las kyis// bzlas pa rdzogs par bya bar bshad// de nas gas dang dpas byed na// dri yi mchod pa sgral dbul// Sha m+bi ro dang khro ba'i bzhin// dado drag pos gzer sngags bzlas// byang shar mchoms su cha
264b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ ga nas dkrus rgya s+ho// ti na po nyi dang // kyang dkara' bdang // ga la yun // nga rdzogs pa 'jig pa / // sa da
265a1(rnying rgyud): nu su// / skam na du// sas na na/ sa// klus gas sa/ smra
265a2(rnying rgyud): ma rang bdang // gshi 'i phyogs su byabar bshed// rlung sti'i phyogs su bye bar bshad// ting dzin dang 'drug pa'i rjes// mi 'thun dang thags 'di yis// de yi lus bsrung dag dang rtse// rnyed bkab yong lar byo gyi/ e ga sa na
265a3(rnying rgyud): thAH/ I ngas pa/ sanas sa m+b+ha/ sngon tshubs sngags byaste// mun dkyi den zung pa dang // nga dgi ba gas pan kyis thug// sa gad+ha sngal gto ma tab// 'ad pang rdzog pa ga nga/

265a5(rnying rgyud): na ma pa rta ba// 'dri bar byar de'i badzad \u0f7f// ma rdzogs dpa cing bdang rdzug pa// nya ma'i jugs dang brgyab pade// rdzas kyi gtor ba cid su mchogs// de ladam ni cwa bye bya// mthong bdas kyi sa rnying // 'thong ba ma 'a 'tha

265b4(rnying rgyud): kyai sems dag spyong/ mag cig gdan d-i byer nal byor bdag la maN+Dig// sa chags rnams pa'i dbu yang // mug ci gnas dum phyi rnam 'byor bdag la mgyis/ ma gong du nyams cang // ma gcis su

268a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa bsrung ba'i rgyud rnams mang po zhig/ ston pa'i zhal nas mang po kun gsungs kyang // bzad phyung ba yi gsang ba phyi ma 'di// 'gal ba choms la 'bebs pa'i man ngag dam pa yin// rna ba'i rgyud nyid gsal bar byed pa ste// lce mig lta bu'i kha

268a7(rnying rgyud): las/ thog ma chos kyi sku'i ngang las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku snang srid kyi bdag mo snod bdud la dbang sgyur ba'i 'thung ba'i rgyal mo drug dang / ye she tshogs ni rnga mo bcu bzhi dang / sprul ba'i spyad med ma drug dang / 'dod ga 'ams kyi gnod sbyinarnam

269b3(rnying rgyud): rtsa za/ zang chud/ r+g+haM d+hI b+hUM l-I/ nan na ne/ rig mo ni reg mo ni/ kha bo rbad/ dug sde drug rI kho lo bad/ kyil mo rdung / yul po rbad/ swa swI kyi sti rbad/ nir s+thi nir sti/ mugs grags/ thub thub/ phubs subs sti rbad/ se kha lo nA/
269b4(rnying rgyud): nu kha po rbad// thod pa chu mig de bzhin du// klu dang ma mo dkrugs pa'i sngags// de lta rang blas ni de bzhin 'gyur// 'ur kaM ka me/ sha rag kha khaM ha ha hra hi dza/ ma mo las byed ma btub na// zhing shun dag la gzugs byas la// gad+hA gas de brdung zhing
269b5(rnying rgyud): dbugs sngags bzlas// dzadza eh+ye tI sa ma ya snying kha rag/ de dag de bzhin bzlas byas shing // kI la ya yang brjod par bya// de nas thod pa gang yin pa// khar nag dag gis dkri bar bya// dkar po dag pa sngags 'di bzlas// snying pa za ba'i tsam sha/ rol
269b6(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung / kang ka sha zan/ mati par pa to// shapa / rol dang 'thung / btsud shig pa cang shig/ de na thod pa'i dngos po de// zhag ni de bzhin pa lngawa// de nas thang nyid bzhin pa// zhas khang yang na ni// las pa
269b7(rnying rgyud): pa waM// de nas yang dag pazhed byab// zhang nas dmos pa ba sngags la// de dag bzhi drang pos pa ste// dang po bcu la drug pa dang // bdun pa rnam par ldan pa ste// 'dod lapas rta gnas dang rgyang po pa// de lathang rdzogs gnyis pa na//
270a1(rnying rgyud): gnas su ngasapa te// N+DI drug gad// dab zhin kya gyinas pas rdzus// bang sngags gsum pa gang yinapa// mi la gnas sa mas can/ bcwa yirnam pa bdu dang yang // zhen pa ni ma
270a2(rnying rgyud): yin// de la zang sngags bzhi pa ni// gau na tugs pa'i dmod po ste// de dag dgu dang ldan pa ste// dang po dang ni gnyis pa la// thog mar drad pa 'i bzhag nas// mngag rtsag drad pa'i thags dang ldan// de bzhi ni gsal pa bzhi la// de ni ga
270a3(rnying rgyud): med pa la// gsu dang bzhag bzhi ban du// de bzhin ngog rgyab sngags rngan// rdzabad khriga' gyi// de ltar ba ca sngags sbyin pa te// dun 'chang da zhal ban te// nam cig sum mag ba'aganas// ldan du shin cang
270a4(rnying rgyud): rog tu rnganA// rba nu rag mo da kri bo'i snying d+hAr ya/ thang tsadzang / thang mulde thang chu'i srog la 'a/ e hAr ed tsa / drini dun ti spe la la bde/ dza rduH li ne tan / du mar tan 'dzi/ rtag / ma thog gis
270a5(rnying rgyud): tig na TIg// nAm tig/ dzI/ na mA ti ga/ de dag rngon zhin thang thugs te// dris kyi na yang di rnams bzhin// rdo la bzhi yirnam brtse// pa ru shes pa hA// rdul yang ni brjid dri ste// mau gdul brgyad du grags/
270a6(rnying rgyud): dul drug ste na la bzhi// hU~M paM rnam pa drug rtsub rtsi// mi ni drug tu shes pa sh+tsa// nib dru ga nyis dag ci// de dag yin lag 'acing ni// da po pa ni sri s+yAd de// yo 'i rna pas mtshan pa yin// u gnyis yi nga ldan pa ni// gnyis dag tu sa
270a7(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo// de bzhin su dang mi dang ni// srid pa se dang su rnams dang // wa dang ldanan gsum po // u da u med badzin// gsum gyis brgyan pa bzhi ba yin// u da yo nga ldan pa dang // pa yi d+ha pa ha yis mongs// ha la de bzhin ya ga su
270b1(rnying rgyud): rnasu ba'utra pra mi/ nA na
270b2(rnying rgyud): lba ba dag tu shes par bya// klu li m+b+ha ru brjod par bya// rgyan chas spangs badrug pa 'o// i pa 'og tu ya dang ldan// de bzhin ma da mi gas/ de dag ldan pa bdun pa yin// i 'i gnyis kyis brgyan pa na// brgyad padag tu brjod pa yin// e nI i nga
270b3(rnying rgyud): e// drug gis brgyan pa dgu pa'o// 'di ltar grangs dang rgyan cha dang // rtsis kyi na ya ma brtsis na// chad dang lhag dang norab 'byung // de dag byung na don med 'gyur// deyi phyir na bci ba yin// gsal bar ma spras gsang phyi rags pa// de yi phyi na tu
270b4(rnying rgyud): min// des na rgyud 'dir sbas pa yin// thang mu le thang gru le/ zla zlangs thang / zad zad/ gr-i r+t+ti wa~M wi/ nan nan/ rag mo ni rag moni/ kha la zang / drug dzupa kha lo nad/ be+e kha la zad/ gru kha'i nad/ rtse N+Di ti med/ ni sbyin d+hi /
270b5(rnying rgyud): mugs mugs/ thub thub srab sub stind/ saM kha lo rbad/ mu kha lo rbad zad// rtsis kyi nA ya bci ba ni// 'di ltar yang dag bshad bya ba// ma la bzhi yi rnam pa la// u e bzhi yi rgyan gyis mdzes// de bzhin ma sa bzhi la yang // saM yi 'og tu na yi
270b6(rnying rgyud): mnos// u i bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// man bzhi yi dngos po la// oM i bzhi yi rgyan dang ldan// dang po thar sngags dag la ni// rim bzhin la ste o dang ldan// 'dod khams lha gnas dag tu dmos// de la thang sngags gnyis pa ni// la
270b7(rnying rgyud): o yi rnam pa spangs// klu yi yul du o nyid spang // des bzhi la u i bzhi// sa gnyis na yis 'og tu legs// la sne o yi rnam pa sa brgyan// 'dod khams lha gnas dag tu dmos// kA yi pA la la yis mdzes// de lta bu yis klad du mdzes
270b8(rnying rgyud): la ste me yis brgyan pa ni// lha yas yul dud dmos pa'o// ma rtse mo spang gru yul yin// mal u mo ldan pa la// sa gnyis yi dang rnam par ldan// sa ye 'og tu ta yis brgyan// ni gnyis sa gnyis i bzhis brgyan// sa ga ta mi rgyan gyis mings/
271a1(rnying rgyud): Sh+Tha/ rnams sa// g+h+na sa mas pa sa// sas gnas la mas sa/ mas na// da nas da sa pa// sa 'a gyu//
271a2(rnying rgyud): dag ldan// mjug tu bcad pa'i nang sngags mdzes// lha 'i yul du zad / sbrus// klu si yul bu mo nyid spangs// 'di ltar bci ba'i yi ge ni// thog ma rgyan ma ldan pa ste// rgyun gyis brgyan pa gsal par bshid// phyog sh+lau ga ngor/
271a3(rnying rgyud): de dag gsal bar ma bshad de// grangs kyi rnam bar+d+has su shes// de la dang po thar sngags la// bzla drug dag la drug rgya ste// bdun dang ldan pas ro bdun yin// drang sngags gnyis pa sngon bzhin du// brkyang dang ldan pas de bzhin rdo'o// zang
271a4(rnying rgyud): rbang bralaM/ zang nad/ g+h+r-i s+t+ri pr-i sI nan/ rag mo ni rag mo kha lo nang zad / drug s+t+rI drug ste/ kho po rang zad/ pal gyi kha la zad zad/ tsa ti tsa ste zang byed/ no sbyin ste/ snying la thugs rmugs/ thub thub sungs kyi da/ kha 'ad yang dzang
271a5(rnying rgyud): thabs thams cad cad/ seM ke le lce lal rdzang de// me yul gling bzhi'i dmod mo 'od// bcu bdun pa ni bdun cu ste// bzhi dang ldan pa ca ba'i yin// kyis kyi na la bshad byub// mal ba'i ste u ma~M brgyad// mal grad du thig gis brgyad// ngag
271a6(rnying rgyud): su su ye rnam pas mangs// su pa 'og tun yis mdzes// gla bum yis rnam par brgyan// ma yi sbed du sngon bzhin la// sa yi D+yan yang de bzhin du// mA na ma dungam a oM// la ste spyad du oM yis mtshan// de ste sa dang ldan pa la// 'on
271a7(rnying rgyud): na yis mdzes// klad du i yis yang dag brgyan// de bzhin ni u dang ldan// sa dog na yis mdzes pa la// klad du i yis mtshan ma yin// la ste o yis glang du dzes// kayo 'og tu ya yis mdzes// klod pa i mis yang dag
271b1(rnying rgyud): mas parnya byas pa// ka la mAn zhan pa las mangs// dang dang nabyas pa// la pa na// sa mas sku tu mas mdun// thadal ma mangs pas brdzun// dba'i nas ya mangs tu// sa yos tsun pa ma dun na
271b2(rnying rgyud): na te rmad du i yis mtshan// sa yi 'og tu ta yis mdzes// klad du i yis yang dag bshad// na yang glad du sngon bzhin la// sa yid tas mdzes de bzhin no// sa 'og nya mdzes klad du ai// ma gnyis u yis rnam par brgyan// tha gnyis u yis 'og tu
271b3(rnying rgyud): logs// sa la u yis brgyan pa ste// ta la i yis yang dgra brgyan// ya gnyis e dang ldan pa la// tha gnyis u us 'og tu legs// sa yang e yis klad du mdzes// la ni yo dang ldan pa la// ma la u yis 'og tu brgyan// la na
271b4(rnying rgyud): mdang ldan pa la// tha mar rmad gnyis myur bar bya// 'di ltar yi ge brtse pa ni// rkyen gyis brgya ning brtsib ste// grogs byeng yi ge 'dir ma bshad// seMs su sngon du de bzhin brtsis// rgyan dang ldan pa'i yi ge ni// skyes bu mtshon ma can dang 'dra/
271b5(rnying rgyud): grogs byed yi ge dmag mi 'dra// yan lag brdzun pa mtshon cha 'dra// de phyir yan lag brtsi bag ces// lha mo'i sngags kyi rgyud las/ thang sngags dmod pa'i na ya rtsis kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags kyi snying po
271b6(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// thog ma nyid la thAg rag sha/ de bzhin la mun tre zhes brjod// mA ru lu dz+haiM b+h+yo brjod pa// lha mo nyin mo rmya ba'i sngags// rag mo te ke ma \u0f7fzhes// tha mar khal skyo brjod pa// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i sngags su shes// ru lu ru lu ma b+hi b+h+yo// sgra mo
271b7(rnying rgyud): ga tu bye ba'i chags// hU~M le ling tse 'du 'du zhes// de nas srog khrig gnyis brjod nas// tha mar shi khyer hU~M zhes// tha mar 'du 'ju rjod pa ni// e ka tsa ti'i sngags su'o// pog mar ma ma brjod nas kyang // tha mar a shat+pa la brjod// de rnams
272a1(rnying rgyud): yid A rmA/ san// ga // u la ga d+ha/ nags nan mthA/ shAg na na gar// chub gag
272a2(rnying rgyud): mjug tu du brjod thugs su bstan// thog mer ba hA srog blan zhes// tha mar snying la sgyo zhes brjod// phyin las snying por bstan pa min// oM dang badza dang por bzhag/ nga ba rig ces ldan gnyis brjod// tha rnyer gyi zhes brjod nas kyang // mjug
272a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin brje// Sham b+ha ba'i thun grags min// thog ma nyid mjug rag / tha~M ma pas zhes brjid// bam canas sbyar ba ni// dbyas pa ldan pa pa zlas pa// tshig ra ba gran shes 'arjod// dag pong daglang sa// ya byu rjod pan/
272a4(rnying rgyud): dro bzlas pa'i sngags su shes// khal ma te bye brjod nas// dza ra ra k+sha mA ra ya// mjug du na la brjod pa ni// g.yas kyi phyogs su brjod pa'o// thog ma la ni drug rag sha/ mujal na gnyis brjod nas kyang // snying pa rag ces brjod napa ni// de bzhin
272a5(rnying rgyud): ral zhes brjod// tha mar thun la sngar ba ni// g.yon gyi phun sngags zhes myor// A~M zhes bying thog mar bzhag/ de nas ma mthag rag shwa/ mA ra ya dang thun ya brjod// dbus kyi thun la bzlas pa'o// tsapa la zhes brjod nas kyang // Shal ma ti mA ra ra/

272a7(rnying rgyud): g.yon migs ni sa pa// seM tshig pa nyid du// gyur yi// ma rjod pa ni// dri sbyin pa tha lugs spyo// thog sar du thug zhan// nam shA sa nas// sa bye la dunapa pa dang n-i// dbus kyi
272b1(rnying rgyud): dang // thog ma la ni ru dag sha/ de nas trag sha mA ra ya// mjug tu thun ya brjod pa ni// lho yi phyogs la g.yas su bzlas// ru ru ro ru ru lu brjod byas nas// tha mar rag sha mA ra ya// mjug pa tha na ya sbyar ba ni// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'brang ba'i sngags
272b2(rnying rgyud): ruru ro ru ru pu zhes// tha ma pra ni tsaH sbyar// mA ra ya thun la brjod pa// khre spen Sham bu sgrub pa'o// thog ma nyid la trag rag sha/ tha mar snying khrag snying blo zhes// tha mar thu nA ya brjod pa ni// rnge'u hA kha ma bu sgrub pa'i sngags// s+pho Ta Ta d+yo zhes gnyis
272b3(rnying rgyud): brjod nas// de bzhin mA ra ye zhes brjod// thi ma la na rjen ya brjod// kham bu sgrub pa'i dus su bzlas// thog ma nyid na snying kha rag// mA ra ni sha mA ra ya// mjug la thun ya brjod zhi// nu bzur kham bu bcul bzlas// ru lu rag sha thog mar brjod// tha mar tin
272b4(rnying rgyud): raya// mjug la thun ya brjod pa ni// dbus pa bzlas pa'i sngags su'o// rag mo tsa tsa zhes brjod nas// ma ra ma ra sha sha mA ra ya// mjug la thun ya brjod pa ni// g.yas kyi phyogs su bzlas pa'o// thog mar snying khrag tsa la ya// tha mar mA ra ya

275a1(rnying rgyud): gzigags pa na// mdanga' bdag rgyal pa chen bskran gas na cig/ bangs bzang ba dag bkrus pa 'ang // dpung ngas pa zhugs pa'i dus su phyag rnas pazang // gtsug lag khang pa da ltar mtshan pa 'di// slad madron du mab
275a2(rnying rgyud): rigs// be ro sngon dge slong bdag gis kyang // pha bor mabor srun por gnyen bor nas// rje yi zhabs nas btegs paji tsam pa// mnga' bdag rgyal po'i grags la mnga' 'arabs// mig ltar gces par byed pa'i dus gsum pha na dang // gson shi
275a3(rnying rgyud): sa kyis 'brel pa'i gnyen bzhi dang // rtse gcig las kyis 'brel ba'i yul mi gnyen 'dun dang // 'khor yul dung pos 'brel ba de rnams dang // skad cig sras kyang 'bral po mi thogs pa// ma dang bdag rgyal po thugs tshad che// 'di nas rgya gang yus
275a4(rnying rgyud): gal// de'u shade'u chad lnga bcu rtsa bzhi byas// bod kyi rgyal khams smin par bya ba dang // bod kyi dge slong gnyan par bya ba'i phyir// ma rig thun bsil po'i bsnyen bgru ba 'di// rin chen phung por 'gyung bdi bsnyen chos dang // 'gal ba cha ma la
275a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'di 'ong // 'gal ba cham la 'bezla pa'i sngags 'di ni// bdag la 'jam dpal ston pas lung bstan te// rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas brkos dpa// yang dag rus de snying rus pa byed nas ni// gser ni rdzongs par nor gyi bla byas te// me na
275a6(rnying rgyud): ma 'dis thog skabs gser la bgyis// dai'u shi de 'chad byas te sun sder mchis// mnga' bdag rgyal po khro srong lde'u btsan dang // sngon chad mol ba'i don bzhin bdag gi bgyis// mkhas pa'i dug sngags pa cad nas sems phyogs dang // rdo rje gdan
275a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rgyud 'di/ dka' bla byas te dge slong nga dag gi mchis// 'di ltar dka' ba srang ba grangs mngal// snying por byung ba snyam sngags rgyud 'di// bsnyen pa srung bang drag sngags mang ba zhig/ smon pa'i zhal nas mang ba na
275b1(rnying rgyud): sud// bca mas ca gas na// das sa myed sa// gdus gshesas na// nga su ga nga/ su na bang smras/ da/
275b2(rnying rgyud): sbyar dag // denas rkyen pa sems dpa rdzagan / 'kho ma ma rdzogs pa rnams / tshig mardzun pa ma kyi smin sa ma ga rdzogs kyi la b+ha 'di ga kyisags s+ho// /
275b3(rnying rgyud): gas hU~M// dag sa sngags pa ni dan// rdong lan chung brji bye gas// bdag dag pa rdzum zhal ba nas// ba ma ldan ga nga gi dkyims// zhub c-i gsunams bstan dag sal// bsngags pa zhi ning skye 'i sa/

275b6(rnying rgyud): hU~M// gad kyis nga sa gags me/ bags pa'ang than// rkyen gan ma 'di// pan gyi da pan// mas b+h+ring zhes bzungs// ma na ci ge nga jigs// na/
275b7(rnying rgyud): nig ci zhes ni zub n-i// mang sa mas su mang rgya med// lag tu thams cadang la ba byed/ phyogs ga dag pa ban // nga gag // chags bya brten pa dang // delardzogs kyi
276a1(rnying rgyud): cing bsnyen pa'i ljags dang ni// zad cing gsad pa'i sngags dag go// sngags zhes kyang ni de la bya'o// de la rgyud ces bya ba yang // don rnams tshang zhing 'brel ba dang // dgos pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir// de phyir byad
276a2(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba bshad// nag mo sngags kyi rgyud phyi ma las/ rgyud kyi mtshan dris pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di yi gnas rnams ji lta bu/
276a3(rnying rgyud): rlung da tsam ltang banan// dam ga blasag glan ga snang pags// mam mthod dum dri lta bya// sngags kyi nas pad sar lags// mdo rdzogs cal dog pa/ myal pa// dbu nam rdzogs shi da pa // dan nyi
276a4(rnying rgyud): yis// thog mar gnas rnams btsal ba ni// ri lung la sogs gnas rnams kyang // rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa yis// bdag dbang gzhung mthun gnas kyang btsal// de nas gnas chen de lta bur// ma mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni// bla ga
276a5(rnying rgyud): gsus pa tshul bzhin du// rtsab brgyud pas 'byung bag+h+ri// nganam gnan dz+haiM seM ng+ge/ gangag brgyad kyil thob// 'i nang sa rnam sa lasogs pa'i/ gdug d+hin gyi gdon pa bye// rnangs drung zad na ni// 'od tsamadzanan
276a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad dag la// thod pa sted ma rnams la dbus su ya bris// dwe lA la ma r+tha tsa'i sngags kyis bskor// 'og ma rnams la dbus su ma bris// del ma mo'i sngags kyis bskor// bar du bsrub bya'i gzugs dang ming dus gzhug/ phur pa'i sngags dang
276a7(rnying rgyud): mam sngags// gshin 'i chags na bcu sngags dang / phyi'i thugs dang / thar ba rel brdzags lamanan/ de ltar las rdungs byas gyur na// des rnams can la gnod par 'thur// nag pa'i sngags rgyud kyi pos// gnas da phyi
276b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor thod tshal gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas dum rdzas bstan pa la// shwa chen dang na tshal chan dang // bong bu'i rlag pa nal bu sha/ bud mad mngal khrag shi ka la sa// gzhan yang khrag sna thams cad dang // lu nas r+dz+dza
276b2(rnying rgyud): nag dang // 'brang rgyas phyed dkar phyed nag dang // thal chen dang ni ming rus chud// re ma ti yi rdzas su bsag/ lho yi gling nas phyung ba yis// ra skyugs la sogs rdzas rnams kun// star ga la sogs rnga sra rnams kyang // de ru sna ma ye ngas
276b3(rnying rgyud): su bsag/ mchin mkhris la sogs rdzas rnams kyang // smyug ma'i sbu gu bal tshon lnga// sna khrag la sogs rdzas rnams kyang // khri gtan la se'i rdzas su bsag/ gzhan yang shun chen skrag pa dang // spyi blugs zhwa la sogs pa yang // 6
276b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud bzhin bsag par bya// da ni dam rdzas gzhag pa ni// dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma yang // ma mthong bar du gzhag par bya// byang du ma mo'i gtor ma ni// 'bru nag la sogs dam rdzas la// rtag par bzhugs pa'i zhugs mar gzhag/ shing
276b5(rnying rgyud): shun ming bris nang du gzhug/ rgyun gtor dag kyang byang du gzhag/ shar du drag po'i gtor ma gzhag/ lho ru ma mo'i sman phud gzhag/ dngos grub rdzas ni nub tu gzhag/ dpal chen phud ni byang du gzhang // byang shar shar nub khrag kyang gzhag
276b6(rnying rgyud): cha ni nub tu gzhag par bya// re ma ti la sogs pa yi// ma mo so so'i da ma tshig kun// re re zla ga ma re la gzhag/ gzhan yang sha sta khrag sgra dang // snying lnga la sogs rdzas rnams kun// dkyil 'khor 'gram du gzhag par bya// de nas ma
276b7(rnying rgyud): mchod pa yod// ting 'dzin rnam gsum 'gro 'dulas// 'byung ba rim brgyags gzhal las 'ang // de nas spyad las shis phyogs sgra// bsgoms te sbyin drang mtshad bsod bya// ma mo mchod pa'i dras dag kyang // te mgung dang mtshan
277a1(rnying rgyud): dang // skya rarengs shar dang byang ris chad// grug nag 'jigs pa'i rgyal mo sogs// bod mchod bskyod dang gtor mabyin// nag ma sngags ci rgyud phyi ma las/ dam rdzas bsag pa dang ma ma mchod par le'u steg sum
277a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas sngags rnams bzlas pa ni// bya stag lo dang tha ba dang // rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po des// shis pa'i lha bsgom rkun sngags bzlas// snying thun khrag thun rgyan sngags kyang // tra ga ra k+Sha ba mun tra Ta// rmong drug
277a3(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa dag kyang de'o// thong zor la sogs rgyun sngags te// kham bu'i rgyan sngags bzlas pa yang // nyin mtshan gsum gyi sngags dag dgod// dmod mo'i rgyan sngags bcu drug bzlas// nag mo sngags kyi rgyud phyi ma las/ rtsa ba'i sngags
277a4(rnying rgyud): rnams bzlas pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// phrin las grub pa ji ltar lags// de yi ga nas ni ji lta bu// phrin las dkyil 'khor
277a5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bri// zad pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar bzla// thun sngags bzlas pa ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// mchod dang legs pa rdzogs pa dang // rnal 'byor gdeng dang ldan pa yis// phrin las dag ni brtsam par bya//
277a6(rnying rgyud): kun gyis brtsams na rlag par 'gyur// yang na rnal 'byor las ma grub pa'am// shin tu bsod nams chung ba yis// ma mo las byed ma 'dod na// gnyen po gdul skal lha bsgom la// shes bstan zhing sngags kyang 'azlas// dza rdza
277a7(rnying rgyud): te ma mal snying pa rag ma ma kI li kI la ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sngags de bzlas la gzugs brdeg go// de nas ma mo'i gtor mni// gdan 'og dag gam grangs la// trag zla ba mun tras sngags la gtor// de ltar byas na las rnams 'grub// nag mo
277b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi rgyad sbyi ma las/ de nas bstan cing las la gtong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas drag po'i gnas btsal ba// rnal 'byor gdang dang ldan su mas// dmams gang du tshogs par bya// lhang dri dag kyang song pa la
277b2(rnying rgyud): nag mo gnas pa'i sa dag tu// dngos grub mur bas de rbaH// chu bo chen po'i 'gram dag tu// ma mo chu bas de ru bya// drar khrod chen po gyi g.ya' bar// lha 'dre tshogs pas dA tsaH// de nas nam grang nyin gung la// drag po'i
277b3(rnying rgyud): gang byed ni// rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba zla// gzugs dang thun dang na la thod dang // las kyi bya ba thams cad kun// mkhas pas byang shar mtshams su brtsam// de ltar rdzas rnams chags pa dang // sdang srid lha 'dre thams cad la// mchod rkyen
277b4(rnying rgyud): byas la dbang yang gzug/ mngon rdzogs lha mchod bsnyen bslab bya// ring gis mnyes sho rdetha dgram// kham la dag kyang gdab par bya// nag mo sngags kyi rgyud kyi ma las drag po'i gnas dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / las kyi
277b5(rnying rgyud): kI le Ta ste drug po// / de nas zad sngags bzlas pa ni// b+han d+ha'i cha lang dag kyang brdag// thugs dam dag kyang drug tu bskal// rag mo ni shag rdul sogs ni// rgong la sogs bran rnams dang // dmod mo kun gyi chad sngags yin/
277b6(rnying rgyud): spring khrag cal phreng zer la sogs kyang // grong drug thun gyi zang sngags yin// grwa gsung thugs dang phrin las kyang // kham bu grub pa'i nad sngags yin// rbad du zad du lag mo la sogs kyang // s+thi rnams kun gyi zad sngags dang // myar du yang ni sgrol ba
277b7(rnying rgyud): yin// nag mo sngags kyi rgyud phyim las/ zed sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas thun sngags bzlas pa yang // khrag thun skye yi sngags kyang 'di// ma mthag rag sha kha thun la mun tra ru lu tsu ru hrI ts+tsha trAM/ de dag kyi ru bzlas bcwa/
278a1(rnying rgyud): nanyan dum nga// / gas dag ca / 'dun// rdzug+sa gzhal sngags pa rdzu// ldan ga dgan ta nga// mas ma byu ban/
278a2(rnying rgyud): i a a la sogs pa bzlas// skyo rims 'dod na thig nig bzlas// mdze nad dag kyang gtong 'dod na// badz+ra ni phaT la sogs pa dang // nag li la sogs pa bzlas// zod nad mtshon 'khrug gtong 'dod na// dmod mo dag kyang 'azlam par bya/

278a4(rnying rgyud): mkhris na de dag kyang 'ong bar nges// thong zor nag po'i bzlas pa yang // dum bu dum bu tshal pa tshal pa/ ha na ha na mA la thun ya/ de dag bzlas pas mtshon gri dang // rims nad dag kyang 'ong bar nges// mdzen de dag kyang gtang 'dod na// mdze can
278a5(rnying rgyud): thod pa dag dang ni// dgra bo'i ba mes thod pa rjes// pha mes thod pa kla'ams bdag la// gtad de thebs pa dag tu bya'o// dmod pa grub par 'dod pa na// ma mor bsgoms te sha khrag bza'// thang sngags mtha' ni 'phang dang gnan// kham thu
278a6(rnying rgyud): dag gi mtha' yang ni// sbal tog dag gis 'phang ba yin// skonga'i mtha' yang 'phang nga dag nan// gsungs su dag kyang gzung ba'o// thun drug mtha' yang gnan dang 'bang / gzungs su dag kyang gzung bar bya// gzhan yang ldan rnams thams kyas

278b3(rnying rgyud): bag chags yod pa yin// chad na las ma grub pa ste// spos na thun khrag rul pa yin// de ltar byung na bskur la bya// gzhal yas khang du sgrub pa ni// ldeg 'phang lhums na grub pa yin// ser ka dang ni/ mas na ngan// kham bu'i rgya dang rtsang ngag

279b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyod byas na bzang ba yin// shor ba rmin bskyar ba bya// mdor na srog chags gsang pa mi pa ni// myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// shing chen bcad pa rmin bzang // rdo chen phyung ba rmin bzang // chu chen 'bab pa min bzang // me chen btang ba bzang ste'achi
279b7(rnying rgyud): ba'o// nam mkha' klug nag 'thibs na bzang // skra chen dag kyang byung na bzang // 'od chen byung na bzang ba yin// rlung nag kyang ni byung na bzang // bro phyer sngon pos srog chags bsad na bzang // gcan gzan dag gis sems can bsad na bzang ste 'chi'o//
280a1(rnying rgyud): dgra' bzag mdangs na gtos rgyan 'chi'o// nag mo sngags kyi chung phyi ma las/ gnan pa dang 'chi ba'i mtshan ma chu/ ga
280a2(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI de 'i rje \u0f7ft+ta swa han bu ny+tsatan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i thugs kyi srog grub gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis mos pa'i dus ce nA na/ bcom ldan 'das
280a3(rnying rgyud): chen po sas dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams bathun mo'i rta ga'i grong rnam par dag pal 'grangs so// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gseng ba'o b.rig po dpal kyagan rdo rje dang gzhan yang bdud kyi ma gshin rdo'i srer me dpal lha mo zhes byabs/ ra

280a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' lding dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i bdag po dpal nag po chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs nas/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams pa'i rang
280a7(rnying rgyud): du/ brgya byin la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / grubs su 'gro ba dang / rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs la dad par gyis shig ces sbas pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa rnams
280b1(rnying rgyud): kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs la dad pa dang mos pa bya ste/ thal mo sbyar nas thabs cig tu 'grigs par byas te/ 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi chos 'jig rten du can ring bar
280b2(rnying rgyud): gnas shing / rgyas par bya ba'i slad du bdag cag rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dad pa dang / mos pa dang / yid la bya ba'i byin rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs su skyes dang 'khor
280b3(rnying rgyud): du bcas pa rnams bdag gi mngon du snang bar gyur cig/ ces smon lam btab pa dang / de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams mngon du snang bar gyur to// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa dga' ba dang spro ba skyes nas skya'i me tog man dang
280b4(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing gyen gyi char chen po mngon par phab bo// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces smras so// brgya byin la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ dpal lha mo nag mo la zhus shig ces
280b5(rnying rgyud): smras pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor rnams kyis dpal lha mo nag mo la mchod pa dang / bstod pa byas te 'di skad du khyod kyis bstan pa bsung du gsol/ zhes smras pa dang / dpal lha mo nag mos spras pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ni gang /
280b6(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu/ ma bsungs na ci skyon zhes smras pa dang / bstan pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa ste/ rgyal ba'i bka' sde snod du gyur pa mtha' dag go// srung ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas pa'o// 'chang ba dang /
280b7(rnying rgyud): nyan pa dang / sgom pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa rnams la/ gnod pa bskal zhing tshar gcod pa'o// 'chang ba la sogs pa bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang / 'khor dang longs spyod
281a1(rnying rgyud): 'bab zhi mas par bya ba dang / ma bcas dan na mchog gsus pa bgang mig na/ mang samayin pa smra byung dragacod ci di 'ang gis smras ca ci bstan pa rtan ga

281b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bstan ba srungs shig par gnyer gtad do// dpal chen po'i spyan sngar lha mo re ma tis nga gi snying po phul ba/ drag dkra ma hi dun d+ho/ ma hA pa thA mik+ta nag mo dun to zhes brten pa'i snying po dang / gzhan yang ma ma thag kA ma ti snyed kha rag tsi d+ha tsab pa A
281b2(rnying rgyud): shug me b+h+yodzaHzhes bya ba rtsa ba'i snying po'o// gzhan yang dag mo rag mo ma mdun teng / her ma nyed kyo zhes bsrub pa'i snying po dang / badz+ra ku dran rbad/ snying khrag tshil pa rbad/ gtubs tsit+ta rbad/ phyogs tshugs rbad/ snying khrag kha la rbad/ tshul bu sen srin
281b3(rnying rgyud): hur srog la ya rbad/ ma ma rag mo che ge mo'i snying la dza dza/ nag mo ha ra hu ra ma ha tsho cho/ u ra ka me sha ma ra la ba ha ha hra ha ti dza/ che ge mo'i snying pa d+ho/ re mA ting sha tsa pa la shA/ tsa pa la dza dza/ dun du na da k+ka rad+na/ mu ru lu ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ che ge mo mA rA ya phaT

281b5(rnying rgyud): dad pas yid drangs pa'i gang zag de la bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// gang zhig 'chad pa dang / nyan pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de'i sbyor ba ngan pa bsal bar bgyi'o// gang sgom pa dang srub pa nyams su len pa de dag gi ging
281b6(rnying rgyud): dang po nya dus rtag tu bgyi'o// de ltar bdag gis dam bcas pa ltar ma bgyis na bdag gis da lta nyid du bcom ldan 'das bkrus pa lags so// de'i dbang gis rang gi srog gi snying por me 'bar nas lus srog thal ba bzhin du tshig par gyur te/ mnad med pa'i sems
281b7(rnying rgyud): can dmyal ba chen por gyur cig ces smon lam btab cing mna' bor ro// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo des dbang dang byin rlabs thob cing dam tshig can du gyur pa'i tshe brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi rgyan dang lag cha phul te/ de ltar brgya byin gyis rdo rje

282a2(rnying rgyud): kyis thu gyi gdongs ka dang / sa bdag pa ta lis stag gi rgyal mtshan dang / srin po dang shatha rnams kyi sarjod pa'i phrerang bya dang / khrag dpa nag gi yod+ha dang / bdud yang rjes bra ba ma dang/ btsun gyi sa na dza dang / 'khor du myor na rnal /
282a3(rnying rgyud): de ltar 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi rgyan dang yo byad lag cha la sogs pa phul te bstod pa rnams kyis kyang bstod do// lha mo de yang srid pa gsum nA gran gyi do med par gyur to// dpal lha mo he d+ha gsang ba'i srog rgyal bu'i rgyud lus gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//
282a4(rnying rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa sangs rgyas ni brtan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i ched du/ dpal lha mo'i ting 'dzin dang / spyan drang zhing mchod pa'i sngags dang / de
282a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan bstan pa dang / bod pa dang / rbad pa dang / gsad pa dang / rgyud kyi sngags btu ba dang / bsrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / bsrub pa'i rdzas dang / phur bu gdang pa'i sngags dang / mtshon gyis gtung cid sbyin pa sreg bya ba dang /
282a6(rnying rgyud): thun zod 'phang ba dang / gnan pa bya ba dang / ser ba dbab pa'i thabs bstan du gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lha mo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ yaM s+pha ra Na raM ag+ne dz+wa la raM zhes me rlung gi dbus su thod pa'i
282a7(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas bang bskyed pa ni/ d+hU bi shwa bi shud+d+ha ka pA hUM/ de'i nang du sbyor ti ga pa ta s+thi zhes pas lpags kyi dri'u tabaskyed do// de'i gong du yi ge ma'i 'phro 'dul yi nag mo du ni la~M du rjing b+h+yo zhes pas lha mo nag mo ni/ spu mdog mthong nag ral pa ga yasas
282b1(rnying rgyud): gzhon du 'khyil ba/ zhal gdang sa zhing mche ba gtsigs pa/ lhan rtsa dmar la sdang meg bzad pa/ zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi dang / stag gi sham bu dang / sbal gyi ske rags dang / skrod pa'i phreng ba dang / phyag g.yas gnyis na la r+d+ha dang phu dang /
282b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon gnyis na me long dang sbrul zhags bsnams pa/ nad kyi rgyal pa mtshan na sbed pa/ khram bam rgyab tu khur sho rnge mdun na 'thor ba/ tshon gyi gu gu rkyong zhing 'brul ba/ 'khor nag mo 'bum sde dang bcas pa gsal bar bsgom par bya'o// lha mo
282b3(rnying rgyud): srog gsang ba'i rgyal bu las/ skya bskyed pa'i ting 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan dra zhing mchod pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// bdag nyid gdeng dang ldan pa yis// lcags kyu'i phyag
282b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas spyan drangs te// bzhugs gsol gtor ma bsgrub par bya'o// oM nag mo dun+ting laM mA mdun b+h+yo// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ nag mo dun d+ho dz+nye/ oM A r+g+haM sa ma ya e h+ye hing / a ra li rdo hriM/ rak+ka ma hi ku la pad+ma sa ma ya tiSh+Tha wAn/ ma ma nag mo
282b5(rnying rgyud): sin ta san+da ta ku la kul/ ha ha ha/ ma hA mAM sa khA he/ ma hA rAk+Sha khA hi/ pe d+ha a mr-i ta la kha~M Sh+NI ti ShA ti/ thun dza ho// pi pa te sa ma ya swA hA/ zhos r+tha drangs shing gnyis su med par bsti mA la gtor ma dbul bar b+ha'o// dpal lha mo
282b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud las/ spyan drangs shing bzhugs su gsol ba dang tshod chags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen pa'i rten gyi gzugs brtan 'di gsungs sa// dmigs pa'i rten gyi gzugs brtan ni// 'dri

283a2(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chen po'i dbus gnas pa// bris nas dbang bskur mchod pa 'bral// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni sum 'brim 'azlas// zhes gsungs so// dpal lha mo ci nya gsang ba'i srog rgyal bu'i rgyud las/ gzugs brtan pa bzhi pa'o//
283a3(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'dar rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ gsang sngags 'di dag byin gyis brlab ci ba tu ba mdzad do// thog mar yi ge thams cad ni// dmigs med brjod med 'as ma dang bral// sma yi rnam pa ga la yog/ dmigs med gdod na rnam par dag/ don
283a4(rnying rgyud): yi ge a zhes bya// sems can las dang smon lam gyis// stobs las kun rdzob yi ge byung // a A i I u m+bA'i dwA pa lA e mi oM a i aH/ ka kha gaM g+ha / tsarba dza d+ha ta/ Tem rbAH/ ta tha d+ha na/ pa bab d+ham/ phyar la ma/ [ऽ।]
283a5(rnying rgyud): de las thung ba'i sngags rnams ni// na nor gsal ba 'di lta ste// du yong bzhi pa'i dang por gzhag// de la drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og tu brgyan// dma'i gsum pas mdzes par byan// de 'og zug pa'i gnyis pabya dag/ dang po'i gsum de la ts+tshiH/

283a7(rnying rgyud): lnga ba'i bzhing gzhag/ de la sa ste bathun par bya/ dbyangs kyi bcugasu mgong nas dbang // de 'og lnga pa'i lngab gzhag/ de 'og bdun pa'i bzhipa gzhag/ de la dbyangs kyi gnyis pas brgyan// de 'o gadrug pa'i dang po gzhag/ dang po'i gsum pas

283b2(rnying rgyud): sna gzhag/ dang po'i gsam pa de la byin// dpogs pa'i rdza ba gzhag/ dbyangs kyi bcug sum nyer nas dbub// dadag bzhi pa'i gsum pa gzhag/ dkyings kyi bus phyog tu rdzun// de la bzhi pa'i slebs pa nis// de lta lasas bcan

283b7(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi lnga da'i rgyan ldan zhing // dang po'i gsum pa de la sbyin// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig rgyan ldan zhing // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la// 'og nas drug pa'i dang pos mdzes// dbyings yig bcugasum can rjen zhing // gnyis
284a1(rnying rgyud): pa yi ni gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa'i rgyan ldan pa// sngags kyi mtha' chu gzhag par bya// 'di ni rtsa ba'i snang ba ste// dang dbang med par srog nas 'jan// de nas chud 'di /

286b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul// de yi dkyil 'khor grags mni// dur khrod sol pas nag por byag/ drag pa dkyil 'khor zhes su 'dod// de yi dkyil du thum po ni// mu khyad zhi ba'i tshul du dkar// de yi dkyil du su gsung de// rnan chos kyi dkyi
