287a1(rnying rgyud): dang nus bcas nang du gzhug/ zad pa rab tu mtshan na par// ra dang rta dang kyis khrag/ bag gi khrag dang sbrang dug zug/ lcags pang drug gas byugs pa 'dun// tso mog nam bstan nang du gzug/ ma
287a2(rnying rgyud): rtags kyang thur bus gdab// zad pa'i sngags kyis bslab par bya'o// gzhan yang dmadzes chung ba y-i// gtor ma zlag ma gcig la gzhag/ drug dang lan ma gyi tshogs ma// chang dang mar nag ta du ru// rims na dag gis btab pa
287a3(rnying rgyud): khrig/ bral chen khrag dang zod par gyur// blag ma gcig la gzhag pa // dpal rgyamo tse rtag sa pa'i sgrog rgyal bu'i rgyung las rngas bsag pa'i leng skye bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtse ba bta
287a4(rnying rgyud): gyis gtub cing sbyin bsreg bya ba dang / thun por 'beng ba dang / gnan pa'i las 'di gsungs so// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzas rnams la// zad pa'i sngags kyis ba sbyin cing bskul// me 'bar rtags mthong bur pas gdab// badz+ra pu ru na rba
287a5(rnying rgyud): snying thag tshal ba rbad/ gzhubs tsita rbad/ myags thugs zad/ snying khrag kha la rbad/ tshal bus sin du chad/ hu ra thums srog la ya rbad// de nas mtshon gyis gtub par bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ dug zhi
287a6(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i shing bu la// rigs ngan khyim nas blangs pa'iri mos// sngar la ling+ga sreg pa ni// dur khrod shing la yam shing ni// bur ragasum logs la khrag chen pos// ming rus dris pa re re dang // mi dum bu rer dang /
287a7(rnying rgyud): dang phye tshol sogs rdzas// sngags shing sreg pa'i las rgyas na// sbyar du gyis kyis 'debs par 'gyuraro// mu mra sarba shwad+d+he mA / dz+dza/ daha \u0f7f/ btsapa tsata Sh+Tha// 'dzi Ta/ swAhA/
287b1(rnying rgyud): rgyad kyis 'thab ra 'gyur// denas parnags pa shedul 'dung // sa cang gang kyig 'a'asums thab// na 'ad byas sags nga / da da na pa da / bya sngags na pa gas nga ba// ngan nga mdzag/
287b2(rnying rgyud): le zang / mazang rgya zang / yule rbang da/ mu sni mr-i sIn na nan/ rag mo ni rig mo che la lo zang drung / drag sde zad zad zang / Ni kha lo kyi kha lo zad zang / cod tses zang zad/ nigau nIti/ mugs grags/ bram thum sum tre zad/ ma/
287b3(rnying rgyud): tham zad/ mag mog nga/ chege mo yang / sa mi mang bzhes pas can 'phang / grangs ni spyod ba byu // dpal lham tshochags pa grog N+Dal ba'i rdza lam dran pa srung pa'i ma bcad pa// de nas yang bcon
287b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis ser ba dbab pa ri las 'di gsungs so// sha sA khAg sna snying sna dang // nal bu'i snying dang lo zla'i ming // nal bu'i thod par sngags kyis grub// ma mchu wa rba lu sa ma ya sI/ dza lang du madz+ra/ ak+ka sha ya/ tra ga rag zom/
287b5(rnying rgyud): 'phra rdzogs dang las la byor// gtor ma gtang zhing grags kyis baphrul// bran+da rdza su gsum du bgos nas sa// gcig ni khrel sa'i rten la gnan// gcig ni thabs pa rdo rje 'ayang // gcig ni gyis kyi gta'ang ma gzug/ drA /
287b6(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i rnas rgyan la// blan can pa dpa rjid 'dod do// des ni las rnams cing mi // zhes gsangs pa dang / 'khor thams pa de ra brgya dga' das/ bcom ldan sa kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa btsud // dpa ma
287b7(rnying rgyud): gis shi brog ces rgya pa sa seng 'a ba'i ma sto pa 'o// dengs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mo chen pas 'dug su sa/ kyis can na/ dmigs 'di kyis kyi 'gas
288a1(rnying rgyud): thab ga dpa 'o sa nordzogs pa na// mamathun d+hamathA hU~M// rig pas shes pade min mdzar// banan du dang ske thab pa dasmras pa// gnyis med kyan smos pa 'ab mag/ ta sa//
288a2(rnying rgyud): su med pa'i mkha dbyings pas// thang chub sems kyi smin tshogs gtings// bad mcha ga ming bzhin char du 'bebs// thams cad ma skyes pa byed pa'i bya// trA~M// rin ci na bar ba 'a ba las// sha gyi da kyi mi spong
288a3(rnying rgyud): e yaM r-I suM paM hUM// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i nam mkha' la// 'thor byed rlung nag tshogs ni rgya gram gtams// chags pa ra k+ta'i tshogs ni rba klong 'khyil// zhing chen gtams pa'i tshogs ni mtha' dbus brdal// keng ru laM'ang ri'i
288a4(rnying rgyud): rA mi bza 'i// de sri rdo rje rgya gram gcal bkram nye// rna tshogs dag pa'i snang ba 'di brjod do// b+h+rUMHhUMtsapra ha la ha la hUM/ mi bzung mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal khas ni// chu smin byeb sa ya'i thod pas/ mi bad du dzod 'bang
288a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i cig chang bya/ khyod kam dgra yi rtsig pa mkhar du brtsig/ gnam lcags su mo 'brar ba'i gzir gyis btab/ rin chen mchog gis zung bzhi mdzes par brgyan// g.yo 'od sngon po 'bar ba'i kha ba can// kri tung gnas
288a6(rnying rgyud): grags 'bar ba'i ri mis rgor// sum pa sam pa b+han+tar zhi / mthing naga'abar ba'i kyil 'khor na/ zhing chen zhing chung gcal rngu bkram// mchog chen mchog chen gad na the tid / te thang dgra pa rgya ga la
288a7(rnying rgyud): min kun kyang bdan ting // ts+li Sh+T+ri d+ha/ yi / rak+Sha k+shi / de'atir na/ chung maN+Dal hU~M/ dpal myo m-i rtags pa'i srog rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ gzhal las khang gdan de bcas pa brnam
288b1(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo su bskyed cing rgyun dru pa 'di gsungs so// oM nag mo ti ling ma mdun ting // d+h+r-id+d+ho/ yi ge ma las bgyid pa'i rgyu mo d+he// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag nan/
288b2(rnying rgyud): srin mo'i tshul// ral pa'i thor tshugs gser dang bye rus brgyan// dus bzhi'i ma mo bzhi la su las 'char// zhing chen ga yang gzhi rtag lpags sbrul gyis brgyan// 'khor du mi bzad nag mo stong gis bskor// mthing nag rjes
288b3(rnying rgyud): zhon 'jigs pa'i su mdog gsal// b+h+rUM b+h+yo/ dur khrod gsang ba dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// lha mo chen mo mthu mo che// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur ston 'khor dang bcas// rnal 'byor dam pa
288b4(rnying rgyud): gdung ba'i tshe// mchi mthul thul de tshur sbron// nyi ma byang shar pha ki ne// thag dang chu 'thabs mar 'das na// mtsho mu le gting gi nang shed nas// ma gcig dpal ldanar ma ti// nag mo stong gi 'khor dang bcas/
288b5(rnying rgyud): thugs dam dbang gis spyan 'dren na// grub mchog brgya baphyir gshegs su gsol/ skyon tshe dpal chen he ru ka'i// spyan sngar ji ltar dam bcas pa/ ma chu rtse yi sgo 'gram du// las blangs dam bcas bdag
288b6(rnying rgyud): bskul gyis// dam tshig bzhin du gshegs su gsol// oM nag mo ting lam mdun b+h+yo dzaHhU~M hoH// nag modun b+h+yo/ dpal lha mo go// srog rgyal bu'i rgyud las/ sru bgyed pa spyan drang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig
288b7(rnying rgyud): pa// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo nag mo la phyag 'tshal zhing brtan par bakhrugs pa 'di gsungs so// mi mngon mkha' dbyings dag pa nas// yang dag su gcig byung ba ni/ srug

290a14(rnying rgyud): terar+t+taDA hi/ panas rbiShA te/ dpal lha mo tse d+ha gsang ba'i srog rgyal bu'i rgyad las/ sha khrag gi mchod pa'i leng ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
290b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs na/ tsun rdzon srung ba ma yin pa'o drasan ma nga drun pa khyer mchos son 'grams/ gshin de'i snyam gasteg bang la sa das ti sras rkyen padanatha ngas bya bslabs nas dam pa skyobs da rgyan
290b2(rnying rgyud): tsha'ingag tan yo rdzog 'du pa dang / nas naso nga rdzu sa kyi sa gas cha gi sa sa / bdagal btod dang / nga da/ sa tsho
290b3(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa dang / srang gra gdul ba dang / de yis bka ts+tsha stsol ba'i dngos grub sbyin no zhes/ khas blangs dam bcas pa'i dmatshig lus mi 'da' bar bye ba dang / khyod kyi phra yi khyad par bstan pa dang / khyod kyi zug
290b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dngos grub sngal du gsol/ khyad par du yang bdag gi dgra po che ge mo 'di/ sngon las kyi rnam par smin pa la ma gzhag gzhan gyis gnod pa'i sbyor ba lam ltos/ dus dag nyid du rtags rnam pa sna tshogs brtan du gsol/
290b5(rnying rgyud): dpal lha mo khyed la bdag pa'i las bcol ba'i/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gyi dgran la 'thon gyi gos dag/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bshigapa/ dkon ga ga pa 'bangs srid pa/
290b6(rnying rgyud): rnam pa mas pa'i thab papa za dag/ mitid rkyong byer du/ bdug grag bstan pa gsheg pa/ ya ga ze ba/ dkor ba rlom pathang ngam da la btab pa'i dgrab tshig mo 'dilas kyi srang dmar bas cabanas pagacig
290b7(rnying rgyud): 'i rgya sa mdun nas sun ni/ dang tugs dang na sa'adus phrag drug rgyag cu khye las gyu/ 'i ba
291a1(rnying rgyud): drug sa sa rlo par // // sa phrul ba na lam ma mas na /
291a2(rnying rgyud): sa pabyed pa'i phyir// dbang garin pa 'di gsungs so// sbyinas yid ma lhan thu'i pa tho bskyed pa/ slob dpon gyis rgyama'i thag sablangs pa/ gang cig mas su meng bskyed la// rtathugs pa 'dregs pa'i du 'i bo nga// ngadang na
291a3(rnying rgyud): brtsed cang dus nyid du/ skye mong gu yi 'ang baphra rabs// mi nyams pa yis las 'ded// brtsams nas thams cad mthar phyin shog/ phrin nabs dbang mcho gatho ba par shog/ ma ma dag kyi la ni'i la/ rjod bathod pa'i nyi brgyab kyi
291a4(rnying rgyud): bda' bas/ sangs rgyas kyi brtan pa bsrung shing mtha tshal mchog dang ldan zhing / dgra 'dul zhing bgegs 'joms pa'i dbang thob par shogacig/ l+r-ing gu chus spyong thogs la/ srid pa gsum du rdzogs pa 'o// mdzu ba gnyis 'a'i thod 'dis
291a5(rnying rgyud): rigs ldan khyod la dbang bsrung du// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug tul// lha mo'i gsung dbyangs thob par shog/ gau tI a b+hi Shi d+d+he ma/ rigs kyi bu khyod la rnga chung gi dbang tho ba byed thar cig/ gwa rus sngags pri shogs ma/ ting 'dzin rje
291a6(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa yis// grol byed phyags thar dpal rngan 'di// grag sung rtags las rab sgras pa'i// rigs ldan kyad la dbang bskur bas// dam nyams grol zhing byed par shog/ badz+re tI 'i nyA sas su d+hi h+lA / dzi ma ldan byeng mi
291a7(rnying rgyud): lpags phur gyi dbang bskur bas/ dam nyams myur du bskal ba'i dbang thob par gyur cig/ gu rus thod phreng thogs la/ bu gsum 'degs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// sku gsum rgyan ni mnyams pa'i// thod pa'i thebs dbang bskur bas// mi
291b1(rnying rgyud): gzungs ni bab par shog/ badz+ra mA la a ti ShiHa// rigs kyi pa khyod la bong seng gi dbang bsgyur bas/ nus pa'i dbang thob par gyur cig/ ku nus yungs kar thogs la/ sgrub pa'i dzas rgya can brlabs pa'o// grob gazla ba'i 'aslab pa/
291b2(rnying rgyud): yungs kar rgyal pos dbang bskur bas// dgra bgegs grol ba'i dbang thob shog/ badz+ra krota a b+hi Shi d+ha d+hI/ rigs kyi bu khyod la yungs kar rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas// dgra bgegs rtsol bar byed pa'i dbang po par gyur cig/ 'dod yon lnga ldan
291b3(rnying rgyud): gtor ma 'dri// rigs ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// rang byeng dpal gyi lha mo yis// rus pa rdzogs pa'i dbang pob shog/ ba liM ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa dz+dza a/ dpal lha mo tsi t+ta gsang ba'i srog rgyal ba'i rgyud las nus pa dbang gi le'u ste bcu drug pa/
291b4(rnying rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zor drug thun dang 'dun po 'di gsungs so// snying zor lug nag snying pa ni// yungs kar brab cing de phyogs 'phang // zod zor rabs chad thod pa cu// khrag sku phrugs la de phyogs 'phang // bu zor bya nag cheg
291b5(rnying rgyud): zab cing de phyogs phur bar bya// mda' bor bug pa pho rog sgos basmon la// bug shing mde'u bcug la 'phang // sgong zor bya nag sgong bu// bran pra ba de phyogs 'phang bar bya// thun ni yungs kar sna tshogs zan snas zab par bya'o// lha mo tset+ta gsang ba'i
291b6(rnying rgyud): srog rgyal bu'i rgyud pas thun nor gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas 'khor na gnas pa'i lha mo dang / gru mo dang / bdud mo dang / srin mo dang / bdud dang / mgon po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gza' dang / grol ging rnams kyis bstan pa 'awa
291b7(rnying rgyud): bar dam bcas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhag pa'i gnas su 'dug nas sgrol ba'i shing du khas grangs so// tsit+ta gsang ba'i srog rgyal bu'i rgyud las dam bcas pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / tsit+ta gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//
292a1(rnying rgyud): na/ cu gang gdang // nying lol/ 'odas dang / snying thig bkol ba'i chud/ de nas 'jigs byed he rugs// snying thig rgyud 'di bzhag pa ste// 'ug pa'i gdong can zhes sa grags// 'ad gro'i thun dang bzhi'i ding da
292a2(rnying rgyud): ste gzer sngags dang snying thun dral bas gas pa'i las// byin sregangs par gas pa dang // ngan gas sbyor ba rnams cad dang // gtor ma las kyi sbyor bdang // ba gdags pa yinam pa dang // dbang du ba dra zhing shis bstan// rab sa tshad nag
292a3(rnying rgyud): da paH// rba sku gtsung dang thag tu gtsang // sred de yi ma lta ba nom// dan gas rtsong ba 'di ltar ba\u0f88\u0f90// mam s+t+rai 'dug ts+tshaH/ mkhye ga zhi pa ga tho / 'bras pangs dug ni ma gyur na// 'chi bar 'gyur bar mid na mig/ thug
292a4(rnying rgyud): gis gnod pa de la gre tor// gan kyang drug par rab tu rnas// dben pa'i gnas sa me nas ni// sa ya~M maN+Dal bye dran// midag kyi dka shA bya pe slong nying // mi pheg rnams kyig yang gzhi ma nyams 'ding bar byed// dkyil 'khong sa gsum sos
292a5(rnying rgyud): zag mi mag por pa'i nang du ri// so so'i snying khrag gter mar bsngal// de yi nang du gzugs kyi rten// shing shan brim pa'i ming rngas dang // srog d+ha'i nang du dmaju gzug/ sbrang gi nang du dam dub cing // khA ni bgazan dag gis gcad/ dmar sa
292a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis byed/ drim ma du gzhag / 'dug nyid dpa la ma nyi bzhan/ na 'a sa btsun du/ sre 'a ga shi las/ gle byed migs d+d+hiH// na byin pa ba nga bcu// tham
292a7(rnying rgyud): 'ang 'ching // sa gshi rigs pa rgyam d+hI// dr-i ni tshul bzhin paphrul ba // maung dag na / nas gsum bzlas pas ga dgas par // nyi ma dang pos sprul du bye // nyis gnyis pas 'grags par byed// gsum
292b1(rnying rgyud): srog 'phrog nyams par byed// bzhi bas gsod cing 'a ba byed// rdza lenab spyad dag can// srar bu so gsam gdab par bya// yang dgazugs dam can gyis gathag// dbyas su dzod dang stsal nas ni// gnod par byab ba'i gnas sus// rlud
292b2(rnying rgyud): las rnam bzhis gzir gnan tha// des kyang the tshom med par 'grub// yang na dgos pa de rnams kun// gzhu'i nang du bstsal nas ni// 'gro dang 'dug pa'i rdzas rnams su// gtso mo bzhi po nam grub 'phrul// lung dkar thal chen ni tshem// rog sngags/
292b3(rnying rgyud): gsad pa'i phyi po zlas// de yinang du gdab par bya// khrag ni gnod pa de la gtor// yang na nem phyogs su 'phang // gzugs rnams rabs chad thod par bskul// gnod par 'grub pa'i sa sam// gnan pa yang na gong me bzhin// ldang ba
292b4(rnying rgyud): cad med 'dod na// myur du de ltar byas pas 'thug// bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di rnams yin// ma mthag rag shu mun tsats+tsha/ ru snying khrag kha la rag sha ni rbad bu ril ri la zad/ ma ma snying ba la ras te'u zang // thum ri li'i zad/ ma ma ni she ku ru dag
292b5(rnying rgyud): hU ba re 'i ku ni khAr b+h+yo/ bum de 'i li rdung // ma ma jug rag sha sutra nying ran tu thum li'i drung / ma mis mu l+ya snying kha dag kha bum ni dzes dun myur yar phiT thun to/ mnag sha ba dag mob+h+yo/ che go mos nam ra sa tsid+ha bu ring ma ral parda /
292b6(rnying rgyud): snying tig bkol ba'i rgyung las/ srid pa'i bdeng gro ma'i thun dang / bzhi'i snying theg dang srog tig gI le'u ste dang po'o// / des kyang gal te mthub na// bu mo bzhi 'i byo ba bya// dben pa'i gnas su song nas kyang // ma ma
292b7(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal ste dun// mes ji ga yang gzhi te nas kyang // dkyil 'khor gragasum thi ba // mi 'i rjod pa'i spyod na// / snying dang khrag gis gtor mabya// de yi nang dra dag yi gzugs// chog la gis gzhag par bya// srog tu dang du bsngal
293a1(rnying rgyud): sa// da ga// dang da grus/ ma na na smra dus sa
293a2(rnying rgyud): mar// sra mi bu mos po phrul/ dka ba'i ba la// sog nying gsang pa'i sngags pathas la// des gzugs la gtu byu \u0f7f// te me ngos smral ba cid// nyis gnas pas 'grag med// gsum pas zag ga
293a3(rnying rgyud): par byed// bAzhapas gsod pa 'bobar byed// lA 'i nub 'di dag par// thar pa so gas pa ga dab pa \u0f7f// yang dgazugs de 'tshon gyis gtug// rabs rgyang pyod par bsdus nas de// gnod pa 'thab pa'i sa rbaH// phrirnalas gangabacam de la //
293a4(rnying rgyud): bas par gdod mi par 'thang // yang na dgas padirnams na // gapa dang dra 'asa'i nas na// 'gro da 'jug pa'i ngas rnams sa// bram thag pa bsrel bar bya// rbang dgang tham tshan na tsal/ srog da gsang pa 'i dgas banas pa//
293a5(rnying rgyud): de yi nang du ga dab par bya// khrag ni nyams pa de sa gtor// yang dasogs su 'ang ba bya// gzugs rnams rabs chad thod par bskul// gnod pa 'grub pa'i sarbaH// mnan pa yang ni snga ma bzhin// rgyan du ltar byed 'gyur na// ldang ba thams
293a6(rnying rgyud): cad med par 'thar// des zlas pa 'di san// dag po dran rdzi dag shi ti shad shA rag sheng ming gardzi dza dza snyed la shad dang / dgra tsun mchen mo/ reg she ma zad/ su rba shes na / shing shid / nag shA du dag ma
293a7(rnying rgyud): ti gang / tshige so skyeng par ga / tshal pa rnam tham / ga mo lugasam nye pa dang / sA sa nang / ga so shi srog dngags ma pa Ta/ nam ga da 'dzad/ sa tun bzhin sngar pa phaT/ ga pakos
293b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ bu mo bzhi'i srog tig dang rkang tig gi leng ste gnyis pa'o// / ma snying gi gzer sngags kyis// thams cad du ni badz+rag cing gsang// dmar gyi gtor ma an+ta ra bcas// snying na chags cha dad rba thugs// grugasum na/
293b2(rnying rgyud): rdu lidi gzhag/ srid pa'i ma mo tshogs kyi gtso// stong rtsa brgyad ni rab bskyed cing // skyon dang dbang bskur byin gyis brlal// zil gyis mnan cing bsdig par bya// mchod 'bral srog snying stod du bzlas// pho nya rnams ni tshul bzhin bkye// gan
293b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi yang rab tu bskul// ma mo spyi yang rab tu bskul// gu gul dud pa rgyun mi gcang// tshang rnam pa lnga yang 'dug/ lnga lnga dag kyang dbye bar bya// mchog las ni byed 'gyur bsgom// nyung dkar thig cing gzugs la thab// reg mo snying rtsa la b+h+yo//
293b4(rnying rgyud): mo dag mo snying du ru hUM/ reg mo tsab la dgra bo'i snying kha rag s+ho/ reg mo tsa pa khrag mu mu ma mtsho/ reg mo sems byed snying la skyo// reg mo sna byed mig la b+h+yo/ reg mo nyan byed rna ba la b+h+yo/ reg mo skra byed lce la b+h+yo/ reg mo tshor byed lus la
293b5(rnying rgyud): reg mo srog rgyud rtsal b+h+yo/ reg mo bi la ri li li/ reg mo khrag la ri li li/ reg mo snying la ri li li/ reg mo srog la chem chem/ reg mo bi ri li li/ reg mo bshi ba tsa pa tsa la dza dza/ reg mo snying skad cal dza dzaM/ rag mo d+ha rmad srog la dza/
293b6(rnying rgyud): reg mo shA n+yAd d+hi ngi la dza dza/ srog rgyad dbugs la dza dza/ oM ga ga ni ga ga ni/ A kar sha ya A kar sha ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban d+hA ban d+ha/ ha sa ya hA sA ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ga ma ra/ ya dza ma ha ye ma ye ge ye/ reg mo dza/ oM ru lu ru d+hi de d+ho/
293b7(rnying rgyud): dgra po'i snying la thun/ dgra po'i lag la thun/ dgra bo'i rkang la thun// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa de// ma 'grub bar du gzugs ming bcas// spyi yi sring gzer ma grub kyang // gtso mo bzhi'i snying gzer bstan par bya'o// rdzas drang sngo ba sngar bstan

294a2(rnying rgyud): kha la kha com b+h+yo/ rag mo snying la ya/ rag mo dbang po la la/ rag mo gro co la skying zan mthun/ rag mo dun ti ma heng nyed / rag mo sha la dza dza/ srog rgyud dbugs la dza dza/ rag mo snying Sha rag mo dun ting dun dang rab mo ma ma shin ting wA ra pa

294a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra mA ra ya/ shig kha la za mang / khrag ting shan ting sdang ba mA ra yaM thib su ran sha thob/ pra ti ga nyi thib/ da ra ya thib/ mu shi badrA kha la sbub ri lI/ snying gong tshod/ dbang gi ma bkod cing dam mi gnas// the tshom za zhing zhe sdang med// lasi

298b2(rnying rgyud): pal// de la thig bzhi gru bzhir gdab// ma bzhi logs na zhir dgod par bya// mtshams bzhir las byed bzhi dgod bya// ma mo bzhi yi thod pa la// mthing nag gra gsum 'bar ba'i steng // dpal gyi phyag rgya dgod par bya// de ni dpal gsang
298b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ro// rgyal po gsum dang gson khrag gsum// rgya sna gsum dang dug snag sum// rdzas gsum drag po'i sha lnga gsum// dgra po'i ming rus bris nas ni// rabs chang thod pa'i nang du thug/ rgyu zhags dag gis dam du bcing // rgyas pa'i gzung
298b4(rnying rgyud): thags rab tu gdags// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa der// phyer rtsang khrag gis byug pa la// kha 'u tshon srung khrig btags brkyang // de la mthun rdzas rab tu gzhag/ de nas mtho gang rtsing rtse la// mthing nag kur gyi yol bas dga'// gnyen
298b5(rnying rgyud): po'i sgra yang sgom par byed// ma mo rnams kyi rngam brtan pa// gzhong pa gra gsum nang du yang // khrag d+hA gsum dang sha sna dang // sman sna tshogs pa thug par bya// gtor mgu gsum bkod de gzhag/ g.yas kyi bu gsum zhal de la// zur gsum mi
298b6(rnying rgyud): rus bres pa dgod// chang phrad sman dang sha sna dang // khrag skas ga dang glang po seng ge dang // sbrang ki'i snying la sogs pa gzhag/ dmar chen gtor ma ma mo'i rdzas// zla ga ma zhal gyi gnyis pa li// khrag sde skyong dang sman rdza 'bru// 'dza' gad bkang bas ba
298b7(rnying rgyud): dam bgang // nyung dkar khrag gis byug pa la// nad kying bos gsod pa'i rdzas// zhing chen klu dum 'akram pa la// tshol chen drung ba rgyan mig cad// thod nag bcing na 'gos nag zhon// dbang gzug ra mad 'a klog par byed// de sdang 'bar ba'i dkyil mo /
299a1(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang mom dum bzhin du babyed// yang teg bkol ba las/ gnas dang dzin du bya ba da rdzas bstan pa'i long gag nyis pan// de nas yang dgra bshad paraH// nas bstan bas khyis kyang /
299a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rim pa dmigs pa yis// dbang chen rim pas dmigs par bya'o// mag shin 'dus bya dkyil 'khor du// 'khor lo bzhi yi lte ba dbum// phyogs srong khro ban+da rigs lnga dang // 'dod pa'i dbang can nyal ba dang // snying rje che ma rtog te zad me
299a3(rnying rgyud): te shu rtsa gcig mdog ma nges// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bde gshegs 'dzin// steng zhal rdo rje mnyam myor bas// byang chub sems kyi rgyu las byung // gson gshin sgrol ba'i yum zhes bya'o// srid pa bde 'gro mder dmigs// de yi 'byung ba bzhi po la// mcho
299a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad par bya// stong tha brgyad kyang dmigs par bya// spyan d+hang dbang bgyur byin brlab te/ bdag yang sems kyis dbul ba dang // dra dang rba dang dgas pa'i sngags// gon mo 'khor dang bcas pa yis// nyin grang mtshan grang mnor 'jas// nyen gang mtshan
299a5(rnying rgyud): kung la bstsal zhing // dus der gtor ma gtang bar bya// ma nor dus su rim par bsgom// yang teg bkol ba las/ ma mo'i las bya thabs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// grub pa'i rtags mtshan byung ba dang /
299a6(rnying rgyud): las la rab tu sbyar ba'i mir// khyim mam dur mchad pas 'ongs gdong // khrag dung nyung dkar bsres pa de// rgya bkrol lag ga yang thugs te gtor// phyogs bskor g.yab mos gdul bya'o// drag po'i rjes kyis gnan te gzhag/ ser ba thog mar 'bredra 'ang
299a7(rnying rgyud): na// rmu gnas rgya mig brag dmar gnas// yul lha sogs la brdeg par bya'o// dzas dang sngags kyi sbyor bde// so so tha dganod par bsapa// las la btsud nas grub par 'gyur// yang tig bkol ba las/ sa so las la sbrer ba'i
299b1(rnying rgyud): na da/ de nas thags kyi sbyor ba// las pa pan 'dags pan par bstan// yo y-i ti shA pa byung rgyus/ thagyis yang mdzad/ ma hA gag+sa gsan/ sum pang byu / sa shashapa dag gang nga kyang / ngan
299b2(rnying rgyud): rag/ ma ma trag sha dza/ spring dzu dun dun rag mo te kaM/ ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ snying kha rag ma sa ma sa du dzA da/ tsar nan mar shag ni du mA ra ya dza shag/ snying tsam rag mo thun thun/ ma ting rag mo thun/ sgyid khrag mAng yang du/ dgra bo thun thun/ ma
299b3(rnying rgyud): rta pa ga mor du ga // zin pan/ ma mthag rag gi cin ma nyid rtsig pas/ rgyag mas du myur pa mican gyi/ dpa'o thang pa las/ nyid la ma/ dbang po pas/ na ma kyi/ zhin du / thad+ham na// da
299b4(rnying rgyud): shig sod/ nAg las myur du kyis shig/ btsan stan/ mnyan/ 'bri ma 'gri ma sha dz+ra/ tshom tri mA ra ya rAg sha dza/ btsan la las myur du mdzod cig/ tri ling sha ka du phyung / tri tsa pa la shig/ khung d+hi/ ma mo las myur du gyis shig/
299b5(rnying rgyud): dengs bsam gtan sbyong ba ni// sngags la phan 'dogs phyir nabastan// dang por gnas dang rim pa bsgom// gnyis pa rim pas gsal bar bsgom// gsum pas dbang du bsdu ba bsgom// 'od zer dgye ba rab 'thos pas// srid gsum ma mo snye
299b6(rnying rgyud): nas drangs// de nas mdun du rab bkug ste// 'dir zhing srid gsum ba spa'i tshul drung du// lus reg yid gsum dbang du bkru ba'i rtags// ting 'dzin gsal bas 'jigs par bya// srid pa'i ma mo bka' gnyan pas// las le 'phos te snying nas
299b7(rnying rgyud): drangs// srog sgrol mig tsa rig rig 'dug/ gdang / datshangs pa'i gnas su 'don// snga phyir bzung nas thun nang // lpags nas las la gsal bar dmigs par bya// 'ongs nang gza' ba 'od 'bar ni// kha nas ngan sngags rab zlos shing // phrin pas/
300a1(rnying rgyud): shin n+ya gas da migs// ga do rungs pa'i gnas sa pado// mtshon mchar 'a bdas rgyangs pa'o// dbaldan pasngar // rdzags dang na dung bsam gan rdzan/ dngas na ni btan pa // dang
300a2(rnying rgyud): dres na dngos bu 'thob// blo sleb yod pashegs pa bya// 'phral zhing sdig na sur smra chags// khol zhing rlabs zung myur bar gsod// gnag na sa nya 'khor bcas thub// dmar na badrang mo 'khor bcas zab// de tshogs man dzin 'dor bcas 'ang // dI
300a3(rnying rgyud): l+r-iwa nga bcas zung // s+kha ni gang n+yas byung ba gyi// tshogs pa ni phub par \u0f7f// dr-i yang de bzhin zhes par bshad// nAb tsan brtag pa rab tu btags// shar dam nyo 'am nub pa ma byung // de yang dbus su byung na ba TIng // nyams la gsal lam mdzong na legs/
300a4(rnying rgyud): ro mo tonan bgrang bar bya// mang po byung na 'khor mi yin// gtor ma skyil sbyin par bya// bzhi du byung nag com ste// shin tu bcol badrag tuH// dmag tshogs ston ma las byed yin// lus la sbal gyis 'brel ba ni// 'khor gyi lu mo pas byed yin// bud rtsenab
300a5(rnying rgyud): d+hA rnam mo las byed min// gya shar byung nas las byed na// bdud po las byed yin par bshad// dgra rtags sogs dag bud mo byang // rjes pa med par shin tu dang // zo tshom nang de 'thab med// sbyor ba ma gtsang las mi phung// rtags lajos lang
300a6(rnying rgyud): rI mug/ se rlabs rgyang nalas mi thug/ de'i rtags kyi sgrub ba bshad// 'gra ba'i dris pa thub gzugs gzung / bco rgyanar gnyis ma ngos/ sa pangs bco lnga las byed ngas// dngas byab mtha' las la gdung // gangasa'i rab yang btan /
300a7(rnying rgyud): ma rje 'am 'am gyi bar// 'jam man bdun mam thapa med// dang ngo bsdur bgyur bar bya// 'as la gang ba'i las napas// gtong ma nga pagrags pa bya// rdzas nga pa la grus teH// yang ga 'dol palas/ bsam ga
300b1(rnying rgyud): dang / dus dang bcas pa'i le'u nye lnga pa 'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byab// cung zad grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bslab pa'i sbyor ba bcas pa sbyin// de yang kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// bcu tshan grub pa'i bsgrub pa ste// dra dam khan dang rje/
300b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rdzas rnams thun du thug/ mi yis mi mthong gnas dag tu// mu gsum nang du gsong la gzhag/ gtor ma chen po rdzas ldan gzung // dus rnams kun tu sbyin par bya// stong las mar me 'bar d+hI ste// 'od las 'dab bzhi las ci dpas
300b3(rnying rgyud): ldan par dmigs// steng gi nam mkha' nyi ma la// gnas pa'i steng du hU~M dmigs te// de las 'jigs byed 'bar ba bsgom// spyan drang byin brlab dbang bskur te// nyin mtshan bzlas pa thun re dbul// spyod lam dus bzhi thams cad du// lus la nyung
300b4(rnying rgyud): dkar dgye chu ba tags la// he ru ka ru gdug pa'i gnas// de yi ma mo'i gsal dmigs shing // sngags skyel zur ma chag par bzlas// phun sdod nang du nges par thug/ las kyi sbyor ba bstan pa ni// sad dang ser ba la sogs kun// nya gsum bsrubs la
300b5(rnying rgyud): bdun pa gajog/ gnam stong chos rnams nyi shu gnyis// bsrub ste phyi de rngub mo ni// sa ser dus sradrag po'o// 'dis 'thab gzhan gyis 'grub pa min// yang tig bkol ba las/ grub pa dang las la sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
300b6(rnying rgyud): naste yang dngag bshad zhib// shin su drag po'i rnal 'byo ngas// sbyor 'kho na grol bar \u0f7f// de yang thabs mchog bdun du 'jus// bsgom pa'i gnyen po nye bsal dang // las su drang bas yongs dang // thugs la dbang ba dzus las gzung dang // bcwo
300b7(rnying rgyud): zad pa'i sngags bzlas shing // zhe sdang 'bar ba'i kyim 'khor nas// gsang pa'i zhe wang 'bar dmigs shing // ma mos mtshon cha tshogs kyis// gsod par dmigs te thun du brdeg/ sgrol ba lung gi zhe sdang ngo // ma mos shin tu sgrol ba'i lam/
301a1(rnying rgyud): khrags spyi bong la nas kyang // rnam par shes pa byed par bsgom// thod pas thod pa 'jigs par bsgom// ma mus 'khor ba la ma la gnas// mdog dang mthun pa'i nad bskyed na// 'jog pa khrag med zhes kyang brjod// TIng na
301a2(rnying rgyud): mdun nang da kan rtsa// nam mkha'i ma mo rlung nag dang // bad kAn de las rtse bar dmigs// sgying nas g.yas na khrag gi rtsi// sa yi dbang byed ma mo'i rtswa// khrag ni de las 'byung bar dmig// rgyab na gnas pas tshogs rtsa// 'byung ba rlung gi ma mongs/
301a3(rnying rgyud): nad kyi gnyis 'byung dmigs// g.yon na gnas pa mkhris pa'i rtsa// 'byung ba chu yi dbang mo des// mkhris pa kun ka gnyis 'byung dmigs// yid kyi 'dzin phur 'debs pa la// zlog pa he rugs mis klog/ drag pa'i rgya lus dal te bzlas// gsang ba'i
301a4(rnying rgyud): dngos pab nges par 'byung // sngags ni rna dbang thos mi rung // yid dag lpag pa'i tshul du bzlas// phra ma nyams na dngos grub 'byung // bskal ba ci ltar 'dod pa drug/ bskang ba byang chub sems dang ni// bdud rtsi dmar gyi oM d+hi dang // zla shi nye dang chos brgyad
301a5(rnying rgyud): nyi shu gnyis dgu gnam stong bskang // byes su 'gro na lus la bcang // dgra byung mdun du gtor bar bya// nub mo bag phab khyim khwa brgyag/ sred par gyur na mi 'grub ste// de ni bsgrub pa'i dgos pa ste// rtags ni mod la 'byung b.rarta bshad/ bdun dang ldan
301a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba'i rdzas// 'phangs na tshangs pa nyid kyang bkrongs// yang nyig bkol ba'i las sbyor ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya'o// lus nges thams cad bsgrub pa la// las kyi sbyor bas grub pa yin// thun gyi sbyor ba
301a7(rnying rgyud): mchog tu bshad// rnam par sbyar ba'i snying por bshad// sA la gtad pa'i sbyor ba ni// mdang bdud la gtad par bya// gson khrag gsum la tshogs gsum gcad// snrel bri'i thod par zhugs la gnan// gcig la sbyig tor dag la gtang // nyung dkar
301b1(rnying rgyud): bcas pad// ma ma'i gtor ma dag la gtung // ma ma na shA// ma ma thing tha~Mng // mam // nga / snying zan ma// ma mkha' dang ma // rnyog mo khrag tog ma d+ha // rig mo skyong bar dag sa // dgra mo grom la thos tsa //
301b2(rnying rgyud): ma shan ting ma b+h+yo// reg mo dgra po snying la b+ho// reg mo dgra bo sha rgyud la rgyo// snying rgyud dbugs pa d+mo// rgyur srog la b+h+yo/ yang tig zab dang cung dkar bcas/ yag mo gro ma tsa la/ yan ma kro ma tsa la chu mchu ma thu ma ri li ri li/ reg mo kha re la b+h+yo// reg mo ru tA
301b3(rnying rgyud): ram b+ho// reg mo khA gtang kha spring la ril/ reg mo tis twa zad/ b+hu ma ri li ri li b+h+yo// reg mo sha la dza dza/ reg mo dbugs ladza dza/ reg mo snying la dza b+h+yo// srog mo dzadza b+h+yo// a bi tsa ra s+ya was pa yin/ snying po kyis skyes dgongs/
301b4(rnying rgyud): rag sha thun de rgyo// oM badz+ra mu nAn tra b+h+yo// ma ra b+hU n+yo// snying rdza ta ma b+h+yo// che ge mo'i snying la ya/ dun+ti reg mo dun b+h+yo// chu rag trag ma tri du d+ho// sha ma sha dzi mar du b+h+yo// ru snying kheg kha rag sha ni b+ho// ru snying khrag kha rag sha ni b+h+yo// nr-i sha ku ru ni ru ru
301b5(rnying rgyud): rbang b+h+yo// thag rag sha mu dza~M ni b+h+yo// des kyang skyong khram mthar phyin 'gyur// des kyang gal nye ma grub na// nyams pa dgra bo 'dul la gtang // mi med lha khang stong pa ru// rin chen sna tshogs sdod du ni// nas dang gro dang 'bru sna tshogs// rin chen
301b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs sbyar ba yi// gtor ma byas la lug gi ni// rje dar gtubs te byug par bya// bag phye'i mi gzugs sor bcu gnyis// dbang po lags btod ming dang rus// shing thun dag la snying gar smin// grwa phying gtsang ma mthing nag gur// nang du
301b7(rnying rgyud): bcas gzhag par bya// stod dmigs de la rta mgrin bskyed// che ba'i nga rgyal bdud rnams bod// bdun dri mar rung / hri du sang tri/ dri tri sho ma/ hri nang/ na mdzo / ya ya thi bathib/ ces stong bzlas// de nas bdud 'ong bstir pa
302a1(rnying rgyud): yo gyu// gnas ku s+ho// dug sa // gag pa ga bad/ gan /
302a2(rnying rgyud): dan rban pa na/ sa san ma mas/ sa/ / sa nga dag pa
302a3(rnying rgyud): mang byudang stesas na dag// mdun pa ldan padag gyis nag/ dbacig ga sa bsas// ga hU~M sa na thal na/ 'dzin mang chus bya zan dasam
302a4(rnying rgyud): suman+ta 'idres dgaci// dam kyig / thugs na da/ nga baspyod/ sa/ rnas ma dang
302a5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs mas kyis ngan 'bes// mam gas laka rim grog na lA ra/ mdzun sa kyi la ma/ gas na/ nga mam skyed tsatam la/ mahAg+sas la la/ ma tam/
302a6(rnying rgyud): gas ga da// na gas gas pa nal pan/ sa sa spyan/ sa na / tegs mangs pa shAs/ 'i 'a sa bye bdag// thus pashA sbyi sa nga dun
302a7(rnying rgyud): su ma chu du / ma sa du

302b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa
302b3(rnying rgyud): na / bas/

303a1(rnying rgyud): rnams sa rnams// tham nAm/ bya dus nyams brtan pa ni// ra bzhi mas brgyad mas la 'gyu// 'bring ba bsas sros la 'gyu// ma chung bco lnga mtshams lang \u0f7f// nas dang mam med na// Shad drang ba
303a2(rnying rgyud): dang // bi rdzi bzhi la srin mo 'gyu// dus der sna glan la sogs bya// las kyi myor ba bya bar bshad// sna glan pa dang / bya thabs dang / nyams len bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / yang tig bkol ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//
303a3(rnying rgyud): rgya gararA skad du/ tsit+ta u lU ka mu kha tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ snying tig bkol ba'i rgyud 'ug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed he ru ka laM phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'ad
303a4(rnying rgyud): dpal 'jig ma byed kyi rgyal po/ dur khrod chen po kyi sha na zhes bya ba khang bzang rab tu 'bar ba ni/ khrag gi rgya mtsho chen po'i glong / dur khrod kyi ro mang mo yod pa'i gnas/ thod pa brtsegs pa'i gnas/ thod pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas khang /
303a5(rnying rgyud): keng rus brtsegs pa'i grong khyer gyis bskor ba shin tu 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba'i gnas de na/ 'khor tshogs khro bo dang khro mo dang 'bar ba'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ma mo mkha' 'gro bsam b+his mi khyab pa'i tshogs la/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes
303a6(rnying rgyud): kyi ma mo dang / srid pa'i ma mo dang / bka' sdod kyi las mkhan dang / srin mo khro mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni 'di ltar/ dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / spos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum
303a7(rnying rgyud): mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs dang / sle sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma mo la sogs pa'i 'khor na/ sprul pa'i bud med seng gdong ma'i tshogs dang / stag gdong ma dang / wa gdong ma dang / sbrang gdong ma dang / gzhan yang gya rgod ma dang /
303b1(rnying rgyud): ng+ka mA dang / bya rog ma dang / drug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa/ sha khrag srog dbugs la dbang byed pa/ 'ji gtan gyi nad bdag mo/ srog gcod pa'i bdag mo/ bdud kyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'i tshogs dang / gzazu' yi bu mong tshogs dang / pra
303b2(rnying rgyud): srin gyi bu mo'i tshogs dang / gru srin gyi bu mo'i tshogs dang / las le grub pa'i lha sbyin gdug pa can la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor te gnas so// de'i tshe de dag gi nang nas las kyi srin mo 'jig rten gyi tshe srog la dbang byed pa'i bdag 'o/ gsod byed
303b3(rnying rgyud): dmar mo mi ban ma zhes kyang bya/ srin mo 'od 'dus shang ka ti zhes kyang bya/ dmar mo chu srin rgyal mtshan can zhes kyang b+ha/ klog byed chen mo za mo ta zhes kyang bru ba zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen mo la lan brgya stong du bskor zhing mchod pa byas te/
303b4(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// e ma dpa' bo thugs rje bdag // bskal pa bgrangs pa'i 'gro drug rnams// las kyi 'khor ba'i 'jig rten 'di// sgrol ba 'ba' zhig thug rje'i bdag// khams gsum blol ba'i mchog 'tshal gyis// srid gsum sgrol ba'i dbang sgrol cig/ ces gsol pa dang
303b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'jig byed he ru kas/ kham gsum dbang du bsdus srid gsum zil gyis gnon/ su yi 'od zer dang gsung gi nga ro dang / thugs kyi sprul bas 'khor rnams spro ba bskyed par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig srid pa'i khro mo'i gtso// srid gsum 'jig rten
303b6(rnying rgyud): thams ched du// mi dge'i cho 'phrul gsad bcad tshogs// bka' dang mthun pa'i las ma yin// 'on kyang lnga bcu'i tha ma la// brtan pa 'jig pa'i rje rnga'i tshogs// khyod kyi zas dang skom du bajo// dam sri bskal ba'i zhing bkra yin pas// srog dang dbugs la
303b7(rnying rgyud): dbang bsgyur ro// bka' dang mthun pa'i rnal 'byor la// bsrang dang dbab pa'i las kun byos// mu stegs log ha'i ngan sbyor rnams// rmog cing gsod par dbang bgyur ro// don dang mthun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi// las rnams ma lus kun byos shig// ces bka
304a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / srin ma chen mo sems rab tu dga' ba gyes nas/ dpal chen po'i bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du dam bcas te/ gsang sngags kyi sung mar gyur to// 'khor na gnas pa'i ma mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' bang
304a2(rnying rgyud): mas gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing / bskor ba dang mchod pa rgya cher byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho dpal chen khrag 'thung tshogs// bdag cag/ las kyis ma mo shang ka ti'i// bka' dang skyab pa'i rjes su ni// bdag cag
304a3(rnying rgyud): kyi
304a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le zhwa snyed po'o// / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba zhig gis mkhyen bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho dpal chen
304a5(rnying rgyud): thugs rje bdag/ las kyi srin mo chen mo 'di// da ltar ji ltar rgyu las byung // gnas ni ji lta bral gnas// las dang bye ba ji lta bu// gyi rabs bstan pa srung ba yis// tshul bzhin bsrub na ji ltar grub// ngan sngags sngor ba ji ltar lags// phan
304a6(rnying rgyud): gdags pa yi las ni gang // zlog cing bsrung ni ji ltar lags// dbab gsad cho 'phrul sreg mnan dang // dbang bskur shis bstan pa dang // las rnams ma lus mtha' dag kun// dpa' bos rgyas par bka' stsol cig/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
304b1(rnying rgyud): dpal 'dzegs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig zung zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin// las dang thugs rjes 'brel pa yis// srin mo'i las rnams ngas bshad kyi// gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// bskal pa kun bkod byab la// las kyis grol ba'i rtsa rjed// nyid
304b2(rnying rgyud): kyis de nyid gsang bar btul// srin po'i chung mar gyur pa ni// srin mong ro khrag 'thung myos// ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang // pha ma gdug pa'i bu mo ni// srin mo shang ka ti zhes grags// gdug pa'i byad rtsems ngan pa yis// 'jig rten phung la kha dpa'
304b3(rnying rgyud): dregs pa'i srin po r+yA de// mngon spyod thugs rjes bskul ba ni// 'dzam gling lho yi zhing khams su// phung po nyal stabs gan rgyal du// rol gling bzhir gyur pa ni// thug pa med par kun tu brkyang // dur khrod chen po brgyad du gyur// min mo ral gcig dam la
304b4(rnying rgyud): btags// bu mo srin mo shang ka ti// ro yi sung ma chen mor bzhag/ phyi rabs drang ba'i cho 'phrul du// rang byung mchod rten brgyad sprul te// srung ma chen mo brgyad rnams bzhag/ de nas 'dzam gling pa 'di kun// 'akri shis rdzu 'phrul 'byung ba'i gnas/
304b5(rnying rgyud): cho 'bul 'byung bar bka' snang to// de dag nang nas mtha rtsal can// srin mo 'od 'dus shaM ka ri// lha chen tshogs bdag zung mar gyur// lha mo shang ka ti zhes bya// bye 'gro kun gyi srog 'tshog pas// gso bye dadamar mo mi rban ma// srid pa gsum gyi
304b6(rnying rgyud): dbugs le nam// sbyin mo zhag 'thung ma zhes d+ha// yang na zlog byed pra mo ha// phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas// kha che'i yul gyi dur khrod de// mtha' yas kyi ni ri yi lug/ rgya mtsho'i gling gi ma ga do// dur khrong srin mo ro yi ming // mamo gnas ni den
304b7(rnying rgyud): gnas// srung ni mchod rten ka ni srung // las ni rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nyul// nga yi dam la rab tu gnas// dad mos nyams su gang lon pa// de yis dgos pa grub par byed// ces gsungs so// snying tig dkol ba'i rgya drug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba
305a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ las/ phreng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshang byug// bstan pa bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// las rnams 'og ma 'di ltar thA// khrag 'thang rgyal ma'i zla ba thubs ni// shin tu dben pa gnas
305a2(rnying rgyud): dag tu// srin mo galang gzhi bkram nas swA// de yid dbus su dkyil 'khor ni// thig le khrag gi blag mabya// srin mo'i grwa yang khrag gis bri// de yi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// snying gi gtor ma mdun du gzhag/ bstod pa'i tshig dang mchod pa ni/
305a3(rnying rgyud): dus nyid du ni dbul bar bya// bdag nyid dpal gyi sur bsgom nas// srub pa'i sngags ni 'dzub tu drang // grub pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang // nub phyogs su ni gtor ma gtang // dgongs pa dam pa de yi tshe// gsang ste gang 'dod bcol ba ni// klog dang lung da
305a4(rnying rgyud): gsod la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub// snying tig bkol ba'i rgyud 'ug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba las/ ma mo grub pa'i gnad kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// spyan 'dren nye ba'i snying po dang // las rnam
305a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gsang sngags ni// dang po bdag nyid gas la gdab sngags// oM badz+ra maN+Da shrI he ru ka ma hA tsAr+tha sarba duSh+TAn taka tA na da ha ba ts+ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid khro rgyal rgyal bya// oM badz+ra pra mo hA ru lu ru mu n+tu dz+yad+hi/ ma mo bskyed pa'i sngags so// dza hU~M hoH/ @
305a6(rnying rgyud): pra mo hu shang ka ring / sbran drang nye ba'i sbyong ba'o// badz+ra pra mo hwA d+hu du dri ma rag mo sbying tsa b+ho/ gru'i snying po grub pa'o// U badz+ra rab mo kho lar shA dung dmar kA ma la b+h+yo/ gsung brtsub thugs kyi drug sngags so// oM ba lin ra ska rag mo ShA hoH// me tsa me tar te tsa
305a7(rnying rgyud): gI hU~M/ mchod pa 'bral ba'i sngags sa// mal rnam gan na mob rgya ma rlu / grags las nga ming babye 'o// ma mtsho 'anadrug rin mo myong la ni rdzogasadun myo dag mo da la ma mdun dru rnala'i drug grags ma
305b1(rnying rgyud): s+ho/ snying shig zag la bajug pa'i gdong can ni rgyud las/ srin mo'i gas kyi le'u sta bzhi pa'o// / de nas pang dag bshad byab// dmangs cang ba gtor ma bsag/ gdung ba byungs kyis 'di ga dbyu du/ na
305b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod chen po'i gnas bsung na// srid pa yongs kyi sha zan mo// khams gsum srid pa'i dbugs 'phrog ma// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// yul gyi ming ni kha che'i yul// rgya mtsho'i gling ni mgo'o// dur khrod ming ni nye chen brdang
305b3(rnying rgyud): mchod rten ming TI ka ni nya// ma mo'i ming ni 'od 'du shing ka ti// gnas ni dur khrod he chen brdal// srung ni mchod rten ka ni srung // dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// skad ni mi gcig kha che'i skad// gzugs ni mi rton lag brtsa ma// ban ni me 'phrod lto ba la mo//
305b4(rnying rgyud): mched la gdung zhing dam la gnas// zhing chen g.yang gzhi gdan la gding // dmar chen dam la gshegs su gsol// dus 'dir grub pa stsal du gsol// bka' dang dam las 'das gyur na// he ru ka dpal thugs khros nas// dmar srug nang du tshig ha ra/
305b5(rnying rgyud): de skadang rtod cing spyan drangs la// mchod pa dus gsum dbul bar bya// nam dang nyi ma'i gung ba ni// dmar gyi ar+g+ha bstab cing sbeng // bsrub pa'i sngags ni 'dzab tu drang // snying tig bkol ba rtag pa'i gdong can gyi D+ha las/ ma mo gnad nas bakhrul ba'i
305b6(rnying rgyud): skye lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// klog pa'i thabs ni 'di ltar bya'o// sgrub tshul du mthun pa la// gtor ma'i nang du gdab pa ni// thal chen dang ni hung dkar la// srog byed ma yi zlo ga sngags kyis// nyin gsum bar du btang nas ni
305b7(rnying rgyud): thogs bcu dag tu gtor byas nas// dam sri bar chod bzlog par 'gyur// gzhan dag smos kyang ci dgos te// de yi mtshan ni spo bar bya// las skal bzhin du bcol gyur na// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang zlog/ oM badz+ra pra mo ha a lo khas nag mo dam ma byon zlog
306a1(rnying rgyud): 'a/ rdo/ thams cos yo bas/ mang sa nyasam lam ma/ gas sumapa te tam pan zlog can rdzog/ dam dang cad bzlog pa phyugs sa// mo ba bya ma bal drug sa ga
306a2(rnying rgyud): lha srin gyi rdzu 'phrul bzlog pa'o// oM ma ma shang ka ti rag mo rag mo/ man tha ma bruM waM shig shig rdo rdoHd+yo b+h+yo/ zod gtong bzlog cing slar gsad pa'o// snying tig bkol ba'i rgyud dug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba las bzlog pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
306a3(rnying rgyud): nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor 'khor bcas bsrung ba'i phyir// bgrub pa gzhung bzhin mthun pa la// bsung ba'i don du 'di ltar ro// bya nag mo'i rgong gtor ma'i dbus// rdzas ni nyung dkar thal ba la// zlog byed ma yi bzlog sngags kyis// gsu
306a4(rnying rgyud): par dwa bzlas nas ni// de yi nang du drug par bya// de nas ras kyi khye'ur blugs// gang la bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// lus sam mgul du btags gyur na// bsrung skye thams cad thub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra pra mo ha he dung ling / nag mo bam srungs/ e nu dra nya ma
306a5(rnying rgyud): sgying tig bkol ba'i rgyud 'ug pa'i gdong can las/ bsrung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// dgra bgegs 'pho ba'i las byed de// srub pa gre zhung bzhin mthun pa las// gsad pa'i
306a6(rnying rgyud): don du 'di ltar ro// gtor ma'i dbus su gzugs bzhag la// snying gi khrag dang bam gyi khag/ nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe la// gsod byed ma yid mod mo bzlas// lus dang gzugs la btab gyur cing // lba ba'i sa der men na na ni// rtags dang mtshan ma mur
306a7(rnying rgyud): du 'ongs// gsod byed ma yid mod mo yis// lha srin sde brgyad srung bar 'gyur// bud med lag pa g.yas pa cu// gsum mam mar gyi tshes brgyad la// dmod mo btab pa blugs nas ni// rang rang khyim gyi phyogs su gtor// srin mo'i lag pa zhes bya ba//
306b1(rnying rgyud): mid mod la 'babs par byed// lung rgyun du \u0f7f// gas pa'i da'ang po da tud do// nga rnyan so// ragam na sa/ skye pa gang ga tug+sa/ tshig mishig sum dang / smye gtsul paT byos ngan rkyenan/ dmajug te/ rag so/
306b2(rnying rgyud): der ye bun d+ho d+ho/ 'di dag ma mo'i dmod mo ste// las rnams nges par 'grub par 'gyur// snying tig bkol ba thug pa'i gdong can gyi rgyud ces bya ba las/ gsad pa thun nag gi mod mo'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag pashA
306b3(rnying rgyud): ba/ bstan pa bsung ba'i las bya na// chu 'khyag thog dang ser ba dbab// de yi las kyang 'di ltar ro// sgrub pa gzhung dang mthun pa la// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// dgra bo'i lo tog sngo snar bcas pa blugs// khrag dang dug dang ske tshol// thugs kyi ste
306b4(rnying rgyud): po 'bum du bzlas// las sngags khri zon dgra yul gnan// tsa ra'i khrag gI swa da mAr la ma bstan// srid pa g.yo phyir khrag zor brdeg/ seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sbyin mo nyid du dbang bskur te// lha gu gnas pa'i rten la gdab// sbyin thang nges pa
306b5(rnying rgyud): 'beb par 'gyur// thugs kyi sngags la rbad sngags spel// tad+ya thA dza ri lI ri li snying khA rak+ka pa shing ku ru ma ma ri ri hri la hril/ shar shar/ drag drag/ ru tsa ru tsa/ shru ti dza~M/ tsa mun rung / sa man+ta a kar/ du ru du ru phreM phaT/ ser ba spu 'dril sngang
306b6(rnying rgyud): so// ma ke na shing gi ta/ rag mo rag mo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dud gro/ dkar gr-i/ shu ti phreM/ su ga ti smi na/ drag tu tsar hril b+h+yo/ dum dum ma mthil shAg po ba/ e ke rbad glo bur phyin 'dod song / ser ba dbab pa'i sngags so// oM badz+radza mo hA/ ku ni
306b7(rnying rgyud): sa ma ma l+li thun praM rag rbad/ nal chem thur zad// tseg ram mo gro nad nad/ thog dbab pa'i sngags so// las rnams snga ma'i steng du yang // shes ring ma'i mtshal dang gser dang // khro chu'abar babrog lcags dang // 'dus bus nyung dkar rnams
307a1(rnying rgyud): bong pa gas sbyor bams pazla/ skyo zhi gas pa thug pa dang sa nas rgyud las/ thag sar dab ba pa'i lebabedas paso// / de nas yang dag ba bangarlab// cho du mthon du 'gyur da// sang ma
307a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs dbab// 'ug pa'i sha khrag lu la sogs// bag phye la sogs gzugs byas la// 'ug pa'i sha khrag blo btsugs te// ma mo'i mdun du gzhag par bya// lhas ngan gzugs ni sna tshogs kyis// thug pa'i gzugs kyi tha ma bskor// so so'i khrag pa
307a3(rnying rgyud): sa gzhag/ ma mo'i sgrub pa gzhung btsugs la// ltas ngan rgyal mo bskur bar bya// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba'i tshe// nam gung nag la dgra phyogs 'phang // nges par cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra pra mo ha/ e ru ta ba phaT/ rag mo ru'u ru lu ka po
307a4(rnying rgyud): tri la dun tshe trab tra ba sil sil phob/ sed+ha b+hA grA sril shwa na phob/ gr-i d+ha kang+ka kA kA u lu ma pho ba/ ma b+h+yo sa ma ya phob/ seng ge stag dang wa spyang tshogs// bya rgod kad bya rog 'ug/ mngon sum dag tu 'byung bar nges// snying tig bkol pa'i le Ta
307a5(rnying rgyud): 'ug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ ltas ngan gtang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma mo dam la rub pa'i phyir// dbang du bsdu ba'i las bshad de// bdug nyid dpal chen he ru ka/ thugs las ye shes rab 'bar
307a6(rnying rgyud): 'phros// ma mo'i snying gi dkyil du ni// dmar smug 'bar ba'i me dag bsam// de las ye shes sems dpar bsam// gal te dam las 'da' gyur na// bdud rtsi gtor zhing sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra kro ta ma ken shang tri ma trang du ha ma hUM b+h+yo D+ho// dza dzaH/ sa
307a7(rnying rgyud): ma ya i dan he na ra ka na rak+Sha kro d+ha dz+wa la raM/ mar k+ka pra be sha ya phaT/ de skad ces ni brjod pa ni// ma mo'i snying tig srog snying nyid// dmar smug 'bar ba'i me nang du// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro mor gyur// snying khrag thams cad 'thung bsam pas// ma mo nyid kyang brgyal
307b1(rnying rgyud): ba 'gyur// de nas las rnams grub pa dang // smrar zhing ma mo gso bar byed// oM r+han mo// badz+ran gits+tsha/ snying po srog gi snying po bri// zhing chen tshon wa yi snying // gse dang bcas pas shes rab mtshal// zhing chem thag mar bskal nas ni// 'gro dang jug/
307b2(rnying rgyud): dra'i dras su 'azlas// las rnams grub par gdo na mi za// ying teg bkol ba thug pa'i gdong can zhes byi ba'i rgyud las/ dbang du badz+ra zhing shes bstan pa'i tha srog gzung ba'i le ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dgra bshad bya 'o// las rnams
307b3(rnying rgyud): me yisra grub pa ste// sbyin sreg las ni 'di ltar ro// shar lho 'bu khung gra gsum te// drag shing gdug pa'i me thar la// mamo me lha nyid du bsgom// mchod rdzas rim par dbul bar bya// oM badz+rag tan mo ha reng la ni ram ram me ge mo lA ra ya phaT/ @
307b4(rnying rgyud): rgyang zeg man// tshangs pa'i tshedang ldan pa yang // skad cigasung la brnas par 'gyur// rjes kra 'i thud las/ sbyin bye ni la sa sa brgyan tam pal/ dedam ma dag pa ga byag// rten la las kyiganan 'byes /
307b5(rnying rgyud): drang thod pa de nang du// dgra bgegs ming dang gzugs bcas gzhug/ srin sreg thal ba gzugs bcas rbab// 1/ khang mchod rten 'dre gzugs can// lha srin gnas pa'i mar mong la// drag khrag chung dkar snatshogs thab// oM ma ma rag mos mal
307b6(rnying rgyud): e rgan rnong / ma mdzad/ le la/ swA Sh+kaM/ dazang / khag rdung/ d+harba / rag ma ts+tshaH/ rag min// nag po zag/ ma yus / bdi la ba bang ba'i dus med pa' sagasanas rdzu lngas/ mngon pa'i la pa
307b7(rnying rgyud): bstsu // / de nas pang dag bsha byeb// gal ti las sumathas na// bum zin la myor ba bcan// dben pa gan mi song ma // sa y-i nyel ste na/ ma man na ga mas/ kyil 'khong gags tha ga
308a1(rnying rgyud): mi mgo'i phor pa'i nang dag tu// snying dang khrug gi gtor ma gzhag/ de yi nang du gzugs kyi steng // grogs dgra bo'i ming dras bris// srog ca'i nang du 'astsal nas ni// snying gA dag tu gzhag par bya// dmar gyi a rbu gtor ma
308a2(rnying rgyud): bcas// de yi 'gram du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid dpal chen he ru bsgom// bdud dang gnod sbyin brag srin dang // klu srin bu mo bzhi po bskul// nyung dkar thal chen ske tshe dang // srog rbad gsad pa'i sngags su bzlas// de yi gzugs la gdab par
308a3(rnying rgyud): bya// nyi ma dang po stsal bar byed// gnyis pa de nyid 'gugs par byed// gsum pas srog 'phrog nyams par byed// bzhi pas gsod cing 'pho bar byed// lnga pa'i nub mo de dag kun// phur bu sor gsum gdab par bya// yang na gzugs de mtshon gyis
308a4(rnying rgyud): gtub// rabs chad thod par bstsal nas ni// gnod par gyur pa'i sa dag tu// phrin las rnams bzhi'i gzir gnan bya// nges par gdon mi za bar 'gyur// yang na de yi dgongs pa de rnams kun// ga'u'i nang du bstsal nas ni// 'gro'am 'dug pa'i dus rnams su/

308a6(rnying rgyud): gyur pa'i sa ru swa// mnan pa yang ni snga ma bzhin// rgyun du de ltar byas gyur na// sdang ba thams cad brlag par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub// rag mo dun tri yak+ka snying la shad shad/ che ge mo snying la rak+Sha b+h+yo/ tshal pa dum bu mA ra ya phaT/ bdud

308b1(rnying rgyud): zin papa'i/ nagar slo du dag mo 'i rtag shang / che ge mo na modzad pa rbag pa ma shig gyur la zad/ rnying teg pako rgyung zag pa'i gdang zhwa zhes byab las/ bugro 'i sroganang gsang pa'i ba ba rgya zhi / don
308b2(rnying rgyud): dag bshad cing // tshe srog nyams pa gsod ni// maN+Dal badz+ra 'ad ba bzhi pa// dbus su skrag ma kha skrad de// dpal chen nyid dang srin mo dgod// bzla dab bzhi dag la yang // bu mo bzhin tshul bzhin dgod// tshebu mad+ha d+ha thu ba med la// snying ngo sngags sa
308b3(rnying rgyud): kyis dag // rgyan chas ldan pas mchod pa dgram// oM AHhUM badz+ra mA yu She dzaH/ pu N+ye puSh+TiM ku ru sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~M/ tshe yi snying po zhag gsum bzang // bar chod bzlog phyir phyag rgyar gzhug/ bskul pa'i pho nyas tshe dpal drang // drod tshad zin nas tshe dbang bsla
308b4(rnying rgyud): de'i satsha la sid+d+hi nges par 'brib// snying tig bkrol ba thug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ tshe bsgrub po 'iri le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dge bshad byeg// ma mo gang pa'i rdzas bshad de// shel sdug skye dkar mo yi rigs// rgyan
308b5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba rdzas kyi mchog/ mkha' lding skrag mo thig le can// nyams chag slong ba'i rdzas chen de// gyes pa gtsang ma'i bam gsar ni// ma mo mchod cing sgrub pa'i rdzas// ma mo'i dam rdzas khyad par ni// wa snying me dang lug skrag snying // mkhar rdzing sti
308b6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi dang // byang sems dkar dmar rdzas mchog ni// ma mo brten pa'i rdzas yin no// gzhan yang sha chen tshil chen dang // 'bras bu mi dbang sha khrag snying // gsung chen dud dpa tshil chen me// g.yeng gzhi rgyal mtshan na gdugs dang // rdzas dang ldan pa'i ga
308b7(rnying rgyud): mdo'o// 'bru mang rtsi chang nga ti'i tshogs// ma mo mchod pa'i rten bye// snying tig bkol ba'i rgyud drug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba las/ ma mo'i mthun rdzas kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshar bye ba// ma mo'i rtags da
309a1(rnying rgyud): ma bshad// rab ni su ston gsung mchog sa// 'bring ni me 'drar 'ad 'phyo zhing // rlu dubyung porjes sla bar byed// rnam mi lam na chags nyon// dmang mo bud med // rnga seMn rgyal mtshan
309a2(rnying rgyud): ni// rmi ltas rab tu bshad pa yin// dkar mo bung na ldan bya 'grub// sor mo b+ha na longs spyod 'phel// nag mo d+hi na mthe rtsal 'thung // so d+hi byi na las la yul// dmag tshogs byeng nand gsod pa// gcan gung na byung na brnag pa
309a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub// du ba mthong na nyams pa gnod// rgod cing byung na dngos grub ster// sbyor ba byed na dngos grub 'grub// rgyang glu len na mchod pa ster// dbang rtags ston dang grel gyur na// gtor ma dus su sbyin kyar bya// mngon sum pa yi cho 'grel yang /
309a4(rnying rgyud): 'brug dang skra dang thug tshoms dang // rlung dmar 'khrug dang sgo chung dang // me dang 'od dang sgo khyim 'tshags// sna tshogs mtshan ma ci yang 'byung // gang yang med na rtog mi skyed// 'jigs par byang yang mnyam por de bzhag/ snying tig bkol pa'i rgyud 'ug pa'i ga
309a5(rnying rgyud): can zhes bya ba las/ rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// 'khrug pa bcos dang bskur zlog phyir// drag po bsang mdos bshad par bya// 'bru na tshogs pa'i ri rab ni// mchod rten
309a6(rnying rgyud): kak+Shi'i dbyibs su bya// ri rab gsum ldan bum pas mdzes// steng du dmar mo dar gyi gdugs// phyogs bzhir rgyal mtshan ba dan mda'// dbus su ma mo'i gzugs gzhag la// snying sna gser g.yu bdud rtsir bcas// gsal ba'i 'od dang bcas pa
309a7(rnying rgyud): dmam// de 'og bang rim dang po la// rtse mo bzhi yi gzugs bzhag la// dang dang rgyal mtshan snga ma bzhin// seng rtag zha dang srung gi dang // bu nod ga ga bya rog drug/ brgyad brgyad bang rim par mdo// 'bri lug rang ba nag gyi// sha ny-id gnyen 'a dgas
309b1(rnying rgyud): dang // srog zugs mi byams brgyad brgyad ni// bad sa tham dag pa ni// gzhan yang srid pa'i sems can gcugs// khadog yon gyis ngos bsgyur nas// re ba tham 'khor bar bya// spyan gzigs dkor ba cu rlu brtan// rang byud zas su brgya
309b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad// ma mo 'khor tshogs kun la brjo// bdag nyid dpal chen bsgom byas la// khrag 'thung mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya// tshe dpal drong dang dngos grub blang // zhag gsum bsten pa btsugs nas ni// ma mo nyid dang 'khor la da'o// gnod par gyur
309b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i seru bskul// las rnams nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de yi las thabs 'di lta ste// dkyil 'khor dbus su g.yang gzhi gding // de la lha bkod rdzas kyis bskor// byang du maN+Dal dris byug lnga// lug nag g.yang gzhi'i steng du yang // nas
309b4(rnying rgyud): nag khal lam ze gsum bdal// steng du bskang zlog mdos chen bzhag/ dbus su 'byor tshad skong rdzas la// lho gyogs bsad las 'grub khung du// shar du sgrub pa bdag nyid bzhugs// 'dis ni ji ltar bsam pa 'grub/ snying tig bkol pa 'ug
309b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dador can zhes bya ba'i rgyud la drag po mdos kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzhi dang gtso mo'i spyi sngags bstan// oM badz+ra pra mo ha ma ke na shang ki ma pe du ha na hU~M trug rag mo ra nA yak+ka dung hi pra mo ya n+ta ga
309b6(rnying rgyud): rAnA me// hu lu hu lu hrI dz+yo hU~M/ gcig tu dril te pho pa'o// oM rag mo tsit+ta nad ru ru rbad su ma du ha na ha na dzaHrba rbad/ oM tsi kra ha ha ka laM ba tor b+h+yo/ rA na tsa kra ba pa ma/ tsa ma ma du kha tsit+ta nan d+ho/ spyir zad pa'o// ra hi l-i ki li ki lA ya rbad TA/ i dar ri 'i s+ya
309b7(rnying rgyud): yi dang yang / lba pa te yeng / pa rog mo ta yang byi li ma ti yang / ma ma kan shing ki pra ma ya/ tiSh+Tha rbad/ br-i ri li li zad/ ya skAr na pra ma ni nA ga rag mo kri ri le nad zad/ tsit+ta \u0f7f/ kha rag trag ra k+ka thi/ ma hA sa ma ya/ ma hA rak+Sha traM/ tsit+ti d+ha ri pi li rbang/ spyi bsad
310a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags do// spying tig bkol drug pa'i gdong can zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ ta yang snying gi sngags kyi leT ste brgya dgu po'o// denas dpal gyur tertsa// dang pa ci thugs kyi chud 'di dang/
310a2(rnying rgyud): gzing rdo rje 'dzin pa khyed// nga yi gsang rgyud chen po 'di// lnga brgya'i dus su bstan sung phyir// rtsa ba gsum du bsdu bar bya// yan lag lnga la sgo byas te// dang po dpal chen spyan snga rtse// srid pa'i tshe srog bdag mo yis// rang rang srog gi snying po
310a3(rnying rgyud): da byed bu mo srun bzhi yis// rang rtags srog gi snying po phul// 'khoHdang bcas pa thams cad kun// dpal chen nyid kyi dam la gnas// bstan pa srung ba'i bdag mo yin// dad mos nyams su gang len pa// dngos grub mchog ni gdon miH/
310a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor gyi gtso bo dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / srin mo 'od 'dus shang ka ti la sogs pa/ bu mo dang 'khor du bcas pa thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// snying cig bkol pa 'ug pa'i gdong can zhes
310a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i len ste nyi shu pa'o// / ma mo rab tu gsang ba'i rgyung rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ e gra ts+tsha tsag tan tra/ bod ska dadu / dbyings gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i chung / bcom ldan 'das dpal
310a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu zang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa nus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba gsum gri bdag po shin tu 'jigs pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ gsang ba'i rnag las bzhengs te/ rngag po e'i gdan la bzhugs pa/
310a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba rigs kyi 'khor rnams kyis bskor te badzugs so// de'i nang nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rdo'i gshed po gdan las bzhengs te rton pa kun tu bzing po la gar gyi mchod pa lan brgya phrag phul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di dad ces gsol
310b1(rnying rgyud): che ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// gong du gsungs pa'i rgyud rgyal der// rten gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa las// gsang ba'i las de mi 'gru ba 'am// 'grub na gsang sngags ji ltar lags// mA ra ya yi phreng ba las// de la bsnyen pa mi 'tshal lam//
310b2(rnying rgyud): gsad pa'i dus tshod ji ltar lags// nya shi dus su bsad pa yi// de yi gtan tshigs ji ltar lags// rak+ta'i nges pa ji lta bu// thod pa'i nges pa ji ltar lags// yi ge grangs kyi nges pa ci// 'di la tshad ma ni 'tshal lam// 'khor la zhes bgyi ji lta bu/
310b3(rnying rgyud): sgron me mchog/ de ni bde ba chen po ste// ma 'ongs rnams kyi don du bshad/ lus ngag yid gsum gus pas nyon// rten gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bsad pa// 'di la rnam pa bdun du gsungs// dang por me yi gnas pa yang // skye med chos dbyings
310b4(rnying rgyud): yi ge e// mA ra ya nyid mthar bzhag pa// dzas 'gugs bsnyen pa'i mchog tu gsungs// gnyis pa yi ge yaM yin te// khyod byed yi ge b+h+yo yis bskul// gsum pa yi ge raM yin te// raM gnyis bar du mA ra ya// sreg byed me yi 'khor lo bsgom
310b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa yi ge pi yin te// paM gnyis bar du mA ra ya// 'dod chags khrag gi dkyil 'khor bsgom// lnga pa yi ge su yin te// su gnyis bar du mA ra ya// gti mugs yid dkyil 'khor bsgom// drug pa yi ge taM yin te// haM gnyis bar du mA ra ye/
310b6(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi gong bu lta bur bsgom// bdun pa yi ge phaT yin te// phaT gnyis bar du mA ra ya// khro tshogs nam mkha'i skar ltar 'khrugs// yi ge rI ni sa bon yin// gsod byed yi ge nad kyang yin// e bzhag yi ge rA ra pa// tha ma dza yis bsten pa ni//
311a1(rnying rgyud): ma mam btsun pa na// sa las 'thab pa byer// grub brgyan pa bdun nags pa// dbyings gsang pa'i byung phyug/ na gzugs sgrub ga mya nganapa bdun da na
311a2(rnying rgyud): 'jas dpal gyis gsol pa// nya zhes bya ba 'iji lta bu// nya yi gtan tshigs bshang 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nya gnyen po don gyi mang bzhin du/ rnal 'byor pa pakra shes par ston pa dang / log par banye 'a rnams la nga
311a3(rnying rgyud): dang / rims nang sna tshogs btang ba dang / dris te bstan/ hong ni rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi skye lugs dang / gzas pa po gsod pa'i thabs ston pa'i phyir na/ stong zhes bya/ rata ni mkha' 'gro kun gyi dmardzas kyi mchog yin pa dang / gzas pa
311a4(rnying rgyud): phyogang yin pa bskal ba'i thabs de las byung ba'i phyir ra bstan to// dbyings gsang bu'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ nya stong dngaraste bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa ma// kye ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// thod 'a rnams cu ru gsung /
311a5(rnying rgyud): skyod da'i nges pa dpe shad 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// thod pa'i de nyid bshad pa yis// lus dag snying g-is mAM gus pas nyon// mnan thor dang ni mchong thod dang // 'arang pod de bzhin rdzi zod dang // srer thod na mos par mchod
311a6(rnying rgyud): rgod dang // zlog zod 'brub zod ma nyams thod// sra khrod 'thod la sogs pa// thod pa brta gsu ma dag tungs// yi gre me bris ri rab ldan// dbus su ni dang ming dus bcug/ bris pa mnan pa'i thod par sa// rdzas dang mnan pa rjes pa'i rnas/
311a7(rnying rgyud): la ba dag gi kun rnams na// sbrul gyi mun dngas payin// rtag dang mnan par nges pa'i ga// drug zhes bya'i pong dag gyug/ ting 'an dang ldan gshin rje'i sngags// mtho rje 'dun gnye don na// rdo rje'i 'bras mas pas
311b1(rnying rgyud): mnan nangs par non pa yin// dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dus dang // gnyen dgu dag la gtad par bya// mnan thod mchod na gso bar 'gyur// 'phang na bslabs pa 'tshor bar nges// klu la pa dmar ra ru mnan// gzhan yang rta la sogs pa yin//
311b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs la mnan na nges par phung // gzhan yang mnan pa thod pa'i grangs// kham sa'i phur ba bcu 'am dgu las nyung mi bya// de dag mnan pa grub pa'i rtags// klu las mdze nad bco brgya nga 'byung // btsan las gzer na drug tu 'byar// sa
311b3(rnying rgyud): bdag las ni zha grum ste// yul lhas yul las dbyung la sogs// dmu lhas dmu nad dgu rnams gtong // lha la sogs pa gzhan rnams la// bdun dang lnga dang drug dang yang // brgyad dang dgu ru shes par bya// phung byed mnan thod bshad pa'o//
311b4(rnying rgyud): mchod zong nal bu dred dang phag/ zhag gsum la sogs gong dang 'dra// yong su ma nyams thod pa la// dbus su gtso bo'i sngags bris la/ yi sngags kyis bskor// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho mchod pa'i rdzas// bong pa'i rdzas ni spos chen la// bsnyen pa'i
311b5(rnying rgyud): rdzas ni mamr-i ta// dam tshig rdzas ni dam tshig bsre// bsgom dang ting 'dzin ma 'khrul bas// mkha' 'gro thod pa de la mchod// ye shes gshegs dang 'brel pa bzhin// mchod thod dran te rtag tu mchod// zas kyi phud mchod rtag tu dran// bran dang yul
311b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor skyob par byed// ci 'dod bsam pa 'grub par byed// mchod thod mnan na mkha' 'gro mnan// stong gsum srid pa'i mkha' 'gro 'khrug/ bdag nyid 'khor du skyo 'bog gtong // rims nad sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang mdze
311b7(rnying rgyud): sa ga te// 'ab na 'as ma'an sa ma// dang ba'i thagaming mo gshes pa'o// nga ba'i byang bya ming ba// brgya mchang bang // rtsem ma ga ba dung myos/ gas ro// du

312b1(rnying rgyud): rlu ba gas pu dngos po'o// rang pa yod pas grub pa yin// yig tshon tha bsngags te// da ni bas dang 'phags smon to// man mnan pa'i sngags sano// mni ga shed ma cu'in to// nga ni gshed ma byed pa na// pa na ga shad ma byin pa nas
312b2(rnying rgyud): shed ma tshogs sgo yi gri phaT// sngags kyi phreng ba dram du ma 'brel// ye shes lnga dang lhun gyis grub// ye shes phreng ba dram du ma 'brel// las deng 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das// las mkhan phreng ba dum du me 'brel// 'bras bu
312b3(rnying rgyud): dngag / lam gyi phreng badri ma dum+bu 'brel// phreng ba yang dag rnam pa gsam// de nyid ma 'khrul spyad gyur na// las mkhan ma lus dbang du 'dra// rgyad ni rnam pa gsu ma yin te// las kyi blad ni dregs pa can// 'bras bu'i chud ni bdag she
312b4(rnying rgyud): pom kyi myang nigs du rtogs so// yi ge du ltung nyid yin// rten nga rten kun rnam gnyid kyi/ srog ga ting ba man dang / nga zhin brtsis par 'byags// bsnyen rdzogs mnod bad brjod// srub thogs mno la
312b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzud// bsad sngags mnor mtshon du dbab// oM yis bsnyen pa bgrangs pa yis// srog sum thob kyang 'chi ba rings// yo gyis bsnyen pa bgra pa yis// rig pa rnyed kyang gnas nas 'bugs// ra~M gyi bsnyen pa bzangs nas ni/
312b6(rnying rgyud): thod kyang lus sems 'bral// ba kyi bsnyen pa bgrangs pas ni// grwa la thob cing sdug bsngal myong // sra yi bsnyen pa bgrangs nas ni// sa rnams thob kyang gsod par byed// ti gi bsnyen pa bgrangs pas ni// su lnga rtogs kyang
312b7(rnying rgyud): rigs par 'gyur// phaT kye bsnyen pa pagrangs pas ni// tshi gas che ba'i mthu dpung 'joms// 'di rnams gcig las gang byas kyang // las rnams 'bru'ab gdon min// dbyings gsang 'i 'khor dza'i rlu las/ sngags kyi kyis dang
313a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed gdan las bzhengs te/ sem bdu gzugs bcom ldan 'das// gong drugs dra ba'i myanan gtad la// las
313a2(rnying rgyud): gyi rtse zad de mya gyi// bcom ldan 'das la bka' 'ahrIH// des du gsol pa gas na nas cing // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rgyal pa// nga ni 'grol thugs brje'i phyir// las kyi bye bra gathams cad kun// 'akrol bco mye ngas pa dang
313a3(rnying rgyud): gas ma thas pas sa// na rjes kyi dbying sa nyid ni ky-i// thugs rnam papa'i nyid po yin// rtag tu sbying nas 'dzim// rgyal gyis rnarnams sa sa // su sa rigs pazhi las 'jud// des rgyasas
313a4(rnying rgyud): sor 'dzin pa de byed// nam gyis mgo lus dbang du bsdus// phug gis las rnams gdon me za// e na ga tshal thu ma ril ni phrug/ lcags kyi phur bu song babyed pa gcig gis brdeg cing yi ge haM bas ma la/ mdze nad sna tshogs pa'i rims kyis
313a5(rnying rgyud): btab nas dang / mtshon grir 'chi bar 'gyur// thugs kyis gzas pa srog nas 'dren// tshal gyis las mkhan gshed mar 'gyed// tshul pa nges par gsod pa yin// dum dkrug gnyis brjod mnan pa'i don// mgo chag pa dang
313a6(rnying rgyud): rkang lag chag pa dang // ra rus chag pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rmugs tshal tshal pa duM dgug/ dri dgug/ zangs kyi phur pa sor brgyad gcig brdeg cing / gyo mo la 'khor lo bris la gtums na/ gong mi'i nad rnams kyis btab nas
313a7(rnying rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ro// nA ga zhes byas kyu rnams 'grags// hi he btab pa'i sngags yin te/ di di ri ris gshed mar ldang // rmug+sag shar gshed ma bsul ba'i sngags// nAg he hi di di ri ri nu kla ga shar/ brgya rtsa ba rgyad brkyang na/ dgra
313b1(rnying rgyud): mengs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de dag ni drag sngags byed par can brtan pa ste/ dbyings gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ mnan pa las kyi bye brag bstan pa'i le Ta n+de lnga pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal stan las bzhengs te/ bcom ldan
313b2(rnying rgyud): 'das la phyag byas te// kye ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs pa yi rnal 'byor la// thun mong sngags rnams mi 'tshal lam// de la nan tur mi 'tshal lam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad 'tshal// bcom ldan 'a
313b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// sngags rnam gragri 'dra ba la// shin tu bshad par mi spobs kyang // ma 'ongs rnams kyi don gyi bshad// dar rnam shes sngags yin te// thum byer gyis ni gsod por byed// dar bum byer mnan pa yin// da khye
313b4(rnying rgyud): zhin / // ga
313b5(rnying rgyud): de ni rnam shes snying por gsungs// ci ri gnyis 'gyur brjod par bya// ri ri sreg pa'i sbyor ba yin// sbar na gram bsad sngags te// thug lum gnyis brjod bsad sngags yin// bar du mug byer gnyis bzhag pa// rab tu 'asad pa'i
313b6(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags so// rbad thI d+hi ri rtsi ri ri s+pha ran gri thug luM thug lci mugs byer/ gzhan yang oM ni kun gyi mgo yin te// bres 'de bus zhes rbad pa dang // thum bu k+ki te bsad pa'i sngags// dur gri ta dung bstab pa'o// 'jibs ni bsad pa'i
313b7(rnying rgyud): sngags yin te// ta la sogs pa'i rmig zlum rnams// yongs la brdeg par bstan pa yin// oM bre 'di lus bruM s+phu gri ta dung 'jibs/ dgra bo yul tshan dang 'gras na/ gla ba'i tshul chu blugs la/ ngan sngags 'di btab na
314a1(rnying rgyud): chug ma mo// he he dum bu dz+dza ya nA ga dung zhes brjod nas/ rgyal rgyaban rgya mig thal bar thor gyis 'gro'o// rtags klu yi srog nas 'dren// bum bu dmed pa'i sngags yin te// b+hUM ya bstab pa'i sngag cu
314a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs// nA ga bru~M bu hu la/ bral ba'i gso khrag sna tshogs kyis bskang ba la/ bag zan gyi phral lcong brgyad kyis mtha' bskor la/ skad mA g+ha yed gsum la bsnyen pa bzlas/ skar ma khums srad la gtad/ phag pa'i do pa
314a3(rnying rgyud): ga pa'i sog pa mnan/ dgra bo po rgyud mtha' phung bar nges so// oM ni rnam par sngang mdzad de// rje khram btsan gyi srog snying ste// wa khram pa tsan sring srog snying yin// rta khram bum sri'i srog snying yin// oM rje kham la khram rta kham// rabs
314a4(rnying rgyud): chad kyi ni thod pa dang // rta thod du bcug la skar ma bi rdzi la gtad nas/ gong gsum du bcug na/ dgra bo mo rgyud mtha' phung bar 'gyur ro// dbyings gsang ba 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ las thun mong gi sngags bstan pa ste le'u drug pa'o//
