316a2(rnying rgyud): chang/ phred don mo la du// chos nyid rje ba med dbyings na// ston pa kun tu bzang po dang // rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yab sum dang // seMs bcas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mnyam pa'i dang la bde bar bzhugs// de tse 'dzin tog dbang gis
316a3(rnying rgyud): ga gsum po rim gyis tshags// skye 'gro ma lus thams cad la// dregs pas rim par dbang bskur ba// bsam pa log pa'i bar chang bdud// ngargyal khengs pa'i gshin rje dang // gti myig rmongs pa'i srin po rnams// srid pa gsum la/
316a4(rnying rgyud): khams gsum ma lus ris kyis bsdus// dkyul dregs pa'i gzugs 'chang bas// gzugs phung che la gangos po gas// do cha zhing gsum bag can// lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// thams dang snying rje'i lam dnga' thal//
316a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i mthus// phyog pa ri la ma dang gol ba'i sa// phyin ci log la yid ches pas// las su mtshan ma'i chos la spyod// srid pa'is bon chub mos 'phang // dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa rtsong // gal te de las thar nas kyang //
316a6(rnying rgyud): srin po'i lus blangs nas// gong ma 'azhin du 'khor bar byed// de yi 'khor yang phrin mo dang // ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro dang // shin tu gtum pa'i 'khor dang brtsam// gsod pa'i las la 'babs shing grim// sha dang khrag dang srog la mong /
316a7(rnying rgyud): 'i lung dang ma ldan pas// kun kyang dmyal ba'i lam du'agro// srul sku la sogs sangs rgyas kyis// 'dul ba'i las su mgyur te// slar yang khengs pas rgol bar byed// spug pos brtsan pa'i zhing khams na// rgyal ba rnams kyi zungs
316b1(rnying rgyud): kyis gzigs// rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs// kun bzang yab la 'di skad gsol// e ma bcom ldan a la la// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'di dag na// log pa'i bdud dang srin po rnams// sangs rgyas bka' las 'gal bgyid pa/
316b2(rnying rgyud): 'di la nan tan ji ltar bgyi// kun bzang lha yis bka' stsal pa// bdud dang gshin rje srin po rnams// nga rgyal dregs pas 'ching ba la// shin tu gdug cing gtum byed pas// de la zhi bas phan mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs dang ldan byam
316b3(rnying rgyud): nas// khro bor de bzhin gshegs mdzad pa// sangs rgyas thugs rmi khros pa yis// stong gsum ma lus thams cad kyang // skad cig yud la med 'gyur na// srid pa gsum la spos ci dgos// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar bskyed// de nas ston pa
316b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang // legs par thal sbyar phyag 'tshal nas// de nyid la ni gnas bsgyur te// gdug cing drag la rtsub pa yis// gong ma las kyang cher snang zhing // dbu dang phyag zhabs mang po dang // mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs pas// 'jigs pa'i
316b5(rnying rgyud): cha lugs mang pos brgyan// gzi byin mthu dpung bskyed du med// rab tu rngams shing thugs gtum nas// dgyes mdzod rdo rje gsor nas kyang // goms pa'i stobs kyis gar byed cing // sku yi sprul pa sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas//
316b6(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum yang dus gcig g.yos// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od bdal bas// dregs pa kun kyang tshig cing bros// 'brug stong mang po'i sgra bsgrags pas// gdug pa ma lus brgyal zhing skrag/ slan chad sdom zhes smra ba dang // 'bangs su mchi
316b7(rnying rgyud): khro bor kyang // thugs rjes de yi khar ma bta // srin po'i chung ma srin mo brnam// sdug nag kro hrI tA dI // dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs rnams// phyag rgyan nimis dbang dru dru sa// thabs dang zhes rab la pa yis// byang chub mas
317a1(rnying rgyud): byin pa bas pas// dang sa ldan pa\u0f88\u0f90 m+b+ha// pa kyis kyi na// rdzun phun pa g+sags pa dang // 'a du gapa// dgarnam nas nas sa//
317a2(rnying rgyud): gdug ma lus skrag par mdzad// 'jigs pa'i gang pa'i 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'jigs pa'i mtshon che sna tshogs kyis// pha de la rdzogs pa tshar bcad nas// shin tu sgeg kyi brgyal bar byas// rab tung bar 'i
317a3(rnying rgyud): pa rje rjen ra blang te// pir pa ga yul las rgal bar mdzad// srin pa chung ma pa tsigs rnams// phyag rgya bzhi 'i dbang bzlas nas// thabs dang shes rab rol bar mdzad// zhal nas gdug pa'i tshig 'di brjod// nga ni shin tu
317a4(rnying rgyud): sa shi rnams// nga ni sangs rgyas nyid sha can// dus gsums ngas rgyam zos pas ngam 'grangs// de drung 'gro kun za 'dod pa kris la sgom// 'jig rten lha mi 'ga' tsam byas nal// gsong ma 'jigs su rung nas su rdzogs
317a5(rnying rgyud): 'jig byed skye bu 'dzin de snga// gang zhig gas par 'dod kya mi gtor ro// rab tu rnam pa'i tshig thos tsam gyiste/ bad la sogs te srin po thams cad phyin// rab tuskrag ste ga tu 'drig cu// mi rjid rjo kyang po rjod/
317a6(rnying rgyud): ga 'dun dmas// snyoms pa'i stir kyikhyod pa mamang ngam// yun dung ba ma byangs pa'i thong des/ 'du bas khas pan sgyu yang ma ba bya// gzing gan rgyag tu chen pos ma tad te// 'du shi na rid du na na
317a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor// de mi khong sa dang dren du 'acas// 'dab dang skrag nas gcing du bzhin phu nano// bla ma byu gi las kyi rgyal mo gyud bas/ rngon byung ba'i nga ga de'i 'a rnyed pa // / 'das pa'i dus na don du ngas
317b1(rnying rgyud): bdud dang gshin rje dbang phyug ste// dpal chen yak+ka he ru kas// thugs rje tshad med bzhes bsgral nas// ro yi nyal thabs gan rgyal te// 'dzam gling lho yi zhing khams su// bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa na// dur khrod chen po brgyad du gyur// mgron
317b2(rnying rgyud): nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon brkyang // mgo dang lus snying yan lag ni// dur khrod brgyad du bstan pa las// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dur khrod gnas su snang ba'i phyir/
317b3(rnying rgyud): r-I yi bsrung ma chen po ni// ma mo chen mo brgyad bzhag go// de yi gnas rten chen po yin// mchod rten chen po gzi brjid can// rang byung re re bzhag pa yin// de yi lus snying ma b+ha d+ha// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal// ma mo chen mo ko'u rim// mkha
317b4(rnying rgyud): shing snying stobs che ba'i sa'o// mchod rten ming ni bde byed logs// de yi mgo ni lho phyogs kyi// dur khrod chen por bzhag pa yin// sing g+ha yul gyi gling phran yin// ma mo chen mo tse'u rim// mthong thos rnam par 'phrul bag mnga'// mchod rten re bo ta
317b5(rnying rgyud): la yin// lag pa g.yas pa shar lho mtshams// dur khrod chen po bal yul yin// ma mo chen mo puk+ka sI// lhag par zas kyi longs spyod che// mchod rten kha sho b+ha k+ki kha// lag pa g.yon pa lho nub mtshams// dur khrod chen po sA la'i yul//
317b6(rnying rgyud): ma mo chen mo be tA lI// phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas// de na mthu dang dbang yang che// gyad yul mchod rten go ma la// rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams// dur khrod chen po li yi yul// ma mo chen mo tsaN+Da li// lha mo shing ki ni zhes grags//
317b7(rnying rgyud): chu dang ske thub rdzu 'phrul can// mchod rten ming ni g+he'u ro sha na// rkang pa g.yon pa / lho nub mtshams// dur khrod chen po kha che'i yul// ma mo chen mo pra mo ha// bde skyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs// mchod rten med ni ka ni na// pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs
318a1(rnying rgyud): nas// drang khrud rgan pa mo rgyam yul// mA mo na mo tan te// 'gyur ba yongs spyod lnga dang ldan// dngos bub can yang du na mang // gzi yi mdzod rten can // ming yang nam gyur// de yi na sgrol thams ca
318a2(rnying rgyud): drang tshod chen po na gor yul// rgya mtsho'i gling gi mi hA de// lang ga pu srin po'i gnas// ma mo chen mo rma shA t+ti// srin po srin mog pa rnams// de dag kun la dbang byung zhing // den tshon nor dang dpagangasam zhing // 'gyur ba langs snor
318a3(rnying rgyud): dugyun// mchod rkyen pad bya gzhon nu'o// 'jig rten du bsrun pa'i bum thang chen po brgyad kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u kyi gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'jigs sno chen po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de/ dang po bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin chos tid kyi
318a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa pa dang bral bar 'onam ma// de nas kun te stong ba'i ti 'dzin/ kun gni byang chub sems mtshan mo'-i'i spros pa dang bral bar bsgom mo// de nas chu'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems kyis bron rgya nag po zhig tu mngon du gsal bar bsgom ma/
318a5(rnying rgyud): don pa 'dis rjes skal lo// sgo med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// spos dang bal 'de bzhin nyid// mi rtog mi dmigs byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin dag pas kun tu snang // yi ge hrI ni sems kyi tshwa yin te// mtha' dbus me dpa
318a6(rnying rgyud): la N+Dab par dmigs// kos bral d+hini 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa'o// spr-i nag 'bar bu'i sbrul phyag 'tshal lo// de nas hU~M mad+hing nag 'ab ba rje matsun gyi bar rje la gra nas pi ri la bar 'phros pas rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam bskul/ slar 'dus/
318a7(rnying rgyud): pardul 'dus/ hUMlas byung du / dmi byed par yis dog gi phyogs su yi gangos tshig stobasam mo// yag de sngalas 'gros 'dus pa'i tshogs dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de/ de nas gzhal las 'ang gyud do// dkyil 'a'
318b1(rnying rgyud): nga ba dang da dang pa na/ gnas rnams sanas rnam satshunanas padu sa dag na la na myo smra gnas ga/ na nga/ rnas// 'ang
318b2(rnying rgyud): la brtan par bzhugs// ma~M hA b+h+rUM maN+Da la ha la ha la hU~M dza/ ces brjod pas yi ni sbrid babs te/ de nas su bskyed pa 'di ltar brjod de// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ hUM gi 'bar ba'i tshe 'phrul las/ mthong nag byung \u0f7f/ de nas tra~M las
318b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal lo// hUM lasA ye shes 'bar ba'i 'odi 'gros pas// phrin las rnam bzhi sgra la rdzogs mdzad pa// khros nas dbang sdud 'bar ba'i sgrar bstan pa// su mchog spel pa'i ho d+hakA yi sra byung ngo // tra~M hU~M yaD+ga b+h+rU~M ta ru ka ma hA badz+ras rbadun na d+ha ka ha nad
318b4(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ yak+sha kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ a la la ho zhes brjod pas/ he ru ka'i sku mngon du byung ngo // sku mdog mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhir bgrad pa/ g.yon nas yuM ma yan+ta khros pa'i rgyal mi ga rtsa dang 'dra bar smra'i skyeng // de nas
318b5(rnying rgyud): yab yum dgyes pa myed pa 'di sbeng ngo // sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs nas// de nas yum gyi mkha' dkyil du// dgra' mchog rdo rje rab gso nas// ye shes sems dpa'i cho 'phrul bstan// shar phyogs rdzogs pa bsgral ba'i phyir// sems dpa'
318b6(rnying rgyud): kye chud dkar por skul// srin ma dag dang lhags zlum// thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba las// dbang spyad rab tu mngon gas la te// de nas dbang du 'dus pa las// khro bo wal gsum rtse gadrug sbal// ma ma~M ko rngon ma byung // dkyus pa'i sku ni
318b7(rnying rgyud): band// yathA ga yis dbang bskur nas// gisang byed bdag mo yin par gsol// srin mo ma tang baspel ba bcur// gdug pa tshon ma gro 'bar// mchis 'dzin byed phyugs rgyas 'arjid/ thams padzig pa dzin myo kyims// seMnas
319a1(rnying rgyud): tang dkar mo bkral// ma mo ko'u rI ma yi gnas// de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ ro langs smad paSh+Ti bdag po dang // yum ni lha mo ko'u rI gnyis// thabs da' shes rab sbyor ba las// mngon byung me rta seng ge'i mgo// pho nya ma
319a2(rnying rgyud): par dbang bskur ro// ya g+ha shrI he ru ka dang / yak+ka khros pa'i rgyal mo gnyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// mngon byung sems dpa' mthing ga'i sku// srin mo phag gdong zhags pa ma// dbang sdud rab tu mngon gsal te// thabs dang
319a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab skor ba las// khro bo zhal gsum phyag drug sbrul// mngon byung ma mo tse'u rI ma// dgyes pa'i sgra chen ha ha bzhad// ru dra nag po bsgral ba'i phyir// gsod byed chen mo dbang bskur te// gdug pa'i mtshon cha mda' gzhu 'dzin// ma yi zhags
319a4(rnying rgyud): pas srin mo bzung // bu mos mda' yis snying la gzir// ma mo tse'u rI ma yi gnas// de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ srin po bralnga chen nag po dang // ma mo tse'u dri se re mo gnyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// mngon byung phra men phyag gi
319a5(rnying rgyud): mgo// dgyes pa'i sgra chen he he bzhad// ru dra nag po bsgral ba'i phyir// gsod byed chen mor dbang bskur ro// yak+Sha 'joms byed rgyal po dang // yak+sha khros pa'i rgyal mo gnyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// mngon byung sems
319a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' dmar po'i zhal// lha mo lcags sgrog nyi zla'i spyan// dbang sdud mar ni mngon gsal te// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// khro bo zhal gsum phyag drug sbrul// dregs pa chen po bskal ba'i phyir// sems dpa' pad+ma khro bo dang // yum
319a7(rnying rgyud): ni ma mo lcags sgrog ma// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// mngon drung ma mo pra mo hA// dgyes pa'i sgra skad ha ha bzhad// dregs pa chen po bskal ba'i phyir// gsong byed chen por dbang bskur ro// gdug pa'i mtshon cha spu gri byin// srin mo phag
319b1(rnying rgyud): gdang namar mo dag/ ma yis phyag rgyas bsgom nas s+ya// bdug pa'i sgra bris gsod par byed// srin ma bsad pa'i khog pa ni// ma mo phra mo dmar ma'u gnas// nga nas dung khrod bdag po dag / dur khrod rkun chan bdag po dang // ma mtshan mo dra mo gnyis/
319b2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// mngon byung srol wa yi mgo// dgyes pa'i sgra chen he he bzhad// phra men ma ru dbang bskur ro// ya k+ka gsong zed rgyal po dang // yak+Sha khros pa'i rgyal mo gnyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// sem
319b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' ljang bu rdzogs mdzad pa// dbu gsum phyag ni drug par sprul// srin mo thal byed nag mo dang // thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// mngon byed ma mo ba tA li// dgyes pa'i sgra chen ha ha bzhad// dregs pa chen po bsgral ba'i phyir// gso
319b4(rnying rgyud): byed chen por dbang bskur ro// gdug pa'i spu bri lag tu byin// thal byed dril bus bdug byas nas// be tA nag mos spu gri yis// ru dranag po bsgral ba yi// khog pa dur drod gzhal yas khang // ma mo bai tA li yi gnas// de nas dur khrod bdag
319b5(rnying rgyud): dag/ srin por zla spang mgo dang // ma mo chen mo ba tA li gnyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// mngon byung ro ha srung mgo can// dkris pa'i sgra chen te haM bzhad// phra nan ma ru dbang bskur ro// phrin las rdzogs pa'i sku las ni//
319b6(rnying rgyud): gsod byed rngam pa'i sgra byung ste// rak+Sha shI he ru ka dang // rak+ta khros pa'i rgyal mo gnyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// mngon byung sems dpa' gang la byung // yum ni srin mo ker shang mo// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las//
319b7(rnying rgyud): mngon bung lha mo puk+ka s+t+wa~M// dgyes pa'i sgra chen na ha gzhad// srin po b+hair bsgral ba'i phyir// ma mos mtshon gyi zhags pas ni// srin po b+hai ra brdung nas ni// bu sI yis rngu bri ris// rgyu dbra dra nas bsrel 'dzi// de nas ngur rjod bdag po dag/ srin mo
320a1(rnying rgyud): ranam chu mar dang // mamargyan mo thag gnyis// zlabs dang zhes rab ba nyis myed las// mngon byung ban ma// dmas pa'i bla chen te bzhad// thamAn ma du dbang bdu dag// na tadrag dang /
320a2(rnying rgyud): hrI sha rI ga nyid// thabs dang shes rab brel ba las// mngon krung sems dpa' drag po byung // srin mtshan mo nag mo dang // thabs dang shesi ba gnyis med las// mngan byu lha mod+har+Na rti// dgyes pa'i thA ni ha ha bzhod// zhags pa
320a3(rnying rgyud): bzung nas rdzu bri yis// mgo bcad phreng bas lus la brtan// de nas dur khrod bdag po dang // ma mo chen mo b+has ma gnyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// mngon zung za min kazlum// dgyes pa'i sgra skad he he bzhad // tha chen
320a4(rnying rgyud): madra dbang bsnor ro// gsod byed ra na ga dag/ rag po d+hI shAn+ti ma// thabs dang zhes rab gnyis med las// sems dpa' lnga chen 'od gsal thung // smin ma chen mo gol dang // thabs dang shes rab sanyis med las// ma ma khyen mo shA
320a5(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i sman ha ha ban// de nas drugs ldan paspel ba'i phyir// gsang byed chen por dbang babyung ngo // sprin ma chu chen mthang smras kyang // mtshan ci zhags pas bzung nas ni// bris nyid zung skyong pa'is// mam tsunani mi gnas/
320a6(rnying rgyud): sang ba sa byed/ na chen me khyen pa dang mtshan sazabs dang gami bye ga nyin med la// mngon nung ma bya ga gang // dgyes pa'i che gagapan// mdzan mo nga pa dzus/ das
320a7(rnying rgyud): thos pa'i rgyal ma gnyis// thangs dang zhes rab nyis med las// mang drung sems dpa' das gang sha// drin modu rjod cican no// thangam dang shes rang gnyis med las// mngon byung sa ma / dgyes pa'i spri chen banam
320b1(rnying rgyud): de nas dregs pa bskal ba'i byer// blan pab du mar smra yang // ma 'i sa thags nas pan+d+hanas na// mamatshan mom khyes// rtswa bris thon pa'i mgasus thal// mam+ba nas yiganas// de nas drung yod bdag pa dag/ sman pa chags pa'i gas thu /
320b2(rnying rgyud): mamo chen mo tsan+ta lI// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// phra men thug pa'i mgo can byung // dgyes pa'i sgra skr-id he he bzhad// phra men ma ru dbang bskur ro// oM hU~M hU~M ha ha ha ha ha haM/ ha&haH/ 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'jo
320b3(rnying rgyud): rdzog me// spyi mdog phyag mtshan sna tshogs gsal// 'jigs byed rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor las// bsgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas slab lugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ grub lugs s+thir na rnam pa gnyis te/ ma
320b4(rnying rgyud): tang zhal gyi sgrub lugs dang / bing rim gsum pa'i sgrub lugs so// de la'ang sbub lugs kyi dkyil 'khor brgyad do// de la ma tang zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ni// gnas dngas gzhi brtag pa ru// bslang dang byin brlab gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom
320b5(rnying rgyud): gang gru bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga yis zhal zhal bya// de nas matang gnan par b+ha// shar phyogs lamatho 'jig rten nas// yang dag thar lam gcod byed pa/ 'byung po gtum po dargyal can// khyod ni sgrib pa ci la sgri ba// yang dag shes rab ye shes kyis/
320b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus brtag rtsad bcad bdag las byung // bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa ni// bdag med stong pa'i thabs gzham// bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus kyis// gnas ngan len pa'i ded dpon byed// de nyid bdag rtog byeng bas na// bdag med
320b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thobs gnam// mar+d+han d+hi ma hA/ dz+nyA na badz+ra/ ud la/ an ta ya b+h+yas/ sarbab pakar te/ kar ba si ma te ba ru hU~M sa/ chas can dag gog bags te// dpal chen rtapas kyang che ba'i bdag/ rkyong pa 'amatshan chen dran po yis// dedag

321b1(rnying rgyud): dang kyi gnas brgyad brtsegs pa ni/ sgrub pa can po las ma gtogs pa gzhan du mi bya ste/ byas na zhag bdun gyis khrag sngags te shi bar myong ngo // zhes gzhung las 'byung // de ltar gyur pa'i 'jam theng na// bye she gnas pa'i yul yin pas// r+N+Na nga
321b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs 'chang grub pa pos// 'jigs byed chen po bge 'thung gi// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du// rtogs ldan rgyal po'i dur khrod gnas// shes rnams 'khrul sdang kun tu byed pa ni// ma bdun na lam bdun gyis 'chi// de yi rnam shes cing na
321b3(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi dngos grub mchog/ mi gas ma mthar byedabyed pa des// thod dbyig chen po mi zad pas// gshin rje bcom skye byas rgyas so// rdo yang lho yi 'jam gling du// drar khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad brtsegs// de ltar
321b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin bdag gis ni// pha las bu yisas blangs bzhin// 'di lus drung khrod gnas su 'bul// de yi lus snying mkhal ma de// ngur khrod chen po bsil tshul du// ma mo chen mo ko'u rje ma// dur khrod chen po'i rgyan du 'bral// mkha
321b5(rnying rgyud): mthu stobs sangs rgyas pa'i// mthong thos rnam par 'phrul bag gi// dngos supa dam pa sbal du ga som// je ye mgo ba rgya phyogs kyi// seng rta'i yul na rdorje rjem// ngur klod chen po'i rgyan du 'phrul// mthong thos rnam par 'phral bag gi// dngos
321b6(rnying rgyud): grab dam pa stsal du gsol// de le lag g.yas shar lho mtshams// bal yul na ni phug sde// dur khod chen po'i rgyan du 'phrul// lhag par rdzas kyis mchod par 'os// dngos grub dam pa rgyal du gsol// de yi lag g.yon lho nub mtshams/
321b7(rnying rgyud): sa la'i yul na be tA 'aM// dru khrod chen po'i gyen du 'bral// phyag na rdo rjes mthu stobs stsol// de yi nang g.yas byang shar mthams// mi yi yul narba d+ha bi// ngur khrod chen po rgyan du 'phrul// longs spyong ldan pa'i dngos grub stsol// des
322a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ nang gsan nu byung mtshams// ka ni/ na pa mo ha// ngur khrod zad pa'i can du 'phrul// bang gling ldan pa'i dngos grubaskol// da la rA ma rgyan kyang phyogs kyi// urban phul nAk+Shas mahA// ngur khrod chen po rtan
322a2(rnying rgyud): 'bul// grub pa myur ba'i dngos grub stsol// bzhag sha khong nang la sogs pa// thams cad ma lus dur khrod na// sma sha nI yi rgyan du 'bul// sa rnams grub pa'i dngos grub stsol// zhes brjod de dur khrod kyi gnas bsham mo// ma mo chen mo
322a3(rnying rgyud): sprim// g.yas pa'i gru mo can du bya// mu mo tse'u ri spyi bor bya// ma mo chen mo pra mo ha// rkang pa g.yon pa dag la bya// ma mo chen mo pe tA lI// gru mo g.yon pa dag la bkod// ma mo chen mo puk+ka sI// da yi lag pa g.yas la dgod// ma mo chen mo g+has ma
322a4(rnying rgyud): de yi pho mtshan dag la dgod// ma mo chen mo tsaN+Da lI// rkang pa g.yas pa'i pus mo la dgod// ma mo chen mo sma sha nI// bzhag sha nang khrol dag la dgod// phyogs rnams ma nor dgod pa la// thams cad sgrol ba'i dngas grub dang ldan no// dur
322a5(rnying rgyud): khrod brgyad 'di sgrub pa chen po las gzhan du mi bya'o// de ltar ma tang mnan nas gzhal yas khang du byas te/ gzung 'dzin sgo phyis nas/ rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i nang du gzhug go// stegs bu yang ma dang gi gzugs 'dra ba btong la/ mgo lho nub tu thug
322a6(rnying rgyud): med par bstan/ rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// mdog yongs kyang sngo sbyar bus la/ gan t+pal du bsgyel lo// che rung gi tshad ni gnas yangs dog dang sbyar ro// ma tang gi snying gar dug gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bar rim gsum par bya'o// mtha'
322a7(rnying rgyud): mdamar po gru bzhi la/ 'phangs su khyung gang gi steng du/ mthing nag gru gsum la 'phangs su sor bzhi bya/ de'i steng du dmeng nag zla ga ma la 'phangs su sor gsum bya/ dpral ba dang gdor ba dang yan lag gnyis mkhal ma g.yas gson
322b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis/ kha dang rig pa gnyis la/ stegs bu su zhi pa 'dom gang bya// de'i phyi rim yongs su rnag ma la/ 'phangs su sor gnyis so// rdo'i phyi ma yongs su bskal ba'i me ri dmar nag klong bri// de nas rdzas bkram ste/ th+yan+ta ral pa gcig pa la da
322b2(rnying rgyud): chen po yang yum gyi snying po bris la/ gong gi zla gam dmar nag la bzhagade'i 'og ma'i mthing nag gru gsum la/ bskul ba'i me dpung dmar nag gi klong bri/ tha ma'i dmar mo gru bzhi la/ rigs bzhi he ru ka'i snying paM bris la/ phyogs bzhi
322b3(rnying rgyud): yan lag gi dkyil 'khor la/ ko'u d+hi ma brgyad kyi snying po tshul bu la bris la bzhag go// dpal chen po ya bA yum gyi skos kyi sha dang / ma mo rdzas rtags kyi sha brgyad dang phyogs phyogs su bkod do// pha man ma'i rdzas phyogs bzhir skar mo ba'i
322b4(rnying rgyud): mtshams bzhir mgo bzhi bkram/ d+hu bar// tshil sA rkang ba mig srota An dza nar tsan rnams bzhag go// sgo bzhir dpal rngar ba nag/ de'i phyiri ma yongs su bla gam la/ dbang phyug ma'i rdzas med na mtshan byung dgod/ lha ba shos breg ma k+ta'i dzi
322b5(rnying rgyud): dbu byas pa dang / dmadzas tshang ma'i gtor ma smin chen gyi ga la khebs can gcig drangs so// tshil rten gyi mar me dkru bltam mo// ba s+ye ta'i rtswa zhags dris mtha' bskor/ khrag sna dang snying sna ci mang bzhag/ de nas spyan drang mdzad pa 'bum/ @
322b6(rnying rgyud): shing dngos grub gsol// 'dzab drang thugs dam bskul/ phrin las bcol dgra bgegs dgug gzugs la phab la bsad do// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'o// de nas par de me gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ dang po phun sum tshogs pa
322b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang ldan par byas pa/ gnas kyi pha rol du rtogs du gru bzhi pa gcig byas la/ n+dan gyi ljo gu dang / me tog gi spyo ba dAhA/ spos kyi chom bu dang / shog pu'i mtho rnams paja mnas/ de'i steng du bachod pa rnam pa lnga dang / gtor ma cha gsum
323a1(rnying rgyud): shAg+sa/ / sargya/ sa/ ga na mas sa
323a2(rnying rgyud): khrod kyi chag chag rnam gsum gyis gdab la/ shes rab ma byin gyis brlab la/ thig sud 'bal du gzhug/ ma tang las zla gam dmar po gru bzhi pa mdzub gang gi 'phang btod do// de'i steng du mthing nag gru gsum pa sor bzhi pa'i 'phangs su bya'o//
323a3(rnying rgyud): dri'i steng du zlag ma dmar nag sor gsum pa'i 'phangs su bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor la rdzas dgram pa ni/ b+han+ta rang pa gcig la dpal chen po yab yum gyi snying po bris te/ ma thog zla gam gyi steng du bzhag go// b+han+ta tshal bu brgyad la ko'u rI ma brgya
323a4(rnying rgyud): snying po bris la zla gam gyi mthar rim pa bzhin du 'khor bar bzhag/ tshil chen gyi mar me kha dgur bltam mo// de 'og mthir nag gru gsum pa la sha chen gyi lang ling dang / zhing cheni ras ros kyis bskor ro// de yi 'og ma dmar po gru bzhi pa la/
323a5(rnying rgyud): bzher sgo ba bzhi'i rdzas dgram/ lha bshos zla ga ma la rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas la/ phud kyi gtor ma drang ngo // sgrub pa po rnams kyi mdun du b+han+ta'i bzed phor dang dmar gyi rak+ta dgram mo// de nas dkyil 'khor bskyed de spyan drang mchod pa 'bul/ 'dzab stong rtsa
323a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad 'bul/ thugs dam bskul/ dngos grub stsol ba dang / stod tshig gi mchod pa 'bul lo// dgong dang tho rangs gtor ma btang ngo // gtor ma rtsi ma yang drangs la/ dkyil 'khor bskyed de spyan drang mchod pa 'bul/ bshags shing
323a7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub stsol/ 'dzab drang thugs dam paphrul/ phrin las sol/ dgra bgegs pasad la slar gso'o// de nas grub babyin pa dang gtor mtsho gsum du bcad de/ tshe gcig la sbyin bsreg bya/ tshe gcig gis mkha' 'gro ma bsrung / tshe gcig
323b1(rnying rgyud): rbad pal t+tA danam// de nas rim pa bzhin du ces gabar du 'dra cing dadang bzung nga// de nas dkyil 'khur bdu gad dngas thab grolalo// danas gtos ga la rnam btsun pa zhes pa rgyas nga da gnas sunas pas// denas bca
323b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ 'di'i gzhung gis kyang / dang po phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan nas/ sa yi cho ga dang sdig pa srungs shing byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / spang skor bklag par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dos gang dgra bzhi zas te/ de la du gzod/
323b3(rnying rgyud): hrI chag chag gsum gdab ste/ shes rab ma byin gyis rlob la thig srud bkal/ de nas thig bzhir gdapal le'u tsho dgur bya/ de'i gyi rim bu bzhi la me bzhi dang ldan par bya/ de nas thanA rang pa dbul dpal chen po yar yum gco brgyad kyi nying ngo bris pa
323b4(rnying rgyud): ngacho gu yi dbus mu bzhag/ b+han+ta tshal bu brgyad la/ ko'u ni ma brgyad kyi snying po bris la bzhag/ snying sna brgyad dang ling tshe dgu yi g.yas su bzha/ tshal bu brgyad la phra men brgyad kyi snying po bris la/ dam rdzas brgyad dang g.yon du bzhag/ sgor zhing
323b5(rnying rgyud): dpal dang bzhi bzhag/ lha ba shos nr-i gam la rak+ta'i thig le byas pa dgu dang / dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma sprin chen gyis de 'a khebs can 'jig drangs so// tshil chen gyi mar mkha bu gcig bsnyam mo// ba su tA'i hUM zhags kyis mtha' ba dor / steng de
323b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs su ba su ta'i rgyu zhags mig mangs ris su zos pa'o// tshil chen gyi 'bran gzugs thang ze/ tsit+ta pho long 'phyar 'bul kyang dgod/ phyogs bzhi zhing chen gyi ru mtshon bsgreng ngo // phyogs bzhi dnga'i mtsho kyil la gzang dus brdung ngo //
323b7(rnying rgyud): bair+Na d+hA mngon duHsgra'i tha~M dgal dan/ b+ham+b+ha'i phreng rjod kyang dgram no// de nas rgyan dra mdzad pa 'byung ngo // rjeg shegs dngos pa / 'jabardza gradas da' 'phrul/ phrin las 'tshal/ dgrang dedas pacag ci gzugs pa
324a1(rnying rgyud): la bstab paH/ 'dzab b+h+yo tsA brgyad du 'phrul/ stong tshig gi mchod pa bya'o// gtor ma dgong dang tho rangs mi gtong ba'i zo ris bcad la der byug su shing gtar bzung // drab pa thon pa dang du brjod chen por bapral la btang ngo //
324a2(rnying rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor bsdu dngos su bskol lo// de nas tsit+ta gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ zhing lpags rlon pa'i dbus su dgra yi gzugs bris la/ snying gar ming rus rak+ta khrag chen gyis bri'o// snying sna tshogs nang du ming rus bcug la/ de zhing lpags kyi nang du bcug
324a3(rnying rgyud): srog gi sngags bzlas la/ mchi mthengs gsum phyar la 'o dod 'bod lta la dbang gzug go// phra men sbyang ki las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ grub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal khrag 'thung chen po nyid dbyings nas
324a4(rnying rgyud): bskyod pa dang / 'khor rnams dgra bo'i las la gzud pa 'di skad do// hUM khro rgyal khrig 'byung 'jigs byed chen po yi// sku gsung thugs les bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// drag shul tshul gyis sems can don mdzad cing // gdug pa'i tshogs dang gnod
324a5(rnying rgyud): skyon cha lcags 'chang // byams pa'i thugs kyis gnyis med don rtogs nas// ye shes 'od stong 'bar ba'i koT rim// shar gyi phyogs nus las chos la// dam nyams dag la rtags phyung zhig/ zhe gnas rtsa gcig gtod pa'i gzhu krung ste//
324a6(rnying rgyud): mthong shes rab gsal ba'i mnga' byashang nas// nyon mongs brjid 'joms ye shes dbyings tsam du// dug gsum grol mdza bugs rdo tsau rIm// D+ho ma rdzogs nas las myos la// dmanyams dgra la rtags byung zhig/ 'dod pa'i dul
324a7(rnying rgyud): chags med pa ma'i sgra// dag byed rdzogs pa'i bdud 'joms rgyal pa'i rtags// chos la dbang bskur chu srin rgyas mtshan 'dzin// rnam rtog pa byed zag 'thung ma mo// / nub kyi tshogs nas las thos pa// dam nyams dpal rtags srung zhig
324b1(rnying rgyud): zan lus rnams thamam dras pa byamasas// babs pas bya bar ma dbyu gla bdas na// naci bdag pa du satha 'angam mad ma// gas ba thong su ma gyur bas su// gags sungs stsal// das rgyas sa dus pa
324b2(rnying rgyud): phung zhing // ye shes brims ma rig mun gsal phyir// nga trog zag mi bya khyil pa'i dbyings dum tra// thabs med rnyed drug la khyims pa'i phung po lnga// bde chen dbyings su 'dren mdzad pag // ye shes dbyings nyid lce nas gnyis med phyir/
324b3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi rdo rjes nyan dbug cing gso// sprin med mkhar la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// ye shes 'od 'phro 'a khrug byed lhas mAd+h-i// sgo nub mtshams nas las thos la// dam nyams dgral tegs phung zhig/ 'jigs tshogs gsung chung myong
324b4(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i thigs rjes mchog gis rnam shes gro ce nas// ga thu la rnams pa'i stangs su'as tshul gyis su// rten mangs yid 'phrog babyed ldan ni// rdub thung ma mams nas las thos pa// dam nyams dpa' rtags cung dgan
324b5(rnying rgyud): 'dren pagegs kyi tshogs rnams bshig pa'i phyir// thabs kyi tshul gyis skyol srang de// ye shes su gri 'bar ba'i choms brdad nas// 'du na mang bcod mang ts+tshaH// byang shang mtshams nas las mdzod cig/ dam nyams dag la
324b6(rnying rgyud): phyung zhig/ de la 'di skad ces bkod do// kun kyang ye shrIs 'bar ba'i snod dkyil nas// dgongs spyod rgya mchod pagugis mi yang med// su mdog phyag mtshan cig sa mangs te// drar khrod 'ber ba'i gnas mchog dam pa 'dir// gzung las
324b7(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyen po bris// bdud rtsid med kyi gtor ma gnyan bshams te// zhing chen gsar rnying gdan mchog pating lags kyi// thugs dam bzhin du ci bder gshegs su gsol// gser mdog gzi'ab ro rdo rje'i thugs las sbal/

325a2(rnying rgyud): dbang mchog yo tan rin/ bra las rdul// mu dog na ma dag sbyin chen rtag gi zhal// gsang sa'i yongs shing rkyen sto la gajigs// 'chi ba dag bdud kyi rje 'jom nA rgyan// da rnams pas //

325a4(rnying rgyud): ti 'chin// thabs mkhas 'jab tshul nges par grub par gyis// ye shes thugs rje phyogs bcur khyab pa 'i// bya rgod gzugs kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan// 'khor ba mi srong mya ngan mi 'da' bas// sgra dri mtshan bsdams khrag 'thub gri d+ha ma//

325a6(rnying rgyud): za byed shwa na ma// drag shul rngams pas dam nyams 'drad cing gsol// gang la bya bzlogs med myur du sgrol// drar khrod spyod pas 'gro drug bsgral ba'i phyir// log 'dren dngang po gang ka'i mchus 'byin ma// thabs kyi bshan pasnams zhing chen 'jag
325a7(rnying rgyud): la khrur// 'jig rten bsgral phyir tshe 'brog kang ka ma// gzum shing rngams pa sad+mo snying khor khrag 'dzung // dam tams dgra po'i rtsirta pUr la shog/ shes bya'i bag chags cad nas bcad pa'i phyir// ye shes mchod nga snga mas n+ya grong khrag la mos/

325b2(rnying rgyud): sde mdog sde tshogs 'chang // 'bru drug baphrul gyir lcags kyu rno ba skams shing // mi bzad thod khrag 'byung ba'i rbalA ma// gtum khro'i dbang gis nyams pa'i tshot+ta 'byin// dmanyams dang ze'i srog dang gas ky-id TIg/ de rnam sa la
325b3(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ba stod do// bskal pade me ltar 'byer ba'i grong dkyil nas// sran n+ya zlog tum mi bzang drug po'i d+ha// drin las rgya mtsho thub pa tshul bzhin spyod// gzhan par dri men rgya mtshom par 'grong tshig // 'jo ba'i don gyir rna tshogs sur

325b5(rnying rgyud): nas gsung bar bya ba'i grub thabs la yang / dkyil 'khor brgyad de/ bzlog par bya ba dang / len par za ba dang / bsru bar bya ba dang / dpral bar bya ba dang / rgya bar rgya ba dang / myos par bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba dang / dbrog par zla ba dang / dkyil 'a da
325b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad do// de las brdeg par bya ni/ ya dkyil 'khor 'do ma gang su pa'i lce/ dbus su myur nug zugs ma ze/ dris tu dang d+ham grwa/ tsang ma bcid pating / yungs shA Te gang yang bter lade'i dbus su d+haN+Da la zlog byed ma'i snying po dris pa/ mi khrag
325b7(rnying rgyud): la sngags bcu pa/ gang yin pa'i phyogs sa 'byu // bzlog pa'i dkyil la // len par byaba'i tshul rjo na/ dkyil gang das gang dru bzhel/ dbus su mji dag zug phre tra~M/ de'i dazugs su gastsal la
326a1(rnying rgyud): yi snying po bris la bzhag go// de'i rdzas su byis pa'i snying dang / ser ge'i snying dang / sha chen gyi sgos bzhag go/ ru bar byed pa dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang du zhipa/ dbum bu ser ga
326a2(rnying rgyud): dbu b+ha sta ma/ chu byed ma'i snying po rjes la bzhag go// de mi rdzas su stug gi mche ba dang snying bzhag/ gos kyi shu chen yang bzhig go// dkri bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor de/ dkyil 'khod 'odas gang gru ba zhi la/ dngas su
326a3(rnying rgyud): dbus su dz+wa la/ dpral bar byed pa'i snying po bris la bzhag go// de yi rdzas su bya dkar po'i spring dang mchu bzhag go// skos kyi sha tshon yang bzhag go// spro bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang bu bzhi la/ dbus su ljang nag
326a4(rnying rgyud): dri la dbus su b+han+ta la/ smyo byed ma'i snying po bris la bzhag/ de yi rdzas su bya nab mo'i snying dang mthu bzhag go// myos par byed pa'i rdzas ni/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang bru bzhi la/ dbus su mthing nag gru gsung hri/ oM ste
326a5(rnying rgyud): byed ma'i snying po bris la bzhag go// de yi rdzas su sbyang ki'i snying dang mche ba bzhag/ skos kyi sha chen yang bzhag go// gsod par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su dmar na gsug sum ze/ de ster d+haN+Da la gsod byed
326a6(rnying rgyud): snying ngo bris la bzhag/ de yi steng du bya nag mo'i snying dang mchu bzhag/ skos kyi sha chen yang bzhag go// dbrog par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su ser nag gru gsum bri/ de mi steng du g+han+ta la'i phrog rnyed ma
326a7(rnying rgyud): pa bris la bzhag/ de yi rdzas su 'ug pa'i snying dang mchu bzhag skos kyi sha chen yang bzhag go// phra men ma las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas cho ga'i thabs ni/ dang mo rtse'i las
326b1(rnying rgyud): gzhung bzhin byas la/ bla la me 'gog pa'i gud kyi gtor ma'i chog byas la/ bdag nyid dpal rdo rje he du kar bsgom ste/ dmardzas snying rnams dang / sha chen rnams bkram la/ dadung gi nang du ma mal grag gi snying po bdun bris la g.ya' mas gdang du// du nga du/
326b2(rnying rgyud): k+ta gsum kyis dgang / zhing gi dkyus smras pa'i gtor ma bsham/ tshil chen gyi mar me bltam/ sngam chen gyi dud pa yang btang ste/ bsnyen bzhag bdun btsugs la bsgrubs/ de nas bsnyen pa'i zhag grangs thems pa dang / tsa ka li nag po'i nang du gzugs
326b3(rnying rgyud): dang mir byang gzhug la las bsnol ba'i khar sba'o// de nas b+han+d+ha'i nang du zhing chen gyi rak+tas bkang la snying po bzlas nas grong la gtor ro// dkyil 'khor gyi lha grangs tshang bar bskul lo// gzugs smras par bya ba'i sngags la/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir
326b4(rnying rgyud): srin mo bdun gyi sku gzugs gzug go// dam rdzas kyang phyogs mi nor bar dgram mo// de nas nyams brtag pa ni/ rmi lam ni bud med bzang po dang 'phrad na bzang ngo // bud med ngan na sgrib pa sbyang zhing bshags pa bya'o// snying mi dga' nyams mi 'den/
326b5(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa'i sham yo pas bshags byung // bu 'a'od pa snying mi dkang na mchod pa bya'o// nyams dga' la brjid chen bka' nyan par 'ong / rang gi chung ma der 'phrad pa' mkhro zhing ma btung ni dbang du mi 'dus pa yin pas bsgom par bya'o// gang 'dod pa'i sngags
326b6(rnying rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// tshe 'phrul tshung la rang dman na rang la rkyen 'ong / cho 'phrul chung la bud med dang ma 'phrad na ma mo g.yel ba yin pas/ dung gi nang du snying po bris la shing thig sha'i lcags kyis brdung zhing snying po brjod do// gdung ba'i mchi ma dbyung zhing g.yab
326b7(rnying rgyud): mos g.yan po// de ni ma mo bdun gyi las byang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de rjes bsgom par bya bani/ bdag nyid dpal chen po yak+Sha he ru kar bsgoms la/ rak+sha he ru kar yang mi 'gal lo// de nas ma mo bdun 'jom pa ni/ yi
327a1(rnying rgyud): ha bdun byas skyed do// de nas tal ma nadu ga gzu sa gang zhes 'arjodangs/ gdu rim du dag nagamor la brnyan/ zhal nyim bung bur gsum pa/ sngan gsum snang rdzob tu zugs pa

332b5(rnying rgyud): ral pa gcig ma'i bu mo yin pas pra mo ha zhes bya ba las ci yang sh+lo nus so// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra laD+ga dza/ saM skr-i ta'i skad du/ srin mo ra la gcig ma zhes bya ba/ bod skad du/ kau rI ma nag mo lan byed ma ste las ci yang len nus so// rgya gar skad

338b1(rnying rgyud): rmonya zla thod zeng can// gru gsum 'bar ba'i mig gcig ma// gsu pi ral pas sred pa sgrol// chags pa'i phyag gis pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mche ma skye 'gro'i gsos// tsita zhags pas su stegs sgrol// chu 'phrul shugs kyis cha rnangs nan
338b2(rnying rgyud): de nas spel bar bya ste// grI pa mu ran hUM A yu She hUM a b+hi shA san+ti A yu She hUM a bi yang lang ti A yu She hUM a/ ma hA lang ti hUM A yu She hUM a/ che mchog kun gyi 'phro 'du yis// ga'u rgyal mo lnga bskyal bas// 'phro 'dra nyi ma'i 'od d+har \u0f88\u0f90
338b3(rnying rgyud): de nas tshe gnas bya ba ni// rgyal mo lnga po rten sa bsdu// hUM mkha' mnyam pa yi ye shes ni// chos dbyings nyi ma lta bu la// 'phro 'du ye shes lnga ru shar// bag chags lnga yi chud sbyang nas// 'byung ba lnga yi bcud bsdus pas// mi 'gyur tshe yi dngo
338b4(rnying rgyud): grub thob// bum pa bshig la tshe dbang bskur// gnon po'i sngags kyis dral byas la// smin mtshams sbas la rgya yis gdab// 'brang rgyas bab shis gsal byas nas// mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi gtang rag gtong // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las
338b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ro bsgyur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / phra min rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// srid pa chud kyi byung tshul dang // grub pa'i don ni 'bras bu gnyis// ngo mtshar rgyal bdag nyan 'tshal// bcu mol zhi tshogs rgyal stsogs de// zhwa mo
338b6(rnying rgyud): yongs la khyud bde ba mas// bka' don gtan tshigs gtan la phab// mi nub tshe li ga tan tshigs dag/ rtogs pa don gyi che ba dang // sa gzhi lta bu gcan 'brang dang // rgyal po lte bu'i bka' nyan // mdzad pa thabs kyi thabs dang / gas

339a5(rnying rgyud): kunan/ 'di 'dus po// mtha' la rgyang gI don du shar// ma ni nga gi rang bzhin la// mo ni rig pa'i don shar ba// rig pa ma 'gags gtan tshigs kyis// rgya med don kun gtan la phab// skye med don dam tshad ma yis// b+hi ba'i chos then
339a6(rnying rgyud): gan lab// dkyi sa dang mishes rab bzhin pa ste// blang bdes pa dang ni da/ 'phrul cig tu mtha' 'aman pas// rnal mas thugs kyad kyil nas byung // rang gis rang la brtags bya nga// bang dang khyong nga do sbyin /
339a7(rnying rgyud): nga ba'i rgyas pa ste// shang ba nga nyid dung bas shes// kye 'gag med pa'i da nyid pas// rol ba'i khyad par cing yang snang // mtshan ma'i gzung na tshogs kun// sprin mung mkha' 'thim pa bzhin// maskyes ci
339b1(rnying rgyud): dang du// / thim pa'i rgyal ba phyag rgyags la// sbrang srid dag pa'i rgyan shes na// sum thun gyi gnas yin// srid pa'i snam thams cad dang // rgyal ba'i thugs las kyi thag meng // dam don ni 'dis // mkha' la 'od drugs
339b2(rnying rgyud): rtogs na// 'byung ba lnga yi rnam tog thal// ma skyes rig pa'i don la gsal// chos nyid 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma 'jig/ gser gyi thig la don gsal ba// phra men rgya mtsho spos dang bral// thig la chen po'i don rtogs na// thod phreng ma 'i

339b4(rnying rgyud): don nyid tog gyur na// chags byed ma yi mtshan ma 'jig/ snyoms byed byams pa'i ngang gnas pa// cha snyoms ma yi mtshan ma 'joms// las bsku med pa'i don gsal bas// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i 'dzin tog zal// dpag pas ma ning shi cu/

345a3(rnying rgyud): pa ni// de ni rdo rje nyi ma'i rgyu// / mtheb mo gnyis dang mdzub gnyis bsgreng // gsum po phan tshun thabs su btags// de ni smras pa'i ma bzhi'i rgya// gung mo srin lag so sor dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyis so sor mnan// de ni khros pa'i rgyal mo'i
345a4(rnying rgyud): mthe'u chung mthe bong rtsel mnan// lhag ma gsum po 'di ltar byas// thugs kyi dgyes sde rgya chen yin// phan tshun thabs su btags pa la// phyi ru 'gyed nas 'od 'phros pas// sman mo rnams kyi phyag rgya yin// nyi shA rtsa brgyad po yi phyag rgya
345a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan dang 'gre ste 'dir ma bshad// me tog rgyan gyi mchod pa 'di// snang srid mdzes pa'i mchod pa chen po bzhes// me badrug smos kyi ngud pa chen po 'di// tshim pa'i mchod pa chen po bzhis su gsol// bdud rtsi chen po'i dam skong mchod par
345a6(rnying rgyud): ba zhes// 'dod chags khrag gi mchod pa rnam par bzhis// rmad byung rgyan gyi gtor ba'i mchod par bzhes// zhe sdang ting 'dzin ram gyi mchod par bzhes// 'dod chags spyor byed mchod par bzhes// la la dril chen sgra sgrogs khro ma lo// la la rol pa'i
345a7(rnying rgyud): blo sems se chem// ngob mo ye shes mchod pa chen po bzhes// gnam lcags ngur me me ye mchod par bzhes// gnam la 'gyur dang rgyal 'phyo ba dang // sa la skyes pa'i mdangs kyi mchod par bzhes// nyo dgongs su gsol/ ma mo mkha' 'gro phye na
345b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs su bsgyur ba dang / 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa dang / glog gi lde 'byin pa dang / gnam lcags kyi rgan rdebs pa dang / rgyu 'byung ba lba kha lo sbyar ba'i rgyal mo lnga dang / las mdzad srid pa khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi/ dngas ma'i dbyings las shar ba'i mtshan
345b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang / reg pa rgyan gyi mchen bzhi dang / dman mor grags pa thams cad dang / mkhyen pa dang ni rkyen gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas rig pa don la bzlas/ oM shrI hi sa// badz+ra ba hrI na~M/ sa ma la t+l-i// kroSh+Ti shwa rI ba t+pa ra~M lu ru wa ts+tsha/ thugs las las
345b3(rnying rgyud): ce la 'phro// mkha' la 'du zhing dbyings phrab kra// dkyil 'khor gnyis thebs zhal skor bzlas// rang rung rtsa ba'i snying po sgo// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud lus/ mchod pa rim par bstan pa'i le'u skye bcu pa'o// / hUM thugs kyi kun mkhyen sku re kunaH
345b4(rnying rgyud): khyab// gsung gi sgra sgrogs yon tan cir yang snang // phrin las rgya mtsho mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// ci mi 'ong ba'i kun drug bcu gsum po// rus min spyan drug tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rig pa'i dbyings las shar ba'i dam can tshogs// thugs rje rtse gcig
345b5(rnying rgyud): yin gyis dgongs nas gshegs// srid pa kun gyi las rnams grub pa mo// srid pa'i dman mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gdan rnams bsgyel nas su// gus pa'i las rnams byed par bsgo// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i cha lugs la// ngur
345b6(rnying rgyud): khrod 'bar bas bu pa brgyan// phyag drug phyag chas phye shi grol// bskal pa me yi gzi mdangs can// yum dang gnyis su med par rol// thugs rje dbyings nas rol par mdzad// thugs rje mi 'gyur dbyings nas sku sprul pa// mkha' drug rgyal mo mngon spyod las kyis shig
345b7(rnying rgyud): dmigs skye med dbyings nas nu sprul pa// phra men rgya mtshal sogs las kyis shig/ snying rje chen po'i 'od las spu srul ma// nyi mthong zeng la sogs las kyis shig/ thugs kyi sprul pas khams gsum rdul du rdzog/ khros pa'i dbang chen la sogs las kyis shig/ skye
346a1(rnying rgyud): med mi 'gyur dbyings nas dan ma dadam// thas pa'i mtshan la lags las cis shig/ dag su 'ad las shar ba da sunan// thugs kyad kyis rnal sngags pas byis so// snang byung thams rgyad byu bar dam 'byung ma/
346a2(rnying rgyud): chags byed ma snyoms la sogs las kyis shig/ dpag bas ma shing ga khyer nas sprul pa'i lha// e ka tsa ti la sogs pas kyis shig/ 'thod rlung drag pos snang srid b+h+yo zlog byed// nam mkha'i rgyal mo la sogs las kyis shig/ 'dod tshigs gnas su stobs mdzad
346a3(rnying rgyud): blams snyoms ma// 'dod lams ni mtshan la sogs las kyis shig/ bdud kyi buM slad srid gsum gyi zlog mdzad// srin mo chen mo la sogs las kyis shig/ thugs ji thams pas yab la brtse ba ma// las kyi srin mo la sogs las kyis shig/ btul zhugs stobs
346a4(rnying rgyud): kyis bdud kyi dpung 'joms ma// dmag dpon rgyal mo la sogs las gyis shig/ rdul ba'i bka' bzhin las rnams pas blangs pa// nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbang mo las gyis shig/ rdo rnga mkha' 'gro'i chud las/ bdul ba'i badra ste ba du gcig par//
346a5(rnying rgyud): phra med rgya mtshos yang gsel ba// bsgrub pa'i rim pa gang lags pa// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal// rgyal po bde bas bka' stsal pa// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// 'dab bzhi sgo bzhi yang dag ldan// yab yum brten pa rdzogs byas nas//
346a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang mo'i rtag la// rgyal mo bzhi dang thun mong shar// d+hA nAM tra~M/ b+h+yo/ r-I dza la ni phaT/ sing ting sa la phaT/ pha tsan+ti ha phaT/ yaM ga d+he ya brda/ ti pang phaT/ a bar man+ta phaT/ dngas sam 'di dngas ma phaT/ sa ya~M dus rgyal chen mos
346a7(rnying rgyud): ho// shar phyogs khams nas gshegs su gsol// me yi 'di nas rnam sbal ma// lho phyogs khams nas gshegs su gsol// chu yi dang sams thul po mo// nub phyogs khams nas gshegs pu gas la// rlung gi byed las skyed pa mo// byang rdzogs
346b1(rnying rgyud): nas gshegs su gsol// lha yi bu ma 'dab bzang mo// gshin rje'i bu mngal ba can// mu mi bu mo yid 'phrog ma// gnad sbyin bu mo gar ma kha nAm// thugs pa ni dag nas gshegs su gsol// thim pa'i rgyal ma'i bya brag ni// rgya mtsho gzugs kyi theg par
346b2(rnying rgyud): gser mig 'brar ba'i sha yis bskang // rgya mchod ma yi khog pa rtsa// car ka'i pa'i mdangs kyis bskang // na khro ta la khog pa rba// sbyongs byed ma yi brgyad kyis bltams// gnod byin 'bar ba'i rtse mo rba// gangs kyi zhun chu 'bar bas bskang // mthun pa'i
346b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas kyis lu gnyis bya// spyi dpal chen po mchod byas nas// rang rang sngags kyis mchod par rje// lha yi 'bar ba'i me skyil du// rnon gyi 'khor lo dmigs pa yis// sri tse na yi thag pas gdags// gzugs mo byi thur dag ma stong // hUM dpal gyi ponya
346b4(rnying rgyud): chen mo ni// ston zla gsum gyi ngos shed la// khri gdugs gdal pa'i shar phyogs nas// srid pa bgreng bu sha za ma// shar nas dam sri sha dang phrol// dgun zla gsum gyi ngos shed las// khri gzugs gdal ba'i lho gyogs nas// srid pa'i 'phrad nyal drod
346b5(rnying rgyud): 'phrog ma// lho nas dam sri drod dang phrol// dbyar zla gsum gyi ngos shed la// khri gdugs gdal ba'i nub phyogs nas// srid pa ta sbyor khrag 'dzag ma// nub nas dam gri khrag dang grol// khri gdugs gdal ba'i byang phyogs nas// srid pa'i gan rgyal dbug
346b6(rnying rgyud): 'phrog ma// byang nas dam sri dbugs dang grol// hU~M gling bzhi mgyogs ma shar nas gshegs// mkha' la khyud lding lho nas gshegs// dmar mo g.yag mgo nub nas gshegs// ser mo las mkhan byang nas gshegs// e la gnas pa'i dam srim/
346b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo bzhi li rno yis gcad// tri tsit+ta la khad kan/ re tset+ta la bu ma lum/ kha ma tsit+ta la hUM/ a tsiN+Da la ha phaT/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ dam sri rlag byed khrag gi lag cha/ phung byed bregs pa'i rdo khasgril gyi le'u lte bcu gnyis pa'o// // dben pa
347a1(rnying rgyud): na rdzu dus na/ blas sun su kun du smra /
347a2(rnying rgyud): pas/ mA da ni na/ zhin/ ragu gshis/ tshul / gargyasangs/ yu sa/ mangs/ phyogs ma mas brgyad na pa 'a gres// kwib pa'i btsad gas pastan kyil/
347a3(rnying rgyud): slong son// sde tshogs lu li ci sbyang bas// thob pa'i rgyal mo mnyes par bya// dang dang sngags la ru lus sngags// thugs kAr sngags zer 'gro 'dus babul// bzhi 'i lho phyogs e yi gnas// srin po 'dul ba'i gzugs nyid pa/ TIg
347a4(rnying rgyud): debs rgyangs bya// gangs ri 'bar ba'i rgyal 'azhag/ de nas so nya ma ngag pa ste// hU~M mi dmigs ting 'dzin mi shes bde ba rgya// he ru chums 'khor du bzhad// phul pa phreng gi'i mgo brjon// gangs kyi stongs nas der zla 'byor// gcan du
347a5(rnying rgyud): po'adang cing 'dzang // da nyams dul du klo pa'i rgyal bab// hU~M mi dmigs ti na'i gsang de che/ pa stag gi mgo brjon// dam nyas sa dan pa phra pa sa la shA// dri mi dmigase po mi la ra/

347a7(rnying rgyud): rten ma dra granas ga mnan pas// nag thamag can rung bas// gdug pa chen gyi na gis dgang // don ma thong nas mi bas la// da kyims yangs// byed pa man zhig nyis la// ra tha~M
347b1(rnying rgyud): d+ha d+ha y-i k+Sha ba dang // mchi rkyen rgya chol mchod par gyur// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ bshan pa ma brgyad sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa'i lelnga sde bcu gsam pa'o// / dben gnas gtan pa'i gnas mchog rtsa// maN+Da/
347b2(rnying rgyud): 'jim pa'i dri byugs la// gru gsum gcig la rtsibs bgyid ldan// che mchog bsnyen pa rdzogs byas nas// yum gyi b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'khor// snying po thig le spros pa las// da ri hU~M phaT/ ruwa hU~M phaT/ ra ta hU~M phaT/ nA te ka hUM phaT/ grA sha
347b3(rnying rgyud): te hUM phaT/ a to ye hUM phaT/ bi ta swa phaT/ dur rtsa ye phaT/ dzaHhU~M h+Na he phaT/ rgyan ldan sngags kyis mchod byas la// stong rje brgyad kyi 'phro 'du bya// rang dang sngags la ru lus sngags// mthing nag e yi dkyil 'khor du// su rba na yi rgyal pa ru// nr-i tran
347b4(rnying rgyud): yi gzugs bcug la// de nas dpal gyi pho nya la// hUM shar gyi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// dpal gyi bkrag 'phrog nam mkha'i gzi// sku mdog dkar ser sprin gyi ral pa can// lci gtsug dmar po zhe sdang skyed// gar mda' phyag gnyis gza' yi zhags pa
347b5(rnying rgyud): 'ben// g.yas pa 'od zer dmar po g.yon pa tshwa tshuchags cha 'dzin// jib mgo chang nyan d+ha ru// nying khrag dmaral dajoms shig/ hUM ma gyogs nas bskal ba ni// dpal gyi khrag 'byung nam mkha'i gzi// khrag ma dog dmar po pas li ral pa can/
347b6(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM gtsug 'od zer dmar po skyes// g.yas pa 'od zer dmar po 'dzin// gshin rje mgo btsad b+han d+ha d+ha// snying khrag dmar lang sdoms shig/ hU~M nung kyi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// dpal gyi drod 'phrog nam mkhadeg zhi// me 'phreng gu 'phreng ma yi ral pa can/
347b7(rnying rgyud): skyeg tsugs sa 'dad chags dmang pa byas// mas rgyag rgyas babs byud// mi mdang napas gnyis brgya bathum tshus// chu bdud mag cid smra// khrag dmang sa de rloms shig/ byung gargyags nas bal pani// dpung tu

349b1(rnying rgyud): danas pa nya ba tu ste// d+hu shar gyi phyogs nas bzhengs su bzhed// rung gi blang brgyan dul// yanan gnas la mnan // ma cha ba gangs rig tams pa'ang// sbyini ldan gyi klog pas mgyogs// de 'dang sems na
349b2(rnying rgyud): chen po la// bse yi lces bu 'phrul can zhon// skul bas khrab khra bo gsol// phyag na bse mdung dmar po bsnams// dpral bse yi chog zhu gsol// rdo rje 'bang ba'i phra dog skyes// bdud g.yag 'bring gi gzhu mo la//
349b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba 'i 'chang nyung dkyil// gser gyi mchog ma 'bar ba la// dngul gyi sbyin gyis sdebs sbyar nas// zhing gi rgyus kyi rgyud ngu bltams// skrag ma byang chung shir bu la// ye shes bzhi yi sgo yis bskyon// bde chen chos kyi dbyings

351a1(rnying rgyud): las slobacwal / gdun gyi snying du sgrub na gang / denas rang bzhin stan rdungs kyi/ rlochos sumanya ma nyid dal pa'ibya// sgron pa mang bang gis gzugs sugs la// 'am dpa rgya

351a6(rnying rgyud): dang b+h+yo nag mo// wAg nA ga gu chu mun NI// dus la rub cing dam la gnas// ma lus lus la gAshegs su gsol// mchod pa ci sngags khri 'bum bzlas// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor bskor// kyi na gsang ba'i
351a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo gsum// bzhi pa sgo yi dkyil 'khor lo// rgyas pa kla po cid rten// dbang ni chung ma'i snying gar te// bas dpag shin rje'i lto badz+ra// rgyag pa dred dang rnga mo gnyis// dbye ba rta dang ser ge gnyis/
351b1(rnying rgyud): 'brog sha ba'i khyab d+haH// lkugs pa pag ga badz+raH// gnan pa rnye ba 'og/ swAH// dam mkha' 'gro rgyud lag+sa/ gzhon rje'i bo brang gi le m+buny+tsi tha pa'o// / bang rtog pa kha ba dz+nyAn// skyed
351b2(rnying rgyud): yis tshig chag gdab// zla gam gcig la rtsibs bzhis brgyan// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis yab yum bskyed// oM ma ru tse many+dzu shrIHku mA ra ya mAn+ta ka ma ba to me hUM/ rtsa brtsa ma ri shig/ snying rtse ma la b+h+yo/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya
351b3(rnying rgyud): dza dzaH/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ 'bum bzlas/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka bag sha ya ha na hA na hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka tsit+ta sa na tsit+ta hUM phaT/ re re yang 'bum 'bum mo// de nas las la sbyar te/ de
351b4(rnying rgyud): nas drag po e dkyil du// gangs la g.ya' yis bstan la brag/ bkug la rten la bstims pa bsgral// oM hri ling shang kha ru dri dza ya g+ha zad/ bu che ma ga 'da' ru ru phA zlum thum/ shel shel khyud khyud shog shog rbad ling mA ni dza/
351b5(rnying rgyud): rnam smin lus bshig go// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ bshan pa dmar po'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / mon pa khros pa'i mdor ris la// e yig dbus su dgod pa ni// song ga dkar mo mi to baH/
351b6(rnying rgyud): shar du shes lnga bskum nas ni// phag pa'i thod pa bka' nas ni// yugs sa mo yi zhabs mas dkri// dpal gyi thugs las bkrag med sprul// g.yas pa ral gri khram shing tshul// g.yon pa yungs kar no rdol brdega.oM
351b7(rnying rgyud): a l+r-ing ljang d+ha hrIH/ wad lding / yang to rdzing / na te ma dra la rbad/ ti ti ma dra ya nAng/ ti ti nag po tang Ta/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ bdud nag po la gtad pa'i maru b+ha nyi gnyis pa'o// /
352a1(rnying rgyud): turgyu sun/ smras pa sa/ dang/
352a2(rnying rgyud): par gyur// lngas byung ba gams tha bye la zugs/ byed khon kyad migasas chos ti la grags// las rgyang legs na 'gyur// rgyam thad lagan zung ma nyiman+tu// rjes migasas mdza \u0f7f/
352a3(rnying rgyud): dang po bad kan ste skyed cing // gnyis pa mkhris pa skyed byed cing // gsum pa rlung ni skye bar byed// chu ba'i rlung ni gsum kar khyab// rus pa'i nad ni skyed par byed// rnal 'byor nad kyis zin pa la// bskang gso'i tshig byas
352a4(rnying rgyud): par byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / nyon cig yab kyis bka' stsal ba// nga legs rgyud chen po 'di// bla men rgya mtsho nyid la gtad// ma 'ongs sems
352a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// 'di mos pa phrad par 'byur// ma mos sems can phrad mi 'gyur// phrad na log na dngos grub sa la// rdo rje dmyal bsgyung zhes bshad// dmod btsugs pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / rgyud kyi
352a6(rnying rgyud): po rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i chud las srid pa phranani rgya mtshos bsdus pa rdzogs so//
